GE07hv_apppu:0: [h: HV (CE) appendix 1, transliterated by Peter Bisschop, version of october 31, 2001 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:1: [k: After 7.45, S1 K1.3 Dn Ds D1.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2: prathame merusāvarṇe pravakṣyāmi munīñ śṛṇu // HV_App.I,1.1 //
GE07hv_apppu:3: meghātithis tu paulastyo vasuḥ kāśyapa eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:4: jyotiṣmān bhārgavaś caiva dyutimān aṅgirās tathā // HV_App.I,1.3 //
GE07hv_apppu:6: paulahaḥ sapta ity ete ṛṣayo rohite 'ntare // HV_App.I,1.5 //
GE07hv_apppu:7: devatānāṃ gaṇās tatra traya eva narādhipa /
GE07hv_apppu:8: dakṣaputrasya putrās te rohitasya prajāpateḥ // HV_App.I,1.7 //
GE07hv_apppu:11: prathamasya tu sāvarṇer nava putrā mahaujasaḥ // HV_App.I,1.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:12: daśame tv atha paryāye dvitīyasyāntare manoḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13: haviṣmān paulahaś caiva sukṛtiś caiva bhārgavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14: āpomūrtis tathātreyo vāsiṣṭhaś cāṣṭamaḥ smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,1.13 //
GE07hv_apppu:15: paulastyaḥ pramatiś caiva nābhogaś caiva kāśyapaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17: devatānāṃ gaṇau dvau tau ṛṣimantrāś ca ye smṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,1.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:18: manoḥ sutottamaujāś ca nikuṣañjaś ca vīryavān /
GE07hv_apppu:20: bhūridyumnaḥ suvarcāś ca daśa tv ete manoḥ sutāḥ // HV_App.I,1.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:22: tasya saptaṛṣīṃś cāpi kīrtyamānān nibodha me // HV_App.I,1.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:23: haviṣmān kāśyapaś cāpi haviṣmān yaś ca bhārgavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24: taruṇaś ca tathātreyo vāsiṣṭhas tv anaghas tathā // HV_App.I,1.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:25: aṅgirāś cārudhiṣṇyaś ca paulastyo niścaras tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:26: paulahaś cāgnitejāś ca bhāvyāḥ sapta maharṣayaḥ // HV_App.I,1.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:27: brahmaṇas tu sutā devā gaṇās teṣāṃ trayaḥ smṛtāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:28: sarvatragaḥ suśarmā ca devānīkaḥ purūdvahaḥ // HV_App.I,1.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:29: kṣemadhanvā dṛḍhāyuś ca ādarśaḥ paṇḍako manuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:30: sāvarṇasya tu putrā vai tṛtīyasya nava smṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,1.29 //
GE07hv_apppu:31: caturthasya tu sāvarṇer ṛṣīn sapta nibodha me /
GE07hv_apppu:32: dyutir vasiṣṭhaputraś ca ātreyaḥ sutapās tathā // HV_App.I,1.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:34: tapośanaś ca paulastyaḥ paulahaś ca tapo raviḥ // HV_App.I,1.33 //
GE07hv_apppu:35: bhārgavaḥ saptamas teṣāṃ vijñeyas tu tapodhṛtiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:36: pañca devagaṇāḥ proktā mānasā brahmaṇaś ca te // HV_App.I,1.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:38: mitravān mitravindaś ca mitrasenaś ca mitrakṛt /
GE07hv_apppu:39: mitrabāhuḥ suvarcāś ca dvādaśasya manoḥ sutāḥ // HV_App.I,1.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:41: aṅgirāś caiva dhṛtimān paulastyo havyapastu yaḥ // HV_App.I,1.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:42: paulahas tattvadarśī ca bhārgavaś ca nirutsukaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:43: niṣprakampas tathātreyo nirmohaḥ kaśyapas tathā // HV_App.I,1.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:44: sutapāś caiva vāsiṣṭhaḥ saptaite tu maharṣayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:45: traya eva gaṇāḥ proktā devatānāṃ svayaṃbhuvā // HV_App.I,1.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:46: trayodaśasya putrās te vijñeyās tu ruceḥ sutāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:47: citraseno vicitraś ca nayo dharmabhṛto dhṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,1.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:48: sunetraḥ kṣatravṛddhaś ca sutapā nirbhayo dṛḍhaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:49: raucyasyaite manoḥ putrā antare tu trayodaśe // HV_App.I,1.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:51: agnīdhraḥ kāśyapaś caiva paulasyo māgadhas tathā // HV_App.I,1.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:52: bhārgavo hy atibāhuś ca śucir āṅgirasas tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:53: yuktaś caiva tathātreyaḥ śukro vāsiṣṭha eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:54: ajitaḥ paulahaś caiva antyāḥ saptarṣayaś ca te // HV_App.I,1.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:55: [h: HV (CE) appendix 2, transliterated by Peter Bisschop, version of october 31, 2001 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:56: [k: After the addl. colophon after 7.47, N (except S1 N1) T2-4 G ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:59: brahmaṇo 'hnaḥ pramāṇaṃ ca vaktum arhasi me dvija // HV_App.I,2.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:62: tām upādāya gaṇanāṃ śṛṇu saṃkhyām ariṃdama // HV_App.I,2.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:63: nimeṣaiḥ pañcadaśabhiḥ kāṣṭhā triṃśat tu tāḥ kalā /
GE07hv_apppu:64: triṃśatkalo muhūrtas tu triṃśatā tair manīṣiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,2.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:68: viśeṣeṇa tu sarveṣu ahorātraṃ ca nityaśaḥ // HV_App.I,2.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:70: pakṣau dvau ca smṛto māso dvau māsāv ṛtur ucyate // HV_App.I,2.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:71: abdaṃ dvyayanam uktaṃ tu ayanaṃ tv ṛtubhis tribhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:74: pitṝṇāṃ tad ahorātram iti kālavido viduḥ // HV_App.I,2.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:75: kṛṣṇapakṣas tv ahas teṣāṃ śuklapakṣas tu śarvarī /
GE07hv_apppu:76: kṛṣṇapakṣe tv ahaḥśrāddhaṃ pitṝṇāṃ vartate nṛpa // HV_App.I,2.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:77: mānuṣeṇa tu mānena yo vai saṃvatsaraḥ smṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:79: divyam ekam ahas tena tathā māsābdasaṃsthitiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:80: devānāṃ tad ahorātraṃ divā caivottarāyaṇam // HV_App.I,2.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:83: dakṣiṇāyanaṃ smṛtā rātriḥ prājñais tattvārthakovidaiḥ // HV_App.I,2.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:85: divyam abdaṃ daśaguṇam ahorātraṃ manoḥ smṛtam /
GE07hv_apppu:86: ahorātraṃ daśaguṇaṃ mānavaḥ pakṣa ucyate // HV_App.I,2.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:87: pakṣo daśaguṇo māso māsair dvādaśabhir guṇaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:88: ṛtur manūnāṃ saṃproktaḥ prājñais tattvārthadarśibhiḥ // HV_App.I,2.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:90: [k: For line 24, N2.3 V B2 D6 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:91: ṣaḍbhis tair vatsaraṃ proktaṃ tena saṃkhyā nibadhyate /
GE07hv_apppu:92: catvāry eva sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ tu kṛtaṃ yugam // HV_App.I,2.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:93: tāvac chatī bhavet saṃdhyā saṃdhyāṃśaś ca tathā nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:95: tasyāś ca triśatī saṃdhyā saṃdhyāṃśaś ca tathāparaḥ // HV_App.I,2.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:96: tathā varṣasahasre dve dvāparaṃ parikīrtitam // HV_App.I,2.29 //
GE07hv_apppu:97: tasyāpi dviśatī saṃdhyā saṃdhyāśaś ca tathāvidhaḥ // HV_App.I,2.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:100: tasyāpi śatikā saṃdhyā saṃdhyāṃśaś caiva tadvidhaḥ // HV_App.I,2.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:102: divyenānena mānena yugasaṃkhyāṃ nibodha me // HV_App.I,2.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:104: sasarja sa punas tāta jagat sarvam idaṃ vibhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:105: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kaliś caiva caturyugam /
GE07hv_apppu:108: ayanaṃ cāpi tat proktaṃ dve 'yane dakṣiṇottare // HV_App.I,2.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:109: manuḥ pralīyate hy atra samāpte 'thāyane prabho /
GE07hv_apppu:113: tato 'paro manuḥ kālam etāvantaṃ bhavaty uta /
GE07hv_apppu:114: samatīteṣu rājendra proktaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ sa vai // HV_App.I,2.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:115: tad eva cāyutaṃ proktaṃ muninā tattvadarśinā /
GE07hv_apppu:116: brahmaṇas tad ahaḥ proktaṃ kalpaś ceti sa śabdyate // HV_App.I,2.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:123: brāhme divasaparyante kalpo niḥśeṣa ucyate // HV_App.I,2.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:124: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 3, transliterated by Horst Brinkhaus,
GE07hv_apppu:125: proof--read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of January 22, 2001 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:126: [k: D6T GM1.3.4 ins. appendix I, No. 3 after 13.73, M2 after 13.69 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:127: ity ete pitaro devā devāś ca pitaraḥ punaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:128: anyonyaṃ pitaro hy ete devāś ca pitaraś ca ha // HV_App.I,3.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:129: trayo mūrtim ṛte tāta catvāras tu samūrtayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:130: teṣāṃ śrāddhāni satkṛtya devāḥ kurvanti yatnataḥ // HV_App.I,3.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:132: viśve ca sikatāś caiva pṛśnayaḥ śṛṅgiṇas tathā // HV_App.I,3.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:133: kṛṣṇā viśvā ajāś caiva vidhivat pūjayanty uta /
GE07hv_apppu:134: prajās tu vātaraśanā divākīrtyās tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,3.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:135: meghāś ca marutaś caiva brahmādyāś ca divaukasaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:136: bhṛgvaṅgirotripramukhā ṛṣayaḥ sarva eva ca // HV_App.I,3.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:137: yakṣā nāgāḥ suparṇāś ca kiṃnarāś cāraṇaiḥ saha /
GE07hv_apppu:138: pūjayanti pitṝn ete sarva eva phalārthina // HV_App.I,3.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:139: evam ete mahātmānaḥ śrāddhaiḥ satkṛtya pūjitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:140: sarvān kāmān prayacchanti śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,3.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:142: mokṣayogaṃ prayacchanti aiśvaryaṃ ca pitāmahāḥ // HV_App.I,3.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:144: kṛtsnaṃ vairāgyam ānantyaṃ prayacchanti pitāmahāḥ // HV_App.I,3.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:151: koṭiśaś caiva ratnāni prayacchanti pitāmahāḥ // HV_App.I,3.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:156: prajāṃ puṣṭiṃ dhṛtiṃ medhāṃ rājyam ārogyam eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:157: prītā nityaṃ prayacchanti mānuṣāṇāṃ pitāmahāḥ // HV_App.I,3.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:158: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 4, transliterated by Horst Brinkhaus,
GE07hv_apppu:159: proof--read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of January 22, 2001 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:160: [k: D6 S G(ed.) ins. Appendix I, No. 4 after 13.75 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:164: āgrahāyaṇamūlāḥ syur aśṭakās tisra eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:165: kṛṣṇapakṣe variṣṭhā ca pūrvā caindrī ca bhāṣitā /
GE07hv_apppu:166: prājāpatyā dvitīyā syāt tṛtīyā vaiśvadevikī // HV_App.I,4.5 //
GE07hv_apppu:167: ādyāpūpaiḥ smṛtā nityaṃ māṃsair anyā bhavet sadā /
GE07hv_apppu:168: śākaiḥ kāryā tṛtīyā syād eṣa dravyagato vidhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:169: anvaṣṭakyaṃ pitṝṇāṃ vai nityam eva vidhīyate // HV_App.I,4.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:170: yā cāpy anyā caturthī syāt tāṃ ca kuryāt prayatnataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:172: śreyāṃsi kṣipram āyānti paratreha ca modate // HV_App.I,4.11 //
GE07hv_apppu:174: sarve puruṣam āyānti nipāneṣv iva dhenavaḥ // HV_App.I,4.13 //
GE07hv_apppu:175: mā sma śreyaḥ prayaccheyur aṣṭakāyām apūjitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:176: moghās tasya bhavanty āśāḥ paratreha ca nityaśaḥ // HV_App.I,4.15 //
GE07hv_apppu:178: devāṃś ca dāyino yānti tiryag gacchanty adāyinaḥ // HV_App.I,4.17 //
GE07hv_apppu:179: puṣṭiṃ prajāṃ smṛtiṃ medhāṃ putrān aiśvaryam eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:180: kurvāṇaḥ paurṇamāsyāṃ tu sarvaṃ saṃpūrṇam aśnute // HV_App.I,4.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:182: dvitīyāyāṃ tu yaḥ kuryād dvipadādhipatir bhavet // HV_App.I,4.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:184: caturthyāṃ vai prakurvāṇaḥ śatrucchidrāṇi paśyati // HV_App.I,4.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:185: pañcamyām api kurvāṇaḥ prāpnoti mahatīṃ śriyam /
GE07hv_apppu:186: ṣaṣṭhyāṃ śrāddhāni kurvāṇaḥ prāpnoti dvijapūjanam // HV_App.I,4.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:187: kurute yas tu saptamyāṃ śrāddhāni satataṃ naraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:188: mahāsatram avāpnoti gaṇānāṃ cādhipo bhavet // HV_App.I,4.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:189: pūrṇāṃ vṛttim avāpnoti yo 'ṣṭamyāṃ kurute naraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:190: śrāddhaṃ navamyāṃ kartavyam aiśvaryaṃ nṛṣu kāṅkṣatā // HV_App.I,4.29 //
GE07hv_apppu:191: kurvan daśamyāṃ tu naro brāhmīṃ śriyam avāpnuyāt /
GE07hv_apppu:192: vedāṃś caivāpnuyāt sarvān viprāṇāṃ saṃmato bhavet // HV_App.I,4.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:193: ekādaśyāṃ paraṃ dānam aiśvaryaṃ saṃtatiṃ tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:194: dvādaśyāṃ jayalābhāya rājyam āyur vasūni ca // HV_App.I,4.33 //
GE07hv_apppu:195: prajāvṛddhiṃ maśūn medhyān svātantryaṃ puṣṭim uttamām /
GE07hv_apppu:196: dīrgham āyur athaiśvaryaṃ kurvāṇasya trayodaśīm // HV_App.I,4.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:197: yuvān astu gṛhe yasya mṛtās teṣāṃ pradāpayet /
GE07hv_apppu:198: śastreṇa vā hatā ye tu teṣāṃ dadyāc caturdaśīm // HV_App.I,4.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:199: amāvāsyāṃ prayatnena śrāddhaṃ kuryāc chuciḥ sadā /
GE07hv_apppu:200: sarvān kāmān avāpnoti svarge cānantyam aśnute // HV_App.I,4.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:203: lokaṃ mānavam āpnoti tatra sarvam samaśnute /
GE07hv_apppu:204: evam āpyāyitaḥ somas trīṃl lokān dhārayiṣyati // HV_App.I,4.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:206: stavaiḥ puṇyair manojñaiś ca sarvakāmaparicchadaiḥ // HV_App.I,4.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:209: stuvanti devagandharvāḥ siddhasaṃghāś ca taṃ sadā /
GE07hv_apppu:210: pitṛbhaktas tv amāvāsyāṃ sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt // HV_App.I,4.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:211: maghāsu kurvañ śrāddhāni sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt /
GE07hv_apppu:212: pratyakṣam arcitās tena bhavanti pitaraḥ sadā /
GE07hv_apppu:213: pitṛdevā maghā yasmāt tasmāt tāsv akṣayaṃ viduḥ // HV_App.I,4.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:215: yamas tu yāni śrāddhāni provāca śaśabindave /
GE07hv_apppu:216: tāni me śṛṇu kāmyāni nakṣatreṣu pṛthak pṛthak // HV_App.I,4.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:217: śrāddhaṃ yaḥ kṛttikāyoge kurvīta satataṃ naraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:220: durgāṇi tarate nityaṃ dhṛtimān puṣṭimān bhavet /
GE07hv_apppu:222: krūrakarmaṇi bhāgī syād ārdrāyāṃ śrāddham ācaran /
GE07hv_apppu:223: kṣetre putreṣu bhāgī syāc chrāddhaṃ kurvan punarvasau /
GE07hv_apppu:224: [k: T3 subst. for lines 55b-57, T4 ins. after line 55 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:226: ārdrāyāṃ nītimān saumyaḥ puṣṭimāṃś ca punarvasau /
GE07hv_apppu:227: puṣṭikāmaḥ punaḥ puṣye śrāddhaṃ kurvīta mānavaḥ // HV_App.I,4.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:228: āśleṣāsu punar dattvā vīrān putrān avāpnuyāt /
GE07hv_apppu:229: śreṣṭho bhavati bandhūnāṃ maghāsu śrāddham ācaran // HV_App.I,4.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:230: phalgunīṣu punaḥ kṛtvā saubhāgyaṃ labhate naraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:231: pradānaśīlaḥ sāpatya uttarāsu karoti yaḥ // HV_App.I,4.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:232: saṃsatsu mukhyo bhavati haste yas tarpayet pitṝn /
GE07hv_apppu:233: citrāyāṃ kurute yas tu putrān rūpavato labhet /
GE07hv_apppu:234: svātinā tu dvijaḥ kuryād vāṇijyena jijīviṣuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:235: putrārthaṃ tu viśākhāsu śrāddham īheta mānavaḥ // HV_App.I,4.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:237: ādhipatyaṃ labhec chrāddhaṃ jyeṣṭhāyāṃ kurute hi yaḥ // HV_App.I,4.68 //
GE07hv_apppu:239: tathottarāsv aṣāḍhāsu vītaśoko bhaven naraḥ // HV_App.I,4.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:240: śravaṇena tu lokeṣu prāpnuyāt paramāṃ gatiṃ /
GE07hv_apppu:241: rājyabhogāñ śraviṣṭhāsu prāpnuyād vipulaṃ dhanam // HV_App.I,4.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:242: śrāddhaṃ tv abhijitā kurvan vedān sāṅgān avāpnuyāt /
GE07hv_apppu:243: nakṣatre vāruṇe kurvan bhiṣaksiddhim avāpnuyāt // HV_App.I,4.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:245: uttarāsu punaḥ kurvaṃl labhate gāḥ sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,4.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:246: revatyāṃ kurute yas tu rūpyaṃ bahu labhen naraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:247: aśvinīṣu hayāñ śreṣṭhān bharaṇyām āyur uttamam // HV_App.I,4.78 //
GE07hv_apppu:248: imaṃ śrāddhavidhiṃ kurvañ śaśabindur mahīm imām /
GE07hv_apppu:249: akleśenālabhat kṛtsnāṃ labdhvā ca praśaśāsa ha // HV_App.I,4.80 //
GE07hv_apppu:251: rājataṃ rajatāktaṃ vā pitṝṇāṃ pātram ucyate /
GE07hv_apppu:252: rajatasya kathā vāpi darśanaṃ dānam eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:253: ānantyam akṣayaṃ svargyaṃ rājataṃ dānam ucyate // HV_App.I,4.83 //
GE07hv_apppu:254: pitṝṇāṃ tena dānena satputrās tārayanty uta /
GE07hv_apppu:255: paṭhyamānaḥ sadā śrāddhe niyato brahmavādibhiḥ // HV_App.I,4.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:256: rājate hi svadhā dugdhā pātre 'smin pitṛbhiḥ purā /
GE07hv_apppu:257: akṣayārthaṃ mahī yasmāt tasmin dattam ato 'kṣayam // HV_App.I,4.87 //
GE07hv_apppu:258: kṛṣṇājinasya sāṃnidhyaṃ darśanaṃ dānam eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:259: rakṣoghnaṃ brahmavarcasyaṃ paśūn putrāṃś ca tārayet // HV_App.I,4.89 //
GE07hv_apppu:260: kāñcanaṃ rājataṃ pātraṃ dauhitraḥ kutapas tilāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:261: bastaś ca pāvanīyāni tridaṇḍī yoginas tathā // HV_App.I,4.91 //
GE07hv_apppu:262: śrāddhakarmaṇy ayaṃ śreṣṭho vidhir brahman sanātanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:263: āyuḥ puṣṭir yaśaḥ kīrtiḥ prajñā saṃtativardhanaḥ // HV_App.I,4.93 //
GE07hv_apppu:266: vakṣyāmi vidhivat sthānaṃ pitṝṇām iti śāstrataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:268: tatra gartās trayaḥ kāryās trayo daṇḍāś ca khādirāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:269: aratnimātrās te kāryā rajatena vibhūṣitāḥ // HV_App.I,4.99 //
GE07hv_apppu:271: prāgdakṣiṇāyatāḥ kāryāḥ sthirā naśuṣirās tathā // HV_App.I,4.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:273: payobhyām ājagavyābhyāṃ śodhanaṃ vāgbhir eva ca // HV_App.I,4.103 //
GE07hv_apppu:274: tarpaṇaṃ satataṃ hy etat tṛptir bhavati śāśvatī /
GE07hv_apppu:275: iha cāmutra ca śrīmān sarvakāmasamanvitaḥ // HV_App.I,4.105 //
GE07hv_apppu:278: triḥsaptasaṃjñās te yasmāt trailokyaṃ dhāryate hi taiḥ // HV_App.I,4.108
GE07hv_apppu:279: tasya puṣṭir athaiśvaryam āyuḥ saṃtatir eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:280: divi ca bhrājate lakṣmyā mokṣaṃ ca labhate kramāt // HV_App.I,4.110 //
GE07hv_apppu:282: mantraṃ tasmād ahaṃ vakṣye amṛtaṃ brahmasaṃmitam // HV_App.I,4.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:283: devatābhyaḥ pitṛbhyaś ca mahāyogibhya eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:284: namaḥ svadhāyai svāhāyai nityam eva namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,4.114 //
GE07hv_apppu:286: aśvamedhaphalaṃ hy etad vipraiḥ satkṛtya pūjitam // HV_App.I,4.116 //
GE07hv_apppu:288: pitaraḥ kṣipram āyānti rākṣasāḥ pradravanti ca // HV_App.I,4.118 //
GE07hv_apppu:289: pitryo 'yaṃ triṣu lokeṣu mantro 'yaṃ tārayaty uta /
GE07hv_apppu:290: paṭhyamānaḥ sadā śrāddhe niyatair brahmavādibhiḥ // HV_App.I,4.120 //
GE07hv_apppu:291: rājyakāmo japed evaṃ sadā mantram atandritaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:293: prīyante pitaro yena japena niyamena ca /
GE07hv_apppu:296: namasyāmi sadā teṣāṃ dhyāyināṃ yogacakṣuṣām // HV_App.I,4.126 //
GE07hv_apppu:298: pitaraḥ saptarṣīṇāṃ ca tān namasyāmi kāmadān // HV_App.I,4.128 //
GE07hv_apppu:300: tān namaskṛtya sarvān vai pitṝñ jalasamudrayoḥ // HV_App.I,4.130 //
GE07hv_apppu:301: nakṣatrāṇāṃ grahāṇāṃ ca vāyvagnipitaraś ca ye /
GE07hv_apppu:302: dyāvāpṛthivyoś ca sadā namasye 'haṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ // HV_App.I,4.132 //
GE07hv_apppu:304: [k: T3 ins. after line 133, T4 after line 140 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:305: etac ca vidhinā yuktaḥ śrīmān kuryān narādhipa /
GE07hv_apppu:307: prajāpater gavāṃ vahneḥ somāya ca yamāya ca /
GE07hv_apppu:308: yogeśvarebhyaś ca sadā namasye 'haṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ // HV_App.I,4.136 //
GE07hv_apppu:309: namaḥ pitṛgaṇebhyas saptabhyo ye ca kīrtitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:312: pavitraṃ paramaṃ hy etac chrīmad rakṣoghnam eva ca // HV_App.I,4.140 //
GE07hv_apppu:313: etena vidhinā yuktas trīn varāṃl labhate naraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:314: bhaktyā paramayā yuktaḥ śraddadhāno jitendriyaḥ // HV_App.I,4.142 //
GE07hv_apppu:315: saptarcaṃ tu japed yas tu nityam eva samāhitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:317: yena proktas tv ayaṃ kalpo namas tasmai svayaṃbhuve /
GE07hv_apppu:318: mahāyogeśvarebhyaś ca sadā saṃpraṇato 'smy aham // HV_App.I,4.146 //
GE07hv_apppu:319: vartante pitaras tāta devānāṃ divi devatāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:320: saptasv ete sthitā nityaṃ sthāneṣu pitaro 'vyayāḥ // HV_App.I,4.148 //
GE07hv_apppu:322: ādyo gaṇas tu yogīnāṃ sa nityo yogavardhanaḥ // HV_App.I,4.150 //
GE07hv_apppu:326: śeṣās tu varṇināṃ jñeyā iti sarve prakīrtitāḥ // HV_App.I,4.152 //
GE07hv_apppu:327: pitṝn prīṇāti yo bhaktyā pitaraḥ prīṇayanti tam /
GE07hv_apppu:328: yacchanti pitaraḥ prītāḥ prajāṃ puṣṭiṃ tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:329: svargam āyuṣyam ārogyaṃ yad anyad api vāñchitam // HV_App.I,4.155 //
GE07hv_apppu:331: devatānāṃ hi pitaraḥ pūrvam āyatanaṃ smṛtam // HV_App.I,4.157 //
GE07hv_apppu:333: sthiraprasādāś ca sadā tān namasyasva bhārgava // HV_App.I,4.159 //
GE07hv_apppu:334: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 5, transliterated by Horst Brinkhaus,
GE07hv_apppu:335: proof--read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of March 1, 2001 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:336: [k: K2.4 Ñ2.3V BDn Ds D1-3.5.6T Gins. appendix I, No. 5 after 15.65,
GE07hv_apppu:340: andhaṃ cakāra gāṅgeya jyeṣṭhaṃ putraṃ purā vibho // HV_App.I,5.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:341: ciroṣitā gṛhe cāpi kimarthaṃ caiva tasya sā /
GE07hv_apppu:342: cakāra vipriyam idaṃ tasya rājño mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,5.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:343: pūjanīyā cakārāsau kiṃ sakhyaṃ tena caiva ha /
GE07hv_apppu:344: etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ sarvaṃ prabravīhi yathātatham // HV_App.I,5.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:346: śṛṇu sarvaṃ mahārāja yathā vṛttam abhūt purā /
GE07hv_apppu:347: brahmadattasya bhavane tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhira // HV_App.I,5.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:348: kācic chakuntikā rājan brahmadattasya vai sakhī /
GE07hv_apppu:351: tasyāḥ kulāyam abhavad gehe tasya narottama // HV_App.I,5.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:352: sā sadāhani nirgatya tasya rājño gṛhottamāt /
GE07hv_apppu:358: caritvā teṣu sā rājan niśi kāmpilyam āgamat /
GE07hv_apppu:359: nṛpater bhavanaṃ pārtha brahmadattasya dhīmataḥ // HV_App.I,5.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:360: rājñā tena sadā rājan kathāyogaṃ cakāra sā // HV_App.I,5.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:361: āścaryāṇi ca sarvāṇi yāni vṛttāni kānicit /
GE07hv_apppu:362: carantī vividhān deśān kathayām āsa sā niśi // HV_App.I,5.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:364: putro 'bhūd rājaśārdūla sarvasena iti śrutaḥ // HV_App.I,5.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:365: pūjanīyā ca sā tasmin prasūtāṇḍam athāpi ca /
GE07hv_apppu:366: tasmin nīḍe purā hy ekaṃ śakalāt prāsphuṭat tadā // HV_App.I,5.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:369: cakṣuṣmān apy abhūt paścād īṣat pakṣotthitaś ca ha // HV_App.I,5.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:371: tulyasnehāt prītimatī divase divase tadā // HV_App.I,5.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:372: ājahāra sadā sāyaṃ cañcvā nṛpa phaladvayam /
GE07hv_apppu:374: sa bālo brahmadattasya pūjanīyāsutaś ca ha /
GE07hv_apppu:375: te phale bhakṣayitvā ca pṛṭhukau tau mudā yutau /
GE07hv_apppu:376: abhūtāṃ nityam eveha svadatāṃ caiva te phale // HV_App.I,5.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:377: tasyāṃ gatāyām atha ca pūjanīyāṃ sadāhani /
GE07hv_apppu:378: śiśunā caṭakenātha dhātrī taṃ tu śiśuṃ nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:379: tena prakīḍayām āsa brahmadattātmajaṃ sadā // HV_App.I,5.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:380: nīḍāt tadā samākṛṣya pūjanīyā gatā yadā /
GE07hv_apppu:381: krīḍatā rājaputreṇa kadācic caṭakaḥ sa tu // HV_App.I,5.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:383: durbhaṅgamuṣṭinā rājann asūn sadyas tv ajījahat // HV_App.I,5.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:384: taṃ tu pañcatvam āpannaṃ vyāttāsyaṃ bālaghātitam /
GE07hv_apppu:385: kathaṃcin mocitaṃ dṛṣṭvā nṛpatir duḥkhito 'bhavat // HV_App.I,5.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:386: dhātrīṃ tasya jagarhe tāṃ tadāśruparamo nṛpaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:387: tasthau śokānvito rājā śocaṃs taṃ caṭakaṃ nṛpa // HV_App.I,5.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:392: mumoha dṛṣṭvā svaṃ putraṃ punaḥ saṃjñām athālabhat /
GE07hv_apppu:393: labdhasaṃjñā ca sā rājan vilalāpa tapasvinī // HV_App.I,5.54 //
GE07hv_apppu:394: nanu tvam āgatāṃ putra vāśantīṃ parisarpasi /
GE07hv_apppu:397: śoṇena tālunā putra kasmād adya na sarpasi // HV_App.I,5.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:398: pakṣābhyāṃ māṃ pariṣvajya nanu cañcvāpi cāpy aham /
GE07hv_apppu:399: cīcīkūcīti vāśantaṃ tvām adya na śṛṇomi kim // HV_App.I,5.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:400: manoratho yas tu mama paśyeyaṃ putrakaṃ kadā /
GE07hv_apppu:401: vyāttāsyaṃ vāri yācantaṃ sphurat pakṣaṃ mamāgrataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:402: sa me manoratho bhagnas tvayi pañcatvam āgate // HV_App.I,5.63 //
GE07hv_apppu:404: nanu mūrdhābhiṣiktas tvaṃ dharmān vetsi sanātanān // HV_App.I,5.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:405: kathaṃ mamānena sutaṃ dhātryā ghātitavān asi /
GE07hv_apppu:406: svaputreṇa samākṛṣya kṣatriyādhama śaṃsa me // HV_App.I,5.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:407: nanu nūnaṃ śrutā te 'bhūd iyam āṅgirasī śrutiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:408: śaraṇāgataḥ kṣudhārtaś ca śatrubhiś cāpy upadrutaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:409: ciroṣitaś ca svagṛhe pātavyaḥ sarvato bhavet // HV_App.I,5.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:411: katham asya havir devā gṛhṇanti pitaraḥ svadhām // HV_App.I,5.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:413: śokārtā tasya bālasya cakṣuṣī nirbibheda sā // HV_App.I,5.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:414: karābhyāṃ rājaputrasya tatas tac cakṣur asphuṭam /
GE07hv_apppu:415: kṛtvā cāndhaṃ nṛpasutam utpapāta tato 'mbaram // HV_App.I,5.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:416: atha rājā sutaṃ dṛṣṭvā pūjanīyām uvāca ha /
GE07hv_apppu:417: viśokā bhava kalyāṇi kṛtaṃ te bhīru śobhanam // HV_App.I,5.78 //
GE07hv_apppu:418: gataśokā nivartasva ajaryaṃ sakhyam astu te /
GE07hv_apppu:419: pureva sakhi bhadraṃ te nivartasva ramasva ca // HV_App.I,5.80 //
GE07hv_apppu:420: putrapīḍābhavaś cāpi na kopaḥ paramas tvayi /
GE07hv_apppu:421: mamāsti sakhi bhadraṃ te kartavyaṃ ca kṛtaṃ tvayā // HV_App.I,5.82 //
GE07hv_apppu:424: na cāhaṃ vastum icchāmi tava putram acakṣuṣam /
GE07hv_apppu:425: kṛtvā vai rājaśārdūla tvadgṛhe kṛtakilbiṣā // HV_App.I,5.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:426: gāthāś cāpy uśanogītā imāḥ śṛṇu mayeritāḥ // HV_App.I,5.86 //
GE07hv_apppu:427: kumitraṃ ca kudeśaṃ ca kurājānaṃ kusauhṛdam /
GE07hv_apppu:428: kuputraṃ ca kubhāryāṃ ca dūrataḥ parivarjayet // HV_App.I,5.88 //
GE07hv_apppu:429: kumitre sauhṛdaṃ nāsti kubhāryāyāṃ kuto ratiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:430: kutaḥ piṇḍaḥ kuputre tu nāsti satyaṃ kurājani // HV_App.I,5.90 //
GE07hv_apppu:431: kusauhṛde kva viśvāsaḥ kudeśe na prajīvyate /
GE07hv_apppu:432: kurājani bhayaṃ nityaṃ kuputre sarvato 'sukham // HV_App.I,5.92 //
GE07hv_apppu:434: anātho durbalo yadvan na ciraṃ sa tu jīvati // HV_App.I,5.94 //
GE07hv_apppu:435: na viśvased aviśvas te viśvas te nāpi viśvaset /
GE07hv_apppu:436: viśvāsād bhayaṃ utpannaṃ mūlāny api nikṛntati // HV_App.I,5.96 //
GE07hv_apppu:438: yaḥ karoti naro mūḍho na ciraṃ sa tu jīvati // HV_App.I,5.98 //
GE07hv_apppu:439: abhyunnatiṃ prāpya nṛpaḥ prāvāraṃ kīṭako yathā /
GE07hv_apppu:440: sa vinaśyed asaṃdeham āhaivam uśanā nṛpa // HV_App.I,5.100 //
GE07hv_apppu:442: ariṃ nāśayate nityaṃ yathā vallī mahādrumam // HV_App.I,5.102 //
GE07hv_apppu:443: mṛdū raudraḥ kṛśo bhūtvā śanaiḥ saṃlīyate ripuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:444: valmīka iva vṛkṣasya paścān mūlaṃ nikṛntati // HV_App.I,5.104 //
GE07hv_apppu:445: adrohaṃ samayaṃ kṛtvā munīnām agrato hariḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:446: jaghāna namuciṃ paścād apāṃ phenena pārthiva // HV_App.I,5.106 //
GE07hv_apppu:447: suptaṃ mattaṃ pramattaṃ vā ghātayanti ripuṃ narāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:448: viṣeṇa vahninā vāpi śastreṇāpy atha māyayā // HV_App.I,5.108 //
GE07hv_apppu:449: naiva śeṣaṃ prakurvanti punar vairabhayān narāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:450: ghātayanti samūlaṃ hi śrutvemām upamāṃ nṛpa // HV_App.I,5.110 //
GE07hv_apppu:451: śatroḥ śeṣaṃ ṛṇāc cheṣaṃ śeṣam agneś ca bhūmipa /
GE07hv_apppu:452: punar vardheta saṃbhūya tasmāc cheṣaṃ na śeṣayet // HV_App.I,5.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:453: hasate jalpate vairī ekapātre ca bhuñjate /
GE07hv_apppu:454: ekāsanaṃ cārohati smarate tac ca kilbiṣam // HV_App.I,5.114 //
GE07hv_apppu:455: kṛtvā saṃbandhakaṃ cāpi viśvasec chatruṇā na hi /
GE07hv_apppu:456: pulomānaṃ jaghānājau jāmātā sañ śatakratuḥ // HV_App.I,5.116 //
GE07hv_apppu:457: nidhāya manasā vairaṃ priyaṃ vaktīha yo naraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:458: upasarpen na taṃ prājñaḥ kuraṅga iva lubdhakam // HV_App.I,5.118 //
GE07hv_apppu:459: na cāsanne nivastavyaṃ savaire vardhite ripau /
GE07hv_apppu:460: pātayet taṃ samūlaṃ hi nadītīra iva drumam // HV_App.I,5.120 //
GE07hv_apppu:462: tasmāt prāpyonnatiṃ naśyed yathā prāvārakīṭakaḥ // HV_App.I,5.122 //
GE07hv_apppu:463: ity etā uśanogītā gāthā dhāryā vipaścitā /
GE07hv_apppu:465: mayā ca kilbiṣaṃ tubhyaṃ prayuktam atidāruṇam /
GE07hv_apppu:466: putram andhaṃ prakurvantyā tasmān no viśvase tvayi /
GE07hv_apppu:467: evam uktvā pradudrāva tadākāśe pataṃginī // HV_App.I,5.127 //
GE07hv_apppu:468: ity etat te mayākhyātaṃ purābhūtam idaṃ nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:470: śrāddhaṃ ca pṛcchase yan māṃ yudhiṣṭhira mahāmate // HV_App.I,5.130 //
GE07hv_apppu:472: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I No. 6, transliterated by Christophe Vielle :h]
GE07hv_apppu:473: [k: K2.4 Ñ2.3V BDT GM4 G(ed.) ins. after 21.10; K1 after 22.1ab; K3
GE07hv_apppu:474: after adhy. 21. K1 reads lines 1-2 for the first time after 21.10. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:476: gandharvī urvaśī devī rājāṇaṃ manuṣaṃ katham /
GE07hv_apppu:477: devān utsṛjya saṃprāptā tan me brūhi bahuśruta // HV_App.I,6.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:483: svāgataṃ te varārohe āsyatāṃ karavāma kim /
GE07hv_apppu:484: saṃramasva mayā sārdhaṃ ratir nau śāśvatīḥ samāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:487: elaṃ tu sā varārohā samayāt samupasthitā // HV_App.I,6.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:489: evaṃ sā hy uṣitā tatra śāpasyāntam abhīpsatī /
GE07hv_apppu:490: ātmanaḥ śāpamokṣārthaṃ samayaṃ sā cakāra ha /
GE07hv_apppu:491: anagnadarśanaṃ caiva sakāmāyāś ca maithunam // HV_App.I,6.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:493: etāv uraṇakau rājan nyāsau rakṣasva mānada /
GE07hv_apppu:494: saṃraṃsye bhavatā sākaṃ ślāghya strīṇāṃ varaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:495: dvau meṣau śayanābhyāse sadā baddhau ca tiṣṭhataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:496: ghṛtamātraṃ tathāhāraḥ kalām ekaṃ tu pārthiva // HV_App.I,6.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:497: yady eṣa samayo rājan yāvatkālaṃ ca te dṛḍham /
GE07hv_apppu:499: tadā tavaiva saṃyogo mayā saha bhaviṣyati /
GE07hv_apppu:501: eṣa te samayo rājan vastuṃ tava gṛhe kṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:502: tāvatkālaṃ tu vatsyāmi kṛtaḥ samaya eṣa naḥ // HV_App.I,6.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:503: tasyās taṃ samayaṃ sarvaṃ sa rājā samapālayat /
GE07hv_apppu:507: ko na seveta manujo devīṃ tvāṃ svayam āgatām /
GE07hv_apppu:508: evaṃ sā vasate tatra purūravasi bhāvinī /
GE07hv_apppu:509: varṣāṇy athaikaṣaṣṭiṃ tu tadbhaktyā śāpamohitā // HV_App.I,6.13 //
GE07hv_apppu:512: apaśyann urvaśīm indro gandharvān abravīt tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:515: cintayadhvaṃ mahābhāgā yathā sā tu varāṅganā /
GE07hv_apppu:516: samāgacchet punar devān urvaśī svargabhūṣaṇā // HV_App.I,6.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:517: tato viśvāvasur nāma tatrāha vadatāṃ varaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:518: mayā tu samayas tābhyāṃ kriyamāṇaḥ śrutaḥ purā // HV_App.I,6.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:519: vyutkrāntasamayan sā vai rājānaṃ tyakṣyate yathā /
GE07hv_apppu:520: tad ahaṃ vedmy aśeṣeṇa yathā bhetsyaty asau nṛpaḥ // HV_App.I,6.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:522: evam uktvā gatas tatra pratiṣṭhānaṃ mahāyaśāḥ // HV_App.I,6.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:523: niśāyām atha cāgamya meṣam ekaṃ jahāra saḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:524: mātṛvad vartate sā tu meṣayoś cāruhāsinī // HV_App.I,6.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:526: rājānam abravīt tatra putro me 'hriyateti sā // HV_App.I,6.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:528: nagnaṃ māṃ drakṣyate devī samayo vitatho bhavet // HV_App.I,6.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:529: tato bhūyas tu gandharvā dvitīyaṃ meṣam ādaduḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:530: dvitīye tu hṛte meṣe elaṃ devy abravīd idam // HV_App.I,6.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:531: putrau me hriyate rājann anāthāyā iva prabho /
GE07hv_apppu:535: yadviśrambhād ahaṃ naṣṭā hatāpatyā ca dasyubhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:536: yaḥ śete niśi saṃtrasto yathā nārī divā pumān /
GE07hv_apppu:537: evam uktas tadotthāya nagno rājā pradhāvitaḥ // HV_App.I,6.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:538: meṣayoḥ padam anvicchan gandharvair vidyud apy atha /
GE07hv_apppu:539: utpāditā sumahatī yayā tad bhavanaṃ mahat /
GE07hv_apppu:540: prakāśitaṃ vai sahasā tato nagnam avaikṣata // HV_App.I,6.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:541: nagnaṃ dṛṣṭvā tirobhūtā gandharvī hy agamad divam // HV_App.I,6.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:542: [k: K1.2 Ñ2.3 V1.3 Dn Ds D6 T4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:543: tirobhūtāṃ tu tāṃdṛṣṭvā gandharvā hy agaman divam /
GE07hv_apppu:545: tirobhūtāṃ tu tāṃ dṛṣṭvā gandharvās tatratāv ubhau /
GE07hv_apppu:546: utsṛjya meṣau śīghram tu yathākāmaṃ yayus tataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:547: utsṛṣṭau coraṇau dṛṣṭvā rājā gṛhyāgato gṛham /
GE07hv_apppu:549: cacāra pṛthivīṃ caiva mārgamāṇa itas tataḥ // HV_App.I,6.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:550: athāpaśyat sa tāṃ rājā kurukṣetre mahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:552: sa tāṃ vīkṣya kurukṣetre sarasvatyāś ca tatsakhīḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:554: aho jāye jāye tiṣṭha ghore na tyaktum arhasi /
GE07hv_apppu:555: māṃ tvam aprāpya nirvṛttiṃ vacāṃsi kṛṇavāmahe //
GE07hv_apppu:556: sudeho 'yaṃ patatv adya devi dūraṃ gatas tvayā /
GE07hv_apppu:557: svādanty enaṃ vṛkā gṛdhrās tvatprasādasya nāspadam /
GE07hv_apppu:559: krīḍantīṃ apsarobhiś ca pañcabhiḥ saha śobhanām /
GE07hv_apppu:560: tāṃ krīḍantīṃ tato dṛṣṭvā vilalāpa suduḥkhitaḥ // HV_App.I,6.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:561: sā cāpi tatra taṃ dṛṣṭvā rājānam avidūrataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:562: urvaśī tāḥ sakhīḥ prāha sa eṣa puruṣottamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:563: yasminn aham avātsaṃ vai darśayām āsa taṃ nṛpam // HV_App.I,6.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:564: samāvignās tu tāḥ sarvāḥ punar eva narādhipaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:565: jāye ha tiṣṭha manasi ghore vacasi tiṣṭha he /
GE07hv_apppu:567: urvaśī cābravīd ailaṃ sagarbhāhaṃ tvayā vibho /
GE07hv_apppu:568: saṃvatsarāt kumāras te bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:569: niśām ekāṃ ca nṛpate nivatsyasi mayā saha // HV_App.I,6.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:570: hṛṣṭo jagāma rājāt sa svapuraṃ sumahāyaśāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:571: gate saṃvatsare bhūya urvaśī punar āgamat // HV_App.I,6.54 //
GE07hv_apppu:572: uṣitaś ca tayā sārdham ekarātraṃ mahāyaśāḥ // HV_App.I,6.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:573: urvaśy athābravīd ailaṃ gandharvā varadās tava /
GE07hv_apppu:574: tān vṛṇīṣva mahārāja brūhi caitāṃs tvam eva ha // HV_App.I,6.57 //
GE07hv_apppu:576: tathety uktvā varaṃ vavre gandharvāś ca tahāstv iti // HV_App.I,6.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:578: sthālīṃ nyasya vane gatvā gṛham abhyāyayau niśi /
GE07hv_apppu:580: pūrayitvāgninā sthālīṃ gandharvāś ca tam abruvan /
GE07hv_apppu:581: aneneṣṭvā salokān naḥ prāpsyasi tvaṃ narādhipa // HV_App.I,6.61 //
GE07hv_apppu:583: nikṣipyāgnim araṇye tu saputras tu gṛhaṃ yayau // HV_App.I,6.63 //
GE07hv_apppu:584: abhyetyāgniṃ tu nāpaśyad aśvatthaṃ tatra dṛṣṭavān /
GE07hv_apppu:585: śamījātaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā aśvatthaṃ vismitas tataḥ // HV_App.I,6.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:586: gandharvebhyas tadāśaṃsad agnināśaṃ tatas tu saḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:587: śrutvā tam artham akhilam araṇīṃ tu samādiśan // HV_App.I,6.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:589: mathitāgniṃ tridhā kṛtvā ayajat sa narādhipaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:590: iṣṭvā yajñair bahuvidhair gatas teṣāṃ salokatām // HV_App.I,6.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:591: [k: K2 B1.3 Ds for lines 69-70 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:592: teneṣṭvā tu sa tāṃl lokān prāptavān sa narādhipaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:594: eko 'gniḥ pūrvam evāsīd ailas tretām akārayat /
GE07hv_apppu:595: evaṃprabhāvo rājāsīd ailas tu puruṣottamaḥ // HV_App.I,6.73 //
GE07hv_apppu:597: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I No. 6A, transliterated by Sandra Smets :h]
GE07hv_apppu:603: niṣkṛtiḥ kīdṛśī dṛṣṭā tan me brūhi mahāmate /
GE07hv_apppu:604: kīdṛśo brāhmaṇo loke svarūpaṃ tad vadasva me // HV_App.I,6A.5 //
GE07hv_apppu:609: sarvasyaivāsya sargasya dharmato brāhmaṇaḥ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,6A.9 //
GE07hv_apppu:611: kavyāni caiva pitaraḥ kiṃ bhūtā adhikaṃ tataḥ // HV_App.I,6A.11 //
GE07hv_apppu:612: brāhmaṇyāṃ brāhmaṇāj jātaḥ saṃskṛto brāhmaṇo bhavet /
GE07hv_apppu:613: jñeyaṃ (?) kṣatriyaviṭśūdrā jñeyāḥ svebhyaḥ svayonijāḥ // HV_App.I,6A.13
GE07hv_apppu:615: dānaṃ pratigrahaś ceti ṣaṭ karmāṇy agrajanmanām // HV_App.I,6A.15 //
GE07hv_apppu:616: vedam eva sadābhyāset tapas taptaṃ (pyed??) dvijottamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:617: vedābhyāso hi viprasya tapaḥ param ihocyate // HV_App.I,6A.17 //
GE07hv_apppu:619: aṅgopakāravedī ca vedārthaṃ jñātum arhati // HV_App.I,6A.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:623: śrotā caivānyathā cet syān narakāyaiva kalpate // HV_App.I,6A.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:625: pāṭhamātrāvasānas tu paṅke gaur iva sīdati // HV_App.I,6A.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:627: nāmadheyaṃ daśamyāṃ tu dvādaśyām atha kārayet // HV_App.I,6A.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:629: prāpte tu pañcame varṣe tv akṣarābhyāsam ucyate // HV_App.I,6A.29 //
GE07hv_apppu:632: brāhmaṇo bilvapālāśau daṇḍau vā dhārayeta saḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:633: guruṃ raviṃ samabhyarcya bhaikṣeta niyataḥ śuciḥ // HV_App.I,6A.33 //
GE07hv_apppu:635: saṃbhāvayati cānnena sa vipro gurur ucyate // HV_App.I,6A.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:636: upanīya tu yaḥ śiṣyaṃ vedam adhyāpayeta tam /
GE07hv_apppu:637: tadarthabodhakaś caiva tam ācāryaṃ pracakṣate // HV_App.I,6A.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:638: ekadeśaṃ tu vedasya vedāṅgāny api vā punaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:639: yo 'dhyāpayati vṛttyartham upādhyāyaḥ sa ucyate // HV_App.I,6A.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:641: sahasraṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ tu caibhyo mātā garīyasī // HV_App.I,6A.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:643: snāyīta tadanujñāto dattvāsmai dakṣiṇāṃ hi gām // HV_App.I,6A.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:646: bandhuhīnāṃ ca yāṃ kanyāṃ rogiṇīṃ ca parityajet // HV_App.I,6A.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:649: ādadhīta tataḥ paścād vidhānenaiva sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,6A.49 //
GE07hv_apppu:650: brāhme muhūrte cotthāya hariṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum /
GE07hv_apppu:651: dhyātvā samāhitaḥ paścād viṣṭhāmūtraṃ visarjayet // HV_App.I,6A.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:652: nairṛte dakṣiṇe bhāge tṛṇam ācchādya vai punaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:653: loṣṭaiś ca lepanaṃ kṛtvā śaucaṃ kṛtvā yathāvidhi // HV_App.I,6A.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:654: mṛdbhiḥ śodhya gude pādau pāṇau gaṇḍūṣam ācaret /
GE07hv_apppu:655: ācamya prayato bhūtvā tataḥ snānaṃ samācaret // HV_App.I,6A.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:657: dhyātvotthāya tataḥ kuryād ardhyaṃ sūryāya bhūmipa // HV_App.I,6A.57 //
GE07hv_apppu:659: upasthāyaiva tigmāṃśuṃ homaṃ kuryād dvitīyake // HV_App.I,6A.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:661: mūhūrte kusumādīni hṛtvā gacchet tam īśvaram // HV_App.I,6A.61 //
GE07hv_apppu:664: kṛtvā puruṣasūktaiś ca harim aṣṭākṣareṇa ca // HV_App.I,6A.63 //
GE07hv_apppu:666: kṛtvaivātithyapūjāṃ ca bhojanaṃ ca yathākramam // HV_App.I,6A.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:669: upāsya paścimāṃ saṃdhyāṃ homaṃ kuryād atandritaḥ // HV_App.I,6A.68 //
GE07hv_apppu:672: śreṣṭhās te brāhmaṇā loke dānapātraṃ sadā matam // HV_App.I,6A.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:673: prathamaṃ tu gurordānaṃ dadyāc chraiṣṭhyaṃ ca sarvadā /
GE07hv_apppu:674: mātāpitroś ca yad dattaṃ bhrātṛsvasṛsutāsu ca // HV_App.I,6A.73 //
GE07hv_apppu:677: pituḥ śataguṇaṃ dānaṃ sahasraṃ mātur ucyate // HV_App.I,6A.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:679: dāne tu kavyabhojye ca dahaty āsaptamaṃ kulam // HV_App.I,6A.78 //
GE07hv_apppu:680: dviguṇaṃ brāhmaṇe dadyāt samaṃ tu brāhmaṇabruve /
GE07hv_apppu:684: devānāṃ nādhikāro 'sti teṣu rājan divaukasām // HV_App.I,6A.83 //
GE07hv_apppu:688: śaśāṅkas tu kṣayān muktaḥ sarvalokasupūjitaḥ // HV_App.I,6A.87 //
GE07hv_apppu:690: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I No. 6B, transliterated by Christophe Vielle :h]
GE07hv_apppu:691: [k: K Ñ2.3V BDT GM4 cont. after No. 6; G(ed.) after No. 6A :k]
GE07hv_apppu:694: divi jātā mahātmāna āyur dhīmān amāvasuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:697: dṛḍhāyuś ca vanāyuś ca śatāyuś corvaśīsutāḥ // HV_App.I,6B.3 //
GE07hv_apppu:698: amāvasos tu dāyādo bhīmo rājātha rājarāṭ /
GE07hv_apppu:700: vidvāṃs tu kāñcanasyāpi suhotro 'bhūn mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,6B.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:702: ājahre yo mahāsattraṃ sarpamedhaṃ mahāmakham // HV_App.I,6B.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:704: necchataḥ plāvayām āsa tasya gaṅgā ca tat sadaḥ // HV_App.I,6B.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:705: sa tayā plāvitaṃ dṛṣṭvā yajñavāṭaṃ samantataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:706: sauhotrir abravīd gaṅgāṃ kruddho bharatasattama // HV_App.I,6B.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:707: eṣa te triṣu lokeṣu saṃkṣipyāpaḥ pibāmy aham /
GE07hv_apppu:708: asya gaṅge 'valepasya sadyaḥ phalam avāpnuhi // HV_App.I,6B.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:709: rājarṣiṇā tataḥ pītāṃ gaṅgāṃ dṛṣṭvā maharṣayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:711: yuvanāśvasya putrīṃ tu kāverīṃ jahnur āvahat // HV_App.I,6B.17 //
GE07hv_apppu:715: kāverīṃ saritāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ jahnor bhāryām aninditām // HV_App.I,6B.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:716: jahnus tu dayitaṃ putraṃ sumahaṃ nāma dhārmikam /
GE07hv_apppu:717: kāveryāṃ janayām āsa ajakas tasya cātmajaḥ // HV_App.I,6B.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:721: kuśikaḥ kuśanābhaś ca kuśāmbo mūrtimāṃs tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:722: pahlavaiḥ saha saṃvṛddho rājā vanacaraih saha // HV_App.I,6B.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:723: kuśikas tu tapas tepe putram indrasamaṃ vibhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:724: labheyam iti taṃ śakras trāsād abhyetya jajñivān // HV_App.I,6B.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:725: pūrṇe varṣasahasre vai taṃ tu śakro hy apaśyata /
GE07hv_apppu:728: putratve kalpayām āsa devendraḥ sa surottamaḥ // HV_App.I,6B.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:729: sa gādhir abhavad rājā maghavān kauśikaḥ svayam /
GE07hv_apppu:730: paurukutsy abhavad bhāryā gādhis tasyām ajāyata // HV_App.I,6B.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:731: viśvāmitraś ca gādheyo rājā viśvarathaś ca ha /
GE07hv_apppu:732: viśvakṛd viśvajic caiva tathā satyavatī nṛpa // HV_App.I,6B.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:733: purvaṃ kanyā mahābhāgā nāmnā satyavatī śubhā /
GE07hv_apppu:736: varaṃ visadṛśaṃ matvā gādhir bhārgavam abravīt /
GE07hv_apppu:739: sahasraṃ dīyatāṃ śulkaṃ kanyāyāḥ kuśikā vayam //
GE07hv_apppu:740: ity uktas tanmataṃ matvā gataḥ sa varuṇāntakaṃ /
GE07hv_apppu:741: ānīya dattvā tān aśvān upayeme varānanām /
GE07hv_apppu:742: tāṃ gādhiḥ kāvyaputrāya ṛcīkāya dadau prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,6B.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:745: sa ṛṣiḥ prārthitaḥ patnyā mātre cāpatyakāmyayā /
GE07hv_apppu:746: śrapayitvobhayair mantraiś caruṃ snātuṃ gato muniḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:747: putrārthaṃ kalpayām āsa caruṃ gādhes tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,6B.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:748: uvācāhūya tāṃ bhārtā ṛcīko bhārgavas tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:749: upayojyaś carur ayaṃ tvayā mātrā tv ayaṃ tava // HV_App.I,6B.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:753: śamātmakaṃ dvijaśreṣṭhaṃ carur eṣa vidhāsyati // HV_App.I,6B.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:754: evam uktvā tu tāṃ bhāryām ṛcīko bhṛgunandanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:755: tapasy abhirato nityam araṇyaṃ praviveśa ha // HV_App.I,6B.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:756: gādhiḥ sadāras tu tadā ṛcīkāśramam abhyagāt /
GE07hv_apppu:758: carudvayaṃ gṛhītvā tad ṛṣeḥ satyavatī tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:759: carum ādāya yatnena sā tu mātre nyavedayat // HV_App.I,6B.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:760: mātā vyatyasya daivena duhitre svacaruṃ dadau /
GE07hv_apppu:761: tasyāś carum athājñānād ātmasaṃsthaṃ cakāra ha // HV_App.I,6B.54 //
GE07hv_apppu:763: dhārayām āsa dīptena vapuṣā ghoradarśanam // HV_App.I,6B.56 //
GE07hv_apppu:764: tām ṛcīkas tato dṛṣṭvā yogenābhyanusṛtya ca /
GE07hv_apppu:765: tām abravīd dvijaśreṣṭhaḥ svāṃ bhāryāṃ varavarṇinīm // HV_App.I,6B.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:767: janiṣyati hi putras te krūrakarmātidāruṇaḥ // HV_App.I,6B.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:769: viśvaṃ hi brahma tapasā mayā tasmin samarpitam // HV_App.I,6B.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:770: evam uktā mahābhāgā bhartrā satyavatī tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:771: prasādayām āsa patiṃ putro me nedṛśo bhavet /
GE07hv_apppu:772: brāhmaṇāpasadas tvatta ity ukto munir abravīt // HV_App.I,6B.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:773: naiṣa saṃkalpitaḥ kāmo mayā bhadre tathāstv iti /
GE07hv_apppu:774: ugrakarmā bhavet putraḥ pitur mātuś ca kāraṇāt // HV_App.I,6B.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:775: punaḥ satyavatī vākyam evam uktvābravīd idam /
GE07hv_apppu:776: icchaṃl lokān api mune sṛjethāḥ kiṃ punaḥ sutam /
GE07hv_apppu:777: śamātmakam ṛjuṃ tvaṃ me putraṃ dātum ihārhasi // HV_App.I,6B.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:778: kāmam evaṃvidhaḥ pautro mama syāt tava ca prabho /
GE07hv_apppu:779: yady anyathā na śakyaṃ vai kartum etad dvijottama // HV_App.I,6B.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:780: tataḥ prasādam akarot sa tasyās tapaso balāt /
GE07hv_apppu:781: putre nāsti viśeṣo me pautre ca varavarṇini /
GE07hv_apppu:782: tvayā yathoktaṃ vacanaṃ tathā bhadre bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,6B.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:783: tataḥ satyavatī putraṃ janayām āsa bhārgavam /
GE07hv_apppu:784: tapasy abhirataṃ dāntaṃ jamadagniṃ śamātmakam // HV_App.I,6B.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:790: tasya kanyā mahābhāgā kāmalī nāma reṇukā // HV_App.I,6B.83 //
GE07hv_apppu:792: ārcīko janayām āsa jāmadagnyaṃ sudāruṇam // HV_App.I,6B.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:794: rāmaṃ kṣatriyahantāraṃ pradīptam iva pāvakam // HV_App.I,6B.87 //
GE07hv_apppu:796: jamadagnis tapovīryāj jajñe brahmavidāṃ varaḥ // HV_App.I,6B.89 //
GE07hv_apppu:797: madhyamaś ca śunaḥśephaḥ śunaḥpucchaḥ kaniṣṭhakaḥ // HV_App.I,6B.90 //
GE07hv_apppu:800: prāpya brahmarṣisamatāṃ yo 'yaṃ saptarṣitāṃ gataḥ // HV_App.I,6B.93 //
GE07hv_apppu:801: viśvāmitras tu dharmātmā nāmnā viśvarathaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:804: gādher abhūn mahātejāḥ samiddha iva pāvakaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:805: tapasā kṣatram utsṛjya yo lebhe brahmavarcasam //
GE07hv_apppu:807: madhyamas tu madhucchandā madhucchandāsa eva te /
GE07hv_apppu:812: prakhyātās triṣu lokeṣu teṣāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu // HV_App.I,6B.97 //
GE07hv_apppu:813: devaśravāḥ katiś caiva yasmāt kātyāyanāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:814: śālāvatyāṃ hiraṇyākṣo reṇor jajñe 'tha reṇumān // HV_App.I,6B.99 //
GE07hv_apppu:815: sāṃkṛtir gālavaś caiva mudgalaś ceti viśrutaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:816: madhucchandādayaś caiva devalaś ca tathāṣṭakaḥ // HV_App.I,6B.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:817: kacchapo hāritaś caiva viśvāmitrasya vai sutāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:818: teṣāṃ khyātāni gotrāṇi kauśikānāṃ mahātmanām // HV_App.I,6B.103 //
GE07hv_apppu:819: pālito babhravaś caiva karajapyas tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:821: lohityā yamadūtāś ca tathā kārīṣayaḥ smṛtāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:822: sauśrutāḥ kauśikā rājaṃs tathānye saindhavāyanāḥ // HV_App.I,6B.107 //
GE07hv_apppu:827: ṛṣyantaravivāhyāś ca kauśikā bahavaḥ smṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,6B.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:829: saṃbandho 'py asya vaṃśe 'smin brahmakṣatrasya viśrutaḥ // HV_App.I,6B.114
GE07hv_apppu:831: bhārgavaḥ kauśikatvaṃ hi prāptaḥ sa munisattamaḥ // HV_App.I,6B.116 //
GE07hv_apppu:833: hariścandrasya yajñe tu paśutve viniyojitaḥ // HV_App.I,6B.118 //
GE07hv_apppu:835: yo vai hariścandramakhe vikrītaḥ puruṣaḥ paśuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:837: yo rāto devayajane devair gādhiṣu tāpasaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:838: devarāta iti khyāta śunaḥśephas tu bhārgavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:839: devair dattaḥ śunaḥśepo viśvāmitrāya vai punaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:841: putraṃ kṛtvā śunaḥṣephaṃ devarātaṃ ca bhārgavam /
GE07hv_apppu:842: ājīgartaṃ sutān āha jyeṣṭha eṣa prakalpatām // **HV_App.I,6B.119**7:2
GE07hv_apppu:843: ye madhucchandaso jyeṣṭhāḥ kuśalaṃ menire na tat /
GE07hv_apppu:844: aśapat tān muniḥ kruddho mlecchā bhavata durjanāḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:846: yan no bhavān vijānīto tasmiṃs tiṣṭhāmahe vayam //
GE07hv_apppu:847: jyeṣṭhaṃ mantradṛśāṃ cakrus tvām anvañco vayaṃ smasi /
GE07hv_apppu:849: devair dattaḥ sa vai yasmād devarātas tato 'bhavat // HV_App.I,6B.120 //
GE07hv_apppu:852: aṣṭakasya suto lauhiḥ prokto jahnugaṇo mayā /
GE07hv_apppu:853: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi vaṃśam āyor mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,6B.124 //
GE07hv_apppu:855: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 7, transliterated by Horst Brinkhaus,
GE07hv_apppu:856: proof--read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of July 8, 2001 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:857: [k: K2.4 Ñ2.3V BDT GM4 ins. Appendix I, No. 7 after adhyāya 21, K1.3
GE07hv_apppu:860: rambho napatyas tatrāsīd vaṃśaṃ vakṣyāmy anenasaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:861: anenasaḥ suto rājā pratikṣatro mahāyaśāḥ // HV_App.I,7.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:863: sṛñjayasya jayaḥ putro vijayas tasya cātmajaḥ // HV_App.I,7.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:864: vijayasya kṛtiḥ putras tasya haryaśvataḥ sutaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:869: anenasya samākhyātāḥ kṣatravṛddhasya me śṛṇu // HV_App.I,7.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:872: kāśaḥ śalaś ca dvāv etau tathā gṛtsamadaḥ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:873: putro gṛtsamadasyāpi śunako yasya śaunakāḥ // HV_App.I,7.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:874: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāś caiva vaiśyāḥ śūdrās tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:875: śalātmajaś ca cārṣṭiceṇas tanayas tasya kāśyakaḥ // HV_App.I,7.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:876: kāśyasya kāsyayo rājan putro dīrghatamās tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:877: dhanvas tu dīrghatamaso vidvān dhanvantariḥ sutaḥ // HV_App.I,7.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:880: tapaso nte sumahato jāto vṛddhasya dhīmataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:881: punar dhanvantarir devo mānuṣeṣv iha jajñivān // HV_App.I,7.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:883: kathaṃ dhanvantarir devo mānuṣeṣv iha jajñivān /
GE07hv_apppu:884: etad veditum icchāmi tvatto brūhi yathātatham // HV_App.I,7.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:887: sa saṃbhūtaḥ samudrāt tu mathyamāne mṛte purā // HV_App.I,7.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:888: utpannaḥ kalaśāt pūrvaṃ sarvataś ca śriyā vṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:891: sadyaḥsaṃsiddhakāryaṃ hi viṣṇur dṛṣṭvā hi tasthivān // HV_App.I,7.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:892: abjas tvam iti hovāca tasmād abjas tu sa smṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:893: abjaḥ provāca viṣṇuṃ vai tava putro smi vai prabho /
GE07hv_apppu:894: vidhatsva bhāgaṃ sthānaṃ ca mama loke sureśvara // HV_App.I,7.29 //
GE07hv_apppu:895: evam uktaḥ sa dṛṣṭvā vai tathyaṃ provāca taṃ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:896: kṛto yajñavibhāgo hi yajñiyair hi suraiḥ saha // HV_App.I,7.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:897: deveṣu viniyuktaṃ hi viddhi hotraṃ maharṣibhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:898: na śakyam upahomo vai tubhyaṃ kartu kathaṃcana /
GE07hv_apppu:900: na śakyam iha vai kartuṃ mayā tubhyaṃ kathaṃcana /
GE07hv_apppu:901: arvāgbhūto si devānāṃ putra tvaṃ tu na hīśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,7.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:902: dvitīyāyāṃ tu saṃbhūtyāṃ loke khyātiṃ gamiṣyasi /
GE07hv_apppu:903: aṇimādiś ca te siddhir garbhasthasya bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,7.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:904: tenaiva tvaṃ śarīreṇa devatvaṃ prāpsyase prabho /
GE07hv_apppu:905: carumantrair vratair jāpyair yakṣyanti tvāṃ dvijātayaḥ // HV_App.I,7.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:906: aṣṭadhā tvaṃ punaś caiva āyurvedaṃ vidhāsyasi /
GE07hv_apppu:907: avaśyaṃbhāvī hy artho yaṃ prāgdṛṣṭas tv abjayoninā // HV_App.I,7.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:908: dvitīyaṃ dvāparaṃ prāpya bhavitā tvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:909: imaṃ tasmai varaṃ dattvā viṣṇur antardadhe punaḥ // HV_App.I,7.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:910: dvitīye dvāpare prāpte saunahotriḥ sa kāśirāṭ /
GE07hv_apppu:911: putrakāmas tapas tepe dhanvo dīrghaṃ mahat tadā // HV_App.I,7.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:912: prapadye devatāṃ tāṃ tu yā me putraṃ pradāsyati /
GE07hv_apppu:913: abjaṃ devaṃ sa putrārthe tad ārādhitavān nṛpa // HV_App.I,7.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:914: tatas tuṣṭaḥ sa bhagavān abjaḥ provāca taṃ nṛpam /
GE07hv_apppu:915: yad icchasi varaṃ sarvaṃ tat te dāsyāmi suvrata // HV_App.I,7.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:916: bhagavan yadi tuṣṭas tvaṃ putro me khyātimān bhavet /
GE07hv_apppu:918: tasya gehe samutpanno devo dhanvantaris tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:921: tam aṣṭadhā punar vyasya śiṣyebhyaḥ pratyapādayat // HV_App.I,7.54 //
GE07hv_apppu:922: dhanvantares tu tanayaḥ ketumān iti viśrutaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:923: atha ketumataḥ putro vīro bhīmarathaḥ smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,7.56 //
GE07hv_apppu:925: divodāsas tu dharmātmā vārāṇasyadhipo bhavat // HV_App.I,7.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:926: etasminn eva kāle tu purīṃ vārāṇasīṃ nṛpaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:927: śūnyāṃ niveśayām āsa kṣemako nāma rākṣasaḥ // HV_App.I,7.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:928: śaptā hi sā matimatā nikumbhena mahātmanā /
GE07hv_apppu:929: śūnyā varṣasahasraṃ vai bhavitrīti na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,7.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:931: viṣayānte purīṃ ramyāṃ gomatyāṃ saṃnyaveśayat // HV_App.I,7.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:932: [k: K1 (marg.) Ñ2.3V BDn Ds D5.6 T2 G1-3.5 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:933: bhadraśreṇyasya pūrvaṃ tu purī vārāṇasīty abhūt /
GE07hv_apppu:936: bhadraśreṇyasya tad rājyaṃ hṛtaṃ tena balīyasā // HV_App.I,7.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:938: vārāṇasīṃ nikumbhas tu kimarthaṃ śaptavān prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:939: nikumbhaḥ kaś ca dharmātmā siddhikṣetraṃ śaśāpa yaḥ // HV_App.I,7.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:941: kāraṇaṃ tad aśeṣeṇa vada tvaṃ vadatāṃ vara /
GE07hv_apppu:943: divodāsas tu rājarṣir nagaraṃ prāpya pārthiva /
GE07hv_apppu:944: vasati sma mahātejāḥ sphītāyāṃ tu narādhipaḥ // HV_App.I,7.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:945: etasminn eva kāle tu kṛtadāro maheśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:946: devyās tu priyakāmārthaṃ nyavasac chvaśurāntike // HV_App.I,7.73 //
GE07hv_apppu:947: devājñayā pārṣadā ye tv abhirūpās tapodhanāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:948: pūrvoktai rūpaveṣaś ca toṣayanti sma pārvatīm // HV_App.I,7.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:949: hṛṣyate vai mahādevī menā naiva prahṛṣyati /
GE07hv_apppu:950: jugupsaty asakṛt taṃ vai devadevaṃ tathaiva ha // HV_App.I,7.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:951: sapārṣadas tv anācāras tava bhartā maheśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:952: daridraḥ sarvadaivāsau śīlaṃ tasya na vartate // HV_App.I,7.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:953: mātrā tathoktā varadā strīsvabhāvān na cukruve /
GE07hv_apppu:954: smitaṃ kṛtvā tu varadā bhavapārśvam athāgamat // HV_App.I,7.81 //
GE07hv_apppu:956: neha vatsyāmy ahaṃ deva naya māṃ svaṃ niveśanam // HV_App.I,7.83 //
GE07hv_apppu:957: tathā kartuṃ mahādevaḥ sarvāṃl lokān avaikṣata /
GE07hv_apppu:958: vāsārthaṃ rocayām āsa pṛthivyāṃ kurunandana // HV_App.I,7.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:960: divodāsena tāṃ jñātvā niviṣṭāṃ nagarīṃ bhavaḥ // HV_App.I,7.87 //
GE07hv_apppu:961: pārśve tiṣṭhan tam āhūya nikumbham idam abravīt /
GE07hv_apppu:962: gaṇeśvara purīṃ gatvā śūnyāṃ vārāṇasīṃ kuru /
GE07hv_apppu:964: tato gatvā nikumbhas tu purīṃ vārāṇasīṃ tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:965: svapne nidarśayām āsa kaṇṭakaṃ nāma nāpitam /
GE07hv_apppu:966: śreyas te haṃ kariṣyāmi sthānaṃ me racayānagha // HV_App.I,7.93 //
GE07hv_apppu:967: madrūpāṃ pratimāṃ kṛtvā nagaryante tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:968: tataḥ svapne yathoddiṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ kāritavān nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:969: purīdvāre tu vijñāpya rājānaṃ tu yathāvidhi /
GE07hv_apppu:970: pūjāṃ ca mahatīṃ tasya nityam eva prayojayat // HV_App.I,7.97 //
GE07hv_apppu:971: gandhaiś ca dhūpamālyaiś ca prokṣaṇīyais tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:973: evaṃ saṃpūjyate tatra nityam eva gaṇeśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:975: putrān hiraṇyam āyuś ca sarvān kāmāṃs tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,7.102 //
GE07hv_apppu:976: rājñas tu mahiṣī śreṣṭhā suyaśā nāma viśrutā /
GE07hv_apppu:977: putrārtham āgatā devī sādhvī rājñā pracoditā // HV_App.I,7.104 //
GE07hv_apppu:978: pūjāṃ tu vipulāṃ kṛtvā devī putram ayācata /
GE07hv_apppu:979: punaḥ punar athāgamya bahuśaḥ putrakāraṇāt // HV_App.I,7.106 //
GE07hv_apppu:980: na prayacchati putraṃ hi nikumbhaḥ kāraṇena hi /
GE07hv_apppu:981: rājā tu yadi saṃkruddhaḥ kāryasiddhis tato bhavet // HV_App.I,7.108 //
GE07hv_apppu:982: atha dīrgheṇa kālena krodho rājānam āviśat /
GE07hv_apppu:983: bhūtam etan mahaddūri nāgarāṇāṃ prayacchati // HV_App.I,7.110 //
GE07hv_apppu:984: prīto varānnaiḥ śataśo mama kiṃ na prayacchati /
GE07hv_apppu:985: māmakaiḥ pūjyate nityaṃ nagaryāṃ mama caiva hi // HV_App.I,7.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:986: vijñāpito mamārthaṃ vai devyā me putrakāraṇāt /
GE07hv_apppu:987: na dadāti ca putraṃ me kṛtaghnaḥ kena hetunā // HV_App.I,7.114 //
GE07hv_apppu:989: tasmāt tu nāśayiṣyāmi sthānam asya durātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,7.116 //
GE07hv_apppu:990: evaṃ sa tu viniścitya durātmā rājakilbiṣī /
GE07hv_apppu:991: sthānaṃ gaṇapates tasya nāśayām āsa durmatiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:992: bhagnam āyatanaṃ dṛṣṭvā rājānam aśapat prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,7.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:994: pury akasmād iyaṃ śūnyā tava nūnaṃ bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,7.121 //
GE07hv_apppu:995: tatas tena tu śāpena śūnyā vārāṇasī tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:996: śaptvā purīṃ nikumbhas tāṃ mahādevam athāgamat // HV_App.I,7.123 //
GE07hv_apppu:997: akasmāc ca purī sā tu vidrutā sarvatodiśam /
GE07hv_apppu:998: tasyāṃ puryāṃ tato devo nirmame padam ātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:999: ramate tatra vai devo ramamāṇo gireḥ sutām // HV_App.I,7.126 //
GE07hv_apppu:1000: na ratiṃ tatra vai devī labhate gṛhavismayāt /
GE07hv_apppu:1001: vasāmy atra na puryāṃ tu devī devam athābravīt // HV_App.I,7.128 //
GE07hv_apppu:1003: nāhaṃ veśma vimokṣyāmi avimuktaṃ hi me gṛham /
GE07hv_apppu:1004: nāhaṃ tatra gamiṣyāmi gaccha devi gṛhaṃ prati // HV_App.I,7.130 //
GE07hv_apppu:1006: tasmāt tad avimuktaṃ hi proktaṃ devena vai svayam /
GE07hv_apppu:1007: evaṃ vārāṇasī śaptā avimuktaṃ ca kīrtitam // HV_App.I,7.133 //
GE07hv_apppu:1009: yugeṣu triṣu dharmātmā saha devyā maheśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,7.135 //
GE07hv_apppu:1010: antardhānaṃ kalau yāti tatpuraṃ hi mahātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1011: antarhite pure tasmin purī tu vasate punaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1012: evaṃ vārāṇasī śaptā niveśaṃ punar āgatā // HV_App.I,7.138 //
GE07hv_apppu:1013: bhadraśreṇyasya putro vai durdamo nāma viśrutaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1014: divodāsena bāleti ghṛṇayā sa vivarjitaḥ // HV_App.I,7.140 //
GE07hv_apppu:1015: haihayasya tu dāyādyaṃ kṛtavān vai mahīpatiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1020: tena putreṇa bālena prahṛtaṃ tasya vai punaḥ // HV_App.I,7.146 //
GE07hv_apppu:1022: tena bālena dāyādyaṃ pragṛhītaṃ punas tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:1024: evaṃ pratardano rājā brahmajñaḥ saṃbabhūva ha /
GE07hv_apppu:1025: sa eva śatrujid vīra ṛtadhvaja itīritaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1028: vatsaputro hy alarkas tu saṃnatis tasya cātmajaḥ // HV_App.I,7.148 //
GE07hv_apppu:1030: alarko nāma putras tu rājā saṃnatimān bhuvi /
GE07hv_apppu:1031: aṣṭāratho nāma nṛpaḥ suto bhīmarathasya vai /
GE07hv_apppu:1034: alarkaṃ prati rājarṣiṃ śloko gītaḥ purātanaiḥ // HV_App.I,7.150 //
GE07hv_apppu:1037: alarkād aparo nānyo bubhuje medinīm imām /
GE07hv_apppu:1038: yuvā rūpeṇa saṃpanna āsīt kāśikulodvahaḥ // HV_App.I,7.152 //
GE07hv_apppu:1042: ramyāṃ niveśayām āsa purīṃ vārāṇasīṃ punaḥ // HV_App.I,7.156 //
GE07hv_apppu:1043: saṃnater api dāyādaḥ sunītho nāma dhārmikaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1044: sunīthasya tu dāyādaḥ kṣemo nāma mahāyaśāḥ // HV_App.I,7.158 //
GE07hv_apppu:1045: kṣemasya ketumān putraḥ suketus tasya cātmajaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1046: suketutanayaś cāpi dharmaketur iti śrutiḥ // HV_App.I,7.160 //
GE07hv_apppu:1048: satyaketusutaś cāpi vibhur nāma prajeśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,7.162 //
GE07hv_apppu:1049: ānartas tu vibhoḥ putraḥ sukumāraś ca tatsutaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1050: sukumārasya putras tu satyaketur sudhārmikaḥ // HV_App.I,7.164 //
GE07hv_apppu:1053: vatsasya vatsabhūmiś ca bhṛgubhūmis tu bhārgavāt // HV_App.I,7.167 //
GE07hv_apppu:1054: ete tv aṅgirasaḥ putrā jātā vaṃśe tha bhārgave /
GE07hv_apppu:1055: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ striyaḥ putrāḥ sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,7.169 //
GE07hv_apppu:1056: ity ete kāśayaḥ proktā nahuṣasya nibodhata // HV_App.I,7.170 //
GE07hv_apppu:1058: [h: HV (CE) App.I No. 8, transliterated by Peter Schreiner, 17.9.1988,
GE07hv_apppu:1060: [k: After 47.52, all Mss. (except M1--3) G(ed.) ins. App.I No. 8: :k]
GE07hv_apppu:1063: jananī siddhasenasya durgā vīrā mahātapāḥ // HV_App.I,8.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:1064: jayā ca vijayā caiva puṣṭiś ca tvaṃ kṣamā dayā /
GE07hv_apppu:1068: parvatāgreṣu ghoreṣu nadīṣu ca guhāsu ca /
GE07hv_apppu:1069: vāsas tava mahādevi vaneṣūpavaneṣu ca // HV_App.I,8.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:1070: śabarair barbaraiś caiva pulindaiś ca supūjitā /
GE07hv_apppu:1072: kukkuṭaiś chāgalair meṣaiḥ siṃhair vyāghraiḥ samākulā /
GE07hv_apppu:1077: āvāsaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ niṣṭhā ca paramā gatiḥ // HV_App.I,8.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:1079: cīravāsāḥ suvāsāś ca raudrī saṃdhyā tvam eva ca // HV_App.I,8.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:1081: lakṣmīr alakṣmīrūpeṇa dānavānāṃ vadhāya ca // HV_App.I,8.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:1082: sāvitrī cāpi devānāṃ mātā bhūtagaṇasya ca /
GE07hv_apppu:1083: antarvedī ca yajñānām ṛtvijāṃ caiva dakṣiṇā // HV_App.I,8.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:1085: yakṣāṇāṃ prathamā yakṣī nāgānāṃ suraseti ca // HV_App.I,8.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:1086: [k: Ñ2.3 V B2 Dn Ds1 D4.5 ins. after line 24; D2 T4 after line 21 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:1087: kanyānāṃ brahmacaryā ca saubhāgyaṃ pramadāsu ca /
GE07hv_apppu:1088: brahmavādiny atho dīkṣā śobhā ca paramā tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:1089: jyotiṣāṃ tvaṃ prabhā devi nakṣatrāṇāṃ ca rohiṇī // HV_App.I,8.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:1091: pūrṇe ca pūrṇimācandre kṛttivāsā iti smṛtā // HV_App.I,8.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:1092: sarasvatī ca vālmīkeḥ smṛtir dvaipāyane tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:1093: suradevī ca bhūteṣu stūyase tvaṃ svakarmabhiḥ // HV_App.I,8.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:1095: ṛṣīṇāṃ dharmabuddhis tu devānām aditis tathā // HV_App.I,8.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:1096: karṣakānāṃ ca sīteti bhūtānāṃ dharaṇīti ca /
GE07hv_apppu:1097: tāpasānāṃ ca devī tvam araṇī cāgnihotriṇām // HV_App.I,8.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:1098: kṣudhā ca sarvabhūtānāṃ tṛptis tvaṃ ca divaukasām /
GE07hv_apppu:1099: svāhā tuṣṭir dhṛtir medhā vasūnāṃ tvaṃ vasūmatī // HV_App.I,8.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:1100: āśā tvaṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ tu tuṣṭiś ca kṛtakarmaṇām /
GE07hv_apppu:1101: diśaś ca vidiśaś caiva tathā hy agniśikhā prabhā // HV_App.I,8.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:1102: śakunī pūtanā ca tvaṃ revatī ca sudāruṇā /
GE07hv_apppu:1103: nidrā ca sarvabhūtānāṃ mohanī kṣatriyā tathā // HV_App.I,8.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:1104: vidyānāṃ brahmavidyā tvam oṃkāro 'stha vaṣaṭ tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:1105: nārīṇāṃ pārvatī ca tvaṃ paurāṇīm ṛṣayo viduḥ // HV_App.I,8.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:1107: [k: K2 V2 B Ds D4 subst. for one 43; Ñ2 ins. after 44 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:1110: tvayā vyāptam idaṃ sarvaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṃgamam // HV_App.I,8.45 //
GE07hv_apppu:1112: nadītīreṣu ghoreṣu kāntāreṣu bhayeṣu ca // HV_App.I,8.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:1113: pravāse rājabandhe ca śatrūṇāṃ ca pramardane /
GE07hv_apppu:1114: prāṇātyayeṣu sarveṣu tvaṃ hi rakṣā na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,8.49 //
GE07hv_apppu:1115: tvayi me hṛdayaṃ devi tvayi buddhir manas tvayi /
GE07hv_apppu:1116: rakṣa māṃ sarvapāpebhyaḥ prasādaṃ ca kariṣyasi // HV_App.I,8.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:1118: yaḥ paṭhet prātar utthāya śuciḥ prayatamānasaḥ // HV_App.I,8.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:1119: tribhiś ca kāṅkṣitaṃ māsaiḥ phalaṃ vai saṃprayacchati /
GE07hv_apppu:1120: ṣadbhir māsair variṣṭhaṃ tu varam ekaṃ prayacchati // HV_App.I,8.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:1121: [k: For line 55, B3 Ds T3.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:1122: ṣaṇmāsān paṭhate yas tu kāṅkṣitaṃ ca labheta saḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1123: asrcitā navabhir māsair divyaṃ cakṣuḥ prayacchati /
GE07hv_apppu:1125: satyaṃ ca brahmacaryaṃ ca dvaipāyanavaco yathā // HV_App.I,8.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:1126: [h: HV (CE) App.I No. 9, transliterated and collated with ViP and BrP by Utz Podzeit, extracted from the collation and edited by Peter Schreiner.
GE07hv_apppu:1130: kvacid veśmani nirgatya navanītaṃ ca gṛhṇataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1131: saṃkṣobhya takraṃ bahuśo dārakau dārakaiḥ saha /
GE07hv_apppu:1132: anvabhūtām tato rājan ghaṭāṃś ca parijaghnatuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1133: dadhi pītvā tu deveśau tān ghaṭāṃś ca pipeṣatuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1135: bhittvā chittvā ca govindaḥ papau kṣīrāṇi sarvaśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1136: tac chiṣṭaṃ caiva deveśaḥ kṣitau ca samavākṣipat /
GE07hv_apppu:1137: pāyasaṃ ca samānīya gṛhād anyatra vikṣipan /
GE07hv_apppu:1138: dārakhebhyas tadā kṛṣṇo dadau svaṃ ca samācaran /
GE07hv_apppu:1139: śikyāc ca ghaṭam ādāya dadhnāṃ dārakasattamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1140: nirbhidyācchidya bhūmau tu niṣpapeṣa sa keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,9.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:1141: dārakau tau tu sahasā vatsānāṃ ca paraṃtapa /
GE07hv_apppu:1142: dāmnāṃ vimocanaṃ kṛtvā vatsān dhenūr apāyatām /
GE07hv_apppu:1143: prativeśma tadā tau tu vyasanaṃ paryakurvatām /
GE07hv_apppu:1145: na ca śakto vārayituṃ nandagopaḥ sudurmadau /
GE07hv_apppu:1146: tatas tu dārakaiḥ sārdhaṃ kṛṣṇaś cakṣuś ca tadgatam /
GE07hv_apppu:1147: ekasya tu tadā kṛṣṇo dārakasya mahīpate /
GE07hv_apppu:1148: pracchādya tarasānyaṃ tu dārakaṃ pratyuvāca ha /
GE07hv_apppu:1149: gaccha vatsa yathānyatra tathā dṛṣṭaiś ca dārakaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1150: yadi dṛṣṭas tvam anyais tu jito daṇḍadharo mama /
GE07hv_apppu:1151: ity uktvā balabhadraṃ tu taṃ draṣṭuṃ praiṣayad balī /
GE07hv_apppu:1152: sa gatvā balabhadras tu gṛhītvā dārakaṃ balāt /
GE07hv_apppu:1153: keśavāya dadau taṃ tu tvaṃ jitaḥ keśavo 'bravīt /
GE07hv_apppu:1154: kīlakaṃ ca samānīya vikṣipya bhuvi gūhitam /
GE07hv_apppu:1155: āhūya dārakān sarvān idam āha jagatpatiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1156: śaktaś ced bhavatāṃ kaścit kīlaṃ gṛhṇātu paśyataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1157: mama pārśvagato bhūtvā daṇḍo deyaś ca tasya ha /
GE07hv_apppu:1158: tac chrutvā dārakāḥ sarve taṃ draṣṭuṃ yatnam āsthitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1159: nāśaknuvaṃś ca te sarve jitāṃs tān abravīd iti /
GE07hv_apppu:1161: cakāra matimān kṛṣṇo dārakaiḥ saha gokule // HV_App.I,9.33 //
GE07hv_apppu:1162: [h: HV (CE) App.I No. 9A, transliterated and collated with ViP and BrP by Utz Podzeit, extracted from the collation and edited by Peter Schreiner;
GE07hv_apppu:1164: [k: D6T GM4 G(ed.) cont. (after App.I No. 9); M1-3 ins. after 51.12: :k]
GE07hv_apppu:1165: kvacid veśmani saṃgamya śikyasthān payaso ghaṭān /
GE07hv_apppu:1166: ādāya yugapat sarvān payaḥ pītvā mudā bhṛśam /
GE07hv_apppu:1167: abhihatya tataḥ sarvān niṣpapeṣa hasan bahiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1168: ācchidya śikyam anyatra tato dadhno ghaṭān kṣipan /
GE07hv_apppu:1169: yathākāmaṃ tataḥ pītvā dārakebhyas tato dadau /
GE07hv_apppu:1170: atha vegān mudā kṛṣṇaḥ kvacid anyatra veśmani /
GE07hv_apppu:1171: guptān ghaṭān upādāya tvarito 'tha babhañja ha /
GE07hv_apppu:1172: kvacid dhṛtaghaṭān pūrṇān bahūn ādāya vesmani /
GE07hv_apppu:1173: vyabhajad dārakebhyas tu bhakṣayaṃś ca svayaṃ dadau /
GE07hv_apppu:1174: anyato veśmanaḥ śikyān ghaṭāṃs takrasya pūrayan /
GE07hv_apppu:1175: ādāyādhūya bahudhā tasminn eva muhuḥ kṣipan /
GE07hv_apppu:1176: vyahasad vividhaṃ hāsaṃ nanarta ca sa dārakaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1177: takreṣu ca payaḥ kṣipya takraṃ ca payasi kṣipan /
GE07hv_apppu:1178: payo jaleṣu saṃyojya ghṛtam agnau juhāva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:1179: evaṃ tau satataṃ tatra cakratur veśmasaṃgaram /
GE07hv_apppu:1181: gāvaḥ puṣṭā nīrujāś ca vatsalāḥ kāmadohanāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1182: āgamya harṣitās tau tu pucchādiṣv avalambatām //
GE07hv_apppu:1184: vatsān ārohamāṇau ca tatpāne phenavo śiśū (sic) //
GE07hv_apppu:1185: atha vatsān muhur baddhān dāmabhiḥ kīlakeṣu vai /
GE07hv_apppu:1186: bhittvā cchittvā ca dāmāni vatsān dhenuṣv anīyatām /
GE07hv_apppu:1187: dāmany ācchidya sarvatra vatsān dikṣu prakālayan /
GE07hv_apppu:1189: nirudhyamāno gopībhiḥ sa cakre vai muhurmuhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1190: sarpiṣā payasā caiva dadhnā takreṇa śūnyakam // HV_App.I,9A.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:1192: paśyantīnāṃ ca gopīnāṃ kṛṣṇo nityaṃ sa saṃbhramam // HV_App.I,9A.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:1193: piban payaś ca vividhaṃ cakre caivaṃ sa vaiśasam // HV_App.I,9A.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:1195: kṛṣṇasya ceṣṭitaṃ sarvaṃ yaśodāyai nyavedayan // HV_App.I,9A.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:1196: mama kumbhyo daśa hatāḥ putreṇānena durmate /
GE07hv_apppu:1197: na ca śiṣṭaṃ payas takraṃ ghṛtaṃ vā dadhi leśakam /
GE07hv_apppu:1198: kim adya kriyate mūḍhe jīvikā mama naśyati // HV_App.I,9A.29 //
GE07hv_apppu:1200: pañcāśan mama kumbhīnāṃ śikyād ādāya te sutaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1201: ghṛtasya pūrṇān suśliṣṭān paśyantyā mama hanti ha // HV_App.I,9A.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:1203: antarveśmany aśūnyāṃś ca kumbhān sarvān ghṛtena vai /
GE07hv_apppu:1204: tāñ śūnyān kārayām āsa na ca śiṣṭaṃ ghṛtaṃ mama /
GE07hv_apppu:1206: pañcatriṃśad ghaṭān kṛṣṇo ghṛtena payasā samam /
GE07hv_apppu:1207: ādhūyotkṣipya cāvidhya niṣpapeṣa ca bhūtale // HV_App.I,9A.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:1208: na kiṃcid vyañjanaṃ mūḍhe mama veśmani vidyate /
GE07hv_apppu:1209: gāvaś ca vatsakaiḥ pītāḥ kṛṣṇenānena mokṣitaiḥ // HV_App.I,9A.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:1211: pāyasaṃ bahu pakvaṃ me bhadre jagdham anena vai /
GE07hv_apppu:1212: dadhyodanaṃ bhṛśaṃ dattaṃ dārakebhyo rasānvitam // HV_App.I,9A.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:1213: apūpā bahavo jagdhā bhartrarthe rakṣitā mayā /
GE07hv_apppu:1214: saktavo bahavaḥ pītāḥ saṃskṛtāḥ śarkarādibhiḥ // HV_App.I,9A.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:1215: kiṃ gṛheṇa ca me kāryaṃ kiṃ ghoṣaiḥ kiṃ gavādibhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1216: eṣā yāsyāmi durmedhe mūḍhe duṣputrasūyini // HV_App.I,9A.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:1218: dhenavo mama naṣṭāḥ syur vatsaiḥ sārdhaṃ daśādya vai /
GE07hv_apppu:1219: anena kālitā mūḍhe tava putreṇa durhṛdā // HV_App.I,9A.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:1221: jīvikā mama naṣṭābhūd eṣā yāsyāmi deśakam // HV_App.I,9A.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:1222: evam atyantato gopyo vinedur visvaraṃ bhṛśam /
GE07hv_apppu:1223: kā gatir vada bhadreti gopyaḥ sarvās tadābruvan // HV_App.I,9A.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:1224: atha tābhyo yathānaṣṭaṃ yaśodā dattavaty alam /
GE07hv_apppu:1225: samāśvāsya tataḥ sarvāḥ svaṃ svaṃ veśma vyakālayat /
GE07hv_apppu:1226: [h: HV (CE) App.I No. 10, transliterated and collated with ViP and BrP by Utz Podzeit, extracted from the collation and edited by Peter Schreiner.
GE07hv_apppu:1228: [k: After 53.7, D6,S,G(ed.) ins. a passage given in App. I, No. 10 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:1229: prāg eva vasudevas tu nandagopena vāritaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1230: vṛndāvananivāsas te parihartavya ity api // HV_App.I,10.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:1234: gopāḥ praveṣṭum icchanti pralambas tatra cāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,10.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:1235: nānyad vanaṃ ca paśyāmi samīpe saṃpadā yutam /
GE07hv_apppu:1236: kiṃ nu kartavyam iti me putrayoś ca hitaṃ bhavet // HV_App.I,10.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:1238: brahmaṇā codito vipra indreṇa ca mahātmanā // HV_App.I,10.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:1240: vavande nandagopas tu tasya vai caraṇau muneḥ // HV_App.I,10.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:1242: jñātvā tvayi manoduḥkhaṃ praṇayāt te 'ham āgataḥ // HV_App.I,10.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:1244: asmin kāle mahāprājña kāle jñāsyati vai bhavān // HV_App.I,10.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:1245: yat tvāṃ vakṣyāmi ghoṣeśa tat tvaṃ jñāsyasi vai vibho /
GE07hv_apppu:1246: na kevalau tava sutau devau mānuṣatāṃ gatau /
GE07hv_apppu:1247: rāmakṛṣṇāv imau jātau daityamūlaharāv iti // HV_App.I,10.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:1250: śakaṭasya tv adhaḥ suptaṃ nihantuṃ niścitaṃ śiśum // HV_App.I,10.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:1251: rakṣāhīnaṃ yuvābhyāṃ ca viyuktaṃ vīkṣya dānavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1253: yuvābhyām atha nirmuktaṃ vīkṣya dāmodaraṃ tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:1254: labdharandhraś ca niṣpeṣṭuṃ tatkṣaṇāc chiśunā hataḥ // HV_App.I,10.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:1256: prabuddhasya tu bālasya tanmuhūrtaṃ vijṛmbhataḥ // HV_App.I,10.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:1257: tasyām eva niśāyāṃ ca pūtanāṃ nāma rākṣasīm /
GE07hv_apppu:1258: pāyayantīṃ viṣapayaḥ sastanyaṃ prāṇam āharat // HV_App.I,10.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:1260: hantukāmau tadā bālaḥ svayam eva jaghāna ha // HV_App.I,10.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:1262: bhayasthānaṃ na te gopa viśa vṛndāvanaṃ vanam // HV_App.I,10.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:1264: pratyakṣaṃ tava caitāni karmāṇīha kṛtāni ca // HV_App.I,10.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:1266: kṛṣṇaś cāsurasaṃghātaṃ na bhīs tvām upasarpa tu // HV_App.I,10.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:1267: ity uktvā nandagopaṃ tu kṛṣṇaṃ tuṣṭāva nāradaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1268: namas tubhyaṃ jagaddhātre viśvakartre namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,10.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:1271: namas te devakīmatar namas te yādaveśvara /
GE07hv_apppu:1274: viśa vṛndāvanāṃ deva vihara tvaṃ yathāsukham /
GE07hv_apppu:1275: tatra daityān mahāvīryāñ jahi yatnaparo bhava // HV_App.I,10.45 //
GE07hv_apppu:1276: ity uktvā nārade yāte nandagopo mahāmatiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1278: [h: HV (CE) App.I No. 11, transliterated by Peter Schreiner; version of March 5, 2002.
GE07hv_apppu:1279: [k: After adhy. 53, D3.6,S ins. App. I, No. 11 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:1281: tau tu vṛndāvanaṃ prāptau vasudevasutāv ubhau /
GE07hv_apppu:1283: praviśya ca mahāraṇyaṃ tadā vṛndāvanaṃ vanam /
GE07hv_apppu:1285: gāvaś ca kṣīrasaṃpannā mahiṣyaś ca sunirvṛtāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1286: tasmin kāle tadā ceruḥ savatsāś ca yathāsukham // HV_App.I,11.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:1287: [k: M1.2 subst. for line 6; M3 ins. after line 5 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:1288: cacāra ca yadā kṛṣṇas tadā vṛndāvanevane /
GE07hv_apppu:1289: atha trayodaśe varṣe vardhamāne ca keśave /
GE07hv_apppu:1290: saṃprāpto gharmasamayaḥ kṛṣṇe vṛndāvane sthite // HV_App.I,11.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:1291: gate ca bhāskare kāṣṭhām uttarāṃ tīkṣṇadīdhitau /
GE07hv_apppu:1293: lobhayantyo mṛgāñ śaśvat tīkṣṇaraśmau divākare // HV_App.I,11.11 //
GE07hv_apppu:1295: saptārciṣo giriṃ dagdham udabhūvann itas tataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1300: petuś ca sarvataḥ pṛthvīṃ raktapātā ivādriṣu // HV_App.I,11.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:1302: tamāṃsīva hi gopānāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ pidadhire muhuḥ // HV_App.I,11.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:1304: vaneṣu drumamūleṣu gāś ca saṃkālya tasthire // HV_App.I,11.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:1305: gopyaḥ kumbhīḥ samādāya nīraiḥ pūrṇāḥ samantataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1307: vastrair jalārdraiḥ satataṃ vāhayantyaḥ kucān pṛthūn // HV_App.I,11.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:1309: ādāya pathi gopālā āsyaśoṣaṃ nirāsire // HV_App.I,11.27 //
