GE07hv_apppu:1592: bhayād añcitalomāno viviśuḥ sarvato vanam // HV_App.I,11.276 //
GE07hv_apppu:1593: asurāḥ paśavas tāsām anvayo niṣphalo bhuvi /
GE07hv_apppu:1594: adyāpi saṃcaranty eva mahāraṇye janāvṛte // HV_App.I,11.278 //
GE07hv_apppu:1598: dikṣu sarvāsu vatsānāṃ kṣipan vṛkṣe babhañja ha // HV_App.I,11.280 //
GE07hv_apppu:1599: ubhābhyām api hastābhyāṃ yugapac ca pṛthak ca saḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1600: ekagrāhaiś ca bahubhir tair vatsair vṛkṣam āhanat // HV_App.I,11.282 //
GE07hv_apppu:1601: kṣipyamāṇais tato vṛkṣo vatsair bhagno 'tha viṣṇunā /
GE07hv_apppu:1602: sāravanto hatā vṛkṣā vatsāś ca nihatās tathā // HV_App.I,11.284 //
GE07hv_apppu:1603: aśeṣam eva vatsānāṃ kṣayaṃ nītvā janādanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1607: dāruṇaiś ca vapurbhis tair bhagnair aṅgair anekadhā /
GE07hv_apppu:1609: dṛṣṭvā tat karma kṛṣṇasya vismitās tatra ye sthitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1610: asādhyaṃ sumahat kāryaṃ kṛtvā kṛṣṇo vyavasthitaḥ // HV_App.I,11.292 //
GE07hv_apppu:1612: śeṣaṃ vṛkṣaṃ samunmathya gopālair adahat saha /
GE07hv_apppu:1613: viṣakaṇṭakino vṛkṣās tatra ye tān vyanīnaśat // HV_App.I,11.295 //
GE07hv_apppu:1614: tato vallyaś ca bhūyiṣṭhā ye ca gulmās tadāśritāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1615: chittvā saṃgṛhya tān sarvān bhagno yatra viṣadrumaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1616: tatra parvatavad rāśiṃ kṛtvāgniṃ samupānayat // HV_App.I,11.298 //
GE07hv_apppu:1618: adahat patitaiḥ sārdhaṃ phalaiḥ puṣpaiḥ śavais tathā // HV_App.I,11.300 //
GE07hv_apppu:1624: ākāśāt puṣpavṛṣṭiś ca papāta dharaṇītale // HV_App.I,11.304 //
GE07hv_apppu:1625: vavau vāyuḥ sukhasparśaḥ praśāntam abhavad rajaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1626: devaduṃdubhayo nedur nīrujaṃ cābhavad vanam // HV_App.I,11.306 //
GE07hv_apppu:1627: tato rāmaś ca kṛṣṇaś ca pūjyamānau mudā yutau /
GE07hv_apppu:1628: gopālair brahmaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ pratiyātau mahāvanāt // HV_App.I,11.308 //
GE07hv_apppu:1630: gopālāḥ kṛtakarmāṇaś cakruḥ siṃhadhvaniṃ muhuḥ // HV_App.I,11.310 //
GE07hv_apppu:1631: praviśya yamunāṃ gopā jalakrīḍās tv anekaśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1632: sakṛṣṇā gopamukhyāś ca cakrur nityavihāriṇaḥ // HV_App.I,11.312 //
GE07hv_apppu:1634: cakruḥ śikṣāviśeṣāṃś ca vyāyāmāṃś ca jalāśrayān // HV_App.I,11.314 //
GE07hv_apppu:1637: yuddhamārgaṃ ca saṃyūhya cakrur yuddhakramaṃ muhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1638: jalagūḍhaśarīrās te cerur nadyām adhogatāḥ // HV_App.I,11.318 //
GE07hv_apppu:1639: antaś copari toyasya rāmakṛṣṇau mudā yutau /
GE07hv_apppu:1642: samutteratur īśau tau sayūthāv iva yūthapau // HV_App.I,11.322 //
GE07hv_apppu:1644: parikalpitam annādyaṃ putrayor utsave sati // HV_App.I,11.324 //
GE07hv_apppu:1645: tatas tasya niyogāc ca suddham āhāram āhṛtam /
GE07hv_apppu:1646: nyavedayaṃś ca tatraiṣāṃ gopanāryaḥ sadārakāḥ // HV_App.I,11.326 //
GE07hv_apppu:1647: tatra tau vimale vastre paridhāya svalaṃkṛtau /
GE07hv_apppu:1648: ājahrur aśanaṃ mṛṣṭam amṛtaṃ vibudhā iva // HV_App.I,11.328 //
GE07hv_apppu:1649: bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca peyaṃ ca vidhivad vyañjanānvitam /
GE07hv_apppu:1654: śivāś ca lokasiddhyarthaṃ śivā vāco vavāśire // HV_App.I,11.332 //
GE07hv_apppu:1656: tataś ca rāmakṛṣṇau tau gopaiḥ krīḍāparāyaṇau /
GE07hv_apppu:1657: tata utthāya gopālāḥ svadeśān prati niryayauḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1658: goniveśaṃ mudā yuktāḥ sāyāhne vītakalmaṣāḥ // HV_App.I,11.334 //
GE07hv_apppu:1659: nṛtyantaḥ prahasantś ca dhāvantaś ca parasparam /
GE07hv_apppu:1664: saveṇaśṛṅgavetrāṃ ca vīnāṃ ca vādayaṃs tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:1665: pratiyātāḥ sukhaṃ gopāḥ sukaṇṭhā madhurasvarāḥ // HV_App.I,11.338 //
GE07hv_apppu:1667: samantataḥ prādur āsīt kṛto gopair mudānvitaiḥ // HV_App.I,11.340 //
GE07hv_apppu:1668: evaṃ saṃbhūtam atulaṃ śabdaṃ kurvan kumārakāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1669: praharṣam atulaṃ labdhvā bhejire vāsam eva te // HV_App.I,11.342 //
GE07hv_apppu:1671: gatasya tasya devasya dharmakālo mahān abhūt /
GE07hv_apppu:1674: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I No. 12, transliterated by Peter Schreiner; version of March 5, 2002.
GE07hv_apppu:1675: [k: After adhy. 54, D3.6,S ins. App.I No. 12. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:1679: dātā dugdhasya sarveṣāṃ takrasya ca ghṛtasya ca /
GE07hv_apppu:1680: janasya priyavāṅ nityaṃ yaśodāyā jaghanyajaḥ // HV_App.I,12.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:1681: dharmadā tasya bhāryāsīd dharmadaiva ca nāmataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1683: tayos tatra pumāñ jātaḥ śrīdāmā nāma viśrutaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1684: sarvaiś ca sadguṇair yuktaḥ sarvaprāṇimanoramaḥ // HV_App.I,12.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:1686: hasantī gamanair haṃsān bhūspṛṣṭacaraṇān muhuḥ // HV_App.I,12.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:1692: suvarṇakumbhasadṛśau dṛḍhau pīnau stanau mṛdū // HV_App.I,12.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:1702: tāṃ vavruḥ sarvabhūpālā bhūyo bhūyo viśāṃ pate /
GE07hv_apppu:1703: na teṣāṃ kasyacid dattā pitrā vidhibalāśrayāt // HV_App.I,12.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:1704: etasminn eva kāle tu vṛṣarūpā mahāsurāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1707: saṃgrāmān bahuśaḥ kṛtvā tena yuddhe jitās tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:1708: diśo mūḍhāḥ prajagmus te viṣṇuṃ hantuṃ samudyatāḥ // HV_App.I,12.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:1710: jñātvā viṣṇuṃ yadukule yatnavantaḥ samutthitāḥ // HV_App.I,12.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:1717: te vṛṣāḥ sarvato jaghnur gāś ca vatsāṃś ca durmadāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1718: garbhān āsrāvayan sarvān gavāṃ sasyāny abhakṣayan // HV_App.I,12.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:1720: sasyānāṃ pālakān sarvān ādhāvanti sma sarvataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1721: kumbhakasya vraje rātrau vasanti sma mudānvitāḥ // HV_App.I,12.45 //
GE07hv_apppu:1723: nyavedayaṃs tadā sarvaṃ vṛṣaiḥ sasyavināśanam // HV_App.I,12.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:1724: yāny eva tava sasyāni rāṣṭre jātāni sarvaśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1726: saptabhis taiḥ samudriktair damanena vivarjitaiḥ // HV_App.I,12.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:1727: te nivāryā mahīpāla yadi te syāj jagattrayam /
GE07hv_apppu:1728: sādayanti muhuḥ sarvān naṣṭā rājan bhavatprajāḥ // HV_App.I,12.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:1729: iti teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā rājā janakasaṃbhavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1730: dūtaiḥ kumbhakam āhūya vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // HV_App.I,12.54 //
GE07hv_apppu:1731: tava sapta vṛṣā gopa nirdamāḥ sasyaghātakāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1732: damyantām adya sarve te vṛṣāḥ sarvaprayatnataḥ // HV_App.I,12.56 //
GE07hv_apppu:1733: anyathā daṇḍya eva syāt sabandhuḥ saprajo bhavān /
GE07hv_apppu:1734: gaccha gopair matiyutair damane kuśalaiḥ samam /
GE07hv_apppu:1735: damyantāṃ te vṛṣāḥ sapta na bhayaṃ vidyate tava // HV_App.I,12.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:1736: atha rātrau kvacid dṛptān dānavān vṛṣarūpiṇaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1738: rajjuhastās tadā sarve mandaṃ mandam upāyayuḥ // HV_App.I,12.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:1739: atha te ballavān dṛṣṭvā rajjuhastān samantataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1741: tān khuraiḥ śṛṅgakoṇaiś ca samājagmuḥ samantataḥ // HV_App.I,12.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:1742: te hatā gopamukhyās tair gataprāṇāḥ samaṃ bhuvi /
GE07hv_apppu:1743: patitāḥ śerate bhūmau vajrabhagnā ivācalāḥ // HV_App.I,12.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:1744: dārakā dārikā vatsās tair hatāḥ patitā bhuvi /
GE07hv_apppu:1745: śerate mṛtabhūyiṣṭhāḥ kumbhakasya vraje sma ha // HV_App.I,12.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:1747: na śekus te vṛṣān roddhuṃ dṛḍhair dāmabhir udyatāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1748: nirvīryāḥ sarva evāmī bhagnās tair vṛṣarūpibhiḥ // HV_App.I,12.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:1749: vraje tasmin mahīpāla nihate ca tathā hate /
GE07hv_apppu:1750: visaṃjñaḥ kumbhako bhūtvā niśceṣṭaḥ samapadyata // HV_App.I,12.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:1751: tato vimṛśya tair gopair matim evaṃ samādadhe /
GE07hv_apppu:1752: taptānāṃ vṛṣamallānāṃ damitā yo bhaved bhuvi /
GE07hv_apppu:1753: tasmai kanyāṃ pradāsyāmi nīlāṃ nīradalocanām // HV_App.I,12.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:1754: gopāḥ sarve samāyāntu ye gopā goṣu jīvinaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1755: śūdrā vā ye samarthā syus te ca gacchantu sarvaśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1756: evam āghoṣayām āsa kumbhakaḥ sa vraje kila // HV_App.I,12.80 //
GE07hv_apppu:1760: vṛṣān sapta samāhatya nīlāṃ gṛhṇāma yatnataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1761: iti gopāḥ samājagmuḥ pratyekaṃ tāṃ jighṛkṣavaḥ // HV_App.I,12.83 //
GE07hv_apppu:1762: mithilā rājadhānī sā na kvacid ballavair vinā /
GE07hv_apppu:1763: gopālam ayam evaitad rāṣṭraṃ mithilavarmaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,12.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:1765: āsphoṭitabhujā mattāḥ pratyekaṃ vṛṣam anvayuḥ // HV_App.I,12.87 //
GE07hv_apppu:1767: gopālair aparaiḥ sārdhaṃ nandagopaḥ samāyayau // HV_App.I,12.89 //
GE07hv_apppu:1768: rāmakṛṣṇau ca saṃyātau kumbhakasya vrajaṃ kila /
GE07hv_apppu:1769: dārakair aparaiḥ sārdhaṃ savayobhir mudānvitaiḥ // HV_App.I,12.91 //
GE07hv_apppu:1777: gopās te naubhir uttīrya yamunām ūrmimālinīm /
GE07hv_apppu:1780: nandagopaṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā saputraṃ ca samāgatam // HV_App.I,12.102 //
GE07hv_apppu:1782: bṛsīṃ saṃcodayām āsa yaśodāṃ caiva dharmadā // HV_App.I,12.104 //
GE07hv_apppu:1784: kṛsaraṃ pāyasaṃ caiva tathā dadhyodanaṃ bahu /
GE07hv_apppu:1787: dattāḥ kṛṣṇāya rāmāya nandāyātha sajātaye // HV_App.I,12.109 //
GE07hv_apppu:1789: ūṣuḥ sukhaṃ tadā rātrau gopālāḥ sarva eva te // HV_App.I,12.111 //
GE07hv_apppu:1790: atha tasyāṃ vṛṣā rātrau goṣu vaiśasanaṃ muhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1791: pratyekaṃ sapta te mallā dāvanā vṛṣarūpiṇaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1792: vatsāñ jaghnur atho gāś ca kuṭīr bhūyo babhañjire // HV_App.I,12.114 //
GE07hv_apppu:1793: āgantukāṃs tadā gopān rātrau yuddhāya niḥsṛtān /
GE07hv_apppu:1794: jaghnuḥ śṛṅgaiḥ khuraiś caiva śiṣṭā gopāḥ diśo yayuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1797: rajjūś chittvā ghaṭān bhittvā kīlakān atha śikyakān /
GE07hv_apppu:1799: vatsān vidrāvayām āsur gāś ca rājan diśo daśa // HV_App.I,12.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:1800: tataḥ prabhāte vimale vyuṣṭā sā rajanī kila /
GE07hv_apppu:1801: vṛṣās tasthur mahānādās tasmin kumbhakaveśmani // HV_App.I,12.121 //
GE07hv_apppu:1806: atha tasyām avasthāyāṃ niśceṣṭaḥ kumbhakaḥ kila /
GE07hv_apppu:1808: gopān sarvān samāhūya vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // HV_App.I,12.126 //
GE07hv_apppu:1810: vṛṣāḥ sapta samudbhūtā vraje 'smin madadurmadāḥ // HV_App.I,12.128 //
GE07hv_apppu:1811: siṃhā iva grahākrāntā diggajā iva daṃśitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1813: yatnāś ca bahavo 'smābhiḥ kṛtā roddhum imān muhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1814: eṣām ekaṃ balād yoddhuṃ na śaktā smeti saṃgatāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1815: bhītās tebhyo muhur gopā visaṃjñā paryaṭāmahe // HV_App.I,12.133 //
GE07hv_apppu:1816: kiṃ ca rājñā muhur daṇḍyā vayaṃ mithilavarmaṇā /
GE07hv_apppu:1817: gatim eṣāṃ na jānīmo nāgatiṃ na ca cintitam // HV_App.I,12.135 //
GE07hv_apppu:1818: na ca te kevalavṛṣā rākṣasā vā vṛṣātmanā /
GE07hv_apppu:1819: daityā vā dānavā vāpi yakṣagandharva eva vā /
GE07hv_apppu:1821: yuṣmākam āgatānāṃ tu yo vṛṣān damayiṣyati /
GE07hv_apppu:1823: nīlā sumadhyamā tasmai dattā kamalalocanā // HV_App.I,12.141 //
GE07hv_apppu:1824: ity uktvāhūya tāṃ kanyāṃ gopamadhye karotthitām /
GE07hv_apppu:1825: yūnāṃ manāṃsi cākṣīṇi tasyām eva prapedire // HV_App.I,12.143 //
GE07hv_apppu:1827: anyeṣām adhare caiva pareṣāṃ ca sumadhyame /
GE07hv_apppu:1828: evaṃ vyālolamanaso gopāś citrasthitā iva // HV_App.I,12.146 //
GE07hv_apppu:1829: tatra nandasutaḥ kaścij jyeṣṭhaḥ kṛṣṇasya saṃmataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1830: sa tadāghoṣayad vācā damayiṣye vṛṣān amūn /
GE07hv_apppu:1831: iti pratasthe tān hantuṃ daiteyān vṛṣarūpiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,12.149 //
GE07hv_apppu:1832: bhujāv āsphoṭya ruddho 'pi pitrā yatnavatā tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:1833: iyeṣa yoddhuṃ mandātmā yān na śaknoti mādhavaḥ // HV_App.I,12.151 //
GE07hv_apppu:1834: rāvaṇasya raṇe hantā yaś ca hantā sumālinaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1835: teṣāṃ madhye samāsthāya humbhāravam athākarot // HV_App.I,12.153 //
GE07hv_apppu:1836: tena śabdena te sapta vṛṣā ghoṣavataḥ puraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1837: khurāñ śṛṅgān samuddhṛtya samuttasthuḥ samudyatāḥ // HV_App.I,12.155 //
GE07hv_apppu:1839: tato gopāḥ samāgamya siṃhanādaṃ vyanīnadan // HV_App.I,12.157 //
GE07hv_apppu:1840: āhato mastake so 'tha vṛṣo ghoṣavatā tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:1841: agre khurābhyām āhṛtya ghoṣavantaṃ dadaṃśa ha // HV_App.I,12.159 //
GE07hv_apppu:1842: punaḥ śṛṅgeṇa taṃ hatvā khurābhyāṃ dūrato 'kṣipat /
GE07hv_apppu:1843: vyanīnadac ca sahasā gopān vidrāvayaṃs tadā // HV_App.I,12.161 //
GE07hv_apppu:1844: yuvānas tv atha ye gopā nīlāgrahaṇalālasāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1846: gopalīlāṃ prakurvantas teṣām agre padaṃ dadhuḥ // HV_App.I,12.164 //
GE07hv_apppu:1848: sarvāṃs tāñ śṛṅgakoṇaiś ca nijaghnuḥ sarvatas tataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1849: mastakaiś ca khuraiś caiva nyahanan muditā bhṛśam // HV_App.I,12.167 //
GE07hv_apppu:1850: te gopā vṛṣadaityaiś ca nihatā bhuvi pātitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1851: gatān abhimukhaṃ hatvā saṃsthitāḥ sumahāvṛṣāḥ // HV_App.I,12.169 //
GE07hv_apppu:1853: gopālān gopamukhyāṃś ca balād vidrāvya daṃśitān /
GE07hv_apppu:1854: valmīkān khādayanto vai taṭaghātaṃ pracakrire // HV_App.I,12.172 //
GE07hv_apppu:1855: kumbhako nandagopaś ca ye vṛddhā goṣu jīvinaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1857: rājño bhītā babhūvuś ca daṇḍyā vayam iti sthitāḥ // HV_App.I,12.175 //
GE07hv_apppu:1860: atha kṛṣṇas tadā rāmaṃ babhāṣe vaiśase sati /
GE07hv_apppu:1861: naite vṛṣā mahābāho daityāḥ sapta samutthitāḥ // HV_App.I,12.177 //
GE07hv_apppu:1862: kālanemisutā ārya māṃ hantum iha saṃgatāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1863: purā mayā hatā yuddhe tadā tārāmaye vibho // HV_App.I,12.179 //
GE07hv_apppu:1865: nihantavyā mayā rāma gogopān rakṣatā samam // HV_App.I,12.181 //
GE07hv_apppu:1866: etair gopā hatā bhūyo bhūyo hantuṃ samudyatāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1867: vayam etair yathāyogaṃ krīḍāṃ kūrmaḥ sagopakāḥ // HV_App.I,12.183 //
GE07hv_apppu:1868: nandaś ca kumbhakaś cobhau viṣaṇṇau samapadyatām /
GE07hv_apppu:1869: rakṣitavyau balād etau gopau bandhū mayā vibho // HV_App.I,12.185 //
GE07hv_apppu:1870: nīlām enāṃ grahīṣyāmi hatvā sapta vṛṣān imān /
GE07hv_apppu:1871: śrīdāmānaṃ sakhitvena grahīṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,12.187 //
GE07hv_apppu:1873: puras teṣāṃ padaṃ cakre vṛṣāṇāṃ balaśālinām // HV_App.I,12.189 //
GE07hv_apppu:1874: te vṛṣā didijāḥ kruddhā viṣṇuṃ dṛṣṭvā puraḥsthitam /
GE07hv_apppu:1876: te samaṃ sahasā petuḥ kṛṣṇasyopari dānavāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1877: tato yuddhaṃ samabhavat teṣāṃ kṛṣṇasya ca prabho // HV_App.I,12.193 //
GE07hv_apppu:1879: śṛṅgais te sahasā jaghnuḥ kṛṣṇaṃ hantum abhīpsavaḥ // HV_App.I,12.195 //
GE07hv_apppu:1882: dantair dadaṃśur apare khurair anye janārdanam // HV_App.I,12.198 //
GE07hv_apppu:1883: tataḥ kṛṣṇo ruṣā muṣṭiṃ saṃnihatya jaghāna ha /
GE07hv_apppu:1884: teṣām ekaṃ kṣaṇād dhatvā punar anyaṃ jaghāna ha // HV_App.I,12.200 //
GE07hv_apppu:1885: krameṇa muṣṭyā tān sarvān hatvā daiteyagopatīn /
GE07hv_apppu:1886: nīlāṃ haste gṛhītvātha kṛṣṇas tasmin vyarocata // HV_App.I,12.202 //
GE07hv_apppu:1889: saputrāḥ saha gopālaiḥ savatsā godhanaiḥ samam // HV_App.I,12.205 //
GE07hv_apppu:1890: vṛṣaiś ca saptabhir nanda hatā gāvaḥ sahasraśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1891: garbhāś ca niḥsṛtās tāvad vatsās tāvanta eva hi /
GE07hv_apppu:1892: yatas te nihatā nanda sukhaṃ tasmād avāpnumaḥ // HV_App.I,12.208 //
GE07hv_apppu:1894: yāvad icchasi vā nanda tāvat te vai dadāmy aham // HV_App.I,12.210 //
GE07hv_apppu:1895: nīlāyai lakṣam ayutaṃ dāsyāmi bahugodhanam // HV_App.I,12.211 //
GE07hv_apppu:1897: alaṃ mama vibho tāta gobhir vatsair dhanair api /
GE07hv_apppu:1898: tiṣṭhantām adya gāvas te gāvo me bahavo matāḥ // HV_App.I,12.213 //
GE07hv_apppu:1900: yadā ca kṛṣṇa udbhūtas tadāprabhṛti me vraje // HV_App.I,12.215 //
GE07hv_apppu:1901: yāvad dugdhaṃ samudbhūtaṃ tāvad eva ghṛtaṃ bhavet /
GE07hv_apppu:1902: gulme gulme madhu bhavet svādu svādu bhavaty alam // HV_App.I,12.217 //
GE07hv_apppu:1903: gāvo vatsāś ca nīrogā jāte kṛṣṇe vraje mama /
GE07hv_apppu:1904: alpakaṃ na ca me syāt tad gehe svaṃ kṛṣṇasaṃnidhau // HV_App.I,12.219 //
GE07hv_apppu:1906: ity uktvā prayayau nandaḥ savrajaḥ sahagogaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,12.221 //
GE07hv_apppu:1907: kṛṣṇaś ca nīlayā sārdhaṃ śrīdāmnā saha saṃgatah /
GE07hv_apppu:1908: sākaṃ ca balabhadreṇa yayau vṛndāvanaṃ vanam // HV_App.I,12.223 //
GE07hv_apppu:1909: prāpya vṛḍāvanaṃ gopā remire sahakeśavāḥ // HV_App.I,12.224 //
GE07hv_apppu:1912: aho citram aho citraṃ mādhavasya jagatpateḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1915: apaśyan devam īśaṃ ye mayūrāṅgadabhūṣaṇam // HV_App.I,12.228 //
GE07hv_apppu:1919: paśyanti devam īśeśaṃ namas tebhyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,12.232 //
GE07hv_apppu:1920: hatvā vṛṣān hariḥ sapta punar āgamya mādhavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1921: vṛndāvanaṃ sarāmas tu gopaiḥ saha mahāmune /
GE07hv_apppu:1922: akarot kiṃ jagannāthas tan me brūhi tapodhana // HV_App.I,12.235 //
GE07hv_apppu:1924: tasyāṃ śaradi govindaḥ sukhaṃ vṛndāvane vane /
GE07hv_apppu:1925: cacāra godhanaḥ sākaṃ jagatāṃ prītivardhanaḥ // HV_App.I,12.237 //
GE07hv_apppu:1926: [h: HV (CE) App. I, No. 13, transliterated and collated with ViP and BrP by Utz Podzeit, extracted and edited by Peter Schreiner; version of March
GE07hv_apppu:1931: gaṅgātīrthāya saṃkrāntau bhāskarau dvāv ivāgatau // HV_App.I,13.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:1935: namaskartuṃ tadā vīra bhāṇḍīraṃ yakṣasevitam // HV_App.I,13.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:1937: dadarśatuḥ samaṃ vatsān kālyānāṃś ca gogaṇān // HV_App.I,13.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:1939: he vatsāḥ kva ca no mārgo yamunātīrthadarśane /
GE07hv_apppu:1940: kva ca tīrthaṃ susopānaṃ jhaṣagrāhavivarjitam // HV_App.I,13.13 //
GE07hv_apppu:1942: mārgajñā na vayaṃ bālā jñānibhyaḥ saṃpraśasyatām /
GE07hv_apppu:1943: kuto 'tra yamunā śubhrā kuto mārgaḥ kuto vayam // HV_App.I,13.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:1944: etasminn antare kṛṣṇas teṣāṃ vākyaṃ tayor api /
GE07hv_apppu:1945: śrutvā tau samupāgamya vaktum evaṃ pracakrame // HV_App.I,13.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:1946: eṣa vāṃ patha ādeṣṭā gavām iva suyantritaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1947: ahaṃ nandasya tanayaḥ kṛṣṇa ity abhiviśrutaḥ // HV_App.I,13.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:1948: mamāyam agrajo rāmaś candramā iva bhāsate /
GE07hv_apppu:1949: āvayor gogaṇaḥ sarvo vacanaṃ ca niśamyatām // HV_App.I,13.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:1950: etad dadhyodanaṃ samyag gṛhyatāṃ yadi rocate /
GE07hv_apppu:1951: pāyasaṃ surasaṃ dugdhaṃ dhātāś ca guḍamiśritāḥ // HV_App.I,13.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:1952: evam ukte tatas tasmin kṛṣṇe kamalalocane /
GE07hv_apppu:1953: tau kāv imāv iti tadā samādhiṃ jagmatur munī /
GE07hv_apppu:1954: tau netrāṇi samunmīlya prītau dṛṣṭvā jagatpatim /
GE07hv_apppu:1955: idam ūcatur adhyātmaṃ munī kṛṣṇasya saṃmatam // HV_App.I,13.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:1956: tvam ādiḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ madhyam antas tathā bhavān /
GE07hv_apppu:1957: sraṣṭā sarvasya lokasya pātā bhoktā janārdana // HV_App.I,13.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:1958: sraṣṭā vedasya yajñasya haviṣām ṛtvijāṃ hare /
GE07hv_apppu:1959: karmaṇāṃ phalabhoktā ca phaladaḥ karma kurvatām // HV_App.I,13.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:1960: niṣeddhā duṣṭasattvasya hantā tvaṃ tamasāṃ paraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1961: netre te bhānuśaśinau nāsikā ca samīraṇaḥ // HV_App.I,13.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:1962: vācaḥ sarasvatī devī jihvā meghaḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1963: dantāś ca parvatā jñeyā karṇaḥ pātālagocaraḥ // HV_App.I,13.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:1964: lakṣmīr vakṣas tu vijṭeyā vāmo bāhus tu śaṃkaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1965: skandhaś ca dakṣiṇo bāhur aṇgulyaḥ sāgarāḥ smṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,13.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:1966: ambaraṃ kukṣir ity uktaṃ vivarāṇi diśaḥ smṛtāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1967: rodasī tava pādau ca keśā devāḥ smṛtā hareḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1968: lomāni yakṣagandharvāḥ piśācā rākṣasā vibho // HV_App.I,13.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:1969: yāny eva vastujātāni loke dṛṣṭāni mādhava /
GE07hv_apppu:1970: tāni gātreṣu paśyāmaḥ puruṣottama te hare // HV_App.I,13.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:1972: bhavantam ūrdhvaṃ paśyāmo bhavantam atha pṛṣṭhataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:1973: pārśvataḥ purataś caiva bhavantaṃ vīkṣya nirvṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,13.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:1974: tvam ādau kroḍadaṃṣṭrāgre adadhā gāṃ saparvatām /
GE07hv_apppu:1977: daityendraṃ hatavān viṣṇo rājyaṃ dattvā marutvate // HV_App.I,13.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:1980: raghor anvayam āpannas tvam eva jagatāṃ pate /
GE07hv_apppu:1981: gatvābdhau setunā viṣṇo laṇkāṃ rāvaṇapālitām // HV_App.I,13.54 //
GE07hv_apppu:1982: rāvaṇaṃ sasutaṃ hatvā sānujaṃ sabalaṃ prabho /
GE07hv_apppu:1983: niṣkaṇṭakam imaṃ lokam akaroḥ puruṣottama // HV_App.I,13.56 //
GE07hv_apppu:1984: baler vāmanatāṃ gatvā mahīm ādāya māyayā /
GE07hv_apppu:1985: dattavāṃs tridaśendrāya pātāle taṃ vyadīdadhāḥ // HV_App.I,13.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:1987: idānīm api deveśa devadeva yadoḥ kule // HV_App.I,13.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:1990: pralambaṃ keśinaṃ hatvā hantā kaṃsasya mādhava /
GE07hv_apppu:1991: aho ramyam idaṃ viṣṇo vapur nīlotpalacchavi /
GE07hv_apppu:1998: aho manoramaṃ rūpaṃ paśyāmas tava mādhava // HV_App.I,13.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:1999: gopālās te ciraṃ dhanyā ye rūpam idam īdṛśam /
GE07hv_apppu:2000: paśyanti nityaśo viṣṇo namas te puruṣottama // HV_App.I,13.73 //
GE07hv_apppu:2002: acintyavibhave tubhyaṃ sarvagāya namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,13.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:2006: bhūyaḥ punar namasyāmas tava yogapadaṃ hare /
GE07hv_apppu:2007: sādhayāmo namas te 'stu tīrthāya jagatāṃ pate // HV_App.I,13.80 //
GE07hv_apppu:2008: ity uktvā harim īśeśaṃ tīrthāya munipuṃgavau /
GE07hv_apppu:2009: jagmatus tatra bhāṇḍīre sthitau tau rāmakeśavau /
GE07hv_apppu:2011: [h: HV (CE) App. I, No. 14 transliterated by Peter Schreiner; Version of March 4, 2002.
GE07hv_apppu:2012: [k: After 73.9, N(except Ś1,Ñ1),T,G,M4,G(ed.) ins. App.I No. 14. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2014: katham uktaṃ nāradena rājan devarṣiṇā purā /
GE07hv_apppu:2015: āścaryam etat kathitaṃ tvattaḥ śrutam ariṃdama // HV_App.I,14.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:2016: katham anyena jātas tvam ugrasena pitur vinā /
GE07hv_apppu:2017: tava mātrā kathaṃ rājan kṛtaṃ karmedam īdṛśam // HV_App.I,14.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:2018: anyāpi prākṛtā nārī na kuryāc ca jugupsitam /
GE07hv_apppu:2019: vistaraṃ śrotum icchāmi hy atra kautūhalaṃ hi me // HV_App.I,14.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:2021: yathā kathitavān vipro maharṣir nāradaḥ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2022: tathāhaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi yadi te śravaṇe matiḥ // HV_App.I,14.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:2023: āgataḥ śakrasadanāt sa vai śakrasakho muniḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2029: tam āgatam ṛṣiṃ dṛṣṭvā pūjayitvā yathāvidhi /
GE07hv_apppu:2030: pādyārghyam āsanaṃ dattvā saṃpraveśyopaveśya ha // HV_App.I,14.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:2031: mukhaüupaviṣṭo 'tha muniḥ dṛṣṭvā ca kuśalaṃ mama /
GE07hv_apppu:2032: uvāca ca prītamanā devarṣir bhāvitātmavān // HV_App.I,14.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:2034: idaṃ eko mama vacaḥ śrūyatāṃ pratigṛhyatām // HV_App.I,14.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:2036: so 'haṃ kadācid devānāṃ samāje merumūrdhani // HV_App.I,14.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:2037: tatra mantrayatām eva devatānāṃ mayā śrutam /
GE07hv_apppu:2040: tatraiṣā devakī yā te mathurāyāṃ pitṛṣvasā /
GE07hv_apppu:2042: yo 'syā garbho 'ṣṭamaḥ kaṃsa sa te mṛtyur bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,14.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:2043: devānāṃ sa tu sarvasvaṃ tridivasya gatiś ca saḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2044: paraṃ rahasyaṃ devānāṃ sa te mṛtyur bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,14.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:2045: yatnaś ca kriyatāṃ kaṃsa garbhānāṃ pātanaṃ prati /
GE07hv_apppu:2046: nāvajñā ripave kāryā subaleṣv abaleṣu vā // HV_App.I,14.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:2047: na cāyam ugrasenas tu pitā tava mahābala /
GE07hv_apppu:2048: drumilo nāma tejasvī saubhasya patir ūrjitaḥ // HV_App.I,14.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:2050: jātas tenāsi kaṃsa tvaṃ nograsenena vīryavān /
GE07hv_apppu:2051: śrutvāhaṃ tad vacas tasya kiṃcid roṣasamanvitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2052: bhūyo 'pṛcchaṃ kathaṃ brahman drumilo nāma dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,14.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:2053: mama mātrā kathaṃ tasya brūhi vipra samāgamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2054: etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ vistareṇa tapodhana // HV_App.I,14.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:2056: hanta te vartayiṣyāmi śṛṇu rājan yathārthataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2057: drumilasya ca mātrā te saṃvādaṃ ca samāgamam // HV_App.I,14.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:2058: [h: HV (CE) App. I, No. 15 transliterated by Peter Schreiner; Version of March 4, 2002.
GE07hv_apppu:2059: [k: After 73.18ab, all Mss. (except Ś1,Ñ1,M1-3), G(ed.) ins. App. I, 15.
GE07hv_apppu:2062: [k: V1 ins. before line 1; Ñ2 after line 1; V3 after line 3 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2068: [k: Ñ2 ins. after the second occurrence of line 4; V1.3 after line 4;
GE07hv_apppu:2072: avatīrya rathād dhṛṣtaś cacāra drumilo nṛpaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2074: sa taṃ prāpya parvatendram avatīrya rathottamāt /
GE07hv_apppu:2076: ubhau tau sūtasahitau ceratur nagamūrdhani // HV_App.I,15.7 //
GE07hv_apppu:2077: tato bahūny apaśyetāṃ kānanāni vanāni ca /
GE07hv_apppu:2080: nānādhātupinaddhaiś ca śṛṅgair bahubhir ucchritaiḥ // HV_App.I,15.11 //
GE07hv_apppu:2087: siṃhān vyāghrān varāhāṃś ca mahiṣāñ śrabhāñ śaśān /
GE07hv_apppu:2088: sṛmarāṃś camarān nyaṅkūn mātaṅgān yakṣarākṣasān // HV_App.I,15.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:2091: krīḍamānāṃ sakhībhiś ca puṣpāṇi pravicinvatīm // HV_App.I,15.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:2092: tataś carantīṃ suśroṇīṃ sakhībhiḥ saha saṃvṛtām /
GE07hv_apppu:2093: dṛṣṭvā bhaumapatir dūrād vismayan sūtam abravīt // HV_App.I,15.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:2098: ailasya dayitā devī yoṣidratnaṃ kim urvaśī // HV_App.I,15.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:2100: manthānaṃ mandaraṃ kṛtvā amṛtārtheti naḥ śrutam // HV_App.I,15.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:2101: tato amṛtāt samuttasthau devī śrīr lokabhāvanī /
GE07hv_apppu:2102: nārāyaṇāṅkalalitā kiṃ śrīr eṣā varāṅganā // HV_App.I,15.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:2104: tathā yoṣidgaṇān madhye rūpaṃ pradyotayad vanam /
GE07hv_apppu:2107: kāmasya vaśam āpanno mano vihvalatīva me // HV_App.I,15.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:2109: bhittvā hṛdi śarāḥ pañca nirdahantīva me manaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2111: kāmaḥ śaraiḥ pañcabhir me hṛdayaṃ nirdahann iva /
GE07hv_apppu:2113: katham adya bhavet kāryaṃ śāntyarthaṃ manmathārciṣaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2114: kenopāyena kiṃ kurma bhajen māṃ mattakāśinī // HV_App.I,15.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:2115: evaṃ bahu cintayāno nopalabhya ca dānavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2116: sūtam āha muhūrtaṃ tu tiṣṭhasva tvam ihānagha // HV_App.I,15.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:2117: ahaṃ yāsyāmi tāṃ draṣṭuṃ kasyeyam iti yoṣitam /
GE07hv_apppu:2119: śrutvā tu vacanaṃ sūtas tathāstv iti ca so 'bravīt // HV_App.I,15.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:2120: evam uktvā dānavendro gamanāya mano dadhe /
GE07hv_apppu:2123: vāry upaspṛśya balavān dhyānam evānvapadyata // HV_App.I,15.49 //
GE07hv_apppu:2125: ugrasenasya patnīti jñātvā harṣam avāpa saḥ // HV_App.I,15.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:2126: ugrasenasya vai rūpaṃ kṛtvā svaṃ parivartya saḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2129: [h: HV (CE) App.I No.16, transliterated by John Brockington, proof--read
GE07hv_apppu:2130: by John Brockington, version of 31st December 2001 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:2131: [k: D6 T2 G1.3.5 M4 ins. after the ref. of Adhy. 81; T1 M1-3 after 81.3;
GE07hv_apppu:2132: G2 after line 14 of App.I (No. 18); G3 after adhy. 80. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2135: tau gatvā mathurāṃ vīrau dvāṣthena prativeśitau // HV_App.I,16.3 //
GE07hv_apppu:2136: āsanasthaṃ tadā rājann ugrasenaṃ patiṃ nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:2137: tatpārśve ca sthitaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ balabhadreṇa saṃgatam // HV_App.I,16.5 //
GE07hv_apppu:2139: anyāṃś ca yādavān dṛṣṭvā samīpasthān mahīpateḥ // HV_App.I,16.7 //
GE07hv_apppu:2140: tau tu sarvān samābhāṣya kaṃsasya pitaraṃ tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:2141: ūcatuḥ sukham āsīnau vāsudevaṃ ca sāgrajam // HV_App.I,16.9 //
GE07hv_apppu:2143: śrūyatāṃ mama yad vākyaṃ duḥkhitasyābalasya me // HV_App.I,16.11 //
GE07hv_apppu:2146: yat tu kaṃso hataḥ saṃkhye kṛṣṇena hi balīyasā /
GE07hv_apppu:2147: aśakto 'haṃ tathā rājan kṛtasya pratikarmaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,16.15 //
GE07hv_apppu:2148: yat tu yuddhaṃ balavatā kṛṣṇena kṛtam ity api /
GE07hv_apppu:2149: nātra me vismayaḥ kāryo balavān sa hi sāgrajaḥ // HV_App.I,16.17 //
GE07hv_apppu:2150: kiṃ tu duḥkhaṃ mahad bhūtaṃ duḥsahaṃ mama jāyate /
GE07hv_apppu:2151: tad duḥkhaṃ duḥsahaṃ manye vaktuṃ ca mama duḥsaham // HV_App.I,16.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:2153: citram etan mahārāja yat kṛtaṃ mayi jīvati // HV_App.I,16.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:2154: kṛṣṇena sukṛtaṃ karma māṃ matvā paśum ity api /
GE07hv_apppu:2156: kṛṣṇe tv asukṛtaṃ karma mama tvāṃ paśya ity api /
GE07hv_apppu:2157: kiṃ nūnaṃ duṣkaraṃ karma kṛtvā kṛṣṇas tu jīvati // HV_App.I,16.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:2159: jīvitaṃ tu samāptaṃ me kṛṣṇe jīvati saṃprati // HV_App.I,16.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:2161: yadi kṛṣṇaṃ sthitaṃ saṃkhye haniṣye yadi manmukhe // HV_App.I,16.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:2162: nāhaṃ kaṃso na vā keśī nāriṣṭo na ca pūtanā /
GE07hv_apppu:2164: imām apy aparāṃ rājan pratijñāṃ śṛṇu keśava /
GE07hv_apppu:2165: yadi tvaṃ matpuro bhūyās tadā hanmi sabāndhavam // HV_App.I,16.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:2167: yatra yatra bhavān yāti tatra tatrāham āsthitaḥ // HV_App.I,16.33 //
GE07hv_apppu:2168: jīvati tvayi govinda jarāsaṃdho na jīvati /
GE07hv_apppu:2169: āgaccha saha yuddhāya balabhadreṇa dhīmatā // HV_App.I,16.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:2172: sātyake yuktam evaitat kṛtaṃ kṛṣṇena kiṃ prabho /
GE07hv_apppu:2173: vasudeva yaduśreṣṭha yuktaṃ putreṇa kiṃ tava /
GE07hv_apppu:2174: akrūra vada satyena yuktaṃ vātrānyathāpi vā // HV_App.I,16.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:2175: mṛdhe kṛṣṇa yaduśreṣṭha sthiro bhava na cañcalaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2176: bahunātra kim uktena na sthiraṃ tava jīvitam // HV_App.I,16.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:2177: śvaḥ purīṃ tava rotsyāmi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GE07hv_apppu:2178: ko nv idaṃ sāhasaṃ kuryāt tvāṃ vinā kṛṣṇa sāṃpratam // HV_App.I,16.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:2179: ity uktvā tau mahāvīryau virāmaṃ jagmatus tadā // HV_App.I,16.45 //
GE07hv_apppu:2180: ity ukto roṣatāmrākṣaḥ kṛṣṇa ūce vacas tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:2181: hataḥ kaṃso mahārāja kim ataḥ sāhasaṃ kṛtam /
GE07hv_apppu:2182: kiṃ citraṃ vada rājendra hataḥ kaṃsa itīha naḥ // HV_App.I,16.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:2183: idaṃ ca tasmai vaktavyaṃ bhavadbhyāṃ rājasattamau /
GE07hv_apppu:2184: sthito 'smi yuddhasaṃrakto jeṣyāmi ca raṇe ripūn // HV_App.I,16.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:2185: tvāṃ hatvā sabalaṃ saṃkhye rājyam ādāya sāṃpratam /
GE07hv_apppu:2186: ugrasenāya dāsyāmi satyena ca śapāmy aham // HV_App.I,16.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:2188: tau tu gatvā tadā sarvaṃ tasmai ca procatuḥ prabho // HV_App.I,16.54 //
GE07hv_apppu:2192: taṃ śrutvā rājarājendram āhavepsum amarṣaṇam // HV_App.I,16.56 //
GE07hv_apppu:2195: śaṅkamānā bhayaṃ tasmāj jarāsaṃdhān mahīpateḥ // HV_App.I,16.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:2197: sa pratāpo hi balavān magadhendrasya sarvataḥ // HV_App.I,16.61 //
GE07hv_apppu:2198: [h: HV (CE) App.I No.17, transliterated by John Brockington, proof--read
GE07hv_apppu:2199: by John Brockington, version of 31st December 2001 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:2200: [k: T1.3 G3.5 M ins. after 82.5; D6 T2 G1.4.5 cont. after *932. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2202: ājaghne keśavaṃ tābhyāṃ śarābhyāṃ bhojavardhanaḥ // HV_App.I,17.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:2203: rukmī tu vāsudevasya jyāṃ chettuṃ paricakrame /
GE07hv_apppu:2204: jñātvaiva vāsudevo 'pi dhanuś ciccheda tasya ha // HV_App.I,17.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:2206: tayā jaghne hariṃ vīraḥ so 'cchinat tāṃ śarair api // HV_App.I,17.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:2207: punar anyāṃ mahārāja gadāṃ preṣitavān nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:2208: ciccheda tāṃ jagannāthaḥ sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,17.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:2210: tad dvidhā śastrasaṃpātair akarod yadupuṃgavaḥ // HV_App.I,17.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:2212: tilaśaś ca tathā deva tac cakraṃ kṛtavāñ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,17.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:2214: tattat tatra dvidhā kṛtvā jahāsa yadunandanaḥ // HV_App.I,17.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:2216: viśastraṃ vidhanuṣkaṃ ca cakāra madhusūdanaḥ // HV_App.I,17.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:2218: avekṣya rukmiṇīṃ kṛṣṇo rukmiṇaṃ na vyaśātayat /
GE07hv_apppu:2219: āhukaḥ pañcaviṃśatyā bhīṣmakaṃ prajaghāna ha // HV_App.I,17.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:2220: bhīṣmako 'tha ca rājendra śarāṇāṃ ca paraḥśataiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2222: āhukas tu dhanuś chittvā bhīṣmakasya mahātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2223: rathaṃ cāsya praciccheda dhvajaṃ ca yadupuṃgavaḥ // HV_App.I,17.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:2224: sārathiṃ ca hayāṃs tasya jaghāna yadunandanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2225: apāyāt samarāt tasmād bhīṣmakas tu śramānvitaḥ // HV_App.I,17.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:2226: vasudevas tu rājendra krāthaṃ vivyādha patribhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2227: krāthas tu rājan vivyādha śaraiḥ saptabhir āśugaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2230: sārathiṃ ca jaghānāśu tathobhau pārṣṇisārathī // HV_App.I,17.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:2231: vasudevas tataḥ kruddho dhanuś ciccheda patribhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2232: virathaṃ ca jaghānāśu jarāsaṃdhasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,17.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:2233: viratho vidhanuṣkaś ca prayayau māgadhaṃ prati // HV_App.I,17.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:2234: babhruḥ kauśikarājaṃ taṃ vivyādha vividhaiḥ śaraiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2235: atha babhrur mahātmānaṃ vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,17.33 //
GE07hv_apppu:2236: kauśikaś ca tathā babhruṃ marmajño marmabhedibhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2237: bhṛśaṃ vivyādha samare tad adbhutam ivābhavat // HV_App.I,17.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:2240: atha hatvā mahātmānaṃ babhruś ca sumahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2243: gadaś ca niśitair bāṇaiś cedirājam apāhanat /
GE07hv_apppu:2247: cedirājas tu sahasā gadaṃ yaduvaraṃ raṇe /
GE07hv_apppu:2250: virathaṃ vidhanuṣkaṃ ca kṛtavāṃś cedipaḥ kila /
GE07hv_apppu:2252: dantavaktraṃ mahārāja śaṃbhus tu bahuśas tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:2257: tau ca rājan mahātmānau sātyakiṃ satyavikramam /
GE07hv_apppu:2258: pīḍayāṃ cakratū rājan sarvamarmasu patribhiḥ // HV_App.I,17.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:2259: sātyakir vimukhīkṛtya tau ca rājan mahābalau /
GE07hv_apppu:2261: tau ca taṃ sātyakiṃ vīraṃ jaghnatuś ca śitaiḥ śaraiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2263: sātyakiḥ pañcaviṃśatyā tau ca rājan mahāmatim /
GE07hv_apppu:2264: samājaghne ca rājendra sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,17.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:2265: sātyakeś ca dhanur bāṇaṃ rathaṃ sārathim eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:2266: ubhau vivyadhatū rājan vāsudevasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,17.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:2267: kruddho 'tha sātyakis tau tu gadayābhijaghāna ha /
GE07hv_apppu:2268: stanayoś ca tadā rājan bāhvor urasi cārpayat /
GE07hv_apppu:2269: rathaṃ ca cūrṇayām āsa tathobhau pārṣṇisārathī /
GE07hv_apppu:2270: āyudhāni ca sarvāṇi pothayām āsa yādavaḥ // HV_App.I,17.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:2271: punaś ca gadayā cāśu jaghāna yadunandanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2273: gadāṃ ca prāhiṇot tābhyāṃ vāsudevasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,17.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:2275: jarāsaṃdhasya puratas tatsamīpaṃ ca jagmatuḥ // HV_App.I,17.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:2276: ekalavyo 'sya vārṣṇeyaṃ śarair vivyādha saptabhiḥ // HV_App.I,17.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:2279: saptatriṃśat tu vārṣṇeya ekalavyas tu viṃśatim /
GE07hv_apppu:2281: lokeṣu pravarau vīrau dhanvināṃ pravarau raṇe // HV_App.I,17.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:2282: parasparaṃ dhanuś chittvā dhvajaṃ caiva parasparam /
GE07hv_apppu:2283: tāv ubhāv ubhayo rājan rathau jaghnatur āśugaiḥ // HV_App.I,17.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:2284: dhvajau ca cicchidur vīrau sārathī ca mahābalau // HV_App.I,17.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:2285: tau tu bhūmigatau bhūtvā gadām ādāya satvarau /
GE07hv_apppu:2292: gadāṃ ciccheda bhūyas tu tasya rājñaḥ sa yādavaḥ // HV_App.I,17.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:2294: jānubhyāṃ talapādaiś ca jānupādaiś ca yatnataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2295: sa ca tādṛgvidhaṃ cakre yuddhaṃ yuddhaviśāradaḥ // HV_App.I,17.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:2296: punaś ca muṣṭinā rājan rājā yadukulodvaham /
GE07hv_apppu:2297: āhatya dantapātaiś ca dadaṃśa nṛpasaṃsadi // HV_App.I,17.81 //
GE07hv_apppu:2298: tataś ca sainikāḥ sarve vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2300: samantāj jagmatus tau tu yuddhāya ca mahāraṇe // HV_App.I,17.84 //
GE07hv_apppu:2302: ājaghne muṣṭinā taṃ tu jarāsaṃdhasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,17.86 //
GE07hv_apppu:2304: pradyumnas tu tataḥ kruddho muṣṭinā taṃ jaghāna ha /
GE07hv_apppu:2305: udvamañ śoṇitaṃ vaktrād gatāyur iva niḥśvasan /
GE07hv_apppu:2306: gantum aicchat tadā yuddhāt pradyumnena prapīḍitaḥ // HV_App.I,17.88 //
GE07hv_apppu:2308: na gantavyaṃ raṇe vīra kṣatriyo 'sīti cābravīt // HV_App.I,17.90 //
GE07hv_apppu:2310: anyeṣāṃ ca mahān āsīd yodhānāṃ dāruṇo raṇaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2311: [h: HV (CE) App.I No. 18, transliterated by Renate Söhnen--Thieme,
GE07hv_apppu:2313: [k: After adhy. 82, N (except Ś1) S G(ed.) ins. App.I No. 18: :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2314: sa kṛṣṇas tatra sahito rauhiṇeyena saṃgataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2315: mathurāṃ yādavādhīnāṃ purīṃ tāṃ sukham āvasat // HV_App.I,18.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:2318: kasyacit tv atha kālasya rājā rājagṛheśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2319: [k: Ñ2.3 V1.2 B Dn2 Ds D4.6 G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2326: na śarma labhate rātrau na divā śokakarṣitaḥ // **HV_App.I,18.6**2:4
GE07hv_apppu:2327: sarvaiḥ sa pārthivaiḥ sārdhaṃ mantrayan guptamantravit /
GE07hv_apppu:2328: aho dhik pauruṣaṃ manye sarveṣāṃ sarvapārthivāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2330: te gacchāmaḥ punas tatra mathurāṃ caturaṅgiṇaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2331: balena mahatā yuktā yatra tau gopakilbiṣau /
GE07hv_apppu:2332: anyathā hy ayaśo 'smākam yāval lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:2335: ūcuś ca vacanaṃ tasya sādhu sādhv iti cābruvan //
GE07hv_apppu:2337: bhūmeḥ samantataḥ kṛtvā yadūn sarvān nihatya ca /
GE07hv_apppu:2339: tatas te susthirāṃ kṛtvā matiṃ yuddhāya pārthivāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2341: daśa sapta ca saṃgrāmāñ jarāsaṃdhasya yādavāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2342: dadur na cainaṃ samare hantuṃ śekur mahārathāḥ // HV_App.I,18.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:2344: bhūyo 'ṣṭādaśamaṃ kartuṃ saṃgrāmaṃ sa samābharat // HV_App.I,18.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:2348: kṛṣṇasya vadham anvicchan bhūyo vai saṃnyavartata // HV_App.I,18.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:2349: taṃ śrutvā sahitāḥ sarve nivṛttaṃ magadheśvaram /
GE07hv_apppu:2353: śrūyatāṃ tāta govinda kulasyāsya samudbhavaḥ // HV_App.I,18.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:2357: yaduvaṃśaṃ śrotum icche prāptakālaṃ ahaṃ tava /
GE07hv_apppu:2358: prādhānyena dvijaśreṣṭha brūhi taṃ vai viśeṣataḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:2361: yuktaṃ cen manyase sādho kariṣyasi vaco mama // HV_App.I,18.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:2363: yathā me kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ vyāsena viditātmanā // HV_App.I,18.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:2367: āsīd rājā manor vaṃśe śrīmān ikṣvākusaṃbhavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2369: tasyāsīd dayitā bhāryā madhor daityasya sā sutā /
GE07hv_apppu:2370: devī madhumatī nāma yathā devī śucī tathā // HV_App.I,18.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:2375: sā tam ikṣvākuśārdūlaṃ kāmayām āsa kāminī // HV_App.I,18.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:2378: sa kadācin naraśreṣṭho bhrātrā jyeṣṭhena mādhava /
GE07hv_apppu:2379: rājyān nirasto viśvastaḥ so 'yodhyām saṃparityajat // HV_App.I,18.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:2381: reme sametya kālajñaḥ priyayā kamalekṣaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,18.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:2383: ehy āgaccha nṛpaśreṣṭha tyaja rājyakṛtāṃ spṛhām // HV_App.I,18.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:2384: gacchāva sahitau vīra madhor mama pitur gṛham /
GE07hv_apppu:2386: sahitau tatra raṃsyāvo yathā divigatau tathā // HV_App.I,18.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:2387: pitur me dayitas tvaṃ hi mātuś ca mama pārthiva /
GE07hv_apppu:2388: matpriyatvāt priyataro bhrātuś ca lavaṇasya me // HV_App.I,18.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:2389: raṃsyāvas tatra sahitau rājyasthāv iva kāmagau /
GE07hv_apppu:2390: [k: K Ñ2.3V BD T2-4 G4.5 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2391: tatra gatvā naraśreṣṭha hy amarāv iva nandane /
GE07hv_apppu:2392: vihariṣyāma bhadraṃ te yathā devasutau tathā // HV_App.I,18.45 //
GE07hv_apppu:2396: āvayor dveṣiṇaṃ nityaṃ mattaṃ rājyamadena vai // HV_App.I,18.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:2397: dhig imaṃ garhitaṃ vāsaṃ bhṛtyavac ca parāśrayam /
GE07hv_apppu:2398: gacchāva sahitau vīra pitur me bhavanāntikam // HV_App.I,18.49 //
GE07hv_apppu:2400: kāmārtasya narendrasya patnyās tad ruruce vacaḥ // HV_App.I,18.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:2401: tato madhupuraṃ rājā haryaśvaḥ sa jagāma ha /
GE07hv_apppu:2402: bhāryayā saha kāminyā kāmī puruṣasattamaḥ // HV_App.I,18.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:2404: svāgataṃ vatsa haryaśva prīto 'smi tava darśanāt // HV_App.I,18.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:2405: yad imaṃ mama rājyaṃ vai sarvaṃ madhuvanaṃ vibho /
GE07hv_apppu:2406: dadāmi tava rājendra kṣaṇe 'smin pratigṛhyatām // HV_App.I,18.57 //
GE07hv_apppu:2407: vane 'smiṃl lavaṇaś cāyaṃ maithunaṃ te bhaviṣyati /
GE07hv_apppu:2409: lavaṇaś cāpy ayaṃ rājan vīryavān balavattaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2413: atra te vasatas tāta durgaṃ giripuraṃ mahat /
GE07hv_apppu:2416: ānartaṃ nāma tad rāṣṭraṃ bhaviṣyaty āyataṃ mahat // HV_App.I,18.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:2417: tad bhaviṣyam ahaṃ manye kālayogena pārthiva /
GE07hv_apppu:2418: adhyāssva ca yathākāmaṃ pārthivaṃ vṛttam uttamam // HV_App.I,18.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:2419: [k: K1.3.4 Ñ2.3V BDT GM4 G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2420: yāyātam api vaṃśas te sameṣyati ca yādavam /
GE07hv_apppu:2421: atra vaṃśe ca vaṃśas te somasya bhavitā kila // **HV_App.I,18.67**9:2
GE07hv_apppu:2422: eṣa me viṣayas tāta tavaiva viṣayopamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2423: dattvā yāsyāmi tapase sāgaraṃ dānavālayam // HV_App.I,18.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:2425: pālayasvākhilaṃ tāta svasya vaṃśasya vṛddhaye // HV_App.I,18.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:2426: bāḍham ity eva haryaśvaḥ pratijagrāha tatpuram /
GE07hv_apppu:2427: sa ca daityas tapovāsaṃ jagāma varuṇālayam // HV_App.I,18.73 //
GE07hv_apppu:2429: niveśayām āsa puraṃ vāsārtham amaropamaḥ // HV_App.I,18.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:2430: satyanāma ca tad rāṣṭraṃ surāṣṭraṃ godhanāyutam /
GE07hv_apppu:2434: śaśāsa sa nṛpaḥ sphītaṃ tad rāṣṭraṃ rāṣṭravardhanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2437: samavardhata tad rājyaṃ rāṣṭraṃ sarvaguṇānvitam // HV_App.I,18.83 //
GE07hv_apppu:2438: sa hi rājyasthito rājye rājavṛttena śobhitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2439: prāptaḥ kulocitāṃ lakṣmīṃ vṛttena ca nayena ca // HV_App.I,18.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:2441: madhumatyāṃ suto jajñe yadur nāma mahāyaśāḥ // HV_App.I,18.87 //
GE07hv_apppu:2444: [k: K4 T3 Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2446: [k: T3 Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) cont.; K1 Ñ2.3V BDs D2-4.6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2447: yathāsya pūrvako rājā pūruḥ sa sumahāyaśāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2448: sa eka eva tasyāsīt putraḥ paramaśobhanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2451: jagāma tridivaṃ rājā dharmeṇāstamito bhuvi // HV_App.I,18.93 //
GE07hv_apppu:2453: pitary uparate śrīmān krameṇārka ivoditaḥ // HV_App.I,18.95 //
GE07hv_apppu:2455: yadur indrapratīkāśo nṛpo yena sma yādavāḥ // HV_App.I,18.97 //
GE07hv_apppu:2456: sa kadācin nṛpaś cakre jalakrīḍāṃ mahodadhau /
GE07hv_apppu:2457: dāraiḥ saha mahodāraiḥ satāra iva candramāḥ // HV_App.I,18.99 //
GE07hv_apppu:2458: sa tatra sahasā kṣiptis titīrṣuḥ sāgarāmbhasi /
GE07hv_apppu:2466: sa tad dadarśa rājendro majjitaḥ sāgarāmbhasi /
GE07hv_apppu:2467: pannagendrapuraṃ toye jagatyām iva nirmitam // HV_App.I,18.109 //
GE07hv_apppu:2468: svasthaś caiva pure tatra praviveśa nṛpo yaduḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2474: pitā te svargatiṃ prāptaḥ kṛtvā vaṃśam imaṃ mahat /
GE07hv_apppu:2476: yādavo nāma vaṃśo 'yaṃ yathā te putrasaṃjñitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2477: pitrā te tāta loke 'smin sthāpitaḥ pārthivākaraḥ // HV_App.I,18.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:2478: vaṃśe cāsmiṃs tava vibho devānāṃ tanayāvyayāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2479: ṛṣīṇām uragāṇāṃ ca utpatsyante nṛyonijāḥ // HV_App.I,18.121 //
GE07hv_apppu:2480: [k: note hiatus at end of pāda a :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2481: tan mameha sutāḥ pañca kumāryo vṛttasaṃmatāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2484: varaṃ ca te pradāsyāmi varārhas tvaṃ mato mama // HV_App.I,18.125 //
GE07hv_apppu:2485: [k: K Ñ2.3V BD T2.3(both times).4 G1.4.5 M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2487: dāśārhā vṛṣṇayaś ceti khyātiṃ yāsyanti sapta te //
GE07hv_apppu:2488: sa tasmai dhūmavarṇo vai kanyāḥ kanyāvrate sthitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2489: jalapūrṇena yogena dadāv indrasamāya vai // HV_App.I,18.127 //
GE07hv_apppu:2490: varaṃ cāsmai dadau prītaḥ sa vai pannagapuṃgavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2491: śrāvayat kanyakā sarvā yathākramam adīnavat // HV_App.I,18.129 //
GE07hv_apppu:2492: etāsu te sutāḥ pañca sutāsu mama mānada /
GE07hv_apppu:2493: utpatsyante pitus tejo mātuś caiva samāśritāḥ // HV_App.I,18.131 //
GE07hv_apppu:2495: tava vaṃśe bhaviṣyanti pārthivāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,18.133 //
GE07hv_apppu:2496: sa varaṃ kanyakāś caiva labdhvā yaduvṛṣas tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:2497: unmamajjātha vegena salilāc candramā yathā // HV_App.I,18.135 //
GE07hv_apppu:2500: sa tad antaḥpuraṃ sarvaṃ dadarśa nṛpasattamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2502: samāśvasya ca tāḥ sarvāḥ patnīr vai pāvakopamāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2503: jagāma svapuraṃ rājā gatvā vai ramate bhṛśam // HV_App.I,18.141 //
GE07hv_apppu:2504: [k: After 141a, K1 Ñ3 V B1 Dn D2.3.5.6 T2 G2.5 M ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2509: sa tāsu nāgakanyāsu kālena mahatā nṛpaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2510: janayām āsa vikrāntān pañca putrān kulodvahān // HV_App.I,18.143 //
GE07hv_apppu:2512: mādhavaṃ sārasaṃ caiva haritaṃ caiva pārthivam // HV_App.I,18.145 //
GE07hv_apppu:2513: etān pañca sutān saumyān pañcabhūtopamān bhuvi /
GE07hv_apppu:2515: te prāptavayasaḥ sarve sthitāḥ pañca yathādrayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2516: te jitā baladarpeṇa ūcuḥ pitaram agrataḥ // HV_App.I,18.149 //
GE07hv_apppu:2517: tāta yuktāḥ sma vayasā bale mahati tasthuṣaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2518: kṣipram ājñaptum icchāmaḥ kiṃ kurmas tava śāsanāt // HV_App.I,18.151 //
GE07hv_apppu:2519: sa tān nṛpatiśārdūlaḥ śārdūlān iva tejitān /
GE07hv_apppu:2520: prāha prītyā paramayā sutavīrye kutūhalaḥ // HV_App.I,18.153 //
GE07hv_apppu:2522: niveśayatv ayaṃ tāvan mucukundaḥ suto mama // HV_App.I,18.155 //
GE07hv_apppu:2523: sahyasya copari purīṃ dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āśritaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2524: padmavarṇo 'pi me putro niveśayatu māciram // HV_App.I,18.157 //
GE07hv_apppu:2526: sāraso me puraṃ tatra niveśayatu putrakaḥ // HV_App.I,18.159 //
GE07hv_apppu:2528: dvīpaṃ pannagarājasya suto me pālayiṣyati // HV_App.I,18.161 //
GE07hv_apppu:2529: mādhavo 'yaṃ mama suto jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhaś ca dharmavit /
GE07hv_apppu:2533: svaṃ svaṃ niveśanaṃ sarve bhejire nṛpasattamāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2537: sa tu taṃ śodhayām āsa vivikte vicacāra ha /
GE07hv_apppu:2538: setuṃ caiva samaṃ cakre parikhāś cāmitodakāḥ // HV_App.I,18.171 //
GE07hv_apppu:2540: rathyā vīthyo nṛṇāṃ mārgāś catvarāṇi gṛhāṇi ca // HV_App.I,18.173 //
GE07hv_apppu:2543: [k: K1.2 Ñ3 V B1 Dn Ds D2-6 Cal. ed. ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2545: nāma cāsyāḥ śubhaṃ cakre nirmitaṃ svena tejasā /
GE07hv_apppu:2548: māhiṣmatī nāma purī prakāśam upayāsyati // HV_App.I,18.179 //
GE07hv_apppu:2550: madhye niveśayām āsa śriyā paramayā vṛtām // HV_App.I,18.181 //
GE07hv_apppu:2553: [k: K1.2.4 Ñ2.3V BD T2-4 G M4 ins. (T1 after line 182) :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2555: nirmitā sā purī rājñā purīkā nāma nāmataḥ // **HV_App.I,18.183**15:2
GE07hv_apppu:2556: sa te dve vipule puryau rājapuryupame śubhe /
GE07hv_apppu:2557: pālayām āsa dharmātmā rājā dharmeṇa vīryavān // HV_App.I,18.185 //
GE07hv_apppu:2559: cakāra nadyā veṇṇāyās tīre tarulatākule // HV_App.I,18.187 //
GE07hv_apppu:2560: viṣayasyālpatāṃ jñātvā saṃpūrṇaṃ rāṣṭram eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:2561: niveśayām āsa nṛpaḥ sa vapraprāyam uttamam // HV_App.I,18.189 //
GE07hv_apppu:2567: puraṃ tu tasya tac chrīmad drumaiḥ sarvartukair vṛtam // HV_App.I,18.195
GE07hv_apppu:2572: tasya dāśā jale magnā madgurā nāma viśrutāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2573: ye haranti sadā śaṅkhān samudrodaracāriṇaḥ // HV_App.I,18.199 //
GE07hv_apppu:2575: saṃcinvanti sadā yuktā jātarūpaṃ ca mauktikam // HV_App.I,18.201 //
GE07hv_apppu:2576: jalajāni ca ratnāni niṣādās tasya mānavāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2578: matsyamāṃsena te sarve vartayanti sadā narāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2581: haritaṃ tarpayanty ekaṃ yathaiva dhanadaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,18.207 //
GE07hv_apppu:2583: caturdhā yaduputrais tu caturbhir bhidyate punaḥ // HV_App.I,18.209 //
GE07hv_apppu:2584: sa yadur mādhave rājyaṃ visṛjya yadupuṃgave /
GE07hv_apppu:2585: triviṣṭapaṃ gato rājā tyaktvā dehaṃ mahītale // HV_App.I,18.211 //
GE07hv_apppu:2588: satvatasya suto rājā bhīmo nāma mahān abhūt /
GE07hv_apppu:2589: yena bhaimāḥ sma saṃvṛttāḥ satvatāt sātvatāḥ smṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,18.215 //
GE07hv_apppu:2590: rājyasthe tu nṛpe tasmin rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati /
GE07hv_apppu:2591: śatrughno lavaṇaṃ hatvā ciccheda sa madhor vanam // HV_App.I,18.217 //
GE07hv_apppu:2592: tasmin madhuvanasthāne purīṃ ca mathurām imām /
GE07hv_apppu:2594: paryāye caiva rāmasya bharatasya tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:2595: sumitrāyāḥ sutābhyāṃ ca sthānaṃ prāptaṃ ca vaiṣṇavam // HV_App.I,18.221 //
GE07hv_apppu:2596: [k: For line 221, K1.2.4 V2 B Ds D3.5 M1-3 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2600: yādavena purī vyāptā bhīmena tu mahātmanā /
GE07hv_apppu:2601: svavaṃśe sthāpitā pūrvaṃ svayam adhyāsitā tathā // HV_App.I,18.223 //
GE07hv_apppu:2602: tataḥ kuśe sthite rājye lave ca yuvarājani /
GE07hv_apppu:2603: andhako nāma bhīmasya suto rājyam akārayat // HV_App.I,18.225 //
GE07hv_apppu:2604: andhakasya suto jajñe raivato nāma pārthivaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2605: ṛkṣas tu raivatāj jajñe ramye parvatamūrdhani // HV_App.I,18.227 //
GE07hv_apppu:2607: nāmnā raivatako nāma bhūmau bhūmidharaḥ smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,18.229 //
GE07hv_apppu:2609: babhūva pṛthivīpālaḥ pṛthivyāṃ prathitaḥ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,18.231 //
GE07hv_apppu:2611: catvāro jajñire putrā rucyā proṣṭhapadopamāḥ // HV_App.I,18.233 //
GE07hv_apppu:2612: vasur babhruḥ suṣeṇaś ca śubhākṣaś caiva vīryavān /
GE07hv_apppu:2614: tair ayaṃ yādavo vaṃśaḥ pārthivair bahulīkṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2615: ye sma te kṛṣṇa loke 'smin prajāvantaḥ prajeśvarāḥ // HV_App.I,18.237 //
GE07hv_apppu:2619: janayām āsa caivātra suprabhe dve ca dārike // HV_App.I,18.239 //
GE07hv_apppu:2620: kuntīṃ ca pāṇḍor mahiṣīṃ devatām iva bhūcarīm /
GE07hv_apppu:2621: bhāryāṃ ca cedirājasya damaghoṣasya suprabhām // HV_App.I,18.241 //
GE07hv_apppu:2622: [k: For line 241, K Ñ3 V1.2B DT2-4 G1.4.5 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2624: eṣa te svasya vaṃśasya prabhavaḥ parikīrtitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2625: śruto mayā purā kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇadvaipāyanāntikāt // HV_App.I,18.243 //
GE07hv_apppu:2626: tvaṃ tv idānīṃ pranaṣṭe 'smin vaṃśe vaṃśabhṛtāṃ vara /
GE07hv_apppu:2627: svayaṃbhūr iva saṃprāpto bhavāyāsmajjayāya ca // HV_App.I,18.245 //
GE07hv_apppu:2628: na tvāṃ paurāṇamātreṇa śaktā gūhayituṃ vayam /
GE07hv_apppu:2629: devaguhyeṣv api bhavān sarvajñaḥ sarvabhāvanaḥ // HV_App.I,18.247 //
GE07hv_apppu:2630: śaktaś cāsi jarāsaṃdhaṃ nṛpaṃ yodhayituṃ prabho /
GE07hv_apppu:2632: śakyaṃ cemaṃ jarāsaṃdhaṃ nṛpaṃ drāvayituṃ hare /
GE07hv_apppu:2633: tvadbuddhivaśagāḥ sarve vayaṃ yogavrate sthitāḥ // HV_App.I,18.249 //
GE07hv_apppu:2634: jarāsaṃdhas tu balavān nṛpāṇāṃ mūrdhani sthitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2635: aprameyabalaś caiva vayaṃ ca kṛśasādhanāḥ // HV_App.I,18.251 //
GE07hv_apppu:2636: na ceyam ekāham api purī rodhaṃ sahiṣyati /
GE07hv_apppu:2641: kaṃsasya balavattvāt tu nātiguptā purī janaiḥ // HV_App.I,18.257 //
GE07hv_apppu:2643: purī pratyagrarodheyaṃ na rodhaṃ visahiṣyati // HV_App.I,18.259 //
GE07hv_apppu:2644: balaṃ saṃmardabhagnaṃ ca kliśyamānaṃ pareṇa ha /
GE07hv_apppu:2645: asaṃśayam idaṃ rāṣṭraṃ janaiḥ saha vinaṅkṣyati // HV_App.I,18.261 //
GE07hv_apppu:2648: ārto vakṣyati naḥ sarvo rudhyamānaḥ pure janaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2649: yādavaiḥ sma virodhena yojito rājyakāmukaiḥ // HV_App.I,18.265 //
GE07hv_apppu:2650: [k: K Ñ2.3 V1B DT2.3 G1.4.5 M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2652: te sarve dvaidham icchanti yat kṣamaṃ tad vidhīyatām /
GE07hv_apppu:2653: etan mama mataṃ kṛṣṇa viśrambhāt samudāhṛtam /
GE07hv_apppu:2654: tvayi sarvasvam ity eva paras tvaṃ caiva buddhimān // HV_App.I,18.267 //
GE07hv_apppu:2655: [k: For l. 267, K Ñ2 B1.3 D T2-4 G1.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2656: tvaṃ tu vijñāpitaḥ sarvaṃ na punaḥ saṃprabodhitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2657: yad atra naḥ kṣamaṃ kṛṣṇa tat svairam abhidhīyatām /
GE07hv_apppu:2658: tvam asya netā sainyasya vayaṃ tvacchāsane sthitāḥ // HV_App.I,18.269 //
GE07hv_apppu:2659: [k: K Ñ2.3V BD T1-3 G1.3-5 M4 (G2 after l. 268) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2660: tvanmūlaś ca virodho 'yaṃ rakṣāsmān ātmanā saha /
GE07hv_apppu:2663: vikadros tu vacas tathyaṃ niśamya yadupuṃgavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2666: [k: After line 270,K2 Ñ2.3V BDn D2-6 Bom. Poona eds ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2669: sat tattvaṃ ca hitaṃ caiva kṛṣṇoktaṃ khila dhīmatā /
GE07hv_apppu:2670: bhāṣitā rājadharmāś ca satyāś ca jagato hitāḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:2671: etac chrutvā pitur vākyaṃ vikadroś ca mahātmanā /
GE07hv_apppu:2672: [k: After l. 4, Bom. Poona ed. ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2673: vikadruṇā yaduśreṣṭha yad dhitaṃ tad vidhīyatām /
GE07hv_apppu:2674: vākyam uttamam ekāgro babhāṣe cārubhāṣaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,18.271 //
GE07hv_apppu:2675: bruvatāṃ vaḥ śrutaṃ vākyaṃ hetutaḥ kramatas tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:2676: nyāyataḥ śāstrataś caiva daivaṃ caivānupaśyatām // HV_App.I,18.273 //
GE07hv_apppu:2677: śrūyatām uttamaṃ vākyaṃ mama buddhyā ca gṛhyatām /
GE07hv_apppu:2678: nayena vyavahartavyaṃ pārthivena yathā mayā // HV_App.I,18.275 //
GE07hv_apppu:2680: saṃdhiṃ ca vigrahaṃ caiva yānam āsanam eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:2681: dvaidhībhāvaṃ saṃśrayaṃ ca ṣāḍguṇyaṃ cintayet sadā //
GE07hv_apppu:2682: balinaḥ saṃnikarṣe tu na stheyaṃ paṇḍitena ca /
GE07hv_apppu:2683: apakramed dhi kālajñaḥ samartho yuddham āvahet //
GE07hv_apppu:2688: jīvanāśaṃ gamiṣyāmi śaktimān apy aśaktavat // HV_App.I,18.277 //
GE07hv_apppu:2693: vikadros tad vacaḥ śrutvā baladevānujasya ca /
GE07hv_apppu:2694: praśaśaṃsa tathā mene tathyaṃ tadvacanaṃ hitam /
GE07hv_apppu:2695: kṛṣṇaṃ prāha rato raṅgaṃ gamyatāṃ tatra saṃgatau /
GE07hv_apppu:2696: drakṣyāvas tatra sahitau gomantaṃ ca nagottamam // HV_App.I,18.281 //
GE07hv_apppu:2697: āvayor gamanaṃ śrutvā jitakāśī ca pārthivaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2698: aspṛṣṭvaiva purīṃ darpād anusāraṃ kariṣyati // HV_App.I,18.283 //
GE07hv_apppu:2699: tataḥ sahyavaneṣv eva rājā yāsyati sānugaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2700: āvayor darśanād eva yuddhaprītim avāpsyati // HV_App.I,18.285 //
GE07hv_apppu:2701: eṣā naḥ śreyasī yātrā bhaviṣyati kulasya vai /
GE07hv_apppu:2702: paurāṇām atha puryāś ca deśasya ca sukhāvahā // HV_App.I,18.287 //
GE07hv_apppu:2703: na ca śatrau paribhraṣṭe rājāno vijigīṣavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2704: pararāṣṭreṣu mūrchanti mṛdhe śatrukṣayaṃ vinā // HV_App.I,18.289 //
GE07hv_apppu:2705: evam uktvā tu tau vīrau kṛṣṇasaṃkarṣaṇāv ubhau /
GE07hv_apppu:2707: māgadhasya puraḥ sthitvā vākyam etad avocatām //
GE07hv_apppu:2708: āvāṃ paśya mahārāja yat kāryaṃ tad vadasva nau /
GE07hv_apppu:2709: yac ca kartuṃ pravṛtto 'si tat kuruṣva yathecchasi //
GE07hv_apppu:2710: tac chrutvā roṣatāmrākṣo babhāṣe māgadhas tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:2711: eṣa vāṃ pratiyotsyāmi haniṣyāmi ca vāṃ yudhi //
GE07hv_apppu:2712: ity uktvā dhanur ādatta jarāputraḥ pratāpavān /
GE07hv_apppu:2713: tac chrutvā tau tu deveśau gantuṃ vyavasitau kila //
GE07hv_apppu:2715: tau tu rāṣṭrāṇi śataśaś carantau kāmarūpiṇau /
GE07hv_apppu:2716: dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āsthāya ceratur mārgagau sukham // HV_App.I,18.293 //
GE07hv_apppu:2721: tau tatra gatvā veṇṇāyā nadyās tīraṃ samāśritau /
GE07hv_apppu:2728: klinnaṃ triṣavaṇāmbhobhir ādyaṃ devaguruṃ yathā // HV_App.I,18.305 //
GE07hv_apppu:2737: yasya nāmāni rājānaḥ śrotuṃ śaktāḥ sadā na hi //
GE07hv_apppu:2739: bhārgavaṃ rāmam āsīnaṃ mandarasthaṃ yathā ravim // HV_App.I,18.309 //
GE07hv_apppu:2740: nyāyatas tau tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā pādamūle kṛtāsanau /
GE07hv_apppu:2741: vasudevasutau vīrau sadhiṣṇyāv iva pāvakau // HV_App.I,18.311 //
GE07hv_apppu:2742: kṛṣṇas tam ṛṣiśārdūlam uvāca vadatāṃ varaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2745: rāmaṃ munīnām ṛṣabhaṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ kulāntakam // HV_App.I,18.315 //
GE07hv_apppu:2747: iṣupātena nagaraṃ kṛtaṃ sūrpārakaṃ tvayā // HV_App.I,18.317 //
GE07hv_apppu:2748: [k: K ÑV BD T2-4 G1 M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2750: sahyasya ca nikuñjeṣu sphīto janapado mahān /
GE07hv_apppu:2753: tvayā ca sāgaro vipra velām utsārito mahān /
GE07hv_apppu:2755: chinnaṃ drumavanaprakhyaṃ smaratā nidhanaṃ pituḥ // HV_App.I,18.321 //
GE07hv_apppu:2759: paraśūpagrahe yuktaṃ yathaiveha raṇe tathā // HV_App.I,18.325 //
GE07hv_apppu:2760: tad icchāvas tvayā vipra kaṃcid artham upaśrutam /
GE07hv_apppu:2761: uttaraṃ ca śrutārthena pratyuktam aviśaṅkayā // HV_App.I,18.327 //
GE07hv_apppu:2763: yādavau svo muniśreṣṭha yadi te śrutim āgatau // HV_App.I,18.329 //
GE07hv_apppu:2764: vasudevo yaduśreṣṭhaḥ pitā nau hi dhṛtavrataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:2765: janmaprabhṛti caivāvāṃ vrajeṣv eva niyojitau // HV_App.I,18.331 //
GE07hv_apppu:2767: āvāṃ ca prathamaṃ prāptau mathurāṃ ca praveśitau // HV_App.I,18.333 //
GE07hv_apppu:2768: tāv āvāṃ vyutthitaṃ hatvā samāje kaṃsam ojasā /
GE07hv_apppu:2770: svam eva karma cārabdhau gavāṃ vyāpārakārakau // HV_App.I,18.336 //
GE07hv_apppu:2771: athāvayoḥ puraṃ roddhuṃ jarāsaṃdho vyavasthitaḥ // HV_App.I,18.337 //
GE07hv_apppu:2772: [k: K Ñ2.3V BD T2-4 G1.4.5 M4 ins. :k]

GE07hv_apppu:3160: tatas te calitāḥ sarve gomantaṃ sabalā nṛpāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3164: rathaiḥ sāṃgrāmikair yuktair asaṅgagatibhiḥ kvacit // HV_App.I,18.625 //
GE07hv_apppu:3168: vājibhir vāyusaṃkāśaiḥ plavadbhir iva patribhiḥ // HV_App.I,18.629 //
GE07hv_apppu:3177: sa rathair neminirghoṣair gajaiś ca madasiñjitaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3178: heṣadbhiś caiva turagaiḥ kṣveḍitograiś ca pattibhiḥ // HV_App.I,18.635 //
GE07hv_apppu:3179: saṃnādayan diśaḥ sarvāḥ sarvāṃś cāpi guhāśayān /
GE07hv_apppu:3180: sa rājā sāgarākāraḥ sasainyaḥ pratyadṛśyata // HV_App.I,18.637 //
GE07hv_apppu:3184: rathī khaḍgī śarī cāpī niṣaṅgī hemakuṇḍalī /
GE07hv_apppu:3188: kim etair nṛpasiṃhaiś ca ity avocan mahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3192: turagaiś ca sitābhrābhaiḥ pattibhiś cāpi daṃśitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3197: babhau tasya niviṣṭasya babhau śrīḥ śibirasya vai /
GE07hv_apppu:3198: śuklaparvaṇi pūrṇasya yathā rūpaṃ mahodadheḥ // HV_App.I,18.647 //
GE07hv_apppu:3199: vītarātre tataḥ kāle nṛpās te kṛtakautukāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3204: yugānte bhidyamānānām sāgarāṇāṃ yathā svaraḥ // HV_App.I,18.653 //
GE07hv_apppu:3206: cerur mā śabda ity evaṃ bruvanto rājaśāsanāt // HV_App.I,18.655 //
GE07hv_apppu:3210: jarāsaṃdho bṛhad vākyaṃ bṛhaspatir ivādade // HV_App.I,18.659 //
GE07hv_apppu:3212: sarvataḥ parvataś caiva balaughaiḥ parivāryatām // HV_App.I,18.661 //
GE07hv_apppu:3214: ūrdhvaṃ cāpi pravāhyantāṃ prāsā vai tomarāṇi ca // HV_App.I,18.663 //
GE07hv_apppu:3215: [k: K Ñ2.3V BD G M4 G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3216: ūrdhvaṃ prekṣamāṇārthāya dṛḍhāni ca laghūni ca /
GE07hv_apppu:3219: yathā narapatiḥ prāha tathā śighraṃ vidhīyatām //
GE07hv_apppu:3220: dāryatām eṣa ṭaṅkaughaiḥ khanitaiś ca nagottamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3221: nṛpāś ca durgayuddhajñā vinyasyantām adūrataḥ // HV_App.I,18.665 //
GE07hv_apppu:3223: yāvad etau pātayāmo vasudevasutāv ubhau // HV_App.I,18.667 //
GE07hv_apppu:3225: ākāśam api bāṇaughair niḥsaṃpātaṃ vidhīyatām // HV_App.I,18.669 //
GE07hv_apppu:3227: teṣu teṣv avakāśeṣu śīghram āruhyatāṃ giriḥ // HV_App.I,18.671 //
GE07hv_apppu:3230: drumaḥ kiṃpuruṣaś caiva pārvatīyāś ca mānavāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3231: parvatasyāparaṃ pārśvaṃ kṣipram ārohayantv amī // HV_App.I,18.675 //
GE07hv_apppu:3232: pauravo veṇudāriś ca vaidarbhaḥ somakas tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:3233: rukmī ca bhojādhipatiḥ sūryākṣaś caiva yāvanaḥ // HV_App.I,18.677 //
GE07hv_apppu:3235: vindānuvindāv āvantyau dantavaktraś ca vīryavān // HV_App.I,18.679 //
GE07hv_apppu:3236: chāgaliḥ purumitraś ca virāṭaś ca mahīpatiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3237: kauśāmbyo mālavaś caiva śatadhanvā vidūrathaḥ // HV_App.I,18.681 //
GE07hv_apppu:3238: bhūriśravās trigartaś ca bāṇaḥ pañcanadas tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:3241: ulūkaḥ kaitaveyaś ca vīraś cāṃśumataḥ sutaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3242: ekalavyo dṛḍhākṣaś ca rathavarmā jayadrathaḥ // HV_App.I,18.686 //
GE07hv_apppu:3243: uttamaujās tathā sālvaḥ kairaleyaś ca kaiśikaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3244: vaidiśo vāmadevaś ca suketuś cāpi vīryavān // HV_App.I,18.688 //
GE07hv_apppu:3245: pūrvaṃ parvatanirvyūham eteṣv āyattam astu naḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3247: ahaṃ ca daradaś caiva cedirājaś ca saṃgataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3249: evam eṣa giriḥ kṣipraṃ samantād veṣṭito balaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3251: gadino ye gadābhis te parighaiḥ parighāyudhāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3252: apare vividhaiḥ śastrair dārayantu nagottamam // HV_App.I,18.696 //
GE07hv_apppu:3254: kāryo bhūmisamaḥ sarvo bhavadbhir vasudhādhipaiḥ // HV_App.I,18.698 //
GE07hv_apppu:3256: [k: K1.2.4 Ñ2.3V BDn Ds D2.6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3257: gomantaṃ veṣṭayām āsuḥ sāgarāḥ pṛthivīm iva /
GE07hv_apppu:3258: uvāca rājā cedīnāṃ devānāṃ maghavā iva // HV_App.I,18.700 //
GE07hv_apppu:3259: kiṃ no yuddhena durge 'smin gomante ca nagottame /
GE07hv_apppu:3261: kāṣṭhais tṛṇaiś ca bahubhiḥ parivārya samantataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3262: adyaiva dīpyatāṃ kṣipram alam anyena karmaṇā // HV_App.I,18.704 //
GE07hv_apppu:3264: na yuktāḥ parvate durge niyoktuṃ pādayodhinaḥ // HV_App.I,18.706 //
GE07hv_apppu:3266: śakya eṣa giris tāta devair apy abhimarditum // HV_App.I,18.708 //
GE07hv_apppu:3269: vayaṃ bahava ity evaṃ nāpy eṣa nipuṇo nayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3270: yādavau nāvamantavyau dvāv apy etau raṇe sthitau // HV_App.I,18.712 //
GE07hv_apppu:3272: karmabhis tv amarau vidmo bālāv atibalānvitau // HV_App.I,18.714 //
GE07hv_apppu:3274: karmabhis tv atulair vīrāv ubhāv api balotkaṭau /
GE07hv_apppu:3275: [k: K ÑV BDT GM4 G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3281: vākyam etat tu ruruce sabalānāṃ mahīkṣitām /
GE07hv_apppu:3282: yad uktaṃ cedirājena nṛpāṇāṃ hitakāmyayā // HV_App.I,18.716 //
GE07hv_apppu:3283: tataḥ kāṣṭhais tṛṇair vaṃśaiḥ śuṣkaśākhaiś ca pādapaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3285: dadus te sarvatas tūrṇaṃ pāvakaṃ tatra pārthivāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3288: sadhūmajvālamālābhir bhābhiḥ kham iva śobhayan // HV_App.I,18.722 //
GE07hv_apppu:3290: dadāha śailaṃ śrīmantaṃ gomantaṃ kāntapādapam // HV_App.I,18.724 //
GE07hv_apppu:3291: sa dahyamānaḥ śailendro mumoca vipulāḥ śilāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3294: ālimpatīva vidhivat samantād arciṣāṃ cayaiḥ // HV_App.I,18.728 //
GE07hv_apppu:3295: dhātubhiḥ pacyamānaiś ca jvaladbhiś caiva pādapaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3297: pratataṃ dahyamānas tu sa śailaḥ kṛṣṇavartmanā /
GE07hv_apppu:3302: girir bhāty analodgārair ulkāvṛṣṭir ivāmbudaḥ // HV_App.I,18.736 //
GE07hv_apppu:3304: sa girir bhasmatāṃ yāto yugāntāgnihatopamaḥ // HV_App.I,18.738 //
GE07hv_apppu:3307: [k: K Ñ2.3V BDT GM4 G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3310: mumucuḥ pādapāś caiva dāhaniryāsajaṃ jalam // HV_App.I,18.742 //
GE07hv_apppu:3314: girir vaikalyam āyāti prāgalbhyāt kṛṣṇavartmanaḥ // HV_App.I,18.746 //
GE07hv_apppu:3316: vajreṇa puruhūtasya yathā syād dāritas tathā // HV_App.I,18.748 //
GE07hv_apppu:3318: babhūvuś ca mahāśabdāḥ śiloccaiḥ sphāṭitair nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:3319: kṛṣṇavartmā pumān natvā tayor agre samāgataḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:3320: namaś cakāra haraye uvāca vadatāṃ varaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3325: tvaṃ tv enaṃ pratigṛhṇīṣva kavacaṃ rāmasaṃyutam /
GE07hv_apppu:3327: tvām ayaṃ na mahābhāga parābhūtāgnim ulbaṇaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3330: ity uktvā pradadau vahniḥ kavacadvayam uttamam //
GE07hv_apppu:3331: tatas tv antardadhe rājann ekaikaṃ rāmakṣṛṇayoḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3334: na tu cakre tayoḥ sparśaṃ vahnitāpo mahīpate //
GE07hv_apppu:3335: ādīpya taṃ te śailendraṃ kṣatriyā vyūhadaṃśitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3338: dhūmabhārair anālakṣye mūle śithilatāṃ gate // HV_App.I,18.752 //
GE07hv_apppu:3339: saroṣaṃ hi tadā rāmo vacanaṃ keśisūdanam /
GE07hv_apppu:3340: babhāṣe padmapatrākṣaṃ sa sākṣān madhusūdanam // HV_App.I,18.754 //
GE07hv_apppu:3342: āvayoḥ kṛṣṇa vaireṇa vairibhir vasudhādhipaiḥ // HV_App.I,18.756 //
GE07hv_apppu:3345: ayaṃ yady āvayor arthe gomantas tāta dahyate /
GE07hv_apppu:3346: ayaśasyam idaṃ loke kaulīnaṃ ca bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,18.760 //
GE07hv_apppu:3348: kṣatriyān nihaniṣyāmi dorbhyām iva yudhāṃ vara // HV_App.I,18.762 //
GE07hv_apppu:3349: ete te kṣatriyāḥ sarve girim ādīpya daṃśitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3350: rathinas tāta dṛśyante yathādeśaṃ yuyutsavaḥ // HV_App.I,18.764 //
GE07hv_apppu:3354: evam uktvā gireḥ śṛṅgān meruśṛṅgād ivoḍurāṭ /
GE07hv_apppu:3363: tatas taṃ pīḍayām āsa padbhyāṃ girivaraṃ hariḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:3364: sa pīḍito giris tena nirmamajja samantataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3366: sa tena vāriṇā vahnis tatkṣaṇāt praśamaṃ yayau /
GE07hv_apppu:3371: [k: Aftr line 775a, D6 T1-3 G M2.4 G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3374: rāmād anantaraṃ kṛṣṇaḥ pluto rāmād anantaraḥ // HV_App.I,18.776 //
GE07hv_apppu:3375: tābhyām avaplutābhyāṃ ca caraṇaiḥ pīḍito giriḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3376: mumoca salilotpīḍān bhṛśam ūrdhvaṃ viniḥsṛtān // HV_App.I,18.778 //
GE07hv_apppu:3377: [k: K2 Ñ2.3V BD (except D3) T1-3 G M4 G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3381: tau nagād āplutau dṛṣṭvā vasudevasutāv ubhau /
GE07hv_apppu:3382: [k: After the ref., D6 S (except T4) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3383: tato devāḥ sagandharvā yakṣāś ca paramarṣayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3384: tuṣṭuvur devam īśānaṃ mantrair bhāgavatais tadā //
GE07hv_apppu:3387: bāhupraharaṇau tau tu ceratus tatra yādavau /
GE07hv_apppu:3388: makarāv iva saṃkruddhau samudre 'ntarhitāv ubhau // HV_App.I,18.782 //
GE07hv_apppu:3389: tābhyām mṛdhe praviṣṭābhyāṃ yādavābhyāṃ matis tv abhūt /
GE07hv_apppu:3391: [k: K Ñ2.3V BD T2-4 G1.4.5 (T1 G2.3 M4 after line 785) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3394: yāni vai māthure yuddhe prāptāny āhavaśobhinoḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:3395: [k: T1 G2.3.5 M4 cont. (M3 ins. after line 784) :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3400: nikṣipya yāni tatraiva tāni prāptau sma yādavau /
GE07hv_apppu:3402: tṛṣitāni āhave bhoktuṃ nṛpamāṃsāni sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,18.788 //
GE07hv_apppu:3404: prabhayā bhāsamānāni daṃśitāni diśo daśa // HV_App.I,18.790 //
GE07hv_apppu:3405: halaṃ saṃvartakaṃ nāma saunandaṃ musalaṃ tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:3406: cakraṃ sudarśanaṃ nāma gadā kaumodakī tathā // HV_App.I,18.792 //
GE07hv_apppu:3410: khaḍgaṃ ca kheṭakaṃ caiva tūṇī cākṣayasāyakau //
GE07hv_apppu:3412: jagrāha prathamaṃ rāmo halam apratimaṃ raṇe /
GE07hv_apppu:3413: sarpantam iva sarpendraṃ divyamālākulaṃ halam // HV_App.I,18.796 //
GE07hv_apppu:3415: saunandaṃ nāma musalaṃ nirānandakaraṃ nṛṇām // HV_App.I,18.798 //
GE07hv_apppu:3417: nāmnā sudarśanaṃ nāma prīto jagrāha keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,18.800 //
GE07hv_apppu:3418: [k: V2 B3 Dn D2 G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3420: nāmnā śārṅgam iti khyātaṃ prīto jagrāha vīryavān //
GE07hv_apppu:3422: niṣaktā kumudākṣasya nāmnā kaumodakīti sā // HV_App.I,18.802 //
GE07hv_apppu:3426: samare rāmagovindau ripūṃs tān pratyayudhyatām // HV_App.I,18.804 //
GE07hv_apppu:3429: samare pratirūpau tau viṣṇur eko dvidhākṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3431: halam udyamya rāmas tu sarpendram iva kopitam /
GE07hv_apppu:3432: cacāra samare vīro dviṣatām antakopamaḥ // HV_App.I,18.810 //
GE07hv_apppu:3434: cakāra roṣaṃ saphalaṃ nāgeṣu ca hayeṣu ca // HV_App.I,18.812 //
GE07hv_apppu:3440: dhig etāṃ kṣatravṛttiṃ vaḥ samare kātarātmanām // HV_App.I,18.818 //
GE07hv_apppu:3444: bhītāḥ kiṃ vinivartadhvaṃ dhig etāṃ kṣatravṛttitām // HV_App.I,18.822 //
GE07hv_apppu:3446: [k: Ñ2.3 V B1.2 Dn Ds D5.6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3447: atha vā tiṣṭhata rathaiḥ prekṣakāḥ samavasthitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3448: yāvad etau raṇe gopau preṣayāmi yamakṣayam // HV_App.I,18.824 //
GE07hv_apppu:3449: tatas te kṣatriyāḥ sarve jarāsaṃdhena coditāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3450: kṣipantaḥ śarajālāni hṛṣṭā yoddhum avasthitāḥ // HV_App.I,18.826 //
GE07hv_apppu:3459: tad yuddham abhavat tatra tayos teṣāṃ ca saṃyuge /
GE07hv_apppu:3462: tasthatur yadumukhyau tāv abhivṛṣṭau yathācalau // HV_App.I,18.838 //
GE07hv_apppu:3465: gadābhiś caiva gurvībhiḥ kṣepaṇīyaiś ca mudgaraiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3466: ardyamānau maheṣvāsau yādavau na cakampatuḥ // HV_App.I,18.840 //
GE07hv_apppu:3472: na śekus te raṇe sthātuṃ pārthivāḥ naṣṭacetasaḥ // HV_App.I,18.846 //
GE07hv_apppu:3474: rathayūthāni bhagnāni na śekuś calituṃ raṇe // HV_App.I,18.848 //
GE07hv_apppu:3476: ghanā iva ghanāpāye bhagnadantā vicukruśuḥ // HV_App.I,18.850 //
GE07hv_apppu:3478: petur gatāsavas tatra yathā vajrahatās tathā // HV_App.I,18.852 //
GE07hv_apppu:3482: vaiṣṇavānāṃ nṛpās te tu draṣṭum apy abalīyasaḥ // HV_App.I,18.856 //
GE07hv_apppu:3484: bhagnaikacakrās tv apare vikīrṇā dharaṇītale // HV_App.I,18.858 //
GE07hv_apppu:3486: dāruṇāni pravṛttāni rakṣāṃsy autpātikāni ca // HV_App.I,18.860 //
GE07hv_apppu:3487: [k: After line 860a, T1 G2.3.5 M1.2.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3491: rakṣāṃsi ca piśācāś ca dṛśyante 'tra sahasraśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3495: yoṣeva candanārdrāṅgī bhairavā pratibhāti vai // HV_App.I,18.864 //
GE07hv_apppu:3497: rudhirodā nadī tatra cchādayām āsa medinīm // HV_App.I,18.866 //
GE07hv_apppu:3499: śivānām aśivaiḥ śabdair nādite ghoradarśane // HV_App.I,18.868 //
GE07hv_apppu:3503: kaṅkaiś ca balagṛdhraiś ca nāditapratinādite // HV_App.I,18.872 //
GE07hv_apppu:3506: jāmbuke ca tathā yūthe rākṣaseṣu samantataḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:3511: śārṅgaṃ caiva mahācāpaṃ bāṇāni vividhāni ca /
GE07hv_apppu:3512: gṛhya sainyāvanigato babhāṣe keśavo nṛpān // HV_App.I,18.876 //
GE07hv_apppu:3513: [k: K2 Ñ2.3 V1.2 B Ds D2-5 T1-3 G1.3-5 M ins. (D6 cont. after *95):k]
GE07hv_apppu:3514: kiṃ nu yudhyata vai śūrā hastyaśvarathasaṃyutāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3515: kim idaṃ gamyate śūrāḥ kṛtāstrā nṛpapuṃgavāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3516: ahaṃ sapūrvajaḥ saṃkhye padātiḥ pramukhe sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,18.878 //
GE07hv_apppu:3518: sa idānīṃ jarāsaṃdhaḥ kimarthaṃ nābhivartate // HV_App.I,18.880 //
GE07hv_apppu:3520: taṃ dṛṣṭvā roṣatāmrākṣo halī musalam ādade /
GE07hv_apppu:3521: [k: K Ñ2.3V BD T3.4 (T2 G1.4.5 after second occurrence of line 882):k]
GE07hv_apppu:3522: babhāṣe sa tu tāmrākṣaṃ ukṣāṇam iva sevanī /
GE07hv_apppu:3523: ehy ehi rāma yudhyasva mayā sārdham ariṃdama //
GE07hv_apppu:3524: evam ukte tu nṛpatir darado nāma vīryavān /
GE07hv_apppu:3526: tad yuddham abhavat tābhyāṃ rāmasya daradasya ca /
GE07hv_apppu:3528: yojayitvā tataḥ skandhe rāmo daradam āhave /
GE07hv_apppu:3533: papāta darado bhūmau dāritārdha ivācalaḥ // HV_App.I,18.888 //
GE07hv_apppu:3535: jarāsaṃdhasya rājñas tu rāmeṇāsīt samāgamaḥ // HV_App.I,18.890 //
GE07hv_apppu:3537: gade hṛhītvā vikrāntāv anyonyam abhidhāvatām // HV_App.I,18.892 //
GE07hv_apppu:3539: dadṛśāte mahātmānau girī saśikharāv iva // HV_App.I,18.894 //
GE07hv_apppu:3541: saṃrabdhāv iva dhāvantau gadāyuddheṣu viśrutau // HV_App.I,18.896 //
GE07hv_apppu:3542: tāv ubhau paramācāryau loke khyātau mahābalau /
GE07hv_apppu:3543: mattāv iva mahānāgāv anyonyaṃ samadhāvatām // HV_App.I,18.898 //
GE07hv_apppu:3544: tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3545: yakṣāś cāpsarasaś caiva samājagmuḥ sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,18.900 //
GE07hv_apppu:3547: śuśubhe 'bhyadhikaṃ rājan nabho jyotirgaṇair iva // HV_App.I,18.902 //
GE07hv_apppu:3549: savyaṃ maṇḍalam āśritya baladevas tu dakṣiṇam // HV_App.I,18.904 //
GE07hv_apppu:3551: dantābhyām iva mātaṅgau nādayantau diśo daśa // HV_App.I,18.906 //

GE07hv_apppu:3648: saṃgrāmaḥ sumahān vṛttaḥ pratyakṣaṃ tava cedipa //
GE07hv_apppu:3649: yadūnāṃ prathamo bandhus tvaṃ hi sarvamahīkṣitām /

GE07hv_apppu:3712: sṛgālābhaṃ sṛgālaṃ ca jaghāna navabhiḥ śaraiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3713: tataḥ pañcaśatā viṣṇuṃ sṛgālo 'tha jaghāna ha /
GE07hv_apppu:3721: tair astrais tau tu rājendra vāsudevau raṇotsukau /
GE07hv_apppu:3722: yuyudhāte ruṣā yuktau saṃdaṣṭoṣṭhau tadā raṇe //
GE07hv_apppu:3725: māheśvaraṃ sṛgālas tu raudraṃ caiva janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3726: gomāyur atha yāmyaṃ tu kālam astraṃ janardanaḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:3727: te śastre niṣphale rājan bhūmiṃ jagmatur āture /
GE07hv_apppu:3728: kṣurapreṇa sṛgālas tu chettum aicchat tu śārṅgiṇaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3729: jyāṃ jātaroṣo dhanuṣā tasya devasya paśyataḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:3730: taj jñātvā bhagavān viṣṇur dhanuś ciccheda sāyakaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3731: visṛjya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ punar anyat samādade //
GE07hv_apppu:3732: tac cāpi bhagavān viṣṇuś ciccheda ca nanāda ca /
GE07hv_apppu:3733: punar anyat samādatte cāpaṃ bhārasahaṃ nṛpa //
GE07hv_apppu:3734: tena cāpena govindaṃ jaghāna niśitaiḥ śataiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3735: navatyā ca punar viṣṇur navabhiś ca punar nṛpaḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:3736: aśītyā ca punar devaṃ samājaghne paraḥ śaraiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3737: śarāṇām atha lakṣāṇāṃ samājaghne hariṃ ruṣā //
GE07hv_apppu:3738: tataḥ kruddho 'tha bhagavāṃś ciccheda dhanur uttamam /
GE07hv_apppu:3739: sārathiṃ cāsya hatvā tu jaghāna prāṣṭhisārathim //
GE07hv_apppu:3741: tataḥ sṛgālo vikrāntaś cāpaṃ bhārasahaṃ mahat /
GE07hv_apppu:3742: ādāya niśitaṃ bāṇaṃ sajjaṃ kṛtvā dhanus tadā //
GE07hv_apppu:3743: sṛgālas tv abravīt kṛṣṇaṃ samare samupasthitam /

GE07hv_apppu:3749: sa me suviditaḥ kṛṣṇa kṣatriyāṇāṃ parājayaḥ /

GE07hv_apppu:3755: na cāham ekaṃ sabalo yuktas tvāṃ yoddhum āhave /

GE07hv_apppu:3797: na bhetavyaṃ na bhetavyam iti tān abhyabhāṣata //
GE07hv_apppu:3801: patito vai sṛgālākhyo bhraṣṭaḥ san dīnamānasaḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:3802: te sma paśyanti patitaṃ dharaṇyāṃ dharaṇīpatim /

GE07hv_apppu:3807: mahiṣyas tasya niṣpetuḥ saputrā ruditānanāḥ // HV_App.I,18.1033 //

GE07hv_apppu:3813: petur ūrdhvabhujāḥ sarvāḥ kṛttamūlā latā iva // HV_App.I,18.1039 //

GE07hv_apppu:3824: tvadvihīnaḥ katham ayaṃ pade sthāsyati paitṛke /

GE07hv_apppu:3826: atṛptās tava saukhyānāṃ kiṃ kurmo vidhavā vayam // HV_App.I,18.1047 //
GE07hv_apppu:3828: gṛhītvā taṃ sutaṃ tatra vāsudevam upasthitā // HV_App.I,18.1049 //

GE07hv_apppu:3841: mṛdupūrvam idaṃ vākyam uvāca vadatāṃ varaḥ // HV_App.I,18.1059 //
GE07hv_apppu:3843: prakṛtisthā vayaṃ jātā devi saiṣo 'smi bāndhavaḥ // HV_App.I,18.1061 //
GE07hv_apppu:3844: roṣo me vigataḥ sādhvi tava vākyair akilbiṣaiḥ /

GE07hv_apppu:3846: abhayaṃ cābhiṣekaṃ ca dadāmy asmai sukhāya vai /
GE07hv_apppu:3849: tataḥ prakṛtayaḥ sarvāḥ purodhā mantriṇas tathā /

GE07hv_apppu:3862: āpṛcchya keśavaṃ rājā svāṃ purīṃ pratijagmivān //

GE07hv_apppu:3868: naidhanena vidhānena cakrus te tasya satkriyām /

GE07hv_apppu:3882: [k: After line 1073a, K Ñ1.2 V3 Dn D2.3.5.6 T3 G2 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3888: jagmatuḥ sahitau vīrau mudā paramayā yutau //
GE07hv_apppu:3889: nagarīṃ mathurāṃ prāptau vasudevasutāv ubhau // HV_App.I,18.1074 //
GE07hv_apppu:3890: [k: D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3891: tataḥ kṛṣṇo mahāśaṅkhaṃ pāñcajanyaṃ ca yādavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3896: sabālavṛddhā sā caiva purī samabhivartata // HV_App.I,18.1078 //
GE07hv_apppu:3898: rathyāḥ patākāmālinyo bhāsanti sma samantataḥ // HV_App.I,18.1080 //
GE07hv_apppu:3901: akrūraḥ sātyakiś caiva mantriṇaś ca yathocitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3902: bhrātros tayor āgamane yathaivendramahe tathā // HV_App.I,18.1082 //
GE07hv_apppu:3906: sve pure nibhayāḥ sarve krīḍadhvaṃ yādavāḥ sukham // HV_App.I,18.1086 //
GE07hv_apppu:3907: na tatra kaścid dīno vā malino vā vicetanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:3910: naranārīgaṇāś caiva bhejire mānasaṃ sukham // HV_App.I,18.1090 //
GE07hv_apppu:3911: śivāś ca pravavur vātā virajaskā diśo daśa /
GE07hv_apppu:3912: daivatāni ca sarvāṇi hṛṣṭāny āyataneṣv api // HV_App.I,18.1092 //
GE07hv_apppu:3913: yāni liṅgāni lokasya vṛttānīha kṛte yuge /

GE07hv_apppu:3916: hariyuktena tau vīrau praviṣṭau mathurāṃ purīm // HV_App.I,18.1096 //
GE07hv_apppu:3917: viśantaṃ nagarīṃ ramyāṃ govindaṃ rāmam eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:3918: anujagmur yadugaṇāḥ śakraṃ devagaṇā iva // HV_App.I,18.1098 //
GE07hv_apppu:3921: tāv āyudhāni vinyasya gṛhe sve svairacāriṇau /
