GE07hv_apppu:5343: nāmnā dvāravatī nāma triṣu lokeṣu viśrutā /
GE07hv_apppu:5345: yadi syāt saṃvṛtāṃ bhūmiṃ pradāsyati mahodadhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5346: yatheṣṭaṃ vividhaṃ karma viśvakarmā kariṣyati // HV_App.I,20.1139 //
GE07hv_apppu:5357: praṇamya śirasā tābhyāṃ niṣasāda kṛtāsanaḥ // HV_App.I,20.1147 //
GE07hv_apppu:5359: prakāśaṃ kartukāmau tau visṛjya vinatātmajam // HV_App.I,20.1149 //
GE07hv_apppu:5362: praviveśa balī śrīmān svapitur bhavanaṃ nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:5363: modete sukhinau tatra devaloke yathāmarau // HV_App.I,20.1151 //
GE07hv_apppu:5364: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā bhojarājo mahāyaśāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5365: kṛṣṇaṃ snehena visrabdhaṃ babhāṣe vacanāmṛtam // HV_App.I,20.1153 //
GE07hv_apppu:5367: śrūyatāṃ yad ahaṃ tvādya vakṣyāmi ripusūdana // HV_App.I,20.1155 //
GE07hv_apppu:5368: tvayā vihīnāḥ sarve sma na śaktāḥ sukham āsitum /
GE07hv_apppu:5369: pure 'smin viṣayānte vā patihīnā iva striyaḥ // HV_App.I,20.1157 //
GE07hv_apppu:5371: bibhīmo na narendrāṇāṃ sendrāṇām api mānada // HV_App.I,20.1159 //
GE07hv_apppu:5373: tatra tvaṃ sahito 'smābhir gacchethā yādavarṣabha // HV_App.I,20.1161 //
GE07hv_apppu:5374: tasya rājño vacaḥ śrutvā sasmitaṃ devakīsutaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5375: yatheṣṭaṃ bhavatām adya tathā kartāsmy asaṃśayam /
GE07hv_apppu:5377: [h: HV (CE) chapter 9210, transliterated by Kreshimir Krnic, proof--read
GE07hv_apppu:5378: by Kreshimir Krnic, version of May 2, 2005 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:5379: [k: After adhy. 87.28, D6 S (except G2) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:5380: yathārhaṃ ca yathāyogaṃ praśrayaṃ pradadau nṛpaḥ // HV_App.I,21.1 //
GE07hv_apppu:5382: sarvamantaḥ puraṃ caiva vivāhe sotsukaṃ kila // HV_App.I,21.3 //
GE07hv_apppu:5383: śvobhūte tu vivāhaḥ syāc caidyasyeti ca bhūmipāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5385: śiśupālo 'pi rājā tu varaveṣeṇa saṃyutaḥ // HV_App.I,21.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:5386: kumārair ātmatulyaiś ca niyamastho 'bhavat tadā // HV_App.I,21.7 //
GE07hv_apppu:5389: etasminn eva kāle tu nārado munisattamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5390: pṛthivyāṃ paryaṭann eko vīṇāsaktakaras tadā // HV_App.I,21.9 //
GE07hv_apppu:5393: praviśya ca purīṃ ramyāṃ keśavenābhipūjitaḥ // HV_App.I,21.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:5394: tasyām eva sabhāyāṃ tu yadubhir vṛṣṇibhiḥ saha /
GE07hv_apppu:5396: tadabhyāśe sthitaṃ rāmam ugrasenaṃ ca sātyakim /
GE07hv_apppu:5397: anyān api yadūn sarvān dadarśa muditān mahān // HV_App.I,21.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:5398: taṃ dṛṣṭvā yādavāḥ sarve pratyujjagmuḥ sasaṃbhramam // HV_App.I,21.17 //
GE07hv_apppu:5399: bhagavān api govindo rāmeṇa saha keśavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5401: idam arghyam idaṃ pādyam ity ūce taṃ munīśvaram // HV_App.I,21.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:5402: tac ca sarvaṃ yathāprāptam upayujya munīśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5403: āsane ca samāsthāya nyaṣīdan muditas tadā // HV_App.I,21.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:5404: āsanasthaṃ muniśreṣṭhaṃ yādavāḥ sarva eva te /
GE07hv_apppu:5405: āsanāni yathāyogaṃ prāpnuvan svāni sarvataḥ // HV_App.I,21.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:5406: keśavo 'pi ca dharmātmā rāmeṇa saha saṃgataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5408: uvāca ca muniśreṣṭhaṃ vīṇāsaktam asaṅgagam // HV_App.I,21.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:5410: api te kuśalaṃ vipra tapaso munisattama // HV_App.I,21.29 //
GE07hv_apppu:5411: kuśalaṃ tava vīṇāyā vada vipra yathātatham // HV_App.I,21.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:5412: jagatām adya viprendra kā vārtā vada me prabho // HV_App.I,21.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:5413: atha vā kuśalaṃ nāma yuṣmākaṃ niyatātmanām /
GE07hv_apppu:5414: diṣṭyā dṛṣṭo 'si saṃprāptaḥ pāvayānaś ca no vibho // HV_App.I,21.33 //
GE07hv_apppu:5415: prītā vayaṃ muniśreṣṭha pūtāś caiva tvadāgamāt /
GE07hv_apppu:5417: tvādṛśāṃ puṇyakīrtīnāṃ saṃyogād vada sāṃpratam // HV_App.I,21.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:5418: ādyo hi munimukhyānāṃ bhavāṃl loke prathiṣyati /
GE07hv_apppu:5419: dhanyāḥ khalu vayaṃ vipra yato dṛṣṭās tvayā vibho /
GE07hv_apppu:5420: evamādi jagannāthaḥ kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭavān munim // HV_App.I,21.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:5421: tac chrutvā kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭaṃ viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā /
GE07hv_apppu:5422: muniḥ prītamanā bhūtvā provāca yadusaṃsadi // HV_App.I,21.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:5424: sarvāṃs tahtā yadūn vipraḥ samābhāṣya vacas tadā // HV_App.I,21.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:5425: kim ayaṃ kuśalapraśnaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ kṛṣṇa mayi prabho /
GE07hv_apppu:5426: na yuktaṃ pratibhāty etad devadeva jagatpate // HV_App.I,21.45 //
GE07hv_apppu:5427: yatas tvaṃ sarvabhūtānām ādiḥ kuśaladas tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:5428: tvadicchayā jagat sarvaṃ kuśale viniyujyate // HV_App.I,21.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:5429: vayaṃ tu devadeveśa nityaṃ kuśalino hare /
GE07hv_apppu:5430: tathā hi mūlabhṛtyā vai viṣṇo tava yuge yuge // HV_App.I,21.49 //
GE07hv_apppu:5431: idaṃ tu citraṃ deveśa yad uktaṃ bhavato hare /
GE07hv_apppu:5432: pāvayāna iti śrīmaṃl lokanātha sureśvara // HV_App.I,21.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:5433: tvaṃ hi śuddhaḥ sadā yogī pūtaḥ kila mamāgamāt /
GE07hv_apppu:5434: kim anyad vada deveśa prasādāt tava mānada // HV_App.I,21.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:5435: prasādāt iśayād etad yuktaṃ vaktuṃ jagatpate /
GE07hv_apppu:5436: idaṃ niścitavān adya prasanno mayi mānada // HV_App.I,21.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:5437: sarvathā kṛtakṛtyo 'smi dṛṣṭo yena tvayā vibho /
GE07hv_apppu:5438: prītir me hy atulā viṣṇo tava saṃdarśanena hi // HV_App.I,21.57 //
GE07hv_apppu:5439: ity uktvā sa jagannāthaṃ bhūyaḥ stotuṃ pracakrame /
GE07hv_apppu:5440: purāṇajñaḥ sadā vipro munīnām ādir avyayaḥ // HV_App.I,21.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:5442: ādāya nihitāṃ vīnāṃ saṃsthāpya layam uttamam // HV_App.I,21.61 //
GE07hv_apppu:5445: [k: Pāda b begins with three stars in the original, probably marking lacuna. The numbering of *--passages continues from app. 20. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:5446: tantrīṃ ca sudṛḍhāṃ kṛtvā jagau geyair jagatpatim /
GE07hv_apppu:5450: devadeva jagannātha namas te cakradhāriṇe // HV_App.I,21.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:5452: namas te sakaleśāya nirguṇāya guṇātmane // HV_App.I,21.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:5454: namas te kroḍarūpāya daṃṣṭrayā kṣitidhāraṇe // HV_App.I,21.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:5456: trivikrama namas tubhyaṃ trayīrūpa janārdana // HV_App.I,21.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:5459: udgīthāya namas tubhyaṃ rathaṃtara namo 'stu te /
GE07hv_apppu:5460: yaṃ vidur vedatattvajñā brahmādyāḥ sanakādayaḥ // HV_App.I,21.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:5462: so 'si deva jagannātha yo dṛṣṭo brahmavādibhiḥ // HV_App.I,21.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:5463: yaṃ prāpya na nivartante yogino yatacetasaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5464: so 'si deva purāṇātmaṃs tubhyaṃ deva namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,21.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:5465: tvām āhuḥ sakalā vedā brahmeti jñānaniścaye /
GE07hv_apppu:5466: tvamevedaṃ jagatsarvaṃ tvayi sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam // HV_App.I,21.81 //
GE07hv_apppu:5468: ahaṃ mānakṛtā bhraṣṭrāḥ patanti narakeṣu ca /
GE07hv_apppu:5469: ye ca tvāṃ viṣṇur ity āhus te ca tvāṃ yānti yatnataḥ // HV_App.I,21.84 //
GE07hv_apppu:5471: te tu tvāṃ devadeveśa praviśanti purātanam // HV_App.I,21.86 //
GE07hv_apppu:5472: tavaiṣā bhagavan māyā yām āśritya jaganmayīm /
GE07hv_apppu:5473: prāṇino niḥśvasanti sma duḥsahā sā hi nityaśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5474: vihāraḥ sarva evaiṣa prāṇinām udayāya hi // HV_App.I,21.89 //
GE07hv_apppu:5476: adadhā bhūtadhātrīṃ tvaṃ prāṇināṃ ca hitāya hi /
GE07hv_apppu:5477: punar aśvaśirā bhūtvā vedān āhṛtya tiṣṭhasi // HV_App.I,21.92 //
GE07hv_apppu:5478: āsīr vāmanarūpas tvam abadhnā balim adhvare /
GE07hv_apppu:5479: āhṛtya rājyaṃ tasmāt tvam indrāya prāhiṇor vibho // HV_App.I,21.94 //
GE07hv_apppu:5480: abhūs tvaṃ nārasiṃhaś ca hatavān daityapuṃgavam // HV_App.I,21.95 //
GE07hv_apppu:5482: āsīś ca rāmasaṃjñas tvaṃ rāvaṇaṃ hatavān vibho /
GE07hv_apppu:5483: niṣkaṇṭakam imaṃ lokam akaror devasattama // HV_App.I,21.98 //
GE07hv_apppu:5484: abhūś ca jāmadagnyas tvaṃ gṛhītvā paraśuṃ prabho /
GE07hv_apppu:5486: niḥkṣatriyam imaṃ lokam adadāḥ kāśyapāya vai // HV_App.I,21.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:5488: mānuṣaṃ vapur āsthāya dvāravatyāṃ pratiṣṭhasi // HV_App.I,21.103 //
GE07hv_apppu:5489: hatavān pūtanāṃ bālye gokule viharan prabho /
GE07hv_apppu:5490: arjunau hatavān bhūyo baddho lūkhalasaṃpuṭaḥ // HV_App.I,21.105 //
GE07hv_apppu:5491: punaś ca krīḍatā viṣṇo tvayaiva nihato hayaḥ // HV_App.I,21.106 //
GE07hv_apppu:5492: adadhās tvaṃ punaḥ śailaṃ gavāṃ saṃrakṣaṇāya hi /
GE07hv_apppu:5494: nanarta bhagavān bhūyo yamunāyā hrade hare /
GE07hv_apppu:5495: akaroḥ kāliyaṃ viṣṇo vimadaṃ yamunātaṭe // HV_App.I,21.110 //
GE07hv_apppu:5497: duḥsahaṃ lokavidviṣṭaṃ hatavān kaṃsam ojasā // HV_App.I,21.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:5499: sa idānīṃ sthito rājye tvām āśrityendravad divi // HV_App.I,21.114 //
GE07hv_apppu:5500: kim anena jagannātha sarvaṃ tvadvaśagaṃ jagat /
GE07hv_apppu:5502: namas te devadeveśa namo bhūyo namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,21.117 //
GE07hv_apppu:5503: iti stutvā jagannātham upāraṃsīt sa nāradaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5504: tac chrutvā yādavāḥ sarve paraṃ vismayam āgatāḥ // HV_App.I,21.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:5506: dhanyā vayaṃ jagannātham āśritya sukhinas tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:5507: nirvṛtā vayam eveti nāradaṃ ca śaśaṃsire // HV_App.I,21.122 //
GE07hv_apppu:5508: punaḥ prītiyutāḥ sarve vilokya ca parasparam /
GE07hv_apppu:5509: dhanyā vayaṃ punar dhanyā dhanyānām agrataḥ sthitāḥ // HV_App.I,21.124 //
GE07hv_apppu:5512: kimartham iha saṃprāpto vada nārada sāṃpratam /
GE07hv_apppu:5513: alam etaiḥ stutipadair yathārthair vāpi nārada // HV_App.I,21.126 //
GE07hv_apppu:5514: tvad āgamanajaṃ vipra tatkāryaṃ vada sāṃpratam /
GE07hv_apppu:5515: kutūhalaṃ mama vibho vṛṣṇīnāṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,21.128 //
GE07hv_apppu:5519: arcayitvā haraṃ śarvaṃ dakṣine sāgare vibhum // HV_App.I,21.131 //
GE07hv_apppu:5521: tvāṃ draṣṭuṃ devadeveśa vasantaṃ vṛṣṇisaṃsadi // HV_App.I,21.133 //
GE07hv_apppu:5523: praviśya ca purīṃ tāṃ tu vidarbhasya mahīpateḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5525: tatra dṛṣṭo hṛṣīkeśa rājñāṃ samudayo mahān // HV_App.I,21.137 //
GE07hv_apppu:5526: jarāsaṃdhaṃ puraskṛtya rājānaḥ sarva eva hi /
GE07hv_apppu:5527: yathāsukhaṃ yathāyogaṃ dṛṣṭāḥ keśava māciram // HV_App.I,21.139 //
GE07hv_apppu:5528: śiśupālo hi nṛpatiś cedīnām īśvaraś ca saḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5529: pauṇḍrako vāsudevaś ca nityaṃ tvāṃ dveṣṭi yo vibho // HV_App.I,21.141 //
GE07hv_apppu:5530: drṣṭaś cātha mayā rājā bhīṣmako mābravīd vacaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5532: bhavitā śvaḥ prabhāte tu tadarthaṃ rājasaṃgamaḥ // HV_App.I,21.144 //
GE07hv_apppu:5533: tac chrutvā tvarito deva prāptas tvāṃ vṛṣṇipuṃgava /
GE07hv_apppu:5534: tad gaccha vṛṣṇibhiḥ sārdhaṃ nagaraṃ tasya dhīmataḥ // HV_App.I,21.146 //
GE07hv_apppu:5535: gṛhāṇa rukmiṇīṃ kṛṣṇa jitvā nṛpatipuṃgavān // HV_App.I,21.147 //
GE07hv_apppu:5536: śiśupālo 'tha rājā tu varaveṣeṇa viṣṭhitaḥ // HV_App.I,21.148 //
GE07hv_apppu:5537: udvaheta jagannātha yadi rājā sa rukmiṇīm /
GE07hv_apppu:5538: akṛtyam ayaśasyaṃ ca bhavato nātra saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,21.150 //
GE07hv_apppu:5539: yācitā sā bhavadbhis tu na dattā bhīṣmakeṇa hi // HV_App.I,21.151 //
GE07hv_apppu:5541: ekalavyo hṛṣīkeśa rukmī tasya tu dāsyati // HV_App.I,21.153 //
GE07hv_apppu:5542: bhavantaṃ yaḥ sadā dveṣṭi na tvāmāhvayati prabho // HV_App.I,21.154 //
GE07hv_apppu:5543: jarāsaṃdhas tu vṛṣṇīnāṃ sadā dveṣṭā na saṃśayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5544: tad gacchatu bhavāñ śīghraṃ yānair aśvair gajair api // HV_App.I,21.156 //
GE07hv_apppu:5546: tām ādāya jagannātha gatvā yāsyasi māciram // HV_App.I,21.158 //
GE07hv_apppu:5548: tvayy eva mana ādhāya sadā tvāṃ smarati prabho // HV_App.I,21.160 //
GE07hv_apppu:5549: yadi bhartā bhavec caidyaḥ syān mṛtā rukmiṇī hare /
GE07hv_apppu:5550: ujjīvaya hare viṣṇo rukmiṇīṃ rukmabhūṣaṇām // HV_App.I,21.162 //
GE07hv_apppu:5551: ity ahaṃ deva saṃprāptaḥ kṛtyaśeṣaṃ vicintyatām /
GE07hv_apppu:5552: na kiṃcid api duḥsādhyaṃ cakrapāṇe hare tava // HV_App.I,21.164 //
GE07hv_apppu:5553: sādhayāmo vayaṃ deva gacchet yuktvā jagāma saḥ // HV_App.I,21.165 //
GE07hv_apppu:5556: ity uktvā nārade yāte brahmalokaṃ sanātanam /
GE07hv_apppu:5557: vāsudevas tu dharmātmā yadūnām agraṇīr hariḥ // HV_App.I,21.167 //
GE07hv_apppu:5559: uvāca ca yadūn sarvān sajjībhavata māciram // HV_App.I,21.169 //
GE07hv_apppu:5560: asminn eva muhūrte tu yāsyāmaḥ kuṇḍinaṃ prati /
GE07hv_apppu:5561: rathamānaya me śīghraṃ sārathe dāruka prabho // HV_App.I,21.171 //
GE07hv_apppu:5562: āruhyantāṃ rathā aśvā gajāś ca parikalpitāḥ // HV_App.I,21.172 //
GE07hv_apppu:5563: agrataś cāstu no vīraḥ sātyakiḥ satyavikramaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5564: madhyato balabhadras tu rājā caiva tu pṛṣṭhataḥ // HV_App.I,21.174 //
GE07hv_apppu:5565: ahaṃ khaḍgī gadī cakrī śārṅgī śāṅkhī talatravān /
GE07hv_apppu:5566: ratham āsthāya gacchāmi dārukeṇa sahāyavān // HV_App.I,21.176 //
GE07hv_apppu:5569: badhvā vā bhīṣmakaṃ saṃkhye hatvā caiva tu rukmiṇam /
GE07hv_apppu:5570: ānayiṣyāmi tāṃ rājan rukmiṇīṃ matpriyāṃ sadā // HV_App.I,21.180 //
GE07hv_apppu:5571: sajjībhavantu rājāno rathair aśvair gajais tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:5572: kiṃ vilambatha rājāno yāsyāmaḥ sarva eva hi /
GE07hv_apppu:5573: ity uktvā vṛṣṇayaḥ sarve gamanāyopacakrire // HV_App.I,21.183 //
GE07hv_apppu:5575: rathān āruhya yātās te saṃnaddhāḥ śastrapāṇayaḥ // HV_App.I,21.185 //
GE07hv_apppu:5576: sātyakis tu mahārāja ratham āruhya daṃśitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5577: dhanvī khaṅgī rathī bāṇī sainyāgre pratyadṛśyata /
GE07hv_apppu:5578: baladevo 'pi dharmātmā gajam āruhya daṃśitaḥ // HV_App.I,21.188 //
GE07hv_apppu:5579: sainyamadhye mahārāja mṛgamadhye yathā hariḥ // HV_App.I,21.189 //
GE07hv_apppu:5582: gantum aichaj jagannātho hartuṃ bhojapateḥ sutām // HV_App.I,21.192 //
GE07hv_apppu:5584: samāśvastā tadā sā tu sa ca rājā suduḥkhitaḥ // HV_App.I,21.194 //
GE07hv_apppu:5586: āhatya duṃdubhīn sarve śaṅkhān dadhmuḥ pṛthak pṛthak /
GE07hv_apppu:5587: krameṇaiva gatās te tu bhīṣmakasya purīṃ prati // HV_App.I,21.197 //
GE07hv_apppu:5588: [h: HV (CE) chapter 9220, transliterated by Kreṣimir Krnic, proof--read by Kreṣimir Krnic, version of May 2, 2005 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:5590: pitṛṣv asuḥ priyārthaṃ ca rāmakṛṣṇāv ubhāv api /
GE07hv_apppu:5591: prayayur vṛṣṇayaś cānye mānyās tejobalānvitāḥ // HV_App.I,22.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:5594: pūjayām āsa pūjārhān niviṣṭān bahir eva tān /
GE07hv_apppu:5595: nyaveśayac ca tān sarvān bhīṣmako nagarād bahiḥ // HV_App.I,22.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:5596: sthite tasmiñ jarāsaṃdhe ripau teṣāṃ mahātmani /
GE07hv_apppu:5597: saṃbhārās tatra sarvatra vivāhāya samāhṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,22.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:5598: śaṅkhāś ca paṭahāś caiva sasvanuḥ sarvatas tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:5599: brāhmaṇāś ca samāyātā nānādigbhyas tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:5600: ucchritāś caiva sarvatra dhvajā vai samalaṃkṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,22.11 //
GE07hv_apppu:5601: śvobhāvini vivāhe tu rukmiṇī niryayau bahiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5604: keśavo me bhaved bhartā nānyaḥ kaścid bhaved iti /
GE07hv_apppu:5605: evaṃ manasi saṃkalpaṃ kurvatī rukmiṇī śubhā /
GE07hv_apppu:5606: dīpyamānena vapuṣā balena mahatā vṛtā // HV_App.I,22.17 //
GE07hv_apppu:5607: tāṃ dadarśa tadā kṛṣṇo lakṣmīṃ sākṣād iva sthitām /
GE07hv_apppu:5609: vahner iva śikhāṃ dīptāṃ māyāṃ bhūmigatām iva /
GE07hv_apppu:5610: pṛthivīm iva gambhīrām utthitāṃ dharaṇītalāt // HV_App.I,22.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:5611: marīcim iva somasya saumyāṃ strīvigrahām iva /
GE07hv_apppu:5612: vinā padmaṃ śriyam iva bhujiṣyāstrīsahāyinīm // HV_App.I,22.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:5613: kṛṣṇena manasā dṛṣṭā durnirīkṣyā surair api // HV_App.I,22.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:5619: nāsty anyā pramadā loke rūpeṇa yaśasā śriyā /
GE07hv_apppu:5621: tāṃ dṛṣṭvāṃ vavṛdhe kāmaḥ kṛṣṇasya priyadarśanām /
GE07hv_apppu:5623: rukmiṇī ca tathā devī dadṛśe kṛṣṇam īśvaram /
GE07hv_apppu:5624: acintayac ca sā devī dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇam avasthitam /
GE07hv_apppu:5625: so 'yaṃ viṣṇur jagannāthaḥ sākṣād rāmānujaḥ kṛtī // HV_App.I,22.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:5626: asya cakraṃ sadā śaṅkho bhujayor ubhayor api /
GE07hv_apppu:5627: śobhayetāṃ sadā tau tu daityadānavadāriṇau // HV_App.I,22.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:5629: sadā bhāti mahācāpaṃ loke khyātataraṃ hareḥ // HV_App.I,22.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:5630: yamāśritya sadā devaṃ gadā kaumodakīti sā /
GE07hv_apppu:5633: ripūn hanti mahāvīryān asahyān daivatair api // HV_App.I,22.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:5637: gopastrīs tan abhāreṣu vijahāra yathāsukham // HV_App.I,22.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:5638: yo nanarta hrade tasyā yamunāyās tadā hariḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5641: līlayā sa jagannātho golakaṃ bālako yathā // HV_App.I,22.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:5642: ayaṃ sa puṇḍarīkākṣo yo gajaṃ prajaghāna ha // HV_App.I,22.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:5643: yaś cāṇūraṃ mṛdhe hatvā kaṃsaṃ caiva mahābalam /
GE07hv_apppu:5644: nanarta raṅge govindo gopaiḥ sārdhaṃ sayādavaiḥ // HV_App.I,22.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:5647: yuvā hariḥ purāṇātmā padmākṣaḥ padmasaprabhaḥ // HV_App.I,22.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:5648: so 'yam adya jagannāthaḥ prāpto mām iha yādavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5649: amuṣya pādayoryugmam udvahāmi na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,22.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:5651: evaṃ vicintayitvā sā vavande taṃ śacīṃ tadā // HV_App.I,22.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:5652: rāmeṇa saha niścitya keśavas tu mahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5653: tatpramāthe 'karod buddhiṃ vṛṣṇibhiḥ praṇidhāya ca // HV_App.I,22.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:5654: kṛtvā tu devakāryāṇi niṣkrāmantīṃ surālayāt // HV_App.I,22.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:5655: unmathya sahasā kṛṣṇaḥ svaṃ nināya rathottamam // HV_App.I,22.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:5657: samanahyanta dāśārhās tad ājñāya tu sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,22.68 //
GE07hv_apppu:5659: vājibhir vāraṇaiś caiva parivavrur halāyudham // HV_App.I,22.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:5660: ādāya rukmiṇīṃ kṛṣṇo jagāmāśu puraṃ prati /
GE07hv_apppu:5661: rāme tv āsajya taṃ bhāraṃ yuyudhāne ca vīryavān // HV_App.I,22.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:5662: akrūre vipṛthau caiva gade ca kṛtavarmaṇi /
GE07hv_apppu:5663: vasudeve sudeve ca sāraṇe ca mahābale // HV_App.I,22.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:5665: ugrasenātmaje kahve śatadyumne ca keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,22.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:5667: agnidatte bṛhaddurge śvaphalke satyake pṛthau // HV_App.I,22.78 //
GE07hv_apppu:5669: gurum āsajya taṃ bhāraṃ yayau dvāravatīṃ prati // HV_App.I,22.80 //
GE07hv_apppu:5670: te cāpi yādavāḥ sarve yuddhāya samupasthitāḥ // HV_App.I,22.81 //
GE07hv_apppu:5672: [h: HV (CE) App. 22A, transliterated by Kreshimir Krnic, proof--read by Kreshimir Krnic, version of May 2, 2005 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:5676: nyavedayanta tad vṛttaṃ jarāsaṃdhāya mānada // HV_App.I,22A.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:5678: dantavaktrāya śūrāya caidyāya ca sumedhase // HV_App.I,22A.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:5680: anyebhyaś cāpi rājabhyaḥ praśaśaṃsur yathātatham // HV_App.I,22A.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:5682: kṣubdhaṃ narāvarānīkaṃ śirasi prahṛtaṃ yathā // HV_App.I,22A.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:5683: cacāla rājakaḥ sarvas totrārdita iva dvipaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5684: aho vīryam aho dhairyaṃ kṛṣṇasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,22A.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:5685: hatā vayaṃ nirānandā avajñātāś ca savaśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5686: ity ūcus te nṛpatayo māgadhapramukhās tadā // HV_App.I,22A.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:5688: uvāca rājñas tān sarvān māgadhaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5689: niṣpīḍya caraṇau rājā dantān kaṭakaṭāpayan // HV_App.I,22A.15 //
GE07hv_apppu:5690: śrūyatāṃ mama vākyāni rājānaḥ sarva eva hi /
GE07hv_apppu:5692: tasyādya phalabhākso æstu yadi jīvāmi bhūmipāḥ // HV_App.I,22A.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:5693: eṣo æhaṃ sagaṇaṃ hatvā gopālaṃ nṛpasaṃjñitam /
GE07hv_apppu:5694: dvārakāṃ yādavapurīṃ bhaṅktvānīya ca rukmiṇīm // HV_App.I,22A.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:5696: saṃnahyantāṃ rathaśreṣṭhā ratha āyātu me tvarāt // HV_App.I,22A.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:5698: cacāla ca balaṃ sarvaṃ jarāsaṃdhapriye sthitam // HV_App.I,22A.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:5700: āhatya tu sabhāstambhaṃ jarāsaṃdham abhāṣata // HV_App.I,22A.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:5701: sthātavyaṃ bhavatā rājan sthite mayi narādhipa /
GE07hv_apppu:5702: bhṛtyo æsmi tava rājendra kim etat sāhasaṃ tava // HV_App.I,22A.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:5703: sthite bhṛtye kathaṃ svāmī kāryaṃ kuryād vicakṣaṇaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5706: aham ekaḥ sa evaikaḥ kṛṣṇo gopakakilbiṣaḥ // HV_App.I,22A.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:5707: hatvā taṃ gopakaṃ yuddhe balabhadrasya paśyataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5709: vṛkebhyo hi prayacchāmi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // HV_App.I,22A.33 //
GE07hv_apppu:5711: hate tasmiñ jarāsaṃdha gopake mama nāmake // HV_App.I,22A.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:5712: ity uktvā dhanur ādāya jagarja nṛpasaṃsadi // HV_App.I,22A.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:5713: caidyo æpy atha mahārāja sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5715: ādāya parighaṃ ghoram idam āha nṛpottamān // HV_App.I,22A.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:5716: anenaiva tu rājāno yādavān sabalān yudhi /
GE07hv_apppu:5718: tiṣṭhadhvam iha rājāno mamaivāyaṃ parābhavaḥ // HV_App.I,22A.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:5721: tat tu yuktaṃ yadukule kṣatriyā na hi te vibho /
GE07hv_apppu:5722: viśeṣato ætha gopāle ballaveṣu vivardhite // HV_App.I,22A.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:5723: gavāṃ vṛttiṃ tu gopālā vartayanti sadā tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:5724: kṛṣṇo æpi gokule vṛddho gopaiḥ sahacaraḥ kila // HV_App.I,22A.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:5726: sarvathā taṃ durātmānaṃ haniṣye sagaṇaṃ raṇe /
GE07hv_apppu:5727: tāṃ cānayāmi rājānas tiṣṭhadhvam iha bhūmipāḥ // HV_App.I,22A.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:5728: kva nu te bāndhavās teṣāṃ yānāśritya tu yādavāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5729: avajñāṃ kṛtavanto no yuṣmābhir iha cintyatām // HV_App.I,22A.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:5730: ity uktvātha sa caidyas tu yuddhāya samupasthitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5731: te ca sarve nṛpatayaḥ kruddhā yuddhāya daṃśitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5733: jarāsaṃdho ætha nṛpatī ratham āruhya daṃśitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5734: yuddhāya vai mahārāja mano dadhre mahīpatiḥ // HV_App.I,22A.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:5735: pauṇḍro æpy atha mahārāja vāsudevo mahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5736: ratham āruhya sahasā yuddhāyaiva mano dadhe // HV_App.I,22A.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:5738: saṃnaddhā niryayuḥ kruddhā jighāṃsanto janārdanam // HV_App.I,22A.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:5740: niryayau cedirājaś ca bhrātṛbhiḥ saha bandhubhiḥ // HV_App.I,22A.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:5741: kva vāsudevaḥ kva ca gopakas tathā @ HV_App.I,22A.65 @
GE07hv_apppu:5744: kuto nu vīro yudhi sātyakiḥ kila || HV_App.I,22A.68 ||
GE07hv_apppu:5747: śaraiś ca khaḍgair yudhi pātayanto @ HV_App.I,22A.71 @
GE07hv_apppu:5753: mādhavo 'pi mahārāja śaṅkhaṃ dadhmau pṛthak tadā // HV_App.I,22A.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:5754: bherīṇāṃ ca mṛdaṅgānāṃ jharjharīṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5755: nādāḥ samabhavaṃs tatra yadūnāṃ sainyasaṃcaye // HV_App.I,22A.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:5756: tato yuddhaṃ samabhavat senayor ubhayos tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:5761: saṃkarṣaṇaṃ puraskṛtya vāsavaṃ tv amarā iva // HV_App.I,22A.83 //
GE07hv_apppu:5763: ṣaḍbhir vivyādha nārācair yuyudhāno mahāmṛdhe // HV_App.I,22A.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:5764: akrūro dantavaktraṃ tu vivyādha navabhiḥ śaraiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5765: taṃ pratyavidhyat kārūṣo bāṇair daśabhir āśugaiḥ // HV_App.I,22A.87 //
GE07hv_apppu:5766: vipṛthuḥ śiśupālaṃ tu śarair vivyādha saptabhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5767: aṣṭabhiḥ pratyavidhyat taṃ śiśupālaḥ pratāpavān // HV_App.I,22A.89 //
GE07hv_apppu:5768: gaveṣaṇo 'pi caidyaṃ tu ṣaḍbhir vivyādha mārgaṇaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5769: anirdāntas tathāṣṭābhir bṛhaddurgas tu pañcabhiḥ // HV_App.I,22A.91 //
GE07hv_apppu:5771: jaghāna cāśvāṃś caturaś caturbhir vipṛthoḥ śaraiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5773: vipṛthoḥ sārathiṃ caiva prāhiṇod yamasādanam // HV_App.I,22A.95 //
GE07hv_apppu:5774: hatāśvaṃ tu rathaṃ tyaktvā vipṛthuḥ sumahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5776: āruhya javanān aśvān niyantum upacakrame // HV_App.I,22A.98 //
GE07hv_apppu:5780: paṭuśaḥ pañcabhiś cāpi vivyādha yudhi mārgaṇaiḥ // HV_App.I,22A.102 //
GE07hv_apppu:5781: tābhyāṃ sa viddho daśabhir bāṇair marmātigaiḥ śitaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5782: tato balī śakradevaṃ bibheda daśabhiḥ krudhā // HV_App.I,22A.104 //
GE07hv_apppu:5783: pañcabhiś cāpi vivyādha so 'vidūrād vidūratham // HV_App.I,22A.105 //
GE07hv_apppu:5784: vidūratho 'pi taṃ ṣaḍbhir vivyādhājau śitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,22A.106 //
GE07hv_apppu:5785: triṃśatā pratyavidhyat taṃ balī bāṇair mahāratham /
GE07hv_apppu:5786: kṛtavarmā bibhedāśu rājaputraṃ tribhiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,22A.108 //
GE07hv_apppu:5787: nyahanat sārathiṃ cāsya dhvajaṃ ciccheda sūcchritam /
GE07hv_apppu:5788: prativivyādha taṃ kruddhaḥ pauṇḍraḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:5790: nikṛttaśatruḥ kāliṅgaṃ bibhedāṅgaṃ ca mārgaṇaiḥ // HV_App.I,22A.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:5791: tomareṇāṃ sadeśe taṃ bibheda ca kaliṅgajaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5792: gajenāsādya kahvas tu gajam aṅgasya vīryavān // HV_App.I,22A.114 //
GE07hv_apppu:5794: citrakaś ca śvaphalkaś ca sātyakiś ca mahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5795: kaliṅgasya rathānīkaṃ nārācair bibhiduḥ śitaiḥ // HV_App.I,22A.117 //
GE07hv_apppu:5797: jaghāna rāmaḥ saṃkruddho vaṅgarājaṃ ca saṃyuge // HV_App.I,22A.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:5798: taṃ hatvā gajam āruhya dhanur ādāya vīryavān /
GE07hv_apppu:5799: saṃkarṣaṇo jaghānograir nārācaiḥ kāśikān bahūn // HV_App.I,22A.121 //
GE07hv_apppu:5800: ṣaḍbhir nihatya kārūṣān maheṣvāsāṃś ca vīryavān /
GE07hv_apppu:5801: śataṃ jaghāna saṃrabdho māgadhānāṃ mahārathaḥ // HV_App.I,22A.123 //
GE07hv_apppu:5802: nihatya tān mahārāja jarāsaṃdhaṃ tato 'bhyayāt // HV_App.I,22A.124 //
GE07hv_apppu:5803: tam āpanantaṃ vivyādha nārācair māgadhas tribhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5805: taṃ bibhedāṣṭabhiḥ kruddho nārācair musalāyudhaḥ // HV_App.I,22A.126 //
GE07hv_apppu:5807: cāpaṃ ca mahādāyattaṃ śarair eva halāyudhaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5808: rathaṃ cāsya mahārāja tilaśaś ca samāhanat // HV_App.I,22A.129 //
GE07hv_apppu:5810: vivyādha balabhadraṃ tu ciccheda ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5811: rathaṃ ca cūrṇayām āsa gadayāsya sa māgadhaḥ // HV_App.I,22A.132 //
GE07hv_apppu:5813: sātyakes tu rathaṃ prāyāt sarvakṣatrasya paṣyataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5814: sātyakis tu mahārāja śarair vivyādha māgadham // HV_App.I,22A.135 //
GE07hv_apppu:5816: jaghāna māgadhaṃ saṃkhye vajreṇeva giriṃ hariḥ // HV_App.I,22A.137 //
GE07hv_apppu:5817: tad yuddham abhavat teṣāṃ ghoraṃ devāsuropamam /
GE07hv_apppu:5819: gajair gajāś ca saṃkruddhāḥ saṃnipetuḥ sahasraśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5820: rathā rathais tu saṃrabdhāḥ sādibhiś cāpi sādinaḥ // HV_App.I,22A.141 //
GE07hv_apppu:5822: chindantaś cottamāṅgāni vinedur yudhi te pṛthak // HV_App.I,22A.143 //
GE07hv_apppu:5824: śarāṇāṃ patatām ājau pakṣiṇām iva śuśruve // HV_App.I,22A.145 //
GE07hv_apppu:5826: babhūva ghoṣaḥ śastrāṇāṃ jyāghoṣaś ca mahātmanām // HV_App.I,22A.147 //
GE07hv_apppu:5829: mūrchāṃ jagāma rājā tu nipapāta ca bhūtale // HV_App.I,22A.150 //
GE07hv_apppu:5830: sātyakir vaṅgarājaṃ tu jaghāna niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5831: tat sainyaṃ vimukhaṃ cāsīj jarāsaṃdhe nipātite // HV_App.I,22A.152 //
GE07hv_apppu:5832: sātyakir balabhadraś ca jitvā yodhān sahasraśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5833: śaṅkhaṃ dadhmatū rājānau sarveṣām agrataḥ sthitau /
GE07hv_apppu:5834: tataś ca vidrute sainye jarāsaṃdhe parājite // HV_App.I,22A.155 //
GE07hv_apppu:5835: tayoḥ śaṅkhasvanaṃ śrutvā gacchann eva janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5837: ity evaṃ cintayitvā tu vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān /
GE07hv_apppu:5840: [h: HV (CE) chapter 9230, transliterated by Kreshimir Krnic, proof--read
GE07hv_apppu:5841: by Kreshimir Krnic, version of August 23, 2002 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:5843: alaṃ kurvantu rathyāś ca patākāś caiva sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,23.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:5845: sūtāś ca māgadhāś caiva bandinaś ca tathāpare // HV_App.I,23.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:5846: kalaśāś ca prapūryantāṃ sumudrair api vāribhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5847: ucchrīyantāṃ dhvajāḥ sarve āneyā vārayoṣitaḥ // HV_App.I,23.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:5848: purohitāś ca hūyantāṃ kumārāś caiva sarvataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5849: āhanyantāṃ mahābheryo mṛdaṅgāḥ sarvataḥ kṣitau // HV_App.I,23.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:5850: nṛtyantāṃ nartakāḥ sarve gāyantāṃ gāyakās tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:5851: bhojyantāṃ brāhmaṇāḥ sarve dīyantāṃ ca dhanāni ca // HV_App.I,23.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:5852: alaṃ kriyantāṃ sarvatra prāsādāḥ sarva eva hi /
GE07hv_apppu:5854: te ca sarve yathājñaptaṃ cakruś caiva sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,23.13 //
GE07hv_apppu:5855: kvacic ca susvaraṃ geyaṃ gāyakāś cakrire tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:5857: rodasī pūrayāmāsuḥ pātālaṃ ca prapūritam // HV_App.I,23.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:5859: pṛthivīṃ kampayanto vai samudrān abhyavardhayan // HV_App.I,23.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:5860: kvacid gajā hayāś caiva heṣāṃ cakrur mahotsave /
GE07hv_apppu:5862: adhyakṣaḥ sātyakiś cāsīt keśave hy utsavonmukhe /
GE07hv_apppu:5863: itaś cetaś ca saṃyāti niyuṅkte tatra tatra ha // HV_App.I,23.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:5864: yasya yasya ca yatkāryaṃ taṃ taṃ tatra niyuktavāṇ // HV_App.I,23.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:5865: baladevo æpi dharmātmā rājabhiḥ sārdham acyutaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5866: yathārhaṃ tu yathāyogaṃ saṃmānaṃ samyojayat // HV_App.I,23.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:5868: brāhmaṇāṃś ca mahārāja nānādigbhyaḥ samāgatān // HV_App.I,23.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:5870: namaskṛtya hṛṣīkeśo vivāhāya mano dadhe // HV_App.I,23.29 //
GE07hv_apppu:5871: anujñātaś ca tai rājan dhautavāsāḥ svalaṃkṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5872: rukmiṇyāḥ keśavaḥ pāṇiṃ jagrāha vidhivat prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,23.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:5876: papāta puṣpavarṣaṃ ca vavau vāyuḥ sukhaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,23.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:5877: brāhmaṇebhyas tadā dattvā ratnāni ca janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5879: saṃyojya ca hṛṣīkeśo vāsāṃsi vividhāni ca // HV_App.I,23.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:5880: gajānāṃ ca śataṃ sāgraṃ sahasram ayutaṃ gavām /
GE07hv_apppu:5883: yad yac ca śobhanaṃ vastu dīyantām ratnasaṃjñitam /
GE07hv_apppu:5884: arcitāś cārthino rājan bhūyāsuś ca mahotsave // HV_App.I,23.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:5885: evam ājñāpya govindo rukmiṇyā saha yādavān /
GE07hv_apppu:5887: ugrasenaṃ ca rājendraṃ vṛddhān anyān sayādavān /
GE07hv_apppu:5888: te sarve cakrur aśrūṇi harṣajāni yadūttamāḥ // HV_App.I,23.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:5889: nirvṛtte tu tadā rājan vivāhe keśavasya ha /
GE07hv_apppu:5890: ye ye samāgatās tatra nṛpā viprāḥ samantataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5891: anubhūya vivāhaṃ tu jagmuḥ sarve yathāgatam // HV_App.I,23.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:5892: [h: HV (CE) Appendix 24, transliterated by Eva De Clercq; version of March
GE07hv_apppu:5894: [k: K Ñ2.3 V2 B Dn D1-5 S (T3 missing) ins. after adhy. 99, V1.3 Ds D6
GE07hv_apppu:5899: pradyumne dvārakāṃ prāpte hatvā taṃ kālaśambaram /
GE07hv_apppu:5901: yaṃ japtvā tu nṛpaśreṣṭha sāyaṃ prātaḥ śubhaṃ labhet // HV_App.I,24.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:5903: dharmakāmaiś ca munibhir ṛṣibhiś cāpi kīrtitam // HV_App.I,24.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:5905: mahadbhir munibhiś caiva ṛṣibhiś cāpi kīrtitam /
GE07hv_apppu:5911: kiṃcit stotraṃ mama brūhi yaj japtvā nirbhayo 'bhavam /
GE07hv_apppu:5914: ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni cchandāṃsy ātharvaṇāni ca /
GE07hv_apppu:5915: catvāraḥ sakalā vedāḥ saharasyāḥ savistarāḥ // HV_App.I,24.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:5916: purāṇam itihāsaṃ ca khilāny upakhilāni ca /
GE07hv_apppu:5917: aṅgāny upāṅgāni tathā savyākhyānāni pāntu mām // HV_App.I,24.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:5918: pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam /
GE07hv_apppu:5919: indriyāṇi mano buddhis tathā sattvaṃ rajas tamaḥ // HV_App.I,24.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:5920: vyānodānaḥ samānaś ca prāṇo 'pānaś ca pañcamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5921: vāyavaḥ sapta caivānye yeṣv āyattam idaṃ jagat // HV_App.I,24.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:5923: āvāhaḥ pravahaś caiva udvahaḥ saṃvahas tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:5925: [k: the first Pāda of this line has one syllable too many :k]
GE07hv_apppu:5926: marīcir aṅgirāś cātriḥ pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5927: bhṛgur vasiṣṭho bhagavān pāntu te māṃ maharṣayaḥ // HV_App.I,24.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:5928: kaśyapādyāś ca munayaś caturdaśa diśo daśa /
GE07hv_apppu:5929: naranārāyaṇau devau sagaṇau pāntu māṃ sadā // HV_App.I,24.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:5930: rudrāś caikādaśa proktā ādityā dvādaśaiva tu // HV_App.I,24.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:5931: aṣṭau ca vasavo devā aśvinau dvau prakīrtitau // HV_App.I,24.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:5932: hrīḥ śrīr lakṣmīḥ svadhā medhā tuṣṭiḥ puṣṭiḥ smṛtir dhṛtiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5933: aditir ditir danuś caiva siṃhikā daityamātaraḥ // HV_App.I,24.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:5934: [k: the first Pāda of this line has one syllable too many :k]
GE07hv_apppu:5936: ṛṣabhaḥ pāriyātraś ca vindhyo vaidūryaparvataḥ // HV_App.I,24.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:5939: śeṣaś ca vāsukiś caiva viśālākṣaś ca takṣakaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5942: tathā pūraṇakaś caiva nāgaś ca karavīrakaḥ // HV_App.I,24.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:5944: maṇināgaś ca bhagavāṃs triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ // HV_App.I,24.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:5946: ete cānye ca bahavo ye cānye nānukīrtitāḥ // HV_App.I,24.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:5948: samudrāḥ pāntu catvāro gaṅgā ca saritāṃ varā // HV_App.I,24.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:5950: irāvatī vipāśā ca śarayūr yamunā tathā // HV_App.I,24.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:5952: kauśikī devikā caiva puṇyā divyā dṛṣadvatī /
GE07hv_apppu:5953: kulmāṣī rathavāmā ca bāhudā ca hiraṇyadā /
GE07hv_apppu:5954: plakṣā cekṣumatī caiva tāpanī ca bṛhadrathā /
GE07hv_apppu:5955: khyātā carmaṇvatī caiva puṇyā caiva vadhūsarā // HV_App.I,24.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:5956: etāś cānyāś ca sarito yāś cānyā nānukīrtitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5958: veṇṇā godāvarī sītā kāverī kāñcanāvatī // HV_App.I,24.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:5961: nadī vaitaraṇī puṇyā vidarbhā narmadā śubhā /
GE07hv_apppu:5962: vitastā vai bhīmarathī elā caiva mahānadī /
GE07hv_apppu:5963: kālindī gomatī puṇyā nadaḥ śoṇaś ca viśrutaḥ // HV_App.I,24.49 //
GE07hv_apppu:5964: etāś cānyāś ca vai nadyo yāś cānyā nānukīrtitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5966: siprā carmaṇvatī puṇyā mahī sābhramatī tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:5967: sindhur vetravatī caiva bhojā ca vanamālikā // HV_App.I,24.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:5969: khyātā vetravatī caiva cāpadāsīti viśrutā // HV_App.I,24.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:5971: mitraghnī cendumālā ca tathā madhumatī nadī // HV_App.I,24.57 //
GE07hv_apppu:5972: umā gurunadī caiva tāpī ca vimalodakā /
GE07hv_apppu:5973: vimalā vimalodā ca mattagaṅgā payasvinī // HV_App.I,24.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:5974: etāś cānyāś ca vai nadyo yāś cānyā nānukīrtitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:5975: tā māṃ samabhiṣiñcantu paścimām āśritā diśam // HV_App.I,24.61 //
GE07hv_apppu:5976: [k: Ñ2 V1 B1.2 D2.3 T1 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:5978: sā tu dahatu me pāpaṃ kīrtitā śaṃbhunā dhṛtā /
GE07hv_apppu:5979: prabhāsaṃ ca prayāgaṃ ca naimiṣaṃ puṣkarāṇi ca /
GE07hv_apppu:5982: gaṅgādvāraṃ kanakhalaṃ somo vai yatra cotthitaḥ // HV_App.I,24.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:5989: magadheṣu tapodaś ca gaṅgodbhedaś ca viśrutaḥ // HV_App.I,24.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:5992: māṃ pāvayantu salilaiḥ kīrtitākīrtitāni ca // HV_App.I,24.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:5993: [k: Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. after line 73, Dn1 after line 74:k]
GE07hv_apppu:5994: sūkaraṃ yogamārgaṃ ca śvetadvīpaṃ tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:5998: taṃ śāpamocanaṃ tīrthaṃ punantv etāni kilbiṣāt /
GE07hv_apppu:6000: varuṇo 'ṃśo 'tha dhanado yamo niyama eva ca // HV_App.I,24.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:6001: kālo nayaḥ saṃnatiś ca krodho mohaḥ kṣamā dhṛtiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6009: āmodaś ca pramodaś ca praharṣaḥ śoka eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:6010: manyus tamas tapaḥ satyaṃ siddhir vṛddhiḥ śrutir dhṛtiḥ // HV_App.I,24.86
GE07hv_apppu:6011: rudrāṇī bhadrakālī ca bhadraṣaṣṭhā ca vāruṇī /
GE07hv_apppu:6012: bhāsī ca kālikā caiva śāṇḍilī ceti viśrutāḥ // HV_App.I,24.88 //
GE07hv_apppu:6013: āryā kuhūḥ sinīvālī bhīmā citravatī ratiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6014: ekānaṃśā ca kūṣmāṇḍī devī kātyāyanī ca yā // HV_App.I,24.90 //
GE07hv_apppu:6015: lohityāyanamātā ca devakanyāś ca yāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6016: gonandā devapatnī ca māṃ rakṣantu sabāndhavam // HV_App.I,24.92 //
GE07hv_apppu:6026: piṅgākṣyaḥ piṅgakeśyaś ca tato 'nyā lūnamūrdhajāḥ // HV_App.I,24.102 //
GE07hv_apppu:6036: mātaro mātṛvat putraṃ rakṣantu mama nityaśaḥ // HV_App.I,24.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:6038: kumāraskandajāś caiva jvarā vai vaiṣṇavādayaḥ // HV_App.I,24.114 //
GE07hv_apppu:6056: nirmāṃsās tālajaṅghāś ca vyāditāsyā bhayaṃkarāḥ // HV_App.I,24.132 //
GE07hv_apppu:6059: ete grahāś ca satataṃ rakṣantu mama sarvataḥ // HV_App.I,24.135 //
GE07hv_apppu:6061: māheśvaro vaiṣṇavaś ca jvarau lokabhayāvahau // HV_App.I,24.137 //
GE07hv_apppu:6063: devaś ca vāmadevaś ca ghaṇṭākarṇaḥ karaṃdhamaḥ // HV_App.I,24.139 //
GE07hv_apppu:6069: kūṣmāṇḍaḥ kumbhamūrdhā ca rocano vaikṛto grahaḥ // HV_App.I,24.145 //
GE07hv_apppu:6070: aniketaḥ surārighnaḥ śivaś cāśiva eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:6071: kṣemakaḥ piśitāśī ca surārir harilocanaḥ // HV_App.I,24.147 //
GE07hv_apppu:6077: pārvatyā roṣasaṃbhūtāḥ sahasrāṇi śatāni ca // HV_App.I,24.153 //
GE07hv_apppu:6081: teṣāṃ gaṇānāṃ patayaḥ sagaṇāḥ pāntu māṃ sadā // HV_App.I,24.157 //
GE07hv_apppu:6083: pitaraḥ kāraṇaṃ kāryam ādhayo vyādhayas tathā // HV_App.I,24.159 //
GE07hv_apppu:6085: kṛṣṇātreyaś ca bhagavān asito devalo 'malaḥ // HV_App.I,24.161 //
GE07hv_apppu:6087: dvaipāyano vidarbhaś ca jaiminir māṭharaḥ kaṭhaḥ // HV_App.I,24.163 //
GE07hv_apppu:6088: viśvāmitro vasiṣṭhaś ca lomaśaś ca mahān ṛṣiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6089: uttaṅkaś caiva raibhyaś ca paulomaś ca dvitas tritaḥ // HV_App.I,24.165 //
GE07hv_apppu:6091: sārasvato yavakrītaḥ kuśiko gautamas tathā // HV_App.I,24.167 //
GE07hv_apppu:6092: [k: T4 M1-3 ins. after line 167, K2 after line 166 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:6095: ṛcīko jamadagniś ca tathaurvas tapasāṃ nidhiḥ // HV_App.I,24.169 //
GE07hv_apppu:6097: bṛhadagnir hariśmaśrur vijayaḥ kaṇva eva ca // HV_App.I,24.171 //
GE07hv_apppu:6098: [k: G5 ins. after line 171, T1.2 G1.3 after the repetition of line 165:k]
GE07hv_apppu:6100: vaitaṇḍī dīrghatapāś caiva vedaś cāthāṃśumāñ śivaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6101: [k: The first Pāda of this line has one syllable too many. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:6104: aṣṭāvakro dadhītiś ca śvetaketus tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,24.173 //
GE07hv_apppu:6106: agniveśyaḥ śamīkaś ca pramucur mumucus tathā // HV_App.I,24.175 //
GE07hv_apppu:6107: ete cānye ca bahavo ṛṣayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6109: ṛjavaḥ ślāghinaḥ śāntāḥ śāntiṃ kurvantu me sadā // HV_App.I,24.178 //
GE07hv_apppu:6110: trayo 'gnayas trayo vedās traividyaṃ kaustubho maṇiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6111: uccaiḥśravā hayaḥ śrīmān vaidyo dhanvaṃtarir hariḥ // HV_App.I,24.180 //
GE07hv_apppu:6112: amṛtaṃ gauḥ suvarṇaṃ ca dadhigaurāś ca sarṣapāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6113: śuklāḥ samanasaḥ kanyāḥ śvetacchatraṃ yavākṣatāḥ // HV_App.I,24.182 //
GE07hv_apppu:6114: dūrvā hiraṇyaṃ gandhāś ca vālavyajanam eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:6115: tathāpratihataṃ cakraṃ mahokṣaś candanaṃ viṣam // HV_App.I,24.184 //
GE07hv_apppu:6116: śveto vṛṣaḥ karī mattaḥ siṃho vyāghro hayaḥ śarāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6117: pṛthivī coddhṛtā lājā brāhmaṇā madhupāyasam // HV_App.I,24.186 //
GE07hv_apppu:6119: śrīphalaṃ gomayaṃ matsyā duṃdubhiḥ paṭahasvanaḥ // HV_App.I,24.188 //
GE07hv_apppu:6120: ṛṣipatnyaś ca kanyāś ca śrīmad bhadrāsanaṃ dhanuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6121: rocanā rucakaś caiva nadīnāṃ saṃgamodakam // HV_App.I,24.190 //
GE07hv_apppu:6125: puṇyaṃ vai vigatakleśaṃ śrīmad vai maṅgalānvitam /
GE07hv_apppu:6127: yaś cedaṃ śrāvayed vidvān yaś caivaṃ śṛṇuyān naraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6128: maṅgalāṣṭaśataṃ snāto japet parvaṇi parvaṇi // HV_App.I,24.197 //
GE07hv_apppu:6130: na ca prāpnoti vaikalyaṃ paratreha ca nandati // HV_App.I,24.199 //
GE07hv_apppu:6131: dhanyaṃ yaśasyām āyuṣyaṃ pavitraṃ vedasaṃmitam // HV_App.I,24.200 //
GE07hv_apppu:6132: śrīmat svargyaṃ sadā puṇyam apatyajananaṃ śivam // HV_App.I,24.201 //
GE07hv_apppu:6136: sarvapāpaviśuddhātmā gatiṃ ca labhate parām // HV_App.I,24.205 //
GE07hv_apppu:6138: [h: HV (CE) Appendix 25 transliterated by Eva De Clercq; version of March
GE07hv_apppu:6142: sa jātu vismayaṃ kurvan diśāṃ dānavasattamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6144: devalokaṃ jagāmāśu kurvan siṃhadhvaniṃ muhuḥ // HV_App.I,25.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:6145: indrasya sadanaṃ gatvā kavāṭaṃ ghaṭṭayan danuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6146: yudhyatām iti hovāca jayo vā pratidīyatām // HV_App.I,25.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:6147: tac chrutvā devarājo 'pi devaiḥ sarvaiḥ samanvitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6148: airāvataṃ samāruhya devasainyaiś ca pālitaḥ // HV_App.I,25.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:6151: airāvataṃ samāsthāya tasthau tatra śacīpatiḥ // HV_App.I,25.11 //
GE07hv_apppu:6153: devaiḥ śakrasahāyaiś ca nighnatām itaretaram // HV_App.I,25.13 //
GE07hv_apppu:6156: nijaghnuḥ samare tatra khaṅgaiḥ prāsaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ // HV_App.I,25.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:6157: siṃhanādaṃ mahac cakrur daityā yudhi mahābalāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6158: devān babādhire te tu pratyakṣaṃ ca śacīpateḥ // HV_App.I,25.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:6160: śakreṇa vāritāś cāpi sthātuṃ śaktā na devatāḥ // HV_App.I,25.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:6161: tāṃs tu vidrāvitān dṛṣṭvā vṛtrahā balasūdanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6162: sthātavyam iti hovāca nirjarān sa mahāprabhuḥ // HV_App.I,25.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:6164: tataḥ śarasahasrāṇi mumoca yudhi vāsavaḥ // HV_App.I,25.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:6166: yakṣaiś ca guhyakaiś caiva saha vaiśravaṇas tathā // HV_App.I,25.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:6167: varuṇo yādasāṃ rājā vāruṇaiś ca samanvitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6168: nāgaiś ca śatasāhasrair anuyāto digīśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,25.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:6170: yayau yoddhuṃ mahārāja narakaṃ dānavottamam // HV_App.I,25.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:6171: taiḥ sārdhaṃ devarājo 'pi yuddhaṃ cakre mahāmatiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6172: narako 'pi mahārāja yuddhaṃ cakre sudāruṇam // HV_App.I,25.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:6173: hayagrīvo nisumbhaś ca muraś ca ripumardanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6174: cakrur yuddhaṃ mahāghoraṃ narakeṇa saha prabho // HV_App.I,25.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:6175: lokapālā mahārāja saṃsaktā yoddhum īhate // HV_App.I,25.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:6177: cakre yuddhaṃ mahāghoraṃ yathā vṛtravadhe purā // HV_App.I,25.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:6179: muro 'pi rājan vikrānto rājarājena saṃgataḥ // HV_App.I,25.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:6181: te ca devā mahārāja dānavaiḥ saha saṃgatāḥ // HV_App.I,25.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:6185: jaghāna niśitair bāṇair marmabhedibhir āśugaiḥ // HV_App.I,25.45 //
GE07hv_apppu:6187: paraḥśataiḥ śarāṇāṃ tu vivyādha yudhi dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,25.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:6188: śarāṇāṃ ca sahasrāṇi tatra devapatī raṇe /
GE07hv_apppu:6189: mumoca yudhi pāśeśas tam asyantaṃ śitāñ śarān // HV_App.I,25.49 //
GE07hv_apppu:6193: visṛjya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ pāśam ādāya pāśabhṛt /
GE07hv_apppu:6194: samājaghne sa pāśena hayagrīvaṃ mahābalam // HV_App.I,25.54 //
GE07hv_apppu:6195: tam āpatantaṃ vegena pāśaṃ jagrāha dānavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6196: tenaiva taṃ samājaghne varuṇaṃ yādasāṃ patim /
GE07hv_apppu:6197: sa tu pāśo 'tra nirvīryaḥ svāminaṃ na babādha ha // HV_App.I,25.57 //
GE07hv_apppu:6198: tataḥ kruddho hayagrīvo varuṇaṃ yādasāṃ patim /
GE07hv_apppu:6199: jaghāna gadayā rājan mūrdhni deśe mahābalam // HV_App.I,25.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:6200: sa tenābhihato mūrdhni vamañ soṇitam ulbaṇam /
GE07hv_apppu:6202: vāruṇais taiḥ samāyuktoḥ nirjito dānavottamaiḥ // HV_App.I,25.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:6205: jaghāna dānavaṃ saṃkhye paśyatas tu śacīpateḥ // HV_App.I,25.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:6206: nisumbho roṣatāmrākṣo dhanuś ciccheda tasya tat // HV_App.I,25.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:6207: utsṛjya dhanuratnaṃ ca daṇḍam udyamya dānavam /
GE07hv_apppu:6208: dhāvati sma yamo rājan hantukāmo mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,25.68 //
GE07hv_apppu:6209: utsṛjya tu mahārāja dānavo dhanur uttamam /
GE07hv_apppu:6210: ādāya niśitaṃ khaṅgaṃ prāyāt pretapatiṃ tadā // HV_App.I,25.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:6212: purā devāsure yuddhe balivāsavayor iva // HV_App.I,25.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:6216: khaṅgena prāharat taṃ tu yamaṃ vaivasvataṃ yudhi // HV_App.I,25.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:6219: jagāmāśu puraṃ yuddhād bhīto dānavasattamāt // HV_App.I,25.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:6222: muraṃ tu mauravaiḥ sārdhaṃ samājaghne paraḥśataiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6225: jaghāna rājarājaṃ tu śaraiḥ suniśitair api /
GE07hv_apppu:6226: vidhvā tu rājarājaṃ taṃ guhyakāṃś ca samāhanat // HV_App.I,25.86 //
GE07hv_apppu:6227: khaḍgaiḥ pāśaiḥ samājaghne yakṣān devaripus tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:6228: yakṣāś ca guhyakāś caiva bhītā dudruvur āhavāt /
GE07hv_apppu:6231: śarair āśīviṣākārair vivyādha yudhi dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,25.91 //
GE07hv_apppu:6234: sa cāpy ārto viṣaṇṇaś ca nirjagāma raṇājirāt // HV_App.I,25.94 //
GE07hv_apppu:6235: te ca yakṣās tadā rājan guhyakāś ca samantataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6236: alakāṃ ca samājagmur bhītā yuddhaparāṅmukhāḥ // HV_App.I,25.96 //
GE07hv_apppu:6237: yamo 'tha varuṇaś caiva kuberaś ca mahāmatiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6238: nirjitā dānavendreṇa svaṃ svaṃ nagaram āyayuḥ // HV_App.I,25.98 //
GE07hv_apppu:6239: devāś ca nirjitāḥ sarve dānavair nagasaṃnibhaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6240: diśo daśa drutāḥ sarve bhītā vṛttavilocanāḥ // HV_App.I,25.100 //
GE07hv_apppu:6244: āruhyairāvataṃ nāgaṃ prāṃśuṃ śaśinibhaṃ tadā // HV_App.I,25.102 //
GE07hv_apppu:6245: māhendram atha cāpaṃ ca sajyaṃ kṛtvā sudāruṇam /
GE07hv_apppu:6246: cakre yuddhaṃ mahāghoraṃ narakeṇa durātmanā // HV_App.I,25.104 //
GE07hv_apppu:6248: nanāda vividhaṃ nādaṃ siṃho gajapatiṃ yathā // HV_App.I,25.106 //
GE07hv_apppu:6249: āgaccheti tadovāca jyāghoṣaṃ ca cakāra saḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6250: tayoḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ yathā vṛtravadhe purā // HV_App.I,25.108 //
GE07hv_apppu:6252: ākarṇapūrṇaṃ saṃdhāya jaghne vṛtraripuṃ punaḥ // HV_App.I,25.110 //
GE07hv_apppu:6254: susrāva rudhiraṃ śakro gatasaṃjñas tadābhavat // HV_App.I,25.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:6255: samāśvastas tadā śakraḥ śarair vivyādha cāṣṭabhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6256: rathaṃ vivyādha saptatyā sārathiṃ navabhiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,25.114 //
GE07hv_apppu:6257: kṣurapreṇa tadā rājan dhvajaṃ ciccheda cottamam /
GE07hv_apppu:6258: sārathiṃ prāhiṇot tasya yamāya niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,25.116 //
GE07hv_apppu:6259: jaghānāśvāṃś caturbhis tu bāṇaiḥ suniśitair api /
GE07hv_apppu:6260: dhanuś ciccheda bhallena narakasya durātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,25.118 //
GE07hv_apppu:6264: vyāvidhya tu punar daityo devarājasya vakṣasi /
GE07hv_apppu:6267: utsṛjyairāvataṃ nāgaṃ gacchati sma tadārtavat // HV_App.I,25.125 //
GE07hv_apppu:6268: nāgaṃ taṃ pothayām āsa kumbhadeśe sa dānavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6269: sa ca nāgo mahārāja prādravac ca bhayāt tadā // HV_App.I,25.127 //
GE07hv_apppu:6271: nanāda vividhān nādān rodasī ca vinādayan // HV_App.I,25.129 //
GE07hv_apppu:6273: jayam āghoṣayām āsa narako dānavottamaḥ // HV_App.I,25.131 //
GE07hv_apppu:6274: amarāvatīṃ tadā daityaḥ praviśya ca mahāsuraiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6275: [k: the first Pada of this line has one syllable too many :k]
GE07hv_apppu:6276: urvaśīṃ ca samāhūya vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // HV_App.I,25.133 //
GE07hv_apppu:6277: bhaja mām iha vāmoru nirjitaḥ śakra āhave /
GE07hv_apppu:6278: aham indro yamo rājā varuṇo yādasāṃ patiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6279: aham eva sadā bhadre rājarājo 'smi suprabhe // HV_App.I,25.136 //
GE07hv_apppu:6281: ṛṣayo yadi te rājan yakṣyanti kratubhiḥ sadā /
GE07hv_apppu:6282: tadā bhajāmi daityendra nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // HV_App.I,25.138 //
GE07hv_apppu:6283: evam uktas tadā daityo bāḍham ity abravīd vacaḥ // HV_App.I,25.139 //
GE07hv_apppu:6287: jagāma daityarājas tu yatheṣṭaṃ dānavaiḥ saha // HV_App.I,25.143 //
GE07hv_apppu:6288: [h: HV (CE) Appendix 26, transliterated by Eva De Clercq; version of June
GE07hv_apppu:6290: [k: After the addl. colophon of 91.21, D6 S (except G2) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:6294: babādhe mānuṣān sarvān ṛṣīn viprāṃś ca dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,26.3 //
GE07hv_apppu:6295: rakṣaty eva jagannāthe viprān munigaṇāṃs tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:6296: bādhate sma tadā daityo viprān munigaṇāṃś ca saḥ // HV_App.I,26.5 //
GE07hv_apppu:6298: badaryāṃ hi mahārāja yaṣṭuṃ munigaṇāṃs tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:6299: satreṇa śakraṃ deveśaṃ tathā devagaṇān api // HV_App.I,26.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:6300: dṛṣṭvā tān munivīrāṃs tu narako dānavottamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6301: provāca vacanaṃ kāle yaṣṭavyo 'smi munīśvarāḥ // HV_App.I,26.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:6303: jitaḥ śakro raṇe viprā lokapālaiḥ sahāmaraiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6304: tata ijyo namaskāryo vandyo lokahitāya vai // HV_App.I,26.13 //
GE07hv_apppu:6305: tad etad vacanaṃ śrutvā narakasya durātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6306: āhus te munayaḥ sarve badarīvāsatatparāḥ // HV_App.I,26.15 //
GE07hv_apppu:6307: yakṣyāmo na vayaṃ daitya dānavo 'si durātmavān /
GE07hv_apppu:6308: indraṃ devagaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ yakṣyāmo vigatajvarāḥ // HV_App.I,26.17 //
GE07hv_apppu:6309: tac chrutvā roṣatāmrākṣo dānavān idam abravīt /
GE07hv_apppu:6310: vadhyantām ṛṣayaḥ sarve bhidyantāṃ yajñabhūmayaḥ // HV_App.I,26.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:6311: na tvāṃ yakṣyāma he daitya ity ūcuḥ kila tāpasāḥ // HV_App.I,26.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:6312: te ca sarvaṃ tathā cakrur dānavā duṣṭacetasaḥ // HV_App.I,26.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:6314: agnīn saṃmiśrayām āsur dadahur darbhapuñjakān // HV_App.I,26.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:6316: prakṣipya dānavāḥ sarve narakeṇa samanvitāḥ // HV_App.I,26.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:6317: yajñavāṭaṃ samāloḍya cakrur bhasma tadā nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:6318: tāvat tāni havīṃṣy atra bhakṣayām āsur ojasā /
GE07hv_apppu:6320: teṣv eva cāgnimukhyeṣu dagdhvā te dānavottamāḥ // HV_App.I,26.29 //
GE07hv_apppu:6321: evaṃ te dānavāḥ sarve cakrur vighnakriyāṃ tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:6322: te ca sarve munivarāḥ palāyanti diśo daśa // HV_App.I,26.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:6323: tatra yā munikanyās tu jahāra narakas tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:6324: prāgjyotiṣaṃ jagāmāśu kanyābhis tābhir eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:6325: yatheṣṭaṃ mumude tatra priyābhiḥ saha dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,26.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:6329: tasminn evāśrame ramye mantrayitvā parasparam // HV_App.I,26.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:6331: nivedayāmaḥ pāpasya dānavasya kṛtaṃ punaḥ // HV_App.I,26.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:6334: yadi sa pratikuryādd hi tan naḥ śreyo bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,26.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:6335: yadi jīved asau pāpo narako dānavottamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6336: jagan na sthāsyate samyag vinaṣṭaś ca bhavej janaḥ // HV_App.I,26.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:6339: gṛhītvā munayaḥ sarve śiṣyair dhamanisaṃtatāḥ // HV_App.I,26.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:6342: te gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ mārgam āsthitāḥ // HV_App.I,26.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:6343: vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca jābālir atha kāśyapaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6344: kaṇvo dhūmro bṛhaddurgo bharadvājaś ca gālavah /
GE07hv_apppu:6345: kavaṣo dhūmraketuś ca kāśyaḥ kāpilakas tathā // HV_App.I,26.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:6346: ete cānye ca munayo narakeṇa durātmanā /
GE07hv_apppu:6350: gaṅgāṃ ca samanuprāpya sthitās tasyās taṭe taḍā /
GE07hv_apppu:6352: atra snātvā vayaṃ yāmo draṣṭuṃ lokahitaiṣiṇaṃ /
GE07hv_apppu:6354: iti saṃcintya munayaḥ snānaṃ cakrur yathāvidhi /
GE07hv_apppu:6355: yena yogyā munivarā draṣṭuṃ keśavam avyayam /
GE07hv_apppu:6356: tasmin gaṅgāmbhasi snātvā sarve śuddhās tapodhanāḥ // HV_App.I,26.61 //
GE07hv_apppu:6357: avatīrya tato gaṅgāṃ naubhir munivarās tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:6359: praviśya dvārakāṃ te tu vasiṣṭhādyā munīśvarāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6361: yā sabhā lokavikhyātā sudharmeti ca viśrutā /
GE07hv_apppu:6362: tasyā dvāraṃ samāsthāya dvāḥsthaṃ procur maharṣayaḥ // HV_App.I,26.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:6365: draṣṭuṃ tvāṃ samanuprāptā pīḍitā dānavottamaiḥ // HV_App.I,26.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:6367: nivedayām āsa tadā yad uktaṃ munisattamaiḥ // HV_App.I,26.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:6369: praveśyantām iti proktāḥ pradyumnaṃ samacodayat // HV_App.I,26.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:6370: arghyaṃ pādyaṃ tadā pātram āsanāni samantataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6371: ānīyantāṃ yathāyogaṃ sa ca sarvaṃ cakāra ha // HV_App.I,26.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:6372: te praviṣṭā munivarās tāṃ sabhāṃ sabhyapūjitām // HV_App.I,26.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:6373: [h: HV (CE) Appendix 27 transliterated by Eva De Clercq; version of June
GE07hv_apppu:6376: tāṃ sabhāṃ viviśur hṛṣṭāḥ saśiṣyā munisattamāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6378: namaskṛtya munīn sarvān āsanānīty avocata // HV_App.I,27.3 //
GE07hv_apppu:6380: arghyaṃ ca tebhyaḥ pradadau pādyam ācamanaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,27.5 //
GE07hv_apppu:6381: utsṛjya gāṃ jagannātho madhuparkaṃ dadau punaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6382: andhakā vṛṣṇayaś caiva praṇāmaṃ cakrire munīn // HV_App.I,27.7 //
GE07hv_apppu:6383: tair apy anumatāḥ sarve yādavā munisattamaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6384: svaṃ svaṃ hi bhejire te tu āsanaṃ lokaviśrutāḥ // HV_App.I,27.9 //
GE07hv_apppu:6385: [k: The counter for line 10 is wrongly printed after line 9; thus, the automatically inserted line counter differs from the printed one for the
GE07hv_apppu:6387: keśavo 'pi mahārāja svaṃ sthānaṃ samavāpa ha // HV_App.I,27.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:6391: uvāca vacanaṃ kāle sopaskaram idaṃ hariḥ // HV_App.I,27.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:6393: yuṣmadāgamanaṃ mahyaṃ prīṇāti satataṃ bhṛśam // HV_App.I,27.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:6394: yādavāś ca parāṃ prītim āsthitā munisattamāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6395: yuṣmadāgamanād viprāḥ kim u vaktavyam atra ha // HV_App.I,27.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:6396: kulaṃ pūtaṃ sadā viprā yasmin viprāḥ samāgatāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6397: yuṣmadāgamanapraśno na yukto vaktum atra naḥ // HV_App.I,27.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:6400: tasmād viprā yathātattvaṃ vaktavyaṃ kāraṇaṃ tadā // HV_App.I,27.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:6401: evaṃ pṛṣṭās tadā viprāḥ keśavena mahātmanā /
GE07hv_apppu:6402: ūcuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve keśavaṃ keśisūdanam // HV_App.I,27.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:6403: śṛṇu deva jagannātha kāraṇaṃ kāraṇātmaka // HV_App.I,27.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:6405: bādhate no jagannātha dānavair dānavādhamaḥ // HV_App.I,27.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:6406: jaghnus te dānavā deva hutaṃ hotavyam eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:6407: abhakṣayanta te deva yajñabhāṇḍān sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,27.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:6408: idaṃ covāca duṣṭātmā ijyo 'smīti ca mādhava /
GE07hv_apppu:6411: na kvacic charma deveśa lapsyāmo yadi jīvati // HV_App.I,27.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:6412: tasmin duṣṭe jagannātha dhig gatā nirayaṃ vayam /
GE07hv_apppu:6413: jahi taṃ devadeveśa dānavaṃ duṣṭacetasam // HV_App.I,27.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:6414: rakṣa naḥ sakalān hatvā dānavān duṣṭapauruṣān // HV_App.I,27.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:6416: rakṣā hi tvayi govinda sthitā nityaṃ jagatpate // HV_App.I,27.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:6417: kṣātraṃ vṛttaṃ samāsthāya dvāravatyāṃ vasan hare /
GE07hv_apppu:6418: nigṛhya duṣṭān rakṣasva sādhūn sādhupriyo hy asi /
GE07hv_apppu:6419: ārtā vayaṃ jagannātha hatās tena durātmanā // HV_App.I,27.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:6420: iyaṃ ca bhavate deva nītā hy asmābhir acyuta /
GE07hv_apppu:6421: badarīsaṃhatir deva pūrvabhuktā tvayā vibho // HV_App.I,27.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:6422: ity uktvā munayas te tu daduḥ sarvaṃ jagatpateḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6424: yajñabhārān mahārāja darśayām āsur añjasā // HV_App.I,27.45 //
GE07hv_apppu:6426: kaṣṭaṃ kaṣṭaṃ mahaj jātam ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām /
GE07hv_apppu:6427: iti matvā jagannātho nottaraṃ pratyapadyata // HV_App.I,27.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:6428: cintāviṣṭe jagannāthe rakṣam ātmani cintite // HV_App.I,27.49 //
GE07hv_apppu:6430: arthyābhir vāgbhir iṣṭābhir īśvaraṃ praṇatās tadā // HV_App.I,27.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:6446: prabodham āyāti kathaṃ nu lokaḥ || HV_App.I,27.67 ||
GE07hv_apppu:6451: kathaṃ vayaṃ vettum alaṃ jagatpate @ HV_App.I,27.72 @
GE07hv_apppu:6454: jñātuṃ vayaṃ deva yatāmahe guro || HV_App.I,27.75 ||
GE07hv_apppu:6457: sthūlaṃ tu nityaṃ jagatāṃ nivāsa @ HV_App.I,27.78 @
GE07hv_apppu:6459: tam eva nityaṃ janakādayas te @ HV_App.I,27.80 @
GE07hv_apppu:6463: natāḥ sma nityaṃ jagatāṃ nivāsa @ HV_App.I,27.84 @
GE07hv_apppu:6467: namas tubhyaṃ namas tubhyaṃ deva deva hare hare /
GE07hv_apppu:6469: yat padaṃ paramaṃ nityaṃ tava viṣṇo hare param /
GE07hv_apppu:6470: taṃ namāma jagannātha yat tu paśyanti yoginaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6471: namo namo hare viṣṇo namo mādhava keśava // HV_App.I,27.92 //
GE07hv_apppu:6472: yat tu paśyanti satataṃ yogino yatacetasaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6473: yat prāpya na nivartante tan namāma padaṃ tava // HV_App.I,27.94 //
GE07hv_apppu:6474: yā māyā tava govinda durjñeyā yogacintakaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6475: tāṃ natāḥ sma jagannātha yām āśritya sthitiṃ sthitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6476: yā rakṣati jagadviṣṇo tāṃ namāma hare sadā // HV_App.I,27.97 //
GE07hv_apppu:6477: ṛgyajuś ca tathā sāma yaṃ stauti satataṃ hare /
GE07hv_apppu:6480: dvābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ tribhiś caiva pañcabhiś ca janārdana // HV_App.I,27.99
GE07hv_apppu:6481: punaś caiva jagannātha dvābhyāṃ stauti jagadpate /
GE07hv_apppu:6482: taṃ tvāṃ natāḥ sma deveśa ṛgyajuḥsāmarūpiṇam // HV_App.I,27.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:6484: makāro 'si tathā viṣṇo namas te praṇavātmaka // HV_App.I,27.103 //
GE07hv_apppu:6485: udgīthāya namo nityaṃ namo hotre janārdana /
GE07hv_apppu:6486: adhvaryave namas tubhyaṃ yaṣṭṛrūpāya te namaḥ // HV_App.I,27.105 //
GE07hv_apppu:6488: jagat sarvaṃ tvam evāsi jagac ca tvayi tiṣṭhati // HV_App.I,27.107 //
GE07hv_apppu:6489: saṃhartā cāsi jagatāṃ tathā pātā jagatpate /
GE07hv_apppu:6490: sraṣṭāsi ca tathā deva sthitau sthitimatāṃ vara // HV_App.I,27.109 //
GE07hv_apppu:6492: vāsudeveśa bho viṣṇo tvayi sṛṣṭiṃ jagatpate /
GE07hv_apppu:6495: namaḥ sarvātmane tubhyaṃ bhūyo bhūyo namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,27.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:6496: evaṃ stutvā jagannāthaṃ praṇāmaṃ cakrire hareḥ // HV_App.I,27.113 //
GE07hv_apppu:6498: utthāya cāsanāt sarve praṇāmaṃ cakrire hareḥ // HV_App.I,27.115 //
GE07hv_apppu:6500: so 'yam eṣa jagannāthaḥ pāti no 'smin vasan sadā /
GE07hv_apppu:6501: āśrityainaṃ sukhaṃ sarve vatsyāmo yādavīṃ purīm // HV_App.I,27.118 //
GE07hv_apppu:6502: iti matvā tadā sarve yādavāḥ kṛṣṇam avyayam // HV_App.I,27.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:6503: vavandire mahābhāgāḥ stutaṃ munibhir avyayam // HV_App.I,27.120 //
GE07hv_apppu:6509: pratijñām akarot tebhyo munibhyo yadusaṃsadi // HV_App.I,27.124 //
GE07hv_apppu:6511: niṣkaṇṭakam imaṃ lokaṃ kariṣyāmi munīśvarāḥ // HV_App.I,27.126 //
GE07hv_apppu:6512: sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva sukhaṃ svapsyati māciram /
GE07hv_apppu:6513: cakreṇa niśitenaiva śiraś chetsyāmi dānavam // HV_App.I,27.128 //
GE07hv_apppu:6514: muraṃ ca dānavaṃ viprā hatagrīvaṃ ca dānavam /
GE07hv_apppu:6516: ārabhyantāṃ kriyāḥ sarvāḥ kiṃ vilambatha māciram // HV_App.I,27.131 //
GE07hv_apppu:6518: munayaś ca tadā deve pratijñāte tu keśave /
GE07hv_apppu:6519: āśīrvādāṃs tadā viprā dadus tasmai mahātmane // HV_App.I,27.134 //
GE07hv_apppu:6522: svasti te 'stu gamiṣyāmo badarīṃ tava śobhanām // HV_App.I,27.137 //
GE07hv_apppu:6523: ity uktvā munayaḥ sarve praṇipatya ca keśavam /
GE07hv_apppu:6524: jagmuḥ śiṣyair mahārāja badarīṃ tāṃ tapodhanāḥ // HV_App.I,27.139 //
GE07hv_apppu:6526: vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā yathāyogam upāsate // HV_App.I,27.141 //
GE07hv_apppu:6527: [h: HV (CE) Appendix 28, transliterated by Eva De Clercq; version of June
GE07hv_apppu:6529: [k: D6 S ins. after 91.52, D3 after 91.52cd :k]
GE07hv_apppu:6532: dhanur ādāya visphārya nādena mahatā tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:6533: nādayan rodasī yāyād yuddhāya narako balī // HV_App.I,28.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:6534: keśavaṃ purato dṛṣṭvā gadinaṃ śārṅgiṇaṃ tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:6535: uvāca narako daityaḥ ko bhavān kim ihāgataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6536: daityendro narakaḥ praṣṭā jetā śakrasya saṃyuge // HV_App.I,28.7 //
GE07hv_apppu:6537: ko 'yaṃ pakṣī sthitaḥ pārśve kaiṣā te vada sāṃpratam /
GE07hv_apppu:6538: enāṃ grahītum icchāmi jānīyāṃ yadi sāṃpratam // HV_App.I,28.9 //
GE07hv_apppu:6539: evam ukto jagannāthaḥ prahasya suciraṃ tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:6540: ālokya satyabhāmāṃ tu vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // HV_App.I,28.11 //
GE07hv_apppu:6541: vāsudevo 'smi daityendra yadi te śrutim āgataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6542: eṣā satrājitaḥ putrī bhāryā mama yavīyasī // HV_App.I,28.13 //
GE07hv_apppu:6543: eṣa tārkṣyo garutmāṃs tu vāhanaṃ mama daityapa /
GE07hv_apppu:6544: tvāṃ hantum iha saṃprāpto vadāmi kim ataḥ param // HV_App.I,28.15 //
GE07hv_apppu:6545: śrutvaitad dānavo ghoro vihasya suciraṃ tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:6546: vāsudevo 'si saṃprāpto māṃ hantuṃ kila yādava // HV_App.I,28.17 //
GE07hv_apppu:6547: diṣṭyā saṃprāptavān adya cintanīyaḥ sadā mayā /
GE07hv_apppu:6548: kadāsau dṛśyate yuddhe haniṣyāmīti me matiḥ // HV_App.I,28.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:6549: kṣaṇaṃ tiṣṭha yaduśreṣṭha kuru yuddhaṃ yadīcchasi /
GE07hv_apppu:6550: hatvā tvām adya saṃprāptam ānayāmi puraṃ mama // HV_App.I,28.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:6555: [h: HV (CE) Appendix 28A transliterated by Eva De Clercq; version of June
GE07hv_apppu:6557: [k: D3.6 T G1.3-5 M4 G(ed.) ins. after 91.55, M1-3 after 91.53 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:6560: garuḍaṃ pothayām āsa śarāṇāṃ ca paraḥśataiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6563: iti saṃcintya manasā śarair vivyādha pañcabhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6564: aṣṭābhir dānavaṃ viṣṇur navabhiś ca śitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,28A.7 //
GE07hv_apppu:6565: dānavo 'pi mahārāja vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,28A.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:6568: dānavo 'pi jagannāthaṃ śarair vivyādha saptabhiḥ // HV_App.I,28A.11 //
GE07hv_apppu:6569: tau tu yuddhaṃ mahāghoraṃ cakratur yuddhalālasau /
GE07hv_apppu:6571: yathā yuddhaṃ mahāghoraṃ rāmarāvaṇayor bhuvi // HV_App.I,28A.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:6573: dhvajaṃ vivyādha rājendra narakasya durātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,28A.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:6574: tam antare sarai rājan vivyādha yudhi dānavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6577: vivyādha garuḍaṃ rājan nārācena mahāmatiḥ // HV_App.I,28A.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:6580: pakṣe samāhataḥ pakṣī cacāla ca punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,28A.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:6582: pakṣeṇa pakṣiṇāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ pothayām āsa dānavam // HV_App.I,28A.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:6584: tataś cacāla narako narakeṇeva kilbiṣī // HV_App.I,28A.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:6585: tataḥ sajyaṃ dhanuḥ kṛtvā vyāvidhya ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6587: ākarṇapūrṇam ākṛṣya jaghāna harim īśvaram // HV_App.I,28A.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:6588: nārācaḥ sa ca rājendra lalāṭe prāpatat tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:6589: cacāla ca jagannāthas totrārdita iva dvipaḥ // HV_App.I,28A.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:6590: visaṃjñaś ca tato bhūtvā rathopastha upāviśat // HV_App.I,28A.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:6591: satyabhāmā ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā vāsudevaṃ tathāgatam /
GE07hv_apppu:6592: cāmarair vījayām āsa pakṣābhyāṃ pakṣipuṃgavaḥ // HV_App.I,28A.33 //
GE07hv_apppu:6593: āśvasto 'tha hṛṣīkeśaḥ saṃjñāṃ prāpya ca keśavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6594: dhanus tasyai tato dattvā śārṅgaṃ bhārasahaṃ raṇe /
GE07hv_apppu:6595: yudhyasva narakaṃ devi śrānto 'smi yudhi pīḍitaḥ // HV_App.I,28A.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:6596: evam uktā tadā devī satyā satyavatāṃ varā /
GE07hv_apppu:6597: tadā yuddhaṃ samārebhe narakeṇa durātmanā // HV_App.I,28A.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:6598: nārācair ardhacandraiś ca bhallaiḥ suniśitair api /
GE07hv_apppu:6600: babādha dānavaṃ satyā satyaṃ satyetaraṃ yathā // HV_App.I,28A.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:6601: yudhyantīṃ tāṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā narako dānavottamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6603: bāhvantare tathā ṣaḍbhiḥ pārśve saptabhir āśugaiḥ // HV_App.I,28A.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:6604: satyabhāmā tataḥ kruddhā bāṇena niśitena ca /
GE07hv_apppu:6605: dhanuś ciccheda tasyāpi narakasya durātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,28A.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:6606: dhvajaṃ chatraṃ tathā yaṣṭiṃ ratham aśvās tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:6607: etān dvidhākarot sarvān satyabhāmā balānvitā // HV_App.I,28A.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:6609: tac cāpi cicchide cāpaṃ mahiṣī śārṅgadhanvanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6610: punar anyat samādatte dvidhā tac cāpi sākarot // HV_App.I,28A.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:6611: tataḥ sa dānavaḥ kruddho gadāṃ suniśitāṃ tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:6612: ādāya prāhiṇot tasyai vāsudevasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,28A.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:6613: tām āpatantīṃ saṃprekṣya tilaśaḥ sākarot tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:6614: tataḥ śaktiṃ samādāya tasyai dātuṃ pracakrame // HV_App.I,28A.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:6616: tāṃ cāpi tilaśaḥ kṛtvā sasvaraṃ prajahāsa ca // HV_App.I,28A.57 //
GE07hv_apppu:6617: tataḥ parigham ādāya vyāvidhya narakas tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:6618: prāhiṇoc ca tadā tasyai sāntare nijaghāna ha /
GE07hv_apppu:6619: śaraiś ca niśitai rājan satyā vivyādha dānavam // HV_App.I,28A.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:6621: divi sthitā devagaṇā ṛṣayaś ca tathāmalāḥ // HV_App.I,28A.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:6622: sāratheś ca śiraḥ kāyāc chareṇa nirakṛntata /
GE07hv_apppu:6623: śaktir bhagavato devī vāsudevasya dhīmataḥ // HV_App.I,28A.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:6624: tatra prīto mahāviṣṇuḥ pariṣvajya ca tāṃ vibhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6626: mahāviṣṇuḥ sasvaje tāṃ satyabhāmāṃ priyāṃ tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:6627: śramāmbhaś cāpi tasyās tu mārjayām āsa keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,28A.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:6628: tasyās tu kaṇṭhābharaṇaṃ dadau prīto janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6629: na dattam atha rukmiṇyā dattaṃ tasyā mahātmanā /
GE07hv_apppu:6630: mahārghaṃ lokavikhyātaṃ hṛtaṃ balimukhe tadā // HV_App.I,28A.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:6632: badhvā kaṇṭhe tadā devī rarāja bahuśaḥ śubhā // HV_App.I,28A.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:6634: na hi labdhavatī pūrva tadā labdhaṃ jarārdanāt // HV_App.I,28A.73 //
GE07hv_apppu:6636: ity uktvā dhanur ādāya yuyudhe dānavaṃ raṇe // HV_App.I,28A.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:6638: ādāya paramaṃ cāpaṃ bāṇair vivyādha cāṣṭabhiḥ // HV_App.I,28A.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:6639: sa vāsudevam āvidhya satyāṃ ca daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6640: garuḍaṃ pañcaviṃśatyā vāsudevaṃ ca saptabhiḥ // HV_App.I,28A.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:6641: atho jagatpatir devaḥ kruddhaḥ saṃprati dānave /
GE07hv_apppu:6642: ādāya niśitaṃ bāṇaṃ dhanuś ciccheda tasya hi /
GE07hv_apppu:6643: rathaṃ ca sārathiṃ cāpi jaghāna yadunandanaḥ // HV_App.I,28A.82 //
GE07hv_apppu:6644: tataḥ kruddho rathāt tasmād āplutya narakas tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:6646: garuḍaṃ pothayam āsa talena narakas tadā // HV_App.I,28A.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:6650: tāś ca sarvāḥ samājaghne śaraiḥ śārṅgaviniḥsṛtaiḥ // HV_App.I,28A.89 //
GE07hv_apppu:6653: tad yuddham abhavad ghoraṃ narake dānaveśvare // HV_App.I,28A.92 //
GE07hv_apppu:6658: hantum aicchaj jagannātho narakaṃ dānaveśvaram // HV_App.I,28A.94 //
GE07hv_apppu:6663: pradīptacakraṃ cakreṇa kṣiptena niśitena ca // HV_App.I,28A.99 //
GE07hv_apppu:6665: dvidhā ciccheda lokeśaḥ sarvalokasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,28A.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:6666: [h: HV (CE) Appendix 29, line 1-484, transliterated by Petteri
GE07hv_apppu:6667: Koskikallio, version of March, 2002, proof--read by Renate Söhnen--Thieme,
GE07hv_apppu:6668: April 2004; line 485--1585, transliterated by R. Söhnen--Thieme, version of March 2004, proof--read April 2004 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:6669: [k: After 92.70, K Ñ2.3V BDT GM4 ins. a passage given in App. I (No.
GE07hv_apppu:6670: 29), Ñ1 ins. this after App. I (No. 42). :k]
GE07hv_apppu:6673: [k: M4 om. the ref. T1-3 G1.3-5 M4 ins. after the ref.; M4 bfore line 1; G after line 4
GE07hv_apppu:6675: tad vadāśu guro mahyam aviglānaṃ kathaṃ hariḥ // **HV_App.I,29.1**1:2
GE07hv_apppu:6676: śṛṇvan vai nādhigacchāmi tṛptiṃ kṛṣṇasya dhīmataḥ // HV_App.I,29.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:6678: caritaṃ brūhi kṛṣṇasya sarvaṃ hi viditaṃ tava // HV_App.I,29.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:6681: nibodha caritaṃ citraṃ tasyaiva sadṛśaṃ prabhoḥ // HV_App.I,29.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:6683: rukmiṇyā sahito devyā yayau raivatakaṃ nṛpa // HV_App.I,29.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:6685: tarpayiṣyan svayaṃ viprāñ jagāma madhusūdanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:6686: kumārāḥ prayayus tatra putrā bhrātara eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:6688: ṣoḍaśa strīsahasrāṇi jagmur eva ca dhīmataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6689: ṛddhyā paramayā rājan viṣṇor evānurūpayā // HV_App.I,29.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:6690: tatas tatra dvijātīnāṃ kāmān prādād adhokṣajaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6693: yaunaiḥ śrautaiś ca mākhaiś ca śuddhānāṃ kurunandana // HV_App.I,29.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:6694: tarpayitvā dvijān kāmair iṣṭair iṣṭaḥ satāṃ hariḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6695: jñātīn saṃtarpayām āsa yathārhaṃ dharmavatsalaḥ // HV_App.I,29.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:6699: kadācid atha rukmiṇyā vasan gehe janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6700: bahu mene priyāṃ bhāryāṃ rukmiṇīṃ bhīṣmakātmajām // HV_App.I,29.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:6704: śāstradṛṣṭena vidhinā arcayām āsa keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,29.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:6706: pārijātataroḥ puṣpaṃ dadau kṛṣṇāya bhārata // HV_App.I,29.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:6708: pārśvasthā sā hi kṛṣṇasya bhojyā naravarābhavat // HV_App.I,29.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:6709: pratigṛhya tu tat puṣpaṃ kāmāraṇir aninditā /
GE07hv_apppu:6712: śuśubhe tena puṣpeṇa dviguṇaṃ rukmiṇī tadā // HV_App.I,29.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:6713: tāṃ nāradas tathovāca munir brahmasutas tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:6714: tavaivaupayikaṃ puṣpam ekaṃ devi pativrate // HV_App.I,29.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:6715: alaṃkṛtaṃ puṣpam etat saṃsargāt tava sarvathā /
GE07hv_apppu:6716: atyarhā ca matā me tvam etat puṣpaṃ dhṛtavrate // HV_App.I,29.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:6718: amlānam etat satataṃ puṣpaṃ bhavati kāmini // HV_App.I,29.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:6720: īpsitān api gandhāṃś ca dadāti vadatāṃ vare // HV_App.I,29.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:6721: śītoṣṇe cepsite devi puṣpam etat prayacchati /
GE07hv_apppu:6722: sravaty api rasān devi manasā kāṅkṣitān varān // HV_App.I,29.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:6724: sravaty api tathā gandhān īpsitān prativardhanān // HV_App.I,29.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:6725: yāni yāni ca puṣpāṇi tvaṃ devy abhilaṣiṣyasi /
GE07hv_apppu:6726: kusumaṃ vṛkṣarājasya tāni tāni pradāsyati // HV_App.I,29.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:6727: etad eva bhagādhānaṃ dharmiṣṭhe dharmadaṃ tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:6728: matiṃ ca nāśubhe dhatte dhāryamāṇaṃ sadā śubhe // HV_App.I,29.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:6729: yad yad icchasi varṇaṃ ca tat sarvaṃ dhārayiṣyati /
GE07hv_apppu:6730: svalpaṃ vā yadi vā sthūlaṃ chandatas te bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,29.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:6732: pradīpakarma rātrau ca karoti kamalekṣaṇe // HV_App.I,29.54 //
GE07hv_apppu:6735: bubhukṣā vā pipāsā vā glānir vāpy atha vā jarā /
GE07hv_apppu:6736: devy etaddhārayantyās te svacchandena bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,29.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:6737: anugītāni gītāni dāsyaty api ca cintite /
GE07hv_apppu:6738: suvāditrān sumadhurāṃs tathaiva tava saṃmatān // HV_App.I,29.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:6739: pūrṇe saṃvatsare devi puṣpam etat tavāntikāt /
GE07hv_apppu:6742: kṛtir eṣā hi bhadraṃ te pārijātasya suprabhe /
GE07hv_apppu:6745: dhārayed īśvarī nityaṃ puṣpāṇy etāni suprabhe // HV_App.I,29.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:6747: sāvitrī vedamātā ca śrīś ca sarvaguṇodite // HV_App.I,29.68 //
GE07hv_apppu:6749: saṃvatsaraḥ paraḥ kālaḥ sarveṣāṃ tu na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,29.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:6751: adyeṣṭāṃ vāsudevasya vedmi tvāṃ bhojanandini // HV_App.I,29.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:6754: prakāśam adya saubhāgyam anivāryaṃ yaśaś ca te /
GE07hv_apppu:6755: mandārakusumaṃ dattaṃ yat te madhunighātinā // HV_App.I,29.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:6757: saubhāgyāḍhyaṃ sadā vetti yātmānaṃ subhagā satī // HV_App.I,29.78 //
GE07hv_apppu:6760: saubhāgyaikaratho jaitras tava devy adya niḥsṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6761: manoratharathānāṃ yaḥ sahasrair api durjayaḥ // HV_App.I,29.82 //
GE07hv_apppu:6763: ātmā dvitīyaḥ kṛṣṇasya bhoje tvam iti bhāmini // HV_App.I,29.84 //
GE07hv_apppu:6765: jīvitātiśayas tena tvayā prāpto haripriye // HV_App.I,29.86 //
GE07hv_apppu:6766: nāradenaivam uktaṃ tu tathyaṃ vākyaṃ narādhipa /
GE07hv_apppu:6767: tatrasthāḥ śuśruvuḥ preṣyāḥ preṣitāḥ satyabhāmayā // HV_App.I,29.88 //
GE07hv_apppu:6768: devīnāṃ ca tathānyāsāṃ sapatnīnāṃ viśāṃ pate /
GE07hv_apppu:6769: dṛṣṭvā tāṃ saviśeṣaṃ ca nāradenābhyudāhṛtam // HV_App.I,29.90 //

GE07hv_apppu:6772: karṇākarṇi tato devyaḥ kaulīnam iva sarvaśaḥ /

GE07hv_apppu:6818: preṣyāmadhyasthitāṃ krodhān niḥśvasantīṃ muhur muhur // HV_App.I,29.132 //

GE07hv_apppu:6828: prasādhayitvā hṛdayaṃ kṣipantīṃ nirdayaṃ punaḥ // HV_App.I,29.140 //

GE07hv_apppu:6832: idam antaram ity eva tato matvā janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.144 //
GE07hv_apppu:6834: saśaṅkitapracāraś ca tvarito 'nvagamac ca tām // HV_App.I,29.146 //
GE07hv_apppu:6835: jagrāha vyajanaṃ caiva sthitvā sa paripārśvataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6836: śanair avāsṛjad vātaṃ jahāsa śanakair iva // HV_App.I,29.148 //
GE07hv_apppu:6838: babhāra bhagavān gandhaṃ divyaṃ mānuṣadurlabham // HV_App.I,29.150 //
GE07hv_apppu:6840: apāvṛṇon mukhaṃ satyā kim etad iti cābravīt // HV_App.I,29.152 //
GE07hv_apppu:6842: paryapṛcchad atho preṣyā gandhasya prabhavaḥ tadā // HV_App.I,29.154 //
GE07hv_apppu:6843: tāḥ pṛṣṭās tv aprabhāṣantyo jānubhyāṃ dharaṇīṃ gatāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6844: adhomukhyas tatas tasthuḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭās tadā // HV_App.I,29.156 //
GE07hv_apppu:6845: tad apūrvam adṛṣṭvaiva gandhaṃ muñcati medinīm /
GE07hv_apppu:6846: katham ekataras tasyā gandho 'yam udabhūt khalu // HV_App.I,29.158 //
GE07hv_apppu:6847: kiṃ tv idaṃ syād iti ca sā vivekṣantī samantataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6848: dadṛśe keśavaṃ devī sahasā lokabhāvanam // HV_App.I,29.160 //
GE07hv_apppu:6852: muhūrtam asitāpāṅgī tasthāv anyamukhī śubhā // HV_App.I,29.164 //
GE07hv_apppu:6853: nibadhya bhrūkuṭīṃ vāmāṃ samyag utkṣipya locane /
GE07hv_apppu:6854: niveśya vadanaṃ haste śobhasīty abravīd dharim // HV_App.I,29.166 //
GE07hv_apppu:6858: pratijagrāha padmākṣaḥ karābhyām api satvaram // HV_App.I,29.170 //
GE07hv_apppu:6862: toyaṃ sundari netrābhyāṃ puṣkarābhyām ivodakam // HV_App.I,29.174 //
GE07hv_apppu:6864: bibharti tava kiṃ vaktraṃ vapur mama manoharam // HV_App.I,29.176 //
GE07hv_apppu:6865: kimarthaṃ kauṅkumaṃ vāso mahārajatam eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:6868: devābhigamanād ūrdhvaṃ śuklaṃ neṣṭaṃ hi te priye // HV_App.I,29.180 //
GE07hv_apppu:6869: kiṃ cānābharaṇaṃ gātraṃ sugātri tava kathyatām /
GE07hv_apppu:6870: citrakasthānam ākrāntaṃ kasmāc ca varavarṇini // HV_App.I,29.182 //
GE07hv_apppu:6872: lalāṭaṃ sevyate kasmāc candanena sugandhinā // HV_App.I,29.184 //
GE07hv_apppu:6875: karoṣi mama cātyarthaṃ mano glāpayasi priye // HV_App.I,29.187 //
GE07hv_apppu:6878: ratnasyābharaṇair muktā tava grīvā na śobhate /
GE07hv_apppu:6881: kim u nābhāṣase mādya sukhenotpalagandhinā // HV_App.I,29.193 //
GE07hv_apppu:6882: ardhākṣṇāpi hi tāvan māṃ kimarthaṃ na nirīkṣase /
GE07hv_apppu:6883: muñcasy eva saniḥśvāsaṃ toyam añjanadurdinam // HV_App.I,29.195 //
GE07hv_apppu:6885: jalam añjanakalmāṣaṃ mā mokṣīr ānanadviṣam // HV_App.I,29.197 //
GE07hv_apppu:6886: tvadīyo 'haṃ yadā devi khyāto jagati kiṃkaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6887: nājñāpayasi māṃ kiṃ tvaṃ pureva varavarṇini // HV_App.I,29.199 //
GE07hv_apppu:6888: kim akārṣam ahaṃ devi vipriyaṃ tava bhāmini /
GE07hv_apppu:6890: manasā karmaṇā vācā na tvām aticarāmy aham /
GE07hv_apppu:6891: sarvathā sarvacārvaṅgi satyam etad bravīmy aham // HV_App.I,29.203 //
GE07hv_apppu:6893: dvitīyaṃ na hi me kiṃcid uktaṃ yan meti nāgare //
GE07hv_apppu:6895: snehaś ca bahumānaś ca tvām ṛte 'nyāsu nāsti me // HV_App.I,29.205 //
GE07hv_apppu:6896: naiva tvāṃ madano jahyād amṛte mayi māmakaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6897: iti me niścitaṃ viddhi cetaḥ surasutopame // HV_App.I,29.207 //
GE07hv_apppu:6899: niścitaṃ viddhi ceto me tvayi nityaṃ suniścalam //
GE07hv_apppu:6900: kṣamādayaś ca medinyāṃ śabdādyāś cāmbare guṇāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6902: gandho guṇaś ca medinyā khe śabdaś ca yathā guṇaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6903: dhruvaṃ paṅkajagarbhābhe tvayi snehas tathā mama // HV_App.I,29.209 //
GE07hv_apppu:6904: rucir agnau yathā divyā prabhā caiva divākare /
GE07hv_apppu:6905: kāntiś ca cāśvatī candre snehas tvayi tathā mama // HV_App.I,29.211 //
GE07hv_apppu:6907: śanair uvāca netrābhyāṃ pramṛjya subhagā jalam // HV_App.I,29.213 //
GE07hv_apppu:6908: madīyas tvam iti hy āsīn mama nityaṃ manaḥ prabho /
GE07hv_apppu:6909: adya sādhāraṇasnehas tvam ity avagatā hy aham // HV_App.I,29.215 //
GE07hv_apppu:6911: adya lokagatiṃ kṛtsnām avagacchāmi na dhruvām // HV_App.I,29.217 //
GE07hv_apppu:6913: adyālokya gatiṃ kṛtsnāṃ maivaṃ jānāmi vā dhruvam //
GE07hv_apppu:6914: amṛtāyā dvitīyaṃ hi janmedaṃ mama sarvathā /
GE07hv_apppu:6915: kim atra bahunoktena hṛdayaṃ vetti te 'cyuta // HV_App.I,29.219 //
GE07hv_apppu:6917: mayi snehaś ca kṛtakas tavānyatra na kṛtrimaḥ // HV_App.I,29.221 //
GE07hv_apppu:6919: avajānāsi jānan māṃ kaitavīṃ vṛttim āsthitaḥ // HV_App.I,29.223 //
GE07hv_apppu:6920: etāvat khalu paryāptaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ draṣṭavyam adya yat /
GE07hv_apppu:6921: śrutaṃ vāpy atha vā śrāvyaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ snehaphalodayaḥ // HV_App.I,29.225 //
GE07hv_apppu:6922: yadi tv aham anugrāhyā mām anujñātum arhasi /
GE07hv_apppu:6923: tapasyeyaṃ paraṃ kṛtvā niścayaṃ puruṣottama // HV_App.I,29.227 //
GE07hv_apppu:6924: bhartuś chandena nārīṇāṃ tapo vā vratakāni vā /

GE07hv_apppu:6933: provāca praṇayāt kruddhām abhimānavatīṃ satīm // HV_App.I,29.235 //
GE07hv_apppu:6935: kim u tatkāraṇaṃ yena tvam evam ativiklavā // HV_App.I,29.237 //

GE07hv_apppu:6938: tataḥ provāca bhartāraṃ satyā satyavrate sthitam /
GE07hv_apppu:6940: tvayaiva sthāpitaṃ pūrvaṃ saubhāgyaṃ mama mānada /
GE07hv_apppu:6941: jagaty amalapatrākṣe tat khyātaṃ keśināśana // HV_App.I,29.243 //

GE07hv_apppu:6947: tat kileṣṭajane dattaṃ tvayāhaṃ parivarjitā // HV_App.I,29.249 //
GE07hv_apppu:6949: snehaś ca bahumānaś ca prakāśaṃ gamitas tvayā // HV_App.I,29.251 //
GE07hv_apppu:6950: tām astauṣīt samakṣaṃ te priyāṃ sa kila nāradaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6951: tam aśrauṣīś ca hṛṣṭas tvaṃ priyāyāḥ saṃstavaṃ kila // HV_App.I,29.253 //
GE07hv_apppu:6952: stotavyā yadi tāvat sā nāradena tavāgrataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:6953: durbhago 'yaṃ janas tatra kimartham anuśabditaḥ // HV_App.I,29.255 //

GE07hv_apppu:6957: yad anyad eva nirvṛttam aśrauṣaṃ paśyatas tava // HV_App.I,29.259 //

GE07hv_apppu:6962: mamābhavad yato rakṣā bhayam adya tato mama /

GE07hv_apppu:6966: kim akārṣam ahaṃ mohād īśvarāṇāṃ priyāpriyam /

GE07hv_apppu:6969: priyā bhūtvāpriyā bhūtā kathaṃ drakṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ // HV_App.I,29.271 //
GE07hv_apppu:6971: kathaṃ nāmānilaṃ dveṣyā seveyaṃ durbhagā satī // HV_App.I,29.273 //
GE07hv_apppu:6973: kathaṃ daurbhāgyam āpannā paśyeyam api sāgaram // HV_App.I,29.275 //

GE07hv_apppu:6975: tvam avocaḥ kva tad yātam atha vā kaḥ smariṣyati // HV_App.I,29.277 //

GE07hv_apppu:6978: yad adrākṣīd dhi māṃ śvaśrūr bahumānena nandinīm /
GE07hv_apppu:6979: avajñātā tvayā rājñī nūnaṃ daurbhāgyakīrtitā // HV_App.I,29.279 //

GE07hv_apppu:6982: nāhaṃ tvāṃ kitavaṃ dhūrtam ajñāsiṣam ariṃdama /

GE07hv_apppu:6997: gṛhe te sthāpayiṣyāmi yāvatkālaṃ tvam icchasi // HV_App.I,29.297 //

GE07hv_apppu:6999: yady evaṃ sa drumaḥ śakya ihānayitum acyuta // HV_App.I,29.299 //
GE07hv_apppu:7000: manyur eṣa pramṛṣṭo hi bhaved bahuguṇo mama /

GE07hv_apppu:7010: tam āgataṃ narapate satāṃ gatir adhokṣajaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7011: satyayā saha dharmātmā yathāvidhim apūjayat // HV_App.I,29.311 //
GE07hv_apppu:7012: pādau prakṣālayāṃ cakre muneḥ sātrājitī svayam /

GE07hv_apppu:7018: upaspṛśya tatas tṛptaḥ pradadau cāśiṣaḥ prabhoḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7019: tāś ca prītena manasā pratijagrāha keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,29.319 //
GE07hv_apppu:7021: prasārya dakṣiṇaṃ hastaṃ sajalaṃ jalajekṣaṇām // HV_App.I,29.321 //
GE07hv_apppu:7022: yathedānīṃ tathaiva tvaṃ bhava devi pativratā /

GE07hv_apppu:7025: uttasthau mahatā yuktā harṣeṇa tu narādhipa // HV_App.I,29.325 //
GE07hv_apppu:7026: sa kṛṣṇo 'py abhyanujñāṃ tu labdhvā munivarāt tadā /

GE07hv_apppu:7029: anujñayā tadā bhartur viveśāntargṛhaṃ mudā // HV_App.I,29.329 //
GE07hv_apppu:7031: sthitā pārśve ca kṛṣṇasya namaskṛtvā mahātmane // HV_App.I,29.331 //
GE07hv_apppu:7032: tato muhūrtam āsitvā nāradaḥ kṛṣṇam abravīt /
GE07hv_apppu:7033: āpṛcche tvāṃ gamiṣyāmi śakralokam adhokṣaja // HV_App.I,29.333 //

GE07hv_apppu:7038: pūjārthaṃ devadevasya gāndharvaṃ nṛtyam eva ca // HV_App.I,29.337 //
GE07hv_apppu:7042: pārijātasya bhadraṃ te tarurājño mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.341 //
GE07hv_apppu:7043: yad etad āhṛtaṃ svargāt tat tvadarthaṃ mayā vibho /
GE07hv_apppu:7045: iṣṭaḥ sa vṛkṣaḥ satataṃ śacyāḥ puṣkaralocana /
GE07hv_apppu:7046: saubhāgyam āvahaty eva pūjyamāno 'pi nityaśaḥ // HV_App.I,29.345 //
