GE07hv_apppu:7049: puṇyaṃ kartuṃ tadā sṛṣṭaḥ pārijāto mahādrumaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7052: vareṇa cchandayām āsa mārīcas tapaso nidhiḥ // HV_App.I,29.349 //
GE07hv_apppu:7054: svalaṃkṛtā kāmataś ca sarvair eva vibhūṣaṇaiḥ // HV_App.I,29.351 //
GE07hv_apppu:7055: īpsitaṃ gītanṛtyaṃ ca bhaven mama tapodhana /
GE07hv_apppu:7056: kumārī nityadā caiva bhaveyaṃ tapasāṃ nidhe // HV_App.I,29.353 //
GE07hv_apppu:7058: patibhaktimatī caiva dharmaśīlā tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29.355 //
GE07hv_apppu:7062: sarvapuṣpāṇi dṛśyante tasminn eva mahādrume // HV_App.I,29.359 //
GE07hv_apppu:7064: bahurūpāṇi cāpy anyā padmāni ca tathāparā // HV_App.I,29.361 //
GE07hv_apppu:7065: mandārād api vṛkṣāc ca sāras uddhṛtya kaśyapaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7066: tasmād eṣa taruśreṣṭhaḥ sarveṣāṃ śreṣṭhatāṃ gataḥ // HV_App.I,29.363 //
GE07hv_apppu:7069: tatas tatra nibadhyātha kaśyapaṃ pradadau śubhā /
GE07hv_apppu:7070: aditir mama puṇyārthaṃ saubhāgyārthaṃ tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29.365 //
GE07hv_apppu:7072: adityā kaśyapo dattaḥ puṇyārthaṃ ca tato mama /
GE07hv_apppu:7074: niṣkrayeṇa mayā muktaḥ kaśyapas tu tapodhanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7075: indro dattas tathendrāṇyā saubhāgyārthaṃ tato mama // HV_App.I,29.367 //
GE07hv_apppu:7076: somaś cāpy atha rohiṇyā ṛddhyā ca dhanadas tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:7077: evaṃ saubhāgyado vṛkṣaḥ pārijāto na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,29.369 //
GE07hv_apppu:7079: mandārapuṣpair yad yukto mandāras tena kathyate // HV_App.I,29.371 //
GE07hv_apppu:7080: ko 'py ayaṃ dārur ity āhur ajānanto yato janāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7081: kovidāra iti khyātaḥ saṃtataḥ sa mahātaruḥ // HV_App.I,29.373 //
GE07hv_apppu:7082: mandāraḥ kovidāraś ca pārijātaś ca nāmabhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7083: sa vṛkṣo jñāyate divyo yasyaitat kusumottamam // HV_App.I,29.375 //
GE07hv_apppu:7089: dṛṣṭvā sadasyān devasya tripuraghnasya dhīmataḥ // HV_App.I,29.379 //
GE07hv_apppu:7091: saṃvarṇayitvā bhrātṛtvaṃ paurāṇaṃ vetsi yan mune // HV_App.I,29.381 //
GE07hv_apppu:7092: yad asrākṣīn muniśreṣṭho bhagavān kaśyapas tarum /
GE07hv_apppu:7095: tava dattaṃ purā dānaṃ vrate ca tarusattamam // HV_App.I,29.385 //
GE07hv_apppu:7097: dattaṃ śrutvābhikāṅkṣanti dātuṃ patnyo mama prabho // HV_App.I,29.387 //
GE07hv_apppu:7098: puṇyārthaṃ dānadharmārthaṃ mama prītyartham eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:7099: ānāyya ca dvāravatīṃ pārijātaṃ mahātarum // HV_App.I,29.389 //
GE07hv_apppu:7100: datte dāne punaḥ svargaṃ tatra taṃ nāyayiṣyasi /
GE07hv_apppu:7101: sa vācya evaṃ bhagavān balabhid bhagavaṃs tvayā // HV_App.I,29.391 //
GE07hv_apppu:7102: tathā tathā prayatnaś ca kāryo munivara tvayā /
GE07hv_apppu:7103: yathā taruvaraṃ dadyāt pārijātaṃ sureśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,29.393 //
GE07hv_apppu:7104: tatra dūtaguṇaṃ tāvat paśyāmas te tapodhana /
GE07hv_apppu:7105: saṃbhāvyā sarvakṛtyānāṃ saṃpad dhi tvayi me matā // HV_App.I,29.395 //
GE07hv_apppu:7107: prahasyovāca keśighnam idaṃ vākyaṃ tapodhanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.397 //
GE07hv_apppu:7109: na tu dāsyati devendraḥ pārijātaṃ kathaṃcana // HV_App.I,29.399 //
GE07hv_apppu:7111: nikṣipya toyadhau pūrvaṃ pārijātaḥ samāhṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,29.401 //
GE07hv_apppu:7114: svayaṃ vijñāpito gatvā tataḥ śakreṇa śaṃkaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7115: ākrīḍadruma udyāne śacyāḥ syād iti yācitaḥ // HV_App.I,29.405 //
GE07hv_apppu:7116: tathāstv iti varo datto mahādevena cānagha /
GE07hv_apppu:7117: na ca nītaḥ pārijāto mandaraṃ citrakandaram // HV_App.I,29.407 //
GE07hv_apppu:7119: mahendreṇa mahābāho pārijātas taruḥ purā // HV_App.I,29.409 //
GE07hv_apppu:7122: na tatra sūryabhāḥ kṛṣṇa praviśanti nagottame /
GE07hv_apppu:7124: na ca candraprabhāḥ śītā naiva kṛṣṇa sadāgatiḥ // HV_App.I,29.413 //
GE07hv_apppu:7125: śītoṣṇe chandatas tatra śailaputryā bhavanti hi /
GE07hv_apppu:7126: svayaṃprabhaṃ vanaṃ tad dhi mahādevasya tejasā // HV_App.I,29.415 //
GE07hv_apppu:7128: māṃ cānyas tad vanaṃ divyaṃ na prayāti kathaṃcana // HV_App.I,29.417 //
GE07hv_apppu:7130: sarvaratnāni mukhyāni manasā kāṅkṣitāni vai // HV_App.I,29.419 //
GE07hv_apppu:7133: pārijātād bahuguṇaṃ phalaṃ teṣāṃ tathā dhanam /
GE07hv_apppu:7134: abhimānaṃ prabhā caiva guṇā bhūriguṇās tathā // HV_App.I,29.423 //
GE07hv_apppu:7135: mūrtimantaś ca te vṛkṣāḥ somaṃ devaṃ vṛṣadhvajam /
GE07hv_apppu:7136: upatiṣṭhanti satataṃ pravaraiḥ saha keśava // HV_App.I,29.425 //
GE07hv_apppu:7137: raudreṇa tejasā juṣṭā hīnā duḥkhaiḥ sukhānvitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7138: taravo mandare te hi dayitāḥ śailakanyayā // HV_App.I,29.427 //
GE07hv_apppu:7142: avadhyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ vṛtrād daśaguṇaṃ balī // HV_App.I,29.431 //
GE07hv_apppu:7143: evaṃ duḥkhena te deva pārijātaṃ pradāsyati /
GE07hv_apppu:7144: puṣkarākṣa sahasrākṣaḥ satyam etad bravīmi te // HV_App.I,29.433 //
GE07hv_apppu:7145: satataṃ sahito devyā śacyā sa hi varadrumaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7148: mune tad yujyate sādhu mahādevena dhīmatā /
GE07hv_apppu:7149: yac chacīṃ kāraṇaṃ kṛtvā na nītaḥ sa taruḥ purā // HV_App.I,29.437 //
GE07hv_apppu:7151: pārāvaryasya sadṛśaṃ kṛtavān iti me matiḥ // HV_App.I,29.439 //
GE07hv_apppu:7153: lālanīyaś ca bhagavañ jayanta iva sattama // HV_App.I,29.441 //
GE07hv_apppu:7155: karotu yatnaṃ prītyarthaṃ śakto hy asi tapodhana // HV_App.I,29.443 //
GE07hv_apppu:7157: svargād ihānayiṣyāmi pārijātam iti prabho // HV_App.I,29.445 //
GE07hv_apppu:7158: mayā tad anṛtaṃ śakyaṃ kathaṃ kartuṃ tapodhana /
GE07hv_apppu:7159: nānṛtaṃ hi vaco vipra proktapūrvaṃ mayānagha /
GE07hv_apppu:7160: mayi bhagnapratijñe hi lokānāṃ saṃplavo bhavet // HV_App.I,29.448 //
GE07hv_apppu:7161: yan mayā hi muniśreṣṭha lokā dharmaguṇānvitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7162: paripālyāḥ sthitau sarve sa kathaṃ hy anṛtaṃ vadet // HV_App.I,29.450 //
GE07hv_apppu:7167: naiva yakṣapiśācāś ca na ca sarve 'pi pannagāḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:7170: sa pārijātaṃ yadi na pradāsyati @ HV_App.I,29.455 @
GE07hv_apppu:7177: tvayāpi kāryaḥ khalu tatra niścayaḥ || HV_App.I,29.462 ||
GE07hv_apppu:7181: tāṃ rātrim avasat tatra dadṛśe ca mahotsavam // HV_App.I,29.464 //
GE07hv_apppu:7183: rājarṣayaś ca vidvāṃsaḥ svargatāḥ karmabhiḥ śubhaiḥ // HV_App.I,29.466 //
GE07hv_apppu:7184: nāgā yakṣāś ca siddhāś ca cāraṇāś ca tapodhanāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7185: brahmarṣayaś ca śataśo devarṣimanavas tathā // HV_App.I,29.468 //
GE07hv_apppu:7186: suparṇāś ca mahātmāno marutaś ca mahābalāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7187: divaukasāṃ nikāyāś ca śataśo 'nye samāgatāḥ // HV_App.I,29.470 //
GE07hv_apppu:7188: upary upari sarveṣāṃ somo devo maheśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7189: tasthāv amitavikrāntaḥ svair gaṇaiḥ parivāritaḥ // HV_App.I,29.472 //
GE07hv_apppu:7191: kalpāntarasahasreṣu kṣayo yeṣāṃ na vidyate // HV_App.I,29.474 //
GE07hv_apppu:7193: ātmajñā nāvalepāndhā ye ca dharmapathe sthitāḥ // HV_App.I,29.476 //
GE07hv_apppu:7194: rudrāś ca kāśyapā devam adhyupāsanta bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:7195: skandaś ca bhagavān raudrir gaṅgā ca saritāṃ varā // HV_App.I,29.478 //
GE07hv_apppu:7196: arciṣmāṃs tumburuś caiva bhāriś ca vadatāṃ varaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7197: netāro devadevānām ete hi tapasānvitāḥ // HV_App.I,29.480 //
GE07hv_apppu:7199: dharmanityās taponityāḥ satāṃ mārgam upāśritāḥ // HV_App.I,29.482 //
GE07hv_apppu:7200: ye tv ime mānuṣā devān arcayanti śubhārthinaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7201: tān arcayanti hy amarās tathā rājañ śubhārthinaḥ // HV_App.I,29.484 //
GE07hv_apppu:7202: pitṛkṛtyeṣu devānāṃ saṃnyāsaṃ ye tv anuṣṭhitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7206: ūrṇāyuś citrasenaś ca hāhā hūhūs tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:7207: ḍambaras tumburuś caiva jagur anye ca tadgaṇāḥ // HV_App.I,29.490 //
GE07hv_apppu:7208: urvaśī pūrvacittiś ca hemā rambhā ca bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:7209: hemadantā ghṛtācī ca sahajanyā tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29.492 //
GE07hv_apppu:7211: vṛttena tuṣṭaḥ śakrasya jagāma jagataḥ patiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7212: gate bhūtapatau sarve nṛpā jagmur yathāgatam /
GE07hv_apppu:7213: mahendreṇārcitā devāḥ svān eva nilayān gatāḥ // HV_App.I,29.496 //
GE07hv_apppu:7215: sadasyaiḥ svaiḥ sahāsīnaṃ nārado 'bhyāyayau muniḥ // HV_App.I,29.498 //
GE07hv_apppu:7216: tam indraḥ pūjayām āsa samutthāya tapodhanam /
GE07hv_apppu:7217: dideśa kuśagarbhaṃ ca pīṭham ātmāsanopamam // HV_App.I,29.500 //
GE07hv_apppu:7223: tataḥ prahṛṣṭo bhagavān abravīt pākaśāsanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.506 //
GE07hv_apppu:7224: kim āha puruṣaśreṣṭhaḥ śīghram ācakṣva me mune /
GE07hv_apppu:7225: cirasya khalu kṛṣṇena saṃsmṛtāḥ sma mahātmanā /
GE07hv_apppu:7226: priyavākyāni hṛdyāni brūhi dharmabhṛtāṃ vara // HV_App.I,29.509 //
GE07hv_apppu:7231: rukmiṇyā sahitaṃ vīram umayeva vṛṣadhvajam // HV_App.I,29.513 //
GE07hv_apppu:7234: tad dṛṣṭvā tasya patnyas tu vismayaṃ paramaṃ yayuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7236: guṇās tāsāṃ mayākhyātās tasya puṣpasya mānada /
GE07hv_apppu:7238: adityā kaśyapo dattaḥ puṇyārthaṃ ca yathā mama /
GE07hv_apppu:7239: puṣpadāmnā veṣṭayitvā kaṇṭhe puṇyārtham ātmavān // HV_App.I,29.521 //
GE07hv_apppu:7240: tvaṃ ca datto yathā śacyā devāś cānye sureśvara /
GE07hv_apppu:7241: niṣkrayaś ca yathā dattaḥ kaśyapādyair mahātmabhiḥ // HV_App.I,29.523 //
GE07hv_apppu:7242: tac chrutvā tasya patny ekā satyabhāmeti viśrutā /
GE07hv_apppu:7243: puṇyakārthaṃ manaś cakre dayitā te yavīyasaḥ // HV_App.I,29.525 //
GE07hv_apppu:7245: pratijajñe sa dharmātmā yavīyāṃs tava mānada // HV_App.I,29.527 //
GE07hv_apppu:7246: tato mām uktavān vīro viṣṇur balavatāṃ varaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7247: yathāvat suramukhyeśa bruvataḥ śṛṇu bhāvana // HV_App.I,29.529 //
GE07hv_apppu:7253: paśyantv amarakalyāṇaṃ matprabhāvāc ca mānuṣāḥ // HV_App.I,29.535 //
GE07hv_apppu:7256: nāradaṃ vadatāṃ śreṣṭham idaṃ vākyam athābravīt // HV_App.I,29.537 //
GE07hv_apppu:7257: bhajāsanaṃ dvijaśreṣṭha śrutam uktaṃ tvayā dvija /
GE07hv_apppu:7260: svam āsanaṃ tato bheje tasyaiva sadṛśaṃ vibho // HV_App.I,29.541 //
GE07hv_apppu:7262: nirīkṣya svabalaṃ vīryaṃ pārṣadaṃ vṛtranāśanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.543 //
GE07hv_apppu:7263: maharṣe kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭvā vaktavyas te janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7265: madanantaram īśas tvaṃ jagato nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7266: tvadīyaḥ pārijātaś ca ratnāny anyāni cācyuta // HV_App.I,29.547 //
GE07hv_apppu:7267: tvaṃ tu bhārāvataraṇaṃ kartuṃ deva mahīṃ gataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7269: tvaṃ tu bhārāvatārāya mahyā deva bhuvaṃ gataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7271: tvayi tīrṇapratijñe hi punaḥ prāpte triviṣṭapam /
GE07hv_apppu:7272: pūrayiṣyāmi vadhvās te iṣṭān kāmān adhokṣaja // HV_App.I,29.551 //
GE07hv_apppu:7274: svalpārthe mānuṣaṃ lokam iti pūrvakṛtā sthitiḥ // HV_App.I,29.553 //
GE07hv_apppu:7275: utkramya hi sthitiṃ daivīṃ pravartāmi mahābala /
GE07hv_apppu:7276: yady ahaṃ kiṃ pravakṣyanti prajāpatigaṇāḥ prabho // HV_App.I,29.555 //
GE07hv_apppu:7278: niyamāḥ sarvakṛtyānāṃ sthāpitā jagato dhruvāḥ // HV_App.I,29.557 //
GE07hv_apppu:7280: śrutvā prajāpatir dhīmāñ śāpam apy utsṛjet prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,29.559 //
GE07hv_apppu:7282: bhetsyanty aśaṅkitā daityā daityapakṣās tathāpare // HV_App.I,29.561 //
GE07hv_apppu:7284: svargaukaso bhaviṣyanti vimanaskāś ca mānada // HV_App.I,29.563 //
GE07hv_apppu:7286: tais tu tuṣyatu me bhrātā saṃpaśyan kālaparyayam // HV_App.I,29.565 //
GE07hv_apppu:7287: ihāpi tāvat tridive mama yaḥ syāt parigrahaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7288: tridivastho 'pi taṃ kṛṣṇaḥ sarvaṃ bhoktum ihārhati // HV_App.I,29.567 //
GE07hv_apppu:7289: [k: Ñ1 V1 B1.3 D6 (marg.) T G1-3.5 ins. (D4 after line 575):k]
GE07hv_apppu:7292: tato dharmaṃ samutsṛjya pāpam evānuvartate // HV_App.I,29.569 //
GE07hv_apppu:7294: jagaty ayaśaso yogaṃ janayed iti me matiḥ // HV_App.I,29.571 //
GE07hv_apppu:7295: mānuṣyaṃ mānuṣe prāpto yad etan madhusūdanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7296: kuryān nirbandhanīyaṃ yad bhrātrā jyeṣṭhena nārada // HV_App.I,29.573 //
GE07hv_apppu:7298: jñātito dharṣaṇā caiva viśeṣeṇa hi garhitā // HV_App.I,29.575 //
GE07hv_apppu:7299: dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca krameṇa madhusūdanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7300: sevatv eṣa satāṃ dharmān sthāpitān padmayoninaḥ // HV_App.I,29.577 //
GE07hv_apppu:7302: paulomīm āditaḥ kṛtvā ko nu māṃ bahu maṃsyate // HV_App.I,29.579 //
GE07hv_apppu:7303: pārijātaṃ mahīpṛṣṭhe dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭvā ca mānuṣāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7304: svargārthaṃ nodyamiṣyanti dṛṣṭvā svargaphalaṃ kṣitau // HV_App.I,29.581 //
GE07hv_apppu:7306: devānāṃ manuṣāṇāṃ ca na viśeṣo bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,29.583 //
GE07hv_apppu:7307: tatra yat kriyate karma iha tad bhujyate naraiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7310: tulyaṃ devasamair martyaiḥ sarvadaiva jagad bhavet // HV_App.I,29.587 //
GE07hv_apppu:7311: yajñair martyā na yakṣyanti labdhasvargaphalā bhuvi /
GE07hv_apppu:7312: na pūrtāni pradāsyanti tulyatvam amarair gatāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7313: yajñair japyāhnikaiś caiva nityam āpyāyayanti naḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7314: mānuṣāḥ svargam icchantaḥ śraddadhānās tapodhana // HV_App.I,29.591 //
GE07hv_apppu:7317: itaḥ suvṛṣṭyā sasyais te jīvanti puruṣā bhuvi /
GE07hv_apppu:7318: āpyāyayantas te 'py asmān dānair yajñais tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29.595 //
GE07hv_apppu:7319: na bubhukṣā pipāsā vā bādhate yadi mānuṣān /
GE07hv_apppu:7320: rogo jarā vā dharmajña mṛtyur vā ratir eva vā // HV_App.I,29.597 //
GE07hv_apppu:7321: daurgandhyaṃ vā sughorā va ītayaḥ karmasaṃbhavāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7323: sarvathā nayanaṃ tatra pārijātasya na kṣamam /
GE07hv_apppu:7324: iti vācyas tvayā vipra viṣṇur akliṣṭakarmakṛt // HV_App.I,29.601 //
GE07hv_apppu:7325: yathā yathā ca me bhrātā tuṣyaty etad vicārayan /
GE07hv_apppu:7326: tathā tathā tvayā kāryaṃ kāryaṃ matprītim icchatā // HV_App.I,29.603 //
GE07hv_apppu:7327: hārāṃś ca maṇayaś caiva candanāny agurūṇi ca /
GE07hv_apppu:7328: vastrāṇi ca vicitrāṇi vadhvās tvaṃ dvārakāṃ naya // HV_App.I,29.605 //
GE07hv_apppu:7329: yogyāni yāni martyānāṃ yavad icchati keśavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7330: na svargaparimoṣaṃ tu kartum arhati keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,29.607 //
GE07hv_apppu:7333: na pārijātaṃ ca kathaṃcana drumaṃ @ HV_App.I,29.610 @
GE07hv_apppu:7338: provāca vākyaṃ vākyajño mahātmā dharmavittamaḥ // HV_App.I,29.613 //
GE07hv_apppu:7340: mayā tava mahābāho bahumāno 'sti me tvayi // HV_App.I,29.615 //
GE07hv_apppu:7341: ukto mayā vāsudevo jānatā bhavato matam /
GE07hv_apppu:7342: na dattaḥ pārijāto hi harasyāpi tvayā purā // HV_App.I,29.617 //
GE07hv_apppu:7343: hetavaś ca mayā tasya darśitā bhoḥ samāsataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7344: na cāvagatavān devaḥ satyam etad bravīmi te // HV_App.I,29.619 //
GE07hv_apppu:7347: uvāca bhagavān devaḥ satyam etad bravīmi te /
GE07hv_apppu:7348: athāha puṇḍarīkākṣas tat tad uttaram eva ca // HV_App.I,29.621 //
GE07hv_apppu:7349: punaḥ punar mayā cāsya hetavo deva darśitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7350: tato na buddhir vyāvṛttā vṛtranāśana tasya vai // HV_App.I,29.623 //
GE07hv_apppu:7351: api cāpy uktavān devo vākyaṃ te madhusūdanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7352: prahasya puruṣaśreṣṭhaḥ saroṣam iva vāsavaḥ // HV_App.I,29.625 //
GE07hv_apppu:7356: mune samarthāḥ khalu bhadram astu te || HV_App.I,29.629 ||
GE07hv_apppu:7357: sa pārijātaṃ yadi na pradāsyati @ HV_App.I,29.630 @
GE07hv_apppu:7361: upendrasya mahendrāyaṃ bhrātus te niścayaḥ paraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7362: yad atra manyase nyāyyaṃ saṃpradhārya kuruṣva tat // HV_App.I,29.635 //
GE07hv_apppu:7363: tattvaṃ hitaṃ ca deveśa śrūyatāṃ vadato mama /
GE07hv_apppu:7364: nayanaṃ pārijātasya dvārakāṃ mama rocate // HV_App.I,29.637 //
GE07hv_apppu:7367: anāgasi mayi jyeṣṭhe sodare yadi keśavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7368: evaṃ pravṛttaḥ kiṃ śakyaṃ kartum adya tapodhana // HV_App.I,29.641 //
GE07hv_apppu:7369: bahūni pratilomāni purā sa kṛtavān mayi /
GE07hv_apppu:7370: kṛṣṇo nārada soḍhāni bhrāteti sma mayānagha // HV_App.I,29.643 //
GE07hv_apppu:7372: madīyā vāritā meghāḥ śamayanto 'gnim uddhatam // HV_App.I,29.645 //
GE07hv_apppu:7373: govardhanaṃ dhārayatās vipriyaṃ ca kṛtaṃ mama // HV_App.I,29.646 //
GE07hv_apppu:7374: tathā vṛtravadhe prāpte sāhāyyārthaṃ vṛto mayā /
GE07hv_apppu:7375: samo 'ham iti sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām iti coktavān /
GE07hv_apppu:7376: svabāhubalam āśritya vṛtraś ca nihato mayā // HV_App.I,29.649 //
GE07hv_apppu:7378: yudhyaty ātmecchayā kṛṣṇo mune suviditaṃ tava // HV_App.I,29.651 //
GE07hv_apppu:7379: bahunātra kim uktena tasmād iṣṭyā pravartatām /
GE07hv_apppu:7380: jñātibhedo na me kāryaḥ sākṣī tvaṃ mama nārada // HV_App.I,29.653 //
GE07hv_apppu:7381: mamorasi gadāṃ moktum udyato yadi keśavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7382: anuśocyātha paulomī guṇaḥ ka iha dṛśyate // HV_App.I,29.655 //
GE07hv_apppu:7383: [k: ka is missing in the cr. ed. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:7384: udavāsagato dhīmān pitā naḥ kaśyapaḥ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7385: adityā saha me mātrā tayor vācyam idaṃ bhavet // HV_App.I,29.657 //
GE07hv_apppu:7386: ajitātmā mama bhrātā rajasā mahatā vṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7387: kāmena ca striyā vākyād evaṃ mām uktavān gurum // HV_App.I,29.659 //
GE07hv_apppu:7388: sarvathā dhik striyo vipra dhig rajastamasī tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:7390: sarvaṃ ca strīṣu saṃgrāhyaṃ dhik striyaḥ sa yathā tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:7391: yatrādhikṣiptavān viṣṇur evaṃ māṃ strījito dvija // HV_App.I,29.661 //
GE07hv_apppu:7393: naiva dakṣakulaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ mātur me yatra saṃbhavaḥ // HV_App.I,29.663 //
GE07hv_apppu:7394: na jyeṣṭhatā na rājatvaṃ devānāṃ pratimānitam /
GE07hv_apppu:7397: sadvṛtto jñānasaṃpanna iti brahmā purābravīt // HV_App.I,29.667 //
GE07hv_apppu:7398: nāsti bhrātṛsamo bandhur āhārya itaro janaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7399: iti mām abravīn mātā pitā caiva prajāpatiḥ // HV_App.I,29.669 //
GE07hv_apppu:7400: sodareṣu viśeṣaṃ tu pitā me kaśyapo 'bravīt /
GE07hv_apppu:7401: dṛptā mayā virudhyante dānavāḥ pāpaniścayāḥ // HV_App.I,29.671 //
GE07hv_apppu:7402: kāmam etan na vaktavyaṃ svayam ātmastavānvitam /
GE07hv_apppu:7403: prāptas tv avasaro vipra yad ihādyocyate mayā // HV_App.I,29.673 //
GE07hv_apppu:7404: dhanur jyāyāṃ muniśreṣṭha cchinnāyāṃ hi purānagha /
GE07hv_apppu:7405: dhanvibhir amarāṇāṃ ca varadānān mahāmate // HV_App.I,29.675 //
GE07hv_apppu:7406: [k: T1-3 G1.3-6 M4 subst. for l. 675 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:7408: utkṛttaśiraso viṣṇoḥ purā deho dhṛto mayā /
GE07hv_apppu:7409: saṃdhitaṃ ca śiro yatnāc chinnaṃ raudreṇa tejasā // HV_App.I,29.677 //
GE07hv_apppu:7410: ahaṃ viśiṣṭo devānām ity uktvā punar acyutaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7411: dhanur āropya darpeṇa sthito nārada keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,29.679 //
GE07hv_apppu:7412: kiṃ māṃ pitā vā mātā va vakṣyatīti mayā mune /
GE07hv_apppu:7413: snehena vidhṛtaṃ viṣṇoḥ śarīraṃ munisattama // HV_App.I,29.681 //
GE07hv_apppu:7414: aindraṃ vaiṣṇavam asyaiva mune bhāgam ahaṃ dadau /
GE07hv_apppu:7415: yavīyāṃsam ahaṃ premṇā kṛṣṇaṃ paśyāmi nārada // HV_App.I,29.683 //
GE07hv_apppu:7417: rājā kilāhaṃ samare praharāmy agrato dhruvam // HV_App.I,29.685 //
GE07hv_apppu:7419: yatto rakṣāmi dharmajña keśavaṃ bhaktim āśritam // HV_App.I,29.687 //
GE07hv_apppu:7420: idaṃ bhaṅktvā madīyaṃ ca bhagavan viṣṇunā kṛtam /
GE07hv_apppu:7421: uparyupari lokānāṃ adhikaṃ bhavanaṃ mune // HV_App.I,29.689 //
GE07hv_apppu:7422: avamānaḥ sa ca mayā pṛṣṭhataḥ kriyate mune /
GE07hv_apppu:7423: lālanīyo mayā bāla ity evaṃ bhrātṛgauravāt // HV_App.I,29.691 //
GE07hv_apppu:7424: bālo 'yaṃ mama putreti yavīyān iti nārada /
GE07hv_apppu:7425: pitrā mātrā ca govindo nātīva paribhāṣitaḥ // HV_App.I,29.693 //
GE07hv_apppu:7426: iṣṭas tatra jananyāḥ sa keśavaḥ saviśeṣataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7427: vayaṃ dveṣyā na saṃdehas tatra sneho 'tiricyate // HV_App.I,29.695 //
GE07hv_apppu:7428: sarvajño balavāñ śūraḥ pātraṃ mānayitā tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:7429: keśavety eva ca dhyānaṃ yat tad vitathatāṃ gatam // HV_App.I,29.697 //
GE07hv_apppu:7430: gaccha nārada vaktavyaḥ keśavo vacanān mama /
GE07hv_apppu:7431: āhūto na nivarteyaṃ samaraṃ prati śatrubhiḥ // HV_App.I,29.699 //
GE07hv_apppu:7432: yadīcchasi tad āgaccha sahyaṃ te yat tvam icchasi /
GE07hv_apppu:7433: praharasva ca pūrvaṃ tvaṃ bhāryājita yathecchasi // HV_App.I,29.701 //
GE07hv_apppu:7435: praharāruhya garuḍaṃ dṛḍho bhūtvā janārdana // HV_App.I,29.703 //
GE07hv_apppu:7437: aho dhig yadi māṃ sneho viklavaṃ na kariṣyati // HV_App.I,29.705 //
GE07hv_apppu:7439: pārijātaṃ na dāsyāmi tāvad bho munisattama // HV_App.I,29.707 //
GE07hv_apppu:7441: ahaṃ taṃ marṣayiṣyāmi kimarthaṃ strījitaṃ harim // HV_App.I,29.709 //
GE07hv_apppu:7443: vivādaḥ saṃsthitaḥ so 'dya iti vācyas tvayācyutaḥ // HV_App.I,29.711 //
GE07hv_apppu:7445: ahaṃ sajjaḥ sthitaḥ sāṅga iti vācyas tvayācyuta /
GE07hv_apppu:7452: na māyayā hartum ihārhasi drumaṃ @ HV_App.I,29.718 @
GE07hv_apppu:7453: suyuddham evāstu dhig astu jihmatām || HV_App.I,29.719 ||
GE07hv_apppu:7457: vivikte devarājānam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // HV_App.I,29.721 //
GE07hv_apppu:7458: kāmaṃ priyāṇi rājāno vaktavyā nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7459: prāptakālaṃ tu vaktavyaṃ hitam apriyam acyuta // HV_App.I,29.723 //
GE07hv_apppu:7460: aniyuktaḥ purobhāgo na syād iti vadanti hi /
GE07hv_apppu:7463: yatas tataḥ pravakṣyāmi gṛhyatāṃ yadi rocate // HV_App.I,29.727 //
GE07hv_apppu:7465: nyāyyaṃ ca prāptakālaṃ ca parābhavam anicchatā // HV_App.I,29.729 //
GE07hv_apppu:7466: vaktavyaṃ sarvathā sadbhir apriyaṃ cāpi yad dhitam /
GE07hv_apppu:7467: ānṛṇyam etat snehasya sadbhir evādṛtaṃ purā // HV_App.I,29.731 //
GE07hv_apppu:7468: anṛte dharmabhagne ca na śuśrūṣati cāpriye /
GE07hv_apppu:7469: na priyaṃ na hitaṃ vācyaṃ sadbhir ete vininditāḥ // HV_App.I,29.733 //
GE07hv_apppu:7470: sarvathā deva vaktavyaṃ śrūyatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ vara /
GE07hv_apppu:7471: śrutvā ca kuru sarvajña mama śreyaskaraṃ vacaḥ // HV_App.I,29.735 //
GE07hv_apppu:7473: bhavaty anandakṛd deva dviṣatāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,29.737 //
GE07hv_apppu:7475: viparītaṃ ca tad buddhvā nityaṃ buddhimatāṃ vara // HV_App.I,29.739 //
GE07hv_apppu:7476: yat syāt tāpakaraṃ paścād ārabdhaṃ kāryam īdṛśam /
GE07hv_apppu:7477: ārabhen naiva tad vidvān eṣa buddhimatāṃ nayaḥ // HV_App.I,29.741 //
GE07hv_apppu:7479: yat tu tatkāraṇaṃ deva nibodha vibudhādhipa // HV_App.I,29.743 //
GE07hv_apppu:7480: ya eko viśvam adhyāste pradhānaṃ jagato hariḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7481: prakṛtyā yaṃ paraṃ sarve kṣetrajñaṃ vai vidur budhāḥ // HV_App.I,29.745 //
GE07hv_apppu:7483: tasyātmā prathamo devo viṣṇuḥ sarvasya dhīmataḥ // HV_App.I,29.747 //
GE07hv_apppu:7484: prakṛtyāḥ prathamo bhāga umā devī yaśasvinī /
GE07hv_apppu:7485: vyaktaḥ sarvamayo viṣṇuḥ strīsaṃjño lokabhāvanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.749 //
GE07hv_apppu:7486: rukmiṇyādyāḥ striyas tasya vyaktatve prathamo guṇaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7487: avyayā prakṛtir devī guṇadevo maheśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,29.751 //
GE07hv_apppu:7489: guṇinaś cāvyayaḥ śaśvat sadā ca prathamo guṇaḥ // HV_App.I,29.753 //
GE07hv_apppu:7491: bhoktā maheśvaro devaḥ kartā viṣṇur adhokṣajaḥ // HV_App.I,29.755 //
GE07hv_apppu:7492: brahmā devagaṇāś cānye paścāt sṛṣṭā mahātmanā /
GE07hv_apppu:7495: acintyaś cāprameyaś ca guṇebhyaś ca paras tathā // HV_App.I,29.759 //
GE07hv_apppu:7497: vareṇa cchanditā tena parituṣṭena cāditiḥ // HV_App.I,29.761 //
GE07hv_apppu:7498: tayoktas tvām ahaṃ putram icchāmīti surottama /
GE07hv_apppu:7499: praṇataṃ deva vijñāya nārāyaṇam adhokṣajam // HV_App.I,29.763 //
GE07hv_apppu:7501: aṃśena tu bhaviṣyāmi putraḥ khalv aham eva te // HV_App.I,29.765 //
GE07hv_apppu:7504: pradhānaṃ jagato nāthaḥ kartā bhartā ca keśavaḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:7505: sa jātaḥ sarvakṛd devo bhrātā tava sureśvara /
GE07hv_apppu:7506: nārāyaṇo mahātejā yam upendraṃ pracakṣate // HV_App.I,29.767 //
GE07hv_apppu:7507: icchann eva harir devaḥ kāśyapatvam upāgataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7508: tais tair bhāvair vikurute bhūtabhavyabhavo 'vyayaḥ // HV_App.I,29.769 //
GE07hv_apppu:7510: māthuraṃ jagato nāthaḥ kartā hartā ca keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,29.771 //
GE07hv_apppu:7511: yathā ca tilapiṇḍaḥ syād vyāptaḥ snehena mānada /
GE07hv_apppu:7512: tathā jagad idaṃ vyāptaṃ viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā // HV_App.I,29.773 //
GE07hv_apppu:7513: brahmaṇyadevaḥ sarvātmā tais tair bhāvair vikurvate /
GE07hv_apppu:7514: jagaty atiguṇo devo vaikuṇṭhaḥ sarvabhāvanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.775 //
GE07hv_apppu:7515: ataḥ samastadevānāṃ pūjya eva ca keśavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7516: padmanābhaś ca bhagavān prajāsargakaro vibhuḥ // HV_App.I,29.777 //
GE07hv_apppu:7517: ananto dhāraṇārthaṃ ca bibharti ca mahad yaśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7518: yajña ity api sadbhiś ca kathyate vedavādibhiḥ // HV_App.I,29.779 //
GE07hv_apppu:7519: śvetaḥ kṛtayuge devo raktas tretāyuge tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:7520: dvāpare ca yathā pītaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kaliyuge vibhuḥ // HV_App.I,29.781 //
GE07hv_apppu:7522: prātaḥ kṛtayugo yo me trātā vai madhyame tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:7523: tṛtīye dvāparo yāme saṃdhyāyāṃ kalir eva ca //
GE07hv_apppu:7529: vārāhaṃ vapur āśritya jagato hitakāmyayā // HV_App.I,29.785 //
GE07hv_apppu:7531: babandha ca baliṃ devaḥ śrīmān pannagabandhanaiḥ // HV_App.I,29.787 //
GE07hv_apppu:7535: tvayy āyattaḥ purā viṣṇur udāram ativikramaḥ // HV_App.I,29.789 //
GE07hv_apppu:7536: sāvaśeṣaṃ tapo yasya taṃ nihanti janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7537: alīkeṣv api vartantaṃ vrataṃ etan mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.791 //
GE07hv_apppu:7538: jaghne ca dānavān mukhyān devānāṃ ye ca śatravaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7539: tava priyārthaṃ govindo dharmanityaḥ satāṃ gatiḥ // HV_App.I,29.793 //
GE07hv_apppu:7540: rāmatvam api cāvāpya jaghne rāvaṇam ātmavān /
GE07hv_apppu:7541: bhūtvā kāmaguṇaś caiva jaghāna dviradaṃ hariḥ // HV_App.I,29.795 //
GE07hv_apppu:7544: jaṭī kṛṣṇājinī daṇḍī dṛṣṭapūrvo mayā hariḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7545: daiteyeṣu caran devas tṛṇeṣv agnir ivoddhataḥ // HV_App.I,29.799 //
GE07hv_apppu:7547: kurvāṇaṃ dānavair hīnaṃ jagato hitakāmyayā // HV_App.I,29.801 //
GE07hv_apppu:7549: dvārakām amaraśreṣṭha nānṛtaṃ ca bravīmy aham // HV_App.I,29.803 //
GE07hv_apppu:7551: nāpi kṛṣṇas tvayi jyeṣṭha prahariṣyati vāsava // HV_App.I,29.805 //
GE07hv_apppu:7552: naiva cec chroṣyasi proktaṃ mayā deva kathaṃcana /
GE07hv_apppu:7553: pṛccha tvaṃ nayadharmajñān ye hitās tava mantriṇaḥ // HV_App.I,29.807 //
GE07hv_apppu:7555: idam uttaram īśo 'tha pratyuvāca jagadgurum // HV_App.I,29.809 //
GE07hv_apppu:7556: evaṃvidhaprabhāvaṃ tvaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ vadasi yad dvija /
GE07hv_apppu:7557: evam etat subahuśaḥ śrutaṃ khalu mayā mune // HV_App.I,29.811 //
GE07hv_apppu:7558: yataś caivaṃvidhaḥ kṛṣṇas tato 'haṃ tasya taṃ tarum /
GE07hv_apppu:7559: na pradāsyāmi dātavyaṃ satāṃ dharmam anusmaran // HV_App.I,29.813 //
GE07hv_apppu:7561: vyavasthito 'haṃ bhadraṃ te mune sarvaguṇoditaḥ // HV_App.I,29.815 //
GE07hv_apppu:7563: śrotāraś caiva satataṃ vṛddhānāṃ jñānacakṣuṣām // HV_App.I,29.817 //
GE07hv_apppu:7564: mahātmā kāraṇe nālpe kṛṣṇo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7565: bhrātrā jyeṣṭhena dharmajño virodhaṃ gantum arhati // HV_App.I,29.819 //
GE07hv_apppu:7566: yathaiva mama mātuḥ sa varaṃ prādād adhokṣajaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7567: tathaiva tasyāḥ putrāṇāṃ jyeṣṭhānāṃ soḍhum arhati // HV_App.I,29.821 //
GE07hv_apppu:7569: tathaiva bhrātur indrasya saṃmānaṃ kartum arhati // HV_App.I,29.823 //
GE07hv_apppu:7570: jyaiṣṭhyam etena devena nārabdhaṃ kiṃ purātane /
GE07hv_apppu:7571: athedānīm apīcchet sa jyeṣṭho 'stu madhusūdanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.825 //
GE07hv_apppu:7583: kevalaṃ yojayantaṃ ca vākyamātreṇa bhāminīm // HV_App.I,29.835 //
GE07hv_apppu:7585: pūjayām āsa ca tadā vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā // HV_App.I,29.837 //
GE07hv_apppu:7590: śrutvā kṛṣṇas tu tat sarvaṃ nāradaṃ vākyam abravīt /
GE07hv_apppu:7591: amarāvatīṃ purīṃ yāsye so 'haṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ vara // HV_App.I,29.843 //
GE07hv_apppu:7592: ity uktvā nāradenaiva sahitaḥ sāgaraṃ yayau /
GE07hv_apppu:7593: saṃdideśa tatas tatra vivikte nāradaṃ hariḥ // HV_App.I,29.845 //
GE07hv_apppu:7596: na yuddhe pramukhe śakra sthātum arhasi me prabho /
GE07hv_apppu:7597: pārijātasya nayane niścitaṃ tvam avehi mām // HV_App.I,29.849 //
GE07hv_apppu:7598: evam uktas tu kṛṣṇena nāradas tridivaṃ gataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7601: śrutvā bṛhaspatir devam uvāca kurunandana // HV_App.I,29.853 //
GE07hv_apppu:7602: aho dhig brahmasadanaṃ mayi yāte śatakrato /
GE07hv_apppu:7603: durnītam idam ārabdham atra bhedo hi dāruṇaḥ // HV_App.I,29.855 //
GE07hv_apppu:7605: mamaitat kṛtyam ārabdhaṃ deva kenāpi hetunā // HV_App.I,29.857 //
GE07hv_apppu:7607: jagadvṛtraghna na vidhiḥ śakyaḥ samativartitum // HV_App.I,29.859 //
GE07hv_apppu:7608: sahasaiva tu kāryāṇām prārambho na praśasyate /
GE07hv_apppu:7609: tad etat sahasārabdhaṃ kāryaṃ dāsyati lāghavam // HV_App.I,29.861 //
GE07hv_apppu:7610: bṛhaspatiṃ mahātmānaṃ mahendras tv abravīd vacaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7611: evaṃ gate 'dya yat kāryaṃ tad bhavān vaktum arhati // HV_App.I,29.863 //
GE07hv_apppu:7615: tathā śakra kariṣyāmi yathā nyāyyaṃ bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,29.867 //
GE07hv_apppu:7616: bṛhaspatis tv evam uktvā kṣīrodaṃ sāgaraṃ gataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:7617: ācaṣṭa munaye sarvaṃ kaśyapāya mahātmane // HV_App.I,29.869 //
GE07hv_apppu:7618: tac chrutvā kaśyapaḥ kruddho bṛhaspatim abhāṣata /
GE07hv_apppu:7619: avaśyaṃ bhāvyam etad bhoḥ sarvathā nātra saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,29.871 //
GE07hv_apppu:7621: apadhyānakṛto doṣaḥ pataty eṣa śatakratoḥ // HV_App.I,29.873 //
GE07hv_apppu:7622: asya doṣasya śāntyartham ārabdhaś ca mune mayā /
GE07hv_apppu:7623: udavāsaḥ sa doṣaś ca prāpta eva sudāruṇaḥ // HV_App.I,29.875 //
GE07hv_apppu:7625: ubhau tau vārayiṣyāmi daivaṃ saṃvadate yadi // HV_App.I,29.877 //
GE07hv_apppu:7626: bṛhaspatis tu dharmātmā mārīcam idam abravīt /
GE07hv_apppu:7627: prāptakālaṃ tvayā tatra bhavitavyaṃ tapodhana // HV_App.I,29.879 //
GE07hv_apppu:7631: varārtho kaśyapo dhīmān adityā sahitaḥ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,29.883 //
GE07hv_apppu:7632: tuṣṭāva ca tam īśanaṃ mārīcaḥ kaśyapas tadā /

GE07hv_apppu:8248: uktā dharmaguṇair yuktā yādavena mahātmanā // HV_App.I,29.1453 //
GE07hv_apppu:8250: mahendraṃ saha śacyā ca pratasthe dvārakāṃ prati // HV_App.I,29.1455 //

GE07hv_apppu:8257: tāni saṃbhāvayethās tvaṃ vastrair ābharaṇais tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:8258: pratigṛhya mahātejāḥ prayayau dvārakāṃ prati // HV_App.I,29.1461 //

GE07hv_apppu:8267: praveśayiṣye nagare śobhā prakriyatāṃ śubhā // HV_App.I,29.1469 //

GE07hv_apppu:8271: pradyumno dvārakāṃ ramyāṃ viveśa rathināṃ varaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1473 //
GE07hv_apppu:8273: tasyānu rathamukhyena satyakaḥ sāmba eva ca // HV_App.I,29.1475 //

GE07hv_apppu:8279: rājan na tatṛpur hṛṣṭāḥ paśyamānā mahodayam // HV_App.I,29.1481 //
GE07hv_apppu:8281: vṛkṣottamaṃ paśyatāṃ vai vṛddhānām agamaj jarā // HV_App.I,29.1483 //
GE07hv_apppu:8282: ye tv andhacakṣuṣaḥ sarve te 'bhavan divyacakṣuṣaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8283: virogā rogiṇaś cāsan ghrātvā gandhaṃ vanaspateḥ // HV_App.I,29.1485 //
GE07hv_apppu:8285: babhūvur hṛṣṭamanaso vavanduś ca janārdanam // HV_App.I,29.1487 //
GE07hv_apppu:8287: śuśruvus tasya vṛkṣasya nātidūragatā narāḥ // HV_App.I,29.1489 //

GE07hv_apppu:8289: sa tadaiva tam ājaghre pārijātasamudbhavam // HV_App.I,29.1491 //
GE07hv_apppu:8290: tataḥ praviśya ramyāṃ tu dvārakāṃ yadunandanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8291: vasudevaṃ mahātmānaṃ dadṛśe devakīṃ tathā // HV_App.I,29.1493 //
GE07hv_apppu:8292: kukurādhipatiṃ caiva balaṃ bhrātaram eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:8293: vṛddhāṃś ca yādavānāṃ ye mānārhān amaropamān // HV_App.I,29.1495 //
GE07hv_apppu:8295: saṃpūjya ca yathānyāyaṃ svam eva bhavanaṃ gataḥ // HV_App.I,29.1497 //
GE07hv_apppu:8298: sā devī pūjayām āsa prahṛṣṭā vāsavānujam /
GE07hv_apppu:8300: manīṣitena sa tarur alpo bhavati bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:8301: mahāṃś ca vāsudevasya tad adbhutam ivābhavat // HV_App.I,29.1503 //
GE07hv_apppu:8303: kadācid dhastadhāryas tu bhavaty aṅguṣṭhasaṃnibhaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1505 //

GE07hv_apppu:8305: puṇyakārthaṃ tu saṃbhārān saṃbhartum upacakrame // HV_App.I,29.1507 //
GE07hv_apppu:8306: yāni dravyāṇi kauravya jambudvīpe tu kānicit /
GE07hv_apppu:8307: yogyāni tāni kṛṣṇena saṃhṛtāni mahātmanā // HV_App.I,29.1509 //
GE07hv_apppu:8308: muniṃ tadā saṃsmṛtavān sa nāradaṃ @ HV_App.I,29.1510 @
GE07hv_apppu:8315: ājagāma muniśreṣṭho nārado vadatāṃ varaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1515 //
GE07hv_apppu:8316: taṃ pūjayitvā vidhivad vāsudevo viśāṃ pate /
GE07hv_apppu:8318: tataḥ kāle ca saṃprāpte snātaṃ devo mahāmunim /
GE07hv_apppu:8319: saṃpūjya mālyair gandhaiś ca bhojayām āsa bhārata // HV_App.I,29.1519 //
GE07hv_apppu:8323: babandha kṛṣṇaṃ subhagā pārijāte vanaspatau // HV_App.I,29.1523 //
GE07hv_apppu:8325: devī dhenusahasraṃ ca kāñcanasya ca parvatam // HV_App.I,29.1525 //
GE07hv_apppu:8327: tilamiśrasya ca tathā dhānyair anyair yutasya ca // HV_App.I,29.1527 //
GE07hv_apppu:8328: pratigṛhya tu tat sarvaṃ nārado munisattamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8329: prahṛṣṭo vadatāṃ śreṣṭho bhuktvā keśavam abravīt // HV_App.I,29.1529 //
GE07hv_apppu:8330: bhoḥ keśava madīyas tvam adbhir datto 'si satyayā /
GE07hv_apppu:8332: sa tvaṃ mām anugacchasva kuru yad yad bravīmy aham // HV_App.I,29.1531 //
GE07hv_apppu:8333: prathamaḥ kalpaḥ ity evam abravīn madhusūdanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8334: vrajantam anuvavrāja nāradaṃ ca janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1533 //
GE07hv_apppu:8338: kapilāṃ gāṃ savatsāṃ bho niṣkrayārthaṃ prayaccha me // HV_App.I,29.1537 //
GE07hv_apppu:8339: kṛṣṇājinaṃ tilaiḥ pūrṇaṃ prayaccha ca sakāñcanam /
GE07hv_apppu:8340: eṣo 'tra niṣkrayaḥ kṛṣṇa vihito vṛṣaketunā // HV_App.I,29.1539 //
GE07hv_apppu:8341: tathety uktvā hṛṣīkeśas tathā cakre janādhipa /
GE07hv_apppu:8343: varaṃ varaya dharmajña yas te nārada kāṅkṣitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8344: taṃ te dātāsmi dharmajña parā prītir hi me tvayi // HV_App.I,29.1543 //
GE07hv_apppu:8346: nityam evāstu me prīto bhavān viṣṇo sanātana /
GE07hv_apppu:8347: tvatprabhāvāc ca sālokyaṃ vrajeyaṃ te mahāmate // HV_App.I,29.1545 //
GE07hv_apppu:8348: ayonijo bhaveyaṃ ca nārāyaṇa satāṃ gate /
GE07hv_apppu:8349: bhaveyaṃ brāhmaṇaś caiva punarjātyantareṣv aham // HV_App.I,29.1547 //
GE07hv_apppu:8350: evam astv iti taṃ devo viṣṇuḥ provāca bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:8351: tutoṣa ca tato dhīmān nārado munisattamaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1549 //
GE07hv_apppu:8355: śacyā yo vāsudevasya purā datto narādhipa // HV_App.I,29.1553 //
GE07hv_apppu:8356: pārijāto vasaṃs tatra tataḥ pravavṛdhe tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:8360: pāṇḍavāṃś cānayām āsa sahaiva pṛthayā hariḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8361: draupadyā ca mahātejās tathaiva ca subhadrayā // HV_App.I,29.1559 //
GE07hv_apppu:8362: śrutaśravāṃ ca sasutāṃ bhīṣmakaṃ sasutaṃ tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:8363: anyān api ca kauravya mitrasaṃbandhibāndhavān // HV_App.I,29.1561 //
GE07hv_apppu:8364: reme ca saha pārthena phālgunena janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8367: pārijātaṃ punaḥ svargam anayat sarvabhāvanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1565 //
GE07hv_apppu:8368: tatrāditiṃ kaśyapaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā svapitarau prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8371: saubhrātram astu vām evaṃ nityaṃ cāmarasattama // HV_App.I,29.1569 //
GE07hv_apppu:8373: tathety evābravīt kṛṣṇas tato mātaram ātmavān // HV_App.I,29.1571 //
GE07hv_apppu:8375: vāsudevo mahātejāḥ kālaprāptam idaṃ vacaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1573 //
GE07hv_apppu:8377: antarbhūmitale vadhyān asurān prati mānada // HV_App.I,29.1575 //
GE07hv_apppu:8381: eko 'tra mānuṣo devo devaputras tathāparaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1579 //
GE07hv_apppu:8382: avadhyāḥ kila te devair brahmaṇo varadarpitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8383: asmābhiḥ kila hantavyā mānuṣatvam upāgataiḥ // HV_App.I,29.1581 //
GE07hv_apppu:8384: tatheti kṛṣṇaṃ sa hariḥ prītarūpas tadābravīt /
GE07hv_apppu:8385: sasvajāte 'tha tau devāv anyonyaṃ janamejaya // HV_App.I,29.1583 //
GE07hv_apppu:8387: prītātmā kuruśārdūla kuṇḍaladvayam eva ca // HV_App.I,29.1585 //
GE07hv_apppu:8389: [h: HV (CE) Appendix 29A, transliterated by Renate Söhnen--Thieme, version of July-Āugust 2004 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:8390: [k: After App I (No. 29), K ÑV BDT GM4 cont. with a passage given in App. I (No. 29A).
GE07hv_apppu:8393: dvaipāyanaprasādena sarvaṃ hi viditaṃ tava // HV_App.I,29A.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:8396: śṛṇu yena vidhānena loke djarmabhṛtāṃ vara // HV_App.I,29A.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:8398: yayau dvāravatīṃ dhīmān nārado munisattamaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:8402: āsīnaṃ paripapraccha rukmiṇī bhaiṣmakī nṛpa // HV_App.I,29A.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:8403: tatra jāmbavatī devī satyamhāmā ca bhāminī /
GE07hv_apppu:8405: devyaś ca nṛpa kṛṣṇasya bahvyo 'nyā vai samāgatāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8409: utpattiṃ puṇyakānāṃ tvaṃn vaktum arhasy aśeṣataḥ // HV_App.I,29A.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:8410: vidhiṃ ca phalayojaṃ ye dānakālaṃ tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:8411: kautūhalaṃ naḥ paramaṃ tac chindhi dvipadāṃ vara // HV_App.I,29A.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:8414: puṇyakānāṃ vidhiḥ prokto yathā devyomayā purā // HV_App.I,29A.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:8416: vratāvasāne 'tha tayā sakhyo devi nimantritāḥ // HV_App.I,29A.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:8418: paulomī ca śacī devī khyātā like pativratā // HV_App.I,29A.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:8420: phalgunī ca tahtā pūrvā revatī ca visāṃ pate // HV_App.I,29A.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:8421: tathā śatabhiṣā caiva maghā ca kurunandana /
GE07hv_apppu:8422: etābhir hi mahādevī pūrvam ārādhitā satī // HV_App.I,29A.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:8423: gaṅgā sarasvatī caiva celagaṅgā ca nimnagā /
GE07hv_apppu:8424: tathā vaitaraṇī caiva gaṇḍakī yā ca bhārata // HV_App.I,29A.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:8425: anyāś ca sarito ramyā lopāmudrā ca bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:8426: satyaś cānyā jagaddevi dhārayanti hi tāḥ śubhāḥ // HV_App.I,29A.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:8427: śubhāś ca girinandinyo vahnikanyāś ca suvratāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8428: svāhā vahnipriyā devī sāvitrī ca yaśasvinī // HV_App.I,29A.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:8430: bhāryā pitṛpateś caiva vasupatnyas tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29A.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:8431: hrīḥ śrīr dhṛtis tathā kīrtir āśā meghā ca suvratā /
GE07hv_apppu:8432: prītir matiś ca khyātiś ca saṃyatiś ca tapodhanāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8433: devyaḥ satyas tathaivānyāḥ sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ // HV_App.I,29A.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:8434: tāsāṃ vratāvasāne ca pūjāṃ cakre 'mbikā tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:8436: vāsobhir bahubhir mukhyair nānārāgaiḥ sumadhyame // HV_App.I,29A.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:8437: pratigṛhya tu tāṃ pūjāṃ dattāṃ devyā tapodhanāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8438: upaviṣṭāḥ kathāś citrāḥ kurvantyo bhartṛdevatāḥ // HV_App.I,29A.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:8439: puṇyakārthaṃ kathās tāsām āsan devī śaśaṃsa yāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8440: vidhiṃ ca puṇyakasyātha satīnāṃ bhartṛdevate // HV_App.I,29A.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:8442: paryapṛcchad umāṃ devīṃ puṇyakānāṃ vidhiṃ varam // HV_App.I,29A.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:8443: umā tāsāṃ priyārthaṃ tu puṇyakāny abravīt tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:8444: samakṣaṃ mama vaidarbhi sarvabhūtahite ratā // HV_App.I,29A.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:8445: mamaiva comayā dattaḥ sa tadā ratnaparvataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8446: pratigṛhya mayā caiva kṛto brāhmaṇāc chubhe // HV_App.I,29A.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:8447: umā tv arundhatīṃ sādhvīm āmantrya yad abhāṣata /
GE07hv_apppu:8448: śṛṇu kalyāṇi vakṣyāmi sarvābhiḥ sahitā śubhe // HV_App.I,29A.54 //
GE07hv_apppu:8450: yathā caiva mayā dṛṣṭas tata eṣa vidhiḥ śubhe // HV_App.I,29A.56 //
GE07hv_apppu:8454: tadā purā mayādiṣṭo dṛṣṭaḥ puṇyavidhiḥ śubhaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:8456: mahādevaprasādena mayā dṛṣṭas tv arundhati // HV_App.I,29A.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:8457: puṇyakāni ca sarvāṇi cīrṇavaty asmy anindite /
GE07hv_apppu:8458: anujñayā bhagavato bhartuḥ śarvasya dhīmataḥ // HV_App.I,29A.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:8462: puṇyakānāṃ vidhis tasyāḥ purāṇe parikīrtitaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:8464: niṣphalāny asatīnāṃ hi puṇyakāni tathā śubhe // HV_App.I,29A.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:8465: yā vañcayanti bhartāraṃ yoniduṣṭāś ca yāḥ striyaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8468: ananyā dharmanityāś ca satāṃ panthānam āśritāḥ // HV_App.I,29A.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:8470: satataṃ sādhuvādinyo dhārayanti jagat khalu // HV_App.I,29A.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:8471: vyādhitaḥ patito vāpi dīno vāpi katkhaṃcana /
GE07hv_apppu:8472: na tyaktavyaḥ striyā bhartā dharma eṣa sanātanaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:8474: strī patiṃ tārayaty eva tathātmānaṃ śubhānane // HV_App.I,29A.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:8476: vāgduṣṭe vihitaṃ sadbhiḥ prāyaścittaṃ purātane // HV_App.I,29A.78 //
GE07hv_apppu:8477: bhartuś chandena kartavyaṃ vratakaṃ sarvadā striyā /
GE07hv_apppu:8478: upavāso 'pi vā satye kāṇkṣantyā sukṛtāṃ gatim // HV_App.I,29A.80 //
GE07hv_apppu:8479: kalpāntarasahasreṣu na strī sā labhate gatim /
GE07hv_apppu:8481: yadi syān nāma mānuṣyaṃ strī labhed asatī satī /
GE07hv_apppu:8483: bhartā devaḥ sadā strīṇāṃ sadbhir dṛṣṭas tapodhane /
GE07hv_apppu:8484: yasyā hi tuṣyate bhartā sā satī dharmacāriṇī // HV_App.I,29A.86 //
GE07hv_apppu:8485: kautūhalahatānāṃ tu striṇāṃ loko na śobhanaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.87 //
GE07hv_apppu:8486: bhartary eva mano yāsāṃ sadbhāvena vyavasthitam /
GE07hv_apppu:8487: karmaṇā manasā vācā patiṃ nāticaranti yāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8488: tāsāṃ puṇyaphalaṃ saumye puṇyakaiḥ samudāhṛtam // HV_App.I,29A.90 //
GE07hv_apppu:8489: puṇyakānāṃ vidhiṃ kṛtsnaṃ svarlokaṃ prati śobhane /
GE07hv_apppu:8490: nibodha saha sarvābhir dṛṣṭo yas tapasā mayā // HV_App.I,29A.92 //
GE07hv_apppu:8491: snātvā strī pratar utthāya patiṃ vijñāpayet satī /
GE07hv_apppu:8492: upavāsārtham atha vā vratakāryaṃ dhṛtavrate // HV_App.I,29A.94 //
GE07hv_apppu:8493: śvaśurābhyāṃ ca caraṇau satataṃ saṃnamasya ca /
GE07hv_apppu:8494: grahāyaudambaraṃ pātraṃ sakuśaṃ sākṣataṃ tathā // HV_App.I,29A.96 //
GE07hv_apppu:8495: gośṛṅgaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ sicya pratigṛhṇīta taj jalam /
GE07hv_apppu:8496: tato bhartuḥ satī dadyāt snātasya prayatasya ca // HV_App.I,29A.98 //
GE07hv_apppu:8497: ātmano 'tha niṣektavyaṃ tataḥ śirasi taj jalam /
GE07hv_apppu:8498: trailokye sarvatīrtheṣu snānam etad udāhṛtam // HV_App.I,29A.100 //
GE07hv_apppu:8499: upavāseṣu kartavyam etad dhi vratakeṣu ca /
GE07hv_apppu:8500: snānam etad dhi sāmānyaṃ strīṇāṃ puṃsāṃ ca bhāvini // HV_App.I,29A.102 //
GE07hv_apppu:8503: svayaṃ prakṣālanaṃ cāpi pādayor anuśabditam // HV_App.I,29A.105 //
GE07hv_apppu:8504: aśruprapāto roṣaś ca kalahaś ca kṛtaḥ sati /
GE07hv_apppu:8505: upavāsād vratād vāpi sadyo bhraṃśayati striyaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.107 //
GE07hv_apppu:8506: śuklam eva sadā vāsaḥ praśastaṃ candrasaṃbhave /
GE07hv_apppu:8507: antarvāsaṃ coparaṃ caiva upavāse vrate tathā // HV_App.I,29A.109 //
GE07hv_apppu:8508: pādukāryaṃ trṇaiḥ kāryaṃ sarvadā vratake sati /
GE07hv_apppu:8509: upavāse 'pi ca vidhir eṣa eva prakīrtitaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.111 //
GE07hv_apppu:8510: añjanaṃ rocanaṃ cāpi gandhān sumanasas tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:8511: vratake copavāse ca nityam eva vivarjayet // HV_App.I,29A.113 //
GE07hv_apppu:8513: vivarjitaṃ mṛdā sarvaḥ śaucarthas tu vidhīyate // HV_App.I,29A.115 //
GE07hv_apppu:8515: prakṣālanaṃ vai śirasaḥ sadā mṛnmiśritair jalaiḥ // HV_App.I,29A.117 //
GE07hv_apppu:8517: na pādayor na gātrasya sneheneti sthitiḥ smṛtā // HV_App.I,29A.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:8518: goyānam uṣṭrayānaṃ ca kharayānaṃ ca varjitam /
GE07hv_apppu:8519: nagnasnānaṃ ca satataṃ vrate cāpy upavāsake // HV_App.I,29A.121 //
GE07hv_apppu:8521: śubhe taḍāgavāpy ādau vistīrṇe jalajāyute // HV_App.I,29A.123 //
GE07hv_apppu:8522: gatvā snānaṃ praśastaṃ tu sadaive khalu sarvathā /
GE07hv_apppu:8523: alābhe tv avaruddhā strī ghaṭasnānaṃ samācaret // HV_App.I,29A.125 //
GE07hv_apppu:8524: navaiś ca kumbhaiḥ snātavyaṃ vidhir eṣa purātanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8525: snānaṃ ca kāryaṃ śirasā tapaḥphalam avāpnuyāt // HV_App.I,29A.127 //
GE07hv_apppu:8529: caret saṃvatsaraṃ dāntā ṣaṇmāsān māsam eva vā // HV_App.I,29A.129 //
GE07hv_apppu:8530: striyo hy āvāhayet sādhvīr ekādaśa samādhinā /
GE07hv_apppu:8531: svayaṃ caiva vidhir dṛṣṭo vratakānāṃ vidhiḥ śubhaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.131 //
GE07hv_apppu:8532: adbhir dadyāt satī sarvā yā mūlavratinī bhavet /
GE07hv_apppu:8533: tāsāṃ tu niṣkrayo deyo deśakālānurūpataḥ // HV_App.I,29A.133 //
GE07hv_apppu:8534: tato māsāntaśuklasya tithau ca navamī tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:8537: ādau cānte ca kurvīta vratakasyāpi siddhaye // HV_App.I,29A.137 //
GE07hv_apppu:8538: kṣurakarma tato bhartur ātmanaś caiva kārayet /
GE07hv_apppu:8539: utsādanaṃ na snānaṃ ca tasminn ahani saṃsmṛtam // HV_App.I,29A.139 //
GE07hv_apppu:8540: tato vivāhavat snānaṃ vihitaṃ puṇyake śubhe /
GE07hv_apppu:8541: maṇḍanaṃ caiva vihitaṃ mālyadhāraṇam eva ca // HV_App.I,29A.141 //
GE07hv_apppu:8542: kumbhais tu snāpyamānemaṃ sādhvī mantram udīrayet /
GE07hv_apppu:8543: bhartuḥ pādau namaskṛtya manasā vātha vā girā // HV_App.I,29A.143 //
GE07hv_apppu:8544: āpo devyo ṛṣīṇāṃ hi viśvadhātryo @ HV_App.I,29A.144 @
GE07hv_apppu:8548: apām eṣa smṛto mantraḥ sarvatrānyatra me śṛṇu /
GE07hv_apppu:8552: mā karmaṇā manasā vāpi vācā @ HV_App.I,29A.152 @
GE07hv_apppu:8553: bhartur bhaveyaṃ ruśatī syāṃ vaśaṃgā || HV_App.I,29A.153 ||
GE07hv_apppu:8557: sarvāmanā syāṃ na daridrā bhaveyam || HV_App.I,29A.157 ||
GE07hv_apppu:8558: patiś ca me syāt sumukho matpratīkṣo @ HV_App.I,29A.158 @
GE07hv_apppu:8559: nityaṃ madbhaktaḥ syāmn manmatir madgatiś ca |
GE07hv_apppu:8560: prītiś ca nau syāc cakravākānurūpā @ HV_App.I,29A.160 @
GE07hv_apppu:8561: manovirāgo na bhavet sādhu ca syāt || HV_App.I,29A.161 ||
GE07hv_apppu:8564: ubhe ule yāḥ śubhāḥ pāvayanti @ HV_App.I,29A.164 @
GE07hv_apppu:8565: pitur bhartuś ca patibhaktyorjitāś ca || HV_App.I,29A.165 ||
GE07hv_apppu:8566: bhūmir vāyur jalam ākāśam agnir @ HV_App.I,29A.166 @
GE07hv_apppu:8568: ahaṃkāra7s ca mama sākṣye niyuktāḥ @ HV_App.I,29A.168 @
GE07hv_apppu:8569: smareyur me niścayaṃ ca vrataṃ ca || HV_App.I,29A.169 ||
GE07hv_apppu:8572: santv ete me sākṣiṇaḥ sarvasaṃsthā @ HV_App.I,29A.172 @
GE07hv_apppu:8573: vrate cāsmin niścaye cāpi vṛtte || HV_App.I,29A.173 ||
GE07hv_apppu:8575: diśaḥ sarvā daśa cātmā ca me 'yam |
GE07hv_apppu:8576: santv ete vai sākṣiṇaḥ sarva eva @ HV_App.I,29A.176 @
GE07hv_apppu:8577: vrate cāsmin niścaye cāpi nityam || HV_App.I,29A.177 ||
GE07hv_apppu:8580: snātvātha vāsasī dadyād bhartuḥ kartya svayaṃ śubhe /
GE07hv_apppu:8581: athātmakartitaṃ na syāc chubhe vighnena kenacit // HV_App.I,29A.181 //
GE07hv_apppu:8582: vāso 'nyad eva dadyāc ca śvetaṃ mukhyaṃ navaṃ śuci /
GE07hv_apppu:8583: svakartitaṃ sūtratantuṃ vāsasā tena miśrayet // HV_App.I,29A.183 //
GE07hv_apppu:8585: bhojayec ca yathāśakti saha bhartrā sumadhyame // HV_App.I,29A.185 //
GE07hv_apppu:8587: śayyā yānaṃ gṛhaṃ dhānyaṃ dāsīdāsaṃ tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29A.187 //
GE07hv_apppu:8588: alaṃkāraḥ śaktitaś ca ratnaparvata eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:8590: vāsobhiś ca praticchanno nānāvarṇair arundhati // HV_App.I,29A.190 //
GE07hv_apppu:8591: hastyaśvājarathāś caiva deyā gaur eva ca dhruvam // HV_App.I,29A.191 //
GE07hv_apppu:8593: guḍasya madhunaś caiva suvarṇasya ca śobhanām // HV_App.I,29A.193 //
GE07hv_apppu:8594: tathaiva sarvagandhānāṃ rasānāṃ pṛthag eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:8595: tathā sumanasāṃ dadyād rūpasyaudumbarasya ca // HV_App.I,29A.195 //
GE07hv_apppu:8596: phalānāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ vāsasām api nandini /
GE07hv_apppu:8597: citrapratikṛtiṃ caiva yāṃś cānyān apy abhīpsyati // HV_App.I,29A.197 //
GE07hv_apppu:8599: sarpiṣā dūrvayā caiva yāṃś cānyān apy abhīpsati // HV_App.I,29A.199 //
GE07hv_apppu:8601: alpaṃ vā bahulaṃ vāpi bhartuś chandena sarvadā // HV_App.I,29A.201 //
GE07hv_apppu:8602: tilapātraṃ pradātavyaṃ na deyaṃ na tu śobhane /
GE07hv_apppu:8603: gaus tv avaśyaṃ pradātavyā kapilā kāṃsyam eva ca // HV_App.I,29A.203 //
GE07hv_apppu:8605: ādarśaś caiva kūrcaś ca tathājinam anindite // HV_App.I,29A.205 //
GE07hv_apppu:8608: mṛṣṭahastā dhanāḍhyā ca strī bhavaty amalekṣāṇā /
GE07hv_apppu:8610: bhavanti subhagāś cāḍhyās tathaiva ca purodhikāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8611: putravatyo dhanāḍhyāś ca śīlavatyaś ca nityadā // HV_App.I,29A.211 //
GE07hv_apppu:8612: arundhati kṛtaṃ hy etan mayaiva prathamaṃ yataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8613: umāvratakam ity evaṃ khyātam atra mahītale // HV_App.I,29A.213 //
GE07hv_apppu:8614: etad evottamaṃ strīṇāṃ vrataṃ tasmāt samācaret /
GE07hv_apppu:8615: sarvakāmān avāpnoti strī dattvaivam anindite // HV_App.I,29A.215 //
GE07hv_apppu:8617: purābhiṣiktavān saumye priyārthaṃ mama sarvakṛt // HV_App.I,29A.217 //
GE07hv_apppu:8618: vratakasyāvasāne tu deyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca nityadā /
GE07hv_apppu:8619: strīṇāṃ pradeyāḥ kāmāś ca sadṛśāḥ kāladeśayoḥ // HV_App.I,29A.219 //
GE07hv_apppu:8621: chandato brāhmaṇānāṃ tu deyam annaṃ sadakṣiṇam // HV_App.I,29A.221 //
GE07hv_apppu:8622: pāyasaṃ tatra dātavyaṃ vratake nānyad iṣyate /
GE07hv_apppu:8623: nātra prāṇivadhaḥ kāryaḥ purāṇe niyatā śrutiḥ // HV_App.I,29A.223 //
GE07hv_apppu:8625: mahādevaprasādeva dṛṣṭavaty asmi yac chubhe // HV_App.I,29A.225 //
GE07hv_apppu:8626: sarvāḥ putraphalāḥ nāryaḥ sadbhir etad udāhṛtam /
GE07hv_apppu:8627: tasmād anviṣyatī dadyāt saputrakarakāñ śubhe // HV_App.I,29A.227 //
GE07hv_apppu:8628: jyeṣṭhāṣāḍhau śubhau māsau puroktaṃ vidhim ācaret /
GE07hv_apppu:8629: atha vā jyeṣṭham evaikam āṣāḍhaṃ vā samācaret // HV_App.I,29A.229 //
GE07hv_apppu:8630: tato māsadvaye pūrṇe māse vā varavarṇini /
GE07hv_apppu:8633: jalasya ca tathā dadyāt pūrayitvā śaśiprabhe // HV_App.I,29A.233 //
GE07hv_apppu:8635: saputrakarakān dadyād yāvanto manasaḥ priyāḥ // HV_App.I,29A.235 //
GE07hv_apppu:8636: icched duhitaraṃ ced dhi strīnāmnā kārayet tataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8637: kiṃcid dravyaṃ sutākāmāt sutāṃ prāpnoty asaṃśayam // HV_App.I,29A.237 //
GE07hv_apppu:8638: gaur vātha kāñcanaṃ vāpi dakṣiṇārthaṃ praśasyate /
GE07hv_apppu:8639: viprasyācchādanaṃ deyam avaśyaṃ tu śucismite // HV_App.I,29A.239 //
GE07hv_apppu:8644: karakān api dadyāc ca pūrṇe saṃvatsare śubhe /
GE07hv_apppu:8645: anujñayā sadā bhartuḥ satyavādiny arundhati // HV_App.I,29A.245 //
GE07hv_apppu:8647: yajñopavītaṃ viprasya vrataṃ saṃsthāpya kāmikam // HV_App.I,29A.247 //
GE07hv_apppu:8650: parasya putrīti hi tā vaidhavyaṃ prāpnivanti hi /
GE07hv_apppu:8652: prayacchantī satī strībhiḥ sarvān kāmān samaśnute // HV_App.I,29A.249 //
GE07hv_apppu:8653: na ca saṃbhakṣayet kiṃcin nārī dhānyam atho phalam /
GE07hv_apppu:8654: puṣpaṃ vā nopayuñjīta yāvad evaṃ samācaret // HV_App.I,29A.251 //
GE07hv_apppu:8655: ekabhaktena dharmajñe sā tryahaṃ kṣantum arhati /
GE07hv_apppu:8656: brāhmaṇāya tato deyaṃ bhartuś ca tadanantaram // HV_App.I,29A.253 //
GE07hv_apppu:8658: bhavaty avidhavā caiva strī dhanasya tatheśvarī // HV_App.I,29A.255 //
GE07hv_apppu:8659: vārtākāni na khāded yā strī pūrṇaṃ parivatsaram /
GE07hv_apppu:8660: na sā putravināśaṃ hi paśyatīty avagamyatām // HV_App.I,29A.257 //
GE07hv_apppu:8661: śaśakaṃ mṛgamāṃsaṃ ca nityam eva vivarjayet /
GE07hv_apppu:8662: nāpnoti maraṇaṃ nārī prāpnoti patidevatām // HV_App.I,29A.259 //
GE07hv_apppu:8664: kalambūṃ kāñcanaṃ dadyād yā bhartuḥ sukham icchati // HV_App.I,29A.261 //
GE07hv_apppu:8665: pūrṇe saṃvatsare dadyād ekaikaṃ śākam ādṛtā /
GE07hv_apppu:8666: sudakṣiṇaṃ putravatī bhavaty eṣā purodhikā // HV_App.I,29A.263 //
GE07hv_apppu:8667: svayaṃ prakṣālayānā strī svapādāv evam āditaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8668: pratiṣṭhāṃ labhate nityam udvegaṃ nādhigacchati // HV_App.I,29A.265 //
GE07hv_apppu:8669: divā yā sūryapūtena vartayet strī pativratā /
GE07hv_apppu:8670: evaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ pūrṇaṃ rātrāv annaṃ vivarjayet // HV_App.I,29A.267 //
GE07hv_apppu:8672: adhitiṣṭhati sarvāś ca sapatnyo nātra saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.269 //
GE07hv_apppu:8673: pūrṇe saṃvatsare dadyāt sauvarṇaṃ sūryam uttamam /
GE07hv_apppu:8675: phalāni vātha puṣpāṇi bhakṣāṇy api ca suvratā /
GE07hv_apppu:8677: athkāstaṃgamite sūrye bhuṅkte strī niyatā satī /
GE07hv_apppu:8679: sā dadyāt kāñcanaṃ candraṃ nakṣatrtāṇi grahān api /
GE07hv_apppu:8680: abhirūpāya viprāya vāsaś ca lavaṇānvitam // HV_App.I,29A.277 //
GE07hv_apppu:8682: subhagā darśanīyā ca putravaty api bhāmini // HV_App.I,29A.279 //
GE07hv_apppu:8684: arghyaṃ dadyāt sumanasā sākṣataṃ sakuśaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,29A.281 //
GE07hv_apppu:8685: yāvakaṃ ca baliṃ dadyād dadhinā saha saṃyutam /
GE07hv_apppu:8686: evaṃ yā kurute nityaṃ sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt // HV_App.I,29A.283 //
GE07hv_apppu:8687: adṛṣṭvā yā tu nāśnāti sūryaṃ nārī pativratā /
GE07hv_apppu:8688: durdine vātha vā vyabhre sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt // HV_App.I,29A.285 //
GE07hv_apppu:8689: kāñcanaṃ śaktito dadyāt sā viprāya manasvinī /
GE07hv_apppu:8690: subhagā darśanīyā ca bhavaty amaravarṇinī // HV_App.I,29A.287 //
GE07hv_apppu:8693: niveṣṭavyaṃ śarīraṃ yair vratakaiḥ puṇyair api /
GE07hv_apppu:8694: arundhati pravakṣyāmi sahaitabhir vare śṛṇu // HV_App.I,29A.289 //
GE07hv_apppu:8695: kṛṣṇāṣṭamīṃ yā kṣipati syād vā mūlaphalāśinī /
GE07hv_apppu:8698: evaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ kṛtvā tato dadyād dvijātaye // HV_App.I,29A.293 //
GE07hv_apppu:8700: dakṣiṇāpūrvam iṣṭānnaṃ śaktyā vāpi śucismite // HV_App.I,29A.295 //
GE07hv_apppu:8702: tasyā bhavanti keśās tu bhavatīṣṭā hi bhartare // HV_App.I,29A.297 //
GE07hv_apppu:8703: śiro nirveṣṭukāmā tu gomayena śiraḥ satī /
GE07hv_apppu:8704: prakṣālayen malaṃ dhātryā bilvena śrīphalena ca // HV_App.I,29A.299 //
GE07hv_apppu:8705: gomūtraṃ ca sadā prāśec chiraḥsnānaṃ ca miśrayet /
GE07hv_apppu:8706: kṛṣṇāṃ caturdaśīṃ tv etat kartavyaṃ varavarṇini // HV_App.I,29A.301 //
GE07hv_apppu:8707: bhavaty avidhavā caiva subhagā vijvarā tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:8708: śirorogair naiva cāsyāḥ śarīram abhitapyate // HV_App.I,29A.303 //
GE07hv_apppu:8709: darśanīyaṃ lalāṭaṃ yā kāṅkṣati strī śucismite /
GE07hv_apppu:8710: tithiṃ pratipadaṃ nityaṃ sā kṣaped ekabhojanā // HV_App.I,29A.305 //
GE07hv_apppu:8711: payasā ca tathāśnīyād yāvat saṃvatsaro gataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8712: brāhmaṇasya tato dadyāt paṭṭaṃ rūpyamayaṃ śubham // HV_App.I,29A.307 //
GE07hv_apppu:8713: lalāṭaṃ rūpasaṃpannam āpnoti strī sumadhyamā // HV_App.I,29A.308 //
GE07hv_apppu:8714: satataṃ strī dvitīyāyāṃ bhruvor icchet surūpatām /
GE07hv_apppu:8716: tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe brāhmaṇaṃ svasti vācayet /
GE07hv_apppu:8718: lavaṇena ca bhadraṃ te ghṛtapātreṇa cānaghe // HV_App.I,29A.313 //
GE07hv_apppu:8720: bhruvau vidhāya sā dadyān mṛganābhimaye śubhe /
GE07hv_apppu:8721: ātmanaḥ śobhanau karṇāv icchantī strī sumadhyamā /
GE07hv_apppu:8722: nakṣatre śravaṇe prāpte dhruvaṃ bhuñjīta yāvakam // HV_App.I,29A.315 //
GE07hv_apppu:8723: tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe karṇau dadyād dhiraṇmayau /
GE07hv_apppu:8724: ghṛte prakṣipya viprāya payasā sahitau śubhe /
GE07hv_apppu:8726: tilagulmaṃ sadā siñced yāvat puṣped dhi rakṣitaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.319 //
GE07hv_apppu:8728: tasmād ādāya puṣpāṇi ghṛte prakṣipya dāpayet // HV_App.I,29A.321 //
GE07hv_apppu:8729: svakṣī bhaveyam iti yā strī kāṅkṣaty amṛtodbhave /
GE07hv_apppu:8730: anantaraṃ vai bhuñjānā payasā vā ghṛtena vā // HV_App.I,29A.323 //
GE07hv_apppu:8733: plavamānāni viprāya tato dadyāt satī sati /
GE07hv_apppu:8734: kṛṣṇasārasamānākṣī tad dattva bhavati sma vai // HV_App.I,29A.327 //
GE07hv_apppu:8735: icched oṣṭhau cārurūpau yā strī dharmaguṇānvitā /
GE07hv_apppu:8736: sā mṛṇmayena tu pibed udakaṃ vatsaraṃ satī /
GE07hv_apppu:8738: tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe vidrumaṃ dātum arhati // HV_App.I,29A.331 //
GE07hv_apppu:8739: tena bimbaphalābhoṣṭhī strī bhavaty eva śobhane /
GE07hv_apppu:8742: śuklāṣṭamīṃ na sāśnīyād bhaktadvayam aninditā // HV_App.I,29A.335 //
GE07hv_apppu:8743: tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe dadyād rūpyamayān satī /
GE07hv_apppu:8744: dantān prkṣipya dharmajñe payasy atiguṇodite // HV_App.I,29A.337 //
GE07hv_apppu:8745: tena sā tilapuṣpābhān dantān āpnoti sā satī /
GE07hv_apppu:8746: saubhāgyam api cāpnoti saputratvaṃ tathānaghe // HV_App.I,29A.339 //
GE07hv_apppu:8747: sarvam eva mukhaṃ kāntam icched yā rucirānane /
GE07hv_apppu:8748: sā paurṇamāsyām aśnātu prāpte candrodaye śubhe // HV_App.I,29A.341 //
GE07hv_apppu:8749: yāvakaṃ payasā siddhaṃ dattvā viprāya bhāminī /
GE07hv_apppu:8750: tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe candraṃ rūpyamayaṃ śubham // HV_App.I,29A.343 //
GE07hv_apppu:8751: padme phulle tu vinyasya brāhmaṇān svasti vācayet /
GE07hv_apppu:8752: pūrṇacandramukhī tena dānena strī śubhe bhavet // HV_App.I,29A.345 //
GE07hv_apppu:8754: ayācitaṃ daśamyāṃ sā nityam aśnīta vāgyatā // HV_App.I,29A.347 //
GE07hv_apppu:8755: saṃvatsare tataḥ pūrṇe dve bilve kāñcane śubhe /
GE07hv_apppu:8757: saubhāgyaṃ param āpnoti bahūn putrāṃs tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:8758: sadonnatau stanau sā strī bibharty amaravarṇini // HV_App.I,29A.351 //
GE07hv_apppu:8760: pañcamyāṃ tu na bhoktavyaṃ annaṃ toyena nityadā // HV_App.I,29A.353 //
GE07hv_apppu:8761: tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe dadyāj jatilatāṃ śubhe /
GE07hv_apppu:8762: phullāṃ sadakṣiṇāṃ dhanye brāhmaṇāya dhṛtāmane // HV_App.I,29A.355 //
GE07hv_apppu:8763: hastāv icchati yā nārī rūpayuktau sumadhyame /
GE07hv_apppu:8764: dvādaśīṃ sā kṣaped evaṃ śākaiḥ sarvair aninditaiḥ // HV_App.I,29A.357 //
GE07hv_apppu:8765: saṃvatsare tataḥ pūrṇe raukme padme dadātu sā /
GE07hv_apppu:8767: śroṇīṃ viśālām anvicchet strī kṣapetv eva suvratā /
GE07hv_apppu:8768: trayodaśīm ekabhaktam aśnātv evam ayācitam // HV_App.I,29A.361 //
GE07hv_apppu:8772: añjanena ca dharmajñe śanakair avacūrṇayet // HV_App.I,29A.365 //
GE07hv_apppu:8773: ratnāni caiva pūrṇāni vāso raktaṃ ca dāpayet /
GE07hv_apppu:8774: tena śroṇīm abhimatāṃ strī saumye pratipadyate // HV_App.I,29A.367 //
GE07hv_apppu:8775: madhurāṃ vācam icchantī varjayel lavaṇaṃ satī /
GE07hv_apppu:8776: saṃvatsare vā māsaṃ vā dāpayel lavaṇaṃ tataḥ // HV_App.I,29A.369 //
GE07hv_apppu:8780: ṣaṣṭhyāṃ ṣaṣṭhyāṃ varārohe bhoktavyaṃ satilaudanam // HV_App.I,29A.373 //
GE07hv_apppu:8781: agnir vā brāhmaṇo vāpi na spraṣṭavyaḥ padā sadā /
GE07hv_apppu:8782: padā yadā spṛśet taṃ ca vandeta tapasānvitā // HV_App.I,29A.375 //
GE07hv_apppu:8783: pādena caiva pādaṃ na prakṣālayitum arhati /
GE07hv_apppu:8784: etair nityavratair yuktā dharmajñā patidevatā // HV_App.I,29A.377 //
GE07hv_apppu:8786: tau vācayed brāhmanāya sthāpayitvā ghṛte 'naghe // HV_App.I,29A.379 //
GE07hv_apppu:8787: padme cādhomukhe kṛtvā dadyād viprāya nandini /
GE07hv_apppu:8789: sarvam eva tu yā gātram icchaty atimanoharam /
GE07hv_apppu:8790: trirātraṃ puṣpakāle sā karoti patidevatā // HV_App.I,29A.383 //
GE07hv_apppu:8791: kaumudyām atha vāṣāḍhyāṃ māghyāṃ cāśvayuje tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:8792: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ caiva manyate yadi daivatam // HV_App.I,29A.385 //
GE07hv_apppu:8793: ghṛtaṃ ca nityaṃ viprebhyo dadātu lavaṇaṃ tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:8794: saṃmārjanaṃ gṛhe caiva karotu patidevatā // HV_App.I,29A.387 //
GE07hv_apppu:8795: upalepanaṃ ca dharmajñe balikarma ca mānini /
GE07hv_apppu:8796: vāgduṣṭā caiva mā śubhre bhavatv ātmārthapaṇḍitā // HV_App.I,29A.389 //
GE07hv_apppu:8797: paryaśnātu ca sā kaṃcid api śākaṃ yaśasvini /
GE07hv_apppu:8798: baliṃ sṛjatv atathyaṃ ca parityajatu bhāmini // HV_App.I,29A.391 //
GE07hv_apppu:8800: saptamīṃ saptamīṃ nityaṃ kṣapet strī patidevatā // HV_App.I,29A.393 //
GE07hv_apppu:8801: tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe vṛkṣaṃ dadyād dhiraṇmayam /
GE07hv_apppu:8803: karañje dīpakaṃ dadyāt sadā yā pramadā vare /
GE07hv_apppu:8804: pūrṇe saṃvatsare dadyāt sauvarṇaṃ dīpakaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,29A.397 //
GE07hv_apppu:8805: rucyā sā strī bhaved bhartur iṣṭā putravatī tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:8806: sapatnīnām adhi tathā dīpavaj jvalate śubhe // HV_App.I,29A.399 //
GE07hv_apppu:8807: yā śeṣabhojinī nityaṃ naiva ca syād aruṃtudā /
GE07hv_apppu:8808: na ca syād vyaśanā saumye nityaṃ ca patidevatā // HV_App.I,29A.401 //
GE07hv_apppu:8809: śaucānvitā ca satataṃ na ca rūkṣābhibhāṣiṇī /
GE07hv_apppu:8811: kiṃ tasyā vratakaiḥ kāryaṃ kiṃ vā syād upavāsakaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8812: yā bhartur devatā nityaṃ satyadharmaguṇānvitā // HV_App.I,29A.405 //
GE07hv_apppu:8814: yā yonim icchate nārī śubhāṃ saṃkucitām api /
GE07hv_apppu:8815: kṛṣṇāṃ caturdaśīṃ sā tu saṃvatsaram upoṣya ca //
GE07hv_apppu:8817: muktāyugmena saṃyuktāṃ śubhāṃ yoniṃ labhet tataḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:8818: vidhavā strī tu yā syād daivayogāt satī sati /
GE07hv_apppu:8819: tasyā vakṣyāmi yo dharmaḥ purāṇoktaḥ sumadhyame // HV_App.I,29A.407 //
GE07hv_apppu:8820: patiṃ sṃakalpayitvā sā citrasthaṃ vātha mṛnmayam /
GE07hv_apppu:8821: tasya pūjāṃ sadā kuryāt satāṃ dharmam anusmaret // HV_App.I,29A.409 //
GE07hv_apppu:8822: tata evābhyanujñāṃ ca nityaṃ yācate suvratā /
GE07hv_apppu:8823: vratake copavāse ca bhojane ca viśeṣataḥ // HV_App.I,29A.411 //
GE07hv_apppu:8824: bhartṛlokān vrajaty evaṃ na ced vyuccarate patim /
GE07hv_apppu:8825: śāṇḍilī sūryavad bhāti satataṃ patidevatā // HV_App.I,29A.413 //
GE07hv_apppu:8827: drakṣyanti puṇyakavidhiṃ paurāṇo yaḥ sanātanaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.415 //
GE07hv_apppu:8828: muniś ca nāradaḥ kṛtsnaṃ paurāṇaṃ jñāsyate vidhim /
GE07hv_apppu:8829: upavāsasya dharmātmā vratakānāṃ tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29A.417 //
GE07hv_apppu:8830: aditiś cāpi sendrāṇī tvaṃ ca somasute vare /
GE07hv_apppu:8832: kīrtanīyāḥ satīnāṃ hi bhaviṣyatha guṇānvitāḥ // HV_App.I,29A.420 //
GE07hv_apppu:8835: jñāsyanti puṇyakavidhiṃ nityam eva sanātanam // HV_App.I,29A.423 //
GE07hv_apppu:8837: patibhaktir aduṣṭatvam avāgduṣṭatvam eva ca // HV_App.I,29A.425 //
GE07hv_apppu:8839: yā patiṃ dūṣayen nārī duṣṭair vākyaiś ca nīcavat /
GE07hv_apppu:8840: sā yāti narakān ghorān yāvat tapati bhāskaraḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:8841: bhojanaṃ kurute yā tu agrato bhartur eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:8842: yāvanti pāṃśavo bhūmau tāvad varṣāṇi valgulī //
GE07hv_apppu:8844: evam uktās tu tāḥ sādhvyo mahādevyā tapodhanāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8845: jagmur hṛṣṭā mahādevīṃ praṇipatya harapriyām // HV_App.I,29A.427 //
GE07hv_apppu:8846: aditir vratakaṃ cakre śṛṇu yad dharmacāriṇī /
GE07hv_apppu:8847: umāvratavidhiḥ sarvaḥ pūrvoddiṣṭas tayā kṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.429 //
GE07hv_apppu:8848: pārijāte nibadhyātha mama dattas tu kaśyapaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8849: aditivratakaṃ nāma tad dattaṃ satyabhāmayā // HV_App.I,29A.431 //
GE07hv_apppu:8850: tad eva vratakaṃ dattaṃ sāvitryā dharmanityayā // HV_App.I,29A.432 //
GE07hv_apppu:8851: tair eva yuktaiḥ saṃyuktam idaṃ tv abhyadhikaṃ kṛtam // HV_App.I,29A.433
GE07hv_apppu:8852: saṃdhyākāle ca saṃprāpte sthāne sthāne tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:8853: pūjanaṃ vā namaskāro japaś ca dviguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.435 //
GE07hv_apppu:8854: sāvitryā vratakaṃ kṛtvā tathādityā vrataṃ satī /
GE07hv_apppu:8855: bhartuḥ kulaṃ pitṛkulaṃ tathātmānaṃ ca tārayet // HV_App.I,29A.437 //
GE07hv_apppu:8857: raktaṃ abhyadhikaṃ vāso bhojanaṃ caiva sāmiṣam // HV_App.I,29A.439 //
GE07hv_apppu:8859: ahorātropavāsaś ca deyaṃ kumbhaśataṃ tathā // HV_App.I,29A.441 //
GE07hv_apppu:8860: gaṅgayā vratakaṃ dattaṃ tad evaumaṃ yaśaskari /
GE07hv_apppu:8861: snānam abhyadhikaṃ kāryaṃ pratyūṣasyātmano jale // HV_App.I,29A.443 //
GE07hv_apppu:8862: anyatra vā jale māgha-- śuklapakṣe haripriye /
GE07hv_apppu:8863: etad gaṅgāvrataṃ nāma sarvakāmapradaṃ smṛtam // HV_App.I,29A.445 //
GE07hv_apppu:8864: sapta sapta ca saptātha kulāni harivallabhe /
GE07hv_apppu:8866: deyaṃ kumbhasahasraṃ tu gaṅgāyā vratake śubhe /
GE07hv_apppu:8867: tāraṇaṃ pāraṇaṃ caiva tad vrataṃ sārvakāmikam // HV_App.I,29A.449 //
GE07hv_apppu:8869: hemante tat tukartavyam ākāśe harivallabhe // HV_App.I,29A.451 //
GE07hv_apppu:8870: imāni caiva vākyāni brūyād ākāśam āsthitā /
GE07hv_apppu:8871: snātā śucisamācārā namaskṛtya patiṃ śubhe // HV_App.I,29A.453 //
GE07hv_apppu:8872: carāmy ahaṃ yāmarathaṃ himaṃ pṛṣṭhena dhāraye /
GE07hv_apppu:8873: pativratā jīvaputrā bhaveyaṃ ca purodhikā // HV_App.I,29A.455 //
GE07hv_apppu:8874: sapatnīś cādhitiṣṭheyaṃ paśyeyaṃ caiva mā yamam /
GE07hv_apppu:8875: sabhartṛputrā jīveyaṃ ciraṃ sumukham eva ca // HV_App.I,29A.457 //
GE07hv_apppu:8876: patilokaṃ ca gaccheyaṃ bhaveyaṃ nandinī tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:8877: sucelā mṛṣṭahastā ca svajaneṣṭā guṇānvitā // HV_App.I,29A.459 //
GE07hv_apppu:8878: evaṃ kṛtvā tato vipraṃ madhunā svasti vācayet /
GE07hv_apppu:8879: tilair api tathā kṛṣṇaiḥ pāyasena tu bhojayet // HV_App.I,29A.461 //
GE07hv_apppu:8883: sarvā drakṣyatha puṇyāni vratakāni tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29A.465 //
GE07hv_apppu:8884: paurāṇāny umayā devyā yāni dṛṣṭāni vai purā /
GE07hv_apppu:8888: umāyā varadānena dṛṣṭvā divyena cakṣuṣā // HV_App.I,29A.469 //
GE07hv_apppu:8892: dadāv abhyadhikaṃ sā tu ratnavṛkṣaṃ manoharam // HV_App.I,29A.473 //
GE07hv_apppu:8894: pītam abhyadhikaṃ vāsas tayā dattam umāvrate // HV_App.I,29A.475 //
GE07hv_apppu:8895: rohiṇyātha ca phālgunyā maghayā ca purātane /
GE07hv_apppu:8896: vratāni khalu dattāni bahūni kulavardhane // HV_App.I,29A.477 //
GE07hv_apppu:8902: sarvair evāsahendraś ca (sic) umā vai rudrasaṃyutā /
GE07hv_apppu:8903: sve sthānena gatā rājan viṣṇor vratakaśāsanāt (sic) //
GE07hv_apppu:8905: [h: HV (CE) Appendix 29B, transliterated by Renate Söhnen--Thieme,
GE07hv_apppu:8907: [k: After App I (No. 29A), K Ñ2V BDT GM4 cont. with a passage given in App. I (No. 29B).
GE07hv_apppu:8912: teṣāṃ vadhaṃ muniśreṣṭha kīrtayasvāndhakasya ca // HV_App.I,29B.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:8915: tatra pradhānā bahavo babhūvur asurottamāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:8917: ṣaṣṭiḥ śatasahasrāṇi na nyūnāny adhikāni ca // HV_App.I,29B.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:8918: te jñātivadhasaṃtaptāś cakrur vīrāḥ purā tapaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8922: teṣām udumbaraṃ rājan gaṇa ekaḥ samāśritaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8923: vṛkṣaṃ tatrāvasan vīra te kurvanto mahat tapaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:8924: kapitthaṃ vṛkṣam āśritya kecit tatroṣitāḥ purā /
GE07hv_apppu:8925: sṛgālavāṭīṃ tv aparre cerur ugraṃ tathā tapaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:8927: adhīyantaḥ pare brahma vaṭaṃ gatvāsurātmajāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:8929: varaṃ dātuṃ suraśreṣṭhaḥ prāpto dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:8930: varaṃ varayatety uktās te rājan padmayoninā /
GE07hv_apppu:8931: te neṣur varadānaṃ tu dviṣantas tryambakaṃ vibhum /
GE07hv_apppu:8933: tān uvāca tato brahmā sarvajñaḥ kurunandana /
GE07hv_apppu:8934: viśvasya jagataḥ kartuḥ saṃhartuś ca mahātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8935: kaḥ śakto 'pacitiṃ gantum māstu vo 'tha vṛthā śramaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:8937: tam astūya sukhaṃ svarge vastum icchanti ye 'surāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:8938: te neṣus tatra kecit tu durātmāno mahāsurāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8939: atheṣur apare rājann asurā bhavyabhāvanāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:8940: neṣur ye sudurātmānas tān uvāca tāmaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8941: varayadhvaṃ varaṃ vīrā rudrakrodham kṛte 'surāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:8942: te ūcuḥ sarvadevānām avadhyāḥ syāma he vibho /
GE07hv_apppu:8943: purāṇi ṣaṭ ca no deva bhavantv antar mahītale // HV_App.I,29B.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:8945: vayaṃ ca ṣaṭpuragatās vasema ca sukhaṃ vibho // HV_App.I,29B.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:8946: rudrāc ca no bhayaṃ na syād yena no jñātayo hatāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8947: nihataṃ tripuraṃ dṛṣṭvā bhītāḥ sma tapasāṃ nidhe // HV_App.I,29B.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:8950: na bādhiṣyatha ced viprān satpathasthān satāṃ priyān // HV_App.I,29B.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:8952: nāśaṃ yāsyatha viprā hi jagataḥ paramā gatiḥ // HV_App.I,29B.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:8954: sarvabhūteṣu bhagavān hitaṃ dhatte janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:8955: te gatā asurā rājan brahmaṇā ye visarjitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8958: ye 'pi bhaktā mahādevam asurā dharmacāriṇaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:8959: svaṃ hi darśanaṃ teṣāṃ dadau tripuranāśanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8960: śvetaṃ vṛṣabham āruhya somaḥ sapravaraḥ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8961: uvāca cedaṃ bhagavān asurān sa satāṃ gatiḥ // HV_App.I,29B.49 //
GE07hv_apppu:8962: vairaṃ utsṛjya dambhaṃ ca hiṃsāṃ cāsurasattamāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8963: mām eva cāśritās tasmād varaṃ sādhu dadāmi vaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:8964: yair dīkṣitāḥ stha munibhiḥ satkriyāparamair dvijaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8965: saha tair gamyatāṃ svargaḥ prīto 'haṃ vaḥ sukarmaṇā // HV_App.I,29B.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:8966: iha ye caiva vatsyanti tāpasā brahmavādinaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8967: api kāpitthikāvṛkṣe teṣāṃ lokā yathā mama // HV_App.I,29B.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:8969: vānaprathena vidhinā pūjayan māṃ tapodhanaḥn // HV_App.I,29B.57 //
GE07hv_apppu:8970: varṣāṇāṃ sa sahasraṃ tu tapasāṃ prāpsyate phalam /
GE07hv_apppu:8971: kṛtvā trirātraṃ vidhival lapsyate cepsitaṃ gatim // HV_App.I,29B.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:8973: nīce deśe ca bhadraṃ vo varam etaṃ dadāmy aham // HV_App.I,29B.61 //
GE07hv_apppu:8975: sarvato bhayacitto 'pi gatiṃ sa mama yāsyati // HV_App.I,29B.63 //
GE07hv_apppu:8978: munīṃś ca brahmavāṭīyān saviśeṣeṇa ye narāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:8979: pūjayiṣyanti satataṃ te yāsyantīpsitāṃ gatim // HV_App.I,29B.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:8981: tair eva sahitaḥ sarvai rudralokaṃ jagāma vai // HV_App.I,29B.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:8989: aśvamedhaḥ kṛtas tena vasudevasya dhīmataḥ // HV_App.I,29B.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:8991: āvartāyāḥ śubhe tīre sunadyā munijuṣṭayā // HV_App.I,29B.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:8993: upādhyāyaś ca kauravya kṣīrahotā mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:8994: vasudevas tatra yāto devakyā sahitaḥ prabho /
GE07hv_apppu:8995: yajamānaṃ ṣaṭpurasthaṃ yathā śakro bṛhaspatim // HV_App.I,29B.81 //
GE07hv_apppu:9000: vyāso 'haṃ yājñavalkyaś ca sumantur jaiminis tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:9001: dhṛtimāñ jājaliś caiva devalādyāś ca bhārata // HV_App.I,29B.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:9006: nikumbhādyāḥ samāgamya tam ucur varadarpitāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.90 //
GE07hv_apppu:9007: kalpyatāṃ yajñabhāgo naḥ somaṃ pāsyāmahe vayam /
GE07hv_apppu:9008: kanyāś ca brahmadatto no yajamānaḥ prayacchatu // HV_App.I,29B.92 //
GE07hv_apppu:9009: bahvyaḥ santy asya kanyāś ca rūpavatyo mahātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9010: āhūya tāḥ pradātavyāḥ sarvathaiva hi naḥ śrutam // HV_App.I,29B.94 //
GE07hv_apppu:9011: ratnāni ca brahmadatto viśiṣṭāni dadātu naḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9012: anyathā tu na yaṣṭavyaṃ vayam ājñāpayāmahe // HV_App.I,29B.96 //
GE07hv_apppu:9013: etac chrutvā brahmadattas tān uvāca mahāsurān /
GE07hv_apppu:9014: yajñabhāgo na vihitaḥ purā vo 'surasattamāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.98 //
GE07hv_apppu:9015: kathaṃ sattre somapānaṃ śakyaṃ dātuṃ mayā hi vaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9017: kanyā hi mama yā deyās tāś ca saṃkalpitā mayā /
GE07hv_apppu:9019: ratnāni tu prayacchāmi sāntvenāhaṃ vicintya vai /
GE07hv_apppu:9020: balān naiva pradāsyāmi devakīputram āśritaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.104 //
GE07hv_apppu:9022: yajñavāṭaṃ vilulupur jahruḥ kanyāś ca tās tathā // HV_App.I,29B.106 //
GE07hv_apppu:9023: taṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃpravṛttaṃ tu dadhyāv ānakaduṃdubhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9024: vāsudevaṃ mahātmānaṃ balabhadraṃ gadaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,29B.108 //
GE07hv_apppu:9025: viditārthas tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pradyumnam idam abravīt /
GE07hv_apppu:9027: yāvad yāvanasainyena ṣaṭpuraṃ yāmy ahaṃ prabho // HV_App.I,29B.111 //
GE07hv_apppu:9028: sa yayau ṣaṭpuraṃ vīraḥ pitur ājñākaras tadā // HV_App.I,29B.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:9030: kanyās tā māyayā dhīmān ājahre sa mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.114 //
GE07hv_apppu:9032: mā bhair iti ca dharmātmā devakīm uktavāṃs tadā // HV_App.I,29B.116 //
GE07hv_apppu:9033: māyāmayīs tu tā hatvā sutā hy asya durāsadāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9034: ṣaṭpuraṃ viviśur daityāḥ parituṣṭā nārādhipa // HV_App.I,29B.118 //
GE07hv_apppu:9035: karma cāsārya te tatra vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā /
GE07hv_apppu:9036: yad viśiṣṭaṃ bahuguṇaṃ tad abhūc ca narādhipa // HV_App.I,29B.120 //
GE07hv_apppu:9037: etasminn antare prāptā rājānas tatra bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:9038: satre nimantritāḥ pūrvaṃ brahmadattena dhīmatā // HV_App.I,29B.122 //
GE07hv_apppu:9039: jarāsaṃdho danta vaktraḥ śiśupālas tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:9040: pāṇḍavā dhārtarāṣṭrāś ca mālavānāṃ gaṇās tathā // HV_App.I,29B.124 //
GE07hv_apppu:9041: rukmī caivāhvṛtiś caiva nīlo nādhrama eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:9042: vindānuvindāv āvantyau ślayaḥ śakunir eva ca // HV_App.I,29B.126 //
GE07hv_apppu:9045: ete caiva mahātejā rājānaś ca dṛḍhavratāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9046: āvāsitā nātidūre ṣaṭpurasya ca bhārata // HV_App.I,29B.128 //
GE07hv_apppu:9047: tān dṛṣṭvā nāradaḥ śrīmān acintayad aninditaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9048: kṣatrasya yādavānāṃ ca bhaviṣyati samāgamaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.130 //
GE07hv_apppu:9049: atra hetur ayaṃ yuddhe tasmāt tat prayatāmy aham /
GE07hv_apppu:9050: evaṃ saṃcintayitvā sa nikumbhabhavanaṃ gataḥ // HV_App.I,29B.132 //
GE07hv_apppu:9051: pūjitaḥ sa nikumbhena dānavaiś ca tathāparaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9052: upaviṣṭaḥ sa dharmātmā nikumbham idam abravīt // HV_App.I,29B.134 //
GE07hv_apppu:9053: kathaṃ virodhaṃ yadubhiḥ kṛtvā svasthair ihāsyate /
GE07hv_apppu:9054: yo brahmadattaḥ sa kṛṣṇaḥ sa hi tasya pituḥ sakhā // HV_App.I,29B.136 //
GE07hv_apppu:9058: vaiśyānāṃ śataṃ ekaṃ ca śādrīṇāṃ śatam eva ca // HV_App.I,29B.140 //
GE07hv_apppu:9060: tena tāsāṃ varo datto muninā puṇyakarmaṇā // HV_App.I,29B.142 //
GE07hv_apppu:9061: ekaikas tanayo rānn ekekā duhitā tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:9063: kanyā bhavanti tanayās tasyāsure punaḥ punaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9064: saṃgame saṃgame vīra bhartṛbhiḥ śayane saha // HV_App.I,29B.146 //
GE07hv_apppu:9065: sarvaṃ puṣpamayaṃ gandhaṃ sravanti ca varāṅganāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9066: sarvadā yauvane nyastāḥ sarvāś caiva pativratāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.148 //
GE07hv_apppu:9068: jānanti sarvā daiteya varadānena dhīmataḥ // HV_App.I,29B.150 //
GE07hv_apppu:9071: svīkariṣyanti tāṃś caiva ye samiṣyanti vai nṛpāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9072: sve sve sthitā varṇadharme yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.152 //
GE07hv_apppu:9073: tāḥ kanyā bhaimamukhyānāṃ dattāḥ prāyeṇa dhīmatā /
GE07hv_apppu:9074: avaśeṣaṃ śataṃ tv ekaṃ yad ānītaṃ kila tvayā // HV_App.I,29B.154 //
GE07hv_apppu:9076: sāhāyyārthe tu rājāno vriyantāṃ hetupūrvakam // HV_App.I,29B.156 //
GE07hv_apppu:9079: ātithyaṃ kriyatāṃ caiva ye sameṣyanti vai nṛpāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9080: evam ukte tathā cakrur asurās te 'tihṛṣṭavat // HV_App.I,29B.160 //
GE07hv_apppu:9081: labdhvā pañcaśataṃ kanyā ratnāni vividhāni ca /
GE07hv_apppu:9082: yathārheṇa narendrais tā vibhaktā bhaktivatsalāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.162 //
GE07hv_apppu:9083: ṛte pāṇḍusutān vīrān vāritā nāradena te /
GE07hv_apppu:9085: tuṣṭais tair asurā hy uktā rājan bhūmipasattamaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9087: arcitāḥ sma yathānyāyaṃ kṣatraṃ suraripus tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:9088: kṣatraṃ nārcitapūrvaṃ hi divyair vīrair bhavadvidhaiḥ // HV_App.I,29B.168
GE07hv_apppu:9090: anuvarṇayitvā kṣatrasya mahātmyaṃ satyam eva ca // HV_App.I,29B.170 //
GE07hv_apppu:9091: yuddhaṃ no ripubhiḥ sārdhaṃ bhaviṣyati nṛpottamāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9092: sāhāyyaṃ dattam iccchāmo bhavadbhis tatra sarvathā // HV_App.I,29B.172 //
GE07hv_apppu:9093: evam astv iti tān ūcuḥ kṣatriyāḥ kṣīṇakilbiṣāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9094: pāṇḍaveyān ṛte vīrāñ śrutārthān nāradād vibho // HV_App.I,29B.174 //
GE07hv_apppu:9096: patnyas tu brahmadattasya yajñavāṭaṃ gatā api // HV_App.I,29B.176 //
GE07hv_apppu:9097: kṛṣṇo 'pi senayā sārdhaṃ prayayau ṣaṭpuraṃ vibhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9098: mahādevasya vacanam udvahan manasā nṛpa // HV_App.I,29B.178 //
GE07hv_apppu:9100: sa tayā senayā sārdhaṃ paurāṇāṃ hitakāmyayā // HV_App.I,29B.180 //
GE07hv_apppu:9104: pradyumnam aṭane śrīmān rakṣārthaṃ viniyujya ca // HV_App.I,29B.184 //
GE07hv_apppu:9108: balaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ sātyakiś ca tārkṣyam āruruhur mudā // HV_App.I,29B.186 //
GE07hv_apppu:9113: pradyumnam agre sainyasya viyati sthāpya mānada /
GE07hv_apppu:9114: rakṣārthaṃ yajñavāṭasya pāṇḍavān viniyujya ca // HV_App.I,29B.192 //
GE07hv_apppu:9115: śeṣāṃ senāṃ guhādvāri bhagavān viniyujya ca /
GE07hv_apppu:9116: jayantam atha sasmāra pravaraṃ ca satāṃ gatiḥ // HV_App.I,29B.194 //
GE07hv_apppu:9117: tāv āpetatur evātha svayaṃ cāpaśyatāṃ tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:9118: viyaty eva niyuktau tau pradyumna iva bhārata // HV_App.I,29B.196 //
GE07hv_apppu:9120: jalajā murajāś caiva vādyāny apy aparāṇi ca // HV_App.I,29B.198 //
GE07hv_apppu:9121: mākaro racito vyūhaḥ sāmbena ca gadena ca /
GE07hv_apppu:9122: sāraṇaś coddhavaś cobhau bhojo vaitaraṇas tathā // HV_App.I,29B.200 //
GE07hv_apppu:9123: anādhṛṣṭiś ca dharmātmā vipṛthuḥ pṛthur eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:9124: k,rtavarmā ca daṃṣṭre dve vicakṣur arimardanaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.202 //
GE07hv_apppu:9128: rathair aśvair narair nāgair ākulā kulavardhana // HV_App.I,29B.206 //
GE07hv_apppu:9130: āruhya meghanādāṃś ca gardabhān api hastinaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.208 //
GE07hv_apppu:9131: makarāñ śiśumārāṃś ca hayān api ca bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:9132: mahiṣān atha khaḍgāṃś ca drutān api ca kacchapān // HV_App.I,29B.210 //
GE07hv_apppu:9138: nikumbho niryayau agre devānām iva vāsavaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.216 //
GE07hv_apppu:9139: bhūmiṃ dyāṃ ca vavṛdhire dānavās te balotkaṭāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9140: nadanto vividhān nādān kṣveḍantaś ca punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.218 //
GE07hv_apppu:9146: rukmī caivāhvṛtiś caiva tasthatur niścitau raṇe /
GE07hv_apppu:9148: śalyaś ca śakuniś cobhau bhagadattaś ca pārthivaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9149: jarāsaṃdhas trijgartaś ca virāṭaś ca sahottaraḥ // HV_App.I,29B.227 //
GE07hv_apppu:9151: yuyutsamānā yadubhir devair iva mahāsurāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.229 //
GE07hv_apppu:9153: mamarda samare senāṃ bhaimnānāṃ bhīmadarśanām // HV_App.I,29B.231 //
GE07hv_apppu:9154: senāpatir anādṛṣṭir mamṛṣe tan na yādavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9155: mamarda ghorair bāṇaughaiś citrapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥ // HV_App.I,29B.233 //
GE07hv_apppu:9156: na ratho 'suramukhyasya dadṛśe na ca vājinaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9157: na dhvajo na nikumbhaś ca sarvaṃ bāṇābhisaṃvṛtam // HV_App.I,29B.235 //
GE07hv_apppu:9158: sa parītya tato vīro nikumbho māyināṃ varaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9161: ruddhvā cābhyagamad vīraṃ māyābalam upāśritaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.239 //
GE07hv_apppu:9162: punar eva nikumbhas tu kṛtavarmāṇam āhave /
GE07hv_apppu:9163: anayac cārudeṣṇaṃ ca bhojaṃ vaitaraṇaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,29B.241 //
GE07hv_apppu:9166: na tasya dadṛśe deho māyācchanno janeśvara /
GE07hv_apppu:9167: nayato yādavān ghorān guhāṃ ṣaṭpurasaṃjñitām // HV_App.I,29B.245 //
GE07hv_apppu:9168: tad dṛṣṭvā kadanaṃ ghoraṃ bhaimānāṃ bhītivardhanam /
GE07hv_apppu:9169: cukopa bhagavān kṛṣṇo balaḥ satyaka eva ca // HV_App.I,29B.247 //
GE07hv_apppu:9170: saviśeṣaṃ tathā kāmaḥ sāmbaś ca paravīrahā /
GE07hv_apppu:9171: aniruddhaś ca durdharṣo bhaimāś ca bahavo 'pare // HV_App.I,29B.249 //
GE07hv_apppu:9172: tataḥ śārṅgāyudhaḥ śārṅgaṃ kṛtvā sajyaṃ nareśvara /
GE07hv_apppu:9173: dānaveṣu pravṛtteṣu tṛṇeṣv iva hutāśanaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.251 //
GE07hv_apppu:9174: taṃ dṛṣṭvā dānavā devam abhidudruvur īśvaram /
GE07hv_apppu:9175: śalabhāḥ kālapāśārtāḥ pradīptam iva pāvakam // HV_App.I,29B.253 //
GE07hv_apppu:9176: samutsṛjya śataghnīś ca parighāṃś ca sahasraśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9177: śūlāni cāgnitulyāni pradīptāṃś ca paraśvadhān // HV_App.I,29B.255 //
GE07hv_apppu:9178: parvatāgrāṇi vṛkṣāṃś ca ghorāś ca vipulāḥ śilāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9179: utkṣipya ca gajān mattān rathān api hayān api // HV_App.I,29B.257 //
GE07hv_apppu:9180: nārāyaṇāgnis tān sarvān dadāha prahasann iva /
GE07hv_apppu:9182: śāradaṃ varṣaṇaṃ yadvat sahed vīra gavāṃ patiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9183: tadvad yaduvṛṣaḥ sehe bāṇavarṣam ariṃdamaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.261 //
GE07hv_apppu:9187: vyāditāsyasya siṃhasya vṛṣabhā iva bhārata // HV_App.I,29B.265 //
GE07hv_apppu:9188: te vadhyamānāḥ kṛṣṇena divam ācakramus tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:9190: tān ākāśagatān aindrir jayantaḥ pravaras tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:9196: raukmiṇeyas tataḥ sṛṣṭvā ghorāṃ māyāmayīṃ guhām /
GE07hv_apppu:9197: adṛśyaniṣkramāṃ vīraḥ kṣatraṃ prakṣeptum udyataḥ // HV_App.I,29B.275 //
GE07hv_apppu:9198: gadena saha dharmātmā sāraṇena śaṭhena ca /
GE07hv_apppu:9199: sāmbena cāparaiś cāpi pūrvaṃ yena praveśitāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.277 //
GE07hv_apppu:9201: jagrāha balavān kārṣṇiḥ prasphurantaṃ tatas tataḥ // HV_App.I,29B.279 //
GE07hv_apppu:9202: vinadya ca guhāṃ vīro ghorāṃ māyāmayīṃ nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:9203: duryodhanaṃ ca rājānaṃ virāṭadrupadāv api // HV_App.I,29B.281 //
GE07hv_apppu:9204: śakuniṃ caiva śalyaṃ ca nīlaṃ cāpi nadīsutam /
GE07hv_apppu:9205: vindānuvindau rājānau jarāsaṃdhaṃ ca bhārata // HV_App.I,29B.283 //
GE07hv_apppu:9206: trigartān mālavāṃś caiva vasātīṃś ca mahābalān /
GE07hv_apppu:9208: tathāhvṛtim uvācedaṃ mātulaṃ rukmim eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:9209: śiśupālaṃ ca rājānaṃ bhagadattaṃ ca bhārata // HV_App.I,29B.287 //
GE07hv_apppu:9210: saṃbamdhaṃ ca gurutvaṃ ca mānayāmi narādhipāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9211: guhām imāṃ ghorarūpāṃ yena prakṣepayāmi vaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.289 //
GE07hv_apppu:9213: prakṣeptavyā narendrās te guhāyām iti dhīmatā // HV_App.I,29B.291 //
GE07hv_apppu:9215: prakṣiptān yādavāṃś caiva mākṣayiṣyāmi sarvathā // HV_App.I,29B.293 //
GE07hv_apppu:9216: ity ukte śiśupālas tu rājā senapatis tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:9217: śarais tatarda tān bhaimān pradyumnaṃ saviśeṣataḥ // HV_App.I,29B.295 //
GE07hv_apppu:9219: ārambhan nṛpatiṃ baddhuṃ śiśupālaṃ mahābalam // HV_App.I,29B.297 //
GE07hv_apppu:9221: śailādir abravīd vīraṃ raukmiṇeyaṃ mahābalam // HV_App.I,29B.299 //
GE07hv_apppu:9223: sarvaṃ kuru yathā rātryāṃ proktas tvaṃ bhaima māyayā // HV_App.I,29B.301
GE07hv_apppu:9225: pāśais tvam eva moktuṃ ca pramāṇaṃ yadunandana // HV_App.I,29B.303 //
GE07hv_apppu:9226: asurāṃs tu mahābāho niḥśeṣān kartum arhasi /
GE07hv_apppu:9227: evam eva ca vaktavyas tvayā vīra janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.305 //
GE07hv_apppu:9228: tataḥ sa bhagadattaṃ ca śiśupālaṃ ca bhūmipam /
GE07hv_apppu:9229: āhvṛtiṃ caiva rumiṃ ca śeṣāṃś cānyān narādhipān // HV_App.I,29B.307 //
GE07hv_apppu:9231: māyāmayīṃ guhāṃ caiva nināya kurunandana // HV_App.I,29B.309 //
GE07hv_apppu:9233: aniruddhaṃ cakārātha rakṣitāraṃ svam ātmajam // HV_App.I,29B.311 //
GE07hv_apppu:9235: senapatiṃ kṣatriyāṃś ca kośādhyakṣāṃś ca bhārata // HV_App.I,29B.313 //
GE07hv_apppu:9237: avyagras tu tato hantum asurān udyataḥ prabho // HV_App.I,29B.315 //
GE07hv_apppu:9239: viśrabdhaṃ vartatāṃ karma mā bhaiḥ paśya dhanaṃjayam // HV_App.I,29B.317
GE07hv_apppu:9241: bhayaṃ hi vidyate tasya goptāro yasya pāṇḍavāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.319 //
GE07hv_apppu:9242: na cāsurais tava sutāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ khalv api tejasā /
GE07hv_apppu:9243: yajñavaṭe nirīkṣyaitān māyayā nihitā mayā // HV_App.I,29B.321 //
GE07hv_apppu:9248: diśaḥ prasasrus te vārā vadhyamānāḥ samantataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9251: bhittvā pratijñāṃ kiṃ mohād bhayārtā yātha vihvalāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.327 //
GE07hv_apppu:9255: hatena cāpi śūreṇa vastavyaṃ tridive sukham // HV_App.I,29B.331 //
GE07hv_apppu:9256: palāyitvā grḥaṃ gatvā kasya drakṣyatha he mukham /
