GE07hv_apppu:9257: dārān vakṣyatha kiṃ cāpi dhig dhik kiṃ kiṃ na lajjatha // HV_App.I,29B.333
GE07hv_apppu:9258: evam uktā nivṛttās te lajjamānā nṛpāsurāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9259: dviguṇena ca vegena yuyudhur yadubhiḥ saha // HV_App.I,29B.335 //
GE07hv_apppu:9261: ye yānti yajñavāṭaṃ tu tān nihati dhanaṃjayaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.337 //
GE07hv_apppu:9262: yamau bhīmaś ca rājā ca dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9263: dyāṃ prayātāj jaghānaindriḥ pravaraśca dvijottamaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.339 //
GE07hv_apppu:9269: susrāva śoṇitanadī nadīva jalād āgame // HV_App.I,29B.345 //
GE07hv_apppu:9270: tāṃ dṛṣṭvaiva nikumbhas tu vardhamānāṃś ca śātravān /
GE07hv_apppu:9271: hatān sarvān sahāyāṃś ca vīryād evotpapāta ha // HV_App.I,29B.347 //
GE07hv_apppu:9272: sa vārito jayantena pravareṇa ca bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:9275: pravaraṃ tāḍayām āsa sa papāta mahītale // HV_App.I,29B.351 //
GE07hv_apppu:9276: aindris taṃ patitaṃ bhūmau bāhubhyāṃ parṣasvaje /
GE07hv_apppu:9278: tataḥ suniścayaṃ kṛtvā pravaraṃ mucya satvaram /
GE07hv_apppu:9279: viditvā caiva saprāṇaṃ hitvāsuram abhidrutaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.353 //
GE07hv_apppu:9280: abhidrutya nikumbhaṃ ca nistriṃśena jaghana ha /
GE07hv_apppu:9283: sa cintayām āsa tadā vadhyamāno mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,29B.357 //
GE07hv_apppu:9285: śrāvayāmi kim ātmānam āhave śakrasūnunā // HV_App.I,29B.359 //
GE07hv_apppu:9287: jagāma caiva yuddhārthaṃ yatra kṛṣṇo mahābalaḥn // HV_App.I,29B.361 //
GE07hv_apppu:9289: draṣṭum abhyāgato yuddhaṃ jahṛṣe saha daivataiḥ // HV_App.I,29B.363 //
GE07hv_apppu:9290: sāghu sādhv iti putraṃ ca parituṣṭaḥ sa sasvaje /
GE07hv_apppu:9291: pravaraṃ cāpi dharmātmā sasvaje mohavarjitam // HV_App.I,29B.365 //
GE07hv_apppu:9293: jayamānaṃ raṇe dṛṣṭvā jayantaṃ raṇadurjayam // HV_App.I,29B.367 //
GE07hv_apppu:9296: sa nādaṃ sumahat kṛtvā pakṣirājam atāḍayat /
GE07hv_apppu:9297: parigheṇa sughoreṇa balaṃ sātyakim eva ca // HV_App.I,29B.371 //
GE07hv_apppu:9298: nārāyaṇaṃ cārjunaṃ ca bhīmaṃ cātha yudhiṣṭhiram /
GE07hv_apppu:9299: yamau ca vasudevaṃ ca sāmbaṃ kāmaṃ ca vīryavān // HV_App.I,29B.373 //
GE07hv_apppu:9300: yuyudhe māyayā daityaḥ śīghrakārī ca bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:9301: na cainaṃ dadṛśuḥ sarve sarvaśastraviśāradāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.375 //
GE07hv_apppu:9302: yadā tu naiva paśyanti tadā bilvodakeśvaram /
GE07hv_apppu:9303: dadhyau devaṃ hṛṣīkeśaḥ pramathānāṃ gaṇeśvaram // HV_App.I,29B.377 //
GE07hv_apppu:9305: yadā tu naiva paśyanti tadā devaṃ janārdanam /
GE07hv_apppu:9307: tatas te dadṛśuḥ sarve prabhāvād atitejasaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9310: āhvayantaṃ raṇe kṛṣṇaṃ vairiṇaṃ jñātināśanam // HV_App.I,29B.381 //
GE07hv_apppu:9312: parighaṃ caiva gātreṣu vivyādhainam athāsakṛt // HV_App.I,29B.383 //
GE07hv_apppu:9313: te bāṇās tasya gātreṣu parighaś ca janādhipa /
GE07hv_apppu:9314: bhagnāḥ śilāśitāḥ sarve nipetuḥ kuñcitāḥ kṣitau // HV_App.I,29B.385 //
GE07hv_apppu:9315: viphalān astrayuktāṃs tān dṛṣṭvā bāṇān dhanaṃjayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9316: papraccha keśavaṃ vīraḥ kim etad iti bhārata // HV_App.I,29B.387 //
GE07hv_apppu:9317: parvatān api bhindanti mama vajropamāḥ śarāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9318: kim idaṃ devakīputra vismayo 'tra mahān mama // HV_App.I,29B.389 //
GE07hv_apppu:9319: tam uvāca tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ prahasann iva bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:9320: mahadbhūtaṃ nikumbho 'yaṃ kaunteya śṛṇu vistaram // HV_App.I,29B.391 //
GE07hv_apppu:9323: athainaṃ chandayām āsa vareṇa bhagavān haraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9324: sa vavre trīṇi rūpāṇi navadhyāni surāsuraiḥ // HV_App.I,29B.395 //
GE07hv_apppu:9328: mama vā brāhmaṇānāṃ vā viṣṇor vāpriyam ācaran // HV_App.I,29B.397 //
GE07hv_apppu:9329: bhaviṣyasi harer vadhyo na tv anyasya mahāsura /
GE07hv_apppu:9330: bramaṇyo 'haṃ ca viṣṇuś ca viprā naḥ paramā gatiḥ // HV_App.I,29B.399 //
GE07hv_apppu:9332: trideho 'tipramāthī ca varadattaś ca dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.401 //
GE07hv_apppu:9334: avadhyaṃ ṣaṭpuraṃ deham idam asya durātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.403 //
GE07hv_apppu:9335: ditiṃ śuśrūṣati tv eko deho 'sya tapasānvitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9336: anyas tu deho ghoro 'sya yenāvasati ṣaṭpuram // HV_App.I,29B.405 //
GE07hv_apppu:9337: etat te sarvam akhyātaṃ nikumbhacaritaṃ mayā /
GE07hv_apppu:9338: tvarayāsya vadhe vīra kathā paścād bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,29B.407 //
GE07hv_apppu:9339: tayoḥ kathayator evaṃ kṛṣṇayor asuras tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:9340: guhāṃ ṣaṭpurasaṃjñāṃ tāṃ viveśa taṇadurjayaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.409 //
GE07hv_apppu:9342: tāṃ ṣaṭpuraguhāṃ ghrāṃ durdharṣāṃ kurunandana // HV_App.I,29B.411 //
GE07hv_apppu:9346: yuyudhe saha ghoreṇa nikumbhena janādhipa // HV_App.I,29B.415 //
GE07hv_apppu:9347: kṛṣṇasyānu praviṣṭās tu balādyā yādavās tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:9348: praviṣṭāś ca tataḥ sarve pāṇḍavāś ca mahātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9349: sametās tu praviṣṭās te kṛṣṇasyānumatena vai // HV_App.I,29B.418 //
GE07hv_apppu:9350: yuyudhe sa tu kṛṣṇena raukmiṇeyaḥ pracoditaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9354: anayad yādavān sarvān yān ayaṃ baddhavān purā // HV_App.I,29B.420 //
GE07hv_apppu:9355: te muktā raukmiṇeyena prāptā yatra janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9357: rājāno vīra muñceti punaḥ kāmam athābruvan /
GE07hv_apppu:9358: mumoca cātha tān vīro raukmiṇeyo pratāpavān // HV_App.I,29B.424 //
GE07hv_apppu:9360: lajjayābhiplutā vīrās tasthur naṣṭaśriyas tathā // HV_App.I,29B.426 //
GE07hv_apppu:9361: nikumbham appi govindaḥ prayatantaṃ jayaṃ prati /
GE07hv_apppu:9362: yodhayām āsa bhagavān ghoram ātmaripuṃ hariḥ // HV_App.I,29B.428 //
GE07hv_apppu:9364: gadayā cāpi kṛṣṇena nikumbhas tāḍito bhṛśam // HV_App.I,29B.430 //
GE07hv_apppu:9365: tāv ubhau moham āpannau suprahārahatau tadā // HV_App.I,29B.431 //
GE07hv_apppu:9366: tataḥ pravyathitān dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavāṃś cātha yādavān /
GE07hv_apppu:9368: tuṣṭuvuś ca mahātmānaṃ vedaproktais tathā stavaiḥ // HV_App.I,29B.434 //
GE07hv_apppu:9370: dānavaś ca punar vīrau udyatau samaraṃ prati // HV_App.I,29B.436 //
GE07hv_apppu:9371: vṛṣabhāv iva nardantau gajāv iva ca bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:9372: śālāvṛkāv iva kruddhau praharantau raṇotkaṭau // HV_App.I,29B.438 //
GE07hv_apppu:9373: atha kṛṣṇaṃ tadovāca nṛpa vāg aśarīriṇī /
GE07hv_apppu:9376: dharmaṃ yaśaś ca vipulaṃ prāpnuhi tvaṃ mahābala // HV_App.I,29B.442 //
GE07hv_apppu:9377: tathety uktvā namaskṛtvā lokanāthaḥ satāṃ gatiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9381: tat papāta śiras tasya bhūmau jvalitakuṇḍalam /
GE07hv_apppu:9382: meghamatto gireḥ śṛṅgān mayūra iva bhūtale // HV_App.I,29B.448 //
GE07hv_apppu:9384: tutoṣa ca naravyāghra jagattrāsakare vibho // HV_App.I,29B.450 //
GE07hv_apppu:9387: nananda ca jagat kṛtsnaṃ munayaś ca viśeṣataḥ // HV_App.I,29B.453 //
GE07hv_apppu:9388: daityakanyāś ca bhagavān yadubhyaḥ śataśo dadau /
GE07hv_apppu:9389: kṣatriyāṇāṃ ca bhagavān sāntvayitvā punaḥ punaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9390: ratnāni ca vicitrāṇi vāsāṃsi pravarāṇi ca // HV_App.I,29B.456 //
GE07hv_apppu:9395: tad eva cātha pravaraṃ saṭpuraṃ puravardhanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9398: visarjayitvā tat kṣatraṃ pāṇḍavāṃś ca mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.462 //
GE07hv_apppu:9402: yodhayitvā dadau bhūri vittaṃ vastrāṇi cātmavān // HV_App.I,29B.466 //
GE07hv_apppu:9404: abhivādya brahmadattaṃ yayau dvāravatīṃ purīm // HV_App.I,29B.468 //
GE07hv_apppu:9406: puṣpacitrapathāṃ vīro vandyamāno naraiḥ pathi // HV_App.I,29B.470 //
GE07hv_apppu:9408: śṛṇuyād vā paṭhed vāppi sa yuddhe jayam āpnuyāt // HV_App.I,29B.472 //
GE07hv_apppu:9409: aputro labhate putram adhano labhate dhanam /
GE07hv_apppu:9410: vyādhito mucyate rogād baddhaś cpay atha bandhanāt // HV_App.I,29B.474 //
GE07hv_apppu:9411: idaṃ puṃsavanaṃ proktaṃ gaubhādhānaṃ ca bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:9412: śrāddheṣu paṭhitaṃ samyag akṣayyakaraṇaṃ smṛtam // HV_App.I,29B.476 //
GE07hv_apppu:9415: satatam iha hi yaḥ paṭhen naraḥ @ HV_App.I,29B.479 @
GE07hv_apppu:9422: [h: HV (CE) Appendix 29C, transliterated and proof--read by Renate Söhnen--Thieme, version of September 2004 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:9423: [k: After App I (No. 29B), K Ñ2V BDT GM4 cont. with a passage given in App. I (No. 29C).
GE07hv_apppu:9427: bhānumatyāś ca haraṇaṃ nikumbhasya vadhaṃ tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:9428: prabrūhi vadatāṃ śreṣṭha paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me // HV_App.I,29C.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:9431: tapasārādhayām āsa mārīcaṃ kaśyapaṃ purā // HV_App.I,29C.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:9433: ānukūlyena ca tathā mādhuryeṇa ca bhārata // HV_App.I,29C.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:9434: parituṣṭaḥ kaśyapas tu tām uvāca tapodhanām /
GE07hv_apppu:9435: parituṣṭo 'haṃ te bhadre varaṃ varaya suvrate // HV_App.I,29C.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:9438: avaśyaṃ putram icchāmi devair amitavikramam // HV_App.I,29C.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:9440: avadhyas te suto devi dākṣāyaṇi bhaved iti /
GE07hv_apppu:9441: devānāṃ saṃśayo nātra kaścit kamalalocane // HV_App.I,29C.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:9442: devadevam ṛte rudraṃ tasya na prabhavāmy aham // HV_App.I,29C.15 //
GE07hv_apppu:9443: ātmā tatas te putreṇa rakṣitavyo hi sarvathā // HV_App.I,29C.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:9444: anvālabhata tāṃ devīṃ kaśyapaḥ satyavāg atha /
GE07hv_apppu:9445: aṅgulyodaradeśe tu sā putraṃ suṣuve tataḥ // HV_App.I,29C.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:9447: dvisahasrekṣaṇaṃ caiva tāvaccaraṇam eva ca // HV_App.I,29C.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:9448: sa vrajaty andhavad yasmād anandho 'pi hi bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:9449: tam andhako 'yaṃ nāmneti procus tatranivāsinaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:9450: avadhyo 'smīti lokān sa sarvān bādhati bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:9451: haraty api ca ratnāni sarvāṇy ātmabalāśrayāt // HV_App.I,29C.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:9455: cakāra satataṃ mohād andhakaḥ pāpaniścayaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:9457: sahāyair asuraiḥ sārdhaṃ bahubhiḥ sarvadharṣibhiḥ // HV_App.I,29C.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:9458: taṃ śrutvā bhagavāñ śakraḥ kaśyapaṃ pitaraṃ bravīt /
GE07hv_apppu:9461: yavīyasaḥ kathaṃ nāma soḍhavyaṃ syān mune mayā // HV_App.I,29C.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:9462: iṣṭaputre prahartavyaṃ kathaṃ nāma mayā vibho /
GE07hv_apppu:9463: ihātrabhavatī kuryān manyuṃ mayi hate sute // HV_App.I,29C.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:9465: vārayiṣyāmi devendra sarvathā bhadram astu te // HV_App.I,29C.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:9466: andhakaṃ vārayām āsa dityā saha tu kaśyapaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9468: vārito 'pi sa duṣṭātmā bādhaty eva divaukasaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9469: tais tair upāyair duṣṭātmā pramathya ca tathā parān // HV_App.I,29C.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:9470: babhañja kānane vṛkān udyānāni ca durmatiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9471: uccaiḥśravaḥsutān aśvān balād apy ānayad divaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:9472: nāgān diśāgajasutān divyān āpi ca bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:9473: balād dharati devānāṃ paśyatāṃ baladarpitaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:9474: devān āpyāyante tu ye yajñais tapasā balāt /
GE07hv_apppu:9475: teṣāṃ cakāra vidhvaṃsaṃ duṣṭātmā devakaṇṭakaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:9476: nejur yajñais trayo varṇās tepur naiva tapāṃsy api /
GE07hv_apppu:9477: andhakasya bhayād rājan yajñavighnāni kurvataḥ // HV_App.I,29C.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:9478: tasyecchayā vāti vāyur ādityaś ca tapaty uta /
GE07hv_apppu:9479: candramāś ca sanakṣatro dṛśyate naiva vā punaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:9480: na bhajanti vimānāni vihāyasy prabhāṃ prabho /
GE07hv_apppu:9484: kurūn athottarān pāpo drāvayām āsa bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:9485: bhadrāśvān ketumālāṃś ca jambudvīpāṃs tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29C.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:9486: mānayanti ca taṃ devā dānavāś ca durāsadāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9487: bhūtāni ca tathānyāni samarthāny api sarvathā // HV_App.I,29C.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:9489: acintayann andhakasya vadhaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ vara // HV_App.I,29C.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:9490: teṣāṃ bṛhaspatir madhye dhīmān idam athābravīt /
GE07hv_apppu:9491: nāsya rudrād ṛte mṛtyur vidyate ca kathaṃcana // HV_App.I,29C.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:9493: nāhaṃ rudrāt paritrātuṃ śakta ity eva dhīmatā // HV_App.I,29C.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:9494: tad upāyaṃ cintayāmaḥ śarvo yena sanātanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9496: viditārtho hi bhagavān avaśyaṃ jagataḥ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9497: aśrupramarjanaṃ devaḥ kariṣyati satāṃ gatiḥ // HV_App.I,29C.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:9498: vrataṃ hi devadevasya bhavasya jagato guroḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9499: santo 'sadbhyo rakṣitavyā brāhmaṇās tu viśeṣataḥ // HV_App.I,29C.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:9500: te vayaṃ nāradaṃ sarve prayāmaḥ śaraṇaṃ dvijaṃ /
GE07hv_apppu:9501: upāyaṃ vetsyate tatra vayasyo hi bhavasya saḥ // HV_App.I,29C.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:9503: [k: Ds1 (marg.) Bom. Poona eds, G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:9507: devarṣe bhagavan sādho kailāsaṃ vraja satvaram /
GE07hv_apppu:9508: vijñaptum arhase devam andhakasya vadhe haram //
GE07hv_apppu:9509: trāṇārthaṃ nāradaṃ procus tāṃs tatheti sa coktavān // HV_App.I,29C.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:9510: ṛṣiṣv atha prayāteṣu tat kāryaṃ nārado muniḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9511: vicārya manasā vidvān iti kāryaṃ sa dṛṣṭavān // HV_App.I,29C.78 //
GE07hv_apppu:9512: sa devadevaṃ bhagavān draṣṭuṃ munir athāyayau /
GE07hv_apppu:9514: sa tatra rajanīm ekām uṣitvā munisattamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9515: mandārāṇāṃ vane ramnye dayitaḥ śūlapāṇinaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.82 //
GE07hv_apppu:9517: mandārapuṣpaiḥ sukṛtāṃ mālām ābadhya bhārata // HV_App.I,29C.84 //
GE07hv_apppu:9519: saṃtānamālyadāmaṃ ca sarvais taiḥ kusumaiḥ kṛtam // HV_App.I,29C.86 //
GE07hv_apppu:9520: tac ca kaṇṭhe samāsajya mahāgandhaṃ nārādhipa /
GE07hv_apppu:9521: āyayāv andhako yatra durātmā baladarpitaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.88 //
GE07hv_apppu:9522: andhakas tv atha taṃ dṛṣṭvā gandham āghrāya cottamam /
GE07hv_apppu:9525: gandhān varṇāñ śubhāṃs tān hi bhoḥ puṣyati muhur muhuḥ // HV_App.I,29C.92
GE07hv_apppu:9527: kaḥ prabhus tasya deśasya yaḥ sa sukṛtavān mune /
GE07hv_apppu:9528: ācakṣya yady anugrāhyā vayaṃ te devatātithe // HV_App.I,29C.95 //
GE07hv_apppu:9530: ācakṣva me mune sarvaṃ saṃsiśasva varaṃ hi vai /
GE07hv_apppu:9532: yad yad iṣṭaṃ mamāpi syāt tad deyaṃ devatātithau /
GE07hv_apppu:9533: tam uvāca muniśreṣṭhaḥ prahasann iva bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:9534: grahāya dakṣiṇe haste mahatas tapaso nidhiḥ // HV_App.I,29C.97 //
GE07hv_apppu:9536: tatra caivaṃvidhaṃ puṣpaṃ bhoḥ sṛṣṭiḥ śūlapāṇinaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9537: na tu tatra vanaṃ kaścid acchandena mahātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9538: praveṣṭuṃ labhate tad dhi rakṣanti pramathottamāḥ // HV_App.I,29C.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:9541: nityaṃ prakrīḍate tatra somaḥ sapravaro haraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9546: kāṅkṣitāni phalanti sma te drumā haravallabhāḥ // HV_App.I,29C.109 //
GE07hv_apppu:9547: na tatra sūryaḥ somo 'tha tapaty atulavikrama /
GE07hv_apppu:9548: svayaṃprabhaṃ taruvanaṃ tad bho duḥkhavivarjitam // HV_App.I,29C.111 //
GE07hv_apppu:9549: tatra gandhāḥ sravanty anye ratnāny anye mahādrumāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9550: vāsāṃsi vividhāny anye sugandhāni mahābala // HV_App.I,29C.113 //
GE07hv_apppu:9551: bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca peyaṃ ca coṣyaṃ lehyaṃ tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:9552: tarubhyaḥ sravate tebhyo vividhaṃ manasepsitam // HV_App.I,29C.115 //
GE07hv_apppu:9553: pipāsā vā bubhukṣā vā glāniś cintāpi vānagha /
GE07hv_apppu:9554: na mandāravane vīra bhavatīty upadhāryatām // HV_App.I,29C.117 //
GE07hv_apppu:9555: na te varṇayituṃ śakyā guṇā varṣaśatair api /
GE07hv_apppu:9556: guṇā ye tatra vartante svargād bahuguṇottarāḥ // HV_App.I,29C.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:9557: atīva vijayel lokān samahendrān na saṃśayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9558: ekāham api yas tatra vased vai ditijottama // HV_App.I,29C.121 //
GE07hv_apppu:9559: svargasyāpi hi tat svargaṃ sukhānām api sat sukham /
GE07hv_apppu:9560: babhūva jagataḥ sarvam iti me dhīyate manaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.123 //
GE07hv_apppu:9564: mandaraṃ parvataṃ gantuṃ mano dadhre mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,29C.125 //
GE07hv_apppu:9566: jagāma mandaraṃ kruddho mahādevālayaṃ tadā // HV_App.I,29C.127 //
GE07hv_apppu:9571: vātoddhūtair vanaiḥ phullair nṛtyantam iva ca kvacit /
GE07hv_apppu:9572: prasrutair dhātubhiś citrair viliptam iva ca kvacit // HV_App.I,29C.133 //
GE07hv_apppu:9573: pakṣisvanaiḥ sumadhurair nadantam iva ca kvacit /
GE07hv_apppu:9574: haṃsaiḥ śucipadaiḥ kīrṇaṃ saṃpatadbhir itas tataḥ // HV_App.I,29C.135 //
GE07hv_apppu:9580: sa mandaraṃ giriṃ prāha rūpiṇaṃ baladarppitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9581: vetsi tvaṃ hi yathāvadhyo varadānād ahaṃ pituḥ // HV_App.I,29C.140 //
GE07hv_apppu:9582: mama caiva vaśe sarvaṃ trailokyaṃ sacarācaram /
GE07hv_apppu:9583: pratiyoddhuṃ na māṃ kaścid icchaty api gire bhayāt // HV_App.I,29C.142 //
GE07hv_apppu:9585: sarvakāmapradaiḥ puṣpair bhūṣitaṃ ratnam uttamam // HV_App.I,29C.144 //
GE07hv_apppu:9586: tad ācakṣvopabhokṣyāmi tad vanaṃ tava sānujam // HV_App.I,29C.145 //
GE07hv_apppu:9587: kiṃ kariṣyasi kruddhas tvaṃ mano hi tvarate mama // HV_App.I,29C.146 //
GE07hv_apppu:9588: trātāraṃ nānupaśyāmi mayā khalv arditasya te /
GE07hv_apppu:9591: mumoca nādaṃ sumahad idaṃ vacanam abravīt // HV_App.I,29C.150 //
GE07hv_apppu:9592: mayā nāma yācyamāno yasmān na bahu manyase /
GE07hv_apppu:9593: ahaṃ cūrṇīkaromi tvāṃ balaṃ parvata paśya me // HV_App.I,29C.152 //
GE07hv_apppu:9594: evam uktvā gireḥ śṛṅgam utpāṭya bahuyojanam /
GE07hv_apppu:9596: saha tair asuraiḥ sarvair varadānena darpitaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.155 //
GE07hv_apppu:9598: viditvā bhagavān rudraś cakārānugrahaṃ gireḥ // HV_App.I,29C.157 //
GE07hv_apppu:9601: nabhaścyutaiḥ purā yadvat tadvad eva virājate // HV_App.I,29C.160 //
GE07hv_apppu:9603: kṣiptāni cāsurān eva ghnanti ghorāṇi bhārata // HV_App.I,29C.162 //
GE07hv_apppu:9604: kṣiptvā ye prapalāyante śṛṅgāṇi tu mahāsurāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9605: śṛṅais tais taiḥ sma vadhyante parvatasya janādhipa // HV_App.I,29C.164 //
GE07hv_apppu:9606: ye svasthās tv asurās tatra tiṣṭhanti girisānuṣu /
GE07hv_apppu:9607: śṛṅgais te tasya vadhyante mandarasya mahāgireḥ // HV_App.I,29C.166 //
GE07hv_apppu:9608: tato 'ndhakas tadā dṛṣṭvā senāṃ tāṃ sūditāṃ tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:9611: kiṃ tvayācala yuddhena hatāḥ sma cchadmanā raṇe // HV_App.I,29C.170 //
GE07hv_apppu:9612: evam ukte tv andhakena vṛṣabheṇa maheśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9614: pramathānāṃ gaṇair dhīmān vṛto vai bahulocanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9615: tathā bhūtagaṇaiś caiva dhīmān bhūtagaṇeśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,29C.174 //
GE07hv_apppu:9616: pracakampe tataḥ kṛtsnaṃ trailokyaṃ ruṣite hare /
GE07hv_apppu:9617: sindhavaś ca pratisrotam ūhuḥ prajvalitodakāḥ // HV_App.I,29C.176 //
GE07hv_apppu:9619: yuyudhuś ca grahāḥ sarve viparītā janādhipa // HV_App.I,29C.178 //
GE07hv_apppu:9620: celuś ca girayas tatra kāle kurukulodvaha /
GE07hv_apppu:9622: uṣṇabhāś candramāś cāsīt sūryaḥ śītaprabhas tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:9623: na brahma vividus tatra munayyo brahmavādinaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.182 //
GE07hv_apppu:9624: vaḍavāḥ suṣuvur gāś ca gāvo 'śvān api cānagha /
GE07hv_apppu:9625: petur vṛkṣāś ca medinyām acchinna bhasmasātkṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,29C.184 //
GE07hv_apppu:9626: bādhante vṛṣabhā gāś ca gāvaś cāruruhur vṛṣān /
GE07hv_apppu:9627: rākṣasā yātudhānāś ca piśācāś cāpi sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.186 //
GE07hv_apppu:9630: andhako 'pi mahātejā bāṇair api vavarṣa tam // **HV_App.I,29C.86**5:2
GE07hv_apppu:9631: viparītaṃ jagad dṛṣṭvā mahādevas tathā gatam /
GE07hv_apppu:9634: bhasmasāc cākarod raudram andhakaṃ sādhukaṇṭakam // HV_App.I,29C.190 //
GE07hv_apppu:9635: tato devagaṇāḥ sarve munayaś ca tapodhanāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9636: śaṃkaraṃ tuṣṭuvuś caiva jagacchatrau nibarhite // HV_App.I,29C.192 //
GE07hv_apppu:9638: trailokyaṃ virvṛtaṃ cāsīn narendra vigatajvaram // HV_App.I,29C.194 //
GE07hv_apppu:9640: jepuś ca brāhmaṇā vedān ījuś ca kratubhis tathā // HV_App.I,29C.196 //
GE07hv_apppu:9641: grahāḥ prakṛtim āpedur ūhur nadyo yathā purā /
GE07hv_apppu:9642: na jajvāla jale vahnir āśāḥ sarvāḥ prasedire // HV_App.I,29C.198 //
GE07hv_apppu:9645: reme somaś ca bhagavān pārijātavane haraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9646: supracārān surān kṛtvā śakrādīn dharmataḥ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,29C.202 //
GE07hv_apppu:9648: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 29D, transliterated by François Painchaud,
GE07hv_apppu:9649: proof--read by André Couture, version of January 2005 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:9652: mune 'ndhakavadhaḥ śrāvyaḥ śruto 'yaṃ khalu bho mayā /
GE07hv_apppu:9653: śāntis trayāṇāṃ lokānāṃ kṛtā devena dhīmatā // HV_App.I,29D.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:9655: yadarthaṃ ca yathā caiva tad bhavān vaktum arhati // HV_App.I,29D.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:9660: samudrayātrā saṃprāptā tīrthe piṇḍārake nṛpa // HV_App.I,29D.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:9662: nikṣiptau nagarādhyakṣau śeṣāḥ sarve vinirgatāḥ // HV_App.I,29D.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:9663: pṛthag balaḥ pṛthag dhīmāl lokanātho janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9666: kumaraiḥ saha vārṣṇeyai rūpavadbhiḥ svalaṃkṛtaiḥ // HV_App.I,29D.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:9668: veśyā niveśitā vīra dvāravatyāṃ sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,29D.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:9671: sthitir eṣā hi bhaimānāṃ kṛtā kṛṣṇena dhīmatā /
GE07hv_apppu:9672: strīnimittaṃ bhaved vairaṃ mā yadunām iti prabho // HV_App.I,29D.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:9676: cikrīḍa sāgarajale revatyā sahito balaḥ // HV_App.I,29D.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:9678: ramayām āsa govindo vaiśvarūpyeṇa sarvakṛt // HV_App.I,29D.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:9679: aham iṣṭā mayā sārdhaṃ jale vasati keśavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9680: iti tā menire sarvā nārāyaṇaparāḥ striyaḥ // HV_App.I,29D.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:9682: mānam ūhuś ca tāḥ sarvā govinde bahumānajam // HV_App.I,29D.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:9683: aham iṣṭaham iṣṭeti snigdhe parijane tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:9684: nārāyaṇās triyaḥ sarvā mudā śaślāghire śubhāḥ // HV_App.I,29D.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:9686: dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvā jahṛṣire darpaṇeṣv aṅgalakṣaṇam // HV_App.I,29D.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:9688: pibantya iva kṛṣṇasya nayanair vadanāmbujam // HV_App.I,29D.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:9695: tābhis tu saha cikrīḍa sarvābhir harir ātmavān /
GE07hv_apppu:9696: vaiśvarūpyeṇa vidhinā samudre vimale jale // HV_App.I,29D.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:9698: toyaṃ cālavaṇaṃ vīra vāsudevasya śāsanāt // HV_App.I,29D.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:9700: nāryas tāḥ stanadaghnaṃ vā jalaṃ samabhikāṅkṣitam // HV_App.I,29D.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:9701: siṣicuḥ keśavaṃ patnyo dhārā iva mahodadhim /
GE07hv_apppu:9702: siṣeca taśca govindo meghaḥ phullalatā iva // HV_App.I,29D.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:9704: upagūhasva māṃ vīra patāmīty abruvan striyaḥ // HV_App.I,29D.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:9709: stanakumbhais tathā terūḥ kumbhair iva tathāparāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9711: rarāma saha rūkmiṇyā jale tasmin mudā yutaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9713: tat tad eva hi tāś cakrur mudā nārāyaṇastriyaḥ // HV_App.I,29D.61 //
GE07hv_apppu:9716: yasyā yasyās tu yo bhāvas tāṃ tāṃ tenaiva keśavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9721: vaiśvarūpyeṇa vartantam aṅganās tā janārdanam // HV_App.I,29D.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:9723: kṛṣṇaṃ bhāryāś cakamire bhaktyā ca bahu menire // HV_App.I,29D.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:9724: pṛthag goṣṭhyaḥ kumārāṇāṃ prakāśaṃ strīgaṇaiḥ saha /
GE07hv_apppu:9725: alaṃcakrur jalaṃ vīrāḥ sāgarasya guṇākarāḥ // HV_App.I,29D.73 //
GE07hv_apppu:9727: tejasāpy āhṛtānāṃ te dākṣaṇyāt tasthire vaśe /
GE07hv_apppu:9730: pañcacūḍās tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kauberyaś ca varāpsarāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9731: māhendrīś cānayām āsa vaiśvarūpyeṇa hetunā // HV_App.I,29D.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:9733: upasthitāś ca praṇatāḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭās tathā // HV_App.I,29D.81 //
GE07hv_apppu:9735: matpriyārthaṃ varārohā ramayadhvaṃ ca yādavān // HV_App.I,29D.83 //
GE07hv_apppu:9736: darśayadhvaṃ guṇān sarvān nṛtyagītai rahaḥsu ca /
GE07hv_apppu:9738: evaṃ kṛte vidhāsyāmi śreyo vo manasepsitam /
GE07hv_apppu:9739: maccharīrasamā hy ete sarve niravaśeṣataḥ // HV_App.I,29D.87 //
GE07hv_apppu:9740: śirasājñāṃ tu tāḥ sarvāḥ pratigṛhya hares tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:9744: tā jale sthalavat sthitvā jaguś cāthāpy avādayan /
GE07hv_apppu:9745: cakruś cābhinayaṃ samyak svargāvāsa ivāṅganāḥ // HV_App.I,29D.93 //
GE07hv_apppu:9746: gandhair mālyaiś ca tā divyair vastraiś cāyatalocanāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9747: helābhir hāsabhāvaiś ca jahrur bhaimamanāṃsy atha // HV_App.I,29D.95 //
GE07hv_apppu:9749: manonukūlair bhaimānāṃ samājahrur manāṃsi tāḥ // HV_App.I,29D.97 //
GE07hv_apppu:9750: utkṣipyotkṣipya cākāśaṃ vātaskandhān bahūṃś ca tān /
GE07hv_apppu:9752: kṛṣṇo 'pi teṣāṃ prītyarthaṃ vijahre viyati prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9753: sarvaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ sārdhaṃ strīsahasrair mudānvitaḥ // HV_App.I,29D.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:9755: na jagmur vismayaṃ bhaimā gāmbhīryaṃ paramāsthitāḥ // HV_App.I,29D.103 //
GE07hv_apppu:9756: kecid raivatakaṃ gatvā punar āyānti bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:9757: gṛhān anye vanāny anye kāṅkṣitāny arimardana // HV_App.I,29D.105 //
GE07hv_apppu:9761: gṛhya haste tathā nāryo yuktā majjaṃs tathāpi ca // HV_App.I,29D.109 //
GE07hv_apppu:9762: bhakṣyabhojyāni peyāni coṣyaṃ lehyaṃ tathaica ca /
GE07hv_apppu:9763: bahuprakāraṃ manasā dhyāte teṣāṃ bhavaty uta // HV_App.I,29D.111 //
GE07hv_apppu:9765: rahaḥsu ramayāṃ cakruḥ svarge devaratānugāḥ // HV_App.I,29D.113 //
GE07hv_apppu:9768: āyatāś caturasrāś ca vṛttāś ca svastikās tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:9769: prāsādā nauṣu kauravya vihitā viśvakarmaṇā // HV_App.I,29D.117 //
GE07hv_apppu:9777: salilaṃ śobhayām āsuḥ sāgarasya mahormimat // HV_App.I,29D.125 //
GE07hv_apppu:9778: samucchritaiḥ sitaiḥ potair yānapātrais tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:9779: naubhiś ca jhillikābhiś ca śuśubhe varuṇālayaḥ // HV_App.I,29D.127 //
GE07hv_apppu:9784: udyānāni sabhā vṛkṣā dīrghikāḥ syandanāni ca /
GE07hv_apppu:9785: niveśitāni svalpāni tādṛśāny eva sarvathā // HV_App.I,29D.133 //
GE07hv_apppu:9788: vaneṣu ruruvur hṛdyaṃ madhuraṃ caiva pakṣiṇaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:9791: madhurāṇi vicitrāṇi yadūnāṃ kāṅkṣitāni ca // HV_App.I,29D.139 //
GE07hv_apppu:9802: na kṣutpipāsā na glānir na cintā śoka eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:9803: āviveśa tadā bhaimān prabhāvāc cakrapāninaḥ // HV_App.I,29D.151 //
GE07hv_apppu:9807: rūdhvā cikrīḍur indrābhā bhaimāḥ kṛṣṇābhirakṣitāḥ // HV_App.I,29D.155 //
GE07hv_apppu:9810: ratnāni yāni trailaukye viśiṣṭāni viśāṃ pate /
GE07hv_apppu:9812: pṛthak pṛthaṅ nivāsāś ca strīṇāṃ kṛṣṇasya bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:9815: yadusiṃhāḥ śubhair juṣṭāḥ śakunaiḥ svargavāsibhiḥ // HV_App.I,29D.163 //
GE07hv_apppu:9834: tāṃ revatīṃ cāpy atha vāpi rāmaṃ @ HV_App.I,29D.180 @
GE07hv_apppu:9842: cikrīḍur anyāś ca tathaiva tāsāṃ @ HV_App.I,29D.188 @
GE07hv_apppu:9853: vraje ca vāsaṃ śakunīvadhaṃ ca || HV_App.I,29D.199 ||
GE07hv_apppu:9854: tathā ca bhagnau yamalārjunau ca @ HV_App.I,29D.200 @
GE07hv_apppu:9856: sa kāliyo nāgapatir hrade ca @ HV_App.I,29D.202 @
GE07hv_apppu:9857: kṛṣṇena dāntaś ca yathā durātmā || HV_App.I,29D.203 ||
GE07hv_apppu:9872: ratnapravekaṃ ca yudhā jitair yat @ HV_App.I,29D.218 @
GE07hv_apppu:9890: gadaś ca dhīmān atha sāraṇaś ca @ HV_App.I,29D.236 @
GE07hv_apppu:9912: madhyaṃ ca gatvā sa cukūrda bhūyo @ HV_App.I,29D.258 @
GE07hv_apppu:9914: sa satyabhāmām atha keśavaṃ ca @ HV_App.I,29D.260 @
GE07hv_apppu:9915: pārthaṃ subhadrāṃ ca balaṃ ca devam |
GE07hv_apppu:9924: hasan vihāsāṃś ca jahāsa harṣād @ HV_App.I,29D.270 @
GE07hv_apppu:9934: rāsāvasāne tv atha gṛhya haste @ HV_App.I,29D.280 @
GE07hv_apppu:9940: dvidhākṛtāḥ sma patitāḥ sma bhūtvā @ HV_App.I,29D.286 @
GE07hv_apppu:9950: dṛśyā ca te ratnavibhūṣitā tu @ HV_App.I,29D.296 @
GE07hv_apppu:9952: manonukūlaṃ ca janasya yat tat @ HV_App.I,29D.298 @
GE07hv_apppu:9965: pātraṃ papur yeṣu dadasva bhaimāḥ || HV_App.I,29D.311 ||
GE07hv_apppu:9968: yathā vyalīkaṃ na bhaved yadūnāṃ @ HV_App.I,29D.314 @
GE07hv_apppu:9972: siṣeca pūrvaṃ nṛpa nāradaṃ tu @ HV_App.I,29D.318 @
GE07hv_apppu:9975: sa cāpi satyām atha rukmiṇīṃ ca @ **HV_App.I,29D.319**1:2 @
GE07hv_apppu:9981: kṛṣṇātmajā ye tv atha bhaimamukhyā @ HV_App.I,29D.324 @
GE07hv_apppu:9985: śeṣās tu bhaimā harim abhyupetāḥ @ HV_App.I,29D.328 @
GE07hv_apppu:10013: nārāyaṇaś caiva sa nāradaś ca @ HV_App.I,29D.356 @
GE07hv_apppu:10023: te noparemuḥ suciraṃ ca bhaimā @ HV_App.I,29D.366 @
GE07hv_apppu:10024: mānaṃ vahanto madanaṃ madaṃ ca || HV_App.I,29D.367 ||
GE07hv_apppu:10032: priyāś ca teṣāṃ nanṛtuḥ pratītāḥ || HV_App.I,29D.375 ||
GE07hv_apppu:10038: bhaimā hi te tatyajur eva toyam || HV_App.I,29D.381 ||
GE07hv_apppu:10078: peyaiś ca dadhnā payasā ca vīrāḥ @ HV_App.I,29D.418 @
GE07hv_apppu:10082: śṛtaṃ payaḥ śarkarayā ca yuktaṃ @ HV_App.I,29D.422 @
GE07hv_apppu:10083: phalaprakārāṃś ca bahūṃś ca khādan || HV_App.I,29D.423 ||
GE07hv_apppu:10087: sarpiḥ palaṃ madhu palaṃ maricaṃ dvikarṣaṃ @ **HV_App.I,29D.423**3:3
GE07hv_apppu:10093: tṛptāḥ pravṛttāḥ punar eva vīrās @ HV_App.I,29D.424 @
GE07hv_apppu:10097: ājñāpayām āsa tataḥ sa tasyāṃ @ HV_App.I,29D.428 @
GE07hv_apppu:10101: jagrāha vīṇām atha nāradas tu @ HV_App.I,29D.432 @
GE07hv_apppu:10103: hallīsakaṃ tu svayam eva kṛṣṇaḥ @ HV_App.I,29D.434 @
GE07hv_apppu:10107: āsāritān te ca tataḥ pratītā @ HV_App.I,29D.438 @
GE07hv_apppu:10112: hemā ca rājann atha miśrakeśī || HV_App.I,29D.443 ||
GE07hv_apppu:10113: tilottamā cāpy atha menakā ca @ HV_App.I,29D.444 @
GE07hv_apppu:10141: karoti pāpaṃ ca tathā vihanti @ HV_App.I,29D.470 @
GE07hv_apppu:10144: [k: T1 G3 (second occurrence) T2, 3 G1, 4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:10151: viveda kṛṣṇaś ca sa nāradaś ca @ HV_App.I,29D.478 @
GE07hv_apppu:10153: vijñātam etad dhi parair yathāvad @ HV_App.I,29D.480 @
GE07hv_apppu:10156: toyaṃ nadīnām atha vā samudraḥ || HV_App.I,29D.483 ||
GE07hv_apppu:10157: jñātuṃ hi śakyaṃ hi mahāgirir vā @ HV_App.I,29D.484 @
GE07hv_apppu:10159: śakyaṃ na chālikyam ṛte tapobhis @ HV_App.I,29D.486 @
GE07hv_apppu:10169: [k: a line seems to be missing in all Mss.; while D6 (marg.) ins.
GE07hv_apppu:10180: bālā yavānaś ca tathaiva vṛddhāḥ @ HV_App.I,29D.499 @
GE07hv_apppu:10185: [k: Line 503 is printed with enclosing brackets. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:10202: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 29E, transliterated by François Painchaud,
GE07hv_apppu:10203: proof--read by André Couture, version of February 2005 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:10207: chidram āsādya durbuddhir devaśatrur durāsadaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:10208: kanyāṃ bhānumatīṃ nāma bhānor duhitaraṃ nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:10211: māyāvī māyayā rājan pūrvavairam anusmaran // HV_App.I,29E.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:10212: bhrātur hi vajranābhasya tasya kanyā prabhāvatī /
GE07hv_apppu:10213: pradyūmnena hṛtā vīra vajranābhas tathā hataḥ // HV_App.I,29E.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:10214: bhānor eva tathāraṇye vasaty avasareṇa hi /
GE07hv_apppu:10217: tasyāṃ hṛtāyāṃ kanyāyāṃ rudantyāṃ samitiṃjaya // HV_App.I,29E.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:10219: ārtanādam upaśrutya bhānoḥ kanyāpure tadā // HV_App.I,29E.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:10221: tathaiva daṃśitau yātau yatra kṛṣṇo mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:10222: śrutārthaḥ svaṃ vimānaṃ tad āruroha janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10223: pārthena sahitas tārkṣyaṃ nāgaśatrum ariṃdamaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:10225: tvareti garuḍaṃ vīraḥ saṃdideśa ca kāśyapam // HV_App.I,29E.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:10228: pradyumnaś ca mahātejā māyināṃ pravaro nṛpa // HV_App.I,29E.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:10231: nikumbhas tv atha taṃ dṛṣṭvā tridhātmānam athākarot // HV_App.I,29E.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:10232: tān sarvān yodhayām āsa nikumbhaḥ prahasann iva /
GE07hv_apppu:10235: dakṣiṇenātha hastena gadayā praharaty uta // HV_App.I,29E.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:10236: kanyārthaṃ na ca kṛṇṣau vā kāmo vā nṛpasattama /
GE07hv_apppu:10237: nirdayaṃ praharanti sma nikumbhe ca mahāsure // HV_App.I,29E.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:10238: samarthās te mahātmānaḥ śatruṃ hantuṃ durāsadāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10240: śreṣṭho dhanuṣmatāṃ pārthaḥ sarvathā kuśalo yudhi /
GE07hv_apppu:10241: nārācair vidhinā daityaṃ śaraśaktyā jaghāna ha // HV_App.I,29E.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:10242: te tu vaitastikair bāṇair vividhur dānavaṃ yudhi /
GE07hv_apppu:10243: na kanyāṃ kalayā yuktyā śikṣayā ca mahīpate // HV_App.I,29E.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:10245: āsurīm āśrito māyāṃ na tāṃ vetti hi kaś cana // HV_App.I,29E.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:10246: taṃ kṛṣṇau raukmiṇeyaś ca pṛṣṭhato 'nuyayus tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:10247: hārītaḥ śakuno bhūtvā tasthāv atha mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,29E.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:10248: taṃ bāṇaiḥ punar evātha vīro bhūyo dhanaṃjayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10249: vaitastikair marmabhidbhiḥ kanyāṃ rakṣann atāḍayat // HV_App.I,29E.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:10250: sa imāṃ pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ saptadvīpāṃ mahāsuraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10251: babhrāmānugataś caiva tair vīrair arimardanaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:10253: papāta celagaṅgāyāḥ puline saha kanyayā // HV_App.I,29E.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:10254: na devā nāsurā vāpi laṅghayanti tapodhanāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10255: gokarṇaṃ tejasā guptaṃ mahādevasya bhārata // HV_App.I,29E.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:10257: kanyāṃ bhānumatīṃ bhaimo jagrāha raṇadurjayaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:10258: asuraḥ so 'rdito rājan kṛṣṇābhyāṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10260: jagāma pṛṣṭhato yātau kṛṣṇau tārkṣyagatau tadā // HV_App.I,29E.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:10261: viveśa ṣaṭpuraṃ caiva jñātīnām ālayaṃ tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:10262: tatra vīrau guhādvāri kṛṣṇau rātriṃ tadoṣatuḥ // HV_App.I,29E.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:10266: dadarśa ca guhādvāri kṛṣṇau bhīmaparākramau // HV_App.I,29E.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:10270: nirjagāma balī yoddhuṃ nikumbho bhīmavikramaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.63 //
GE07hv_apppu:10271: tasya nirgacchatas tasmād bilāt pārtho viśāṃ pate /
GE07hv_apppu:10272: rurodha sarvato mārgaṃ śarair gāṇḍīvaniḥsṛtaiḥ // HV_App.I,29E.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:10274: śirasy atāḍayat pārthaṃ nikumbho balināṃ varaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:10276: hasitvā so 'suro dṛpto raukmiṇeyam atāḍayat // HV_App.I,29E.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:10277: taṃ prāṅmukhamukhaṃ vīraṃ māyāvī māyināṃ varam /
GE07hv_apppu:10278: adṛṣṭenāhato vīraḥ śirasy atha mumoha saḥ // HV_App.I,29E.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:10279: tathāgatau tu dṛṣṭvā tau muhyamānau sutāḍitau /
GE07hv_apppu:10282: tāv anyonyaṃ durādharṣau garjantāv abhipetatuḥ // HV_App.I,29E.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:10284: dadarśa tan mahāyuddhaṃ ghoraṃ devāsuraṃ tadā // HV_App.I,29E.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:10285: dṛṣṭvā devān hṛṣīkeśaś citrair yuddhair ariṃdamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10286: iyeṣa dānavaṃ hantuṃ devānāṃ hitakāmyayā // HV_App.I,29E.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:10287: sa maṇḍalāni citrāṇi darśayām āsa keśavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10290: śikṣayā bhrāmayāṇo 'tha maṇḍalāni cacāra ha // HV_App.I,29E.83 //
GE07hv_apppu:10291: ṛṣabhāv iva garjantau bṛṃhantāv iva kuñjarau /
GE07hv_apppu:10292: vāsitāntaram āsādya kruddhau sālāvṛkāv iva // HV_App.I,29E.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:10296: nikumbhamūrdhani tadā pātayām āsa bhārata // HV_App.I,29E.89 //
GE07hv_apppu:10297: avaṣṭabhya muhūrtaṃ tu hariḥ kaumodakīṃ gadām /
GE07hv_apppu:10298: tasthau jagadgurur dhīmān mumoha patitaḥ kṣitau // HV_App.I,29E.91 //
GE07hv_apppu:10299: hāhābhūtaṃ jagat sarvaṃ tatkālam abhavat tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:10300: tathā gate vāsudeve naradeve mahātmani // HV_App.I,29E.93 //
GE07hv_apppu:10303: nūnam ātmecchayā kṛṣṇas tathā cakre surottamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10304: ko hi śakto mahātmānaṃ yuddhe mohayituṃ harim // HV_App.I,29E.97 //
GE07hv_apppu:10308: śarīraṃ tat parityajya na tu taṃ vetti keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:10309: mumūrṣati mṛto vāyam iti matvā janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10310: rarakṣa smaramāṇo 'tha vīro vīravrataṃ vibho // HV_App.I,29E.103 //
GE07hv_apppu:10313: pradyumno 'py atha māyāvī viditaḥ kṛṣṇam abravīt /
GE07hv_apppu:10314: nikumbhas tāta nāsty atra gataḥ kvāpi sudurmatiḥ // HV_App.I,29E.107 //
GE07hv_apppu:10315: pradyumnenaiva mukte tu tan nanāśa kalevaram /
GE07hv_apppu:10316: prajahāsātha bhagavān arjunena saha prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,29E.109 //
GE07hv_apppu:10318: dadṛśus te tadā vīrāḥ kṣitau divi ca sarvataḥ // HV_App.I,29E.111 //
GE07hv_apppu:10319: sahasrāṇy eva kṛṣṇaṃ tu tathā pārtham ariṃdamam /
GE07hv_apppu:10320: raukmiṇeyaṃ tathā vīraṃ tad adbhutam ivābhavat // HV_App.I,29E.113 //
GE07hv_apppu:10321: pāṇḍavasya dhanuḥ kecit kecid asya mahāśarān /
GE07hv_apppu:10322: anye 'sya jagṛhur hastāv anye pādau mahāsurāḥ // HV_App.I,29E.115 //
GE07hv_apppu:10323: evaṃ grahāya te vīram agamaṃs te vihāyasi /
GE07hv_apppu:10324: pārthānām api koṭyas tu gṛhītānāṃ tadābhavan // HV_App.I,29E.117 //
GE07hv_apppu:10325: nāntaṃ dadarśa kṛṣṇaś ca kārṣṇiś ca ripunāśanau /
GE07hv_apppu:10326: vicchidya tau śarair vīrau nikumbhaṃ pārthavarjitau // HV_App.I,29E.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:10327: ekaikas tu dvidhā chinno dvaidhībhavati bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:10328: divyajñānas tadā kṛṣṇo bhagavān atra dṛṣṭvān // HV_App.I,29E.121 //
GE07hv_apppu:10330: sraṣṭāraṃ sarvamāyānāṃ hartāraṃ phalgunasya ca // HV_App.I,29E.123 //
GE07hv_apppu:10333: sa muktvā phalgunaṃ rājaṃś chinne śirasi bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:10336: kṛṣṇavākyena jagraha kārṣṇir viyati mānada // HV_App.I,29E.129 //
GE07hv_apppu:10340: nāradaṃ ca mahātmānaṃ vavande yadunandanaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.133 //
GE07hv_apppu:10342: bhāno mā kārṣīr manyuṃ tvaṃ śrūyatāṃ bhaimanandana // HV_App.I,29E.135 //
GE07hv_apppu:10344: sa śaśāpa tato roṣān munir duhitaraṃ tava // HV_App.I,29E.137 //
GE07hv_apppu:10346: sutārthe te mayā sārdhaṃ munibhiḥ sa prasāditaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.139 //
GE07hv_apppu:10347: bālāṃ vratavatīṃ kanyām anāgasam imāṃ mune /
GE07hv_apppu:10348: śaptavān asi dharmajña kathaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ vara /
GE07hv_apppu:10350: asmābhir evam uktas tu durvāsā bhaimanandana /
GE07hv_apppu:10352: yad avocam ahaṃ vākyaṃ tat tathā na tad anyathā /
GE07hv_apppu:10353: ripuhastam avaśyaṃ hi gamiṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.146 //
GE07hv_apppu:10354: adūṣitā tu dharmeṇa bhartāram upalapsyati // HV_App.I,29E.147 //
GE07hv_apppu:10355: bahuputrā bahudhanā subhagā ca bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,29E.148 //
GE07hv_apppu:10356: sugandhagandhā ca sadā kumārī ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10357: na ca śokām imaṃ ghoraṃ tan vaṅgī dhārayiṣyati // HV_App.I,29E.150 //
GE07hv_apppu:10359: śraddadhānaḥ sa śūraś ca dharmaśīlaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.152 //
GE07hv_apppu:10360: tato bhānumatīṃ bhānur dadau mādrīsutāya vai /
GE07hv_apppu:10361: sahadevāya dharmātmā nāradasya vacaḥ smaran // HV_App.I,29E.154 //
GE07hv_apppu:10363: vivāhe ca tadā vṛtte sabhāryaḥ svapuraṃ gataḥ // HV_App.I,29E.156 //
GE07hv_apppu:10364: imaṃ kṛṣṇasya vijayaṃ yaḥ paṭhec chṛṇuyād atha /
GE07hv_apppu:10365: vijayaṃ sarvakṛtyeṣu śraddadhāno labhen naraḥ // HV_App.I,29E.158 //
GE07hv_apppu:10367: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 29F, transliterated by François Painchaud,
GE07hv_apppu:10368: proof--read by André Couture, version of March 2005 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:10373: krīḍāṃ ca sāgare divyāṃ kṛṣṇīnām atitejasām /
GE07hv_apppu:10374: aśrauṣaṃ paramāścaryaṃ mune dharmabhṛtāṃ vara // HV_App.I,29F.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:10376: tan me kautūhalaṃ śrotuṃ prasādād bhavato mune // HV_App.I,29F.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:10379: vijayaṃ caiva kāmasya sāmbasya ca mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:10380: meroḥ sānau narapate tapaś cakre mahāsuraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10381: vajranābha iti khyāto niścitaḥ samitiṃjayaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:10383: vareṇa cchandayām āsa tapasā paritoṣitaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:10385: puraṃ vajrapuraṃ caiva sarvaratnamayaṃ śubham // HV_App.I,29F.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:10386: svacchandena praveśaś ca na vāyor api bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:10390: tathā tad abhavat tasya varadānena bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:10392: koṭiśo varalabdhaṃ tam asurāḥ parivārya te /
GE07hv_apppu:10393: ūṣur vajrapure rājan saṃvāheṣu tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29F.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:10397: purasya cātmanaś caiva jagad bādhitum udyataḥ // HV_App.I,29F.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:10398: mahendram abravīd gatvā devalokaṃ viśāṃ pate /
GE07hv_apppu:10399: aham īśitum icchāmi trailokyaṃ pākaśāsana // HV_App.I,29F.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:10400: atha vā me prayacchasva yuddhaṃ devagaṇeśvara /
GE07hv_apppu:10401: sāmānyaṃ hi jagat kṛtsnaṃ kāśyapānāṃ mahātmanām // HV_App.I,29F.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:10404: satreṣu dīkṣitaḥ saumya kaśyapo naḥ pitā muniḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10405: tasmin vṛtte yathā nyāyyaṃ tathā sa hi kariṣyati // HV_App.I,29F.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:10406: tataḥ sa pitaraṃ gatvā kaśyapaṃ dānavo 'bravīt /
GE07hv_apppu:10407: yathoktaṃ devarājena tam uvācātha kaśyapaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:10408: satre kṛtte kariṣyāmi yathā nyāyyaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GE07hv_apppu:10409: tvaṃ tu vajrapure putra vasa gaccha samāśritaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:10410: evam ukte vajranābhaḥ svam eva nagaraṃ gataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10411: mahendro 'pi yayau devo dvārakāṃ dvāramālinīm // HV_App.I,29F.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:10413: vajranābhasya vṛttāntaṃ tam uvāca janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:10415: tasmin vṛtte vajranābhaṃ pātayiṣyāmi vāsava // HV_App.I,29F.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:10416: tatropāyaṃ praveśe tu cintayāvaḥ satāṃ gate /
GE07hv_apppu:10417: nānicchayā praveśo 'sti tatra vāyor api prabho // HV_App.I,29F.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:10419: vājimedhe ca saṃprāpte vasudevasya bhārata // HV_App.I,29F.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:10421: cintayām āsatur vīrau devarājācyutāv ubhau // HV_App.I,29F.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:10422: tatra yajñe vartamāne sunāṭyena naṭas tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:10423: maharṣīṃs toṣayām āsa bhadranāmeti nāmataḥ // HV_App.I,29F.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:10424: taṃ vareṇa muniśreṣṭhāś chandayām āsur ātmavān /
GE07hv_apppu:10425: sa vavre tu naṭo bhadro varaṃ deveśvaropamaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.54 //
GE07hv_apppu:10429: saptadvīpāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ vicareyam imām aham // HV_App.I,29F.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:10431: avadhyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ sthāvarā ye ca jaṅgamāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:10432: yasya yasya va veṣeṇa praviśeyam ahaṃ khalu /
GE07hv_apppu:10433: mṛtasya jīvato vāpi bhāvenotpāditasya vā // HV_App.I,29F.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:10434: sa bhūyas tādṛśaḥ syāṃ vai jarārogavivarjitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10435: tuṣyeyur munayo nityam anye ca mama sarvadā // HV_App.I,29F.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:10436: evam astv iti sa prokto brāhmaṇair nṛpate naṭaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10438: purāṇi dānavendrāṇām uttarāṃś ca kurūṃs tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:10439: bhadrāśvān ketumālāṃś ca kālāpadvīpam eva ca // HV_App.I,29F.68 //
GE07hv_apppu:10441: āyāti varadattaḥ sa lokavīra mahānaṭaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:10443: uvāca bhagavāñ śakraḥ sāntvayitvā sureśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,29F.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:10445: vimānavāhā devānāṃ sukṛtīnāṃ tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29F.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:10447: tat kartavyaṃ na mantraś ca bhettavyo vaḥ kathaṃcana // HV_App.I,29F.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:10448: akurvatāṃ devatājñām ugro daṇḍaḥ pated api /
GE07hv_apppu:10451: ito 'ntaḥpuravāpīṣu caradhvam ucitaṃ hi vaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.80 //
GE07hv_apppu:10453: nāmnā prabhāvatī nāma candrābheva prabhāvatī // HV_App.I,29F.82 //
GE07hv_apppu:10454: varadānena sā labdhā mātrā kila varānanā /
GE07hv_apppu:10455: haimavatyā mahādevyāḥ sakāśād iti naḥ śrutam // HV_App.I,29F.84 //
GE07hv_apppu:10456: svayaṃvarā ca sā kanyā bandhubhiḥ sthāpitā satī /
GE07hv_apppu:10457: ātmecchayā patiṃ haṃsā varayiṣyati śobhanā // HV_App.I,29F.86 //
GE07hv_apppu:10458: tad bhavadbhir guṇā vācyāḥ pradyumnasya mahātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10459: sadbhūtāḥ kularūpasya śīlasya vayasas tathā // HV_App.I,29F.88 //
GE07hv_apppu:10460: yadā sā raktabhāvā ca vajranābhasutā satī /
GE07hv_apppu:10461: tasyāḥ sakāśāt saṃdeśo nayitavyaḥ samādhinā // HV_App.I,29F.90 //
GE07hv_apppu:10462: pradyumnasya punas tasmād ānayadhvaṃ tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:10463: svabuddhyā prāptakālaṃ ca saṃvidheyaṃ hitaṃ mama /
GE07hv_apppu:10464: netravaktraprasādaś ca kartavyas tatra sarvathā // HV_App.I,29F.93 //
GE07hv_apppu:10465: tathā tathā guṇā vācyāḥ pradyumnasya mahātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10466: yathā yathā prabhāvatyā manas tatra bhavet sthiram // HV_App.I,29F.95 //
GE07hv_apppu:10468: dvāravatyāṃ ca kṛṣṇasya bhratur mama yavīyasaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.97 //
GE07hv_apppu:10469: tāvad yatnaś ca kartayaḥ pradyumno yāvad ātmavit /
GE07hv_apppu:10471: avadhyās te tu devānāṃ brahmaṇo varadarpitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10472: devaputrair hi hantavyāḥ pradyumnapramukhair yudhi // HV_App.I,29F.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:10473: naṭo dattavaras tasya veṣam āsthāya yādavāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10475: etac ca sarvaṃ kartavyam anyac ca svayam eva hi /
GE07hv_apppu:10477: praveśas tatra devānāṃ nāsti haṃsāḥ kathaṃcana /
GE07hv_apppu:10478: vajranābhepsite tatra praveśaḥ khalu sarvathā // HV_App.I,29F.107 //
GE07hv_apppu:10481: te vāsavavacaḥ śrutvā haṃsā vajrapuraṃ yayuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10482: pūrvocitaṃ hi gamanaṃ tatra teṣāṃ janādhipa // HV_App.I,29F.109 //
GE07hv_apppu:10483: te dīrghikāsu ramyāsu nipetur vīra pakṣiṇaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10486: pūrvam apy āgatās te tu vismayaṃ janayanti hi // HV_App.I,29F.113 //
GE07hv_apppu:10490: sa tān uvāca daiteyo dhartarāṣṭrān idaṃ vacaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.117 //
GE07hv_apppu:10493: āgantavyaṃ jālapādāḥ svam idaṃ bhavatāṃ gṛham /
GE07hv_apppu:10496: tathoty uktvā hi viviśur dānavendraniveśanam // HV_App.I,29F.123 //
GE07hv_apppu:10498: mānuṣālāpinas te tu kathāś cakruḥ pṛthagvidhāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.125 //
GE07hv_apppu:10500: striyo remur viśeṣeṇa śṛṇvantyaḥ saṃgatāḥ kathāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.127 //
GE07hv_apppu:10503: haṃsāḥ paricitāṃ cakrus tāṃ tataś cāruhāsinīm // HV_App.I,29F.130 //
GE07hv_apppu:10504: sakhīṃ śucimukhī cakre haṃsī rājasutāṃ tadā // HV_App.I,29F.131 //
GE07hv_apppu:10505: sā tāṃ kadācit papraccha vajranābhasutāṃ sakhīm /
GE07hv_apppu:10507: trailokyasundarīṃ vedmi tvām ahaṃ hi prabhāvati /
GE07hv_apppu:10508: rūpaśīlaguṇair devi kiṃcit tvāṃ vaktum utsahe // HV_App.I,29F.135 //
GE07hv_apppu:10510: yad atītaṃ punar naiti gataṃ srota ivāmbhasaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.137 //
GE07hv_apppu:10511: kāmopabhogatulyā hi ratir devi na vidyate /
GE07hv_apppu:10512: strīṇāṃ jagati kalyāṇi satyam etad bravīmi te // HV_App.I,29F.139 //
GE07hv_apppu:10514: na ca kiṃcid varayase devāsurakulodbhavam // HV_App.I,29F.141 //
GE07hv_apppu:10515: vrīḍitā yānti suśroṇi pratyākhyātās tvayā śubhe /
GE07hv_apppu:10516: rūpaśauryaguṇair yuktāḥ sadṛśās tvatkulasya hi // HV_App.I,29F.143 //
GE07hv_apppu:10518: ihaiṣyati kim arthaṃ tvāṃ pradyumno rukmiṇīsutaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.145 //
GE07hv_apppu:10519: trailokye yasya rūpeṇa sadṛśo 'tha kulena vā /
GE07hv_apppu:10520: gunair vā cārusarvāṅgi śauryeṇāpy atha vā śubhe // HV_App.I,29F.147 //
GE07hv_apppu:10521: deveṣu devaḥ suśroṇi dānaveṣu ca dānavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10522: mānuṣeṣv api dharmātmā mānuṣaḥ sa mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.149 //
GE07hv_apppu:10523: yaṃ sadā devi dṛṣṭvā hi sravanti jaghanāni hi /
GE07hv_apppu:10524: āpīnānīva dhenūnāṃ srotāṃsi saritām iva // HV_App.I,29F.151 //
GE07hv_apppu:10525: na pūrṇacandreṇa mukhaṃ nayane vā kuśeśayaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10526: utsahāmopamātuṃ hi mṛgendreṇātha vā gatim // HV_App.I,29F.153 //
GE07hv_apppu:10527: jagataḥ sāram uddhṛtya putraḥ sa vihitaḥ śubhe /
GE07hv_apppu:10528: kṛtvānaṅgaṃ vaśe sāṅgaṃ viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā // HV_App.I,29F.155 //
GE07hv_apppu:10529: hṛtena śambaro bālye yena pāpo nibarhitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10530: māyāś ca sarvāḥ saṃprāptā na ca śīlaṃ vināśitam // HV_App.I,29F.157 //
GE07hv_apppu:10531: yān yān guṇān pṛthuśroṇi manasā kalpayiṣyasi /
GE07hv_apppu:10532: eṣṭavyās triṣu lokeṣu pradyumne sarva eva te // HV_App.I,29F.159 //
GE07hv_apppu:10536: viṣṇur mānuṣalokasthaḥ śrutaḥ sa bahuśo mayā // HV_App.I,29F.163 //
GE07hv_apppu:10537: pituḥ kathayataḥ saumye nāradasya ca dhīmataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10538: śatruḥ sa kila daityānāṃ varjanīyaḥ kilānaghe // HV_App.I,29F.165 //
GE07hv_apppu:10539: kulāni kila daityānāṃ tena dagdhāni mānini /
GE07hv_apppu:10540: pradīptena rathāṅgena śārṅgeṇa gadayā tathā // HV_App.I,29F.167 //
GE07hv_apppu:10542: ity ete dānavendreṇa saṃdiśyante hi taṃ prati // HV_App.I,29F.169 //
GE07hv_apppu:10543: manoratho hi sarvāsāṃ strīṇām evaṃ śucismite /
GE07hv_apppu:10544: bhaved dhi me patikulaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ pitṛkulād iti // HV_App.I,29F.171 //
GE07hv_apppu:10546: mahān anugraho me syāt kulaṃ syāt pāvitaṃ ca me // HV_App.I,29F.173 //
GE07hv_apppu:10547: samarthanāṃ me pṛṣṭā tvaṃ prayaccha śucilāpini /
GE07hv_apppu:10548: pradyumnaḥ syād yathā bhartā mama vṛṣṇikulodbhavaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.175 //
GE07hv_apppu:10550: asurāṇāṃ striyo vṛddhāḥ kathayantyo mayā śrutāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.177 //
GE07hv_apppu:10551: pradyumnasya tathā janma purastād api me śrutam /
GE07hv_apppu:10552: yathā ca tena nihato balavān kālaśambaraḥ // HV_App.I,29F.179 //
GE07hv_apppu:10553: hṛdi me vartate nityaṃ pradyumnaḥ khalu sattame /
GE07hv_apppu:10554: hetuḥ sa nāsti tasyārthe yathā mama samāgamaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.181 //
GE07hv_apppu:10555: dāsī tavāhaṃ sakhyārhe dūtye tvāṃ ca visarjaye // HV_App.I,29F.182 //
GE07hv_apppu:10556: paṇḍitāsi vadopāyaṃ mama tasya ca saṃgame // HV_App.I,29F.183 //
GE07hv_apppu:10557: tatas tāṃ sāntvayitvā sā prahasantīdam abravīt /
GE07hv_apppu:10559: imāṃ bhaktiṃ tavodārāṃ pravakṣyāmi śucismite // HV_App.I,29F.186 //
GE07hv_apppu:10561: sākṣāt kāmena suśroṇi bhaviṣyasi sakāminī // HV_App.I,29F.188 //
GE07hv_apppu:10562: iti me bhāṣitaṃ satyaṃ smarethāḥ śucilocane /
GE07hv_apppu:10566: mama tvaṃ tatra me devi hitaṃ samyak prapatsyase /
GE07hv_apppu:10567: ity uktvā sā tathā cakre yat tat sā tām athābravīt // HV_App.I,29F.192 //
GE07hv_apppu:10568: dānavendraś ca tāṃ haṃsīṃ papracchāntaḥpure tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:10570: tattvaṃ śucimukhi brūhi kathāṃ yogyatayā vare /
GE07hv_apppu:10571: kiṃ tvayā dṛṣṭam āścaryaṃ jagaty uttamapakṣiṇi // HV_App.I,29F.196 //
GE07hv_apppu:10573: sovāca vajranābhaṃ tu haṃsī naravarottama // HV_App.I,29F.198 //
GE07hv_apppu:10575: dṛṣṭā me śāṇḍilī nāma sādhvī dānavasattama /
GE07hv_apppu:10576: āścaryaṃ karma kurvantī merupārśve manasvinī // HV_App.I,29F.201 //
GE07hv_apppu:10578: tathāvidūre śāṇḍilyāḥ śailaputryāḥ śubhā sakhī // HV_App.I,29F.203 //
GE07hv_apppu:10579: naṭaś caiva mayā dṛṣṭo munidattavaraḥ śubhaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10580: kāmarūpī ca bhojyaś ca trailokye nityasaṃmataḥ // HV_App.I,29F.205 //
GE07hv_apppu:10581: kurūn yātyuttarān vīra kālāmradvīpam eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:10582: bhadrāśvān ketumālāṃś ca dvīpān anyāṃs tathānagha // HV_App.I,29F.207 //
GE07hv_apppu:10584: sa vetti devān nṛtyena vismāpayati sarvadā // HV_App.I,29F.209 //
GE07hv_apppu:10586: śrutam etan mayā haṃsi nacirād iva vistaram /
GE07hv_apppu:10587: cāraṇānāṃ kathayatāṃ siddhānāṃ ca mahātmanām // HV_App.I,29F.211 //
GE07hv_apppu:10589: naṭe dattavare tasmin saṃstavas tu na vidyate // HV_App.I,29F.213 //
GE07hv_apppu:10592: guṇavantaṃ janaṃ śrutvā guṇahāryaḥ sa sarvathā // HV_App.I,29F.215 //
GE07hv_apppu:10594: naṭaṃ tadāgataṃ viddhi puraṃ tava mahāsura // HV_App.I,29F.217 //
GE07hv_apppu:10596: upāyaḥ sṛjyatāṃ haṃsi yeneha sa naṭaḥ śubhe /
GE07hv_apppu:10597: āgacchen mama bhadraṃ te viṣayaṃ pakṣinandini // HV_App.I,29F.219 //
GE07hv_apppu:10599: devendrāyātha kṛṣṇāya śaśaṃsuḥ sarvam eva tat // HV_App.I,29F.221 //
GE07hv_apppu:10601: prabhāvatyāś ca saṃsarge vajranābhavadhe tathā // HV_App.I,29F.223 //
GE07hv_apppu:10602: daivīṃ māyāṃ samāśritya saṃvidhāya harir naṭam /
GE07hv_apppu:10603: naṭaveṣeṇa bhaimānāṃ preṣayām āsa bharata // HV_App.I,29F.225 //
GE07hv_apppu:10604: pradyumnaṃ nāyakaṃ kṛtvā sāmbaṃ kṛtvā vidūṣakam /
GE07hv_apppu:10605: pāripārśvaṃ gadaṃ vīram anyān bhaimāṃs tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29F.227 //
GE07hv_apppu:10607: pārśve gadāṃ vīramatyāṃ bhaimānāṃ ca tathaiva hi /
GE07hv_apppu:10608: vāramukhyā naṭīḥ kṛtvā tat tūryasadṛśaṃ tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:10609: tathaiva bhadraṃbhadrasya sahāyāṃś ca tathāvidhān // HV_App.I,29F.229 //
GE07hv_apppu:10611: jagmur āruhya kāryārthaṃ devānām amitaijasām // HV_App.I,29F.231 //
GE07hv_apppu:10612: ekaikasya samā rūpe puruṣāḥ puruṣasya te /
GE07hv_apppu:10613: strīṇāṃ ca sadṛśāḥ sarve svararūpair narādhipa // HV_App.I,29F.233 //
GE07hv_apppu:10615: jagmur dānavasaṃkīrṇaṃ supuraṃ nāma nāmataḥ // HV_App.I,29F.235 //
GE07hv_apppu:10620: dadāv ājñāṃ vajranābho dīyatāṃ gṛham uttamam /
GE07hv_apppu:10623: bhartur ājñāṃ samālabhya tathā cakruś ca sarvaśaḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:10624: pūrvaśruto naṭaḥ prāptaḥ kautūhalam ajījanat // HV_App.I,29F.237 //
GE07hv_apppu:10625: naṭasyātha dadur daityāḥ satkāraṃ parayā mudā /
GE07hv_apppu:10626: pratyayārthaṃ daduś cāpi ratnāni subahūny atha // HV_App.I,29F.239 //
GE07hv_apppu:10627: tataḥ sa nanṛte tatra varadatto naṭas tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:10628: supure puravāsīnāṃ paraṃ harṣaṃ samādadhat // HV_App.I,29F.241 //
GE07hv_apppu:10634: ṛśyaśṛṅgaś ca śāntā ca tathārūpair naṭaiḥ kṛtaiḥ // HV_App.I,29F.247 //
GE07hv_apppu:10636: ācacakṣuś ca teṣāṃ vai rūpatulyatvam acyuta // HV_App.I,29F.249 //
GE07hv_apppu:10638: dṛṣṭvā sarve praveśaṃ ca dānavā vismayaṃ gatāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.251 //
GE07hv_apppu:10639: te raktā vismayaṃ nedur asurāḥ parayā mudā /
GE07hv_apppu:10640: utthāyotthāya nāṭyasya viśeṣeṣu punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.253 //
GE07hv_apppu:10641: dadur vastrāṇi tuṣṭāś ca graiveyavalayāni ca /
GE07hv_apppu:10643: pṛthagartheṣu datteṣu ślokais te tuṣṭuvur naṭāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10644: asurāṃś ca munīṃś caiva gotrair abhijanair api // HV_App.I,29F.257 //
GE07hv_apppu:10647: purā śrutārtho daityeśaḥ preṣayām āsa bharata /
GE07hv_apppu:10648: ānīyatāṃ vajrapuraṃ naṭo 'sāv iti harṣitaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.261 //
GE07hv_apppu:10650: nītā vajrapuraṃ ramyaṃ naṭaveṣeṇa yādavāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.263 //
GE07hv_apppu:10651: āvāsaś ca tato dattaḥ sukṛto viśvakarmaṇā /
GE07hv_apppu:10652: eṣṭavyaṃ yac ca tat sarvaṃ dattaṃ śataguṇottaram // HV_App.I,29F.265 //
GE07hv_apppu:10654: kārayām āsa ramyaṃ ca raṅgavāṭaṃ prahṛṣṭavat // HV_App.I,29F.267 //
GE07hv_apppu:10656: dattvā ratnāni bhūrīṇi vajranābho mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,29F.269 //
GE07hv_apppu:10657: upaviṣṭaś ca tān draṣṭuṃ saha jñātibhir ātmavān /
GE07hv_apppu:10658: chatre cāntaḥpuraṃ sthāpya cakṣur dṛśye janādhipa // HV_App.I,29F.271 //
GE07hv_apppu:10663: tatas tu devagāndhāraṃ chālikyaṃ śravaṇām ṛtam /
GE07hv_apppu:10666: viddham āsāritaṃ ramyaṃ jagire svarasaṃpadā // HV_App.I,29F.279 //
GE07hv_apppu:10668: asurāṃs toṣayām āsur utthāyothāya bhārata // HV_App.I,29F.281 //
GE07hv_apppu:10669: nāndīṃ ca vādayām āsa pradyumno gada eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:10670: sāmbaś ca vīryasaṃpannaḥ kāryārthaṃ naṭatāṃ gataḥ // HV_App.I,29F.283 //
GE07hv_apppu:10675: nalakūbaras tu pradyumnaḥ sāmbas tasya vidūṣakaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10676: kailāso rūpitaś cāpi māyayā yadunandanaiḥ // HV_App.I,29F.289 //
GE07hv_apppu:10677: śāpaś ca dattaḥ kruddhena rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10678: nalakūbareṇātha yathā rambho cāpy atha sāntvitā /
GE07hv_apppu:10680: evaṃ rāmasya caritaṃ ṣaṭkāṇḍam atha sottaram /
GE07hv_apppu:10681: dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ rājñāṃ ca vijayāvaham //
GE07hv_apppu:10685: nāradasya muneḥ kīrtiṃ sarvajñasya mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.293 //
GE07hv_apppu:10687: tuṣṭuvur dānavā vīrā bhaimān amitatejasaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.295 //
GE07hv_apppu:10688: te dadur vastramukhyāni ratnāny ābharaṇāni ca /
GE07hv_apppu:10692: candanāni ca divyāni śītāni rasavanti ca /
GE07hv_apppu:10694: cintāmaṇīn udārāṃś ca cintite sarvakāmadān // HV_App.I,29F.302 //
GE07hv_apppu:10695: prekṣāsu tāsu bahvīṣu dadanto dānavās tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:10697: striyo dānavamukhyānāṃ tathaiva ca janeśvara // HV_App.I,29F.305 //
GE07hv_apppu:10698: tato haṃsī prabhāvatyāḥ sakhī prāha prabhāvatīm /
GE07hv_apppu:10699: gatāsmi dvārakāṃ ramyāṃ bhaimaguptām anindite // HV_App.I,29F.307 //
GE07hv_apppu:10700: pradyumnaś ca mayā dṛṣṭo vivikte cārulocane /
GE07hv_apppu:10701: bhaktiś ca kathitā tasya mayā tava śucismite // HV_App.I,29F.309 //
GE07hv_apppu:10702: tena hṛṣṭena kālaś ca kṛtaḥ kamalalocane /
GE07hv_apppu:10703: adya pradoṣasamaye tvayā saha samāgamaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.311 //
GE07hv_apppu:10705: na hy ātmavanto bhāṣanti mithyā bhaimakulodbhavāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.313 //
GE07hv_apppu:10706: tataḥ prabhāvatī hṛṣṭā haṃsīṃ tām idam abravīt /
GE07hv_apppu:10707: uṣitāsi mamāvāse svaptum arhasi sundari // HV_App.I,29F.315 //
GE07hv_apppu:10709: niḥsādhvasā bhaviṣyāmi tvayā saha vihaṃgame // HV_App.I,29F.317 //
GE07hv_apppu:10711: āruroha ca tad dharmyaṃ prabhāvatyā vihaṃgamā // HV_App.I,29F.319 //
GE07hv_apppu:10714: tasmin kṛte saṃvidhāne kāmam ānayituṃ yayau /
GE07hv_apppu:10715: prabhāvatīm anujñāpya haṃsī vāyusamā gatau // HV_App.I,29F.323 //
GE07hv_apppu:10716: [k: Ds1 Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:10718: adya bhūtaḥ sa bhagavan samayo vartate niśi /
GE07hv_apppu:10719: tatheti prāha tāṃ kāmaḥ sā nivṛttātha pakṣiṇī //
GE07hv_apppu:10722: pradyumno nīyamānaṃ tu dadṛśe mālyam ātmavān /
GE07hv_apppu:10723: bhramarair āvṛtaṃ vīraḥ sugandham arimardana // HV_App.I,29F.327 //
GE07hv_apppu:10724: nililye tatra mālye tu bhūtvā madhukaras tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:10726: praveśitaṃ ca tan mālyaṃ strībhir madhukarāyutam /
GE07hv_apppu:10727: [k: K1.3.4V BDn Ds D1.3.6 T1-3 G1-5 M3 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:10730: bhramarās te yayuḥ saumya saṃdhyākāle hy upasthite // HV_App.I,29F.332 //
GE07hv_apppu:10731: sa bhaimapravaro vīras taiḥ sahāyair vihinataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10732: karṇotpale prabhāvatyā nililye śanakair iva // HV_App.I,29F.334 //
GE07hv_apppu:10733: tataḥ prabhāvatī haṃsīm uvāca vadatāṃ varā /
GE07hv_apppu:10735: sakhi dahyanti me 'ṅgāni mukhaṃ ca pariśuṣyati /
GE07hv_apppu:10736: autsukyaṃ hṛdi cātīva ko 'yaṃ vyādhir anauṣadhaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.338 //
GE07hv_apppu:10739: na dṛṣṭapūrvo hi mayā śrutimātreṇa kāṅkṣitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10740: aho dhūmayate 'ṅgāni strīsvabhāvasya dhik khalu // HV_App.I,29F.342 //
GE07hv_apppu:10741: kalpayāmi yathā buddhyā yadi nābhyeti me priyaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10745: dahanti mama gātrāṇi kiṃ nu candragabhastayaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.347 //
GE07hv_apppu:10747: dāvāgnisadṛśo me 'dya daṃdahīti śubhāṃ tanum // HV_App.I,29F.349 //
GE07hv_apppu:10748: tataḥ saṃkalpaye eva sthairyaṃ kāryam ivātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10750: vimanaskāsmi muhyāmi vepathur me mahān hṛdi /
GE07hv_apppu:10751: baṃbhramīti ca me dṛṣṭir hā hā yāmi dhruvaṃ kṣayam // HV_App.I,29F.353 //
GE07hv_apppu:10754: āviṣṭeyaṃ mayā bālā sarvathety avagamya tu /
GE07hv_apppu:10755: kārṣṇir hṛṣṭena manasā saṃsīm idam uvāca ha // HV_App.I,29F.355 //
GE07hv_apppu:10757: ṣaṭpadaiḥ saha ṣaṭpādo bhūtvā mālye nilīya tu // HV_App.I,29F.357 //
GE07hv_apppu:10759: ity uktvā darśayām āsa surūpo rūpam ātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.359 //
GE07hv_apppu:10760: tad dharmyapṛṣṭhaṃ prabhayā dyotitaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10761: abhibhūtā prabhā caiva rājaṃś candrodbhavā śubhā // HV_App.I,29F.361 //
GE07hv_apppu:10762: prabhāvatyās tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā vavṛve kāmasāgaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10763: candrasyevodaye prāpte parvaṇyāṃ saritāṃ patiḥ // HV_App.I,29F.363 //
GE07hv_apppu:10769: adhomukhaṃ mukhaṃ kṛtvā na māṃ kiṃcit prabhāṣase // HV_App.I,29F.369 //
GE07hv_apppu:10771: sādhvasaṃ tyajyatāṃ bhīru dāsaḥ sādhv anugṛhyatām // HV_App.I,29F.371 //
GE07hv_apppu:10772: na kālam iva paśyāmi bhīru bhīrutvam utsṛja /
GE07hv_apppu:10773: yācāmy eṣo 'ñjalaṃ kṛtvā prāptakālaṃ nibodha me // HV_App.I,29F.373 //
GE07hv_apppu:10777: juhāva samaye vīraḥ puṣpair mantrān udīrayan // HV_App.I,29F.377 //
GE07hv_apppu:10779: cakre pradakṣiṇaṃ caiva taṃ maṇisthaṃ hutāśanam // HV_App.I,29F.379 //
GE07hv_apppu:10781: bhagavāñ jagataḥ sākṣī śubhasyāthāśubhasya ca // HV_App.I,29F.381 //
GE07hv_apppu:10783: uvāca haṃsīṃ dvārasthāṃ tiṣṭhāvāṃ rakṣa pakṣiṇi // HV_App.I,29F.383 //
GE07hv_apppu:10784: tasyāṃ praṇamya yātāyāṃ kāmas tāṃ cārulocanām /
GE07hv_apppu:10785: grahāya dakṣiṇe haste nināya śayanottamam // HV_App.I,29F.385 //
GE07hv_apppu:10787: cucumba śanakair gaṇḍe vāsayan mukhamārutaiḥ // HV_App.I,29F.387 //
GE07hv_apppu:10788: tato 'syā āpapau vaktraṃ padmaṃ madhukaro yathā /
GE07hv_apppu:10789: āliliṅge ca suśroṇīṃ krameṇa ratikovidaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.389 //
GE07hv_apppu:10790: arāmayad rahasy enāṃ na codvejigavāṃs tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:10792: uvāsa sa tayā sārdhaṃ raman kṛṣṇasutaḥ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,29F.392 //
GE07hv_apppu:10795: tām eva manasā kāntāṃ kāntarupaḥ samudvahan // HV_App.I,29F.395 //
GE07hv_apppu:10800: kaśyapasya muneḥ satraṃ yāvat tāvan narādhipa // HV_App.I,29F.400 //
GE07hv_apppu:10804: tāvad divāyāṃ daityendraḥ nāṭayaṃś ca naṭān nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:10805: divāsu nanṛtus te vai rātrāv eva kadācana // **HV_App.I,29F.402**7:2
GE07hv_apppu:10808: ahar niśaṃ ca vṛttāntaṃ prayacchanti manojavāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.405 //
GE07hv_apppu:10812: tair hi vajrapuraṃ haṃsair vasadbhir vāsavājñayā /
GE07hv_apppu:10813: vyāptaṃ nṛpa naṭāṃs tāṃś ca na viduḥ kālamohitāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.410 //
GE07hv_apppu:10817: dehārdhena tu kauravya siṣeva sa prabhāvatīm // HV_App.I,29F.414 //
GE07hv_apppu:10818: saṃnatiṃ vinayaṃ śīlaṃ līlāṃ dākṣyaṃ vilāsitām /
GE07hv_apppu:10819: spṛhayanty asurā dṛṣṭvā vidvattāṃ ca mahātmanām // HV_App.I,29F.416 //
GE07hv_apppu:10820: rūpaṃ vilāsaṃ gandhaṃ ca mṛjāṃ bhāṣām athāryatām /
GE07hv_apppu:10822: vajranābhasya tu bhrātā sunābho nāma viśrutaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10823: duhitṛdvayaṃ ca nṛpates tasya rūpaguṇānvitam // HV_App.I,29F.420 //
GE07hv_apppu:10824: ekā candravatī nāmnā guṇavaty atha cāparā /
GE07hv_apppu:10825: prabhāvatyālayaṃ te tu vrajataḥ khalu nityadā // HV_App.I,29F.422 //
GE07hv_apppu:10826: dadṛśāte tu te tatra ratisaktāṃ prabhāvatīm /
GE07hv_apppu:10828: sovāca mama vidyāsti yādhītā kāṅkṣitaṃ patim /
GE07hv_apppu:10829: ratyartham ānayaty āśu saubhagyaṃ ca prayacchati /
GE07hv_apppu:10830: devaṃ vā dānavaṃ vāpi vivaśaṃ sadya eva hi // HV_App.I,29F.427 //
GE07hv_apppu:10833: te dṛṣṭvā vismayaṃ yāte rūpayauvanasaṃpadam // HV_App.I,29F.430 //
GE07hv_apppu:10834: punar evābravīt te tu bhaginyau cāruhāsinī /
GE07hv_apppu:10835: prabhāvatī varārohā kālaprāptam idaṃ vacaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.432 //
GE07hv_apppu:10837: devās tapasi raktā hi sukharaktā mahāsurāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.434 //
GE07hv_apppu:10838: devāḥ satyaratā nityam anṛte tu mahāsurāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10839: dharmastapaś ca satyaṃ ca yatra tatra jayo dhruvam // HV_App.I,29F.436 //
GE07hv_apppu:10842: tāṃ tathety ūcatur hṛṣṭe bhaginyau cārulocanām /
GE07hv_apppu:10843: paripapraccha bhaimaṃ ca kāryaṃ tat prati māninī // HV_App.I,29F.440 //
GE07hv_apppu:10844: sa pitṛvyaṃ gadaṃ vīraṃ sāmbaṃ cāpy abravīt tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:10845: rūpānvitau suśīlau ca śūrau ca raṇakarmaṇi // HV_App.I,29F.442 //
GE07hv_apppu:10847: parituṣṭena dattā me vidyā durvāsasā purā /
GE07hv_apppu:10848: parituṣṭena saubhāgyaṃ sadā kanyātvam eva ca // HV_App.I,29F.444 //
GE07hv_apppu:10849: devadānavayakṣāṇāṃ yaṃ dhyāsyasi sa te patiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10850: bhaviteti mayā caiva vīro 'yam abhikāṅkṣitaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.446 //
GE07hv_apppu:10852: pradyumnaṃ tv aham eṣyāmi yuvāṃ tāv apy avāpsyatha /
GE07hv_apppu:10853: gṛhṇītaṃ tad imāṃ vidyāṃ sadyo vāṃ priyasaṃgamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10854: tato jagṛhatur hṛṣṭe tāṃ vidyāṃ bhaginīmukhāt // HV_App.I,29F.448 //
GE07hv_apppu:10855: dadhyatur gadasāmbau ca vidyām abhyasya te śubhe /
GE07hv_apppu:10856: tau pradyumnena sahitau praviṣṭau bhaimanandanau // HV_App.I,29F.450 //
GE07hv_apppu:10857: pracchannau māyayā vīrau kārṣṇinā māyinā nṛpa // HV_App.I,29F.451 //
GE07hv_apppu:10865: ity uktas tu prabhāvatyā pradyumno hṛṣṭamānasaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:10868: pāṇiṃ jagṛhatur vīrau mantrapūrvaṃ satāṃ priyau /
GE07hv_apppu:10869: candravatyā gadaḥ sāmbo guṇavatyā tu kaiśaviḥ // HV_App.I,29F.454 //
GE07hv_apppu:10871: mārgamāṇās tv anujñāṃ te śakrakeśavayos tadā // HV_App.I,29F.456 //
GE07hv_apppu:10884: muñcanti dhārāś ca ghanā nadantas @ HV_App.I,29F.467 @
GE07hv_apppu:10916: na mārutaḥ syād yadi cārugātri @ HV_App.I,29F.499 @
GE07hv_apppu:10917: na meghakālo mama vallabhaḥ syāt || HV_App.I,29F.500 ||
GE07hv_apppu:10921: tataḥ paraṃ kiṃ sukham asti loke || HV_App.I,29F.504 ||
GE07hv_apppu:10926: na bhānti nadyo 'dya sarāṃsi caiva @ HV_App.I,29F.509 @
GE07hv_apppu:10957: gajān gajaiḥ svair iva vīryadṛptān || HV_App.I,29F.540 ||
GE07hv_apppu:10972: na dṛśyate yat tava vaktratulyo @ HV_App.I,29F.555 @
GE07hv_apppu:10976: tadā nu paśyanti janāḥ prahṛṣṭā @ HV_App.I,29F.559 @
GE07hv_apppu:10989: vināpi candreṇa pure pitus te @ HV_App.I,29F.569 @
GE07hv_apppu:10996: yaṃ sāmagāḥ parvaṇi cāpy udāram || HV_App.I,29F.576 ||
GE07hv_apppu:11005: nṛpaḥ kuśāgraiḥ punar eva yaś ca @ HV_App.I,29F.585 @
GE07hv_apppu:11007: āyuś ca vaṃśe nahuṣaś ca yasya @ HV_App.I,29F.587 @
GE07hv_apppu:11012: yaḥ subhru dakṣasya vṛtaḥ sutābhiḥ || HV_App.I,29F.592 ||
GE07hv_apppu:11013: babhūva rājā ca vasuś ca yasya @ HV_App.I,29F.593 @
GE07hv_apppu:11021: na kutsito yasya nṛpo 'sti vaṃśe @ HV_App.I,29F.601 @
GE07hv_apppu:11038: jagmur devāsurāḥ svāni sthānāny amitavikramāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.614 //
GE07hv_apppu:11041: vajranābha nibodhasva śrotavyaṃ yadi cen mama /
GE07hv_apppu:11042: vasa vajrapure putra svajanena samāvṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.618 //
GE07hv_apppu:11044: brahmaṇyaś ca kṛtajñaś ca jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhatamo gunaiḥ // HV_App.I,29F.620
GE07hv_apppu:11045: rājā kṛtsnasya jagataḥ pātrabhūtaḥ satāṃ gatiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11046: saṃprāpto lokarājyaṃ sa sarvabhūtahite rataḥ // HV_App.I,29F.622 //
GE07hv_apppu:11047: naiva śakyas tvayā jetuṃ vajranābha vihanyase /
GE07hv_apppu:11048: ahiṃ padā vyutkraman vai na cirād vinaśiṣyasi // HV_App.I,29F.624 //
GE07hv_apppu:11049: vajranābhas tu tad vākyaṃ nābhinandati bharata /
GE07hv_apppu:11054: pratasthe svargam evāgre vijigīṣur viśāṃ pate // HV_App.I,29F.630 //
GE07hv_apppu:11055: etasminn antare devau kṛṣṇendrau ca mahābalau /
GE07hv_apppu:11056: preṣayām āsatur haṃsān vajranābhavadhaṃ prati // HV_App.I,29F.632 //
GE07hv_apppu:11058: tayos tad vacanaṃ śrutvā haṃsā vajrapuraṃ yayuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11059: ūcuś ca vacanaṃ teṣāṃ śakrakeśavayos tadā // **HV_App.I,29F.632**12:2
GE07hv_apppu:11060: samāgatās tu tac chrutvā yadumukhyā mahābalāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11063: tayor duhitaro bhāryā bhaktyā tāḥ sarvabhāvanāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.636 //
GE07hv_apppu:11064: sarvāḥ sagarbhās tāś caiva kiṃ tu kāryam anantaram /
GE07hv_apppu:11065: prāptaḥ prasavakālaś ca tāsāṃ nāticirād iva // HV_App.I,29F.638 //
GE07hv_apppu:11067: ākhyeyam arthavat kṛtsnaṃ śakrakeśavayos tadā // HV_App.I,29F.640 //
GE07hv_apppu:11068: haṃsair gatvā tadākhyātaṃ devayos tad yathātatham // HV_App.I,29F.641 //
GE07hv_apppu:11069: tābhyāṃ haṃsās tu saṃdiṣṭā na bhetavyam iti prabho // HV_App.I,29F.642 //
GE07hv_apppu:11070: utpatsyanti gunaiḥ ślāghyāḥ putrā vaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11071: garbhasthāḥ sarvavedāṃś ca sāṅgān vetsyanty aninditāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.644
GE07hv_apppu:11072: tathā cānāgataṃ sarvam astrāṇi vividhāni ca /
GE07hv_apppu:11073: sadya eṣa yuvānaś ca bhaviṣyanti supaṇḍ itāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.646 //
GE07hv_apppu:11074: evam uktvā gatā haṃsāḥ punar vajrapuraṃ vibho /
GE07hv_apppu:11076: prabhāvatī tadā putraṃ suṣuve sadṛśaṃ pituḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11079: candraprabham iti khyātaṃ tanayaṃ sadṛśaṃ pituḥ // HV_App.I,29F.652 //
GE07hv_apppu:11080: sadyaś ca yauvanaprāptaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ ca bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:11081: guṇavaty- api putraṃ ca guṇavantam aninditā // HV_App.I,29F.654 //
GE07hv_apppu:11091: āvārayām āsa diśaḥ sarvāḥ kurukulodvaha // HV_App.I,29F.664 //
GE07hv_apppu:11092: gṛhyantām āśu vadhyantām iti vācas tatas tataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11094: tac chrutvā vyathitās teṣāṃ mātaraḥ putravatsalāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11095: rurudus tā rudantyo 'tha pradyumnaḥ sahasābravīt // HV_App.I,29F.668 //
GE07hv_apppu:11096: mā bhaiṣṭa jīvamāneṣu sthiteṣv asmāsu sarvathā /
GE07hv_apppu:11097: kiṃ no daityāḥ kariṣyanti sarvathā bhadram astu vaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.670 //
GE07hv_apppu:11099: pitā tava gadāpāṇiḥ pitṛvyaś ca sthitas tava // HV_App.I,29F.672 //
GE07hv_apppu:11100: bhrātaraś caiva te devi jñātayaś ca tathāpare /
GE07hv_apppu:11101: ete pūjyāś ca mānyāś ca tavārthe khalu sarvathā // HV_App.I,29F.674 //
GE07hv_apppu:11102: bhaginyau pṛccha bhadraṃ te kāle 'yaṃ khalu dāruṇaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11103: maraṇaṃ sahamānānāṃ yudhyatāṃ vijayo dhruvam // HV_App.I,29F.676 //
GE07hv_apppu:11105: kim atra kāryam asmābhiḥ sarvaiś cakrāntarasthitaiḥ // HV_App.I,29F.678 //
GE07hv_apppu:11106: prabhāvatī rudantī tu pradyumnam idam abravīt /
GE07hv_apppu:11107: śirasy añjalim ādhāya jānubhyāṃ patitā kṣitau // HV_App.I,29F.680 //
GE07hv_apppu:11109: jīvanputrāṃś ca dārāṃś ca draṣṭāsi yadunandana // HV_App.I,29F.682 //
GE07hv_apppu:11110: āryāṃ nṛvara vaidarbhīm aniruddhaṃ ca mānada /
GE07hv_apppu:11112: durvāsasā varo datto muninā mama dhīmatā /
GE07hv_apppu:11114: eṣa me hṛdayāśvāso bhavitā na tad anyathā /
GE07hv_apppu:11116: ity uktvā sāsim ādāya sūpaspṛṣṭvā manasvinī /
GE07hv_apppu:11117: pradadau raukmiṇeyāya jayasveti varaṃ varā // HV_App.I,29F.690 //
GE07hv_apppu:11119: praṇamya śirasā dattaṃ priyayā bhaktiyuktayā // HV_App.I,29F.692 //
GE07hv_apppu:11120: candravaty- api nistriṃśaṃ gadāya pradadau mudā /
GE07hv_apppu:11121: tathā guṇavatī caiva sāmbāyāsiṃ mahātmane // HV_App.I,29F.694 //
GE07hv_apppu:11123: ihaiva sāmbasahitau yudhyasva saha dānavaiḥ // HV_App.I,29F.696 //
GE07hv_apppu:11124: ākāśe dikṣu sarvāsu yotsyāmy aham āriṃdama /
GE07hv_apppu:11125: ity uktvātha rathaṃ cakre māyayā māyināṃ varaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.698 //
GE07hv_apppu:11128: sa tena rathamukhyena harṣayan vai prabhāvatīm /
GE07hv_apppu:11131: bhedanair gādhanaiś caiva tatarda ditisaṃbhavān // HV_App.I,29F.704 //
GE07hv_apppu:11132: asurāś ca raṇe mattāḥ kārṣṇiṃ śatrair itas tataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11133: jaghnuḥ kamalapatrākṣaṃ paraṃ niścayam āsthitāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.706 //
GE07hv_apppu:11135: sukuṇḍalāni cānyeṣāṃ śirāṃsy api sa cicchide // HV_App.I,29F.708 //
GE07hv_apppu:11136: kṣuracchinnaiḥ śirobhis taiḥ kāyaiś ca śakalair api // HV_App.I,29F.709 //
GE07hv_apppu:11139: dadarśa mudito yuddhaṃ bhaimānāṃ ditijaiḥ saha // HV_App.I,29F.712 //
GE07hv_apppu:11140: ye gadaṃ caiva sāmbaṃ ca daityāḥ samabhidudruvuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11141: te yayur nidhanaṃ sarve yādāṃsīva mahodadhau // HV_App.I,29F.714 //
GE07hv_apppu:11142: viṣamaṃ tu tadā yuddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā devapatir hariḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11143: gadāya preṣayām āsa svarathaṃ harivāhanaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.716 //
GE07hv_apppu:11145: sāmbāyairāvaṇaṃ nāgaṃ preṣayām āsa ceśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,29F.718 //
GE07hv_apppu:11147: airāvaṇam adhiṣṭhātuṃ pravaraṃ sa niyuktavān // HV_App.I,29F.720 //
GE07hv_apppu:11152: taṃ mātalisutaṃ caiva gajam airāvaṇaṃ tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:11153: devaḥ preṣitavāñ śakro vidhijño varakarmasu // HV_App.I,29F.724 //
GE07hv_apppu:11154: kṣīṇam asya tapo vadhyo yadunām eṣa durmatiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11155: praviśanti tu bhūtāni sarvatra tu yathepsitam // HV_App.I,29F.726 //
GE07hv_apppu:11156: pradyumnaś ca jayantaś ca prāptau harmyaṃ mahābalau /
GE07hv_apppu:11158: parighair vikramantau ca yudhyantau ca raṇājire // HV_App.I,29F.729 //
GE07hv_apppu:11160: upendrānuja śakreṇa ratho 'yaṃ preṣitas tava // HV_App.I,29F.731 //
GE07hv_apppu:11164: śva eṣyati hṛṣīkeśas tasmin vṛtte 'cyutānuja // HV_App.I,29F.735 //
GE07hv_apppu:11167: kariṣyāmi vidhānaṃ tu naiṣa śakraṃ sutānvitam /
GE07hv_apppu:11168: vijeṣyaty apramādas tu kartavya iti me matiḥ // HV_App.I,29F.739 //
GE07hv_apppu:11171: evaṃ saṃdiśya bhaimaḥ sa gadasāmbau mahābalau /
GE07hv_apppu:11173: tamaś ca nāśayām āsa daityasṛṣṭaṃ durāsadam /
GE07hv_apppu:11174: jahṛṣe devarājaś ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā ripumardanam // HV_App.I,29F.745 //
GE07hv_apppu:11176: antarātmani vartantaṃ kṣetrajñam iti taṃ viduḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11180: asurāṇāṃ tribhāgaś ca nihato nātitejasā // HV_App.I,29F.749 //
GE07hv_apppu:11181: yāvad dhi yodhayām āsa kārṣṇir daityān raṇājire /
GE07hv_apppu:11183: ayodhayaj jayantaś ca yāvad daityān mahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11184: tāvad ākāśagaṅgāyāṃ bhaimaḥ saṃdhyām upāsta vān // HV_App.I,29F.753 //
GE07hv_apppu:11190: tasthau viyati śakrasya samīpe kurunandana // HV_App.I,29F.757 //
GE07hv_apppu:11194: vajranābhaṃ jahīty uktaḥ keśavena tvareti ca // HV_App.I,29F.761 //
GE07hv_apppu:11195: tārkṣyam āruhya gaccheti punar eva pracoditaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11196: cakāra sa tathā vīraḥ praṇipatya surottamau // HV_App.I,29F.763 //
GE07hv_apppu:11197: sa manoraṃhasā vīras tārkṣyeṇāśu yayau nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:11200: vajranābhaṃ sthiro bhūtvā sarvāstravid aninditaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.767 //
GE07hv_apppu:11202: urasy abhihato vīro vajranābho mahātmanā // HV_App.I,29F.769 //
GE07hv_apppu:11203: sa tenābhihato vīro daityo mohavaśaṃ gataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11204: cakṣāra ca bhṛśaṃ raktaṃ babhrāma ca gatāsuvat // HV_App.I,29F.771 //
GE07hv_apppu:11205: āśvasety atha taṃ kārṣṇir uvāca raṇadurjayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11206: labdhasaṃjñaḥ sa vīras tu pradyumnam idam abravīt // HV_App.I,29F.773 //
GE07hv_apppu:11207: sādhu yādava vīryeṇa ślāghyo mama ripur bhavān /
GE07hv_apppu:11210: gadāṃ mumoca vegena saghaṇṭāṃ bahukaṇṭakām // HV_App.I,29F.777 //
GE07hv_apppu:11212: udvaman rudhiraṃ bhūri mumoha yadupuṃgavaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.779 //
GE07hv_apppu:11213: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ pāñcajanyaṃ jalodbhavam /
GE07hv_apppu:11217: tasya cakraṃ kare jātaṃ kṛṣṇacchandena bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:11230: avatīrṇau mahātmānau harī vajrapuraṃ tadā // HV_App.I,29F.797 //
GE07hv_apppu:11235: sāntvayām āsatuś caiva bālavṛddhaṃ bhayārditam // HV_App.I,29F.799 //
GE07hv_apppu:11237: āyatyāṃ ca tadātve ca bṛhaspatimatānugau // HV_App.I,29F.801 //
GE07hv_apppu:11238: vajranābhasya tad rājyaṃ caturdhā cakratur nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:11248: koṭyaś catasro grāmāṇām adhikās tā viśāṃ pate /
GE07hv_apppu:11250: caturdhā cakratus tatra saṃhṛṣṭau śakrakeśavau // HV_App.I,29F.808 //
GE07hv_apppu:11252: caturdhā cakratur vīrau vīra vāsavakeśavau // HV_App.I,29F.810 //
GE07hv_apppu:11255: svayaṃ śakreṇa devena keśavena ca dhīmatā /
GE07hv_apppu:11260: tvayaite vīra saṃrakṣyā rājānaḥ samitiṃjaya // HV_App.I,29F.818 //
GE07hv_apppu:11264: triviṣṭapaṃ dvārakāṃ ca ramyāṃ bhaimābhirakṣitām // HV_App.I,29F.822 //
GE07hv_apppu:11266: icchayaiṣāṃ prayacchasva rathāṃs tvaṣṭṛkṛtān api // HV_App.I,29F.824 //
GE07hv_apppu:11268: prayacchākāśagau vīra sāmbasya ca gadasya ca // HV_App.I,29F.826 //
GE07hv_apppu:11270: āyāntu ca sutaṃ draṣṭuṃ yatheṣṭaṃ bhimanandanau // HV_App.I,29F.828 //
GE07hv_apppu:11272: jagāma bhagavān svargaṃ dvārakām api keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.830 //
GE07hv_apppu:11273: ṣaṇmāsān uṣitas tatra gadaḥ pradyumna eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:11274: sāmbaś ca dvārakāṃ yātā yānārūḍhā mahābalāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.832 //
GE07hv_apppu:11275: adyāpi tāni rājyāni meroḥ pārśve nṛpottare /
GE07hv_apppu:11276: sthāsyanti ca jagad yāvat tāvat te 'marasaṃnibhāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.834 //
GE07hv_apppu:11277: nivṛtte mausale yuddhe svargaṃ yāteṣu vṛṣṇiṣu /
GE07hv_apppu:11278: gadapradyumnasāmbās te gatā vajrapuraṃ vibho // HV_App.I,29F.836 //
GE07hv_apppu:11279: tataḥ proṣya punar yānti svargaṃ svaiḥ karmabhiḥ śubhaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11280: prasādena ca kṛṣṇasya lokakartur janeśvara // HV_App.I,29F.838 //
GE07hv_apppu:11281: pradyumnottaram etat te nṛdeva kathitaṃ mayā /
GE07hv_apppu:11282: dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ śatrunāśanam eva ca // HV_App.I,29F.840 //
GE07hv_apppu:11284: yaśo vipulam āpnoti dvaipāyanavaco yathā // HV_App.I,29F.842 //
GE07hv_apppu:11286: [h: HV (CE) App. I No. 30, transliterated by André Couture, proof--read by
GE07hv_apppu:11288: [k: After 99.26, all Mss. (except Ś1 Ñ1 M1-3) G(ed.) ins. App. I, No. 30
GE07hv_apppu:11290: sarvamāyāsv abhijño 'sau nāma viśrāvya cāvyayaḥ // HV_App.I,30.1 //
GE07hv_apppu:11292: harate nirbhayaś caiva bhayam adya karomy aham // HV_App.I,30.3 //
GE07hv_apppu:11293: kathaṃ vai krodham āgacched badhyate vā kathaṃ mayā /
GE07hv_apppu:11294: prathamaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmi yena kupyati mandadhīḥ // HV_App.I,30.5 //
GE07hv_apppu:11296: toraṇaṃ gṛham āsādya ucchritaṃ meruśṛṅgavat // HV_App.I,30.7 //
GE07hv_apppu:11297: etad unmathya pātiṣye bhallena niśitena vai /
GE07hv_apppu:11299: tato yuddhena hatvājau gantāsmi dvārakāṃ prati // HV_App.I,30.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:11300: ity uktvā sajyam ācakre saśaraṃ cāpam ojasā /
GE07hv_apppu:11301: ciccheda dhvajaratnaṃ tu śambarasya mahābhujaḥ // HV_App.I,30.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:11302: tac chrutvā tu dhvajacchedaṃ pradyumnena mahātmanā /
GE07hv_apppu:11303: kruddhas tv ājñāpayām āsa putrān vai kālaśambaraḥ // HV_App.I,30.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:11305: naitaṃ vai draṣṭum icchāmi mama vipriyakārakam // HV_App.I,30.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:11306: śrutvā tu śambarād vākyaṃ sutās te śambarasya ha /
GE07hv_apppu:11309: śrutesenaḥ suṣeṇaś ca somaseno damas tathā // HV_App.I,30.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:11310: senānīḥ sainyahantā ca senahā sainikas tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:11313: kumbhaketuḥ sudaṃṣṭraś ca keśir ity evam ādayaḥ // HV_App.I,30.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:11316: āhvayantam amitraṃ vai tasthuḥ saṃgrāmamūrdhani // HV_App.I,30.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:11317: pradyumnas tu mahābāhū ratham āruhya satvaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11318: niryayau cāpam ādāya saṃgrāmābhimukhas tadā // HV_App.I,30.29 //
GE07hv_apppu:11320: śambarasya ca putrāṇāṃ keśavasya ca sūnunā // HV_App.I,30.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:11323: nāradas tumbarus caiva hāhā hūhūś ca gāyanāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11326: śaśaṃsa devarājāya vajriṇe citram adbhutam // HV_App.I,30.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:11327: śambarasya śataṃ putrā ekaḥ kṛṣṇasya cātmajaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11328: bahūnāṃ yudhyatām eṣa kathaṃ vijayam āpnuyāt // HV_App.I,30.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:11329: tac chrutvā bhāṣitaṃ tasya prahasya balasūdanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11330: uvāca vacanaṃ cedam śṛṇu yo 'sya parākramaḥ // HV_App.I,30.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:11333: parituṣṭena devena varam asyāḥ pradīyate // HV_App.I,30.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:11335: tasya putratvam asyaiva bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,30.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:11339: āsthāya śambaro māyāṃ pradyumnam apaneṣyati // HV_App.I,30.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:11340: tac gaccha śambaragṛhaṃ bhāryā māyāvatī bhava /
GE07hv_apppu:11342: tatra tvam ātmanaḥ kāntaṃ bālarūpaṃ vivardhaya /
GE07hv_apppu:11344: tatas tvayā sahānaṅgo dvārakāṃ vai gamiṣyati /
GE07hv_apppu:11345: ramiṣyati tvayā sārdhaṃ śailāputryā tv ahaṃ yathā // HV_App.I,30.56 //
GE07hv_apppu:11351: saputriṇo vai pradyumno hantā tasya durātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,30.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:11354: saha putreṇa govindo bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // **HV_App.I,30.62**1:2
GE07hv_apppu:11358: śambarasya tu putrāṇāṃ rukmiṇyā nandanasya ca // HV_App.I,30.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:11361: yugapat pātayanti sma pradyumnopari vegitāḥ // HV_App.I,30.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:11362: kārṣṇāyanis tu saṃkruddhaḥ sarvāstrair dhanuṣaś cyutaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11363: ekaikaṃ paṅcabhiḥ kruddhaś ciccheda raṇamūrdhani // HV_App.I,30.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:11367: śambarasya jaghānāśu daśa putrān mahaujasaḥ // HV_App.I,30.73 //
GE07hv_apppu:11369: cicchedāśu śiras tasya citrasenasya vīryavān // HV_App.I,30.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:11370: tatas te hataśeṣās tu sametya samayudhyata /
GE07hv_apppu:11372: tataḥ saṃdhāya bāṇāṃs tu vimuṅcan sa raṇotsukaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11373: krīḍann iva mahātejās teṣāṃ śīrṣāṇy apātayat // HV_App.I,30.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:11376: hataṃ putraśataṃ śrutvā śambaraḥ krodham ādadhe /
GE07hv_apppu:11377: sūtaṃ saṃcodayām āsa rathaṃ me saṃprayojaya // HV_App.I,30.83 //
GE07hv_apppu:11378: rājño vākyaṃ niśamyātha praṇamya śirasā bhuvi /
GE07hv_apppu:11379: sa sainyaṃ codayām āsa rathaṃ ca susamāhitam // HV_App.I,30.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:11390: virājamānaṃ śrīmantam ārohac chambaras tadā // HV_App.I,30.94 //
GE07hv_apppu:11391: kāñcanaṃ citrasaṃnāhaṃ dhanur gṛhya śarāṃs tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:11393: caturbhiḥ sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ sainyena mahatā vṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11395: etaiḥ parivṛto 'mātyair yuyutsuḥ prasthito raṇe // HV_App.I,30.99 //
GE07hv_apppu:11396: daśa nāgasahasrāṇi rathānāṃ dve śate tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:11398: etaiḥ parivṛto yodhaiḥ śambaraḥ prayayau tadā // HV_App.I,30.102 //
GE07hv_apppu:11399: prayātasya tu saṃgrāme utpātāny utthitāni vai /
GE07hv_apppu:11401: garjanti puruṣaṃ medhā nirghātaś cāmbarāt patat /
GE07hv_apppu:11402: śivā vinedur aśivaṃ sainyaṃ saṃkālayan mahat // HV_App.I,30.106 //
GE07hv_apppu:11404: rathāgre patitaś cāsya kabandho bhuvi dṛśyate // HV_App.I,30.108 //
GE07hv_apppu:11408: bāhuḥ prakampate savyaḥ prāskhalan rathavājinaḥ // HV_App.I,30.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:11412: pratodo nyapatad dhastāt sārather hayayāyinaḥ // HV_App.I,30.116 //
GE07hv_apppu:11419: raṇamadhye sthitaḥ kārṣṇiś cintayan nidhanaṃ ripoḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11421: taṃ dṛṣṭvā śambaro māyī raukmiṇeyaṃ mahābalam /
GE07hv_apppu:11422: sainyaiḥ parivṛtaḥ saṃkhye yuddhāya kṛtaniścayaḥ // HV_App.I,30.124 //
GE07hv_apppu:11424: asaṃprāptāṃś ca tān bāṇāṃś ciccheda kṛtahastavat // HV_App.I,30.126 //
GE07hv_apppu:11425: pradyumno dhanur ādāya śaravarṣaṃ mumoca ha /
GE07hv_apppu:11426: na tasya sainye 'bhimukho yo na viddhaḥ śareṇa vai // HV_App.I,30.128 //
GE07hv_apppu:11428: śambarasya tathābhyāśe sthitaṃ saṃhṛtya bhītavat // HV_App.I,30.130 //
GE07hv_apppu:11430: ājñāpayām āsa tadā sacivān dānaveśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,30.132 //
GE07hv_apppu:11432: nopekṣaṇīyaḥ śatrur vai vadhyatāṃ kṣipram eṣa vai // HV_App.I,30.134 //
GE07hv_apppu:11433: upekṣita iva vyādhiḥ śarīraṃ nāśayed dhruvam /
GE07hv_apppu:11434: tad eṣa durgatiḥ pāpo vadhyatāṃ matpriyecchayā // HV_App.I,30.136 //
GE07hv_apppu:11435: tatas te sacivāḥ kruddhāḥ śirasā gṛhya śāsanam /
GE07hv_apppu:11436: śaravarṣaṃ pramuñcantas tvaritāś codayan rathān // HV_App.I,30.138 //
GE07hv_apppu:11437: tān dṛṣṭvā dhāvataḥ saṃkhye kruddho makaraketanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11438: cāpam udyamya saṃbhrāntas tasthau pramukhato balī // HV_App.I,30.140 //
GE07hv_apppu:11443: tatas te savicāḥ kruddhā pradyumnaṃ śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11444: [k: After line 145, Dn Cal. ed. ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:11445: nijaghnuḥ samare vīrās tad adbhūtam ivābhavat /
GE07hv_apppu:11447: tān aprāptāñ śarān bāṇaiś ciccheda makaradhvajaḥ // HV_App.I,30.147 //
GE07hv_apppu:11449: jaghāna paśyatāṃ rājñāṃ sarveṣāṃ sainikasya vai // HV_App.I,30.149 //
GE07hv_apppu:11451: jaghāna caturaḥ so 'śvān durdharasya rathaṃ prati // HV_App.I,30.151 //
GE07hv_apppu:11452: ekena yoktraṃ chatraṃ ca dhvajam ekena bandhuram /
GE07hv_apppu:11453: ṣaṣṭyā ca yugacakrākṣaṃ ciccheda makaradhvajaḥ // HV_App.I,30.153 //
GE07hv_apppu:11457: nipapāta rathopasthāt kṣīṇapuṇya iva grahaḥ // HV_App.I,30.157 //
