GE07hv_apppu:11461: kṛtvābhyadhāvat sahasā tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt // HV_App.I,30.161 //
GE07hv_apppu:11463: parvataṃ vāridhārābhiḥ prāvṛṣīva yathā ghanaḥ // HV_App.I,30.163 //
GE07hv_apppu:11469: tenaiva tasya ciccheda ketumāleḥ śiras tadā // HV_App.I,30.168 //
GE07hv_apppu:11470: tad dṛṣṭvā karma vipulaṃ raukmiṇeyasya devarāṭ /
GE07hv_apppu:11471: vismayaṃ paramaṃ prāptaḥ sarvair devagaṇaiḥ saha /
GE07hv_apppu:11477: yugapat saṃkṣipanti sma vadhārthaṃ kṛṣṇanandane // HV_App.I,30.176 //
GE07hv_apppu:11479: ciccheda bahudhā vīro darśayan pāṇilāghavam // HV_App.I,30.178 //
GE07hv_apppu:11481: rathān sārathibhiḥ sārdhaṃ hayāṃś caiva tu mardayan /
GE07hv_apppu:11482: pātayaṃs tāñ śaravrātair nāviddhaḥ kaś cid īkṣyate // HV_App.I,30.181 //
GE07hv_apppu:11492: nadīṃ dustaraṇīṃ bhīmām anaṅgena pravartitām // HV_App.I,30.191 //
GE07hv_apppu:11496: śatruhantāram āśritya śarān abhyakiran bahūn // HV_App.I,30.195 //
GE07hv_apppu:11497: śatruhantā punaḥ kruddho mumoca śaram uttamam /
GE07hv_apppu:11498: pradyumnaṃ sa samāsādya hṛdaye nipapāta ha // HV_App.I,30.197 //
GE07hv_apppu:11499: sa viddhas tena bāṇena pradyumno na vyakampata /
GE07hv_apppu:11500: śaktiṃ jagrāha balavāñ śatruhantre mumūrṣave // HV_App.I,30.199 //
GE07hv_apppu:11501: sā kṣiptā raukmiṇeyena śaktir jvālākulā raṇe /
GE07hv_apppu:11506: jagrāha musalaṃ so'tha vacanaṃ cedam ādade // HV_App.I,30.205 //
GE07hv_apppu:11507: tiṣṭha kiṃ prākṛtair ebhiḥ kariṣyasi raṇapriya /
GE07hv_apppu:11508: māṃ yodhaya sudurbuddhe tatas tvaṃ na bhaviṣyasi // HV_App.I,30.207 //
GE07hv_apppu:11510: putraṃ hantāsmy ahaṃ tasya tato 'sau nihato bhavet // HV_App.I,30.209 //
GE07hv_apppu:11512: daiteyā dānavāḥ sarve modantāṃ hataśatravaḥ // HV_App.I,30.211 //
GE07hv_apppu:11513: hate tvayi mamāstreṇa tvatsamutthaiś ca śoṇitaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11514: śambarasya tu putrāṇāṃ karomy udakasatkriyām // HV_App.I,30.213 //
GE07hv_apppu:11516: nihataṃ tvāṃ ca śrutvaiva yauvanasthaṃ gatāyuṣam // HV_App.I,30.215 //
GE07hv_apppu:11517: sa te pitā cakradharo viphalāśo bhaviṣyati /
GE07hv_apppu:11518: hataṃ tvāṃ sa viditvā tu prāṇāṃs tyakṣyati mandadhīḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11519: ity uktvā parigheṇāśu tāḍayad rukmiṇīsutam // HV_App.I,30.218 //
GE07hv_apppu:11521: [k: Line 219: double daṇḍa corrected to single. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:11522: dorbhyām ākṣipya tasyaiva rathamukhyaṃ vyacūrṇayat // HV_App.I,30.220 //
GE07hv_apppu:11524: tāṃ gadāṃ gṛhya sahasā raukmiṇeyam upādravat /
GE07hv_apppu:11525: tathaiva gadayā kāmaḥ pramardanam apothayat // HV_App.I,30.223 //
GE07hv_apppu:11526: hataṃ pramardanaṃ daityaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve pradudruvuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11527: na śaktāḥ pramukhe sthātuṃ siṃhatrāsād gajā iva // HV_App.I,30.225 //
GE07hv_apppu:11529: tathā sainyā viṣīdanti pradyumnasya bhayārditāḥ // HV_App.I,30.227 //
GE07hv_apppu:11538: śambaras tu tataḥ kruddhaḥ sūtam āha viśāṃ pate /
GE07hv_apppu:11539: śatrupramukhato vīra rathaṃ me śīgram āvaha /
GE07hv_apppu:11540: yāvad enaṃ śarair hanmi mama vipriyakārakam // HV_App.I,30.236 //
GE07hv_apppu:11541: tato bhartur vacaḥ śrutvā sūtas tatpriyakārakaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11543: taṃ dṛṣṭvā ratham āyāntaṃ pradyumnaḥ phullalocanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11545: tenāhanat susaṃkruddhaḥ kopayañ śambaraṃ raṇe // HV_App.I,30.241 //
GE07hv_apppu:11547: rathopasthaṃ samāśritya tasthau so 'tha vicetanaḥ // HV_App.I,30.243 //
GE07hv_apppu:11548: sa cetanāṃ punaḥ prāpya dhanur ādāya śambaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11549: vivyādha kārṣṇiṃ kupitaḥ saptabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,30.245 //
GE07hv_apppu:11550: tān aprāptāñ śarān so 'tha saptabhiḥ saptadhācchinat /
GE07hv_apppu:11551: śambaraṃ ca jaghānātha saptatyā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,30.247 //
GE07hv_apppu:11553: ahanac chambaraṃ krodhād dhārābhir iva parvatam // HV_App.I,30.249 //
GE07hv_apppu:11555: [k: After line 250, Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:11556: sa diśo vidiśaś caiva śaradhārāḥ samāvṛṇot /
GE07hv_apppu:11557: andhakārīkṛtaṃ vyoma dineśo naiva dṛśyate // HV_App.I,30.251 //
GE07hv_apppu:11559: pradyumnasya rathopasthe śaravarṣaṃ mumoca ha // HV_App.I,30.253 //
GE07hv_apppu:11561: ciccheda bahudhā rājan darśayan pāṇilāghavam // HV_App.I,30.255 //
GE07hv_apppu:11562: hate tasmin mahāvarṣe śarāṇāṃ kārṣṇinā tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:11565: āgneyāstraṃ mumocātha tena vṛkṣān aśātayat // HV_App.I,30.259 //
GE07hv_apppu:11567: pradyumnas taṃ tu vāyavyaiḥ protsārayata saṃyuge /
GE07hv_apppu:11568: tato māyāṃ parāṃ cakre devaśatruḥ pratāpavān // HV_App.I,30.262 //
GE07hv_apppu:11569: siṃhān vyāghrān varāhāṃś ca tarakṣūn ṛkṣavānarān /
GE07hv_apppu:11570: vāraṇān vāridaprakhyān hayān uṣṭrān viśāṃ pate // HV_App.I,30.264 //
GE07hv_apppu:11573: gāndharvāstreṇa ciccheda sarvāṃs tān khaṇḍaśas tadā // HV_App.I,30.266 //
GE07hv_apppu:11574: pradyumnena tu sā māyā hatā tāṃ vīkṣya śambaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11575: anyāṃ māyāṃ mumocātha śambaraḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ // HV_App.I,30.268 //
GE07hv_apppu:11578: tām āpatantīṃ māyāṃ tu kārṣṇiḥ kamalalocanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11579: saiṃhīṃ māyāṃ samutsraṣṭuṃ cakre buddhiṃ mahāmanāḥ // HV_App.I,30.272 //
GE07hv_apppu:11580: [k: After line 272, T1.2 G1.3-5 M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:11581: utsraṣṭukāmaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭā śambaro 'pi mumoca tām /
GE07hv_apppu:11583: māyā nāgamayī naṣṭā ādityeneva śarvarī // HV_App.I,30.274 //
GE07hv_apppu:11585: māyāṃ saṃmohanīṃ nāma so 'sṛjad dānaveśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,30.276 //
GE07hv_apppu:11586: tāṃ sṛṣṭāṃ mohinīṃ nāma māyāṃ mayavinirmitām /
GE07hv_apppu:11587: saṃjñāstreṇa tu pradyumno nāśayām āsa vīryavān // HV_App.I,30.278 //
GE07hv_apppu:11588: śambaras tu tataḥ kruddho māyayā naṣṭayā tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:11589: saiṃhīṃ māyāṃ mahātejāḥ so 'sṛjad dānaveśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,30.280 //
GE07hv_apppu:11591: astraṃ gāndharvam ādāya śarabhān asṛjat tadā // HV_App.I,30.282 //
GE07hv_apppu:11593: siṃhān vidrāvayām āsur vāyur jaladharān iva // HV_App.I,30.284 //
GE07hv_apppu:11595: śambaraś cintayām āsa katham enaṃ nihanmi vai // HV_App.I,30.286 //
GE07hv_apppu:11596: aho mūrkhasvabhāvo 'haṃ yan mayā na hataḥ śiśuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11597: [k: Line 287: manmayā corrected. The vulgate reading "yan mayā" is not recorded by the CE; so I deduce it is a misprint. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:11599: tat kathaṃ nihaniṣyāmi śatruṃ raṇaśiraḥsthitam // HV_App.I,30.289 //
GE07hv_apppu:11600: māyā sā tiṣṭhate tīvrā pannagī nāma bhīṣaṇā /
GE07hv_apppu:11603: tayā dahyeta duṣṭātmā hy eṣa māyāmayena vai // HV_App.I,30.293 //
GE07hv_apppu:11606: sasūtaṃ sa hi pradyumnaṃ babandha śarabandhanaiḥ // HV_App.I,30.296 //
GE07hv_apppu:11608: māyāṃ saṃcintayām āsa sauparṇīṃ sarpanāśanīm // HV_App.I,30.298 //
GE07hv_apppu:11610: [k: After line 299, T1.2 G1.3-5 M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:11612: suparṇā vicaranti sma sarpā naṣṭā mahāviṣāḥ // HV_App.I,30.300 //
GE07hv_apppu:11615: yat tvayā dharṣitā māyā tena sma paritoṣitāḥ // HV_App.I,30.303 //
GE07hv_apppu:11617: asti me kāladaṇḍābho mudgaro hemabhūṣitaḥ // HV_App.I,30.305 //
GE07hv_apppu:11619: mayā sṛṣṭaṃ svadehena tapas taptvā suduścaram // HV_App.I,30.307 //
GE07hv_apppu:11620: purā yo mama pārvatyā dattaḥ paramatuṣṭayā /
GE07hv_apppu:11621: gṛhāṇa śambaremaṃ tvaṃ mudgaraṃ hemabhūṣitam // HV_App.I,30.309 //
GE07hv_apppu:11624: śumbhaś caiva niśumbhaś ca sagaṇau sūditau mayā // HV_App.I,30.312 //
GE07hv_apppu:11625: prāṇasaṃśayam āpanne tvayā mokṣyaḥ sa śatrave /
GE07hv_apppu:11626: ity uktvā pārvatī devī tatraivāntaradhīyata // HV_App.I,30.314 //
GE07hv_apppu:11627: tad ahaṃ mudgaraśreṣṭhaṃ mocayiṣyāmi śatrave // HV_App.I,30.315 //
GE07hv_apppu:11629: gaccha nārada śīgraṃ tvaṃ pradyumnasya rathaṃ prati // HV_App.I,30.317 //
GE07hv_apppu:11633: evam ukto maghavatā nāradaḥ prayayau tvaran /
GE07hv_apppu:11636: preṣitaṃ devarājena tava saṃbodhanāya vai // HV_App.I,30.324 //
GE07hv_apppu:11637: smara tvaṃ pūrvakaṃ bhāvaṃ kāmadevo 'si mānada /
GE07hv_apppu:11640: jāto 'si keśavena tvaṃ pradyumna iti kīrtyase // HV_App.I,30.328 //
GE07hv_apppu:11643: vadhārthaṃ śambarasya tvaṃ hriyamāṇo hy apekṣitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11645: yaiṣā māyāvatī nāma bhāryā vai śambarasya tu /
GE07hv_apppu:11646: ratiṃ tāṃ viddhi kalyāṇīṃ tava bhāryāṃ purātanīm /
GE07hv_apppu:11647: tava sā rakṣaṇārthāya śambarasya gṛhe 'vasat // HV_App.I,30.335 //
GE07hv_apppu:11648: māyāṃ śarīrajāṃ nyasya mohanārthaṃ durātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,30.336 //
GE07hv_apppu:11650: evaṃ pradyumna buddhyā vai tava bhāryā pratiṣṭhitā // HV_App.I,30.338 //
GE07hv_apppu:11651: hatvā tvaṃ śambaraṃ vīra vaiṣṇavāstreṇa saṃyuge /
GE07hv_apppu:11652: gṛhya māyāvatīṃ bhāryāṃ dvārakāṃ gantum arhasi // HV_App.I,30.340 //
GE07hv_apppu:11653: gṛhāṇa vaiṣṇavaṃ cāstraṃ kavacaṃ ca mahāprabham /
GE07hv_apppu:11654: śakreṇa tava saṃgṛhya preṣitaṃ śatrusūdana // HV_App.I,30.342 //
GE07hv_apppu:11655: śṛṇu me hy aparaṃ vākyaṃ kriyatām aviśaṅkayā /
GE07hv_apppu:11656: asya devaripos tāta mudgaro nityapūjitaḥ // HV_App.I,30.344 //
GE07hv_apppu:11661: gṛhāṇa vaiṣṇavaṃ cāstraṃ devyai caiva namasya ca /
GE07hv_apppu:11662: stavyā caiva namasyā ca mahādevī raṇotsukaiḥ // HV_App.I,30.348 //
GE07hv_apppu:11663: tatra vai kriyatāṃ yatnaḥ saṃgrāme ripuṇā saha /
GE07hv_apppu:11664: ity uktvā nārado vākyaṃ prayayau yatra vāsavaḥ // HV_App.I,30.350 //
GE07hv_apppu:11667: śambaras tu tataḥ kruddho mudgaraṃ taṃ samādade /
GE07hv_apppu:11668: mudgare gṛhyamāṇe tu dvādaśārkāḥ samutthitāḥ // HV_App.I,30.352 //
GE07hv_apppu:11670: udmārgāḥ sāgarā jātāḥ saṃkṣubdhāś cāpi devatāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11672: vavarṣa rudhiraṃ devaḥ puruṣaṃ pavano vavau // HV_App.I,30.356 //
GE07hv_apppu:11673: evaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahotpātān pradyumnaḥ sa tvarānvitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11674: avatīrya rathād vīraḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭaḥ sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,30.358 //
GE07hv_apppu:11676: praṇamya śirasā devīṃ stotuṃ samupacakrame // HV_App.I,30.360 //
GE07hv_apppu:11678: oṃ namaḥ kātyāyanyai guhasya jananyai namaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11679: namas trailokyamāyāyai kātyāyanyai namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,30.362 //
GE07hv_apppu:11685: namasyāmi mahādevīṃ jayāṃ ca vijayāṃ tathā // HV_App.I,30.368 //
GE07hv_apppu:11692: rakṣa māṃ devi satataṃ saṃgrāme vijayaṃ kuru // HV_App.I,30.375 //
GE07hv_apppu:11696: varaṃ varaya vatsa tvam amoghaṃ darśanaṃ mama // HV_App.I,30.379 //
GE07hv_apppu:11698: praṇamya śirasā devīṃ vijñaptum upacakrame // HV_App.I,30.381 //
GE07hv_apppu:11699: yadi tvaṃ devi tuṣṭāsi dīyatāṃ me yadīpsitam /
GE07hv_apppu:11700: varaṃ ca varade yāce sarvāmitreṣu me jayaḥ // HV_App.I,30.383 //
GE07hv_apppu:11702: eṣa me gātram āsādya mālā padmamayī bhavet // HV_App.I,30.385 //
GE07hv_apppu:11703: tathāstv iti ca sāpy uktvā tatraivantaradhīyata /
GE07hv_apppu:11704: pradyumnas tu mahātejā hṛṣṭo ratham athāruhat // HV_App.I,30.387 //
GE07hv_apppu:11705: mudgaraṃ tu gṛhītvā ca śambaraḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11706: bhrāmayitvā sa cikṣepa pradyumnorasi vīryavān // HV_App.I,30.389 //
GE07hv_apppu:11707: sa gatvā madanābhyāśaṃ mālā bhūtvātha pauṣkarī /
GE07hv_apppu:11708: pradyumnasya ca kaṇṭhe sā samāyuktā vyarājata /
GE07hv_apppu:11709: nakṣatrāṇāṃ tu mālāyāṃ yathā parivṛto vidhuḥ // HV_App.I,30.392 //
GE07hv_apppu:11710: tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11711: sādhu sādhv iti vācocuḥ pūjayan keśavātmajam // HV_App.I,30.394 //
GE07hv_apppu:11714: saṃdadhe cāpam āyamya idaṃ vacanam abravīt // HV_App.I,30.397 //
GE07hv_apppu:11715: yady ahaṃ rukmiṇīputraḥ keśavasyātmajo hy aham /
GE07hv_apppu:11716: tena satyena bāṇemaṃ jahi tvaṃ śambaraṃ raṇe // HV_App.I,30.399 //
GE07hv_apppu:11717: ity uktvā cāpam ākṛṣya saṃdhāya ca mahāmanāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11718: cikṣepa śambarāāyātha dahaṃl lokatrayaṃ tviṣā // HV_App.I,30.401 //
GE07hv_apppu:11720: hṛdayaṃ śambarasyātha bhittvā dharaṇim āgamat // HV_App.I,30.403 //
GE07hv_apppu:11721: naivāsya māṃsaṃ na snāyur nāsthi na tvaṅ na śoṇitam /
GE07hv_apppu:11727: devarājas tu suprītaḥ sarvair devagaṇaiḥ saha /
GE07hv_apppu:11733: sa ca samarapariśramaṃ vahan vai @ HV_App.I,30.416 @
GE07hv_apppu:11738: [h: HV (CE) App. I, No. 31, transliterated by Anne Mossner and Horst
GE07hv_apppu:11739: Brinkhaus, proof--read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of June 3, 2005 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:11740: [k: T2.4 G M1-3 ins. after adhyāya 105, Dn Ds2 D6 T1 M4 after App. I, No.
GE07hv_apppu:11744: gataḥ kailāsaśikharam ālayaṃ śaṃkarasya ha // HV_App.I,31.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:11745: nāradād yais tapo vṛddhair munibhis tattvadarśibhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11746: tatra dṛṣṭo mahādevaḥ śaṃkaro nīlalohitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:11747: keśavena purā vipra kurvatā tapa uttamam /
GE07hv_apppu:11748: arcitas tena devena śaṃkaraś ceti viśrutam // HV_App.I,31.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:11750: arcayāṃ cakrire sākṣāc chakrādyās taṃ hariṃ haram // HV_App.I,31.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:11751: tau tu devau mahādevāv ekībhūtau dvidhā kṛtau /
GE07hv_apppu:11754: tayos tatra yathāvṛttaṃ kailāse parvatottame // HV_App.I,31.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:11755: ṛṣayaḥ kim aceṣṭanta dṛṣṭvā tau puruṣottamau /
GE07hv_apppu:11756: etat sarvam aśeṣeṇa vaktum arhasi sattama // HV_App.I,31.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:11757: yathāgato harir viṣṇuḥ kṛṣṇo jiṣṇuḥ purātanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11758: yathā ca śaṃkaraḥ sākṣāt kṛtavān nāgabhūṣaṇaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11759: etat sarvaṃ vipravarya brūhi tattvena yatnataḥ // HV_App.I,31.17 //
GE07hv_apppu:11761: śṛṇuṣvāvahito rājan yathā kṛṣṇo gato nagam /
GE07hv_apppu:11762: yathā ca dṛṣṭo deveśaḥ śaṃkaro vṛṣavāhanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:11763: yathā cacāra ca tapo yathā te munayo gatāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11764: ekatvaṃ ca tayor yadvat tathā śṛṇu nṛpottama // HV_App.I,31.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:11765: dvaipāyano 'tha bhagavān yathā provāca māṃ tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:11767: yathāśakti yathāprajñaṃ śṛṇu yatnena suvrata // HV_App.I,31.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:11769: nānadhītāya vaktavyaṃ puṇyaṃ puṇyavatāṃ sadā // HV_App.I,31.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:11770: svargyaṃ yaśasyaṃ dhanyaṃ ca buddhiśuddhikaraṃ sadā /
GE07hv_apppu:11771: dhyeyaṃ puṇyātmanā nityam idaṃ vedārthaniścitam // HV_App.I,31.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:11775: śivayor devayos tatra hareś caiva bhavasya ha // HV_App.I,31.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:11777: hateṣv atha nṛpeṣv eva kiṃcic chiṣṭeṣu śatruṣu // HV_App.I,31.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:11778: śāsati sma tadā viṣṇuḥ pṛthivīṃ puruṣottamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11779: dvāravatyāṃ jagannātho vasan vṛṣṇibhir īśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:11780: rukmiṇīsaṃgato devo vasaṃs tatra pure hariḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11781: kadācic ca tayā sārdhaṃ śete rātrau jagatpatiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11782: viharaṃś ca yathāyogaṃ prītaḥ prītiyujā tayā // HV_App.I,31.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:11784: putram icchāmi deveśa tvatto devakinandana // HV_App.I,31.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:11786: vṛṣṇīnām api netāraṃ vīryayuktaṃ taponvitam // HV_App.I,31.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:11788: evam ādiguṇair yuktaṃ dātum arhasi sattama // HV_App.I,31.45 //
GE07hv_apppu:11789: tvayi sarvasya dātṛtvaṃ nityam eva pratiṣṭhitam /
GE07hv_apppu:11790: tvaṃ hi sarvasya kartā ca dātā bhoktā jagatpate /
GE07hv_apppu:11792: vaktavyaṃ kim u deveśa yadi bhaktāsmi keśava /
GE07hv_apppu:11793: anugraho yadi syān me devadeva jagatpate /
GE07hv_apppu:11794: dātum arhasi putraṃ tvaṃ vīryavantaṃ janārdana // HV_App.I,31.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:11797: tayā mahiṣyā rukmiṇyā rukmiśatrur yadūdvahaḥ // HV_App.I,31.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:11799: dātāsmi tādṛśaṃ putraṃ yaṃ tvam icchasi bhāmini // HV_App.I,31.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:11800: nityabhaktāsi me devi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GE07hv_apppu:11801: avaśyaṃ tava dāsyāmi putraṃ śatrunibarhaṇam // HV_App.I,31.57 //
GE07hv_apppu:11802: putreṇa lokāñ jayati satām kāmadughā hi ye /
GE07hv_apppu:11803: pud iti narakasyākhyā duḥkaṃ ca narakaṃ viduḥ // HV_App.I,31.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:11804: pudas trāṇāt tataḥ putram ihecchanti paratra ca /
GE07hv_apppu:11805: anantāḥ putriṇo lokāḥ puruṣasya priye śubhāḥ // HV_App.I,31.61 //
GE07hv_apppu:11806: patir jāyāṃ praviśati garbho bhūtvā sa mātaram /
GE07hv_apppu:11807: tasyāṃ punar navo bhūtvā daśame māsi jāyate // HV_App.I,31.63 //
GE07hv_apppu:11809: tajjāyā jāyā bhavati yad asyāṃ jāyate punaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11810: putravatāṃ bibhetīndraḥ kiṃ nu te nājitaṃ bhavet /
GE07hv_apppu:11811: nāputro vindate lokān kuputrād vandhyatā varā // HV_App.I,31.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:11812: kuputro narako yasmāt suputrāt svarga eva hi /
GE07hv_apppu:11813: tasmād vinītaṃ satputraṃ śrutavantaṃ dayāparam // HV_App.I,31.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:11814: vidyā hi vinatir yasmād vidyāyuktaṃ sudhārmikam /
GE07hv_apppu:11815: icchet putraṃ sadā putrī puruṣo yatnavān budhaḥ // HV_App.I,31.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:11816: tasmād dāsyāmi te putraṃ vidyāvantaṃ sudhārmikam /
GE07hv_apppu:11817: eṣa gacchāmi putrārthaṃ kailāsaṃ parvatottamam // HV_App.I,31.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:11819: tato labdhāsmi putraṃ te bhavād bhūtahite ratāt // HV_App.I,31.73 //
GE07hv_apppu:11821: toṣayitvā virūpākṣam ādidevam ajaṃ vibhum // HV_App.I,31.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:11822: gamiṣyāmy aham adyaiva draṣṭuṃ śaṃkaram avyayam /
GE07hv_apppu:11823: sa ca me dāsyate putraṃ toṣitas tapasā mayā // HV_App.I,31.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:11825: praviśya badarīṃ puṇyām ṛṣijuṣṭāṃ tapomayīm // HV_App.I,31.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:11832: idam ekam idaṃ tattvam iti niścitamānasaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11837: ity uktvā virarāmaiva devadevo janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.91 //
GE07hv_apppu:11840: prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ gantum icchañ janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11842: gāś ca dattvātha viprebhyo namaskṛtya dvijottamān /
GE07hv_apppu:11843: āsthānam aṇḍapaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ praviveśa jagatpatiḥ // HV_App.I,31.95 //
GE07hv_apppu:11844: āsanaṃ mahad āsthāya vṛṣṇīn āhūya sarvaśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11845: balabhadraṃ śineḥ putraṃ hārdikyaṃ śaṭhasāraṇau // HV_App.I,31.97 //
GE07hv_apppu:11847: yasya nītiṃ samāśritya jīvanti yadavaḥ sukham // HV_App.I,31.99 //
GE07hv_apppu:11848: netā ca yaduvṛṣṇīnāṃ sa tu dharmaparaḥ sadā /
GE07hv_apppu:11849: yasya bibhyati devāś ca nītes tasya mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:11850: yasya buddhivaśād viṣṇuḥ śaśāsa pṛthivīṃ sadā /
GE07hv_apppu:11851: taṃ ca vṛṣṇivaraṃ vīram uddhavaṃ devasaprabham // HV_App.I,31.103 //
GE07hv_apppu:11852: anyān api yadūn sarvān uvāca bhagavān hariḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11853: śṛṇvantu mama vākyāni yādavāḥ sarva eva hi /
GE07hv_apppu:11854: śṛṇu cāpi vaco mahyaṃ pitar uddhava me sakhe // HV_App.I,31.106 //
GE07hv_apppu:11855: bālyāt prabhṛti yo yatno mama duṣṭanibarhaṇe /
GE07hv_apppu:11856: pratyakṣaṃ bhavatā dṛṣṭaṃ pūtanānidhanaṃ nṛpāḥ // HV_App.I,31.108 //
GE07hv_apppu:11857: keśī ca nihato bālye mayā bālena yādavāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11858: govardhano dhṛtaḥ śailo gāvaś ca paripālitāḥ // HV_App.I,31.110 //
GE07hv_apppu:11860: kaṃso 'pi nidhanaṃ nīto mayā cāṇūramallakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:11862: anye cāpi nṛpā rājan balino nihatā mayā // HV_App.I,31.114 //
GE07hv_apppu:11863: yo 'pi vīro jarāsaṃdho nigṛhīto balān mayā /
GE07hv_apppu:11864: bhīmena balinā rājan nayena mama yādavāḥ // HV_App.I,31.116 //
GE07hv_apppu:11865: sṛgālo nihataḥ saṃkhye gomantād gacchatā mayā /
GE07hv_apppu:11866: yo 'pi vīro durātmāsau dānavo narako hataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11867: niṣkaṇṭakam imaṃ lokaṃ kṛtavān rājasattamāḥ // HV_App.I,31.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:11868: kiṃ tu vīro nṛpo jajñe sakhā bhaumasya yādavāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11869: pauṇḍro vīryavatāṃ netā dveṣṭā cāsau sadā mama // HV_App.I,31.121 //
GE07hv_apppu:11871: śāstrajño nītimān sākṣān netā sainyasya yatnavān /
GE07hv_apppu:11872: yoddhā yuddhapriyo rājā jāmadagnya ivāparaḥ // HV_App.I,31.124 //
GE07hv_apppu:11874: bādhiṣyate purīṃ yoddhā chidraṃ yadi labheta saḥ // HV_App.I,31.126 //
GE07hv_apppu:11875: na hy alpasādhyo balavān puṇḍrasyeśo nṛpottamāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11877: yathā na bādhate rājā purīṃ yadukulāśrayām // HV_App.I,31.129 //
GE07hv_apppu:11878: ahaṃ tu yās ye kailāsaṃ kutaścit kāraṇān nṛpāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11880: yāvad āgamanaṃ mahyaṃ tāvad yattā bhavantv iha // HV_App.I,31.132 //
GE07hv_apppu:11881: mayā virahatāṃ cemaṃ yadi jānāti pauṇḍrakaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11882: āgamiṣyati rājendro rotsyate ca purīm imām /
GE07hv_apppu:11883: imāṃ niryādavāṃ kartuṃ śaknotīti ca me matiḥ // HV_App.I,31.135 //
GE07hv_apppu:11884: yattā bhavata rājendrāḥ khaḍgaiḥ pāśaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11888: teṣāṃ madhye mahābāhur uddhavaḥ kṛṣṇam abravīt /
GE07hv_apppu:11889: pāṣāṇaiḥ karpaṇasthaiś ca saṃnaddhā bhavata svakaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11890: pidhāya ca kapāṭāni mahādvārāṇi yatnataḥ // HV_App.I,31.138 //
GE07hv_apppu:11892: mudrayā saha gacchantu rājāno gantum īpsavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.140 //
GE07hv_apppu:11894: yāvad āgamanaṃ mahyaṃ tāvad evaṃ bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,31.142 //
GE07hv_apppu:11895: mṛgayā nātra kartavyā na ca krīḍā bahiḥ purāt /
GE07hv_apppu:11896: jñātavyāś ca pare sve ca gamanāgamane sadā // HV_App.I,31.144 //
GE07hv_apppu:11900: evamādi kriyā kāryā yāvad āgamanaṃ mama /
GE07hv_apppu:11901: ity uktvā yādavān sarvān sātyakiṃ punar āha ca // HV_App.I,31.146 //
GE07hv_apppu:11904: sātyake śṛṇu madvākyaṃ yatto bhava yudhāṃ vara /
GE07hv_apppu:11905: tvaṃ tu khaḍgī gadī bhūtvā cāpī bāṇī talatravān /
GE07hv_apppu:11906: tiṣṭha yatnena rakṣasva purīṃ bahunṛpāśrayām // HV_App.I,31.149 //
GE07hv_apppu:11907: na ca nidrā tvayā kāryā rātrau yaduvṛṣa prabho /
GE07hv_apppu:11908: na ca vyākhyā tvayā kāryā śāstrāṇāṃ śāstratatpara /
GE07hv_apppu:11909: na ca vādas tvayā kāryo vādibhiḥ saha vṛṣṇipa // HV_App.I,31.152 //
GE07hv_apppu:11910: tvaṃ hi yoddhā balī jetā dhanurvedasya vedavit /
GE07hv_apppu:11911: tathā kuru yathā vīra nopahāsyā bhavemahi // HV_App.I,31.154 //
GE07hv_apppu:11914: ājñā tava jagannātha dhāryā yatnena me sadā // HV_App.I,31.156 //
GE07hv_apppu:11916: yāvad āgamanaṃ tubhyaṃ tāvat sthāsyāmi yatnataḥ // HV_App.I,31.158 //
GE07hv_apppu:11917: prasādas tava govinda yadi syān mayi mādhava /
GE07hv_apppu:11918: kiṃ nāma mama duḥsādhyaṃ śatrūṇāṃ nigrahe hare // HV_App.I,31.160 //
GE07hv_apppu:11919: yadi śakraṃ yamaṃ vāpi kuberam api pāśinam /
GE07hv_apppu:11920: sarvān etān vijeṣyāmi kim u pauṇḍraṃ nṛpottamam /
GE07hv_apppu:11921: gaccha kāryaṃ kuruṣvedaṃ yatto 'haṃ satataṃ hare // HV_App.I,31.163 //
GE07hv_apppu:11923: śṛṇūddhava tvaṃ vākyaṃ me kuryās tv etat prayatnavān // HV_App.I,31.165 //
GE07hv_apppu:11924: rakṣyā nayena rājendra purī dvāravatī tvayā /
GE07hv_apppu:11925: yatto bhava sadā tāta kuru sāhāyyam atra naḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11926: lajjā mama samutpannā vadatas tava sāṃpratam // HV_App.I,31.168 //
GE07hv_apppu:11927: tvaṃ hi netā samas tasya vidyāpārasya sarvataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11928: ko nu śakṣyati medhāvī vaktuṃ vidyāvataḥ puraḥ // HV_App.I,31.170 //
GE07hv_apppu:11929: yat kāryaṃ tad bhavān vetti hy akāryaṃ cāpi sarvataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11930: ato 'haṃ virame tāta vaktuṃ saṃprati vṛṣṇipa // HV_App.I,31.172 //
GE07hv_apppu:11932: kim idaṃ tava govinda vartate māṃ prati prabho /
GE07hv_apppu:11933: aho prasannatā mahyaṃ kiṃ tu prītir iyaṃ tava // HV_App.I,31.174 //
GE07hv_apppu:11935: yasya prasanno bhavasi tasya kiṃ nāsti keśava // HV_App.I,31.176 //
GE07hv_apppu:11936: tvaṃ hi sarvasya jagataḥ kartā hartā pradhānakṛt /
GE07hv_apppu:11937: prabhavaḥ sarvakāryāṇāṃ vaktā śrotā pramāṇavit // HV_App.I,31.178 //
GE07hv_apppu:11938: dhyātā dhyānamayo dhyeya iti brahmavido viduḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11939: jetā devaripūṇāṃ ca goptā nākasadāṃ bhavān // HV_App.I,31.180 //
GE07hv_apppu:11941: iyaṃ nītir ahaṃ manye netā nīter yato bhavān // HV_App.I,31.182 //
GE07hv_apppu:11942: ko nu nāma na yo veda tvāṃ vinā sāṃprataṃ vada /
GE07hv_apppu:11943: nītis tvaṃ sarvakāryāṇām iti me niścitā matiḥ // HV_App.I,31.184 //
GE07hv_apppu:11944: durgāḍho nayamārgo 'yam ity āhus tadvido janāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11945: caturdhā procyate nītiḥ sāmadāne janārdana // HV_App.I,31.186 //
GE07hv_apppu:11947: daṇḍyeṣu daṇḍam icchanti sāmānyaṃ tu naye hare // HV_App.I,31.188 //
GE07hv_apppu:11948: balavatsv atha dānaṃ tu trayāṇāṃ cedagocare /
GE07hv_apppu:11949: prayoktavyo mahābheda iti nītimatāṃ matam // HV_App.I,31.190 //
GE07hv_apppu:11950: teṣu teṣv atha sarveṣu pramāṇaṃ tvāṃ vidur budhāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11951: kim atra bahunoktena sarvaṃ tvayi samarpitam /
GE07hv_apppu:11952: ity uktvā virarāmaiva uddhavo nītimattaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.193 //
GE07hv_apppu:11953: tataḥ sa bhagavān viṣṇur evam eva nṛpottama /
GE07hv_apppu:11955: ugrasenaṃ nṛpaṃ rājaṃs tathā hārdikyam eva ca // HV_App.I,31.196 //
GE07hv_apppu:11956: kāmapālaṃ punar viṣṇur idaṃ hovāca yattvavit /
GE07hv_apppu:11957: na pramādas tvayā kāryaḥ sarvadā yatnavān bhava // HV_App.I,31.198 //
GE07hv_apppu:11958: sthite tvayi mahābāho ka pīḍā jagato bhavet // HV_App.I,31.199 //
GE07hv_apppu:11959: gadī bhava sadā ārya na krīḍā sarvadā bhavet // HV_App.I,31.200 //
GE07hv_apppu:11960: rakṣa tvaṃ sarvadā yatnāt purīṃ dvāravatīṃ prabho /
GE07hv_apppu:11961: nopahāsyā yathā syāma tathā kuru gadī bhava // HV_App.I,31.202 //
GE07hv_apppu:11962: utsāhaḥ sarvathā kāryo nirutsāho na yatnataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11963: bāḍham ity abravīd rāmaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ vṛṣṇikulodvaham // HV_App.I,31.204 //
GE07hv_apppu:11964: vṛṣṇayaḥ sarva evaite svaṃ svaṃ sadma samāyayuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11965: gantum aicchaj jagannāthaḥ kailāsaṃ parvatottamam // HV_App.I,31.206 //
GE07hv_apppu:11968: tataḥ sa cintayām āsa garuḍaṃ pakṣipuṃgavam /
GE07hv_apppu:11969: āgaccha tvaritaṃ tārkṣya iti viṣnur jagatpatiḥ // HV_App.I,31.208 //
GE07hv_apppu:11970: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tārkṣyo vedarāśir iti smṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11971: balavān vikramī yogī śāstranetā kurūdvaha // HV_App.I,31.210 //
GE07hv_apppu:11975: pannagāriḥ padmanetraḥ sākṣād indra ivāparaḥ // HV_App.I,31.214 //
GE07hv_apppu:11979: jānubhyām apatad bhūmau namo viṣṇo jagatpate // HV_App.I,31.218 //
GE07hv_apppu:11980: namaste devadeveśa hare svāminn iti bruvan /
GE07hv_apppu:11981: pasparśa pāṇinā kṛṣṇaḥ svāgataṃ tārkṣyapuṃgava // HV_App.I,31.220 //
GE07hv_apppu:11982: ity uvāca tadā tārkṣyaṃ yāsye kailāsaparvatam /
GE07hv_apppu:11983: śūlinaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi śaṃkaraṃ śāśvataṃ śivam // HV_App.I,31.222 //
GE07hv_apppu:11984: bāḍham ity abravīt tārkṣya āruhyainaṃ janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11985: tiṣṭhadhvam iti hovāca yādavān pārśvavartinaḥ // HV_App.I,31.224 //
GE07hv_apppu:11986: tato yayau jagannātho diśaṃ prāguttarāṃ hariḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:11987: raveṇa mahatā tārkṣyas trailokyaṃ samakampayat // HV_App.I,31.226 //
GE07hv_apppu:11988: sāgaraṃ kṣobhayām āsa padbhyāṃ pakṣī vrajaṃs tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:11989: pakṣeṇa parvatān sarvān vahan devaṃ janārdanam // HV_App.I,31.228 //
GE07hv_apppu:11991: tuṣṭuvuḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ vāgbhir iṣṭābhir īśvaram // HV_App.I,31.230 //
GE07hv_apppu:11992: jaya deva jagannātha naya viṣṇo jagatpate /
GE07hv_apppu:11995: jayājeya hare deva yogidhyeya bhayāpaha // HV_App.I,31.234 //
GE07hv_apppu:11996: nārāyaṇa namo deva kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa hare hare /
GE07hv_apppu:12001: ity ādibhis tadā devaṃ vāgbhir īśānam avyayam /
GE07hv_apppu:12003: śṛṇvann eva jagannāthaḥ stutivākyāni tāni ca /
GE07hv_apppu:12004: yayau sārdhaṃ suragaṇair munibhir vedapāragaiḥ // HV_App.I,31.243 //
GE07hv_apppu:12005: yatra pūrvaṃ svayaṃ viṣṇus tapas tepe sudāruṇam /
GE07hv_apppu:12008: yatra viṣṇur jagannāthas tapas taptvā sudāruṇam /
GE07hv_apppu:12010: gaṅgā yatra saricchreṣṭhā madhye dhāvati pāvanī /
GE07hv_apppu:12011: yatra śakraḥ svayaṃ hatvā vṛtraṃ vedārthatattvagam // HV_App.I,31.250 //
GE07hv_apppu:12013: yatra siddhāś ca siddhāḥ syur dhyātvā devaṃ janārdanam // HV_App.I,31.252
GE07hv_apppu:12014: yatra hatvā raṇe rāmo rāvaṇaṃ lokarāvaṇam /
GE07hv_apppu:12015: etacchāsanam icchaṃś ca tapo ghoram atapyata // HV_App.I,31.254 //
GE07hv_apppu:12016: devāś ca munayaś caiva siddhiṃ yānti śucivratāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:12017: yatra nityaṃ jagannāthaḥ sākṣād vasati keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.256 //
GE07hv_apppu:12018: yatra yajñāḥ pravartante nityaṃ munigaṇaiḥ saha /
GE07hv_apppu:12019: yasyāḥ smaraṇamātreṇa naraḥ svargaṃ gamiṣyati // HV_App.I,31.258 //
GE07hv_apppu:12021: śatravo mitratāṃ yānti yatra nityaṃ nṛpottama // HV_App.I,31.260 //
GE07hv_apppu:12023: yatra viṣṇuṃ samārādhya devāḥ svargaṃ samāyayuḥ // HV_App.I,31.262 //
GE07hv_apppu:12025: viśālāṃ badarīṃ viṣṇus tāṃ draṣṭuṃ sakaleśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.264 //
GE07hv_apppu:12029: nīḍastheṣu vihaṃgeṣu duhyamānāsu goṣu ca // HV_App.I,31.268 //
GE07hv_apppu:12030: bṛsīṣv atha ca tiṣṭhatsu munivīreṣu sarvataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:12034: atithau pūjyamāne ca saṃdhyāviṣṭe jaganmaye // HV_App.I,31.273 //
GE07hv_apppu:12035: sa tasyām atha velāyāṃ devaiḥ saha janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:12036: viveśa badarīṃ viṣṇur munijuṣṭāṃ tapomayīm // HV_App.I,31.275 //
GE07hv_apppu:12037: āśramasyātha madhyaṃ tu praviśya harir īśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:12039: pradeśe puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ sthitas tāvat sahāmaraiḥ // HV_App.I,31.278 //
GE07hv_apppu:12049: smarantaḥ sarvadā viṣṇuṃ tadbhaktās tatparāyaṇāḥ // HV_App.I,31.286 //
GE07hv_apppu:12051: dhyānena manasā viṣṇuṃ dṛṣṭavantas tapodhanāḥ // HV_App.I,31.288 //
GE07hv_apppu:12054: vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca raibhyo dhūmras tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:12055: jābāliḥ kāśyapaḥ kaṇvo bharadvājo 'tha gautamaḥ // HV_App.I,31.292 //
GE07hv_apppu:12056: atrir aśvaśirā bhadraḥ śaṅkhaḥ śaṇkhanidhiḥ kuṇiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:12058: kakṣīvān aṅgirāś caiva munir dīrghatamās tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:12059: asito devalas tāta vālmīkiś ca mahātapāḥ // HV_App.I,31.296 //
GE07hv_apppu:12060: ete cānye ca munayo draṣṭum īśvaram avyayam /
GE07hv_apppu:12061: ādāyārghyaṃ yathāyogam uṭajāt svāt samāyayuḥ // HV_App.I,31.298 //
GE07hv_apppu:12062: te ca gatvā hariṃ kṛṣṇaṃ viṣṇum īśaṃ janārdanam /
GE07hv_apppu:12063: bhaktinamrās tadā devaṃ praṇemur bhaktavatsalam // HV_App.I,31.300 //
GE07hv_apppu:12065: praṇavātmañ jagannātha natāḥ sma śirasā hare // HV_App.I,31.302 //
GE07hv_apppu:12066: viṣṇo jiṣṇo hṛṣīkeśa keśaveti ca sarvadā /
GE07hv_apppu:12067: praṇām apraṇatā viprāḥ prāhur itthaṃ jagatpatim // HV_App.I,31.304 //
GE07hv_apppu:12068: idam arghyam idaṃ pādyam idaṃ viṣṭaram eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:12069: kṛtārthāḥ sarvathā deva prasanno no jagatpatiḥ // HV_App.I,31.306 //
GE07hv_apppu:12070: kiṃ kurmaḥ kiṃ nu naḥ kṛtyaṃ kaścid doṣaḥ prabho hare /
GE07hv_apppu:12071: iti prāñjalayaḥ sarve sthitā devasya pārśvataḥ // HV_App.I,31.308 //
GE07hv_apppu:12073: kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ munivarā vardhatāṃ tapa uttamam // HV_App.I,31.310 //
GE07hv_apppu:12074: iti bruvan purāṇātmā prītas tena garutmatā /
GE07hv_apppu:12075: āsanaṃ lambhayām āsa rātrau devo janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.312 //
GE07hv_apppu:12077: agnihotreṣu tapasi tathā kṛtyeṣu sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,31.314 //
GE07hv_apppu:12079: sarvatra kuśalaṃ te tu brūyuḥ kṛṣṇasya tattvataḥ // HV_App.I,31.316 //
GE07hv_apppu:12080: ātithyaṃ cakrire te tu nīvāraiḥ phalamūlakaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:12081: devānām atha sarveṣāṃ viṣṇoḥ kṛṣṇasya yatnataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:12082: ātithyam upayuñjānas tataḥ prīto 'bhavad dhariḥ // HV_App.I,31.319 //
GE07hv_apppu:12085: tataḥ sa bhagavān viṣṇur durvijñeyagatiḥ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:12086: yatra pūrvaṃ tapas taptam ātmanā yādaveśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.321 //
GE07hv_apppu:12087: gaṅgāyāś cottare tīre deśaṃ draṣṭum upāgataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:12088: svayam eva hariḥ sākṣāt praviveśa tamālayam // HV_App.I,31.323 //
GE07hv_apppu:12089: praviśya suciraṃ kālaṃ dadarśa ca manoramam /
GE07hv_apppu:12090: niṣasāda tatas tasminn āśrame puṇyavardhane // HV_App.I,31.325 //
GE07hv_apppu:12092: kim apy eṣa jagannātho dhyātvā deveśvaraḥ sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.327 //
GE07hv_apppu:12093: sthite devagurau tatra samādhau dīpavad dharau /
GE07hv_apppu:12094: tatra śabdo mahān ghoraḥ prādur āsīt samantataḥ // HV_App.I,31.329 //
GE07hv_apppu:12095: khāda khāda namo deva yāta yāta mṛgān imān /
GE07hv_apppu:12096: preṣayeha śunaḥ sarvān prasādāc chārṅgadhanvanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.331 //
GE07hv_apppu:12097: eṣa viṣṇur ayaṃ kṛṣṇo harir īśa ito 'cyutaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:12098: namo 'stu viṣṇo deveśa svāmin mādhava keśava // HV_App.I,31.333 //
GE07hv_apppu:12099: ity ādiśabdaḥ sumahān āvir āsīt tadā niśi /
GE07hv_apppu:12101: dhāvatāṃ ca śunāṃ rajan mṛgān anu vinardatām // HV_App.I,31.336 //
GE07hv_apppu:12103: gajānāṃ nardatāṃ rājan bṛṃhitāni tatas tataḥ // HV_App.I,31.338 //
GE07hv_apppu:12105: nādas trailokyavitrāsaḥ prādur āsīt tadā niśi // HV_App.I,31.340 //
GE07hv_apppu:12106: śrutvā taṃ tu harir devas tādṛśaṃ tatra viṣṭhitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:12107: samādhi kṣobhanipuṇaṃ niḥśvasya ca jagatpatiḥ // HV_App.I,31.342 //
GE07hv_apppu:12108: tataḥ sa cintayām āsa ko 'yam eṣa mahāsvanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:12109: kasyāyam īdṛśaḥ śabdaḥ stutiyukto mama tv iti // HV_App.I,31.344 //
GE07hv_apppu:12110: āhosvin mṛgayā śabdaḥ śunāṃ saṃcaratāṃ vane /
GE07hv_apppu:12111: mṛgāṇām atha sarveṣāṃ nādaś ca sumahān ayam /
GE07hv_apppu:12112: vyāmiśraḥ stutiyuktābhir vāgbhir mama samantataḥ // HV_App.I,31.347 //
GE07hv_apppu:12113: iti saṃcintya manasā diśo viprekṣya sarvataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:12114: tata āste haris tatra jñātuṃ tasya samudbhavam // HV_App.I,31.349 //
GE07hv_apppu:12115: tato mṛgāḥ samāyānti yatra tiṣṭhati keśavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:12116: tāṃś caivānucaro rājañ śvagaṇaḥ samapadyata // HV_App.I,31.351 //
GE07hv_apppu:12117: atha vai dīpikā rājañ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:12118: tatas tamo 'pi vyanaśad diveva samapadyata // HV_App.I,31.353 //
GE07hv_apppu:12119: tato 'nu bhūtasaṃghāś ca samadṛśyanta tatra ha /
GE07hv_apppu:12120: piśācāś ca mahāghorā nardanto bahuvisvaram // HV_App.I,31.355 //
GE07hv_apppu:12123: yatrāsau tiṣṭhate deva tāni tatraiva bhārata //
GE07hv_apppu:12125: prādur āsan mahāghorāḥ piśācā vikṛtānanāḥ // HV_App.I,31.357 //
GE07hv_apppu:12126: hanyamānā hatā rājan patantaḥ patitā mṛgāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:12127: itaś cetaś ca dhāvanto bāṇair viddhā mṛgadviṣaḥ // HV_App.I,31.359 //
GE07hv_apppu:12129: yatrāsau tiṣṭhate devas tatra yātāni bhārata // HV_App.I,31.361 //
GE07hv_apppu:12133: śvagaṇas tatra rājendra caraty eva tatas tataḥ // HV_App.I,31.365 //
GE07hv_apppu:12134: tataḥ sa bhagavān viṣṇuḥ sarvam ālokya viṣṭhitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:12135: vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā paśyann āste sma keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.367 //
GE07hv_apppu:12136: kasyaiṣa visṛto nādaḥ kasya vāyaṃ janaḥ patan /
GE07hv_apppu:12137: ko nu māṃ stauti bhaktyā tu bhaviṣye prītimān aham // HV_App.I,31.369 //
GE07hv_apppu:12138: kasya muktiḥ samāyātā prīte mayi sudurlabhā /
GE07hv_apppu:12139: iti saṃcintya bhagavān āste prākṛtavad dhariḥ // HV_App.I,31.371 //
GE07hv_apppu:12145: khādantau māṃsapiṭakaṃ pibantau śoṇitaṃ bahu // HV_App.I,31.375 //
GE07hv_apppu:12148: karṣantau śavayūthāni bāhubhyāṃ tatra tatra ha /
GE07hv_apppu:12149: hasantau vividhaṃ hāsaṃ svajātisadṛśaṃ nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.379 //
GE07hv_apppu:12154: vadantau kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇeti mādhaveti ca saṃtatam // HV_App.I,31.384 //
GE07hv_apppu:12155: kadā nu drakṣyate viṣṇuḥ sa idānīṃ kva tiṣṭhati // HV_App.I,31.385 //
GE07hv_apppu:12156: svāmī naḥ kutra vasati kuto draṣṭuṃ yatāmahe /
GE07hv_apppu:12157: atra vā kutra deveśaḥ kuto nu sthāsyate hariḥ // HV_App.I,31.387 //
GE07hv_apppu:12159: yam āhuḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ brahma brahmavido janāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:12160: tam ajaṃ puruṣaṃ viṣṇuṃ draṣṭum abhyudyatā vayam // HV_App.I,31.390 //
GE07hv_apppu:12162: tam ajaṃ viśvakartāraṃ kuto drakṣyāma sāṃpratam // HV_App.I,31.392 //
GE07hv_apppu:12164: taṃ devaṃ draṣṭum īśānaṃ yatāmaḥ sāṃprataṃ harim // HV_App.I,31.394 //
GE07hv_apppu:12166: paiśācīyaṃ samutpannā kathaṃ nau prāviśad balāt /
GE07hv_apppu:12168: aho nau duṣkṛtaṃ karma prāktane janmasaṃcaye /
GE07hv_apppu:12169: atraiva mahatī prītir vartate sarvadā tadā // HV_App.I,31.399 //
GE07hv_apppu:12170: yāvanno duṣkṛtaṃ karma tāvat sthāsyati tādṛśī /
GE07hv_apppu:12173: tathā hi tat phalaṃ ghoram adyāpi na nivartate // HV_App.I,31.403 //
GE07hv_apppu:12174: yat tāḥ smaḥ prāṇino hantuṃ śvagaṇaiḥ saha sāṃpratam /
GE07hv_apppu:12175: tathā hi prāṇino loke bālyam ādau samāsthitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:12176: ajñānāvṛtacittāś ca kṛtyākṛtyaṃ na jānate // HV_App.I,31.406 //
GE07hv_apppu:12180: tathā ca vṛddhabhāve tu vyādhibhir bahubhir vṛtāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:12182: yatante na hi vai śreyo vinaṣṭendriyagocarāḥ // HV_App.I,31.412 //
GE07hv_apppu:12183: tato mṛtā garbhavāse vasanti satataṃ narāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:12184: viṇmūtrakalile ghore duḥkhair bahubhir ācitāḥ // HV_App.I,31.414 //
GE07hv_apppu:12185: cyavante tu tato ghorād garbhāt saṃsāramaṇḍale /
GE07hv_apppu:12187: mahaty evaṃ sadā ghore saṃsāre duḥkhasaṃkule /
GE07hv_apppu:12191: etasmān na nivartante martyāḥ prākṛtabuddhayaḥ // HV_App.I,31.421 //
GE07hv_apppu:12192: imaṃ hatvā manuṣyendram idam asmād dharāmy aham /
GE07hv_apppu:12193: corayitvā dhanam idaṃ hariṣyāmy adya yāmy aham // HV_App.I,31.423 //
GE07hv_apppu:12194: nirbhartsyainam idaṃ śāntaṃ hariṣyāmi dhanaṃ balī /
GE07hv_apppu:12196: asyaiva duḥkhamūlasya saṃsārasya sadā hariḥ // HV_App.I,31.426 //
GE07hv_apppu:12199: taṃ vayaṃ sarvayatnena drakṣyāmaḥ sarvathā harim /
GE07hv_apppu:12200: itthaṃ piśācau bhāṣantau prādur āstāṃ hareḥ puraḥ // HV_App.I,31.430 //
GE07hv_apppu:12203: tataḥ sa bhagavān viṣṇuḥ piśācau māṃsabhakṣakau /
GE07hv_apppu:12206: sthitaṃ sukhāsane viṣṇuṃ dṛṣṭvā lokeśvaraṃ harim // HV_App.I,31.434 //
GE07hv_apppu:12207: tau ca gatvā samuddeśaṃ piśācau keśavasya ha /
GE07hv_apppu:12208: tatas tāv ūcatur viṣṇum antarīkṛtya keśavam // HV_App.I,31.436 //
GE07hv_apppu:12209: ko bhavān kasya vā martya kutaś cāgamyate tvayā /
GE07hv_apppu:12210: kimartham iha saṃprāpto vane ghoramṛgākule // HV_App.I,31.438 //
GE07hv_apppu:12212: śvāpadaiḥ sevyamāne ca vipine vyāghrasaṃkule // HV_App.I,31.440 //
GE07hv_apppu:12214: padmapatrekṣaṇaḥ śyāmaḥ padmābhaḥ śrīpatiḥ svayam // HV_App.I,31.442 //
GE07hv_apppu:12216: devo vā yadi vā yakṣo gandharvaḥ kiṃnaro 'pi vā // HV_App.I,31.444 //
GE07hv_apppu:12217: indro vā dhanado vāpi yamo 'tha varuṇo 'pi vā /
GE07hv_apppu:12218: ekākī vipine ghore dhyānārpitamanā iva // HV_App.I,31.446 //
GE07hv_apppu:12219: brūhi martya yathātattvaṃ jñātum icchāmi mānada /

GE07hv_apppu:12825: dadarśa viṣṇuṃ deveśaṃ tapantaṃ tapa uttamam /
GE07hv_apppu:12826: juhvānam agniṃ vidhivad dhavyair medhyair jagatpatim // HV_App.I,31.1028
GE07hv_apppu:12830: indrādyair devasaṃghaiś ca vṛtaṃ munigaṇaiḥ saha /
GE07hv_apppu:12831: acintyaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ dhyāyantaṃ kim api prabhum // HV_App.I,31.1033 //
GE07hv_apppu:12834: tato bhūtapiśācāś ca rākṣasā guhyakās tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:12835: munayo vipravaryāś ca jayaśabdaṃ pracakrire // HV_App.I,31.1037 //
GE07hv_apppu:12836: jaya deva jagannātha jaya rudra janārdana /
GE07hv_apppu:12837: jaya viṣṇo hṛṣīkeśa nārāyaṇa parāyaṇa // HV_App.I,31.1039 //
GE07hv_apppu:12838: jaya rudra purāṇātmañ jaya deva hareśvara /
GE07hv_apppu:12839: ādideva jagannātha jaya śaṃkara bhāvana // HV_App.I,31.1041 //
GE07hv_apppu:12841: jaya cakragadāpāṇe jaya śūliṃs trilocana // HV_App.I,31.1043 //
GE07hv_apppu:12843: iti te munayaḥ sarve praṇāmaṃ cakrire harim // HV_App.I,31.1045 //
GE07hv_apppu:12844: tata utthāya bhagavān dṛṣṭvā devam avasthitam /
GE07hv_apppu:12846: tato hṛṣṭamanā viśṇus tuṣṭāva haram īśvaram // HV_App.I,31.1048 //
GE07hv_apppu:12849: namas te astu śociṣe namas te upavāsine // HV_App.I,31.1050 //
GE07hv_apppu:12850: namas te astu mīḍhuṣe nams te gadine hara /
GE07hv_apppu:12851: namas te viśvamūrtaye vṛṣāya vṛṣarūpiṇe // HV_App.I,31.1052 //
GE07hv_apppu:12854: amūrtāya ca devāya namas te 'stu pinākine /
GE07hv_apppu:12857: [k: The *--passage after line 1233 is also numbered as *11! :k]
GE07hv_apppu:12858: nāmaḥ kubjāya kūpāya śivāya śivarūpiṇe // HV_App.I,31.1054 //
GE07hv_apppu:12859: namas tuṇḍāya tuṣṭāya namas tuṭituṭāya ca /
GE07hv_apppu:12860: namaḥ śivāya śāntāya giriśāya ca te namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1056 //
GE07hv_apppu:12861: namo harāya hiprāya namo hariharāya ca /
GE07hv_apppu:12864: namaḥ śarvāya śāntāya bhūtādhipataye namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1060 //
GE07hv_apppu:12866: nama ādyāya bījāya śucaye bhasmarūpiṇe // HV_App.I,31.1062 //
GE07hv_apppu:12868: namas te khaṭvahastāya namas te kṛttivāsase // HV_App.I,31.1064 //
GE07hv_apppu:12870: harāya harirūpāya namas te tigmatejase // HV_App.I,31.1066 //
GE07hv_apppu:12873: namaś candrāya devāya sūryāya ca namo namaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:12874: namaḥ pradhānadevāya bhūtānāṃ pataye namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1070 //
GE07hv_apppu:12876: ajāya ca namas tubhyaṃ bhūtabhāvana bhāvana // HV_App.I,31.1072 //
GE07hv_apppu:12884: tryambakāya namas tubhyaṃ tryakṣāya ca śivāya ca // HV_App.I,31.1080 //
GE07hv_apppu:12886: nama idhmāya haviṣe dhruvāya ca kuśāya ca // HV_App.I,31.1082 //
GE07hv_apppu:12892: virūpāya surūpāya mahāghorāya te namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1088 //
GE07hv_apppu:12896: bhūtāvāsa namas tubhyaṃ sarvāvāsa namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1092 //
GE07hv_apppu:12897: namaḥ sarvātmane tubhyaṃ namas te bhūtidāyine /
GE07hv_apppu:12898: nams te vāmadevāya mahādevāya te namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1094 //
GE07hv_apppu:12899: kā nu vākstutirūpā te ko nu stotuṃ praśaknuyāt /
GE07hv_apppu:12900: kasya vā sphurate jihvā stutau stutimatāṃ vara // HV_App.I,31.1096 //
GE07hv_apppu:12901: kṣamasva bhagavan deva bhakto 'haṃ dhyāhi māṃ hara /
GE07hv_apppu:12902: sarvātman sarvabhūteśa dhyāhi māṃ satataṃ hara // HV_App.I,31.1098 //
GE07hv_apppu:12903: rakṣa deva jagannātha lokān sarvātmanā hara /
GE07hv_apppu:12904: dhyāhi bhaktān sadā deva bhaktapriya sadā hara // HV_App.I,31.1100 //
GE07hv_apppu:12907: tato vṛṣadhvajo devaḥ śūlī sākṣād umāpatiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:12908: karaṃ kareṇa saṃspṛśya viṣṇoś cakradharasya ha // HV_App.I,31.1102 //
GE07hv_apppu:12912: tapaścaryā kim arthaṃ te prārthanā tava kā vibho /
GE07hv_apppu:12913: svayaṃ viṣṇur bhavān nityas tapas tvaṃ tapasāṃ hare // HV_App.I,31.1107 //
GE07hv_apppu:12914: putrārthaṃ yadi te deva tapaścaryā janārdana /
GE07hv_apppu:12915: putro datto mayā deva pūrvam eva jagatpate // HV_App.I,31.1109 //
GE07hv_apppu:12916: śṛṇu tatrāpi bhagavan kāraṇaṃ kāraṇātmaka // HV_App.I,31.1110 //
GE07hv_apppu:12917: tapaś cartuṃ pravṛtto 'ham kutaścit kāraṇād dhare /
GE07hv_apppu:12918: varṣāyutaṃ mahāghoram purā kṛtayuge tadā // HV_App.I,31.1112 //
GE07hv_apppu:12919: bhavānī tatra me deva paricartuṃ tadābhavat /
GE07hv_apppu:12921: bhīta indras tadā deva māraṃ māṃ praiṣayat tadā // HV_App.I,31.1115 //
GE07hv_apppu:12922: madhunā saha saṃyukto māro mām āgatas tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:12923: lakṣyaṃ mām akarot tatra bāṇasya preṣitasya ha // HV_App.I,31.1117 //
GE07hv_apppu:12924: eṣā māṃ sevate tatra dānāt puṣpādinā hare // HV_App.I,31.1118 //
GE07hv_apppu:12925: tataḥ kruddho 'ham abhavaṃ dṛṣṭvā māraṃ tathāvidham /
GE07hv_apppu:12926: krudhyato mama deveśa netrād agniḥ papāta ha // HV_App.I,31.1120 //
GE07hv_apppu:12927: so 'yam agnis tadā māraṃ bhasmasāt kṛtavāṃs tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:12928: acintayaṃ tadā viṣṇo śakrasyaitac cikīrṣitam // HV_App.I,31.1122 //
GE07hv_apppu:12929: tataḥprabhṛti deveśa dayā taṃ prati vartate /
GE07hv_apppu:12930: brahmaṇā ca niyukto 'smi prītas tatra janārdana // HV_App.I,31.1124 //
GE07hv_apppu:12931: niyuktaḥ putrarūpeṇa sa te deva jagatpate /
GE07hv_apppu:12932: jyeṣṭhas tava suto deva pradyumnety abhiviśrutaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1126 //
GE07hv_apppu:12933: smaraṃ taṃ viddhi deveśa nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GE07hv_apppu:12934: ity uktvā punar āhedaṃ yāthātmyaṃ darśayann iva /
GE07hv_apppu:12935: munīnāṃ śrotukāmānāṃ yāthātmyaṃ tatra sattama // HV_App.I,31.1129 //
GE07hv_apppu:12936: añjaliṃ saṃpuṭaṃ kṛtvā viṣṇum uddiśya śaṃkaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:12937: umayā sārdham īśāno yāthātmyaṃ vaktum aihata // HV_App.I,31.1131 //
GE07hv_apppu:12940: añjaliṃ cakrire viṣṇau devadeveśvare harau // HV_App.I,31.1134 //
GE07hv_apppu:12942: yat tat kāraṇam āhus tat sāṃkhyāḥ prakṛtisaṃjñitam /
GE07hv_apppu:12944: sattvaṃ rajas tamo viṣṇo jagadaṇḍaṃ janārdana /
GE07hv_apppu:12945: tasya kāraṇam āhus tvāṃ sāṃkhyās tattvavido hare /
GE07hv_apppu:12947: tato mahān samutpannaḥ prakṛtir yasya kāraṇam /
GE07hv_apppu:12948: tasmāt tu mahato ghorād ahaṃkāro mahān abhūt /
GE07hv_apppu:12949: sa tvam ādau jagannātha pariṇāmas tathā hi saḥ // HV_App.I,31.1142 //
GE07hv_apppu:12950: ahaṃkārāt prabho deva kāraṇāni mahānti ca /
GE07hv_apppu:12951: tanmātrāṇi tathā pañca bhūtāni prabhavanty uta // HV_App.I,31.1144 //
GE07hv_apppu:12952: tāni tvām āhur īśānaṃ bhūtānīti jagatpate /
GE07hv_apppu:12953: pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam // HV_App.I,31.1146 //
GE07hv_apppu:12954: cakṣur ghrāṇaṃ tathā sparṣo rasanā śrotram eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:12955: manaḥ ṣaṣṭhaṃ tathā deva prerakaṃ tatra tatra ha // HV_App.I,31.1148 //
GE07hv_apppu:12957: tvam eva tāni sarvāṇi karoṣi niyatātmavān // HV_App.I,31.1150 //
GE07hv_apppu:12958: sveṣu sveṣu jagannātha viṣayeṣu tathā hare /
GE07hv_apppu:12960: yadā tvaṃ rajasā yuktas tadā bhūtāni sṛṣṭavān /
GE07hv_apppu:12961: yadā ca sattvayukto 'si tadā pātā jagattrayam // HV_App.I,31.1154 //
GE07hv_apppu:12962: yadā te tama utkṛṣṭaṃ tadā saṃharase jagat /
GE07hv_apppu:12963: tribhir eva guṇair yuktaḥ sṛṣṭirakṣāvināśane // HV_App.I,31.1156 //
GE07hv_apppu:12967: tasmāt sarvatra bhūteṣu vartase sarvago bhavān // HV_App.I,31.1160 //
GE07hv_apppu:12968: brahmā tvaṃ sṛṣṭikāle tu sthitau viṣṇur asi prabho /
GE07hv_apppu:12969: saṃhāre rudranāmāsi tridhāmā tvam iti prabho // HV_App.I,31.1162 //
GE07hv_apppu:12970: bhūmir āpo 'nalo vāyuḥ khaṃ mano buddhir eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:12971: etāḥ prakṛtayo deva bhinnāḥ sarvatra te hare // HV_App.I,31.1164 //
GE07hv_apppu:12974: bhūmiṃ sarvām imāṃ prāpya saptadvīpāṃ sasāgarām /
GE07hv_apppu:12975: aṇuḥ sarvatrago bhūtvā atyatiṣṭhad daśāṅgulam // HV_App.I,31.1168 //
GE07hv_apppu:12976: tvam evedaṃ jagat sarvaṃ yad bhūtaṃ yad bhaviṣyati /
GE07hv_apppu:12977: tvatto virāṭ prādur abhūt samrāṭ caiva janārdana // HV_App.I,31.1170 //
GE07hv_apppu:12979: prādur āsīt purāṇātman ṣaṭkarmanirataḥ sadā // HV_App.I,31.1172 //
GE07hv_apppu:12980: rājanyas tu tathā bāhvor āsīt saṃrakṣaṇe rataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:12981: ūrvor vaiśyas tathā viṣṇo pādāc chūdra udāhṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:12982: evaṃ varṇā jagannātha tava dehāt sanātanāt // HV_App.I,31.1175 //
GE07hv_apppu:12986: yasya bhāsā jagat sarvaṃ bhāsate bhānumānasau // HV_App.I,31.1179 //
GE07hv_apppu:12987: mukhād indraś cāgniś ca prāṇād vāyur ajāyata /
GE07hv_apppu:12988: nābher antarikṣam utpannaṃ tava deva janārdana // HV_App.I,31.1181 //
GE07hv_apppu:12989: dyaur āsīt tu mahāghorā śirasas tava gopate /
GE07hv_apppu:12990: padbhyāṃ bhūmiḥ samutpannā diśaḥ śrotrāj jagatpate /
GE07hv_apppu:12991: evaṃ sṛṣṭvā jagat sarvaṃ vyāpya sarvaṃ vyavasthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1184 //
GE07hv_apppu:12992: vyāpya sarvān imāṃl lokān sthitaḥ sarvatra keśava /
GE07hv_apppu:12993: tataś ca viṣṇunāmāsi dhātor vyāpteś ca darśanāt // HV_App.I,31.1186 //
GE07hv_apppu:12994: nārā āpaḥ samākhyātās tāsām ayanam āditaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:12995: yatas tvaṃ bhūtabhavyeśa tan nārāyaṇaśabditaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1188 //
GE07hv_apppu:12997: harasi prāṇino deva tato harir iti smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1190 //
GE07hv_apppu:12998: śaṃ karoṣi sadā deva tataḥ śaṃkaranāmavān /
GE07hv_apppu:12999: bṛhattvād bṛṃhaṇatvāc ca tasmād brahmeti śabditaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13001: hṛṣīkāṇīndriyāṇy āhus teṣām īśo yato bhavān /
GE07hv_apppu:13002: hṛṣīkeśas tato viṣṇo khyāto vedeṣu paṭhyate // HV_App.I,31.1195 //
GE07hv_apppu:13004: āvāṃ tavāṅge saṃbhūtau tataḥ keśavanāmavān // HV_App.I,31.1197 //
GE07hv_apppu:13005: mā vidyā ca hare proktā tasyā īśo yato bhavān /
GE07hv_apppu:13006: tasmān mādhavanāmāsi dhavaḥ svāmīti śabditaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1199 //
GE07hv_apppu:13007: gaur eṣā tu yato vāṇī tāṃ ca veda yato bhavān /
GE07hv_apppu:13008: govindas tu tato deva munibhiḥ kathyate bhavān // HV_App.I,31.1201 //
GE07hv_apppu:13009: trir ity eva trayo vedāḥ kīrtitā munisattamaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13010: kramate tāṃs tathā sarvāṃs trivikrama iti smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1203 //
GE07hv_apppu:13012: mananān munir evāsi yamanād yatir ucyase // HV_App.I,31.1205 //
GE07hv_apppu:13013: apaś carasi yasmāt tvaṃ tapasvīti ca śabditaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13014: vasanti tvayi bhūtāni bhūtāvāsas tato hare // HV_App.I,31.1207 //
GE07hv_apppu:13015: īśas tvaṃ sarvabhūtānām īśvaro 'si tato hare /
GE07hv_apppu:13016: praṇavaḥ sarvavedānāṃ gāyatrī chandasāṃ prabho // HV_App.I,31.1209 //
GE07hv_apppu:13017: akṣarāṇām akāras tvaṃ sphoṭas tvaṃ varṇasaṃśrayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13018: rudrāṇām aham evāsmi vasūnāṃ pāvako bhavān /
GE07hv_apppu:13019: ādityānāṃ bhavān viṣṇur indro deveśvaro bhavān // HV_App.I,31.1212 //
GE07hv_apppu:13021: merus tvaṃ parvatendrāṇāṃ devarṣīṇāṃ ca nāradaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1214 //
GE07hv_apppu:13023: sarpāṇām eva sarveṣāṃ bhavān vāsukisaṃjñakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1216 //
GE07hv_apppu:13024: guhyakānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ bhavān dhanada eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:13025: varuṇo yādasāṃ rājā gaṅgā tripathagā bhavān // HV_App.I,31.1218 //
GE07hv_apppu:13026: ādis tvaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ madhyam antas tathā bhavān /
GE07hv_apppu:13027: tvattaḥ samabhavad viśvaṃ tvayi sarvaṃ pralīyate // HV_App.I,31.1220 //
GE07hv_apppu:13028: ahaṃ tvaṃ sarvago deva tvam evāhaṃ janārdana /
GE07hv_apppu:13029: āvayor antaraṃ nāsti śabdair arthair jagatpate // HV_App.I,31.1222 //
GE07hv_apppu:13030: nāmāni tava govinda yāni loke mahānti ca /
GE07hv_apppu:13031: tāny eva mama nāmāni nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // HV_App.I,31.1224 //
GE07hv_apppu:13033: yaś ca tvāṃ dveṣṭi deveśa sa māṃ dveṣṭi na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1226 //
GE07hv_apppu:13034: tvadvistāro yato deva ahaṃ bhūtapatis tataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13035: na tad asti vinā deva yat te virahitaṃ hare // HV_App.I,31.1228 //
GE07hv_apppu:13036: yad āsīd vartate yac ca yac ca bhāvi jagatpate /
GE07hv_apppu:13037: sarvaṃ tvam eva deveśa vinā kiṃcit tvayā na hi // HV_App.I,31.1230 //
GE07hv_apppu:13038: stuvanti devāḥ satataṃ bhavantaṃ svair guṇaiḥ prabho /
GE07hv_apppu:13039: ṛk ca tvaṃ yajur evāsi sāmāsi satataṃ vibho // HV_App.I,31.1232 //
GE07hv_apppu:13040: kiṃ ucyate mayā deva sarvaṃ tvaṃ bhūtabhāvanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13042: namaḥ sarvātmane deva munīn āha punaḥ śivaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13043: evaṃ jānīta he viprā ye bhaktā draṣṭum āgatāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13044: etad eva paraṃ vastu naitasmāt param asti vaḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:13045: [k: This is a second occurrence of the reference *11. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:13046: namaḥ sarvātmane deva viṣṇo mādhava keśava // HV_App.I,31.1234 //
GE07hv_apppu:13047: namas karomi sarvātman namas te 'stu sadā hare /
GE07hv_apppu:13048: namaḥ puṣkaranābhāya vande tvām aham īśvara // HV_App.I,31.1236 //
GE07hv_apppu:13051: ity uktvā devadeveśaṃ munīn āha punaḥ śivaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13052: evaṃ jānīta he viprā ye bhaktā draṣṭum āgatāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1238 //
GE07hv_apppu:13053: etad eva paraṃ vastu naitasmāt param asti vaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13054: etad eva vijānīdhvam etad vaḥ paramaṃ tapaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1240 //
GE07hv_apppu:13055: etad eva sadā viprā dhyeyaṃ prathatamānasaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13056: etad vaḥ paramaṃ śreya etad vaḥ paramaṃ tapaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1242 //
GE07hv_apppu:13057: etad vo janmanaḥ kṛtyam etad vas tapasaḥ phalam /
GE07hv_apppu:13058: eṣa vaḥ puṇyanicaya eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1244 //
GE07hv_apppu:13059: eṣa vo mokṣavaśaga eṣa mārga udāhṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13060: eṣa puṇyapradaḥ sākṣād etad vaḥ karmaṇāṃ phalam // HV_App.I,31.1246 //
GE07hv_apppu:13062: eṣā trayīgatir viprāḥ prārthyā brahmavidāṃ sadā // HV_App.I,31.1248 //
GE07hv_apppu:13064: eṣa brahmavidāṃ mārgaḥ kathito vedavādibhiḥ // HV_App.I,31.1250 //
GE07hv_apppu:13065: evam eva vijānīta nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GE07hv_apppu:13066: harir ekaḥ sadā dhyeyo bhavadbhiḥ sattvasaṃsthitaiḥ // HV_App.I,31.1252 //
GE07hv_apppu:13068: nānyo jagati devo 'sti viṣṇor nārāyaṇāt paraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13069: om ity evaṃ sadā viprāḥ paṭhadhvaṃ dhyāta keśavam /
GE07hv_apppu:13070: tato niḥśreyasaprāptir bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1254 //
GE07hv_apppu:13071: evaṃ dhyāto hariḥ sākṣāt prasanno vo bhaviṣyati /
GE07hv_apppu:13072: bhavanāśam ayaṃ devaḥ kariṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1256 //
GE07hv_apppu:13073: sadā dhyāta hariṃ viprā yadīcchā prāptum īśvaram /
GE07hv_apppu:13075: smaradhvaṃ sarvadā viṣṇuṃ paṭhadhvaṃ triśarīriṇam // HV_App.I,31.1259 //
GE07hv_apppu:13078: dhyātvā māṃ sarvayatnena tato jānīta keśavam /
GE07hv_apppu:13079: upāsyo 'yaṃ sadā viprā upāyo 'smi hare smṛtau // HV_App.I,31.1263 //
GE07hv_apppu:13080: upāyo 'yaṃ mayā prokto nātra saṃdeha ity api /
GE07hv_apppu:13081: ayaṃ māyī sadā viprā yatadhvaṃ māyanāśane // HV_App.I,31.1265 //
GE07hv_apppu:13082: yathā vo buddhir akhilā śuddhā bhavati yatnataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13083: tathā kuruta viprendrā yathā devaḥ prasīdati // HV_App.I,31.1267 //
GE07hv_apppu:13084: evam uktās tataḥ sarve yatayaḥ puṇyaśālinaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13086: yathāvad upagṛhṇānā nirastāḥ saṃśayān nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.1269 //
GE07hv_apppu:13087: evam eveti te viprāḥ prāhuḥ prāñjalayo haram /
GE07hv_apppu:13088: chinno naḥ saṃśayaḥ sarvo gṛhīto 'rthaḥ sa tādṛśaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1271 //
GE07hv_apppu:13090: saṃgamād yuvayoḥ sarvo naṣṭo moho mahān iha /
GE07hv_apppu:13091: yathā vadasi deveśa tathā naḥ śreyase param // HV_App.I,31.1274 //
GE07hv_apppu:13092: yathāha bhagavān rudro yatāmaḥ satataṃ harau /
GE07hv_apppu:13093: iti te munayaḥ prītāḥ praṇemuḥ keśavaṃ harim // HV_App.I,31.1276 //
GE07hv_apppu:13096: tataḥ sa bhagavān rudraḥ sarvān vismāpayann iva /
GE07hv_apppu:13097: stutyā pracakrame stotuṃ viṣṇuṃ viśveśvaraṃ harim /
GE07hv_apppu:13098: arthyābhiḥ śrutiyuktābhir munīnāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ tadā // HV_App.I,31.1279 //
GE07hv_apppu:13100: yasya bhāsā jagat sarvaṃ bhāsate nityam acyuta /
GE07hv_apppu:13101: namo bhagavate deva nityaṃ sūryātmane namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1282 //
GE07hv_apppu:13102: yaḥ śītayati śītāṃśur lokān sarvān imān prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13103: namas te viṣṇave deva tubhyaṃ somātmane namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1284 //
GE07hv_apppu:13104: yaḥ prajāḥ prāṇayaty eko viśvātmā bhūtabhāvanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13105: namaḥ sarvātmane deva namo vāyvātmane hare // HV_App.I,31.1286 //
GE07hv_apppu:13106: yo dadhāra kareṇāsau kuśacīrādi yat sadā /
GE07hv_apppu:13107: dadhāra vedān sarvāṃś ca tubhyaṃ brahmātmane namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1288 //
GE07hv_apppu:13108: sarvān saṃharate yas tu saṃhāre viśvadṛk sadā /
GE07hv_apppu:13109: krodhātmā viśvarūpo 'si tubhyaṃ rudrātmane namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1290 //
GE07hv_apppu:13111: ajāya viṣṇave tubhyaṃ sraṣṭre viśvasṛje namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1292 //
GE07hv_apppu:13113: namas te devadeveśa pradhānāya namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1294 //
GE07hv_apppu:13115: dṛḍhāya dṛḍharūpāya tubhyaṃ gandhātmane namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1296 //
GE07hv_apppu:13117: namas te viśvarūpāya rasāya ca namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1298 //
GE07hv_apppu:13118: tejasā bhāsvaro yas tu guṇo jantuhitaḥ sadā /
GE07hv_apppu:13119: tasmai deva jagannātha namo bhāsvararūpiṇe // HV_App.I,31.1300 //
GE07hv_apppu:13121: namas te vāyurūpāya namaḥ sparśātmane hare // HV_App.I,31.1302 //
GE07hv_apppu:13123: namas te bhagavan viṣṇo tubhyaṃ śabdātmane namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1304 //
GE07hv_apppu:13127: acintyāya sucintyāya tasmai cintyātmane namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1308 //
GE07hv_apppu:13129: namo brahmavide tubhyaṃ brahmabrahmātmane namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1310 //
GE07hv_apppu:13133: viśvahartre namo nityaṃ bhūtāvāsa namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1314 //
GE07hv_apppu:13137: namaḥ sūryāya bhadrāya tejasāṃ pataye namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1318 //
GE07hv_apppu:13138: namaḥ somāya saumyāya namaḥ śītātmane hare /
GE07hv_apppu:13143: namaḥ sruvāya pātrāya yajñāṅgāya parāya ca // HV_App.I,31.1322 //
GE07hv_apppu:13148: gadine khaḍgine tubhyaṃ śaṅkhine cakriṇe namaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13149: śūline carmiṇe nityaṃ varadāya namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1326 //
GE07hv_apppu:13151: haraye viṣṇave tubhyaṃ namaḥ sarvātmane guro // HV_App.I,31.1328 //
GE07hv_apppu:13152: namas te sarvalokeśa sarvakartre namo namaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13153: namaḥ svabhāvaśuddhāya namas te yajñasūkara // HV_App.I,31.1330 //
GE07hv_apppu:13154: namo viṣṇo namo viṣṇo namo viṣṇo namo hare /
GE07hv_apppu:13155: namas te vāsudevāya vāsudevāya dhīmate // HV_App.I,31.1332 //
GE07hv_apppu:13156: namaḥ kṛṣṇāya kṛṣṇāya sarvāvāsa namo namaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13157: namo bhūyo namas te 'stu pāhi lokāñ janārdana // HV_App.I,31.1334 //
GE07hv_apppu:13159: idaṃ stotram adhīyānā nityaṃ vrajata keśavam /
GE07hv_apppu:13160: śaraṇyaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ tatra śreyo vidhāsyati // HV_App.I,31.1337 //
GE07hv_apppu:13162: teṣāṃ prītaḥ prasannātmā paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ hariḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13163: śreyo dāsyati sarvātmā nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // HV_App.I,31.1340 //
GE07hv_apppu:13165: śreyaḥ prāptuṃ yadīcchanti bhavantaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1342 //
GE07hv_apppu:13167: sagaṇaḥ śaṃkaraḥ sākṣād umayā bhūtabhāvanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1344 //
GE07hv_apppu:13168: tatas te munayaḥ sarve parāṃ nirvṛtim āpnuyuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13170: tam eva paramaṃ tattvaṃ matvā nārāyaṇaṃ harim /
GE07hv_apppu:13171: vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā menire svakṛtārthatām // HV_App.I,31.1346 //
GE07hv_apppu:13172: lokapālās tadā viṣṇuṃ namaskṛtya hariṃ tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:13173: jagmuḥ svānyatha veśmāni gaṇaiḥ sarvair nṛpottama // HV_App.I,31.1348 //
GE07hv_apppu:13175: śaṅkhī cakrī gadī khaḍgī śārṅgī tūṇītalatravān // HV_App.I,31.1350 //
GE07hv_apppu:13178: tatra gatvā yathāyogaṃ viśramya harir īśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13179: arcito munibhiḥ sarvair niṣasāda sukhāsane // HV_App.I,31.1354 //
GE07hv_apppu:13182: etasminn eva kāle tu pauṇḍro nṛpavaro nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:13184: vṛṣṇiśatrus tadā rājā kṛṣṇadveṣṭā balāt tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:13185: nṛpān sarvān samāhūya provāca nṛpasaṃsadi // HV_App.I,31.1358 //
GE07hv_apppu:13186: jitā ca pṛthivī sarvā jitāś ca nṛpasattamāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13187: vṛṣṇayas te balonmattāḥ kṛṣṇam āśritya garvitāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1360 //
GE07hv_apppu:13188: na dāsyanti karaṃ sarve mama te kṛṣṇasaṃśrayāt /
GE07hv_apppu:13189: sa tu kṛṣṇaś ca balavān mām avajñāya tiṣṭhati // HV_App.I,31.1362 //
GE07hv_apppu:13190: ahaṃ cakrīti garvo 'bhūt tasya gopasya sarvadā /
GE07hv_apppu:13192: evamādir mahāgarvas tasya saṃprati vartate // HV_App.I,31.1365 //
GE07hv_apppu:13193: loke ca mama yan nāma vāsudeveti nityaśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13194: agṛhṇān mama tan nāma gopo madabalānvitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1367 //
GE07hv_apppu:13195: tasya cakrasya yac cakraṃ mamāpi niśitaṃ mahat /
GE07hv_apppu:13196: garvahantṛ sadā tasya bali nāmnā sudarśanam // HV_App.I,31.1369 //
GE07hv_apppu:13198: anena mahatā cakraṃ gopakasya nṛpottamāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1371 //
GE07hv_apppu:13199: mamāpy etad dhanur divyaṃ śārṅgaṃ nāma mahāvaram /
GE07hv_apppu:13200: nāśayāmi na saṃdehaś cakraṃ tasya yad adbhutam // HV_App.I,31.1373 //
GE07hv_apppu:13202: tasya śaṅkhasya jetāsau paśyadhvaṃ nṛpasattamāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1375 //
GE07hv_apppu:13203: gadā kaumodakī nāma mameyaṃ mahatī dṛḍhā /
GE07hv_apppu:13206: antakasyāntako ghoras tasya khaḍgasya nāśakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1379 //
GE07hv_apppu:13207: tataś cāhaṃ gadī khaḍgī śārṅgī cakrī talatravān /
GE07hv_apppu:13208: yudhi jetāsmi kṛṣṇasya nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // HV_App.I,31.1381 //
GE07hv_apppu:13209: māṃ ca brūta nṛpāś caivaṃ gadinaṃ cakriṇaṃ tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:13210: śaṅkhinaṃ śārṅgiṇaṃ vīraṃ brūta nityaṃ nṛpottamāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13211: vāsudeveti māṃ brūta na tu gopaṃ yadūttamam // HV_App.I,31.1384 //
GE07hv_apppu:13212: eko 'haṃ vāsudevo hi hatvā taṃ gopadārakam /
GE07hv_apppu:13213: sakhyur mama nihantāraṃ narakasya mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1386 //
GE07hv_apppu:13214: māṃ tathā yadi na brūta daṇḍyā bhāraṃ śataṃ śatam /
GE07hv_apppu:13215: suvarṇasya ca niṣkasya dhānyānāṃ bahuśas tathā // HV_App.I,31.1388 //
GE07hv_apppu:13216: tathā bruvati rājendre manasā duḥsahaṃ tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:13218: rasajñā balavīryasya keśavasya sadā nṛpāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1391 //
GE07hv_apppu:13219: apare tu nṛpā rājann evam eveti cukruśuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13220: anye balamadotsiktā jeṣyāmaḥ keśavaṃ raṇe // HV_App.I,31.1393 //
GE07hv_apppu:13224: nāradaḥ sarvalokajñaḥ pauṇḍrasya nagaraṃ prati // HV_App.I,31.1395 //
GE07hv_apppu:13226: dvāḥsthena ca samājñaptaḥ praviveśa gṛhottamam // HV_App.I,31.1397 //
GE07hv_apppu:13230: uvāca nāradaṃ bhūyaḥ pauṇḍrako balagarvitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1401 //
GE07hv_apppu:13234: agamyaṃ tava viprendra brahmāṇḍe 'tra na kiṃcana // HV_App.I,31.1405 //
GE07hv_apppu:13235: nāradaivaṃ vada tvaṃ hi yatra yatra gataḥ sadā /
GE07hv_apppu:13236: tatra tatra tapaḥsiddho loke prathitavīryavān // HV_App.I,31.1407 //
GE07hv_apppu:13237: pauṇḍra eva balī khyāto vāsudeveti śabditaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13238: śaṅkhī cakrī gadī śārṅgī khaḍgī tūṇītalatravān // HV_App.I,31.1409 //
GE07hv_apppu:13240: bhoktā rājyasya sarvasya śāstā rājñāṃ balād balī /
GE07hv_apppu:13241: ajeyaḥ śatrusainyānāṃ rakṣitā svajanasya ha // HV_App.I,31.1412 //
GE07hv_apppu:13243: tasya vīryabale na sto nāmnaś ca mama dhāraṇe // HV_App.I,31.1414 //
GE07hv_apppu:13244: sa hi gopo vṛthā bālyād dhārayaty eva nāma me /
GE07hv_apppu:13245: idaṃ niścinu viprendra eka eva bhavāmy aham // HV_App.I,31.1416 //
GE07hv_apppu:13246: vāsudevo jagaty asmin nirjitya balinaṃ yadum /
GE07hv_apppu:13247: vṛṣṇīn sarvān balāj jitvā nirdahiṣye ca tāṃ purīṃ // HV_App.I,31.1418 //
GE07hv_apppu:13249: ete ca balinaḥ sarve nṛpā mama samāgatāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1420 //
GE07hv_apppu:13250: aśvāś ca veginaḥ santi rathā vāyujavā mama /
GE07hv_apppu:13251: nāgā mattāḥ sahasraṃ ca śataṃ niyutam eva ca // HV_App.I,31.1422 //
GE07hv_apppu:13253: tasmād evaṃ sadā vipra vada brahman pure mama // HV_App.I,31.1424 //
GE07hv_apppu:13254: indrasyāpi sadā vipra vada nārada sāṃpratam /
GE07hv_apppu:13255: prārthanaiṣā mama vibho namasye tvāṃ tapodhana // HV_App.I,31.1426 //
GE07hv_apppu:13258: avāryaḥ sarvalokeṣu gamane kenacin nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.1428 //
GE07hv_apppu:13259: kiṃ tu vaktuṃ tathā rājan notsahe nṛpasattama /
GE07hv_apppu:13260: mahīṃ śāsati deveśe cakrapāṇau janārdane // HV_App.I,31.1430 //
GE07hv_apppu:13261: viṣṇau sarvatrage deve duṣṭān hatvā sabāndhavān /
GE07hv_apppu:13262: vāsudeveti ko nāma tiṣṭhaty asmin harāv iti /
GE07hv_apppu:13263: ko nāma vaktum evaṃ hi kṛṣṇe śāsati gopatau // HV_App.I,31.1433 //
GE07hv_apppu:13264: ajñānād vaktum evaṃ cet samarthaḥ prākṛto janaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13265: hariḥ sarvatrago viṣṇur darpaṃ te vyaneṣyati // HV_App.I,31.1435 //
GE07hv_apppu:13267: ādidevaḥ purāṇātmā darpaṃ te vyapaneṣyati // HV_App.I,31.1437 //
GE07hv_apppu:13268: hāsyam etan mahārājan yac cakraṃ tava saṃsthitam /
GE07hv_apppu:13269: śārṅgaṃ śaṅkhaṃ tathā rājan gadā ghoratarā hi te /
GE07hv_apppu:13270: atīva hāsakālo 'yaṃ tava saṃprati vartate // HV_App.I,31.1440 //
GE07hv_apppu:13274: nāradaṃ vipravaryaṃ taṃ provāca nṛpasaṃsadi // HV_App.I,31.1442 //
GE07hv_apppu:13275: mā maivaṃ vada devarṣe rājāhaṃ vijayī sadā /
GE07hv_apppu:13276: gaccha tvaṃ kāmam adyaiva muniḥ śāpapradaḥ sadā /
GE07hv_apppu:13277: bhītas tvatto mahābuddhe gaccha tvaṃ kāmam atra ha // HV_App.I,31.1445 //
GE07hv_apppu:13278: ity ukto nṛpavīryeṇa tūṣṇīm eva sa nāradaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13280: sa gatvā viṣṇusakāśaṃ viṣṇoḥ sarvaṃ śaśaṃsa ha // HV_App.I,31.1448 //
GE07hv_apppu:13281: tac chrutvā bhagavān viṣṇur yatheṣṭaṃ vadatām iti /
GE07hv_apppu:13283: ity uktvā virarāmaiva tasmin badarikāśrame // HV_App.I,31.1451 //
GE07hv_apppu:13284: tataḥ pauṇḍro mahāvīryo balair bahubhir īśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13285: aśvair anekasāhasrair gajair bahubhir anvitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1453 //
GE07hv_apppu:13290: prayutaṃ pattisāhasraṃ tad balaṃ samapadyata // HV_App.I,31.1458 //
GE07hv_apppu:13292: virarāja mahārāja udayastho yathā raviḥ // HV_App.I,31.1460 //
GE07hv_apppu:13294: pattayo dīpikāhastā rātrau mahati dāruṇe // HV_App.I,31.1462 //
GE07hv_apppu:13297: rathaṃ mahāntam āruhya śastraughaiś ca samanvitam /
GE07hv_apppu:13305: hantum aicchaj jagannāthaṃ vṛṣṇīṃś caiva samantataḥ // HV_App.I,31.1473 //
GE07hv_apppu:13306: ākarṣan balamukhyāṃs tān rājñaḥ sarvān mahādyutiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13308: idaṃ provāca rājā tu nṛpān sarvān avasthitān // HV_App.I,31.1476 //
GE07hv_apppu:13309: tāḍyatām atra bherī tu nāma viśrāvya māmakam /
GE07hv_apppu:13310: yudhyatāṃ yudhyatām atra deyaṃ vā pratidīyatām // HV_App.I,31.1478 //
GE07hv_apppu:13313: iti te preṣitāḥ sarve samāghnaṃs tūryakān bahūn /
GE07hv_apppu:13314: dīpikāś ca pradīpyante bahvyaḥ śatasahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1482 //
GE07hv_apppu:13315: itaś cetaś ca rājāno vartante yuddhalālasāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13316: purīṃ te paritas tasthuḥ kṣatriyāḥ śastriṇas tathā // HV_App.I,31.1484 //
GE07hv_apppu:13318: kuto nu vṛṣṇipravaraḥ kuto rājā jagatpatiḥ // HV_App.I,31.1486 //
GE07hv_apppu:13319: kutaś ca sātyakir vīraḥ kuto hārdikya eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:13321: ity evaṃ kathayanto vai rājānaḥ sarva eva tu // HV_App.I,31.1489 //
GE07hv_apppu:13328: tataś ca yādavāḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā sainikasaṃcayam /
GE07hv_apppu:13334: sātyakir balabhadraś ca hārdikyo niśaṭhas tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:13336: anye ca yādavāḥ sarve kavacapragrahe ratāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13340: rathino gajinaś caiva sādinaḥ sāyudhās tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:13343: kutaḥ pauṇḍraka ity eva bruvantaḥ sarvasātvatāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1509 //
GE07hv_apppu:13346: yuddhaṃ samabhavad ghoraṃ vṛṣṇīnāṃ kṣatriyaiḥ saha // HV_App.I,31.1512 //
GE07hv_apppu:13348: hayā hayaiḥ samāyuktāḥ gajāś ca rathayūthapaiḥ // HV_App.I,31.1514 //
GE07hv_apppu:13349: rathā rathaiḥ samāyuktāḥ sādinaḥ sādibhis tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:13350: khaḍgibhiḥ khaḍgino rājan gadibhir gadinas tathā // HV_App.I,31.1516 //
GE07hv_apppu:13354: nighnataitān ity avocan vṛṣṇayaḥ sarvato nṛpān // HV_App.I,31.1520 //
GE07hv_apppu:13355: ayam eṣa mahābāhuḥ khaḍgī patati vīryavān /
GE07hv_apppu:13356: ayam eṣa śarī ghoro vartate naḥ sudāruṇaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13357: gadī cāyaṃ mahāvīryaḥ sarvān no bādhate nṛpaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1523 //
GE07hv_apppu:13358: ayaṃ rathī śarī cāpī gadī tūṇīravān prabho /
GE07hv_apppu:13359: paṭṭasī sarvato yāti kuntapāṇir ayaṃ balī // HV_App.I,31.1525 //
GE07hv_apppu:13361: gajo 'yaṃ suviṣāṇāgro vartate sarvataḥ pathi // HV_App.I,31.1527 //
GE07hv_apppu:13363: śarāñ śaraiḥ samāhanti daṇḍān daṇḍair jagatpate // HV_App.I,31.1529 //
GE07hv_apppu:13364: kuntān kuntaiḥ samājaghnur gadābhiś ca gadās tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:13365: parighān parighaiś caiva śūlāñ śūlaiḥ samantataḥ // HV_App.I,31.1531 //
GE07hv_apppu:13366: evaṃ teṣāṃ mahārāja kurvatāṃ raṇam uttamam /
GE07hv_apppu:13367: saṃgrāmaḥ sumahān āsīc chabdaḥ samabhavan mahān // HV_App.I,31.1533 //
GE07hv_apppu:13368: tūryāṇi subahūny ājau śabdavanti mahānti ca /
GE07hv_apppu:13369: prādur āsan sahasrāṇi śaṅkhānāṃ caiva nisvanāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1535 //
GE07hv_apppu:13370: rātrau prādur abhūc chabdaḥ saṃgrāme lomaharṣaṇaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13371: vartamāne mahāyuddhe vṛṣṇīnāṃ caiva taiḥ saha // HV_App.I,31.1537 //
GE07hv_apppu:13374: petur urvyāṃ mahāvīryā rājānaḥ śastrapāṇayaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1540 //
GE07hv_apppu:13375: kecit tu bhinnavarmāṇaḥ samāpetus tatas tataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13379: evaṃ te nihatā rājan rājānaḥ sarva eva tu // HV_App.I,31.1545 //
GE07hv_apppu:13383: paraḥśataiḥ śarāṇāṃ tu niśitair marmabhedibhiḥ // HV_App.I,31.1549 //
GE07hv_apppu:13385: yudhyataḥ śastrapāṇīṃś ca kṣatriyān vīryavattamān // HV_App.I,31.1551 //
GE07hv_apppu:13387: sāraṇaṃ daśabhir vidhvā hārdikyaṃ pañcabhiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,31.1553 //
GE07hv_apppu:13389: uddhavaṃ daśabhiś caiva akrūraṃ pañcabhiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,31.1555 //
GE07hv_apppu:13390: evam ekaikaśaḥ sarvān nihatya niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13391: vidrāvya yādavīṃ senāṃ nāma viśrāvya vīryavān // HV_App.I,31.1557 //
GE07hv_apppu:13392: ekalavyo yadūn āha vīryavān balavān aham /
GE07hv_apppu:13393: idānīṃ sātyakir vīraḥ kva yāsyati mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1559 //
GE07hv_apppu:13394: madamatto halī sākṣāt kva yātīha gadādharaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13395: ity āha siṃhanādena sarvān vismāpayann iva // HV_App.I,31.1561 //
GE07hv_apppu:13398: vidruteṣu ca sainyeṣu vṛṣṇivīreṣu caiva hi /
GE07hv_apppu:13399: bhīteṣv atha mahārāja hateṣu yudhi sarvataḥ // HV_App.I,31.1563 //
GE07hv_apppu:13401: jitam ity eva tan matvā vṛṣṇīnāṃ balam uttamam // HV_App.I,31.1565 //
GE07hv_apppu:13402: tataḥ pauṇḍro mahāvīryo babhāṣe sainikān svakān /
GE07hv_apppu:13403: śīghraṃ gacchata rājendrāṣ ṭaṅkaiḥ kuntaiḥ purīm imām // HV_App.I,31.1567
GE07hv_apppu:13405: karpaṇasthaiś ca pāṣāṇaiḥ sarvato yāta bhūmipāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1569 //
GE07hv_apppu:13407: [k: G2.3 M4 ins. after line 1570, T2.4 G1.4 after 1572:k]
GE07hv_apppu:13408: yoṣito vāramukhyāś ca nāgāś caiva samantataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13409: gṛhyantām aśvamukhyāś ca dhanāni subahūni ca // HV_App.I,31.1571 //
GE07hv_apppu:13410: gṛhyantāṃ kanyakāḥ sarvā dāsyaś caiva samantataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13411: gṛhyantām aśvamukhyāś ca dhanāni subahūny atha // HV_App.I,31.1573 //
GE07hv_apppu:13412: tatheti te mahātmāno rājānaḥ sarva eva tu /
GE07hv_apppu:13414: prākārāṃś caiva sarvatra prāsādān ratnasaṃcayān // HV_App.I,31.1576 //
GE07hv_apppu:13415: atha tatra mahāśabdaḥ prādur āsīt samantataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13420: gataḥ kailāsaśikharaṃ draṣṭum īśvaram avyayam // HV_App.I,31.1582 //
GE07hv_apppu:13421: avaśyaṃ sarvathā rakṣyā purī dvāravatī mayā /
GE07hv_apppu:13422: iti saṃcintya manasā dhanur ādāya satvaram // HV_App.I,31.1584 //
GE07hv_apppu:13424: putreṇa saṃskṛtaṃ ghoraṃ yantā ca svayam eva ha // HV_App.I,31.1586 //
GE07hv_apppu:13425: dhanur mahat tam ādāya śarāṃś cāśīviṣopamān /
GE07hv_apppu:13427: aṅgadī kuṇḍalī tūṇī śarī cāpī gadāsimān /
GE07hv_apppu:13428: yayau yuddhāya vegena saṃsmaran kaiśavaṃ vacaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1590 //
GE07hv_apppu:13429: dīpikādīpite deśe yayau sātyakir uttamaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1591 //
GE07hv_apppu:13430: tathā ca baladevo 'pi ratham āruhya bhāsvaram /
GE07hv_apppu:13431: gadī śarāsimān vīraḥ prāyād raṇacikīrṣayā // HV_App.I,31.1593 //
GE07hv_apppu:13432: siṃhanādaṃ prakurvaṃs tu vimuñcan bhairavaṃ ravam /
GE07hv_apppu:13433: uddhavo 'pi balī sākṣād gajam āruhya satvaram // HV_App.I,31.1595 //
GE07hv_apppu:13435: yayau nītiṃ vicinvānaḥ parāṃ prītiṃ mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1597 //
GE07hv_apppu:13437: rathān gajān samāruhya hārdikyapramukhās tadā // HV_App.I,31.1599 //
GE07hv_apppu:13439: siṃhanādaṃ prakurvantaḥ smarantaḥ kaiśavaṃ vacaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1601 //
GE07hv_apppu:13441: te sametya yathāyogaṃ sthitās tatra mahābalāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1603 //
GE07hv_apppu:13443: śinir vīraḥ śarī cāpī gadī tūṇīrapāṇimān // HV_App.I,31.1605 //
GE07hv_apppu:13445: ākarṇapūrṇam ākṛṣya dhanuḥ pravaram uttamam // HV_App.I,31.1607 //
GE07hv_apppu:13448: vidrutā hy astravīryeṇa yatra tiṣṭhati pauṇḍrakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1610 //
GE07hv_apppu:13449: tatra gatvā sthitāḥ sarve nirdhūtā vātaraṃhasā /
GE07hv_apppu:13450: yatra pūrvaṃ sthitāḥ sarve vidrutā rājasattamāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1612 //
GE07hv_apppu:13451: tatra sthitvā sa śaineyaḥ śaram ādāya satvaram /
GE07hv_apppu:13452: niśitaṃ sarpabhogābhaṃ babhāṣe sātyakis tadā // HV_App.I,31.1614 //
GE07hv_apppu:13454: sthito 'smi vyavasāyena śarī cāpī mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1616 //
GE07hv_apppu:13455: yadi draṣṭā durātmānaṃ tato hantā nṛpādhamam /
GE07hv_apppu:13456: bhṛtyo 'smi keśavasyāhaṃ jighāṃsuḥ pauṇḍrakaṃ sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1618
GE07hv_apppu:13457: chittvā śiras tu tasyāhaṃ sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13458: dāsyāmi vaḷagṛdhrebhyaḥ śvabhyaś caiva durātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1620 //
GE07hv_apppu:13459: ko nu nāmedṛśaṃ karma coravac ca samācaret /
GE07hv_apppu:13460: supteṣu niśi sarvatra yādaveṣu mahātmasu // HV_App.I,31.1622 //
GE07hv_apppu:13461: coro 'yaṃ sarvathā rājā na hi rājā balānvitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13462: yadi śakto na kuryāc ca cauryam etan nṛpādhamaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1624 //
GE07hv_apppu:13464: sarvathā gamanaṃ tasya na hi paśyāmi sāṃpratam // HV_App.I,31.1626 //
GE07hv_apppu:13465: ity uccaiḥ sātyakir vīraḥ prajahāsa mahāsvanam /
GE07hv_apppu:13466: visphārya sudṛḍhaṃ cāpaṃ saṃdadhe kārmuke śaram // HV_App.I,31.1628 //
GE07hv_apppu:13467: ākarṇya vacanaṃ vīraḥ sātyakes tasya dhīmataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13469: ādāya niśitaṃ bāṇam āgatya purato yadoḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13470: babhāṣe vāsudevas tu hasan bahuvidhaṃ nṛpaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1632 //
GE07hv_apppu:13471: sātyake śṛṇu me vākyaṃ yadi yoddhuṃ vyavasthitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13472: kva nu kṛṣṇaḥ kva gopālaḥ kutaḥ sa iha vartate // HV_App.I,31.1634 //
GE07hv_apppu:13473: strīhantā paśuhantā ca kva ca svāmīti śabdyate /
GE07hv_apppu:13474: sa idānīṃ kva varteta gṛhītvā mama nāma tat /
GE07hv_apppu:13475: hantā sakhyur mahāvīryo narakasya mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1637 //
GE07hv_apppu:13476: mamaiva nāma tad bhūyād dhate tasmin durātmani /
GE07hv_apppu:13477: gaccha tvaṃ kāmato vīra yoddhuṃ na kṣamate bhavān // HV_App.I,31.1639 //
GE07hv_apppu:13478: atha vā tiṣṭha kiṃcit tu tato draṣṭāsi me balam /
GE07hv_apppu:13479: śiras te pātayiṣyāmi śarair ghorair durāsadaiḥ // HV_App.I,31.1641 //
GE07hv_apppu:13480: hatasya tava vīrasya bhūmiḥ pāsyati śoṇitam /
GE07hv_apppu:13481: śroṣyate sa tathā gopo hataḥ sātyakir ity api // HV_App.I,31.1643 //
GE07hv_apppu:13482: yo garvas tasya gopasya sarvadā vartate mahān /
GE07hv_apppu:13483: vinaṅkṣyati sa tu kṣipraṃ hate tvayi yadūttama // HV_App.I,31.1645 //
GE07hv_apppu:13485: gata ity evam asmābhiḥ śrutaṃ pūrvaṃ mahāmate // HV_App.I,31.1647 //
GE07hv_apppu:13486: śaraṃ gṛhāṇa niśitaṃ yadi śaknoṣi matpuraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13487: ity uktvā bāṇaṃ ādāya yoddhuṃ vyavasitaḥ kila // HV_App.I,31.1649 //
GE07hv_apppu:13491: uvāca vacanaṃ rājan vāsudevaṃ smayann iva // HV_App.I,31.1651 //
GE07hv_apppu:13492: mā voca īdṛśaṃ vākyaṃ vāsudevaṃ nṛpādhama /
GE07hv_apppu:13493: ko nāma jagatāṃ nātham itthaṃ brūyāj jijīviṣuḥ // HV_App.I,31.1653 //
GE07hv_apppu:13494: mṛtyus tvāṃ sarvathā yāti vadantaṃ tādṛśaṃ vacaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13495: jihvā te śatadhā dīryād vadatas tādṛśaṃ vacaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1655 //
GE07hv_apppu:13496: eṣa te pātayiṣyāmi śiraḥ kāyāc ca pauṇḍraka /
GE07hv_apppu:13497: yan nāma vāsudeveti tava saṃprati vartate // HV_App.I,31.1657 //
GE07hv_apppu:13498: yāvat patati kāyāt tu śiras tāvat tu vartatām /
GE07hv_apppu:13499: sa eva śvo hi bhagavān vāsudevo bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,31.1659 //
GE07hv_apppu:13500: eka eva jagannāthaḥ kartā sarvasya sarvagaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13501: durātman sarvathā devo bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1661 //
GE07hv_apppu:13502: eṣa te svaśiraḥ kāyāt pātayiṣyāmi rājaka /
GE07hv_apppu:13503: yady asau bhagavān viṣṇur nāgamiṣyati sāṃpratam // HV_App.I,31.1663 //
GE07hv_apppu:13504: astraṃ vīryaṃ balaṃ caiva sarvaṃ darśaya sāṃpratam /
GE07hv_apppu:13505: nātaḥ paraṃ balaṃ rājan vīryaṃ tava ca vartate // HV_App.I,31.1665 //
GE07hv_apppu:13507: śarī cāpī gadī khaḍgī sarvathāham upasthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1667 //
GE07hv_apppu:13508: neto nagaram āyāsi satyenaitad bravīmy aham /
GE07hv_apppu:13510: tavāṅgaṃ tilaśaḥ kṛtvā śvabhyo dāsyāmi rājaka // HV_App.I,31.1670 //
GE07hv_apppu:13511: ity uktvā bāṇam ādāya vāsudevaṃ mahābalam /
GE07hv_apppu:13512: ākarṇapūrṇam ākṛṣya vivyādha niśitaṃ śaram // HV_App.I,31.1672 //
GE07hv_apppu:13513: sa tena viddho yadunā vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān /
GE07hv_apppu:13514: vamañ śoṇitam atyuṣṇam aṅgān netrān nṛpottama // HV_App.I,31.1674 //
GE07hv_apppu:13515: tataś cukrodha sa nṛpo vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān /
GE07hv_apppu:13517: vivyādha sātyakiṃ rājā nadaṃś ca bahudhā kila // HV_App.I,31.1677 //
GE07hv_apppu:13520: vivyādha sātyakiṃ bhūyo niśi prahlādayan svakān // HV_App.I,31.1680 //
GE07hv_apppu:13522: lalāṭe sudṛḍhaṃ vīro vṛṣṇīnām agraṇīs tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:13523: niṣasāda rathopasthe niśceṣṭa iva sattama // HV_App.I,31.1683 //
GE07hv_apppu:13527: pātayiṣyāmi te vīryam ity uktvā bāṇam ādade //
GE07hv_apppu:13528: tataḥ sa pauṇḍrako rājā vidhvā daśabhir āśugaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13529: sārathiṃ pañcaviṃśatyā hayāṃś ca caturo dṛḍham // HV_App.I,31.1685 //
GE07hv_apppu:13530: te hayā rudhirāktāṅgāḥ sārathiś ca samantataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13532: vāsudevo rathī cāpī siṃhanādaṃ samādade // HV_App.I,31.1688 //
GE07hv_apppu:13533: tena nādena tatrābhūd vibuddhaḥ sātyakis tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:13534: viddhān hayāṃs tathā dṛṣṭvā sārathiṃ ca tathāgatam // HV_App.I,31.1690 //
GE07hv_apppu:13536: are drakṣyāmi te vīryam ity uktvā bāṇam ādade /
GE07hv_apppu:13537: vivyādha tena bāṇena vakṣasy enaṃ mahābalam // HV_App.I,31.1693 //
GE07hv_apppu:13538: tataś cacāla tenājau vāsudevaḥ śareṇa ha /
GE07hv_apppu:13539: susruve rudhiraṃ ghoram atyuṣṇaṃ vakṣaso nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.1695 //
GE07hv_apppu:13541: kṛtyaṃ cāpi na jānāti kevalaṃ niṣasāda ha // HV_App.I,31.1697 //
GE07hv_apppu:13542: sātyakis tu rathaṃ vidhvā daśabhiḥ sāyakais tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:13544: hayāṃś ca caturo hatvā bāṇaiḥ sārathim eva ca // HV_App.I,31.1700 //
GE07hv_apppu:13546: sāratheś ca śiraḥ kāyād aharat sātyakis tadā // HV_App.I,31.1702 //
GE07hv_apppu:13547: rathagranthiṃ ca ciccheda hayāś ca vyasavo 'bhavan /
GE07hv_apppu:13548: aśvāṃś ca caturo hatvā caturbhiḥ patribhis tadā // HV_App.I,31.1704 //
GE07hv_apppu:13549: cakraṃ ca tilaśaḥ kṛtvā bāṇair daśabhir añjasā /
GE07hv_apppu:13550: jahāsa vipulaṃ rājan vāsudevo mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1706 //
GE07hv_apppu:13551: sātyakiś ca tadā rājan rathād āplutya satvaram /
GE07hv_apppu:13552: dhanur ādāya vipulaṃ tasthau bhūmau yadūttamaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1708 //
GE07hv_apppu:13553: tato bhallena tīkṣṇena jyāṃ ca ciccheda satvaram /
GE07hv_apppu:13554: nimeṣād iva vīras tu sātyakiḥ satyavikramaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13555: dhanuś ciccheda bhallena sarvān vismāpayann iva // HV_App.I,31.1711 //
GE07hv_apppu:13556: tatas tyaktvā mahācāpam anyad ghoraṃ mahāmṛdhe /
GE07hv_apppu:13557: anyat kārmukam ādāya vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,31.1713 //
GE07hv_apppu:13559: śarāṃś ca katicid rājan gadāṃ khaḍgaṃ ca yatnataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13560: yāvad balaṃ samādāya tato bhūmau vyatiṣṭhata // HV_App.I,31.1716 //
GE07hv_apppu:13562: śarair anekasāhasraiḥ ardayām āsa satvaram // HV_App.I,31.1718 //
GE07hv_apppu:13564: rathaṃ jaghāna niśitaiḥ śarair daśabhir āśugaiḥ // HV_App.I,31.1720 //
GE07hv_apppu:13565: sātyakiḥ krūrakarmāṇam indro vṛtravadhe yathā // HV_App.I,31.1721 //
GE07hv_apppu:13566: tataś ca yuyudhānas tu vāsudevaṃ nṛpottama /
GE07hv_apppu:13567: daśabhir daśabhiś caiva pañcabhiḥ pañcabhis tathā // HV_App.I,31.1723 //
GE07hv_apppu:13569: yathā devāsure yuddhe baliṃ baliripur nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.1725 //
GE07hv_apppu:13570: sa ca cāpaṃ mahāghoraṃ pauṇḍro yaduvṛṣasya ha /
GE07hv_apppu:13571: muṣṭideśe dvidhā kṛtvā bāṇair daśabhir añjasā /
GE07hv_apppu:13572: jahāsa vipulaṃ rājan vāsudevo mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1728 //
GE07hv_apppu:13574: sajyaṃ kṛtvā balī sākṣāt sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13575: śaraiḥ saptatisāhasraiḥ ardayām āsa satvaram // HV_App.I,31.1731 //
GE07hv_apppu:13576: te śarāḥ śalabhākārā nipetuḥ sarvatas tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:13577: śirastaḥ pārśvataś caiva pṛṣṭhataḥ puratas tathā // HV_App.I,31.1733 //
GE07hv_apppu:13578: āsye caiva mahārāja jaṅghayor jaghane tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:13579: vyathāṃ ca dadur atyantaṃ vāsudevasya marmagāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1735 //
GE07hv_apppu:13582: yathā manasvī riktaś ca tathā tiṣṭhati pauṇḍrakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1738 //
GE07hv_apppu:13585: vidhvā saptabhir āyāntaṃ krodhena prasphurann iva // HV_App.I,31.1741 //
GE07hv_apppu:13586: viddho 'tha sātyakis tena śaraiḥ pañcabhir āśugaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13587: cāpaṃ ciccheda pauṇḍrasya siṃhanādaṃ vyanīnadat // HV_App.I,31.1743 //
GE07hv_apppu:13589: tvaritaṃ pātayām āsa sātyaker vakṣasi prabho // HV_App.I,31.1745 //
GE07hv_apppu:13591: śaraṃ pragṛhya vivyādha sātyakir yudhi pauṇḍrakam // HV_App.I,31.1747 //
GE07hv_apppu:13593: śaktibhir daśabhiś caiva sātyakiṃ nijaghāna ha // HV_App.I,31.1749 //
GE07hv_apppu:13594: tābhir viddho raṇe vīraḥ sātyakiḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13597: apāsya dhanuratnaṃ tad gadām ādāya satvaram /
GE07hv_apppu:13598: ājaghāna tadā vīro vṛṣṇīnām agraṇīr nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.1752 //
GE07hv_apppu:13603: sātyakiṃ vāsudevas tu gadayābhyahanad balī // HV_App.I,31.1755 //
GE07hv_apppu:13604: tāv udyatagadau vīrau śuśubhāte tadā raṇe /
GE07hv_apppu:13605: dṛptau yathā vane siṃhau parasparavadhaiṣiṇau // HV_App.I,31.1757 //
GE07hv_apppu:13606: tataḥ sa sātyakiḥ kruddhaḥ savyaṃ maṇḍalam āgamat /
GE07hv_apppu:13607: jaghnatus tau tadā yuddhe gadābhyāṃ gadinau nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.1759 //
GE07hv_apppu:13609: ubhau tau rudhirāktāṅgau puṣpitāv iva kiṃśukau // HV_App.I,31.1761 //
GE07hv_apppu:13612: dakṣiṇaṃ vāsudevas tu taṃ jaghāna stanāntare /
GE07hv_apppu:13613: yuyudhāno 'tha vīras tu bāhvor madhyam atāḍayat // HV_App.I,31.1765 //
GE07hv_apppu:13614: dṛḍhaṃ sa tāḍito vīro jānubhyām apatad bhuvi /
GE07hv_apppu:13615: tata utthāya bhūyas tu lalāṭe 'bhyahanad yadum // HV_App.I,31.1767 //
GE07hv_apppu:13616: viṣaṇṇaḥ kiṃcid āyastas tata utthāya satvaram /
GE07hv_apppu:13618: vāsudevo balī vīraḥ sākṣān mṛtyur ivāparaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13619: jaghāna gadayā vṛṣṇiṃ nirdahann iva cakṣuṣā // HV_App.I,31.1771 //
GE07hv_apppu:13620: sa tayā tāḍito vṛṣṇir gadayā bāhumuktayā /
GE07hv_apppu:13621: ālambya bhūmiṃ sahasā mṛtyor aṅkagato yathā // HV_App.I,31.1773 //
GE07hv_apppu:13622: saṃjñāṃ punaḥ samālambya pāṇibhyāṃ dṛḍham eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:13623: gadāṃ tasya mahārāja gṛhītvā pragraheṇa ha // HV_App.I,31.1775 //
GE07hv_apppu:13624: dvidhā kṛtvā mahāgurvīṃ gadāṃ kālāyasīṃ śubhām /
GE07hv_apppu:13625: utsṛjya sahasā vīraḥ siṃhanādaṃ vyanīnadat // HV_App.I,31.1777 //
GE07hv_apppu:13626: tata utplutya rājā tu vāsudevo mahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13627: savyena sātyakiṃ gṛhya dakṣiṇena kareṇa ha // HV_App.I,31.1779 //
