GE07hv_apppu:13629: tāḍayām āsa madhye tu stanayoḥ sātyakiṃ nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.1781 //
GE07hv_apppu:13630: śaineyo vṛṣṇivīras tu gadām utsṛjya satvaram /
GE07hv_apppu:13633: tayor evaṃ mahāghoraṃ talayuddham avartata // HV_App.I,31.1785 //
GE07hv_apppu:13634: jānubhyāṃ muṣṭibhiś caiva bāhubhyāṃ śirasā tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:13636: karābhyāṃ karam āhatya tau yuddhaṃ saṃpracakratuḥ // HV_App.I,31.1788 //
GE07hv_apppu:13638: vane yathāgnir utpannas tathaivāsīt sudāruṇaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1790 //
GE07hv_apppu:13639: tāv ājau prathitau vīrāv ubhau pauṇḍrakasātyakī /
GE07hv_apppu:13641: yuyudhāte mahāraṅge mallau dvāv iva viśrutau // HV_App.I,31.1793 //
GE07hv_apppu:13642: ubhe sene mahārāja saṃśayaṃ jagmatus tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:13643: kiṃ nu syāt sātyakir vīro hato 'nena durātmanā /
GE07hv_apppu:13644: āhosvid vāsudevas tu hato 'nena bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,31.1796 //
GE07hv_apppu:13647: anyathā noparamyetāṃ yuddhād vīrau suviśrutau // HV_App.I,31.1799 //
GE07hv_apppu:13648: aho vīryam aho dhairyam etayor balaśālinoḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13649: etau mahābhaṭau loke naitau prākṛtasaṃmatau // HV_App.I,31.1801 //
GE07hv_apppu:13650: naivaṃ yuddhaṃ mahāghoram āsīd devāsureṣv api /
GE07hv_apppu:13651: na śruto na ca vā dṛṣṭaḥ saṃgrāmo 'yaṃ kadācana // HV_App.I,31.1803 //
GE07hv_apppu:13652: evaṃ te sainikā brūyuḥ senayor ubhayor api /
GE07hv_apppu:13653: rātrau niśātame ghore dṛṣṭvā yuddhaṃ sudāruṇam // HV_App.I,31.1805 //
GE07hv_apppu:13654: atha tau bāhubhir ghoraiḥ saṃnipetatur ojasā /
GE07hv_apppu:13656: pañcabhiḥ sātyakiṃ pauṇḍraḥ samājaghne mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1808 //
GE07hv_apppu:13658: prādur āsīt tu sarvatra sarvān vismāpayann iva // HV_App.I,31.1810 //
GE07hv_apppu:13663: āruhya sa rathaṃ vīro yayau yatra halī sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1813 //
GE07hv_apppu:13665: rathī gadī śarī bhūtvā tasthau tasyāgrato balī // HV_App.I,31.1815 //
GE07hv_apppu:13667: rathaṃ daśabhir āhatya sūtaṃ daśabhir āśugaiḥ // HV_App.I,31.1817 //
GE07hv_apppu:13668: siṃhanādaṃ prakurvāṇo daśabhis tv atha sīriṇam /
GE07hv_apppu:13669: dhanurjyāṃ daśabhiś chittvā siṃhanādaṃ vyanīnadat // HV_App.I,31.1819 //
GE07hv_apppu:13670: sajyaṃ ca kārmukaṃ kṛtvā baladevo niṣādapam /
GE07hv_apppu:13671: nārācair daśabhir vidhvā bāṇaiś ca daśabhiḥ śitaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13672: ciccheda dhanur ardhaṃ tat sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,31.1822 //
GE07hv_apppu:13673: sūtaṃ daśabhir āhatya rathaṃ triṃśadbhir eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:13674: dhvajaṃ ciccheda bhallena niṣādasya jagatpate // HV_App.I,31.1824 //
GE07hv_apppu:13678: baladevo mahāvīryaḥ śeṣaḥ sarpa iva śvasan /
GE07hv_apppu:13679: daśabhis tad dhanur divyaṃ śaraiḥ sarvasahair balī /
GE07hv_apppu:13680: ciccheda muṣṭideśe tu mādhavo mādhavāgrajaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1830 //
GE07hv_apppu:13684: tilaśaḥ pañcabhir bāṇaiś cakāra yadunandanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1834 //
GE07hv_apppu:13686: prāhiṇot sāratheḥ kāyam ālokyātha niṣādapaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1836 //
GE07hv_apppu:13687: taṃ cāpi daśabhir vīro mādhavo yadupuṃgavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13691: siṃhanādaṃ mahāghoraṃ akarot sa niṣādarāṭ // HV_App.I,31.1841 //
GE07hv_apppu:13692: sā śaktiḥ sarvakalyāṇī baladevam upāgamat // HV_App.I,31.1842 //
GE07hv_apppu:13695: tayaiva taṃ jaghānāśu vakṣodeśe sa mādhavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1845 //
GE07hv_apppu:13696: sa tayā tāḍito vīraḥ svaśaktyātha niṣādapaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13701: gadinaḥ sādinaś caiva maheṣvāsā mahābalāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1851 //
GE07hv_apppu:13703: gadābhiḥ paṭṭasaiḥ śūlaiḥ parighaiḥ prāsatomaraiḥ // HV_App.I,31.1853 //
GE07hv_apppu:13704: kuntair atha kuṭhāraiś ca vyadravan rāmam ojasā /
GE07hv_apppu:13706: te śaraiḥ pātayāṃ cakrū rāmaṃ rāmam ivāparam // HV_App.I,31.1856 //
GE07hv_apppu:13707: kecit kuṭhārair ājaghnuḥ kecit kuntaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13708: gadābhiḥ kecid āyānti śaktibhiś ca tathāpare /
GE07hv_apppu:13709: nijaghnuḥ sahasā rāmaṃ sphurantaṃ pāvakaṃ yathā // HV_App.I,31.1859 //
GE07hv_apppu:13710: tataḥ kruddho halī sākṣād dhalam udyamya satvaram /
GE07hv_apppu:13711: sarvāṃs tān karṣayām āsa musalena vyapothayat // HV_App.I,31.1861 //
GE07hv_apppu:13714: kṣaṇena tān mahārāja hatvā sarvān mahābalān /
GE07hv_apppu:13715: siṃhavad vinadaṃs tatra tasthau rāmo mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1865 //
GE07hv_apppu:13718: pibantaḥ śoṇitaṃ koṣṇaṃ saṃkṛṣya ca śavaṃ bahu // HV_App.I,31.1868 //
GE07hv_apppu:13721: kravyādāḥ sarva evāśu bhakṣayantas tadā śavam /
GE07hv_apppu:13722: hasanto vividhaṃ ghoraṃ nādayanto vasuṃdharām // HV_App.I,31.1870 //
GE07hv_apppu:13723: rākṣasāḥ piśitāśāś ca pibanto rudhiraṃ bahu /
GE07hv_apppu:13724: āśiṣaṃ yuñjate rājañ śavasya piśitāśanāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1872 //
GE07hv_apppu:13725: nṛtyanti sma tadā rājan nagaryāṃ raṇatoṣiṇaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13726: kākā baḷāś ca gṛdhrāś ca śyenā gomāyukās tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:13727: bhakṣayantaḥ pradhāvantas tataś cetaś ca dāruṇam // HV_App.I,31.1875 //
GE07hv_apppu:13729: hatān sarvān samālokya niṣādān atha sīriṇā // HV_App.I,31.1877 //
GE07hv_apppu:13730: gadām ādāya kupito rāmam eva jagāma ha /
GE07hv_apppu:13731: jaghāna gadayā rājañ jatrudeśe niṣādapaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1879 //
GE07hv_apppu:13732: tato rāmo gadī rājan niṣādaṃ bāhuśālinam /
GE07hv_apppu:13734: tayoś ca tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ gadābhyāṃ samavartata // HV_App.I,31.1882 //
GE07hv_apppu:13735: ākāśe śabda āsīt tu tayor yuddhe mahāravaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13736: samudrāṇāṃ yathā ghoṣaḥ sarveṣāṃ saṃnigacchatām // HV_App.I,31.1884 //
GE07hv_apppu:13738: kṣubhito nāgalokaś ca nāgāḥ kṣobhaṃ samāyayuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13739: pṛthivī cāntarikṣaṃ ca sarvaṃ śabdamayaṃ babhau // HV_App.I,31.1887 //
GE07hv_apppu:13740: tataḥ sa pauṇḍrako rājā sātyakiṃ vṛṣṇinandanam /
GE07hv_apppu:13742: yuyudhāno balī rājan vāsudevaṃ jaghāna ha // HV_App.I,31.1890 //
GE07hv_apppu:13743: tayoś ca tumulaḥ śabdaḥ prādur āsīn mahāraṇe /
GE07hv_apppu:13745: brahmāṇḍakṣobhaṇo rājañ śabda āsīt subhairavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1893 //
GE07hv_apppu:13746: tato rajaḥ prādur abhūt tasmin saṃgrāmamūrdhani /
GE07hv_apppu:13747: tārakā niṣprabhā āsaṃs tamasy evaṃ kṣayaṃ gate // HV_App.I,31.1895 //
GE07hv_apppu:13749: udito bhagavān sūryaś candraś ca kṣayam āyayau // HV_App.I,31.1897 //
GE07hv_apppu:13750: tato yuddhaṃ prādur abhūc caturṇāṃ bāhuśālinām /
GE07hv_apppu:13751: devāsurasamaṃ rājann udite bhāskare mahat // HV_App.I,31.1899 //
GE07hv_apppu:13755: gantum aicchaj jagannāthaḥ purīṃ badarikāśramāt // HV_App.I,31.1901 //
GE07hv_apppu:13756: namaskṛtya munīn sarvān yayau dvāravatīṃ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13757: āruhya garuḍaṃ viṣṇur vegena mahatā prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,31.1903 //
GE07hv_apppu:13758: sumahāñ śuśruve śabdas teṣāṃ yuddhaṃ prakurvatām /
GE07hv_apppu:13759: gacchatā devadevena purīṃ dvāravatīṃ nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.1905 //
GE07hv_apppu:13760: acintayaj jagannāthaḥ ko nv ayaṃ śabda utthitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13762: vyaktam āgatavān pauṇḍro nagarīṃ dvārakām anu /
GE07hv_apppu:13763: tena yuddhaṃ samabhavat pauṇḍrakeṇa durātmanā // HV_App.I,31.1909 //
GE07hv_apppu:13765: śabdo 'yaṃ sumahān vṛtto nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // HV_App.I,31.1911 //
GE07hv_apppu:13766: ity evaṃ cintayitvā tu dadhmau śaṅkhaṃ mahāravam /
GE07hv_apppu:13767: pāñcajanyaṃ hariḥ sākṣāt prīṇayan vṛṣṇipuṃgavān // HV_App.I,31.1913 //
GE07hv_apppu:13768: rodasī pūrayām āsa tena śabdena keśavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13769: yādavā vṛṣṇayaś caiva śrutvā śaṅkhasya taṃ ravam // HV_App.I,31.1915 //
GE07hv_apppu:13770: vyaktam āyāti bhagavān pāñcajanyaravo hy ayam /
GE07hv_apppu:13771: iti te menire rājan vṛṣṇayo yādavās tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:13772: nirbhayāḥ samapadyanta vṛṣṇayo yādavā nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.1918 //
GE07hv_apppu:13773: tasminn eva kṣaṇe dṛṣṭas tārkṣyaś ca patatāṃ varaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13774: tataś ca devakīsūnur dṛṣṭas tair yādaveśvaraiḥ // HV_App.I,31.1920 //
GE07hv_apppu:13775: sūtāś ca māgadhāś caiva puro yānti jagatpateḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13776: stutyā stotuṃ hariṃ viṣṇum īśvaraṃ kamalekṣaṇam // HV_App.I,31.1922 //
GE07hv_apppu:13777: tataś ca yādavāḥ sarve parivavrur janārdanam /
GE07hv_apppu:13778: kṛṣṇas tu garuḍaṃ bhūyo gaccha tvaṃ merum uttamam // HV_App.I,31.1924 //
GE07hv_apppu:13779: ity uktvā garuḍaṃ viṣṇur visṛjya yadupuṃgavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13780: dārukaṃ punar āhedaṃ ratham ānaya me prabho // HV_App.I,31.1926 //
GE07hv_apppu:13781: sa tatheti pratijñāya ratham ānīya satvaram /
GE07hv_apppu:13782: ratho 'yaṃ bhagavan deva kim ataḥ kṛtyam asti me /
GE07hv_apppu:13783: ity uktvā ratham ādāya praṇamyāgre sthito hareḥ // HV_App.I,31.1929 //
GE07hv_apppu:13784: gate 'tha garuḍe viṣṇū ratham āruhya satvaram /
GE07hv_apppu:13785: yatra yuddhaṃ samabhavat tatra yāti sma keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1931 //
GE07hv_apppu:13786: tatra gatvā mahāraṅge yudhyatāṃ ca mahātmanām /
GE07hv_apppu:13788: pauṇḍro 'tha vāsudevas tu kṛṣṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā raṇotsukam /
GE07hv_apppu:13789: sātyakiṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā vāsudevam upāgamat // HV_App.I,31.1935 //
GE07hv_apppu:13790: kruddho 'tha sātyakī rājan vārayām āsa pauṇḍrakam /
GE07hv_apppu:13791: na gantavyam ito rājann eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1937 //
GE07hv_apppu:13792: jitvā māṃ gaccha rājendra paraṃ yoddhuṃ mahāraṇe /
GE07hv_apppu:13793: kṣatriyo 'si mahāvīra sthite mayi raṇotsuke // HV_App.I,31.1939 //
GE07hv_apppu:13794: eṣa te garvam akhilaṃ nāśayiṣyāmi saṃyuge /
GE07hv_apppu:13795: ity uktvā cāgratas tasthau gacchato yādaveśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.1941 //
GE07hv_apppu:13796: pauṇḍrasya śininaptā tu paśyataḥ keśavasya ha /
GE07hv_apppu:13797: avajñāya śineḥ pautraṃ kṛṣṇam eva jagāma ha // HV_App.I,31.1943 //
GE07hv_apppu:13801: dṛṣṭvātha bhagavān evaṃ sātyakiṃ praśaśaṃsa ha // HV_App.I,31.1947 //
GE07hv_apppu:13802: nivārya sātyakiṃ kṛṣṇo yatheṣṭaṃ kriyatām asau /
GE07hv_apppu:13804: tataḥ sa pauṇḍrako rājā vāsudevam uvāca ha /
GE07hv_apppu:13805: bho bho yādavagopāla idānīṃ kva gato bhavān // HV_App.I,31.1951 //
GE07hv_apppu:13806: tvāṃ draṣṭum adya saṃprāpto vāsudevo 'smi sāṃpratam // HV_App.I,31.1952 //
GE07hv_apppu:13807: hatvā tvāṃ sabalaṃ kṛṣṇa balair bahubhir anvitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13808: gate 'tha yamalokaṃ tu tvayi keśava bandhubhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13809: aham eko bhaviṣyāmi vāsudevo jagatpatiḥ // HV_App.I,31.1955 //
GE07hv_apppu:13810: yac cakraṃ tava govinda prathitaṃ suprabhaṃ mahat /
GE07hv_apppu:13811: anena mama cakreṇa pāṭito 'smi ca tad raṇe // HV_App.I,31.1957 //
GE07hv_apppu:13812: cakram astīti yad vīryaṃ tava mādhava sāṃpratam /
GE07hv_apppu:13813: nāśayiṣyāmi tat sarvaṃ sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,31.1959 //
GE07hv_apppu:13814: śārṅgīti māṃ vijānīhi na tvaṃ śārṅgīti śabdyase /
GE07hv_apppu:13815: śaṅkhī cāhaṃ gadī cāhaṃ cakrīti ca janārdana /
GE07hv_apppu:13816: mām eva hi sadā brūyū rājāno vīryaśālinaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1962 //
GE07hv_apppu:13817: ādau tvaṃ ballavair vṛddho hatvā strībālakān bahūn /
GE07hv_apppu:13818: gāś ca hatvā mahāgarvas tava saṃprati vartate // HV_App.I,31.1964 //
GE07hv_apppu:13819: tat te 'haṃ vyapaneṣyāmi yadi tiṣṭhasi matpuraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13820: śastraṃ gṛhāṇa govinda yadi yoddhuṃ vyavasthitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13821: ity uktvā bāṇam ādāya tasthau pārśve jagatpateḥ // HV_App.I,31.1967 //
GE07hv_apppu:13823: smitaṃ kṛtvā hariḥ kṛṣṇo babhāṣe pauṇḍrakaṃ nṛpam // HV_App.I,31.1969 //
GE07hv_apppu:13824: kāmaṃ vada nṛpa tvaṃ hi pātaky asmi sadā nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:13825: goghātī bālaghātī ca strīhantā sarvathā nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.1971 //
GE07hv_apppu:13826: cakrī bhava gadī rājañ śārṅgī ca satataṃ bhava /
GE07hv_apppu:13827: nāmāsīd yad vṛthā mahyaṃ vāsudeveti ca prabho // HV_App.I,31.1973 //
GE07hv_apppu:13828: śārṅgī cakrī gadī śaṅkhīty evamādi vṛthā mama /
GE07hv_apppu:13829: kiṃ tu vakṣyāmi kiṃcit tu śṛṇuṣva yadi manyase // HV_App.I,31.1975 //
GE07hv_apppu:13830: kṣatriyā balino ye tu sthite mayi jagatpatau /
GE07hv_apppu:13831: tathā nu bruvate tvāṃ hi jīvaty eva mayi prabho // HV_App.I,31.1977 //
GE07hv_apppu:13832: yat te cakraṃ mahāghoraṃ sarvakālāyasaṃ mahat /
GE07hv_apppu:13833: tat tulyaṃ mama cakrasya vṛttato na tu vīryataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13834: āyudheṣv atha sarvatra śabdasādṛśyam asti te // HV_App.I,31.1980 //
GE07hv_apppu:13835: gopo 'haṃ sarvadā rājan prāṇināṃ prāṇadaḥ sadā /
GE07hv_apppu:13836: goptā sarveṣu lokeṣu śāstā duṣṭasya sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1982 //
GE07hv_apppu:13837: katthanaṃ sarvadā kāryaṃ jitvā śatrūn raṇe nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:13838: ajitvā kiṃ bhavān brūte sthite mayi ca śastriṇi // HV_App.I,31.1984 //
GE07hv_apppu:13839: hatvā māṃ brūhi rājendra yadi śaknoṣi pauṇḍraka /
GE07hv_apppu:13840: sthito 'haṃ cakram āśritya rathī cāpī gadāsimān // HV_App.I,31.1986 //
GE07hv_apppu:13841: ratham āruhya yuddhāya saṃnaddho bhava mānada /
GE07hv_apppu:13842: ity uktvā bhagavān viṣṇuḥ siṃhanādaṃ vyanīnadat // HV_App.I,31.1988 //
GE07hv_apppu:13846: pauṇḍraṃ jaghāna sahasā niśitena śareṇa ha // HV_App.I,31.1990 //
GE07hv_apppu:13847: pauṇḍro 'tha vāsudevas tu śarair daśabhir āśugaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13849: dārukaṃ pañcaviṃśatyā hayān daśabhir eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:13850: saptatyā vāsudevaṃ tu yādavaṃ vāsudevakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1994 //
GE07hv_apppu:13854: nārācena sutīkṣṇena dhvajaṃ ciccheda keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1998 //
GE07hv_apppu:13855: sāratheś ca śiraḥ kāyād āhṛtya yadupuṃgavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13856: aśvāṃś ca caturo hatvā caturbhiḥ sāyakottamaiḥ // HV_App.I,31.2000 //
GE07hv_apppu:13858: cakraṃ ca tilaśaḥ kṛtvā hasan kiṃcid avasthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2002 //
GE07hv_apppu:13859: pauṇḍrako vāsudevas tu rathād āplutya satvaram /
GE07hv_apppu:13860: ādāya niśitaṃ khaḍgaṃ prāhiṇot keśavāya ha // HV_App.I,31.2004 //
GE07hv_apppu:13861: sa khaḍgaṃ śatadhā kṛtvā śarair daśabhir eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:13862: bālavat keśavo 'tiṣṭhan nimīlya nayane hariḥ // HV_App.I,31.2006 //
GE07hv_apppu:13865: tāṃ cāpi tilaśaḥ kṛtvā tūṣṇīm āsīt sa keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2009 //
GE07hv_apppu:13869: tad dvidhā jagatāṃ nāthaś cakāra yadunandanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2013 //
GE07hv_apppu:13872: ādāyātha mahārāja keśavaṃ vākyam abravīt // HV_App.I,31.2016 //
GE07hv_apppu:13874: anena tava govinda darpaṃ darpavatāṃ vara /
GE07hv_apppu:13876: tvām uddiśya mahāghoraṃ kṛtaṃ mama durāsadam /
GE07hv_apppu:13877: yadi śakto hare kṛṣṇa dārayainaṃ mahāspadam // HV_App.I,31.2021 //
GE07hv_apppu:13878: ity uktvā tac chataguṇaṃ bhrāmayitvā mahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13880: harim uddiśya sahasā vinadad bhairavaṃ ravam // HV_App.I,31.2024 //
GE07hv_apppu:13882: gṛhītvā balavad ghoraṃ tenaiva prāhiṇod dhariḥ // HV_App.I,31.2026 //
GE07hv_apppu:13883: dṛṣṭvā tam mahad āyāntaṃ pauṇḍrako nṛpasattamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13884: avaplutya tato deśāt tad utsṛjya mahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13885: siṃhanādaṃ mahāghoraṃ vyanadad vīryavāṃs tadā // HV_App.I,31.2029 //
GE07hv_apppu:13887: aho vīryam aho dhairyam asya pauṇḍrasya duḥsaham /
GE07hv_apppu:13888: iti matvā jagannāthaḥ sthita eva rathottame // HV_App.I,31.2032 //
GE07hv_apppu:13889: tataḥ śilāḥ samādāya preṣayām āsa keśave /
GE07hv_apppu:13890: tāḥ śilāḥ praṣayām āsa tasmai yādavanandanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2034 //
GE07hv_apppu:13891: pauṇḍreṇa suciraṃ kālaṃ vikrīḍya bhagavān hariḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13892: tataś cakraṃ samādāya niśitaṃ raktabhojanam // HV_App.I,31.2036 //
GE07hv_apppu:13896: vaiṣṇavaṃ paramaṃ cakraṃ nityaṃ suragaṇārcitam // HV_App.I,31.2040 //
GE07hv_apppu:13897: viṣṇuḥ kṛṣṇo rathī śārṅgī nityayuktaḥ sadā hariḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13898: jaghāna tena govindaḥ pauṇḍrakaṃ nṛpasattamam // HV_App.I,31.2042 //
GE07hv_apppu:13900: kṛṣṇasyātha karaṃ bhūyaḥ prāpa sarveśvarasya ha /
GE07hv_apppu:13901: tataḥ sa pauṇḍrako rājā gatāsuḥ prāpatad bhuvi // HV_App.I,31.2045 //
GE07hv_apppu:13903: pratipede sudharmāṃ tu yādavaiḥ pūjito hariḥ // HV_App.I,31.2047 //
GE07hv_apppu:13906: niṣādeśaṃ tato rāmaḥ śaktyā vīryavatāṃ varaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13908: tataḥ kruddho niṣādeśo rāmaṃ mattaṃ mahābalam /
GE07hv_apppu:13910: āhataḥ sa tu tenāśu balabhadro mahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13911: ubhābhyāṃ caiva rāmas tu karābhyāṃ vṛṣṇipuṅgavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13912: gadāṃ gṛhya mahāghorāṃ niṣādāya samādade // HV_App.I,31.2054 //
GE07hv_apppu:13913: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā mahatīṃ ghorām āyāntīṃ prāṇahāriṇīm /
GE07hv_apppu:13915: anvadhāvat tato rāmo dhāvantaṃ makarālayam // HV_App.I,31.2057 //
GE07hv_apppu:13916: dhāvaty evaṃ tadā rājann ekalavye niṣādape /
GE07hv_apppu:13917: dhāvaty eva ca rāmo 'pi yatra yāto niṣādapaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2059 //
GE07hv_apppu:13919: bhīta eva tadā rājann ekalavyo niṣādapaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13920: kaṃcid dvīpāntaraṃ rājan praviśya jaḍavat sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2062 //
GE07hv_apppu:13922: tāṃ sabhāṃ maṇiratnāḍhyāṃ praviveśa halāyudhaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2064 //
GE07hv_apppu:13923: sātyakir yuddhasaṃraktas tāṃ sabhāṃ praviveśa ha /
GE07hv_apppu:13924: anye ca yādavā rājan yathāyogam upasthitāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2066 //
GE07hv_apppu:13926: abhivādya yathāyogaṃ vṛddhān sarvān sa keśavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13927: uvāca vacanaṃ kāle bhagavān devakīsutaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2069 //
GE07hv_apppu:13929: sa tu mahyaṃ yaduvarāḥ prītimāṃś ca dadau varam // HV_App.I,31.2071 //
GE07hv_apppu:13930: tatra devāḥ samāyātā munayaś ca tapodhanāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13931: dṛṣṭvā māṃ śaṃkaraṃ caiva prītās tuṣṭāḥ samāyayuḥ // HV_App.I,31.2073 //
GE07hv_apppu:13933: piśācau dvau mahāghorau vadantau māmikāṃ kathām // HV_App.I,31.2075 //
GE07hv_apppu:13934: mṛgayāṃ cakratus tau tu cintayantau tu māṃ sadā /
GE07hv_apppu:13935: dṛṣṭvā māṃ tau tu rājendrāḥ prītimantau tapasvinau /
GE07hv_apppu:13936: bhaktinamrau mahātmānau praṇāmaṃ cakratus tadā // HV_App.I,31.2078 //
GE07hv_apppu:13937: tato 'haṃ sarvathā prītas tau dṛṣṭvā svargam uttamam /
GE07hv_apppu:13938: toṣayitvā mahādevam ahnā cāhaṃ tato gataḥ // HV_App.I,31.2080 //
GE07hv_apppu:13939: tatas te vṛṣṇayaḥ sarve devadevaṃ praśaṃsire /
GE07hv_apppu:13941: yādavāḥ sarva evātra svaṃ svaṃ jagmur yathālayam // HV_App.I,31.2083 //
GE07hv_apppu:13945: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ keśavasya ca ceṣṭitam // HV_App.I,31.2087 //
GE07hv_apppu:13946: śaśāsa pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ duṣṭān hatvā mahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13947: narakaṃ ghorakarmāṇaṃ pauṇḍraṃ ca nṛpasattamam // HV_App.I,31.2089 //
GE07hv_apppu:13949: rarakṣa viprān deveśo munīn munivarārcitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2091 //
GE07hv_apppu:13950: viprebhyaś ca dadau vittaṃ gāś ca ratnāni keśavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13951: agnihotraṃ prayuñjāno brāhmaṇāṃś ca sutarpayan // HV_App.I,31.2093 //
GE07hv_apppu:13952: munīṃś ca brahmacaryeṇa devān yajñena keśavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13953: svadhayā ca pitṝn sarvān prīṇayaty eva sarvadā // HV_App.I,31.2095 //
GE07hv_apppu:13954: tasmiñ śāsati deveśe rājyaṃ niṣkaṇṭakaṃ babhau /
GE07hv_apppu:13955: sukham eva prajāḥ sarvā jīvanti brāhmaṇottarāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2097 //
GE07hv_apppu:13960: na hi me tṛptir astīha śṛṇvataḥ kaiśavīṃ kathām // HV_App.I,31.2100 //
GE07hv_apppu:13961: ko nu nāma harer viṣṇor devadevasya cakriṇaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13962: śṛṇvan kathāṃ smaran vāpi tṛptiṃ yāti divāniśam // HV_App.I,31.2102 //
GE07hv_apppu:13963: puruṣārtho 'yam evaiko yat kathāśravanaṃ hareḥ // HV_App.I,31.2103 //
GE07hv_apppu:13964: katham āsīj jagaddhetor haṃsasya ḍibhakasya ca /
GE07hv_apppu:13967: sa tayor mitratāṃ yāta ity evam anuśuśrumaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2107 //
GE07hv_apppu:13968: tau nṛpau vīryasaṃpannau śiṣyau bhṛgusutasya ha /
GE07hv_apppu:13969: sarvāstrakuśalau vīrau harāl labdhavarau kila // HV_App.I,31.2109 //
GE07hv_apppu:13970: saṃgrāmaḥ sumahān āsīd ity uktaṃ bhavatā purā /
GE07hv_apppu:13971: tayoś ca nṛpayor vipra keśavasya jagatpateḥ // HV_App.I,31.2111 //
GE07hv_apppu:13973: sarvam etad dvijaśreṣṭha vaktum arhasi suvrata // HV_App.I,31.2113 //
GE07hv_apppu:13976: yathā saṃgrāma āsīt tu tayoś cakradharasya ca // HV_App.I,31.2115 //
GE07hv_apppu:13977: yathā ca tau samutpannau yathābhūd vigraho mahān /
GE07hv_apppu:13980: āsan yuddhe mahārāja dānavasya mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2119 //
GE07hv_apppu:13983: tadvadārthaṃ sadā yatnam akaroc caiva keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2122 //
GE07hv_apppu:13987: nāmnā rājan sa bhūtātmā sarvabhūtadayāparaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2124 //
GE07hv_apppu:13989: brahmavid vedavic caiva sadā yajñaparaḥ śivaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2126 //
GE07hv_apppu:13992: sa tābhyāṃ mumude rājā śacyā śakra ivāmbare /
GE07hv_apppu:13993: nāmnā mitrasaho nāma sakhā cāsīd dvijottamaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2130 //
GE07hv_apppu:13995: anapatyaḥ sa viprendro yathā rājā babhūva ha // HV_App.I,31.2132 //
GE07hv_apppu:13996: sa rājā sahitas tābhyām arcayām āsa śaṃkaram /
GE07hv_apppu:13997: putrārthaṃ śūlinaṃ śarvaṃ daśa varṣāṇy ananyadhīḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:13998: sa vipro vaiṣṇavaṃ satraṃ putrārthaṃ samayojayat // HV_App.I,31.2135 //
GE07hv_apppu:14000: ātmānaṃ darśayām āsa svapne rājānam abravīt /
GE07hv_apppu:14001: prīto 'smi tava bhadraṃ te varaṃ varaya suvrata // HV_App.I,31.2138 //
GE07hv_apppu:14002: atha rājā jagannātham uvācedaṃ svapann api /
GE07hv_apppu:14003: putrau mama bhavetāṃ hi tathety uktvā vṛṣadhvajaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14004: antardhānaṃ gataḥ śaṃbhuḥ sa ca prīto 'bhavan nṛpaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2141 //
GE07hv_apppu:14005: so 'pi mitrasaho vidvān devaṃ keśavam avyayam /
GE07hv_apppu:14006: pañcavarṣaṃ jagannātham arcayām āsa bhaktitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2143 //
GE07hv_apppu:14008: putram ekaṃ dadau tasmai svātmanā sadṛśaṃ hariḥ // HV_App.I,31.2145 //
GE07hv_apppu:14009: te bhārye garbham ādhattāṃ tejasā śaṃkarasya ha /
GE07hv_apppu:14010: viprabhāryā mahārāja vaiṣṇavaṃ teja ādadhāt // HV_App.I,31.2147 //
GE07hv_apppu:14012: asūyetāṃ mahīpāla krameṇaiva nṛpasya ha // HV_App.I,31.2149 //
GE07hv_apppu:14013: sa tayoś ca mahārāja jātakarmādikāḥ kriyāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14014: cakāra vidhivat sarvā viprasāc ca mahaddhanam // HV_App.I,31.2151 //
GE07hv_apppu:14015: sa ca vipro vinītātmā putram ekaṃ prajajñivān /
GE07hv_apppu:14016: sākṣād iva jagannāthaṃ sthitaṃ putrātmanā nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.2153 //
GE07hv_apppu:14017: jātakarmādikaṃ sarvaṃ karaṇaṃ sa cakāra ha /
GE07hv_apppu:14018: tau kumārāv ayaṃ caiva trayaḥ savayaso 'bhavan // HV_App.I,31.2155 //
GE07hv_apppu:14019: vedān adhītya te sarvāñ śrutvā cānvīkṣikīṃ tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:14020: dhanurvedaṃ tathāstre ca nipuṇās te 'bhavaṃs tadā // HV_App.I,31.2157 //
GE07hv_apppu:14022: sa ca viprasuto rājañ janārdana iti smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2159 //
GE07hv_apppu:14023: anyonyaṃ mitratāṃ yātāḥ sarve caiva kumārakāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2160 //
GE07hv_apppu:14026: haṃsaś ca ḍibhakaś caiva tapaś cartuṃ mahāmatī /
GE07hv_apppu:14027: manaś cakratur ātmāṃśau śaṃkarasya nṛpottama // HV_App.I,31.2162 //
GE07hv_apppu:14028: gatvā tu himavatpārśvaṃ tapaś cakratur añjasā /
GE07hv_apppu:14029: uddiśya śaṃkaraṃ śarvaṃ nīlagrīvam umāpatim // HV_App.I,31.2164 //
GE07hv_apppu:14030: vīryāstre caiva nau syātām ity ādhāya tu mānase /
GE07hv_apppu:14031: ekāgrau prayatau bhūtvā vāyvambuprāśinau nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.2166 //
GE07hv_apppu:14033: hara śarva śivānanda nīlagrīva umāpate // HV_App.I,31.2168 //
GE07hv_apppu:14039: hṛdi kṛtvā virūpākṣaṃ tapas tepatur añjasā // HV_App.I,31.2174 //
GE07hv_apppu:14041: varṣāṇīha tadā rājan pañca cakratur ojasā // HV_App.I,31.2176 //
GE07hv_apppu:14042: tataḥ prīto 'bhavac charvas tābhyāṃ saṃyamanena ca /
GE07hv_apppu:14043: sa dadau darśanaṃ naijaṃ vyāghracarmāmbaro haraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14044: triyakṣaḥ śaṃkaraḥ śarvaḥ śūlapāṇir umāpatiḥ // HV_App.I,31.2179 //
GE07hv_apppu:14046: tau dṛṣṭvā prītamanasau namaś cakratur añjasā // HV_App.I,31.2181 //
GE07hv_apppu:14048: varaṃ varayatāṃ bhadrau yathecchā vāṃ tathāstu vai // HV_App.I,31.2182 //
GE07hv_apppu:14049: tāv ūcatus tadā rājan prītas tvaṃ bhagavan yadi /
GE07hv_apppu:14051: āvām ajeyau sarvātmann eṣa nau prathamo varaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2185 //
GE07hv_apppu:14052: dvitīyo nau virūpākṣa raudrāstrāṇāṃ ca saṃgrahaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14053: māheśvaraṃ tathā raudram astraṃ brahmaśiro mahat // HV_App.I,31.2187 //
GE07hv_apppu:14054: abhedyaṃ kavacaṃ divyaṃ acchedyaṃ cāpi kārmukam /
GE07hv_apppu:14055: paraśuṃ ca tathā śarva sadā rakṣārtham eva ca // HV_App.I,31.2189 //
GE07hv_apppu:14056: sahāyau dvau mahādeva bhūtau yuddhe hi gacchatoḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14057: evam astv iti deveśa āha bhṛṅgiriṭī haraḥ // HV_App.I,31.2191 //
GE07hv_apppu:14059: yuvām atha ca bhūteśau sahāyau satataṃ raṇe // HV_App.I,31.2193 //
GE07hv_apppu:14061: ity uktvā bhagavāñ śarvas tatraivāntar adhīyata // HV_App.I,31.2195 //
GE07hv_apppu:14062: tatas tau vīryasaṃpannau haṃso ḍibhaka eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:14070: ityādibhiḥ sadā devaṃ stuvantau nāmabhiḥ śivam /
GE07hv_apppu:14071: sākṣād iva mahādevau rejatuḥ śūladhāriṇau // HV_App.I,31.2205 //
GE07hv_apppu:14072: tataḥ svabhavanaṃ gatvā pituḥ pādāv agṛhṇatām /
GE07hv_apppu:14073: pituś ca sakhyur balinau mātuś ca caraṇau tadā // HV_App.I,31.2207 //
GE07hv_apppu:14078: haṃsaś ca ḍibhakaś caiva kṛtadārau babhūvatuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14079: janārdanaś ca dharmātmā kṛtadāro babhūva ha // HV_App.I,31.2213 //
GE07hv_apppu:14082: dharma eva paraṃ śreya iti te menire nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.2216 //
GE07hv_apppu:14085: tataḥ kadācit tau vīrau mṛgayāṃ cakratuḥ kila /
GE07hv_apppu:14086: janārdanena sahitau rathair aśvair gajair api // HV_App.I,31.2218 //
GE07hv_apppu:14087: vanaṃ gatvā tu tau vīrau siṃhavyāghrāṃś ca jaghnatuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14088: śitair bāṇair mahārāja varāhān atha sarvaśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14089: vyālān anyān mṛgān hiṃsrāñ śvabhiś ca sahitau nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.2221 //
GE07hv_apppu:14091: enaṃ bāṇena saṃchindhi yāti cāyaṃ mṛgādhipaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14093: ete khalu mṛgāḥ sārdhaṃ śāvair dhāvanti sarvataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14094: etad bhramati sarvatra bhītaṃ śaśakulaṃ mahat // HV_App.I,31.2226 //
GE07hv_apppu:14095: śāvais tadanvayaiḥ sārdhaṃ na hantavyam idaṃ śubham /
GE07hv_apppu:14096: grahītavyam idaṃ sarvaṃ nirudhya śvagaṇair iha // HV_App.I,31.2228 //
GE07hv_apppu:14097: ity ādiśabdaḥ sumahān mṛgayāṃ kurvatāṃ nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:14098: kṣatriyāṇāṃ nṛpaśreṣṭha vyādhānāṃ caiva dhāvatām // HV_App.I,31.2230 //
GE07hv_apppu:14099: hatvā mṛgān subahuśo vyāghrān siṃhān nṛpottamau /
GE07hv_apppu:14100: śramaṃ ca jagmatur vīrau madhyaṃ gacchati bhāskare // HV_App.I,31.2232 //
GE07hv_apppu:14102: ity ūcatur mahārāja puṣkaraṃ jagmatuḥ saraḥ // HV_App.I,31.2234 //
GE07hv_apppu:14104: vījanmārutasānūpaṃ śramāt tatra sukhaṃ sthitau // HV_App.I,31.2236 //
GE07hv_apppu:14105: tato janāḥ saraḥ sarve vigāhya śramakarśitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14106: bisān pravālān padmānāṃ bhakṣayām āsur ārtavat // HV_App.I,31.2238 //
GE07hv_apppu:14107: janārdanena sahitau haṃso ḍibhaka eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:14108: saraḥ kvacit samāśritya śramaṃ saṃtyajya tiṣṭhataḥ // HV_App.I,31.2240 //
GE07hv_apppu:14110: vigāhyaḥ tatsaraḥ svādu śītaṃ pītvā jalaṃ ca tau /
GE07hv_apppu:14111: viśramya sarasas tīre tadāsāte sukhaṃ nṛpau /
GE07hv_apppu:14113: mādhyaṃdinaṃ tathā sarvaiḥ savanaṃ sasvaraṃ nṛpau // HV_App.I,31.2243 //
GE07hv_apppu:14114: tataḥ prītau nṛpau bhūtvā śrutvā vedadhvaniṃ tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:14115: aicchetāṃ tau tadā draṣṭuṃ yajñaṃ munikṛtaṃ tadā // HV_App.I,31.2245 //
GE07hv_apppu:14117: ādāya ca mahācāpe śarān katicid eva ca // HV_App.I,31.2247 //
GE07hv_apppu:14118: janārdanas tadā vīro haṃso ḍibhaka eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:14119: padātinau mahārāja jagmatuś cāśramaṃ kila // HV_App.I,31.2249 //
GE07hv_apppu:14124: janārdanaś ca dharmātmā haṃso ḍibhaka eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:14125: sadaḥ praviśya satrasya namaś cakrur munīṃs tataḥ // HV_App.I,31.2253 //
GE07hv_apppu:14127: arghyapādyāsanādīni cakruḥ pūjāṃ ca yatnataḥ // HV_App.I,31.2255 //
GE07hv_apppu:14128: tau nṛpau sa ca viprendraḥ saparyāṃ pratigṛhya ca /
GE07hv_apppu:14129: prītātmānau mahātmānau āsate susukhaṃ nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.2257 //
GE07hv_apppu:14130: tato haṃso babhāṣe tān munīn saṃyatavāṅ nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:14131: pitā hi nau muniśreṣṭhā yaṣṭum aicchat sasādhanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14132: gantavyaṃ tatra yuṣmābhiḥ satrānte munisattamāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2260 //
GE07hv_apppu:14135: āyāntu tatra viprendrāḥ saśiṣyāḥ saparicchadāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2263 //
GE07hv_apppu:14136: vayam adyaiva sahitā diśo jeṣyāmahe dhruvam /
GE07hv_apppu:14137: śaktā hi vayam evaitat kartuṃ sainikasaṃcayaiḥ // HV_App.I,31.2265 //
GE07hv_apppu:14138: āvayoḥ purataḥ sthātuṃ na śaktā devadānavāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14139: kailāsanilayād devād varaṃ labdhāḥ sma yatnataḥ // HV_App.I,31.2267 //
GE07hv_apppu:14141: ity uktvā virarāmaiva haṃso balamadānvitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2269 //
GE07hv_apppu:14143: yadi syāt tatra gacchāmo vayaṃ śiṣyair nṛpottama /
GE07hv_apppu:14144: āsmahe cānyathā rājann ity ūcuḥ kila tāpasāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2271 //
GE07hv_apppu:14148: puṣkarasyottaraṃ tīraṃ durvāsā yatra tiṣṭhati // HV_App.I,31.2273 //
GE07hv_apppu:14152: tam ātmānaṃ jagadyoniṃ viṣṇuṃ viśveśvaraṃ śivam // HV_App.I,31.2277 //
GE07hv_apppu:14154: vedāntamūrtim avyaktam anantaṃ śāśvataṃ śivam // HV_App.I,31.2279 //
GE07hv_apppu:14156: dhyāyantaṃ sarvadā devaṃ manasā sarvatomukham // HV_App.I,31.2281 //
GE07hv_apppu:14159: haṃsāḥ paramahaṃsāś ca śiṣyā durvāsasaḥ prabho /
GE07hv_apppu:14160: gatvā tatra mahātmānau dṛṣṭvā tān ūrdhvaretasaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2285 //
GE07hv_apppu:14162: kruddho yadi sa durvāsā dagdhuṃ lokān imān kṣamaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2287 //
GE07hv_apppu:14163: devā api ca yaṃ draṣṭuṃ kruddhaṃ cen na kṣamāḥ sadā /
GE07hv_apppu:14164: roṣamūrtiḥ sadā yas tu viśvātmā viśvarūpadhṛk // HV_App.I,31.2289 //
GE07hv_apppu:14165: raktakaupīn avasano haṃsaḥ parama eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:14166: dṛṣṭvenaṃ ca tayor evaṃ buddhir āsīn mahāmate // HV_App.I,31.2291 //
GE07hv_apppu:14168: kaścāyam āśramo nāma vihāya ca gṛhāśramam // HV_App.I,31.2293 //
GE07hv_apppu:14170: gṛhastho dharmarūpas tu gṛhasthaḥ svarga eva ca // HV_App.I,31.2295 //
GE07hv_apppu:14171: gṛhasthaś ca sadā mātā prāṇināṃ jīvanaṃ sadā /
GE07hv_apppu:14172: taṃ vinānyena rūpeṇa vartate yo hi mūrkhavat // HV_App.I,31.2297 //
GE07hv_apppu:14173: unmatto 'yaṃ virūpo 'yam atha vā mūrkha eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:14174: dhyāyann iva sadā cāyam āste vañcayitāpi vā // HV_App.I,31.2299 //
GE07hv_apppu:14175: kim ete prākṛtajñānā dhyāyanta iva kiṃcana /
GE07hv_apppu:14179: asadgrāhagṛhītāṃś ca bāliśān durmatīn imān // HV_App.I,31.2304 //
GE07hv_apppu:14180: eṣāṃ śāstā ca ko mūḍho na vidmo vayam atra ha /
GE07hv_apppu:14181: dharmye vartmani saṃsthāpya punar yāsyāva nirvṛtau // HV_App.I,31.2306 //
GE07hv_apppu:14182: iti saṃcintya tau vīrau vipreṇa sahitau nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:14183: janārdanena rājānau mohād bhāgyakṣayān nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.2308 //
GE07hv_apppu:14186: yatīṃś ca niyatān kruddhau rājānau rājasattama // HV_App.I,31.2311 //
GE07hv_apppu:14189: jñānaleśād vihīnātman kiṃ te vyavasitaṃ dvija /
GE07hv_apppu:14190: kaś cāyam āśramo vipra bhavatā yaḥ samāśritaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2313 //
GE07hv_apppu:14191: gṛhamedhaṃ parityajya kiṃ tvayā sādhitaṃ padam /
GE07hv_apppu:14192: dambha eva bhavān vyaktaṃ śaṅke nāsty atra kāraṇam // HV_App.I,31.2315 //
GE07hv_apppu:14193: lokāṃś cemān sadā mūḍha nāśayiṣyasi nirvṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14194: etān sarvān vinetāsi narake pātayiṣyasi // HV_App.I,31.2317 //
GE07hv_apppu:14195: svayaṃ naṣṭaḥ parān mūrkha nāśayiṣyasi yatnataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14196: aho śāstā kathaṃ nāsti tava mandamate dvija // HV_App.I,31.2319 //
GE07hv_apppu:14197: sarvathā tvadvinetā ca pāpaṃ nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14198: tyaktvemam āśramaṃ vipra gṛhī bhava yatātmavān // HV_App.I,31.2321 //
GE07hv_apppu:14199: pañca yajñān sadā vipra kuru yatnaparo bhava /
GE07hv_apppu:14200: tataḥ svargaṃ paraṃ gantā svarge hi sumahat sukham /
GE07hv_apppu:14201: eṣa śreyaḥpatho vipra jīvate cet spṛhā tava // HV_App.I,31.2324 //
GE07hv_apppu:14202: ity uktavantau dharmātmā śrutvā vipro janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14203: uvāca ca yatiṃ dṛṣṭvā praṇamyāsau subhītavat // HV_App.I,31.2326 //
GE07hv_apppu:14204: mā brūtām īdṛśaṃ vākyaṃ rājānau mandacetasau /
GE07hv_apppu:14205: aśrāvyam īdṛśaṃ ghoraṃ lokayor ubhayor api // HV_App.I,31.2328 //
GE07hv_apppu:14206: ko vaktum īśo mandātmā yadi jīvet sabāndhavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14208: samāpta āyuṣaḥ śeṣo brahmadaṇḍahatau yuvām // HV_App.I,31.2331 //
GE07hv_apppu:14211: ṛte vām īdṛśaṃ vākyaṃ kaḥ samartho hy anubruvan /
GE07hv_apppu:14212: sarvathā jñātam asmābhiḥ samāptam iha jīvitam // HV_App.I,31.2335 //
GE07hv_apppu:14213: catvāra āśramāḥ pūrvam ṛṣibhir vihitā nṛpau /
GE07hv_apppu:14214: brahmacārī gṛhasthaś ca vānaprasthaś ca bhikṣukaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2337 //
GE07hv_apppu:14215: teṣām agraś caturtho 'yam āśramo bhikṣukaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14216: āste tasmin mahābuddhiḥ sa hi puṇyatamaḥ smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2339 //
GE07hv_apppu:14217: nopāsitā bhavadbhyāṃ ca vṛddhāḥ samyag vinītavat /
GE07hv_apppu:14218: jñānaṃ nāptaṃ tatas tebhyas tathā caivaṃ vadeta kaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2341 //
GE07hv_apppu:14219: aśrāvyam īdṛśaṃ ghoraṃ mayā prāṇabhṛtā nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:14220: kiṃ kariṣyāmi mandātman mitratvād bhavator nṛpau // HV_App.I,31.2343 //
GE07hv_apppu:14221: jñānaṃ yad āptaṃ bhavatā gurubhyas @ HV_App.I,31.2344 @
GE07hv_apppu:14222: tad atra duḥkhāya hi kevalaṃ naḥ |
GE07hv_apppu:14225: yuvāṃ vihāya yāsye vā pateyaṃ vā śilātale /
GE07hv_apppu:14226: pibeyaṃ vā viṣaṃ ghoraṃ pateyaṃ vā mahormiṣu // HV_App.I,31.2349 //
GE07hv_apppu:14227: ātmānaṃ vātra saṃtyakṣye śṛṇvatāṃ paśyatāṃ nṛpau /
GE07hv_apppu:14228: ity uktvā vilalāpaivaṃ mā brūteti sadā vadan // HV_App.I,31.2351 //
GE07hv_apppu:14231: tataḥ kruddho 'tha durvāsā dhakṣyann iva tayor asūn /
GE07hv_apppu:14234: kurvann iva tadā lokān bhasmabhūtān imān nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.2355 //
GE07hv_apppu:14236: uvāca vacanaṃ rājan dhvaṃsata dhvaṃsateti ha // HV_App.I,31.2357 //
GE07hv_apppu:14237: ito gacchata rājānau kiṃ vilambatha māciram /
GE07hv_apppu:14238: na vāṃ vacanasaṃbhūtaṃ roṣaṃ dhārayituṃ kṣamaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2359 //
GE07hv_apppu:14239: anyathā vo mahīpālān sarvān dagdhum ahaṃ kṣamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14240: kim ataḥ sāhasaṃ vaktuṃ kaś ca śaknoti matpuraḥ // HV_App.I,31.2361 //
GE07hv_apppu:14242: vyapaneṣyati mandajñau kiṃ vā vakṣyāmi sāṃpratam // HV_App.I,31.2363 //
GE07hv_apppu:14243: tata utthāya dharmātmā gantum aicchad yatīśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14244: tato niṣeddhuṃ haṃsas taṃ yatate sma yatīśvaram // HV_App.I,31.2365 //
GE07hv_apppu:14246: kaupīnaṃ cicchide krūraḥ kṛtānta iva sattama // HV_App.I,31.2367 //
GE07hv_apppu:14247: yatayo 'nye palāyanti diśo daśa vicetasaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2368 //
GE07hv_apppu:14248: kaṣṭaṃ heti vadan vipro mitrabhāvāj janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14249: nyavārayad yathāśakti kim idaṃ sāhasaṃ tv iti // HV_App.I,31.2370 //
GE07hv_apppu:14250: durvāsāḥ satyadharmas tu hantum īśo 'pi taṃ tataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14251: mandaṃ mandam uvācedaṃ haṃsaṃ ḍibhakam eva ca // HV_App.I,31.2372 //
GE07hv_apppu:14253: tathāpi na karomy evaṃ yatayo hy atra te vayam // HV_App.I,31.2374 //
GE07hv_apppu:14254: yo hi devo jagannāthaḥ keśavo yādaveśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14256: loke tasmin yaduśreṣṭhe rakṣaty eva jagatpatau /
GE07hv_apppu:14257: yuvayoḥ sarvathā jīvaḥ sujīva iti me matiḥ // HV_App.I,31.2378 //
GE07hv_apppu:14258: jarāsaṃdho 'pi vāṃ bandhuḥ sa ca vaktuṃ na cecchati /
GE07hv_apppu:14259: īdṛśaṃ lokavidviṣṭaṃ sa hi dharmapathe sadā // HV_App.I,31.2380 //
GE07hv_apppu:14260: etāvatā sa vāṃ bandhur na sa bhūyo bhaviṣyati /
GE07hv_apppu:14261: vidveṣo hy astu vāṃ tasya māgadhasya mahīpateḥ // HV_App.I,31.2382 //
GE07hv_apppu:14262: śrutvedaṃ ghorarūpaṃ tu sa hi bandhuḥ saheta cet /
GE07hv_apppu:14263: dharmanāśo bhavet tasya nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // HV_App.I,31.2384 //
GE07hv_apppu:14264: ity uktvā gaccha gaccheti haṃsaṃ prāha punaḥ punaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14266: svasty astu tava viprendra bhaktir astu janārdane /
GE07hv_apppu:14268: adya śvo vā paraśvo vā sādhur eva sadā bhavān // HV_App.I,31.2389 //
GE07hv_apppu:14269: na hi sādhor vināśo 'sti lokayor ubhayor api /
GE07hv_apppu:14270: gaccha sarvaṃ pitur brūhi jñātvā vṛttaṃ yathākhilam // HV_App.I,31.2391 //
GE07hv_apppu:14273: tatas tau haṃsaḍibhakau kruddhau kālena coditau /
GE07hv_apppu:14274: śikyaṃ kamaṇḍaluṃ caiva vidalaṃ dārum eva ca // HV_App.I,31.2393 //
GE07hv_apppu:14275: daṇḍān pātraviśeṣāṃś ca chittvā mittvā ca sarvaśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14276: tasmin deśe mahārāja vyādhair māṃsāny adīdahan /
GE07hv_apppu:14277: bhakṣayitvā tato deśāt svapuraṃ tau prajagmatuḥ // HV_App.I,31.2396 //
GE07hv_apppu:14278: janārdanaś ca dharmātmā snehād anuyayau tayoḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14279: naṣṭāv imāv iti tadā sa mene duḥkhitaḥ param // HV_App.I,31.2398 //
GE07hv_apppu:14281: palāyanaparān sarvān idam āha yatīśvarān // HV_App.I,31.2400 //
GE07hv_apppu:14283: mandaṃ mandaṃ samāśvasya viśramya ca tatas tataḥ // HV_App.I,31.2402 //
GE07hv_apppu:14285: dṛṣṭvā ca tasmai prabhave vakṣyāmo yatisattamāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2404 //
GE07hv_apppu:14286: sa hi rakṣañ jagad idaṃ dharmavartmani saṃsthitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14288: uddhṛtya kaṇṭakān sarvāñ śaśāsa pṛthivīm imām // HV_App.I,31.2407 //
GE07hv_apppu:14289: sa ca pāpān mahāghorān sarvān pāpakṛtān prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14290: rakṣen naḥ sakalān sarvāñ jñāneṣu niyatātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14291: idam adya kṣamaṃ viprā yānam adya vidhīyatāṃ // HV_App.I,31.2410 //
GE07hv_apppu:14292: sāhasaṃ yat kṛtaṃ tābhyāṃ pātrabhedādi sattamāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14293: etat sarvam aśeṣeṇa darśayāma janārdanam // HV_App.I,31.2412 //
GE07hv_apppu:14295: chinnāṃs tābhyāṃ samādāya śikyaṃ dārumayaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,31.2414 //
GE07hv_apppu:14296: dvidalaṃ karpaṭaṃ caiva kaupīnam atha valkalam /
GE07hv_apppu:14298: etān anyān samādāya draṣṭuṃ keśavam āyayuḥ // HV_App.I,31.2417 //
GE07hv_apppu:14302: yayur dāntā mahātmāno lomaśāḥ keśavarjitāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2421 //
GE07hv_apppu:14304: snātvopaspṛśya śucayo yatnena mahatā tadā // HV_App.I,31.2423 //
GE07hv_apppu:14312: avyaktaḥ śāśvato devaḥ sakalo niṣkalaḥ śivaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2429 //
GE07hv_apppu:14314: kumārair aparaiḥ sārdhaṃ sātyakipramukhair nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.2431 //
GE07hv_apppu:14316: cakāra priyakṛt kṛṣṇo yuyudhānena keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2433 //
GE07hv_apppu:14317: mamāyaṃ prathamo golas tava paścād bhaviṣyati /
GE07hv_apppu:14318: iti bruvaṃs tadā viṣṇuḥ sātyakiṃ kamalekṣaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2435 //
GE07hv_apppu:14320: uddhavapramukhā rājann āseduḥ kvacid atra vai // HV_App.I,31.2437 //
GE07hv_apppu:14322: vijahāra yathā rāmaḥ sugrīveṇa purā nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.2439 //
GE07hv_apppu:14324: vikrīḍya suciraṃ kṛṣna upāraṃsīt sayādavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2441 //
GE07hv_apppu:14325: dvāḥsthena vāritāḥ pūrvaṃ dvāry eva ca samāsthitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14326: idam antaram ity eva viviśus tāṃ sabhāṃ nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.2443 //
GE07hv_apppu:14335: vasudevas tathākrūra ugrasenas tathā nṛpaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2452 //
GE07hv_apppu:14336: anye ca yādavāḥ sarve saṃbhramaṃ pratipedire /
GE07hv_apppu:14337: idaṃ kim idam ity evaṃ vyāsaktamanaso 'bhavan // HV_App.I,31.2454 //
GE07hv_apppu:14339: ardhakaupīnavasanaṃ smarantaṃ kam api dvijam // HV_App.I,31.2456 //
GE07hv_apppu:14343: durvāsasaṃ te dadṛśur bhītā yādavasattamāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2460 //
GE07hv_apppu:14344: kiṃ kariṣyaty asau kruddhaḥ kiṃ vā vakṣyati naḥ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14346: idam āsanam ity evaṃ kiṃcid ūcuś ca vṛṣṇayaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2463 //
GE07hv_apppu:14347: tataḥ kṛṣṇo hṛṣīkeśaḥ kiṃcid utplutya tatpuraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14348: idam āsanam ity evaṃ sthīyatām iha nirvṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2465 //
GE07hv_apppu:14349: aham atra sthito vipra kiṃ karomīti cābravīt /
GE07hv_apppu:14350: tataḥ kiṃcid ivāsīna āsane yativigrahaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2467 //
GE07hv_apppu:14352: āsanāni yathāyogaṃ bhejire nirvṛtāḥ kila // HV_App.I,31.2469 //
GE07hv_apppu:14354: āha bhūyo hṛṣīkeśo yatiṃ durvāsasaṃ prabhum /
GE07hv_apppu:14355: kim arthaṃ brūhi viprendra asmin pratyāgamo hi vaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2472 //
GE07hv_apppu:14356: dṛṣṭaṃ vāpy atha vā kiṃcit kāraṇaṃ vo 'sti vā mahat /
GE07hv_apppu:14358: niḥspṛhāś ca sadā yūyam asmatto dvijapuṅgavāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14359: prārthyaṃ nāma na caivāsti spṛhā naivāsti vo yataḥ // HV_App.I,31.2476 //
GE07hv_apppu:14361: nirūpyamāṇam asmābhir vipra kiṃcin na dṛśyate // HV_App.I,31.2478 //
GE07hv_apppu:14362: na jāne kāraṇaṃ brahman yuṣmadāgamanaṃ prati /
GE07hv_apppu:14363: etāvatā cānumeyaṃ kiṃcit kāraṇam asti hi /
GE07hv_apppu:14364: tad brūhi yadi vidyeta tvatto jñāsyāmahe vayam // HV_App.I,31.2481 //
GE07hv_apppu:14366: tasyāpi rājan viprasya bhūyaḥ kopo mahān abhūt /
GE07hv_apppu:14367: tasmād abhyadhikaḥ pūrvāt kopaḥ saṃjāyate mahān // HV_App.I,31.2484 //
GE07hv_apppu:14368: didhakṣann iva lokāṃs trīn bhakṣayann iva paśyataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14369: roṣaraktekṣaṇaḥ kruddho hasann iva dahann iva /
GE07hv_apppu:14370: uvāca vacanaṃ viṣṇuṃ durvāsāḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2487 //
GE07hv_apppu:14371: na jāna iti kasmāt tvaṃ brūṣe no yādaveśvara /
GE07hv_apppu:14372: jānāmi tvām ahaṃ deva vañcayann iva bhāṣase /
GE07hv_apppu:14375: nigūhase prabhur ataḥ kasmān no jagatīpate // HV_App.I,31.2492 //
GE07hv_apppu:14376: so 'si brahmavidāṃ mūrtis tad etat paramaṃ padam /
GE07hv_apppu:14377: yad avyaktaṃ paraṃ brahma yac ca jñātā vayaṃ purā // HV_App.I,31.2494 //
GE07hv_apppu:14378: yato viśvam idaṃ bhūtaṃ tad etat paramaṃ padaṃ /
GE07hv_apppu:14379: yac ca sthūlaṃ vijānanti purā tattvena cetasā // HV_App.I,31.2496 //
GE07hv_apppu:14380: purāvido 'tha viśveśa tad etat paramaṃ vapuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14381: karmaṇā prāpyate yat tu yat smṛtvā nirvṛtā vayam // HV_App.I,31.2498 //
GE07hv_apppu:14382: pratyakṣam api yad rūpaṃ naiva jānanti māṇuṣāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14383: na hi mūḍhadhiyo deva na vayaṃ tādṛśā hare // HV_App.I,31.2500 //
GE07hv_apppu:14384: na jāna iti kasmāt tvaṃ kim ataḥ sāhasaṃ vacaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14385: ye hi mūlaṃ vijānanti teṣāṃ patravivecanam // HV_App.I,31.2502 //
GE07hv_apppu:14386: kurvataḥ kiṃ phalaṃ deva tava keśiniṣūdana /
GE07hv_apppu:14387: vedānte prathitaṃ tejas tava cedaṃ vibhāvyate // HV_App.I,31.2504 //
GE07hv_apppu:14388: yac ca vijñānatṛptās tu yogino vītakalmaṣāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14389: paśyanti hṛtsaroje hi tad evedaṃ vapuḥ prabho // HV_App.I,31.2506 //
GE07hv_apppu:14390: vedair yad gīyate tejo brahmeti pravibhajyate /
GE07hv_apppu:14391: tad evedaṃ vijāne 'haṃ rūpam aiśvaram īśvara // HV_App.I,31.2508 //
GE07hv_apppu:14392: vaiṣṇavaṃ paramaṃ teja iti vedeṣu paṭhyate /
GE07hv_apppu:14393: avagacchāmy ahaṃ viṣṇo tad evedaṃ vapus tava // HV_App.I,31.2510 //
GE07hv_apppu:14394: ya om ity ucyate śabdo yasya vāg iti gīyate /
GE07hv_apppu:14395: sa evāsi prabho viṣṇo na jāna iti mā vada // HV_App.I,31.2512 //
GE07hv_apppu:14396: parokṣaṃ yadi kiṃcit syāt tava vaktuṃ prayujyate /
GE07hv_apppu:14397: na jāna iti govinda mā vadīḥ sāhasaṃ hare // HV_App.I,31.2514 //
GE07hv_apppu:14398: viśvaṃ yataḥ prādur āsīd yasmiṃl līnaṃ kṣaye sati /
GE07hv_apppu:14399: idaṃ tad aiśvaraṃ tejas tv avagacchāmi keśava // HV_App.I,31.2516 //
GE07hv_apppu:14400: kartā tvaṃ bhūtabhavyeśa pratibhāsi sadā hṛdi /
GE07hv_apppu:14401: yad yad rūpaṃ smaren nityaṃ tat tad evāsi me hṛdi // HV_App.I,31.2518 //
GE07hv_apppu:14402: vāyur eva sadā viṣṇur iti me dhīyate matiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14403: tadā tad rūpam evāsi hṛnmadhye saṃsthito vibho // HV_App.I,31.2520 //
GE07hv_apppu:14404: ākāśo viṣṇur ity eva kadācid dhīyate matiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14405: tadā tad rūpam evāsi hṛnmadhye saṃsthito vibho // HV_App.I,31.2522 //
GE07hv_apppu:14406: pṛthivī viṣṇur ity etat kadācid dhīyate matiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14407: tadā pārthivarūpo 'si pratibhāsi sadā mama // HV_App.I,31.2524 //
GE07hv_apppu:14408: raso 'yaṃ deva ity eva kadācic cintyate mayā /
GE07hv_apppu:14409: tadā rasātmanā viṣṇo hṛnmadhye saṃsthito vibho // HV_App.I,31.2526 //
GE07hv_apppu:14410: yadā tvaṃ teja ity eva smartā syāṃ puruṣottama /
GE07hv_apppu:14411: yadā tadrūpasaṃpannaḥ pratibhāsi sadā hṛdi // HV_App.I,31.2528 //
GE07hv_apppu:14412: candramā harir ity eva tadā cāndramasaṃ vapuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14413: nirīkṣaṃś cakṣuṣā deva tataḥ prīto 'smi keśava // HV_App.I,31.2530 //
GE07hv_apppu:14414: yadā sauraṃ vapur iti smartā syāṃ jagatīpate /
GE07hv_apppu:14415: tadā tadbhāvanāyogāt sūrya eva virājase // HV_App.I,31.2532 //
GE07hv_apppu:14416: tasmāt sarvaṃ tvam evāsi niścitā matir īdṛśī /
GE07hv_apppu:14417: ato na jāne 'ham iti vaktuṃ neśo janārdana // HV_App.I,31.2534 //
GE07hv_apppu:14418: ity arthe saṃsthito viṣṇo pīḍāṃ no naiva cintyase /
GE07hv_apppu:14419: atyantaduḥkhitā viṣṇo vayaṃ tvām anu saṃsthitāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2536 //
GE07hv_apppu:14420: īdṛśīyam avasthā no naināṃ smartāsi keśava /
GE07hv_apppu:14421: tat punar bhāgadheyaṃ no naṣṭam ity eva cintaye /
GE07hv_apppu:14422: mandabhāgyā vayaṃ viṣṇo yato no na smareḥ prabho // HV_App.I,31.2539 //
GE07hv_apppu:14424: nāmnā ca haṃsaḍibhakau bādhete no janārdana /
GE07hv_apppu:14425: gārhasthyaṃ hi sadā śreyo vadantāv iti keśava // HV_App.I,31.2542 //
GE07hv_apppu:14426: itaś cetaś ca dhāvantau vadantau bahu kilbiṣam /
GE07hv_apppu:14427: ayuktaṃ bahu bhāṣantau dharṣayantau ca naḥ sadā // HV_App.I,31.2544 //
GE07hv_apppu:14428: idam anyat kṛtaṃ deva asahyaṃ pāpam ucyate /
GE07hv_apppu:14429: paśyedaṃ bahudhā deva bhinnaṃ bhinnaṃ sahasraśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14430: śikyaṃ ca dāravaṃ pātraṃ dvidalān veṇukān bahūn // HV_App.I,31.2547 //
GE07hv_apppu:14431: idam apy aparaṃ paśya tayoḥ sāhasaceṣṭitam /
GE07hv_apppu:14432: kaupīnaṃ bahudhā chinnaṃ tad asmākaṃ mahad dhanam /
GE07hv_apppu:14434: tvaṃ tu no rakṣase nityaṃ kṣātravṛttaṃ samāśritaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14435: citraṃ citram idaṃ deva rakṣasy eva divāniśam // HV_App.I,31.2552 //
GE07hv_apppu:14436: kiṃ kariṣyāmi mandātmā mandabhāgyā vayaṃ vibho /
GE07hv_apppu:14437: kiṃ naḥ śaraṇam adyaiva tad brūhi jagatīpate // HV_App.I,31.2554 //
GE07hv_apppu:14438: jīvantau tau yadi syātāṃ naṣṭā lokā ime trayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14439: na viprā na ca rājāno na vaiśyā na ca pādajāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2556 //
GE07hv_apppu:14441: na tayoḥ purataḥ sthātuṃ śaktā devāḥ savāsavāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2558 //
GE07hv_apppu:14442: na ca bhīṣmo na vā rājā bāhlīko bhīmavikramaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14443: yo hi vīro jarāsaṃdhaḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ bhayaṃkaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.2560 //
GE07hv_apppu:14445: tayoḥ śakto hare kṛṣṇa nityam apratisaṅginoḥ // HV_App.I,31.2562 //
GE07hv_apppu:14446: tasmāt tvaṃ jahi tau vīrau rakṣa lokān imān prabho /
GE07hv_apppu:14447: anyathā rakṣasīty evaṃ śabdo vyartho 'tra jāyate // HV_App.I,31.2564 //
GE07hv_apppu:14448: bahunātra kim uktena rakṣa rakṣa jagattrayam /
GE07hv_apppu:14449: ity uktvā virarāmaiva durvāsāḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2566 //
GE07hv_apppu:14453: yater vacanam ākarṇya mandam ucchvasya keśavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14455: kṣantavyaṃ bhavatā pūrvaṃ doṣa eṣa mamaiva hi /
GE07hv_apppu:14456: śṛṇu vākyaṃ mamaitat tu śrutvā kṣamaparo bhava // HV_App.I,31.2570 //
GE07hv_apppu:14457: jeṣyāmi tau raṇe vipra haṃsaṃ ḍibhakam eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:14458: girīśo vā varaṃ dadyāc chakro vā dhanado 'pi vā // HV_App.I,31.2572 //
GE07hv_apppu:14459: yamo vā varuṇo vāpi brahmā vātha caturmukhaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14460: sabalau sānugau hatvā punar dāsyāmi vo ratim // HV_App.I,31.2574 //
GE07hv_apppu:14461: satyenaiva śapāmy adya mā roṣavaśam anvagāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14462: rakṣāṃ vo 'haṃ kariṣyāmi hatvā tau ca nṛpādhamau // HV_App.I,31.2576 //
GE07hv_apppu:14463: jānāmi tau durātmānau yuṣmaddoṣakarau hi tau /
GE07hv_apppu:14464: śrutaṃ ca pūrvam asmābhis tīkṣṇadaṇḍadharāv iti // HV_App.I,31.2578 //
GE07hv_apppu:14467: prāṇān api tayo rājā dāsyaty eva na saṃśayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14469: jaye tayor vipravarya tatra śreyo bhaveta naḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14470: yatra yatra ca tau gatvā sthitāv ity anuśuśruma /
GE07hv_apppu:14471: tatra tatra ca hantāhaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // HV_App.I,31.2585 //
GE07hv_apppu:14474: tataḥ prītaḥ prasannātmā yādaveśvaram āha saḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14475: svasty astu bhavate kṛṣṇa jagatāṃ svasti sarvadā // HV_App.I,31.2589 //
GE07hv_apppu:14476: kiṃ nu nāma jagannātha duḥsādhyaṃ tava keśava /
GE07hv_apppu:14479: viṣṇo deva hare kṛṣṇa namas te cakrapāṇaye // HV_App.I,31.2593 //
GE07hv_apppu:14482: ajñānād atha vā jñānād yan mayoktaṃ kṣamasva tat // HV_App.I,31.2596 //
GE07hv_apppu:14483: tvam evāhaṃ jagannātha nāvayor antaraṃ pṛthak /
GE07hv_apppu:14484: ataḥ kṣamasva bhagavan kṣamāsārā hi sādhavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2598 //
GE07hv_apppu:14486: kṣantavyaṃ bhavatā vipra kṣamāsārā vayaṃ sadā /
GE07hv_apppu:14487: saṃnyāsinaḥ kṣamāsārāḥ kṣamā teṣāṃ paraṃ balam // HV_App.I,31.2600 //
GE07hv_apppu:14488: kṣamā mokṣakarī nityaṃ tattvajñānam iva dvija /
GE07hv_apppu:14489: kṣamā dharmaḥ kṣamā satyaṃ kṣamā dānaṃ kṣamā yaśaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2602 //
GE07hv_apppu:14490: kṣamā svargasya sopānam iti vedavido viduḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14491: tasmāt sarvaprayatnena kṣamāṃ pālayata svakām // HV_App.I,31.2604 //
GE07hv_apppu:14493: ete te yatayo viprāḥ pūjanīyā mayādya vai // HV_App.I,31.2606 //
GE07hv_apppu:14494: bhoktavyā yatayo viprā bhikṣukāḥ sarva eva hi /
GE07hv_apppu:14495: tatheti te pratijñāya bhoktum aicchan harer gṛhe // HV_App.I,31.2608 //
GE07hv_apppu:14496: tataḥ svabhavanaṃ viṣṇuḥ praviśya harir īśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14498: bhojayām āsa tān sarvān yatīn yativarārcitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2611 //
GE07hv_apppu:14499: chittvā chittvā ca deveśo dukūlāni mṛdūni saḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14500: dadau tebhyas tadā viṣṇuḥ sarvebhyo janamejaya /
GE07hv_apppu:14501: te ca prītā yathāyogaṃ yataḥ pūrvaṃ tato gatāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2614 //
GE07hv_apppu:14504: durvāsās tv atha tatraiva nāradena sahāyavān /
GE07hv_apppu:14506: bhagavān api govindas tayor vadham amanyata // HV_App.I,31.2617 //
GE07hv_apppu:14507: tatas tau haṃsaḍibhakau tasmin kāle mahīpate /
GE07hv_apppu:14511: asmin māsi nṛpaśreṣṭha yatāmo yajñasiddhaye // HV_App.I,31.2622 //
GE07hv_apppu:14513: yatiṣyāvo balaiḥ sārdhaṃ rathair aśvair gajair api // HV_App.I,31.2624 //
GE07hv_apppu:14515: tatheti sa mahārājo brahmadatto 'bravīt tadā // HV_App.I,31.2626 //
GE07hv_apppu:14517: aśakyam iti manvāno vayasyaṃ haṃsam abravīt // HV_App.I,31.2628 //
GE07hv_apppu:14518: śṛṇu haṃsa vaco mahyaṃ śrutvā niścitya vīryavān /
GE07hv_apppu:14519: āyuṣman sāhasaṃ kartuṃ niścito 'si nṛpottama // HV_App.I,31.2630 //
GE07hv_apppu:14520: sthite bhīṣme jarāsaṃdhe bāhlīke ca nṛpottame /
GE07hv_apppu:14521: kiṃ ca vīreṣu sarveṣu yādaveṣu nṛpottama // HV_App.I,31.2632 //
GE07hv_apppu:14522: bhīṣmo hi balavān vṛddhaḥ satyasaṃdho jitendriyaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14524: taṃ yuddhe jitavān bhīṣmaḥ sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,31.2635 //
GE07hv_apppu:14525: jarāsaṃdhasya yad vīryaṃ tad bhavān vetti saṃyuge /
GE07hv_apppu:14526: vṛṣṇivīrās tu te sarve kṛtāstrā yuddhadurmadāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2637 //
GE07hv_apppu:14527: tatra kṛṣṇo hṛṣīkeśo jitaśatruḥ kṛtī sadā /
GE07hv_apppu:14529: pramukhe tasya na sthātuṃ śakto jīvan nṛpottama // HV_App.I,31.2640 //
GE07hv_apppu:14530: balabhadras tathā mattaḥ kruddho yadi bhaved balī /
GE07hv_apppu:14531: lokān imān samāhartuṃ śaknotīti matir mama // HV_App.I,31.2642 //
GE07hv_apppu:14532: tathā ca sātyakir vīraḥ śakto jetuṃ raṇe ripūn /
GE07hv_apppu:14533: tathānye yādavāḥ sarve kṛṣṇam āśritya daṃśitāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2644 //
GE07hv_apppu:14534: asmābhiś ca kṛtaḥ pūrvaṃ virodho yatibhiḥ saha /
GE07hv_apppu:14535: durvāsā yatibhiḥ sārdhaṃ gato draṣṭuṃ sa keśavam // HV_App.I,31.2646 //
GE07hv_apppu:14536: iti śrutaṃ nṛpaśreṣṭha brāhmaṇād bhoktum āgatāt /
GE07hv_apppu:14537: tathā sati yathā sidhyet tathā cintyaṃ ca mantribhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14538: tataḥ paścād vidhāsyāmo rājasūyaṃ mahākratum // HV_App.I,31.2649 //
GE07hv_apppu:14540: ko nāma bhīṣmo mandātmā vṛddho hīnabalaḥ sadā /
GE07hv_apppu:14541: āvayoḥ purataḥ sthātuṃ śaktaḥ kila sa vṛddhakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2651 //
GE07hv_apppu:14542: yādavā iti citraṃ naḥ śaktāḥ sthātuṃ raṇe dvija /
GE07hv_apppu:14543: kaś ca kṛṣṇaḥ puraḥ sthātuṃ baladevaś ca mattakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2653 //
GE07hv_apppu:14544: śaineyaś cāpi viprendra sthātuṃ nālaṃ vicitratā /
GE07hv_apppu:14545: jarāsaṃdhas tu dharmātmā bandhur eva sadā mama // HV_App.I,31.2655 //
GE07hv_apppu:14546: gaccha vipra yaduśreṣṭhaṃ brūhi madvacanāt tvaran /
GE07hv_apppu:14547: dīyatāṃ karasarvasvaṃ yajñārthaṃ lavaṇaṃ bahu // HV_App.I,31.2657 //
GE07hv_apppu:14548: lavaṇāni bahūny āśu gṛhya keśava māciram /
GE07hv_apppu:14549: āgaccha tvaritaṃ kṛṣṇa na te kāryaṃ vilambanam /
GE07hv_apppu:14550: iti brūhi yaduśreṣṭhaṃ yāhi tvaritavikramaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2660 //
GE07hv_apppu:14551: na brūyāś cottaraṃ vipra śapeyaṃ tvāṃ priyo 'si me /
GE07hv_apppu:14552: mitrabhāvād idaṃ brūhi śapāmi tvāṃ punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2662 //
GE07hv_apppu:14554: mitrabhāvāt tathā rājan snehāc ca janamejaya // HV_App.I,31.2664 //
GE07hv_apppu:14555: janārdanas tu dharmātmā nityaṃ gantuṃ samudyataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14556: adya śvo vā paraśvo vā gacchāmīti yateta saḥ // HV_App.I,31.2666 //
GE07hv_apppu:14558: eka eva ca dharmātmā hayam āruhya satvaram // HV_App.I,31.2668 //
GE07hv_apppu:14559: prātar eva jagāmāśu draṣṭuṃ dvāravatīṃ dvijaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14560: hariṃ kṛṣṇaṃ hṛṣīkeśaṃ manasā saṃsmaran dvijaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2670 //
GE07hv_apppu:14562: prabhuṃ kṛṣṇaṃ hṛṣīkeśaṃ manasā saṃsmaran harim /
GE07hv_apppu:14565: tataḥ prāyād dhariṃ draṣṭuṃ brāhmaṇo brahmavittamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14566: hayenaikena rājendra tvaritaṃ sa yayau nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.2672 //
GE07hv_apppu:14568: pāntho yāti jalaṃ dṛṣṭvā tvaritaṃ tatpipāsayā /
GE07hv_apppu:14569: dhāvaty eva tathā vipro hariṃ draṣṭuṃ janārdanam // HV_App.I,31.2675 //
GE07hv_apppu:14570: gacchan sa cintayām āsa codayan hayam uttamam /
GE07hv_apppu:14571: haṃsa eva yathā nityaṃ kuryāt priyahitaṃ mama /
GE07hv_apppu:14572: tathā hi preṣitas tena hariṃ paśyety ahaṃ prabhum // HV_App.I,31.2678 //
GE07hv_apppu:14573: aham eva sadā dhanyo matto hy abhyadhiko na ca /
GE07hv_apppu:14574: yato drakṣyāmy ahaṃ viṣṇuṃ vasantaṃ dvārakāpure // HV_App.I,31.2680 //
GE07hv_apppu:14575: sā hi me jananī dhanyā hariṃ dṛṣṭvā punar gatam /
GE07hv_apppu:14576: kṛtārthaṃ sarvathā putraṃ drakṣyaty eṣā manasvinī // HV_App.I,31.2682 //
GE07hv_apppu:14582: paśyāmy aham adīnātmā naṣṭaduḥkho 'smi nirvṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2688 //
GE07hv_apppu:14584: api vā matpriyaṃ brūyāt svasti ceti ca vā vadet // HV_App.I,31.2690 //
GE07hv_apppu:14586: pādābjaṃ cakriṇo draṣṭuṃ tvarayaty eva māṃ manaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2692 //
GE07hv_apppu:14588: paśyann iva ca gacchāmi smarann aniśam īśvaram // HV_App.I,31.2694 //
GE07hv_apppu:14590: īṣat smitādharaṃ viṣṇuṃ paśyāmi ca punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2696 //
GE07hv_apppu:14591: smarataś ca hare rūpaṃ lomaharṣo 'yam īdṛśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14592: gacchataś ca puro bhāti śaṅkhacakragadāsimān // HV_App.I,31.2698 //
GE07hv_apppu:14593: yātīva ca puro bhāti mahyaṃ devo jagadguruḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14594: eṣo 'yam iti me vaktuṃ jihvā prasphuratīva tam // HV_App.I,31.2700 //
GE07hv_apppu:14595: idaṃ duḥkhataraṃ manye karaṃ dehīti yad vacaḥ /

GE07hv_apppu:14598: tasya sarvaṃ puro gatvā vaktāhaṃ kila nirdayaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2704 //
GE07hv_apppu:14599: mūḍhānām agraṇīr asmi nirlajjaś ca tathā vadan /

GE07hv_apppu:14602: iti vaktuṃ na me yuktaṃ puratas tasya śārṅgiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2708 //
GE07hv_apppu:14603: tathāpi mitrabhāvāt tu vaktavyaṃ ghoram īdṛśam /

GE07hv_apppu:14605: atha vā sarvavid viṣṇuḥ sarvasya hṛdi saṃsthitam /

GE07hv_apppu:14607: tathā sati na me doṣo mitrabhāvo yato hy ayam /
GE07hv_apppu:14608: sarvathā rakṣatāṃ viṣṇur ghoraṃ vaktuṃ yatasya me // HV_App.I,31.2714 //
GE07hv_apppu:14612: drakṣyāmi cakriṇaṃ viṣṇuṃ keśavaṃ yādaveśvaram // HV_App.I,31.2718 //
GE07hv_apppu:14616: adya me saphalaṃ janma sākṣātkṛtavato hariṃ // HV_App.I,31.2722 //
GE07hv_apppu:14617: adya me saphalā yajñāḥ sākṣāt kṛtavato harim /

GE07hv_apppu:14619: prītimānas tu me viṣṇur vaktur ghorasya karmaṇaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14620: unmiṣan netrayugmena drakṣyāmy asakṛd īśvaram // HV_App.I,31.2726 //
GE07hv_apppu:14621: āmūlamastakaṃ viṣṇuṃ paśyāmi ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14622: pibāmi netrayugmena vapuḥ kṛṣṇasya kevalam // HV_App.I,31.2728 //
GE07hv_apppu:14624: tataḥ kṛtārthatāṃ yāsye svargamārgo hi tadrajaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2730 //
GE07hv_apppu:14626: pādābjaṃ cakriṇo viṣṇoḥ paśyāmi ca jagatpateḥ // HV_App.I,31.2732 //
GE07hv_apppu:14628: harer idaṃ jagadrūpaṃ paśyāmīva ca sarvataḥ // HV_App.I,31.2734 //
GE07hv_apppu:14629: prasīdatu sadā viṣṇur ayuktaṃ vaktum icchataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14636: kadā drakṣyāmi deveśam idānīm atha vānyadā /
GE07hv_apppu:14637: sarvathā kṛtakṛtyo 'haṃ yad vapur draṣṭum udyataḥ // HV_App.I,31.2743 //
GE07hv_apppu:14638: namo mahyaṃ namo mahyaṃ yato draṣṭum ahaṃ harim /
GE07hv_apppu:14640: drakṣyāmy avaśyam adyaiva viṣṇuṃ jiṣṇuṃ jagadgurum // HV_App.I,31.2746 //
GE07hv_apppu:14644: tejomayaṃ mama harer vapur astu bhūtyai || HV_App.I,31.2750 ||
GE07hv_apppu:14649: dhyeyaṃ mumukṣubhir ameyam anādy anantaṃ @ HV_App.I,31.2755 @
GE07hv_apppu:14653: cintayann iti viprendro yayau dvāravatīṃ purīm /

GE07hv_apppu:14658: atha praviśya dharmātmā sudharmāṃ vai dvijottamaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2762 //
GE07hv_apppu:14666: udgīyamānaṃ vipraiś ca sāmabhiḥ sāmagair harim // HV_App.I,31.2770 //
GE07hv_apppu:14669: balabhadraṃ tato bhūyo vavande śirasā dvijaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2773 //
GE07hv_apppu:14671: iti bruvāṇaṃ viprendram idam āha sa mādhavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2775 //
GE07hv_apppu:14672: āssvedaṃ viṣṭaraṃ pūrvaṃ paścād būhi prayojanam /
GE07hv_apppu:14673: tatheti cābravīd vipro mahad āsanam āsthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2777 //
GE07hv_apppu:14674: vācā saṃpūjya viprendram apṛcchat kuśalaṃ hariḥ /

GE07hv_apppu:14676: śrutaṃ cāpi tayor vīryaṃ tataḥ prīto dvijottama /
GE07hv_apppu:14677: api vā kuśalaṃ vipra pitus tava janārdana // HV_App.I,31.2781 //
GE07hv_apppu:14679: iti śrutvā giraṃ viṣṇos tathety āha janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14680: saṃgatiś ca girīśāt tu śrutā me vīryatas tayoḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14681: iti śrutvā giraṃ viṣṇos tathety āha janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2783 //
GE07hv_apppu:14682: kuśalaṃ brahmadattasya pituś ca mama keśava /
GE07hv_apppu:14683: tayor eva jagannātha haṃsasya ḍibhakasya ca // HV_App.I,31.2785 //
GE07hv_apppu:14685: kim āhatur mahīpālau tau haṃsaḍibhakau nṛpau /
GE07hv_apppu:14686: brūhi sarvam aśeṣeṇa nātra śaṅkā dvijottama // HV_App.I,31.2787 //
GE07hv_apppu:14687: vācyaṃ vāpy atha vāvācyaṃ kartavyam atha vetaram /
GE07hv_apppu:14688: śrutvā tasya vidhāsyāmo yuktarūpaṃ dvijottama // HV_App.I,31.2789 //
GE07hv_apppu:14690: yat karma rājanirdiṣṭaṃ tad vācyaṃ dūtajanmanā // HV_App.I,31.2791 //
GE07hv_apppu:14691: nātra śaṅkā tvayā kāryā vaktavyasyetarasya vā /
GE07hv_apppu:14692: ato vada yathāproktaṃ tābhyāṃ mama janārdana // HV_App.I,31.2793 //
GE07hv_apppu:14694: ajānann iva kiṃ brūṣe sarvaṃ pratyakṣadarśivān // HV_App.I,31.2795 //
GE07hv_apppu:14695: na cāsti te parokṣaṃ tu jagadvṛttāntam acyuta /
GE07hv_apppu:14696: sarvaṃ hi manasā paśyan kiṃ tvam āttha vadeti mām // HV_App.I,31.2797 //
GE07hv_apppu:14697: vidvadbhir gīyase viṣṇo tvam eva jagatīpate /
GE07hv_apppu:14699: tvam evedaṃ jagat sarvaṃ jagac ca tvayi tiṣṭhati /
GE07hv_apppu:14700: na tvayā rahito hy ekaḥ padārthaḥ sacarācaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.2801 //
GE07hv_apppu:14701: nāsti kiṃcid avedyaṃ te sarvago 'si jagatpate /
GE07hv_apppu:14702: tvam indraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ rudraḥ saṃhārakarmakṛt // HV_App.I,31.2803 //
GE07hv_apppu:14704: saṃsārasya bhavān sraṣṭā kiṃ tvam āttha vadeti mām // HV_App.I,31.2805 //
GE07hv_apppu:14705: vidvadbhir gīyase viṣṇo jñānātmeti ca mādhava /

GE07hv_apppu:14707: śabdaṃ śabdavidaḥ prāhus tvām eva puruṣottama /
GE07hv_apppu:14708: tathā sati hṛṣīkeśa kiṃ tvam āttha vadeti mām // HV_App.I,31.2809 //
GE07hv_apppu:14709: tathāpi śṛṇu deveśa codito 'si yatas tvayā /
GE07hv_apppu:14710: vadety asakṛd evaitat tasmād vakṣyāmi mādhava // HV_App.I,31.2811 //
GE07hv_apppu:14712: tadarthaṃ preṣitas tābhyāṃ haṃsena ḍibhakena ca // HV_App.I,31.2813 //
GE07hv_apppu:14714: lavaṇaṃ bahu deyaṃ te yajñārthaṃ tasya keśava // HV_App.I,31.2815 //
GE07hv_apppu:14715: ity arthaṃ preṣitas tābhyāṃ karaṃ dehi tadājñayā /
GE07hv_apppu:14716: idam apy aparaṃ tābhyāṃ uktaṃ śṛṇu jagatpate // HV_App.I,31.2817 //
GE07hv_apppu:14717: lavaṇāni bahūny āśu pragṛhya tvarito bhavān /
GE07hv_apppu:14718: āgacchatu tayo rājñoḥ seyaṃ keśava vāgvibho // HV_App.I,31.2819 //
GE07hv_apppu:14719: ity uktavati viprendre dūte tatra tayor nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:14720: prahasya suciraṃ kṛṣṇo babhāṣe dūtam īśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.2821 //
GE07hv_apppu:14721: śṛṇu dūta vaco mahyaṃ yuktam uktaṃ dvijottama /

GE07hv_apppu:14723: dhārṣṭyaṃ etat tayor vipra matto yat tu karagrahaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14725: aho dhārṣṭyam aho dhārṣṭyaṃ tayoḥ kṣatriyabījayoḥ // HV_App.I,31.2825 //
GE07hv_apppu:14726: idam aśrutapūrvaṃ me matto yas tu karagrahaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14727: ity uktvā keśavo dūtam idam āha sma yādavān // HV_App.I,31.2827 //
GE07hv_apppu:14728: hāsyam etad yaduśreṣṭhā matto yat tu karagrahaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14730: tau taṃ yājayitārau ca haṃso ḍibhaka eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:14731: voḍhā kila yaduśreṣṭhā lavaṇasya durātmanoḥ // HV_App.I,31.2831 //
GE07hv_apppu:14733: hāsyaṃ hāsyam idaṃ hāsyaṃ śṛṇudhvaṃ yādavā vacaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2833 //
GE07hv_apppu:14735: yādavāḥ sarva evaite hāsāya samavasthitāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2835 //
GE07hv_apppu:14736: karadaḥ kṛṣṇa ity evaṃ bruvantaḥ sarvasātvatāḥ /

GE07hv_apppu:14740: aho kaṣṭam aho kaṣṭaṃ dautyaṃ yat kṛtavān aham /
GE07hv_apppu:14741: iti lajjāsamāviṣṭas tūṣṇīm āsīd avāṅmukhaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2841 //
GE07hv_apppu:14744: hāsaṃ kurvatsu teṣv evaṃ keśavaḥ keśisūdanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14745: uvāca vacanaṃ dūtaṃ gaccha madvacanād dvija /
GE07hv_apppu:14746: tāv itthaṃ haṃsaḍibhakau brūhi tvaritavikrama // HV_App.I,31.2844 //
GE07hv_apppu:14750: śiro vaś chetsyate cakraṃ matkaraprahitaṃ bali // HV_App.I,31.2848 //
GE07hv_apppu:14751: yo varaṃ dattavāñ śarvo yuvayor dhārṣṭyakāraṇam /
GE07hv_apppu:14752: sa eva rakṣitā vāṃ syāt taṃ jitvā vā nihanmy aham // HV_App.I,31.2850 //
GE07hv_apppu:14753: deśo 'yaṃ saṃvidhātavyo yatra naḥ saṃgatir bhavet /

GE07hv_apppu:14755: bhavantau nirbhayau bhūtvā gacchetāṃ sabalau nṛpau /

GE07hv_apppu:14757: tatrāhaṃ sabalo yātā nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // HV_App.I,31.2855 //

GE07hv_apppu:14760: tvayā saha tato gatvā sākṣibhūto bhava dvija // HV_App.I,31.2858 //
GE07hv_apppu:14761: idaṃ ca jāne viprendra sneho mama sadā tvayi /
GE07hv_apppu:14762: tena tvaṃ vijayī bhūyāḥ saṃsāre duḥkhasaṃkule /
GE07hv_apppu:14763: matkathāparamo nityaṃ sadā bhava janārdana // HV_App.I,31.2861 //
GE07hv_apppu:14766: ity uktvā brāhmaṇaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ sātyakiṃ punar āha ca /
GE07hv_apppu:14767: gaccha śaineya vipreṇa brūhi madvacanāt tayoḥ // HV_App.I,31.2863 //
GE07hv_apppu:14768: yan mayoktam aśeṣeṇa vada gatvā tayor yado /
GE07hv_apppu:14769: yathā naḥ saṃgatir yuddhe tathā vada balād yado // HV_App.I,31.2865 //
GE07hv_apppu:14771: ekenāśvena gaccha tvam asahāyo yadūttama // HV_App.I,31.2867 //
GE07hv_apppu:14772: sātyakis taṃ tathety uktvā hayam āruhya śīghragam /
GE07hv_apppu:14773: gantum aicchat tato rājann asahāyaḥ sa sātyakiḥ // HV_App.I,31.2869 //
GE07hv_apppu:14775: aho dhārṣṭyam aho dārṣṭyam ity uvāca janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2871 //
GE07hv_apppu:14777: sa yayau sālvanagaraṃ śaineyena saha dvijaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2873 //
GE07hv_apppu:14779: āsanaṃ mahad āsthāya visṛjya yadave punaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14780: āste yathāsukhaṃ vipraḥ śaineyena samanvitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2876 //
GE07hv_apppu:14781: atha taṃ haṃsaḍibhayor darśayām āsa sātyakim /

GE07hv_apppu:14783: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā haṃsaḥ prāha vacas tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:14784: śrutyā samāgataḥ pūrvam adya dṛṣṭo mayā tv asau // HV_App.I,31.2880 //
GE07hv_apppu:14785: dhanurvede ca vede ca śastraśāstre tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:14786: nipuṇo 'yaṃ sadā śūra ity evam anuśuśrumaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14787: adya dṛṣṭipathaṃ prāptaḥ prītiṃ me vidadhāty asau // HV_App.I,31.2883 //
GE07hv_apppu:14791: tato janārdanaṃ prāha haṃso vākyaviśāradaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2887 //

GE07hv_apppu:14793: vada sarvam aśeṣeṇa mā vṛthā kālam atyagāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2889 //
GE07hv_apppu:14796: ity uktavati haṃse ca dharmātmātha janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14797: uvāca prasahan vīraḥ stuvan nārāyaṇaṃ tadā // HV_App.I,31.2891 //

GE07hv_apppu:14845: hasantam evam adrākṣaṃ karaṃ dehīty ataḥ param /
GE07hv_apppu:14846: vadantaṃ nārade vācaṃ durvāsasi yatīśvare // HV_App.I,31.2935 //
GE07hv_apppu:14848: dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvā hariṃ devaṃ punaḥ punar acintayam // HV_App.I,31.2937 //
GE07hv_apppu:14849: asādhyam idam ārabdhaṃ tābhyām iti nṛpottama /
GE07hv_apppu:14850: nārabdhavyam idaṃ kāryam itaḥprabhṛti bhūmipa // HV_App.I,31.2939 //
GE07hv_apppu:14851: nivṛttā sā kathā haṃsa yat karagrahaṇaṃ tava /
GE07hv_apppu:14852: eṣa te 'śeṣam akhilaṃ vakṣyaty eva hi sātyakiḥ // HV_App.I,31.2941 //
GE07hv_apppu:14853: etad vacanaṃ ākarṇya haṃsaḥ kruddho 'bravīd vacaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14854: are brāhmaṇadāyāda kā nāma tava vāg iyam /
GE07hv_apppu:14855: āvayoḥ purato vaktuṃ trailokyaṃ jetum icchatoḥ // HV_App.I,31.2944 //
GE07hv_apppu:14856: māyayā tvāṃ bhramaty eṣa kṛṣṇo līlāvidhānavit /
GE07hv_apppu:14857: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhrama evaiṣa tava saṃjāyate mahān // HV_App.I,31.2946 //
GE07hv_apppu:14863: aho 'dya bhrama evaiṣa darśanāt tasya cakriṇaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2952 //
GE07hv_apppu:14864: idānīṃ ca mahātmāsau bhrāmayaty eva keśavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14865: tvām eva vipra mandātman nindrajālakṛtā hi sā // HV_App.I,31.2954 //
GE07hv_apppu:14866: cāpalyam idam evaitat tava vipra samudbhavam /
GE07hv_apppu:14867: aho nu khalu sādṛśyaṃ kartavyaṃ bhavatā mama // HV_App.I,31.2956 //
GE07hv_apppu:14868: aham etat tvayā vipra marṣaye 'troditaṃ vacaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14869: sakhibhāvād dvijaśreṣṭha anyathā kaḥ sahed idam // HV_App.I,31.2958 //
GE07hv_apppu:14870: gaccha mandamate vipra yatheṣṭaṃ sāṃprataṃ tv itaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14871: gaccha gaccha yatheṣṭaṃ tvaṃ pṛthivīṃ pṛthivīṃ tava // HV_App.I,31.2960 //
GE07hv_apppu:14873: eṣa naḥ prathamaḥ kalpo jeṣyāma iti yādavān /
GE07hv_apppu:14874: gaccha necchāmi vipra tvāṃ draṣṭuṃ paruṣavādinam // HV_App.I,31.2963 //
GE07hv_apppu:14876: na me vipravadhaḥ kāryaḥ kaṣṭāyām api cāpadi // HV_App.I,31.2965 //
GE07hv_apppu:14877: ity uktvā brāhmaṇaṃ haṃso bhūyaḥ sātyakim abravīt /
GE07hv_apppu:14879: kim abravīn nandasutaḥ kiṃ vā me nādiśat karam // HV_App.I,31.2968 //
GE07hv_apppu:14883: dāsyāmi karasarvasvam asinā vā śitena ca /
