GE07hv_apppu:14885: dhārṣṭyaṃ hi tava mandātman kim ato 'pi nṛpādhama /
GE07hv_apppu:14886: devadevāj jagannāthāt karam icchati yo nṛpaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14888: tasya śārṅgaravaṃ śrutvā śaṅkhasya ca hareḥ punaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14889: ko nāma jīvitaṃ kāṅkṣaṃs tiṣṭhedānīṃ tvam adya vai /
GE07hv_apppu:14892: prathamo balabhadro 'sau dvitīyo 'haṃ sa sātyakiḥ // HV_App.I,31.2980 //
GE07hv_apppu:14893: kṛtavarmā tṛtīyas tu caturtho niśaṭho balī /
GE07hv_apppu:14894: pañcamo 'tha ca babhrus tu ṣaṣṭhaś caivotkalaḥ smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2982
GE07hv_apppu:14896: aṣṭamas tv atha sāraṅgo navamo vipṛthus tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:14897: daśamaś coddhavo dhīmān vayam ete balānvitāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2985 //
GE07hv_apppu:14899: devadevasya yuddheṣu tiṣṭhanty eva divāniśam // HV_App.I,31.2987 //
GE07hv_apppu:14900: yau hi vīrau sutau tasya svātmanā sadṛśau bale /
GE07hv_apppu:14901: tāv eva vāṃ kṣamau yuddhe hantuṃ balamadānvitau // HV_App.I,31.2989 //
GE07hv_apppu:14902: yo girīśo girāv eva varaṃ dattvā sa tiṣṭhati /
GE07hv_apppu:14903: yuvāṃ hi kevalau yuddhe tiṣṭhathaḥ saśaraṃ dhanuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14904: gṛhītvā śatrubhiḥ sārdhaṃ yuddhaṃ kartuṃ samudyatau // HV_App.I,31.2992 //
GE07hv_apppu:14905: īdṛśeṣv atha bhṛtyeṣu yuddhaṃ kurvatsu śatrubhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14906: trailokyaṃ rakṣatas tasmāt karam icchan vrajeta kaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2994 //
GE07hv_apppu:14907: haniṣyaty eṣa vāṃ yuddhe trailokyaṃ yo 'dya rakṣati /
GE07hv_apppu:14909: kva naḥ saṃgrāma ity evaṃ punar āha jagatpatiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14910: puṣkare puṇyade nityam uta govardhane girau // HV_App.I,31.2998 //
GE07hv_apppu:14911: mathurāyāṃ prayāge vā darśayetāṃ balāni me /
GE07hv_apppu:14913: rājasūyaṃ mahāyajñaṃ yaṣṭum icchati kaḥ svayam /
GE07hv_apppu:14914: vadan vā svastimān martyas tvāṃ vinā ko vrajet sukham // HV_App.I,31.3002
GE07hv_apppu:14915: idaṃ jāḍyam idaṃ mauḍhyam idam atyadbhutaṃ vacaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14916: idam icchasi cen mūḍha hāsyatāṃ yāsi bhūtale /
GE07hv_apppu:14917: ity uktvā sātyakir vīro hasann iva vibho sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3005 //
GE07hv_apppu:14920: tataḥ kruddho mahārāja haṃso ḍibhaka eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:14922: didhakṣantau diśaḥ sarvāḥ sarvān vīkṣya nṛpottamān /
GE07hv_apppu:14923: karaṃ kareṇa niṣpīḍya smarantau tadvaco mahat // HV_App.I,31.3009 //
GE07hv_apppu:14924: kva nu kva vā nandasūnuḥ kva vā rāmo balotkaṭaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14925: iti bruvāṇau sākṣepau sātyakiṃ satyasaṃgaram // HV_App.I,31.3011 //
GE07hv_apppu:14926: are yādavadāyāda kiṃ brūṣe naḥ purogataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14927: ito nirgaccha mandātman dūtas tvam asi sāṃpratam // HV_App.I,31.3013 //
GE07hv_apppu:14928: anyathā vadhya eva tvaṃ pralapan paruṣaṃ vacaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14929: satyaṃ nirlajja evāsi yad brūyā īdṛśaṃ vacaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3015 //
GE07hv_apppu:14930: āvām idaṃ jagat sarvaṃ śāsituṃ saṃyatau nṛpau /
GE07hv_apppu:14931: ko nāma mānuṣe loke karado naiva jīvati // HV_App.I,31.3017 //
GE07hv_apppu:14932: hatvā gopālakaṃ saṃkhye badhvā yādavakān bahūn /
GE07hv_apppu:14933: gṛhṇīmaḥ karasarvasvaṃ tato gaccha narādhama // HV_App.I,31.3019 //
GE07hv_apppu:14935: īśvaro nau varaṃ dātā hy astrāṇām api ca prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,31.3021 //
GE07hv_apppu:14936: rakṣitārau mahābhūtau saṃgrāmaṃ gacchatoś ca nau /
GE07hv_apppu:14937: pitaraṃ yājayiṣyāvo hatvā gopālakān raṇe // HV_App.I,31.3023 //
GE07hv_apppu:14938: ete proktā bhṛśaṃ yuddhe kātarāḥ sarva eva te /
GE07hv_apppu:14939: hatvā tān sabalān yuddhe punar jeṣyāva keśavam // HV_App.I,31.3025 //
GE07hv_apppu:14945: sacchatrā sadhvajā caiva sabhaṭā sādhu sāmbarā // HV_App.I,31.3031 //
GE07hv_apppu:14947: avadhya eva gaccha tvaṃ na te maraṇato bhayam // HV_App.I,31.3033 //
GE07hv_apppu:14948: saṃgrāmaḥ puṣkare 'smākaṃ śvaḥ paraśvo 'pi vā nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:14949: tato jñāsyāvahe vīryaṃ keśavasya balasya ca /
GE07hv_apppu:14950: ye tvayoktā nṛpāḥ saṃkhye teṣām api ca yad balam // HV_App.I,31.3036 //
GE07hv_apppu:14952: eṣa gacchāmi vāṃ hantuṃ śvaḥ paraśvo 'pi vā nṛpau /
GE07hv_apppu:14953: adyaiva hi mayā vadhyau na ced dūto bhavāmy aham // HV_App.I,31.3038 //
GE07hv_apppu:14954: na hi śvo vā paraśvo vā yuvāṃ kaṭukabhāṣiṇau /
GE07hv_apppu:14955: dautyaṃ hi duḥkham akhilaṃ bhavaty eva sadā nṛṇām // HV_App.I,31.3040 //
GE07hv_apppu:14956: anyathāhaṃ yuvāṃ hatvā tato yāsyāmi nirvṛtim /
GE07hv_apppu:14957: svavīryaṃ bāhudarpaṃ ca darśayaṃś ca nṛpādhamau // HV_App.I,31.3042 //
GE07hv_apppu:14965: ity uktvā ratham āruhya pratasthe sātyakiḥ kila // HV_App.I,31.3050 //
GE07hv_apppu:14968: sa praviśya puraṃ viṣṇoḥ sātyakiḥ śinipuṃgavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14969: ācacakṣe 'tha kṛṣṇāya yathā vṛttaṃ tayos tadā // HV_App.I,31.3052 //
GE07hv_apppu:14975: tatheti te pratiśrutya sarvaṃ cakrur anīkapāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3058 //
GE07hv_apppu:14976: ādāya sudṛḍhaṃ cāpaṃ ratham āruhya daṃśitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14977: agrato jagmur atyarthaṃ senāyāḥ puruṣottamāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3060 //
GE07hv_apppu:14983: siṃhanādaṃ prakurvanto jagmur atyartham uttamāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3066 //
GE07hv_apppu:14984: haris tu ratham āruhya saṃnaddhaṃ dārukeṇa ha /
GE07hv_apppu:14985: śārṅgaṃ bhārasahaṃ ghoraṃ gṛhītvā saśaraṃ dhanuḥ // HV_App.I,31.3068 //
GE07hv_apppu:14989: yayau rathagato vipraiḥ stūyamāno mudānvitaiḥ // HV_App.I,31.3072 //
GE07hv_apppu:14990: sūtair māgadhaputraiś ca stūyamānas tatas tataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14991: ānīya senāṃ sakalāṃ yayau kāṣṭhām athottarām // HV_App.I,31.3074 //
GE07hv_apppu:14993: dadhmau mahāravaṃ kurvañ śatrūṇāṃ bhayavardhanam // HV_App.I,31.3076 //
GE07hv_apppu:14994: ādhmātas tena hariṇā sa cakre śaṅkharāṭ svanam /
GE07hv_apppu:14995: ravaḥ sa rodasī rājan pūrayām āsa śaṅkhataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3078 //
GE07hv_apppu:14996: tasmiñ śaṅkhe tathādhmāte neduḥ śaṅkhāḥ sahasraśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:14997: bheryaś cāpi samādhmātā mṛdaṅgā bahuśo nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:14998: nedur atyartham atulaṃ gharmānte jaladā yathā // HV_App.I,31.3081 //
GE07hv_apppu:15000: sarasas tasya rājendra puṣkarasya nṛpottamāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3083 //
GE07hv_apppu:15002: niveśaṃ kārayām āsur yādavāḥ sarva eva hi /
GE07hv_apppu:15003: svaṃ svaṃ yathāsukhaṃ rājan pragṛhītakuṭīmaṭham // HV_App.I,31.3086 //
GE07hv_apppu:15004: bhagavān api govindaḥ saro dṛṣṭvā suśobhanam /
GE07hv_apppu:15005: upaspṛśya jale tasmin praṇamya yatipuṅgavān // HV_App.I,31.3088 //
GE07hv_apppu:15006: tayor āgamanaṃ lipsur āste tīre yathāsukham /
GE07hv_apppu:15007: śṛṇvan vedadhvaniṃ viṣṇur brāhmaṇānāṃ samantataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3090 //
GE07hv_apppu:15010: atha tau haṃsaḍibhakau jagmatuḥ puṣkaraṃ prati /
GE07hv_apppu:15015: anyau dvāv iva rudrau tau lokasaṃhārakārakau // HV_App.I,31.3096 //
GE07hv_apppu:15017: akṣauhiṇyo daśaivāsaṃs tayor atha samāgatāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3098 //
GE07hv_apppu:15019: tayor eva sakhā pūrvam āsīc ca balaśālinoḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15020: śakro 'pi yasya purataḥ sthātuṃ śakto na vajrabhṛt // HV_App.I,31.3101 //
GE07hv_apppu:15021: yo hi vīro mahārāja devadaitya samāgame /
GE07hv_apppu:15022: devān nighnaṃs tadā yuddhe devendram ajayan mahān /
GE07hv_apppu:15023: akaroc ca purā yuddhaṃ viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā // HV_App.I,31.3104 //
GE07hv_apppu:15024: yo hi dvāravatīṃ prāpya babādhe yadupuṅgavān /
GE07hv_apppu:15025: sa tadānīṃ mahārāja śrutvā yuddham upasthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3106 //
GE07hv_apppu:15028: haṃsasya ḍibhakasyātha sāhāyyaṃ kartum udyataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3109 //
GE07hv_apppu:15030: atīva mitratāṃ yāto dadyāt prāṇāṃś ca saṃyati // HV_App.I,31.3111 //
GE07hv_apppu:15032: yayau tasya sahāyārthaṃ hiḍimbaḥ puruṣādakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3113 //
GE07hv_apppu:15035: tayos tatra mahāsainyaṃ gacchatoḥ keśavaṃ prati /
GE07hv_apppu:15036: miśritaṃ daityasaṃghaiś ca rākṣasaiś ca samantataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15038: daityena tena sahitau jagmatuḥ puṣkaraṃ prati /
GE07hv_apppu:15039: tāv etau haṃsaḍibhakau hantuṃ keśavam añjasā // HV_App.I,31.3120 //
GE07hv_apppu:15041: nākaron nṛpa sāhāyyaṃ śāpo me bhaviteti ha // HV_App.I,31.3122 //
GE07hv_apppu:15042: gacchatoḥ saṃyugaṃ rājan haṃsasya ḍibhakasya ca /
GE07hv_apppu:15043: atitvaritavikrāntās te yayuḥ puṣkaraṃ nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.3124 //
GE07hv_apppu:15045: aham eva nṛpā yuddhaṃ karomi prathamaṃ hareḥ // HV_App.I,31.3126 //
GE07hv_apppu:15046: ity abruvan nṛpā rājan gacchantaḥ keśavaṃ prati /
GE07hv_apppu:15047: saṃprāptās te nṛpaśreṣṭhāḥ puṣkaraṃ puṇyavardhanam // HV_App.I,31.3128 //
GE07hv_apppu:15049: atyantabhadraṃ lokeṣu puṣkaraṃ prathamaṃ nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.3130 //
GE07hv_apppu:15051: darśanāt sparśanāc cāpi kilbiṣacchedinau nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.3132 //
GE07hv_apppu:15054: dvāv eva hi naraśreṣṭha kilbiṣaughasya nāśakau /
GE07hv_apppu:15055: tāv ubhau yatra sahitau tatra te saṃsthitā nṛpāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3136 //
GE07hv_apppu:15059: aghaṃ niḥśeṣam abhavat tava bhūpa na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3140 //
GE07hv_apppu:15063: praviśya sarasas tīraṃ puṣkarasya viśāṃ pate /
GE07hv_apppu:15064: adarśayat tatra devaṃ yuddhāya samupasthitam // HV_App.I,31.3145 //
GE07hv_apppu:15066: dve sene saṃgate rājan sadhvaje saparicchade /
GE07hv_apppu:15072: śarīrāṇi mahārāja jagmur dūraṃ sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3152 //
GE07hv_apppu:15074: sphuṭitāś ca tadā rājañ śirāṃsy āhatya saṃyayuḥ // HV_App.I,31.3154 //
GE07hv_apppu:15075: parighāś ca tadā rājñāṃ bāhubhiḥ paricoditāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15078: daityā rakṣāṃsi rājendra rājānaś ca samantataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15080: śaraiś ca bhogibhogābhais tīkṣṇam anye mahābalāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3160 //
GE07hv_apppu:15082: [k: Ds2 T1.4 G1.3-5 M (Dn after line 3167) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:15084: nāgā nāgair mahārāja hayāś cāśvaiḥ samantataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3162 //
GE07hv_apppu:15085: rathā rathaiḥ samājaghnuḥ sādinaḥ sādibhis tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:15088: bhiṇḍipālair mahāraudrair jaghnur anyonyam āhave // HV_App.I,31.3166 //
GE07hv_apppu:15089: rākṣasā dānavā rājan kṣatriyāś ca samantataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15090: itaś cetaś ca dhāvantaḥ kurvanto visvaraṃ ravam /
GE07hv_apppu:15091: hatāḥ kecin mahārāja petur urvyāṃ mahāsibhiḥ // HV_App.I,31.3169 //
GE07hv_apppu:15094: yamarāṣṭraṃ gatāḥ kecit kecit svargaṃ samāyayuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15096: kecit svāṃś ca parāṃś caiva hatvā bhrāntā ivābhavan // HV_App.I,31.3174 //
GE07hv_apppu:15097: etasminn antare rājañ śaṅkhā bheryaḥ sahasraśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15098: sasvanuḥ sarvataḥ sainye mṛdaṅgā bahavas tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:15099: madhyaṃdinagate sūrye tāpaṃ dadhati ghoravat // HV_App.I,31.3177 //
GE07hv_apppu:15102: muditā bhakṣayām āsuḥ pibantaḥ śoṇitaṃ bahu // HV_App.I,31.3180 //
GE07hv_apppu:15104: vibhajya deśaṃ bahuśo yuddhabhūmau śavārthinaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3182 //
GE07hv_apppu:15105: atha śyenā balāś caiva kaṅkā gṛdhrās tathāpare /
GE07hv_apppu:15106: tuṇḍaiḥ śavāni niṣkṛṣya bhakṣayanti tatas tataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3184 //
GE07hv_apppu:15109: hataṃ lakṣaṃ mahārāja rathānāṃ rathibhiḥ saha /
GE07hv_apppu:15110: triṃśatkoṭyo hatās tatra sādinaḥ sāyudhā bhṛśam // HV_App.I,31.3188 //
GE07hv_apppu:15112: kecic ca nihatā rājan puṣkaraṃ prāviśan saraḥ // HV_App.I,31.3190 //
GE07hv_apppu:15113: kecid bhūmiṃ samālambya bhītā ity abruvan raṇe /
GE07hv_apppu:15114: muktakeśāḥ patanti sma rathaṃ saṃtyajya kecana // HV_App.I,31.3192 //
GE07hv_apppu:15117: yathā devāsuraṃ yuddhaṃ pūrvam āsīn nṛpottama // HV_App.I,31.3195 //
GE07hv_apppu:15121: vicakraṃ yodhayām āsa śārṅgadhanvā gadādharaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3197 //
GE07hv_apppu:15124: śeṣāś ca śeṣai rājendra cakrur yuddham adīnagāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3200 //
GE07hv_apppu:15126: śarair niśitadhārāgrair vismayaṃ darśayan raṇe // HV_App.I,31.3202 //
GE07hv_apppu:15129: jaghāna stanayor madhye paśyatas tu śacīpateḥ // HV_App.I,31.3205 //
GE07hv_apppu:15131: avamac chonitaṃ viṣṇur ādikāle yathā prajāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3207 //
GE07hv_apppu:15133: aśvāṃś ca caturo hatvā sārathiṃ ca śarais tribhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15134: tato dadhmau śaṅkhavaraṃ yathā tārāmaye raṇe // HV_App.I,31.3210 //
GE07hv_apppu:15136: gadāṃ gṛhya mahāghorāṃ duḥsahāṃ vīryaśālinīm // HV_App.I,31.3212 //
GE07hv_apppu:15137: tayā jaghāna daityendraḥ kirīṭe keśavasya ha /
GE07hv_apppu:15138: lalāṭe ca punar viṣṇuṃ siṃhanādam anīnadat // HV_App.I,31.3214 //
GE07hv_apppu:15139: tataḥ śilāṃ ca mahatīṃ pragṛhya danujaḥ kila /
GE07hv_apppu:15142: jaghāna ca tadā daityaṃ tāḍitaḥ sa tayā kṣitau /
GE07hv_apppu:15143: gatāsur iva saṃjajñe śvasann iva papāta ha // HV_App.I,31.3219 //
GE07hv_apppu:15144: prāpya saṃjñāṃ tato daityaḥ krodhād dviguṇam ābabhau /
GE07hv_apppu:15145: ādāya parighaṃ ghoram idam āha janārdanam // HV_App.I,31.3221 //
GE07hv_apppu:15146: anena tava govinda darpaṃ jātaṃ nihanmy aham /
GE07hv_apppu:15147: vikramajñaḥ sadā cāsi mama devāsure raṇe // HV_App.I,31.3223 //
GE07hv_apppu:15148: tāv eva vipulau bāhū sa evāsmi janārdana /
GE07hv_apppu:15149: tathāpi yudhyase vīra jñātvā vai māmakaṃ balam // HV_App.I,31.3225 //
GE07hv_apppu:15152: cikṣepa daityo lokeśaṃ sarvalokasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3228 //
GE07hv_apppu:15153: taṃ gṛhya bāhunā kṛṣṇo duṣṭo 'sīti vadan hariḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15154: khaṇḍaśaḥ kārayām āsa khaḍgena niśitena ca // HV_App.I,31.3230 //
GE07hv_apppu:15156: tena taṃ pothayām āsa viṣṭaraśravasaṃ vibhum /
GE07hv_apppu:15157: gṛhya taṃ cāpi khaḍgena tilaśaś ca cakāra ha // HV_App.I,31.3233 //
GE07hv_apppu:15158: vikrīḍya suciraṃ kṛṣṇas tena daityena mādhavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15159: hantum aicchat tadā daityam ādāya niśitaṃ śaram /
GE07hv_apppu:15160: āgneyāstreṇa saṃyojya jaghānainaṃ sa tena ha // HV_App.I,31.3236 //
GE07hv_apppu:15161: pradahya sa śaro daityaṃ sarvalokasya paśyataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15162: yathāpūrvaṃ jagāmāśu karaṃ bhagavataḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3238 //
GE07hv_apppu:15163: hataśiṣṭās tadā daityāḥ palāyanta diśo daśa /
GE07hv_apppu:15164: adyāpi na nivartante gacchanto vai mahodadhim // HV_App.I,31.3240 //
GE07hv_apppu:15167: baladevas tu dharmātmā dhanur ādāya satvaram /
GE07hv_apppu:15168: jaghāna haṃsaṃ daśabhir bāṇair bāṇabhṛtāṃ varaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15169: taṃ pratyavidhyan nārācair haṃsaḥ pañcabhir āśugaiḥ // HV_App.I,31.3243 //
GE07hv_apppu:15170: tān antare halī chittvā nārācair daśabhiḥ punaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15171: nārācenāśu vivyādha lalāṭe haṃsam ojasā // HV_App.I,31.3245 //
GE07hv_apppu:15172: dṛḍhaṃ patan sa nārācas tasya saṃjñāṃ samādade /
GE07hv_apppu:15173: rathopasthe ciraṃ sthitvā sthūṇākarṇaṃ samādade // HV_App.I,31.3247 //
GE07hv_apppu:15174: labdhvā haṃsaḥ sa saṃjñāṃ tu vidhvā tena yadūttamam /
GE07hv_apppu:15175: siṃhavad vyanadad dhaṃso devān vismāpayan raṇe // HV_App.I,31.3249 //
GE07hv_apppu:15176: tataḥ kruddho halī viddhas tena bāṇena mādhavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15180: haṃsaṃ haṃsagatiṃ vīraṃ nīlavāsā halāyudhaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3254 //
GE07hv_apppu:15181: te muktā niśitā ghorā nārācāś ca suvājinaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15182: rathe dhvaje tathā cāpe cakre tūṇīdvaye nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:15183: patitāḥ sarvato rājan vyathāṃ caiva tathā dadhuḥ // HV_App.I,31.3257 //
GE07hv_apppu:15185: śareṇa halinaṃ vidhvā dhvajaṃ ciccheda kenacit /
GE07hv_apppu:15186: śaraiś caturbhir aśvāṃś ca sūtaṃ pretādhipe dadau // HV_App.I,31.3260 //
GE07hv_apppu:15187: tataḥ kruddho halī tasmād gadāṃ gṛhya mahāraṇe /
GE07hv_apppu:15188: āpapāta mahābāhur haṃsaṃ śeṣa iva śvasan // HV_App.I,31.3262 //
GE07hv_apppu:15189: tayā dhvajaṃ rathaṃ cakram īṣāṃ sūtaṃ halāyudhaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15190: babhañja tilaśaḥ sarvaṃ nanāda ca punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3264 //
GE07hv_apppu:15191: bhūyaś ca gadayā haṃsaṃ cikṣepa ca halī kila /
GE07hv_apppu:15192: so 'pi haṃso gadāṃ gṛhya rathāt tasmād avāpatat // HV_App.I,31.3266 //
GE07hv_apppu:15201: savyaṃ tu haṃso rājendra vyagṛhṇāt satyasaṃgaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.3275 //
GE07hv_apppu:15203: yathāprāṇaṃ mahābāhū jaghnatur maraṇāya vai // HV_App.I,31.3277 //
GE07hv_apppu:15206: devāś ca munayaś caiva vismayaṃ parijagmire /
GE07hv_apppu:15207: aho khalv īdṛśaṃ yuddhaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ pūrvaṃ na ca śrutam // HV_App.I,31.3281 //
GE07hv_apppu:15211: vyacaran mārgam atyarthaṃ savyaṃ tu balavān balī // HV_App.I,31.3285 //
GE07hv_apppu:15212: vikuñcya jānunī pūrvaṃ cakratur gadayā bhṛśam /
GE07hv_apppu:15213: raṇaṃ raṇavidāṃ śreṣṭhau paśyatāṃ tridivaukasām // HV_App.I,31.3287 //
GE07hv_apppu:15217: tāv ubhau balinau vīrau prakhyātau kṣatriyeṣu vai // HV_App.I,31.3289 //
GE07hv_apppu:15220: avidhyan niśitair bāṇaiḥ stanamadhye tathorasi // HV_App.I,31.3292 //
GE07hv_apppu:15221: sa tena viddho balinā ḍibhakaḥ kṣatriyottamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15222: nārācaiḥ pañcasāhasrair vivyādha yudhi garvitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3294 //
GE07hv_apppu:15223: tān antare vṛṣṇivīro niṣedhya vyanadad raṇe /
GE07hv_apppu:15224: atha kruddho nṛpavaro vidhvā saptabhir āśugaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15225: punaḥ śatasahasreṇa pratyavidhyat sa sātyakim // HV_App.I,31.3297 //
GE07hv_apppu:15226: sātyakis tv atha vikrānto dhanuś ciccheda tasya tat /
GE07hv_apppu:15228: ardhacandreṇa tīkṣṇena ḍibhakasya sa yādavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3299 //
GE07hv_apppu:15231: ājaghne ḍibhako rājan yuyudhānaṃ yudhāṃ varam /
GE07hv_apppu:15233: sa tena viddho bāṇena vamañ śoṇitakaṃ nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:15234: atīva śuśubhe rājan vasante kiṃśuko yathā // HV_App.I,31.3303 //
GE07hv_apppu:15235: dhanuś ciccheda bhūyas tu yad gṛhītaṃ punar mahat // HV_App.I,31.3304 //
GE07hv_apppu:15237: jaghāna niśitair bānaiḥ sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3306 //
GE07hv_apppu:15238: sa dhanuḥ punar atyugraṃ ciccheda yudhi sātyakiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15240: tato 'nyad dhanur ādāya satvaraṃ sa nṛpottamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15241: dhanuṣā tena rājendra sātyakiṃ vivyadhe punaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3310 //
GE07hv_apppu:15242: evaṃ dhanūṃṣi rājendra śataṃ pañca ca pañca ca /
GE07hv_apppu:15243: chittvā nanāda śaineyaḥ sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3312 //
GE07hv_apppu:15245: khaḍgau pragṛhya cātyugrau yuddhāya samupasthitau // HV_App.I,31.3314 //
GE07hv_apppu:15246: tau hi khaḍgavidāṃ śreṣṭhau vīrau ḍibhakasātyakī /
GE07hv_apppu:15247: dauḥśāsanir mahārāja saumadattis tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,31.3316 //
GE07hv_apppu:15248: abhimanyuś ca vikrānto nakulaś ca tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:15249: ete khaḍgavidāṃ śreṣṭhāḥ kīrtitā yudhi sattamāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3318 //
GE07hv_apppu:15250: eṣv etau hi nṛpaśreṣṭhau khaḍge hi nṛpasattamau /
GE07hv_apppu:15251: tāv etāv asinā yuddhaṃ cakratur yuddhalālasau // HV_App.I,31.3320 //
GE07hv_apppu:15253: ākaraṃ vikaraṃ bhinnaṃ nirmaryādam amānuṣam // HV_App.I,31.3322 //
GE07hv_apppu:15255: āhitaṃ citrakaṃ kṣiptaṃ kuḍumbaṃ lambanaṃ dhṛtam // HV_App.I,31.3324 //
GE07hv_apppu:15257: tribāhutuṅgabāhū ca savyonnatam udāsi ca // HV_App.I,31.3326 //
GE07hv_apppu:15259: iti pracārān dvātriṃśac cakratuḥ khaḍgayodhinau // HV_App.I,31.3328 //
GE07hv_apppu:15260: punaś ca praharantau tau na ca śramam upeyatuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15262: tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15264: aho vīryam aho vīryam etayor balaśālinoḥ // HV_App.I,31.3333 //
GE07hv_apppu:15265: etāv eva raṇe śaktau khaḍge dhanuṣi pāragau /
GE07hv_apppu:15266: ekaḥ śiṣyo girīśasya droṇasyānyo hi dhīmataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3335 //
GE07hv_apppu:15268: traya ete mahārāja prathitāḥ saṃgare sadā // HV_App.I,31.3337 //
GE07hv_apppu:15269: ḍibhakaḥ śaktibhṛc charvas traya ete mahārathāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15270: prasiddhāḥ sarva evaite vīryeṣu ca baleṣu ca // HV_App.I,31.3339 //
GE07hv_apppu:15271: iti te devagandharvāḥ siddhā yakṣā mahoragāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15272: divi sthitāḥ samaṃ brūyur yuddhadarśanalālasāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3341 //
GE07hv_apppu:15281: hiḍimbo rākṣasendras tu bhakṣayan sarvato narān /
GE07hv_apppu:15289: gajān gajaiḥ samāghnāno hayair aśvān nṛpottama /
GE07hv_apppu:15290: rathān rathaiḥ samāhatya sādinaḥ sādibhis tathā // HV_App.I,31.3357 //
GE07hv_apppu:15291: manuṣyān svapuro dṛṣṭvā nāsyagrāsaṃ cakāra saḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15292: kāṃścid dhatvā mahārāja vṛṣṇipālān samantataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3359 //
GE07hv_apppu:15294: yān paśyati puro rakṣas tāñ jaghāna virūpadhṛk // HV_App.I,31.3361 //
GE07hv_apppu:15296: cikṣepa sahasā kāṃścid dhiḍimbaḥ puruṣādakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3363 //
GE07hv_apppu:15297: antakāle yathā kruddho rudraḥ prāṇabhṛto nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:15298: kṣaṇenaikena sarvāṃs tān bhakṣayām āsa rākṣasaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3365 //
GE07hv_apppu:15299: kecid bhītā diśaḥ prāpur vṛṣṇayo vīryaśālinaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15300: kecit tu bhakṣitās tena rakṣasā vṛṣṇipuṅgavāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3367 //
GE07hv_apppu:15301: kumbhakarṇo yathā rājan bhakṣayām āsa vānarān /
GE07hv_apppu:15302: niḥśeṣaṃ vṛṣṇisainyaṃ tu cakāra puruṣādakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3369 //
GE07hv_apppu:15303: niśceṣṭaṃ vṛṣṇisainyaṃ tu sthitaṃ citrapaṭe yathā // HV_App.I,31.3370 //
GE07hv_apppu:15305: dhanur gṛhya mahāghoraṃ rākṣasasya puraḥ sthitau // HV_App.I,31.3372 //
GE07hv_apppu:15306: yathā kruddhasya siṃhasya meṣau kruddhatamāv iva /
GE07hv_apppu:15307: vyādāyāsyaṃ mahad rakṣas tau dṛṣṭvāthābhyadhāvata // HV_App.I,31.3374 //
GE07hv_apppu:15309: paryadhāvat tato rakṣaḥ khādat khādat kalevaram // HV_App.I,31.3376 //
GE07hv_apppu:15310: pūrayām āsatur vīrau śarair yaduvṛṣau nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:15312: sarvāṃs tān khādayām āsa devaśatrur virūpadhṛk /
GE07hv_apppu:15313: dhāvati sma tato rakṣo vyāditāsyaṃ bhayānakam // HV_App.I,31.3380 //
GE07hv_apppu:15314: tayor gṛhītvā dhanuṣī babhañja yudhi satvaram /
GE07hv_apppu:15315: bāhū prasārya duṣṭātmā rākṣaso vikṛtānanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3382 //
GE07hv_apppu:15320: ugrasena kimarthaṃ tvaṃ tiṣṭhase matpuro 'dhama // HV_App.I,31.3386 //
GE07hv_apppu:15321: āgaccha praviśāsyaṃ me grāsabhūtau yuvāṃ mama /
GE07hv_apppu:15322: vidhinā nirmitau vṛddhau vasudeva hareḥ pitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3388 //
GE07hv_apppu:15324: manmukhān naiva gacchetaṃ praviśantau tvarānvitau // HV_App.I,31.3390 //
GE07hv_apppu:15325: yuvayoḥ śoṇitaṃ pītvā tṛptiṃ yāsyāmi nirvṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15326: khādāmi ca punar māṃsaṃ vṛddhayor yuvayoḥ sukham // HV_App.I,31.3392 //
GE07hv_apppu:15327: iti bruvaṃs tadā kruddho vyāditāsyo mahāhanuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15328: dhāvati sma tadā kṣipraṃ hiḍimbo rākṣaseśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.3394 //
GE07hv_apppu:15332: dṛṣṭvā ca tau tathābhūtau vasudevograsenakau // HV_App.I,31.3398 //
GE07hv_apppu:15334: nirgatya cāntaraṃ tasya rākṣasasya durātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3400 //
GE07hv_apppu:15335: mā kṛthāḥ sāhasaṃ rakṣo muñcaitau rājasattamau /
GE07hv_apppu:15336: sthito 'smi yudhyatāṃ rakṣo mayā śatrūñ jighāṃsatā // HV_App.I,31.3402 //
GE07hv_apppu:15337: aham eva haniṣye tvāṃ kā ceyaṃ tava bhīṣikā /
GE07hv_apppu:15338: iti bruvāṇaṃ halinaṃ visṛjyaitau mahāraṇe // HV_App.I,31.3404 //
GE07hv_apppu:15339: mahān ayam asau puṣṭo bhakṣayāmy enam agrataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15340: vidārya pūrvavad vaktraṃ balabhadram upādravat // HV_App.I,31.3406 //
GE07hv_apppu:15341: visṛjya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ rākṣasasya puraḥ sthitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15342: muṣṭiṃ pragṛhya balavān sphoṭayan bāhum uttamam // HV_App.I,31.3408 //
GE07hv_apppu:15343: hiḍimbas tv atha duṣṭātmā muṣṭiṃ kṛtvā mahāravam /
GE07hv_apppu:15344: jaghāna vakṣo rāmasya vyāditāsya ivāntakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3410 //
GE07hv_apppu:15345: kruddho 'tha balabhadras tu muṣṭinā tena tāḍitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15346: jaghāna muṣṭinā rāmo rākṣasendram aninditaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3412 //
GE07hv_apppu:15349: tayoś caṭacaṭāśabdaḥ prādur āsīd bhayānakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3415 //
GE07hv_apppu:15350: atha rākṣasarājas tu muṣṭinā rāmam āhave /
GE07hv_apppu:15351: jaghāna vakṣodeśe tu vajreṇeva puraṃdaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.3417 //
GE07hv_apppu:15352: atha rāmo balī sākṣān muṣṭiṃ saṃvartya yatnataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15353: hiḍimbaṃ tāḍayām āsa vakṣasy amaravidviṣam // HV_App.I,31.3419 //
GE07hv_apppu:15354: talābhyām atha rāmas tu jaghne vaktre sa rākṣasam // HV_App.I,31.3420 //
GE07hv_apppu:15356: jānubhyām apatad bhūmau gatāsur iva rākṣasaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3422 //
GE07hv_apppu:15357: tata utpatya rāmas tu dorbhyāṃ saṃgṛhya rākṣasam /
GE07hv_apppu:15358: ādāya bāhuvegena bhrāmayitvā padāt padam // HV_App.I,31.3424 //
GE07hv_apppu:15359: vyāvidhya suciraṃ rāmo darśayann ātmano balam /
GE07hv_apppu:15360: utkṣipya rākṣasendraṃ taṃ sarvalokasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3426 //
GE07hv_apppu:15362: gatāsur iva rakṣas tu tato deśān nirākramat // HV_App.I,31.3428 //
GE07hv_apppu:15363: ye kecid rākṣasās tatra hataśeṣā mahāraṇe /
GE07hv_apppu:15364: balabhadrāt tato bhītā jagmuś caiva diśo daśa // HV_App.I,31.3430 //
GE07hv_apppu:15365: atha bhagavān api bhāskaro raviḥ @ HV_App.I,31.3431 @
GE07hv_apppu:15367: astaṃ yayau cakṣur api prajānām @ HV_App.I,31.3433 @
GE07hv_apppu:15379: ubhau tau haṃsaḍibhakau rātrāv eva mahāgirim /
GE07hv_apppu:15380: jagmatuḥ sahitau rājan govardhanam atho nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.3444 //
GE07hv_apppu:15381: atha prabhāte vimale sūrye cābhyudite sati /
GE07hv_apppu:15384: gandharvair apsarobhiś ca nāditaṃ bahudhā girim // HV_App.I,31.3448 //
GE07hv_apppu:15385: [k: Ds2 Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:15386: jagmatuḥ sahitau rājan govardhanam atho girim /
GE07hv_apppu:15387: godhanair atha sainyaiś ca nāditaṃ bahudhā girim //
GE07hv_apppu:15389: nikaṣā yamunāṃ rājaṃs tato yuddham avartata /
GE07hv_apppu:15390: haṃsena ḍibhakenātha yādavaiś ca samantataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3451 //
GE07hv_apppu:15393: sāraṇaḥ pañcaviṃśatyā daśabhiḥ kaṅka eva ca // HV_App.I,31.3454 //
GE07hv_apppu:15395: niśaṭhas triṃśatā rājan sātyakiś cāpi saptabhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15396: aśītyā vipṛthū rājann uddhavo daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,31.3456 //
GE07hv_apppu:15397: pradyumnas triṃśatā rājan sāmbaś cāpi ca saptabhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15398: anādhṛṣṭis tv ekaṣaṣṭyā śarāṇāṃ nataparvaṇām // HV_App.I,31.3458 //
GE07hv_apppu:15399: evaṃ te sahitā rājaṃś cakrur yuddham adīnavat /
GE07hv_apppu:15400: atyadbhutaṃ mahāghoraṃ yādavāḥ sarva eva ca // HV_App.I,31.3460 //
GE07hv_apppu:15402: sarvān atha mahārāja yādavān balavattarān // HV_App.I,31.3462 //
GE07hv_apppu:15403: tāv ubhau haṃsaḍibhakau nṛpāṃs tān pratyavidhyatām /
GE07hv_apppu:15404: pratyekaṃ daśabhir vidhvā bāṇaiś ca kṛtasaṃyataiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15405: jaghnatuś ca śarais tīkṣṇair atyarthaṃ yādaveśvarān // HV_App.I,31.3465 //
GE07hv_apppu:15406: vyathitāḥ sarva evaite vamantaḥ śoṇitaṃ bahu /
GE07hv_apppu:15407: mādhave kiṃśukā rājan puṣpitā iva te babhuḥ // HV_App.I,31.3467 //
GE07hv_apppu:15409: etasminn antare rājan vasudevātmajau nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.3469 //
GE07hv_apppu:15410: vāsudevo halī yuddhe pramukhe dhanvinau tayoḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15411: cakratur yuddham atulaṃ skandaśakrāv ivāmbare // HV_App.I,31.3471 //
GE07hv_apppu:15412: tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhā yakṣā maharṣayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15413: vimānasthāś ca dadṛśur yuddhaṃ devāsuropamam // HV_App.I,31.3473 //
GE07hv_apppu:15414: tataḥ prādur abhūtāṃ tau bhūtau bhūteśvarasya ha /
GE07hv_apppu:15415: śūlinā preṣito yuddhe rakṣārthaṃ balinau tayoḥ // HV_App.I,31.3475 //
GE07hv_apppu:15416: haṃso 'tha vāsudevaś ca yuddhaṃ cakratur īśvarau /
GE07hv_apppu:15417: rāmaś ca ḍibhakaś caiva saṃyuktau yuddhakāṅkṣayā // HV_App.I,31.3477 //
GE07hv_apppu:15418: vikrāntāḥ sarva evaite śastre hy astre tathā bale /
GE07hv_apppu:15419: śaṅkhān dadhmuḥ pṛthag rājan sve sve sarve rathe sthitāḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:15421: dadhmau padmapalāśākṣaḥ sarvān vismāpayann iva // HV_App.I,31.3481 //
GE07hv_apppu:15424: śūlena pothayāṃ rājaṃś cakratur yādaveśvaram // HV_App.I,31.3484 //
GE07hv_apppu:15427: rathād rathivaraśreṣṭhas tau pragṛhya jagatpatiḥ // HV_App.I,31.3487 //
GE07hv_apppu:15429: kailāsaṃ ca samuddiśya pracikṣepa tato hariḥ // HV_App.I,31.3489 //
GE07hv_apppu:15430: tāv etya tu gireḥ śṛṅgaṃ kailāsasya mahāmate /
GE07hv_apppu:15431: dṛṣṭvā tatkarma devasya vismayaṃ jagmatuḥ param // HV_App.I,31.3491 //
GE07hv_apppu:15433: uvāca vacanaṃ viṣṇuṃ paśyatāṃ tridivaukasām // HV_App.I,31.3493 //
GE07hv_apppu:15436: karaṃ diśa yathāyogaṃ yadi prāṇān prakāṅkṣase // HV_App.I,31.3496 //
GE07hv_apppu:15437: atha cet tvaṃ kṣaṇaṃ tiṣṭha tato jñātvā karaṃ bahu /
GE07hv_apppu:15438: dadāsi nandaputra tvaṃ tato yaṣṭā sa me guruḥ // HV_App.I,31.3498 //
GE07hv_apppu:15439: īśvaro 'haṃ sadā rājñāṃ devānām iva śūladhṛk /
GE07hv_apppu:15440: evaṃ te vīryavibhavaṃ nāśayiṣyāmi saṃyuge // HV_App.I,31.3500 //
GE07hv_apppu:15441: ity uktvā saśaraṃ cāpaṃ sālatālopamaṃ nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:15442: ākṛṣya ca yathāprāṇaṃ nārācena sa keśavam /
GE07hv_apppu:15443: lalāṭe cikṣipe haṃso lalāma iva so 'bhavat // HV_App.I,31.3503 //
GE07hv_apppu:15444: uvāca sātyakiṃ kṛṣṇo rathaṃ vāhaya me prabho /
GE07hv_apppu:15445: dārukaṃ pṛṣṭavāhaṃ taṃ kṛtvā keśava īśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.3505 //
GE07hv_apppu:15446: atha tena samādiṣṭaḥ sātyakir vāhayan ratham /
GE07hv_apppu:15447: maṇḍalāni bahūny ājau darśayām āsa satvaram // HV_App.I,31.3507 //
GE07hv_apppu:15448: atha viddho dṛḍhaṃ tena śareṇa harir īśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15449: āgneyam astraṃ saṃyojya śare kasmiṃścid īśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15450: uvāca haṃsaṃ rājendra sātyakiṃ preṣayan hayān // HV_App.I,31.3510 //
GE07hv_apppu:15451: anena tvāṃ dahāmy adya yadi śaknoṣi vāraya /
GE07hv_apppu:15452: alaṃ te bahuyuddhena kṣatriyo 'si sadā śaṭha // HV_App.I,31.3512 //
GE07hv_apppu:15453: mattaś cet karam icchaṃs tvaṃ darśayādya parākramam /
GE07hv_apppu:15454: yatayo bādhitā haṃsa puṣkare saṃsthitās tvayā // HV_App.I,31.3514 //
GE07hv_apppu:15455: śāstā tvaṃ khalu viprāṇāṃ sthite mayi narādhama /
GE07hv_apppu:15456: sthite mayi jagannāthe hatvā kṣatriyakaṇṭakān // HV_App.I,31.3516 //
GE07hv_apppu:15458: śāpena yatimukhyānāṃ hata eva purādhama // HV_App.I,31.3518 //
GE07hv_apppu:15459: mṛtyave tvāṃ nivedyādya rakṣitā brāhmaṇān aham /
GE07hv_apppu:15460: iti bruvaṃs tad astraṃ tu mumoca yudhi keśavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15461: tad astraṃ vāruṇenātha haṃso 'pi pratyaṣedhayat // HV_App.I,31.3521 //
GE07hv_apppu:15462: vāyavyam atha govindo mumoca yudhi haṃsake /
GE07hv_apppu:15463: tad astraṃ vārayām āsa māhendreṇa nṛpottama // HV_App.I,31.3523 //
GE07hv_apppu:15465: raudreṇa tat tato haṃso vārayām āsa tatkṣaṇāt // HV_App.I,31.3525 //
GE07hv_apppu:15466: gāndharvaṃ rākṣasaṃ caiva paiśācam atha keśavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15467: brahmāstram atha kauberam āsuraṃ yāmyam eva ca // HV_App.I,31.3527 //
GE07hv_apppu:15468: chittvāsyaitāni haṃsas tu mumoca yudhi satvaram /
GE07hv_apppu:15469: vāraṇārthaṃ tadastrāṇāṃ caturṇāṃ mādhavasya ha // HV_App.I,31.3529 //
GE07hv_apppu:15474: atha bhīto mahāraudram astraṃ dṛṣṭvā nṛpottamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15475: haṃso 'pi tena rājendra vārayām āsa taṃ śaram // HV_App.I,31.3532 //
GE07hv_apppu:15477: astraṃ vaiṣṇavam ādāya śare suniśite hariḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15479: yena devā raṇe hatvā rājyam āpuḥ purāsurān /
GE07hv_apppu:15480: tadastraṃ yojayām āsa vadhārthaṃ tasya bhūpateḥ // HV_App.I,31.3537 //
GE07hv_apppu:15483: atha bhīto mahāraudram astraṃ dṛṣṭvā nṛpottama /
GE07hv_apppu:15484: haṃso rājā mahārāja niśceṣṭa iva saṃbabhau // HV_App.I,31.3539 //
GE07hv_apppu:15485: utplutya sa rathāt tasmād yamunām abhyadhāvata /
GE07hv_apppu:15486: yatra kṛṣṇo hṛṣīkeśaḥ kāliyaṃ balaśālinam // HV_App.I,31.3541 //
GE07hv_apppu:15488: tāvad dīrghaṃ mahānīlaṃ kālāñjananibhaṃ mahat // HV_App.I,31.3543 //
GE07hv_apppu:15489: tasmin hrade mahāghore papātātha sa haṃsakaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15490: haṃse patati tasmiṃs tu mahān rāvo babhūva ha /
GE07hv_apppu:15491: girīṇāṃ pātyamānānāṃ samudra iva vajriṇā // HV_App.I,31.3546 //
GE07hv_apppu:15492: rathād utplutya kṛṣṇo 'pi tasyopari papāta ha /
GE07hv_apppu:15494: prāharat taṃ mahābāhuṃ pādābhyām atha keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3549 //
GE07hv_apppu:15495: pādakṣepaṃ tatas tasmāl labdhvā haṃso nṛpottama /
GE07hv_apppu:15496: mamāra ca nṛpaśreṣṭha kecid evaṃ vadanti hi // HV_App.I,31.3551 //
GE07hv_apppu:15497: anye pātālam āyāto bhakṣitaḥ pannagair iti /
GE07hv_apppu:15498: adyāpi naiva rājendra dṛṣṭa ity anuśuśrumaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3553 //
GE07hv_apppu:15501: akarod rājasūyaṃ ca tava pūrvapitāmahaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3556 //
GE07hv_apppu:15502: yadi jīved asau haṃsaḥ ko nu maṃsyati taṃ kratum /
GE07hv_apppu:15503: sa ca sarvāstravin nityaṃ rudrāl labdhavaraḥ prabho // HV_App.I,31.3558 //
GE07hv_apppu:15504: kṣaṇād eva mahārāja vārteyaṃ gām agāhata /
GE07hv_apppu:15505: hato haṃso hato haṃsaḥ kṛṣṇena ripumardinā // HV_App.I,31.3560 //
GE07hv_apppu:15508: yamunāyā hrade ghore kṛṣṇeneti divāniśam // HV_App.I,31.3563 //
GE07hv_apppu:15514: tam anvadhāvad vegena balabhadro halāyudhaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3567 //
GE07hv_apppu:15515: haṃso hi yatra patitas tatrāsau nipapāta ha /
GE07hv_apppu:15518: unmajyonmajya sahasā nimajya ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15519: na dadarśa tadā rājan bhrātaraṃ vīryaśālinam // HV_App.I,31.3572 //
GE07hv_apppu:15522: are gopakadāyāda kvāsau haṃsa iti sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3575 //
GE07hv_apppu:15524: ity abravīt prasannātmā vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān // HV_App.I,31.3577 //
GE07hv_apppu:15525: tac chrutvā yamunāṃ bhūyaḥ praviśya ḍibhakaḥ kila /
GE07hv_apppu:15528: kva nu gacchasi rājendra vihāyaikam abāndhavam // HV_App.I,31.3581 //
GE07hv_apppu:15529: kuto bhrātar ito gaccheḥ parityajyaiva mām iha // HV_App.I,31.3582 //
GE07hv_apppu:15531: ātmatyāge manaḥ kurvan yamunāyā mahāhrade // HV_App.I,31.3584 //
GE07hv_apppu:15533: hastena jihvām ākṛṣya bhūyo bhūyo vilapya ca // HV_App.I,31.3586 //
GE07hv_apppu:15534: tataḥ samūlām ākṛṣya jihvāṃ sāhasakṛt svayam /
GE07hv_apppu:15535: mamārāntarjale rājan ḍibhako narakāya vai // HV_App.I,31.3588 //
GE07hv_apppu:15536: gate narādhame haṃse ḍibhake ca tadā hate /
GE07hv_apppu:15537: agamat puṇḍarīkākṣo bhūtān vismāpayann iva // HV_App.I,31.3590 //
GE07hv_apppu:15540: kaṃcit kālaṃ mahārāja pūrvabhuktam uvāsa ha // HV_App.I,31.3593 //
GE07hv_apppu:15544: govardhanagataṃ śrutvā vāsudevaṃ ca sāgrajam // HV_App.I,31.3595 //
GE07hv_apppu:15545: navanītaṃ ca dadhi ca pāyasaṃ kṛsaraṃ tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:15546: vanyaṃ puṣpaṃ mahārāja mayūrāṅgadam eva ca // HV_App.I,31.3597 //
GE07hv_apppu:15547: ballavair aparaiḥ sārdhaṃ gopībhiś ca samantataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15548: jagmatuḥ sahasā prītau govardhanam atho nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.3599 //
GE07hv_apppu:15550: dadarśatur mahābāhuṃ vāsudevaṃ ca sāgrajam // HV_App.I,31.3601 //
GE07hv_apppu:15552: darśayām āsatur devaṃ pāyasāni mahānti ca // HV_App.I,31.3603 //
GE07hv_apppu:15553: nandagopaṃ yaśodāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā prīto 'bhavad dhariḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15554: avocac ca tato vākyaṃ nandagopaṃ saballavam /
GE07hv_apppu:15555: yaśodāṃ mātaraṃ paścād vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān // HV_App.I,31.3606 //
GE07hv_apppu:15556: tāta mātar vraje goṣṭhe kuśalaṃ vā svagodhane /
GE07hv_apppu:15557: api gāvaḥ kṣīravatyo vatsā vatsatarāḥ pitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3608 //
GE07hv_apppu:15558: api vā suśubhaṃ kṣīram api gāvaḥ suśobhanāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15559: api vā dārakā mātar vatsapālāḥ pitar divā // HV_App.I,31.3610 //
GE07hv_apppu:15560: bahūni cāpi dāmāni kīlakā api vā bahu /
GE07hv_apppu:15561: tṛṇāni bahurūpāṇi kiṃ vā santi pitaḥ sadā // HV_App.I,31.3612 //
GE07hv_apppu:15562: śakaṭāni sugandhīni kiṃ vā santi pitar dhruvam /
GE07hv_apppu:15563: api gopyaḥ putravatyo dārakāḥ kim ajījanan // HV_App.I,31.3614 //
GE07hv_apppu:15564: ghaṭāḥ kiṃ bahavo mātar abhinnāḥ sarvato vraje /
GE07hv_apppu:15565: kiṃ gāvaḥ kṣīram atulaṃ sravany ahar ahaḥ pitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3616 //
GE07hv_apppu:15566: haiyaṃgavīnaṃ kṣīrāṇi dadhi vā kim ajījanan /
GE07hv_apppu:15567: godhanaṃ sarvam evaitan nīrogaṃ saṃprapadyate // HV_App.I,31.3618 //
GE07hv_apppu:15569: sarvam etad yaduśreṣṭha nīrogaṃ bahuśaḥ prabho /
GE07hv_apppu:15571: rakṣaṇāt tava deveśa sadā kuśalino vayam /
GE07hv_apppu:15572: sagodhanāḥ savatsāś ca nīrogā eva keśava // HV_App.I,31.3622 //
GE07hv_apppu:15573: ekam eva sadā duḥkhaṃ na tvāṃ drakṣyāma keśava /
GE07hv_apppu:15574: yad etat kevalaṃ duḥkham iti me dhīyate sadā // HV_App.I,31.3624 //
GE07hv_apppu:15576: evamādi vilapyantaṃ gacchety āha sa keśavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15577: mātaraṃ punar āhedaṃ mātar gaccha gṛhaṃ prati // HV_App.I,31.3626 //
GE07hv_apppu:15578: ye ca tvāṃ kīrtayiṣyanti te ca svargam avāpnuyuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15579: ye kecit tvāṃ namasyanti te me priyatarāḥ sadā // HV_App.I,31.3628 //
GE07hv_apppu:15580: madbhaktāḥ sarvadā santu gacchety āha ca tāṃ hariḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15582: ity uktvā pitarau devo vāsudevaḥ sanātanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15583: gāḍham āliṅgya tau prītau preṣayām āsa keśavaḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:15586: iti śrutvā ca tadvākyaṃ kṛṣṇād bhaktipuraḥsaram /
GE07hv_apppu:15587: yaśodā nandagopaś ca jagmatuḥ svagṛhaṃ kila // HV_App.I,31.3630 //
GE07hv_apppu:15588: tataḥ kṛṣṇo hṛṣīkeśo yādavair vṛṣṇibhiḥ saha /
GE07hv_apppu:15589: gantum aicchat tadā viṣṇuḥ purīṃ dvāravatīṃ kila // HV_App.I,31.3632 //
GE07hv_apppu:15590: [k: Dn Bom. Poona Cal. eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:15591: ya etac chṛṇuyān nityaṃ paṭhed vāpi samāhitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15592: putravān dhanavāṃś caiva ante mokṣaṃ ca gacchati //
GE07hv_apppu:15595: gacchann atha mahāviṣṇuḥ puṣkaraṃ prāpya yādavaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15596: apaśyan munimukhyāṃs tu puṣkarasthān nṛpottama // HV_App.I,31.3634 //
GE07hv_apppu:15600: atyadbhutam idaṃ viṣṇo tava vīryaṃ janārdana /
GE07hv_apppu:15601: yena tau nihatau yuddhe haṃso ḍibhaka eva ca // HV_App.I,31.3639 //
GE07hv_apppu:15602: yo vicakro durādharṣo devair api suduḥsahaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15603: saṃgare nihato deva duḥsādhya iti no matiḥ // HV_App.I,31.3641 //
GE07hv_apppu:15604: kṣemo naḥ sarvakāryeṣu caratāṃ tapa uttamam /
GE07hv_apppu:15605: tvatprasādāj jagannātha carāmas tapa uttamam // HV_App.I,31.3643 //
GE07hv_apppu:15607: tvaṃ hi sarvasya duḥkhasya hartā tvāṃ dhyāyatāṃ sadā // HV_App.I,31.3645
GE07hv_apppu:15609: tvaṃ hi naḥ satataṃ dhātā vidhātā tapaso hare // HV_App.I,31.3647 //
GE07hv_apppu:15610: tvam oṃkāro vaṣaṭkāras tvaṃ yajñas tvaṃ pitāmahaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15611: tvaṃ jyotir brahmaṇo mūrtis tvaṃ brahmā rudra eva ca // HV_App.I,31.3649
GE07hv_apppu:15613: upāsyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yajñair dānair jagatpate // HV_App.I,31.3651 //
GE07hv_apppu:15614: namo viśvasṛje deva namas te viśvamūrtaye /
GE07hv_apppu:15615: pāhi lokam imaṃ deva hatvā brahmadviṣaḥ sadā // HV_App.I,31.3653 //
GE07hv_apppu:15616: sa tatheti harir viṣṇur yayau dvāravatīṃ purīm /
GE07hv_apppu:15617: avasad vṛṣṇibhiḥ sārdhaṃ stūyamānaḥ sa māgadhaiḥ // HV_App.I,31.3655 //
GE07hv_apppu:15618: iyaṃ ca devadevasya ceṣṭā hi janamejaya /
GE07hv_apppu:15619: proktā te pṛcchate rājan kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi // HV_App.I,31.3657 //
GE07hv_apppu:15621: [h: HV (CE), Appendix I, No. 32-39. Input by Luther Obrock, corrected by J. Wayne Bass, supervised, checked, and corrected by James L. Fitzgerald.
GE07hv_apppu:15623: [k: After 107.18, Dn D6 Bom. Poona eds G(ed.) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_apppu:15624: tataḥ prabhṛti sā devī kāmamohaṃ gatā vibho /
GE07hv_apppu:15625: devyās tu vacanaṃ smṛtvā saṃsmarantī patiṃ tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:15626: nidrāṃ na bhajate rātrau na divā bhojanaṃ tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:15627: smarantī patibhāvaṃ sā vilalāpa nṛpātmajā // HV_App.I,32.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:15628: nindantī śaśinaṃ nāke sevatī na ca candanam /
GE07hv_apppu:15629: sā bālā mohitā rājan kāmena paripīḍitā // HV_App.I,32.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:15630: upacaryanti tāṃ sukhyo vijvarām api sajvarām /
GE07hv_apppu:15631: tapyate hṛdayaṃ tasyā lepitaṃ candanena ca // HV_App.I,32.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:15633: jṛmbhaṇaṃ ca tathā svāpo dehe tasyā vyavardhata // HV_App.I,32.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:15635: kṣipanti sakhyo hṛdaye pīḍite manmathāgninā // HV_App.I,32.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:15636: vyajanāni prakurvanti pṛcchanti ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15637: kā vyathā kiṃ śarīriṃ te kim idaṃ tava bhāmini // HV_App.I,32.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:15638: kiṃ tubhyaṃ rocate devi tad ākhyāhi varānane /
GE07hv_apppu:15639: kasmād idaṃ samutpannaṃ duḥkhasādhyaṃ manorame // HV_App.I,32.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:15640: tvanmanonugataṃ vākyaṃ vadanty etās tu sārikāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15641: śukā nīlatamāḥ subhru paṭhanti hi pumān iva // HV_App.I,32.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:15643: tava tāto mahāvīro devānām api durjayaḥ // HV_App.I,32.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:15644: tasyāgre tiṣṭhate ko 'pi na bhūmau varavarṇini /
GE07hv_apppu:15645: baleḥ putro mahāvīro bāṇo hi duratikramaḥ // HV_App.I,32.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:15647: yatra saṃtiṣṭhate devaḥ śūlahasto maheśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,32.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:15649: bāṇaṃ prati mahādevas tava tātam uṣe śṛṇu // HV_App.I,32.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:15650: kā vyatheti mukhe cedaṃ nāsāgraṃ ca virājate /
GE07hv_apppu:15653: na śobhite tu vicchāyaṃ kimarthaṃ kāraṇaṃ vada // HV_App.I,32.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:15654: śvāsān muñcasi bāle tvaṃ na ratiṃ yāsi bhāvataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15655: gṛhāṇa bhojanaṃ divyaṃ yat te manasi vartate // HV_App.I,32.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:15656: tāmbūlaṃ rocate pūrvaṃ tat kimarthaṃ na gṛhyate /
GE07hv_apppu:15658: gṛhāṇa devi uttiṣṭha vada pīḍāṃ śarīrajām // HV_App.I,32.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:15660: dāsībhiḥ kīrtitaṃ tatra mātur agre pṛthak pṛthak // HV_App.I,32.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:15661: rājaputrī yadā devi samāyātā gṛhe satī /
GE07hv_apppu:15663: ato dāsījanā devi vadāmas tvāṃ vayaṃ janāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15664: ko mohaḥ kim idaṃ maunaṃ kaḥ svāpo mlānatā katham /
GE07hv_apppu:15665: vicārya bhiṣajo devi diśyantāṃ kaṣṭaśāntaye // HV_App.I,32.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:15667: tat kathaṃ sahate devi vyādhibhāraṃ varānane // HV_App.I,32.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:15668: iti śrutvā tadā devī satvarā haṃsagāminī /
GE07hv_apppu:15669: prāpya deśam uṣā yatra kim idaṃ kaṣṭalakṣaṇam // HV_App.I,32.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:15671: spṛṣṭvāṅgulīr anāyāsaṃ sphoṭayām āsa bhāvinī // HV_App.I,32.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:15672: kim asti tava kalyāṇi kā vyathā tava vartate /
GE07hv_apppu:15673: ete vaidyāḥ samāgatya pṛcchanti bhavatīṃ hi tat // HV_App.I,32.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:15676: pārvatyāḥ krīḍitaṃ tatra jānīmaḥ śramasaṃbhavam // HV_App.I,32.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:15677: śramād glāniḥ samutpannā jṛmbhaṇaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15678: svāpaś ca jāyate tena mā bhayaṃ kartum arhasi // HV_App.I,32.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:15681: amātyāḥ kim idaṃ śīghraṃ kim idaṃ budbudāyate // HV_App.I,32.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:15682: atidāho mahān svedaḥ pipāsā na bubhukṣate /
GE07hv_apppu:15683: pralāpa eva kiṃ tasyāṃ śāstrato brūta niścitam // HV_App.I,32.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:15687: dṛṣṭipātaḥ kṛtas tābhis tena putryāṃ vyathābhavat // HV_App.I,32.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:15688: rakṣāmantrais tathā pītaiḥ sarṣapais tāṃ kumārikām /
GE07hv_apppu:15689: pānīyair abhiṣekeṇa parā śāntir bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,32.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:15690: ity uktvā bhiṣajaḥ sarve nivṛttā nṛpaveśmataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:15691: sūcayanta punaḥ sarve kāmābhiprāyajāṃ vyathām // HV_App.I,32.68 //

GE07hv_apppu:16010: sakhitvaṃ mānayasvādya bhaktiṃ ca patageśvara // HV_App.I,36.26 //

GE07hv_apppu:16012: suparṇa sukṛtena tvāṃ śape pannaganāśana // HV_App.I,36.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:16013: dāsītvāc ca tvayā mātā mokṣitaikākinā purā /
GE07hv_apppu:16014: pakṣavikṣepam āśritya hatā yodhās tvayā purā // HV_App.I,36.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:16015: bhavān suragaṇān sarvān pṛṣṭham āropya vikramāt /
GE07hv_apppu:16016: gacchase hy agamān deśān vijayaś ca tavāsrayāṭ // HV_App.I,36.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:16018: bhute bhavye bhaviṣye ca na te tulyo 'sti vikrame // HV_App.I,36.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:16022: atyadbhutam idaṃ vākyaṃ tava kṛṣṇa mahābhuja /
GE07hv_apppu:16023: tvatprasādāt tu vijayaḥ sarvatra mama keśava // HV_App.I,36.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:16025: stotavyas tvaṃ mayā kṛṣṇa stauṣi māṃ tvaṃ mahābhuja // HV_App.I,36.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:16027: amoghadarśanas tvaṃ hi varārthiṣu varapradaḥ // HV_App.I,36.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:16031: bhavān pūrveṣu deheṣu khyāto bhūmidharaḥ prabho // HV_App.I,36.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:16033: cāṇūramathanaś caiva gopriyaḥ kaṃsahā bhavān // HV_App.I,36.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:16035: mallapriyo mahāmallo mahāpuruṣa ity api // HV_App.I,36.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:16037: brahmaṇyaś ca vareṇyaś ca bhavān dāmodharaḥ smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,36.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:16039: asilomnaś ca hantā ca tathā rāvaṇanāśanaḥ // HV_App.I,36.54 //
GE07hv_apppu:16043: varuṇaś ca bhavān khyāto bhavāṃś ca saridudbhavaḥ // HV_App.I,36.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:16045: dāśārha iti vikhyāto mahādhanvā dhanuḥ priyaḥ // HV_App.I,36.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:16046: govinda iti vikhyāta udadhis tvaṃ ca suvrata /
GE07hv_apppu:16047: ākāśaś ca tapaś caiva samudramathano bhavān // HV_App.I,36.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:16048: bhavān svargo bahuphalo bhavān svargadharo mahān /
GE07hv_apppu:16049: tvam eva ca mahāmegho bījaniṣpattir eva ca // HV_App.I,36.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:16051: bhavān kāmapradaś caiva kāmaḥ sarvadhanurdharaḥ // HV_App.I,36.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:16052: saṃvarto vartanaś caiva pralayo nilayo mahān /
GE07hv_apppu:16055: stotum icchasi māṃ deva stotavyas tvaṃ yadūttama // HV_App.I,36.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:16056: cakṣuṣā ye tvayā ghorāḥ prāṇinas tu nirīkṣitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16058: ye tvayā parayā prītyā prāṇino vai nirīkṣitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16059: iha ca pretya cāpāpāḥ sarve te svargagāminaḥ // HV_App.I,36.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:16060: eṣa te 'haṃ mahābāho vaśagaḥ śāsane sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,36.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:16063: jayaśabdaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā garuḍaḥ prāha keśavam /
GE07hv_apppu:16064: ayam asmi sthito vīra āruhasva mahābala // HV_App.I,36.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:16065: tataḥ kaṇṭhe pariṣvajya mādhavo garuḍaṃ tataḥ /

GE07hv_apppu:16072: [k: After 112.32, K Ñ2.3V BD T4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16075: evaṃ sa śūlabhṛt tatra punar yuddhaṃ pracakrame /
GE07hv_apppu:16081: jvālā prādurabhūd vaktrād dahantīva diśo daśa // HV_App.I,37.7 //
GE07hv_apppu:16082: tatas tu dharaṇī devī pīḍyamānā mahātmabhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16088: laghvībhūtā yathā deva dhārayeyaṃ carācaram // HV_App.I,37.13 //
GE07hv_apppu:16089: tatas tu kāsyapīṃ devīṃ pratyuvāca pitāmahaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16090: muhūrtaṃ dhārayātmānam āśu laghvī bhaviṣyasi // HV_App.I,37.15 //
GE07hv_apppu:16091: dṛṣṭvā tu bhagavān brahmā rudraṃ vacanam abravīt /
GE07hv_apppu:16092: sṛṣṭo mahāsuravadhaḥ kiṃ bhūyaḥ parirakṣase // HV_App.I,37.17 //
GE07hv_apppu:16093: na ca yuddhaṃ mahābāho kṛṣṇena tava rocate /
GE07hv_apppu:16094: na ca budhyasi kṛṣṇaṃ tvam ātmānaṃ hi dvidhākṛtam // HV_App.I,37.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:16095: tataḥ śarīrayogād dhi bhagavān avyayaḥ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16096: praviśya paśyate kṛtsnāṃs trīṃ lokān sacarācarān // HV_App.I,37.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:16097: [k: After line 21, Ñ2.3V BDs D5.6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16099: [k: Ñ2.3V BDs D5.6 cont.; K1 D1-3 ins. after 1375* [sic] :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16100: praviśya yogaṃ yogātmā varāṃs tān anucintayan /
GE07hv_apppu:16101: dvāravatyāṃ yad uktaṃ ca tad anusmṛtya sarvaśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16102: jagāda nottaraṃ kiṃ cin nivṛtto 'sau bhavat tadā //
GE07hv_apppu:16104: tato niḥsṛtya rudras tu nyastavādo 'bhavan mṛdhe // HV_App.I,37.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:16105: brahmāṇaṃ cābravīd rudro na yotsye bhagavann iti /
GE07hv_apppu:16106: kṛṣṇena saha saṃgrāme laghvī bhavatu medinī // HV_App.I,37.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:16107: tataḥ kṛṣṇo 'tha rudraś ca pariṣvajya parasparam /
GE07hv_apppu:16108: parāṃ prītim upāgamya saṃgrāmād apajagmatuḥ // HV_App.I,37.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:16110: etadarthe purā rājan mārkaṇḍeyaṃ tu nāradaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16111: na ca tau paśyate kaścid yoginau yogam āgatau /
GE07hv_apppu:16112: eko brahmā tathā kṛtvā paśyaṃl lokapitāmahaḥ // HV_App.I,37.29 //
GE07hv_apppu:16114: pārśvathaṃ paripapraccha jñātvā vai dīrghadarśinam // HV_App.I,37.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:16116: rātrau svapnāntare brahman mayā dṛṣṭau harācyutau // HV_App.I,37.33 //
GE07hv_apppu:16117: hariṃ ca hararūpeṇa haraṃ ca harirūpiṇam /
GE07hv_apppu:16120: garuḍasthaṃ cāpi haraṃ hariṃ ca vṛṣabhadhvajam // HV_App.I,37.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:16121: vismayo me mahān brahman dṛṣṭvā tat paramādbhutam /
GE07hv_apppu:16122: etad ācakṣva bhagavan yāthātathyena suvrata // HV_App.I,37.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:16125: yathāntaraṃ na paśyāmi tena tau diśataḥ śivam // HV_App.I,37.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:16127: tad eva te pravakśyāmi rūpaṃ hariharātmakam // HV_App.I,37.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:16128: yo vai viṣṇuḥ sa vai rudro yo rudraḥ sa pitāmahaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16129: ekā mūrtis trayo devā rudraviṣṇupitāmahāḥ // HV_App.I,37.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:16131: ardhanārīśvarās te tu vrataṃ tīvraṃ samāśritāḥ // HV_App.I,37.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:16132: yathā jale jalaṃ kṣiptaṃ jalam eva tu tad bhavet /
GE07hv_apppu:16133: rudraṃ viṣṇuḥ praviṣṭas tu tathā rudramayo bhavet // HV_App.I,37.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:16134: agnim agniḥ praviṣṭas tu agnir eva yathā bhavet /
GE07hv_apppu:16135: tathā viṣṇuṃ praviṣtas tu rudro viṣṇumayo bhavet // HV_App.I,37.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:16136: rudram agnimayaṃ vidyād viṣṇuḥ somātmakaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16142: [k: After line 57, Ñ2.3 V1.2 B1.2 Ds1 T4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16143: etau tau ca pravaktārāv etau tau ca prabhāmayau /

GE07hv_apppu:16145: jagataḥ pālakāv etāv etau sṣṛṭikarau smṛtau /
GE07hv_apppu:16146: ete caiva pravarṣanti bhānti vānti sṛjanti ca /
GE07hv_apppu:16147: etat parataraṃ guhyaṃ kathitaṃ te pitāmaha // HV_App.I,37.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:16148: yaś cainaṃ paṭhate nityaṃ yaś cainaṃ śṛṇuyān naraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16150: devau hariharau stoṣye brahmaṇā saha saṃgatau /
GE07hv_apppu:16151: etau ca paramau devau jagataḥ prabhavāpyayau // HV_App.I,37.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:16152: rudrasya paramo viṣṇur viṣṇoś ca paramaḥ śivaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16153: eka eva dvidhā bhūto loke carati nityaśaḥ // HV_App.I,37.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:16154: na vinā śaṃkaraṃ viṣṇur na vinā keśavaṃ śivaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16155: tasmād ekatvam āyātau rudropendrau tu tau purā // HV_App.I,37.68 //
GE07hv_apppu:16157: namaḥ ṣaḍardhanetrāya dvinetrāya ca vai namaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16158: namaḥ piṅgalanetrāya padmanetrāya vai namaḥ // HV_App.I,37.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:16160: namo dharaṇīdharāya ganṅgādharāya vai namaḥ // HV_App.I,37.73 //
GE07hv_apppu:16162: namaḥ kapālamālāya vanamālāya vai namaḥ // HV_App.I,37.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:16164: namaḥ kanakadaṇḍāya namas te vratadaṇḍine // HV_App.I,37.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:16166: namo 'stu lakṣmīpataye umāyāḥ pataye namaḥ // HV_App.I,37.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:16172: namaḥ pralayakartre ca namaḥ sṛṣṭikarāya ca // HV_App.I,37.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:16174: virūpākṣāya devāya namaḥ saumyekṣaṇāya ca // HV_App.I,37.87 //
GE07hv_apppu:16179: [k: Ñ2 ins. after line 90; K1 D3 after line 94 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16185: namas te bhagavan viṣṇo namas te bhagavañ śiva /
GE07hv_apppu:16186: namas te bhagavan deva namas te devapūjita // HV_App.I,37.97 //
GE07hv_apppu:16187: namas te sāmabhir gīta namas te yajubhiḥ saha /
GE07hv_apppu:16188: namas te suraśatrughna namas te 'surapūjita // HV_App.I,37.99 //
GE07hv_apppu:16190: hṛṣīkeśa namas te 'stu svarṇakeśa namo 'stu te // HV_App.I,37.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:16191: imaṃ stavaṃ yo rudrasya viṣṇoś caiva mahātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16192: sametya ṛṣibhiḥ sarvaiḥ stutau tau sumahātmabhiḥ // HV_App.I,37.103 //
GE07hv_apppu:16195: [k: After line 104, Ñ2 B2 D6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16197: agastyena pulastyena dhaumyena ca mahātmanā // HV_App.I,37.106 //
GE07hv_apppu:16198: yaś cedaṃ paṭhate stotraṃ nityaṃ hariharātmakam /
GE07hv_apppu:16199: arogo balavāṃś caiva jāyate nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16200: śriyaṃ ca labhate nityaṃ na ca svargān nivartate // HV_App.I,37.109 //
GE07hv_apppu:16201: aputro labhate putraṃ kanyā vindati satpatim /
GE07hv_apppu:16202: gurviṇī śṛṇute yā tu varaṃ putraṃ prasūyate // HV_App.I,37.111 //
GE07hv_apppu:16203: rākṣasāś ca piśācāś ca bhūtāni ca vināyakāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16204: bhayaṃ tatra na kurvanti yatrāyaṃ paṭhyate stavaḥ // HV_App.I,37.113 //

GE07hv_apppu:16217: balaṃ cātibalaṃ caiva vāsudevaṃ sudurjayam // HV_App.I,38.8 //

GE07hv_apppu:16235: nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā sarvaṃ prāg eva so 'cyutaḥ /

GE07hv_apppu:16246: snātaḥ svalaṃkṛtas tatra so 'niruddhaḥ sa bhāryayā // HV_App.I,38.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:16247: tataḥ snigdhaiḥ śubhair vākyair gandharvāś ca jagus tadā /

GE07hv_apppu:16258: bāṇasya gāvas tiṣṭhanti haste tu varuṇasya vai /

GE07hv_apppu:16260: tat pītvātibalaś caiva naro bhavati durjayaḥ // HV_App.I,38.47 //

GE07hv_apppu:16263: tatas tu bhagavān brahmā vardhāpya sa tu keśavam /

GE07hv_apppu:16268: devadeva mahāyuddhe jayet tvāṃ ko nu sattamam //
GE07hv_apppu:16269: śakto na pramukhe sthātuṃ sākṣād api śatakratuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16270: āroha garuḍaṃ tūrṇaṃ gacchāmo dvārakāṃ purīm // **HV_App.I,38.53**2:4
GE07hv_apppu:16271: yataḥ kṛṣṇas tataḥ sarve gacchanti jayakāṅkṣiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,38.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:16273: dvārakābhimukhī soṣā devyā prasthāpitā yayau // HV_App.I,38.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:16274: tato balaś ca kṛṣṇaś ca pradyumnaś ca mahābalaḥ /

GE07hv_apppu:16276: prasthitaś ca sa tejasvī garuḍaḥ pakṣiṇāṃ varaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16277: unmūlayaṃs tarugaṇān kampayaṃś cāpi medinīm // HV_App.I,38.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:16278: ākulāś ca diśaḥ sarvā reṇudhvastam ivāmbaram /

GE07hv_apppu:16297: gṛhe śrīdhanvinaś caiva śubhas tatra pravartate // HV_App.I,39.12 //

GE07hv_apppu:16312: [k: Ñ3 V1.3 B2.3 D6 ins. after line 26; Ñ2 B1 Ds2 after line 22 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16314: vadhūr vardhasi diṣṭyā tvam aniruddhasya darśanāt //
GE07hv_apppu:16316: kriyāṃ cārebhire kartum uṣā ca gṛhasaṃsthitā // HV_App.I,39.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:16320: āpṛcchya ca sakhīvargam uṣāṃ ca tridivaṃ gatā // HV_App.I,39.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:16322: māyāvatyā gṛhaṃ nītā prathamaṃ sā nimantritā // HV_App.I,39.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:16324: vāsobhir annapānaiś ca pūjayām āsa sundarīm // HV_App.I,39.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:16325: tataḥ krameṇa sarvās tā vadhūm ūṣāṃ yadustriyaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16326: ācāram anupaśyantyaḥ svavarma iti vavrire // HV_App.I,39.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:16328: yathā bāṇo jitaḥ saṃkhye jīvanmuktaś ca viṣṇunā // HV_App.I,39.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:16329: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 40, transliterated by Horst Brinkhaus,
GE07hv_apppu:16330: proof--read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of August 15, 2001 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:16331: [k: Ś1 ins. after adhyāya 114, K Ñ2.3V BD T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 after appendix I, No. 42 (correction: after app. I, No. 41 and 43 respectively)
GE07hv_apppu:16334: bhagavan kena vidhinā śrotavyaṃ bhārataṃ budhaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16335: [k: Before the ref. D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16338: prajānāṃ patibhiḥ sārdhaṃ devānām ṛṣibhiḥ saha /
GE07hv_apppu:16340: daityānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca yakṣāṇām atha pakṣiṇām /
GE07hv_apppu:16346: vicitrāś ca kathāyogā janma cāgryam anuttamam /
GE07hv_apppu:16347: tat kathyamānam asmākaṃ tvayā vai ślakṣṇayā girā /
GE07hv_apppu:16350: paurāṇe kiṃ phalaṃ cāsya tad bhavān vaktum arhati /
GE07hv_apppu:16352: parvaṇāṃ śravaṇavidhiṃ pāraṇeṣu ca yat phalam /
GE07hv_apppu:16353: janamejayena yat pṛṣṭaṃ tasminn avabhṛte kratau /
GE07hv_apppu:16357: śrutvākhyānam idaṃ samyak pāvanaṃ vai dvijottama /
GE07hv_apppu:16358: ato mahattaraṃ bhūyo vakṣyāmi vidhim uttamam /
GE07hv_apppu:16359: phalaṃ kiṃ ke ca devāś ca pūjyā vai pāraṇeṣv iha // HV_App.I,40.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:16360: deyaṃ samāpte bhagavan kiṃ ca parvaṇi parvaṇi /
GE07hv_apppu:16361: vācakaḥ kīdṛśaś cātra eṣṭavyas tad bravīhi me // HV_App.I,40.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:16363: śṛṇu rājan vidhim imaṃ phalaṃ yac cāpi bhāratāt /
GE07hv_apppu:16364: [k: After the ref. D6 T1.2 G1.3.5 M2.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16365: samyak pṛṣṭo 'smi rājendra tvayā buddhimatāṃ vara /
GE07hv_apppu:16366: mayāpi bhagavān vyāsaḥ pṛṣṭo vedavidāṃ vara /
GE07hv_apppu:16367: pṛṣṭena tu mayā guhyaṃ vidhir ukto mahātmanā /
GE07hv_apppu:16368: tathā vakṣ[y]āmi te samyak samādhāya punaḥ punaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16369: śrutād bhavati rājendra yat tvaṃ mām anupṛcchasi // HV_App.I,40.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:16370: divi devā mahīpāla krīḍārtham avaniṃ gatāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16371: kṛtvā kāryam idaṃ caiva tataś ca divam āgatāḥ // HV_App.I,40.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:16372: hanta yat te pravakṣyāmi tac chṛṇuṣva samāhitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16373: ṛṣīṇāṃ devatānāṃ ca saṃbhavaṃ vasudhātale // HV_App.I,40.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:16374: vasurudrās tathā sādhyā viśve devāś ca śāśvatāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16375: ādityāś cāśvinau devau lokapālāḥ saharṣibhiḥ // HV_App.I,40.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:16376: guhyakāś ca sagandharvā nāgā vidyādharās tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:16377: siddhā dharmaḥ svayaṃbhūś ca muniḥ kātyāyano varaḥ // HV_App.I,40.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:16379: grahāḥ saṃvatsarāś caiva ayanāny ṛtavas tathā // HV_App.I,40.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:16380: sthāvaraṃ jaṃgamaṃ caiva jagat sarvaṃ surāsuram /
GE07hv_apppu:16381: bhārate bharataśreṣṭha ekastham iha dṛśyate // HV_App.I,40.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:16383: kṛtvāpi pātakaṃ ghoraṃ sadyo mucyeta mānavaḥ // HV_App.I,40.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:16385: saṃyamyāntaḥśucir bhūtvā pāraṃ gatvā ca bhārate // HV_App.I,40.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:16386: teṣāṃ śreṣṭhāni deyāni śrutvā bhārata bhāratam /
GE07hv_apppu:16387: brāhmaṇebhyo yathāśaktyā bhaktyā ca bharatarṣabha // HV_App.I,40.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:16389: gāvaḥ kāṃsyopadohāś ca kanyāś caiva svalaṃkṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,40.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:16391: bhavanāni ca vicitrāṇi bhūmir vāsāṃsi kāñcanam // HV_App.I,40.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:16392: vāhanāni ca deyāni hayā mattāś ca vāraṇāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16393: śayanaṃ śibikāś caiva syandanāś ca svalaṃkṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,40.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:16396: kaṭakaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ caiva yajñasūtraṃ tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:16398: evaṃ saṃpūjya vidhivat tato dadyāc ca dakṣiṇām /
GE07hv_apppu:16399: vidhihīnaṃ ca yaḥ kuryāt phalaṃ samyaṅ na cāpnuyāt /
GE07hv_apppu:16400: kāmāl lobhāt tathā mohān na kartavyānyathā nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:16401: kurvan sa narakaṃ yāti viparītaṃ phalaṃ labhet /
GE07hv_apppu:16402: yad yad gṛhe varaṃ kiṃcid yad yad asti mahad vasu /
GE07hv_apppu:16403: tat tad deyaṃ dvijātibhya ātmā dārāś ca sūnavaḥ // HV_App.I,40.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:16404: śraddhayā parayā dattaṃ kramaśas tasya pāragaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16405: śaktitaḥ sumanā hṛṣṭaḥ śuśrūṣur avikatthanaḥ // HV_App.I,40.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:16407: śraddadhāno jitakrodho yathā sidhyati tac chṛṇu // HV_App.I,40.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:16411: vācake ca guṇāḥ proktā yāvantas tāñ śṛṇuṣva me /
GE07hv_apppu:16417: dānamānagṛhītaś ca kāryo bhavati vācakaḥ // HV_App.I,40.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:16426: vācayed vācakaḥ svasthaḥ svāsīnaḥ susamāhitaḥ // HV_App.I,40.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:16428: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet // HV_App.I,40.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:16429: īdṛśād vācakād rājañ śrutvā bhārata bhāratam /
GE07hv_apppu:16430: niyamasthaḥ śuciḥ śrotā śṛṇvan sa phalam aśnute // HV_App.I,40.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:16433: daśabhir daśabhiś caiva parvaṇāṃ pāraṇaṃ smṛtam //
GE07hv_apppu:16435: udyogāntaṃ tṛtīyaṃ tu bhīṣmāntaṃ ca caturthakam //
GE07hv_apppu:16441: ||* **HV_App.I,40.48**9:9: kecit tu mahābhāratasya ekāvṛttir ekapāraṇam iti ca *||
GE07hv_apppu:16442: pāraṇaṃ prathamaṃ prāpya dvijān kāmaiś ca tarpayet /
GE07hv_apppu:16443: agniṣṭomasya yāgasya phalaṃ vai labhate naraḥ // HV_App.I,40.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:16445: prahṛṣṭaḥ sa tu devaiś ca divaṃ yāti samāhitaḥ // HV_App.I,40.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:16447: haṃsayuktaṃ vimānaṃ sa prahṛṣṭaḥ saha devataiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16455: svargataś ca mudā yukto ramate nandane vane /
GE07hv_apppu:16465: vasaty amarasaṃkāśo varṣāṇy ayutaśo divi // HV_App.I,40.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:16470: vimānaṃ vibudhaiḥ sārdham āruhya divi gacchati /
GE07hv_apppu:16471: varṣāyutāni bhavane śakrasya divi modate // HV_App.I,40.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:16472: ṣaṣṭhe dviguṇam astīti saptame triguṇaṃ phalam /
GE07hv_apppu:16476: sarvāṃl lokān vicarate dvitīya iva bhāskaraḥ // HV_App.I,40.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:16480: sevyamāno varastrīṇāṃ candrāt kāntatarair mukhaiḥ // HV_App.I,40.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:16485: phalaṃ sa labhate martyo vimānaṃ caiva kāmikam /
GE07hv_apppu:16487: jāmbūnadamayair divyair gavākṣaiḥ sarvato vṛtam // HV_App.I,40.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:16489: vimānaṃ samadhiṣṭhāya śriyā paramayā jvalan // HV_App.I,40.78 //
GE07hv_apppu:16491: modate daivataiḥ sārdhaṃ divi deva ivāparaḥ // HV_App.I,40.80 //
GE07hv_apppu:16492: daśamaṃ pāraṇaṃ prāpya dvijātīn abhivandya ca /
GE07hv_apppu:16500: divyāṃl lokān vicarati divyair bhogaiḥ samanvitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16501: vibudhānāṃ prasādena śriyā paramayā yutaḥ // HV_App.I,40.90 //
GE07hv_apppu:16507: puraṃdarapure ramye śakreṇa saha modate // HV_App.I,40.93 //
GE07hv_apppu:16510: tataḥ sūryasya bhavane candrasya bhavane tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:16511: śivasya bhavane rājan viṣṇor yāti salokatām // HV_App.I,40.97 //
GE07hv_apppu:16512: evam etan mahārāja nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GE07hv_apppu:16513: śraddhadhānena vai bhāvyam evam āha gurur mama // HV_App.I,40.99 //
GE07hv_apppu:16514: lekhakasya tu dātavyaṃ manasā yad yad icchati /
GE07hv_apppu:16523: kaṭake kuṇḍale caiva brahmasūtraṃ tathāparam // HV_App.I,40.102 //
GE07hv_apppu:16525: vastraṃ caiva vicitraṃ ca gandhaṃ caiva viśeṣataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16526: devavat pūjayet taṃ tu viṣṇulokam avāpnuyāt /
GE07hv_apppu:16528: daṃpatī paridhānaṃ ca deyaṃ svarṇaṃ tathā vasu //
GE07hv_apppu:16530: ko 'pi asmatkule bhūyād dharivaṃśaṃ śṛṇoti yaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16531: nūnaṃ vai tāritās tena tasya tuṣṭā varapradāḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:16532: śrute tu harivaṃśe vai dadāmaḥ putrasaṃtatim /
GE07hv_apppu:16533: putravān sa bhaven nūnaṃ daśa janmāni pañca ca //
GE07hv_apppu:16535: vaiṣṇavān viṣṇubhaktāṃś ca dvijabhaktāṃs tathaiva ca //
GE07hv_apppu:16536: harivaṃśasya vai śrotā punāty ā saptamaṃ kulam //
GE07hv_apppu:16537: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi yāni deyāni bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:16538: vācyamāne ca viprebhyo rājan parvaṇi parvaṇi // HV_App.I,40.104 //
GE07hv_apppu:16539: jātiṃ deśaṃ ca sattvaṃ ca māhātmyaṃ bharatarṣabha /
GE07hv_apppu:16540: dharmaṃ vṛttiṃ ca vijñāya kṣatriyāṇāṃ narādhipa // HV_App.I,40.106 //
GE07hv_apppu:16541: svasti vācya dvijān ādau tataḥ kāryaṃ pravartate /
GE07hv_apppu:16542: samāpte parvaṇi tataḥ svaśaktyā tarpayed dvijān // HV_App.I,40.108 //
GE07hv_apppu:16544: [k: For line 109, K Ñ2 V1.3B Dsubst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16548: vidhivad bhojayed rājan madhupāyasam uttamam // HV_App.I,40.110 //
GE07hv_apppu:16550: āstike bhojayed rājan dadyāc caiva guḍaudanam /
GE07hv_apppu:16553: apūpaiś caiva pūpaiś ca modakaiś ca samanvitam // HV_App.I,40.113 //
GE07hv_apppu:16557: tarpaṇāni ca mukhyāni vanyamūlaphalāni ca // HV_App.I,40.117 //
GE07hv_apppu:16559: virāṭaparvaṇi tathā vāsāṃsi vividhāni ca // HV_App.I,40.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:16564: suvarṇaṃ ca tathā dadyād udyoge ca śrute tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:16565: bhojanaṃ bhojayed viprān gandhamālyair alaṃkṛtān // HV_App.I,40.121 //
GE07hv_apppu:16568: bhojanaṃ caiva mṛṣṭānnam aṣṭau dānāni dāpayet /
GE07hv_apppu:16569: tataḥ sarvaguṇopetam annaṃ dadyāt susaṃskṛtam // HV_App.I,40.123 //
GE07hv_apppu:16571: [k: For line 124, T2 G1 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16573: śarāś ca deyā rājendra cāpāny asivarās tathā // HV_App.I,40.125 //
GE07hv_apppu:16580: apūpais tarpaṇaiś caiva sarvam annaṃ pradāpayet /
GE07hv_apppu:16581: gadāparvaṇy api tathā mudgamiśraṃ pradāpayet // HV_App.I,40.129 //
GE07hv_apppu:16582: [k: For line 129, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16585: ghṛtaudanaṃ purastāc ca aiṣīke dāpayet punaḥ // HV_App.I,40.131 //
GE07hv_apppu:16586: tataḥ sarvaguṇopetam annaṃ dadyāt susaṃskṛtam // HV_App.I,40.132 //
GE07hv_apppu:16587: śāntiparvaṇy api gate haviṣyaṃ bhojayed dvijān // HV_App.I,40.133 //
GE07hv_apppu:16591: tathāśramanivāse tu haviṣyaṃ bhojayed dvijān // HV_App.I,40.135 //
GE07hv_apppu:16597: prāsthānike tathā parve miṣṭānnaṃ dāpayed dvijān /
GE07hv_apppu:16598: svargaparvaṇy api tathā haviṣyaṃ bhojayed dvijān // HV_App.I,40.138 //
GE07hv_apppu:16599: [k: For line 138, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16605: harivaṃśe tataḥ parvaṃ pāyasaṃ tatra bhojanam /
GE07hv_apppu:16606: [k: For line 139, D6 T1.3 G1.3.5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16607: harivaṃśe tu vai deyaṃ yac cāsya dayitaṃ gṛhe /
GE07hv_apppu:16608: [k: K Ñ2 V1.3 B Dn Ds D1.2.4.5 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16609: harivaṃśe tathā parve pāyasaṃ tatra bhojayet /
GE07hv_apppu:16612: śravaṇena ca dānena putraprāptir na saṃśayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16628: ślokaṃ vā ślokapādaṃ vā akṣaraṃ vā nṛpātmaja /
GE07hv_apppu:16630: vyāsaṃ caiva sapatnīkaṃ pūjayec ca yathāvidhi /
GE07hv_apppu:16631: lakṣmīnārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ pūjitaṃ tac ca pūjayet //
GE07hv_apppu:16633: viṣṇuḥ saṃpūjitas tena sa sākṣād devakīsutaḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:16634: pāraṇe pāraṇe rājan yathāvad bharatarṣabha // HV_App.I,40.140 //
GE07hv_apppu:16638: arcayeta yathānyāyaṃ gandhamālyaiḥ pṛthak pṛthak // HV_App.I,40.144 //
GE07hv_apppu:16642: śrīphalārghyaṃ karābhyāṃ ca gṛhītvā tatra daṃpatī /
GE07hv_apppu:16644: oṃ brahman viṣṇo maheśāna putrān dehi mamānaghān /
GE07hv_apppu:16646: pārvatīsahitaḥ svāmiñ śiva putrān dadasva naḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16651: jaya tvaṃ jagatāṃ nātha kāmanāṃ mama pūraya /
GE07hv_apppu:16652: yaṃ yaṃ cintayate kāmaṃ taṃ tam āpnoti niṣcitam /
GE07hv_apppu:16653: harivaṃśaḥ śruto yena tasya hastagato jayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16654: viṣṇur eva mahāyogī yogena stūyate hi yaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16658: kuryāt ṣoḍaśabhiḥ karṣair mūrtiṃ nārāyaṇasya tu /
GE07hv_apppu:16668: tataś ca brāhmaṇān rājan prayataḥ śiṣṭamānasaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16670: bhaktair māṃsaiś ca peyaiś ca kāmaiś ca vividhaiḥ śubhaiḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:16671: hiraṇyaṃ ca suvarṇaṃ ca dakṣiṇām atha dāpayet /
GE07hv_apppu:16675: yad yad evātmano 'bhīṣṭaṃ tad tad deyaṃ dvijātaye /
GE07hv_apppu:16676: sarvathā toṣayed bhaktyā vācakaṃ gurum ātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16677: devatāḥ kīrtayet sarvā naranārāyaṇau tathā // HV_App.I,40.148 //
GE07hv_apppu:16678: tato gandhaiś ca mālyaiś ca svalaṃkṛtya dvijottamān /
GE07hv_apppu:16679: tarpayed dvividhaiḥ kāmair dānaiś coccāvacais tathā // HV_App.I,40.150 //
GE07hv_apppu:16681: prāpnuyāc ca kratuphalaṃ tathā parvaṇi parvaṇi // HV_App.I,40.152 //
GE07hv_apppu:16682: [k: K1.3.4 Ñ2 V1 V3B Dins.; M2.4 ins. after line 150; T1.2 G1.3-5
GE07hv_apppu:16692: anena vidhinā yas tu harivaṃśaṃ śṛṇoti hi /
GE07hv_apppu:16694: vittaśāṭyaṃ samāśritya yo nu kuryād imaṃ vidhim /
GE07hv_apppu:16695: yathoktaṃ na phalaṃ tasya bhaved iha na saṃśayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16697: śrutvā tatpustakaṃ deyaṃ pratimā parvaṇi tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:16699: vācakaḥ parituṣṭaś ca śubhāṃ prītim anuttamām /
GE07hv_apppu:16700: [k: For line 154, K1.3.4 Ñ2 V1.3B DT1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16701: vācake parituṣṭe tu śubhā prītir anuttamā /
GE07hv_apppu:16702: tato hi varaṇaṃ kāryaṃ dvijānāṃ bharatarṣabha // HV_App.I,40.155 //
GE07hv_apppu:16703: [k: Ś1 Ñ2 V1.3 B1.2 Dn Ds D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16705: ity eṣa vidhir uddiṣṭo mayā te dvipadāṃ vara /
GE07hv_apppu:16706: śraddadhānena vai bhāvyaṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi // HV_App.I,40.157 //
GE07hv_apppu:16707: [k: T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4ins.; D6 after the colophon:k]
GE07hv_apppu:16709: harivaṃśam imaṃ puṇyaṃ vidhinā kena suvrata /
GE07hv_apppu:16710: śṛṇuyāt puruṣo nityaṃ paṭhec ca niyatātmavān /
GE07hv_apppu:16712: tathā vakṣyāmi te sarvaṃ śṛṇuṣvaikamanā nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:16714: pārāśaryaṃ tathā vyāsaṃ māṃ ca tvāṃ ca jagatpate /
GE07hv_apppu:16718: adhyāyaṃ ekaṃ devebhyaḥ śrāvayeta sadā naraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16720: vāgyataḥ prayato bhūtvā ekam adhyāyam ācaret /
GE07hv_apppu:16722: śrāvayet satataṃ vipro nityaṃ deveśvare harau /
GE07hv_apppu:16723: sukhaduḥkhe tathā krodhe devakārye tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:16724: pitṛkārye tathā yāne vivāhe maṃgale 'pi ca /
GE07hv_apppu:16725: sāyaṃ prātaḥ sadā rājan manaḥkṣobhe tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:16729: tasmāt sarvaprayatnena paṭhed vaṃśaṃ harer nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:16730: na nāstikeṣu vaktavyaṃ kṛtaghne na ca pāpiṣu /
GE07hv_apppu:16731: vācayan vāpi rājendra tadā tūṣṇīṃ tu saṃyataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16732: anyathā kilbiṣī rājan nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GE07hv_apppu:16734: tasmād dhi bhavatā nityaṃ gopyaṃ sarvatra bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:16737: idaṃ cāpy aparaṃ rājañ śṛṇu yatnaparo bhava /
GE07hv_apppu:16740: samāpte pāraṇe rājan snānaṃ tena samārabhet /
GE07hv_apppu:16742: māṇikyaṃ hāṭakaṃ vāpi bhūmiṃ gāś cāpi yatnataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16743: tena prīto harir viṣṇur ātmasāyujyam ānayet /
GE07hv_apppu:16744: idaṃ puṇyam idaṃ puṇyam ity uvāca mahāmuniḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16745: yaḥ śrāvayed dharer nityaṃ yathāśakti naraḥ sadā /
GE07hv_apppu:16746: harer vaṃśaṃ harer vaṃśaṃ iti vā nityam ācaret /
GE07hv_apppu:16747: harivaṃśe sthite rājan ko nāma narakaṃ vrajet /
GE07hv_apppu:16748: kṛpaṇo vā yadi syāt tu kasyāhur narake bhayam /
GE07hv_apppu:16749: etasya śravaṇe rājan pāraṇe ca narottama /
GE07hv_apppu:16750: tasmād yatnavatā nityaṃ śreyaś ca param ṛcchati /
GE07hv_apppu:16752: ity etat pāraṇe puṇyaṃ śravaṇeṣu ca yo vidhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16757: bhārataṃ bhavane yasya tasya haste gato jayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16763: puṇyaṃ pavitram atha pāpaharaṃ śivaṃ ca |
GE07hv_apppu:16769: tulyaṃ phalaṃ bhavati tasya ca tasya caiva ||
GE07hv_apppu:16771: janamejayas tu rājarṣir viṣṇor bhaktiṃ samudvahan /
GE07hv_apppu:16772: śaśāsa ca nṛpo rājā rājyaṃ nihatakaṇṭakam /
GE07hv_apppu:16776: bhāratād vividhaṃ puṇyaṃ bhārate vividhāḥ kathāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16777: bhārataṃ sevate yaś ca dīrgham āyur avāpnuyāt /
GE07hv_apppu:16780: bhāratāt prāpyate śreyo mokṣas tena bravīmi te /
GE07hv_apppu:16781: mahābhāratam ākhyānaṃ kṣitiṃ gāṃ ca sarasvatīṃ /
GE07hv_apppu:16782: brāhmaṇān keśavaṃ caiva prātar utthāya kīrtayet /
GE07hv_apppu:16785: [k: The printed line number 10 is misplaced; the automatically generated line numbers thus are off by one for the rest of this
GE07hv_apppu:16787: ādau cānte ca madhye ca hariḥ sarvatra gīyate /
GE07hv_apppu:16788: yatra viṣṇukathā divyā śrūyate ca sanātanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16789: tac chrotavyaṃ manuṣyeṇa paraṃ sukham ihecchatā /
GE07hv_apppu:16798: sadā yatnavatā bhāvyaṃ śreyas tu param icchatā // HV_App.I,40.159 //
GE07hv_apppu:16800: bhārataṃ bhavane yasya tasya hastagato jayaḥ // HV_App.I,40.161 //
GE07hv_apppu:16801: bhārataṃ paramaṃ puṇyaṃ bhārate vividhāḥ kathāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16802: bhārataṃ sevyate devair bhārataṃ paramaṃ padam // HV_App.I,40.163 //
GE07hv_apppu:16804: bhārate śriyam abhyeti bhārataṃ yāga ucyate /
GE07hv_apppu:16806: bhāratāt prāpyate mokṣas tattvam etad bravīmi te // HV_App.I,40.165 //
GE07hv_apppu:16807: mahābhāratam ākhyānaṃ kṣitiṃ gāṃ ca sarasvatīm /
GE07hv_apppu:16808: brahmāṇaṃ keśavaṃ caiva kīrtayan nāvasīdati // HV_App.I,40.167 //
GE07hv_apppu:16810: ādau cānte ca madhye ca hariḥ sarvatra gīyate // HV_App.I,40.169 //
GE07hv_apppu:16811: yatra viṣṇukathā divyāḥ śrutayaś ca sanātanāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16812: tac chrotavyaṃ manuṣyena paraṃ padam ihecchatā // HV_App.I,40.171 //
GE07hv_apppu:16814: etat sarvaguṇopetaṃ śrotavyaṃ bhūtim icchatā // HV_App.I,40.173 //
GE07hv_apppu:16816: yad dattaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ śraddhāyuktena saṃyutam /
GE07hv_apppu:16821: yat phalaṃ prāpyate puṃbhis tad dharer vaṃśapāraṇāt /
GE07hv_apppu:16826: sarvas taratu durgāṇi sarvo bhadrāṇi paśyatu /
GE07hv_apppu:16827: sarveṣāṃ vāñchitā arthā bhavantv asya ca pāraṇāt /
GE07hv_apppu:16835: tat sarvaṃ nāśam āyāti tamaḥ sūryodaye yathā //
GE07hv_apppu:16837: tat phalaṃ samavāpnoti vaiṣṇavo nātra saṃśayaḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:16838: striyaś ca puruṣāś caiva vaiṣṇavaṃ padam āpnuyuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16839: strībhiś ca putrakāmābhiḥ śrotavyaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ yaśaḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:16843: vācakāya ca dadyād dhi ātmanaḥśreyaḥ icchatā //
GE07hv_apppu:16844: alaṃkāraṃ pradadyāc ca pāṇyor vai bharatarṣabha /
GE07hv_apppu:16847: bhūmidānasamaṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati //
GE07hv_apppu:16848: śṛṇoti śrāvayed vāpi satataṃ caiva yo naraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16851: ātmānaṃ sasutaṃ caiva striyaṃ ca bharatarṣabha //
GE07hv_apppu:16853: idaṃ mayā tavāgre ca proktaṃ sarvaṃ nararṣabha /
GE07hv_apppu:16855: [k: The additional material added in some mss. after the colophon (e.g.,
GE07hv_apppu:16856: more than 160 lines in D2) has not been transliterated; cf. CE vol. II,
GE07hv_apppu:16858: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 41, transliterated by N. Hanemann, proof--read
GE07hv_apppu:16859: by Horst Brinkhaus, version of September 18, 2001 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:16860: [k: K Ñ2V BD T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. after adhyāya 118 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16863: puṣkare vai yathodbhūtā devāḥ sarṣigaṇāḥ purā // HV_App.I,41.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:16864: ādityā vasavo rudrā marutaś coṣmapās tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:16866: ṛṣayaś ca mahātmānaḥ sādhyā viśveśvarās tathā // HV_App.I,41.5 //
GE07hv_apppu:16867: [k: Ñ2 V1.2 B3 Ds D5 ins., D6 after line 6:k]
GE07hv_apppu:16868: vyāsarṣiṇā purā proktam etad ākhyāhi me 'khilam /
GE07hv_apppu:16871: kriyantaṃ caiva kālaṃ vai sa śete puruṣottamaḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:16872: etad ākhyāhi nikhilaṃ yogaṃ yogavidāṃ pate /
GE07hv_apppu:16874: tvaṃ hi naḥ paramodāro vedavedāṅgavit tathā // **HV_App.I,41.6**3:1
GE07hv_apppu:16875: śṛṇvatas tasya me kīrtiṃ na tṛptir upajāyate // HV_App.I,41.7 //
GE07hv_apppu:16876: kiyantaṃ sa ca kālaṃ vai śete sa puruṣottamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16877: kiyantaṃ caiva śayite kālaṃ kālasya saṃbhavaḥ // HV_App.I,41.9 //
GE07hv_apppu:16879: katham utthāya bhagavān asṛjan nikhalaṃ jagat // HV_App.I,41.11 //
GE07hv_apppu:16880: ke prajāpatayas tatra āsan pūrvaṃ mahāmune /
GE07hv_apppu:16881: kathaṃ nirmitavāṃś caiva sa tu lokān sanātanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.13 //
GE07hv_apppu:16887: āste sa ca suraśreṣṭho vidhim ādāya kaṃ mune // HV_App.I,41.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:16889: śṛṇomi parayā bhaktyā tava vaktrād viśeṣataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16890: tan me tvam upapannāya brahmann etad asaṃśayam /
GE07hv_apppu:16891: vaktum arhasi dharmiṣṭha yaśo nārāyaṇātmakam // HV_App.I,41.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:16893: śrāddhānām upaviṣṭānāṃ bhagavan vaktum arhasi // HV_App.I,41.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:16897: [k: T1.2 G1.3.5 M2.4 subst. for line 25:k]
GE07hv_apppu:16898: tam āśritya spṛhā yeṣāṃ teṣāṃ yuktā jagatpate /
GE07hv_apppu:16900: brāhmaṇānāṃ ca vadatāṃ śruto 'smābhir mahātmanām // HV_App.I,41.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:16904: na vijñātuṃ mayā śakyam ṛṣimātreṇa bhārata // HV_App.I,41.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:16906: viśvātmano 'yaṃ brahmāpi na vedayati tattvataḥ // HV_App.I,41.33 //
GE07hv_apppu:16907: śrutaṃ me viśvadevānāṃ yad rahasyaṃ maharṣiṇām /
GE07hv_apppu:16908: yad divyaṃ sarvadevānāṃ yat tattvaṃ tattvavādinām // HV_App.I,41.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:16909: tad adhyātmavidāṃ cintyaṃ kāraṇaṃ caiva karmaṇām /
GE07hv_apppu:16910: adhidaivaṃ yad adhyātmaṃ yad daivam iti saṃjñitam // HV_App.I,41.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:16911: yadbhūtam adhibhūtaṃ ca yat paraṃ ca maharṣiṇām /
GE07hv_apppu:16912: tat satyaṃ devadṛṣṭaṃ ca yat satyaṃ yatayo viduḥ // HV_App.I,41.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:16913: yaḥ kartā kārako buddhir manaḥ kṣetrajña eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:16914: pradhānaṃ puruṣaḥ śāstā yaḥ kaścid abhiśabdyate // HV_App.I,41.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:16915: kālaḥ kālaṃ svapayati draṣṭā svādhīna eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:16916: prāṇaḥ pañcavidhaś caiva dhruvam akṣaram eva ca // HV_App.I,41.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:16918: sa eva bhagavān sarvaṃ karoti vikaroti ca // HV_App.I,41.45 //
GE07hv_apppu:16919: yo 'smān kārayate karma tena sma vyākulīkṛtāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16920: yajāmahe tam eveśaṃ tam evecchāma nirvṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,41.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:16921: yo vaktā yaś ca vaktavyo yaś cāhaṃ prabravīmi te /
GE07hv_apppu:16922: idaṃ śṛṇuta yacchreyo yac cānyat parijalpatha // HV_App.I,41.49 //
GE07hv_apppu:16923: yāḥ kathāś caiva vartante śrutayo vātha gahvarāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16924: viśvaṃ viśvapatir devaḥ sarvaṃ nārāyaṇātmakam // HV_App.I,41.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:16925: yat satyaṃ yad amṛtam ādim akṣaraṃ vai @ HV_App.I,41.52 @
GE07hv_apppu:16926: yad bhūtaṃ bhavati mithaś ca yad bhaviṣyam |
GE07hv_apppu:16927: yat kiṃcic caram acarāvyayaṃ triloke @ HV_App.I,41.54 @
GE07hv_apppu:16928: tat sarvaṃ puruṣavaraḥ prabhur variṣṭhaḥ || HV_App.I,41.55 ||
GE07hv_apppu:16931: catvāry āhuḥ sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ tat kṛtaṃ yugam /
GE07hv_apppu:16932: tasya tāvacchatī saṃdhyā dviguṇā janamejaya // HV_App.I,41.57 //
GE07hv_apppu:16933: tatra dharmaś catuṣpādo hy adharmaḥ pādavigrahaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16934: svadharmaniratāḥ santo yajante caiva mānavāḥ // HV_App.I,41.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:16935: viprāḥ sthitā dharmaparā rājavṛtte sthitā nṛpāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16936: kṛṣyām abhiratā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ śuśrūṣavaḥ sthitāḥ // HV_App.I,41.61 //
GE07hv_apppu:16937: sadā sattvaṃ ca satyaṃ ca dharmaś caiva vivardhate /
GE07hv_apppu:16938: sadbhir ācaritaṃ yac ca kriyate khyāyate ca vai // HV_App.I,41.63 //
GE07hv_apppu:16939: etat kṛtayuge vṛttaṃ sarveṣām eva bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:16940: prāṇināṃ dharmabuddhīnām api cen nīcayoninām // HV_App.I,41.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:16942: tasya tāvacchatī saṃdhyā dviguṇā parikīrtitā // HV_App.I,41.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:16943: dvābhyām adharmaḥ pādābhyāṃ tribhir dharmo vyavasthitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16944: tatra satyaṃ ca sattvaṃ ca kṛte sarvaṃ vidhīyate // HV_App.I,41.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:16945: tretāyāṃ vikṛtiṃ yānti varṇā laulyena saṃyutāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16946: cāturvarṇyasya vaikṛtyād yānti daurbalyam āśritaḥ // HV_App.I,41.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:16948: dvāparasyāpi yā ceṣṭā tām api śrotum arhasi // HV_App.I,41.73 //
GE07hv_apppu:16949: dvāparaṃ dve sahasre tu varṣāṇāṃ kurusattama /
GE07hv_apppu:16950: tasya tāvacchatī saṃdhyā dviguṇā parikīrtitā // HV_App.I,41.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:16953: dvābhyāṃ dharmaḥ sthitaḥ padbhyām adharmas tribhir utthitaḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:16954: viparyayaṃ yānti śanaiḥ kṛte ye dharmasetavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16957: tathā varṣasahasraṃ tu varṣāṇāṃ dve śate tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:16958: saṃdhyāyāḥ parisaṃkhyātaṃ krūraṃ kaliyugaṃ smṛtam // HV_App.I,41.83 //
GE07hv_apppu:16960: kāminas tamasā channā jāyante tatra mānavāḥ // HV_App.I,41.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:16961: naivopavāsakṛt kaścin na sādhur na ca satyavāk /
GE07hv_apppu:16962: nāstiko brahmavaktā vā naro bhavati vai tadā // HV_App.I,41.87 //
GE07hv_apppu:16964: viprāḥ śūdrasamācārāḥ śūdrās tv ācāralakṣaṇāḥ // HV_App.I,41.89 //
GE07hv_apppu:16965: dūṣakās tv āśramāṇāṃ ca varṇānāṃ caiva saṃkarāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16966: agamyeṣv abhirajyante vatsyanty evaṃ kalau yuge // HV_App.I,41.91 //
GE07hv_apppu:16972: bhūyaś caturdaśaguṇaṃ tad aho brahmaṇaḥ smṛtam /
GE07hv_apppu:16973: trayyāṃ caiva tu saṃdeho yugānte janamejaya /
GE07hv_apppu:16975: etatsahasraparyantaṃ tad aho brāhmam ucyate // HV_App.I,41.96 //
GE07hv_apppu:16976: tato 'hani gate tasmin sarveṣām eva dehinām /
GE07hv_apppu:16981: kiṃnarāṇām apsarasāṃ bhujaṅgānāṃ tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,41.102 //
GE07hv_apppu:16982: parvatānāṃ nadīnāṃ ca paśūnāṃ caiva bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:16983: tiryagyonigatānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ kṛmiṇāṃ tathā // HV_App.I,41.104 //
GE07hv_apppu:16994: pītvārṇavāṃś ca sarvān sa nadīkūpāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:16995: parvatānāṃ ca salilaṃ sarvam ādāya raśmibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.114 //
GE07hv_apppu:16996: bhittvā sahasraśaś caiva mahīṃ gatvā rasātalam /
GE07hv_apppu:16997: rasātalagataṃ kṛtsnaṃ pibate rasam uttamam // HV_App.I,41.116 //
GE07hv_apppu:16998: apsu sṛjan kledam anyad dadāti prāṇināṃ dhruvam /
GE07hv_apppu:16999: tat sarvam aravindākṣa ādatte puruṣottamaḥ // HV_App.I,41.118 //
GE07hv_apppu:17000: vāyuś ca balavān bhūtvā sa vidhūyākhilaṃ jagat /
GE07hv_apppu:17001: prāṇodayaṃ surāṇāṃ ca vāyunā kurute hariḥ // HV_App.I,41.120 //
GE07hv_apppu:17002: tato devagaṇānāṃ ca sarveṣām eva dehinām /
GE07hv_apppu:17003: ye cendriyagaṇāḥ sarve ye cānye rajasodbhavāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17004: rūpaṃ ghrāṇaṃ śarīraṃ ca pṛthivīm āśritā guṇāḥ // HV_App.I,41.123 //
GE07hv_apppu:17005: jihvā rasaś ca snehaś ca saṃśritāḥ salilaṃ guṇāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17006: rūpaṃ cakṣur vipākaś ca jyotir evāśritā guṇāḥ // HV_App.I,41.125 //
GE07hv_apppu:17009: sparśaḥ prāṇaś ca ceṣṭā ca pavanaṃ saṃśritā guṇāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17011: śabdaṃ śrotraṃ ca yoniś ca gaganaṃ saṃśritā guṇāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17013: mano buddhiś ca sarveṣāṃ kṣetrajñaś ceti yaḥ śrutaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17014: parameṣṭhinaṃ vareṇyaṃ ca hṛṣīkeśaṃ samāśritāḥ // HV_App.I,41.127 //
GE07hv_apppu:17018: adahan nikhilāṃl lokān ugraḥ saṃvartako 'nalaḥ // HV_App.I,41.131 //
GE07hv_apppu:17019: sa parvatāṃs tarūn gulmāṃl latāvallīs tṛṇāni ca /
GE07hv_apppu:17020: vimānāni ca divyāni purāṇi vividhāni ca // HV_App.I,41.133 //
GE07hv_apppu:17021: āśramāṃś ca tathā puṇyān divyāny āyatanāni ca /
GE07hv_apppu:17022: yāni cāśrayaṇīyāni tāni sarvāṇi so 'dahat // HV_App.I,41.135 //
GE07hv_apppu:17023: bhasmībhūtāṃs tataḥ sarvāṃl lokāṃl lokagurur hariḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17028: śivena puṇyena mahī nirvāṇam agamat param // HV_App.I,41.141 //
GE07hv_apppu:17029: tena sā jalasaṃchannā payasā sarvato dharā /
GE07hv_apppu:17031: mahābhūtāny api ca taṃ praviṣṭāny amitaujasam /
GE07hv_apppu:17033: saṃśoṣayitvā pītvā ca kalpayitvā ca dehinaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17034: dagdhvā saṃtāpayitvā ca vasaty ekaḥ sanātanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.147 //
GE07hv_apppu:17035: paurāṇaṃ rūpaṃ āsthāya kim apy amitabuddhimān /
GE07hv_apppu:17036: ekārṇavajale hy āsīd yogī yogam upāgataḥ // HV_App.I,41.149 //
GE07hv_apppu:17041: na cainaṃ kaścid avyaktaṃ vyaktaṃ veditum arhati // HV_App.I,41.151 //
GE07hv_apppu:17044: ka eṣa puruṣo nāma kiṃ yogaḥ kaś ca yogavān // HV_App.I,41.153 //
GE07hv_apppu:17047: kariṣyatīmaṃ bhagavān iti kaścin na budhyate // HV_App.I,41.155 //
GE07hv_apppu:17048: na draṣṭā naiva vaditā na jñātā naiva pārśvataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17049: na sma vijñāyate kaścid ṛte taṃ devaṃ uttamam // HV_App.I,41.157 //
GE07hv_apppu:17050: nabhaḥ kṣitiṃ pavanam atha prakāśayan @ HV_App.I,41.158 @
GE07hv_apppu:17061: pracchādya salilaṃ sarvaṃ harir nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,41.163 //
GE07hv_apppu:17062: [k: T1.2 G4.5 M2.4 subst. for line 163 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:17065: virajasko mahābāhur akṣaraṃ brahma yaṃ viduḥ // HV_App.I,41.165 //
GE07hv_apppu:17067: divyam āsthāya kālaṃ tu tataḥ suṣvāpa so 'vyayaḥ // HV_App.I,41.167 //
GE07hv_apppu:17069: manasādhikam āsthāya yatra taṃ satram āsate /
GE07hv_apppu:17070: yathātattvaṃ paraṃ jñānaṃ sūtaṃ yad brahmaṇo matam /
GE07hv_apppu:17072: puruṣo yajña ity evaṃ yat paraṃ parikīrtitam /
