GE07hv_apppu:17073: yac cānyat puruṣākhyaṃ syāt sarvaṃ tat puruṣottamaḥ // HV_App.I,41.169 //
GE07hv_apppu:17074: ye ca yajñaparā viprā ṛtvijā iti saṃjñitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17075: ātmadehāt purā bhūtvā yajñebhyaḥ śrūyatāṃ tadā // HV_App.I,41.171 //
GE07hv_apppu:17076: brahmāṇaṃ paramaṃ vaktrād udgātāraṃ ca sāmagam /
GE07hv_apppu:17077: hotāram atha cādhvaryuṃ bāhubhyām asṛjat prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,41.173 //
GE07hv_apppu:17079: tanmitraṃ varuṇaṃ sṛṣṭvā pratiṣṭhātāram eva ca // HV_App.I,41.175 //
GE07hv_apppu:17081: adhyāpakam athorubhyāṃ neṣṭhāraṃ caiva bhārata // HV_App.I,41.177 //
GE07hv_apppu:17082: pāṇibhyām atha cāgnīdhraṃ brahmaṇyaṃ caiva yajñiyam /
GE07hv_apppu:17083: grāvāṇam atha bāhubhyāṃ sūnetāraṃ ca cakṣuṣaḥ // HV_App.I,41.179 //
GE07hv_apppu:17086: tad eṣa vai vedamayaḥ puruṣo yajñasaṃjñitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17087: vedāś ca tanmayāḥ sarve sāṅgopaniṣad akriyāḥ // HV_App.I,41.183 //
GE07hv_apppu:17088: svapity ekārṇave caiva yadāścaryam abhūt tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:17090: jīrṇo bhagavatas tasya kukṣāv eva mahāmuniḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17093: āśramān api puṇyāṃś ca tīrthāny āyatanāni ca // HV_App.I,41.189 //
GE07hv_apppu:17094: deśān rāṣṭrāṇi citrāṇi purāṇi vividhāni ca /
GE07hv_apppu:17095: japahomarataḥ kṣāntas tapo ghoraṃ samāśritaḥ // HV_App.I,41.191 //
GE07hv_apppu:17098: candrādityau tathā vāyum indraṃ varuṇam eva ca //
GE07hv_apppu:17099: agniṃ yamaṃ bhūtapatiṃ kālamṛtyuṃ tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:17106: mārkaṇḍeyas tatas tasya śanair vaktrād viniḥsṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17107: niṣkrāmantaṃ na cātmānaṃ jānīte devamāyayā // HV_App.I,41.193 //
GE07hv_apppu:17108: niṣkrāntas tasya vadanād ekārṇavam atho gataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17109: sarvatas tapasā channaṃ mārkaṇḍeyo nirīkṣate // HV_App.I,41.195 //
GE07hv_apppu:17115: kiṃ svid bhaved iyaṃ cintā mohaḥ svapno 'nubhūyate // HV_App.I,41.199 //
GE07hv_apppu:17116: vyaktam anyatamo bhāvo hy eteṣāṃ bhavitā mama /
GE07hv_apppu:17117: na hīdṛśam asaṃkliṣṭam ayuktaṃ satyam arhati // HV_App.I,41.201 //
GE07hv_apppu:17119: katamaḥ syād ayaṃ loka iti cintāṃ vyavasthitaḥ // HV_App.I,41.203 //
GE07hv_apppu:17121: toyārdram iva jīmūtaṃ madhye magnaṃ mahārṇave // HV_App.I,41.205 //
GE07hv_apppu:17123: salilārdhād adho magnaṃ jīmūtam iva sāgare /
GE07hv_apppu:17124: tapantam iva tejobhir bhāsvantam iva varcasā /
GE07hv_apppu:17125: jāgrantam iva gāmbhīryāc chvasantam iva pannagam // HV_App.I,41.207 //
GE07hv_apppu:17126: sa devaṃ praṣṭum āyāti ko bhavān iti vismayāt /
GE07hv_apppu:17128: gāmbhīryāj jāgratam iva jvalantam iva tejasā //
GE07hv_apppu:17129: tathaiva ca śanair bhūyo muniḥ kukṣiṃ praveśitaḥ // HV_App.I,41.209 //
GE07hv_apppu:17130: sa praviṣṭaḥ punaḥ kukṣau mārkaṇḍeyaḥ suniścitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17132: sa tathaiva yathāpūrvaṃ pṛthivīm aṭate balāt /
GE07hv_apppu:17133: puṇyatīrthāni pūtāni nirīkṣann iva bhūtale // HV_App.I,41.213 //
GE07hv_apppu:17135: paśyate devakukṣisthān yajñiyāñ śataśo dvijān // HV_App.I,41.215 //
GE07hv_apppu:17139: carataḥ pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ na ca kukṣyantam īkṣate // HV_App.I,41.219 //
GE07hv_apppu:17140: tataḥ kadācid atha vai punar vaktrād viniḥsṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17141: suptaṃ nyagrodhaśākhāyāṃ bālam ekaṃ nirīkṣate // HV_App.I,41.221 //
GE07hv_apppu:17145: bālam ādityasaṃkāśaṃ na śaknoty upasarpitum // HV_App.I,41.225 //
GE07hv_apppu:17147: pūrvadṛṣṭam idaṃ neti śaṅkito devamāyayā // HV_App.I,41.227 //
GE07hv_apppu:17148: agādhe salile stabdhe mārkaṇḍeyaḥ plavan muniḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17150: bāhubhyām asakṛd vipraḥ plavaty eva divāniśam /
GE07hv_apppu:17151: tadā śramas te bahudhā na pāraṃ tasya paśyati /
GE07hv_apppu:17152: tataḥ plavati mūḍhātmā jānāty eva na kiṃcana //
GE07hv_apppu:17153: na śāntiṃ labhate tatra tejasā grastavikramaḥ // HV_App.I,41.229 //
GE07hv_apppu:17156: tathaiva bhagavān haṃso gato yogena bālatām /
GE07hv_apppu:17158: mā bhair vatsa na bhetavyaṃ mamaivāyāhi cāntikam /
GE07hv_apppu:17159: mārkaṇḍeya mune vīra bālas tvaṃ śramapīḍitaḥ // HV_App.I,41.233 //
GE07hv_apppu:17161: ko māṃ nāmnā pīḍayati tapaḥ paribhavan mama /
GE07hv_apppu:17162: bahuvarṣasahasrākhyaṃ dharṣayaṃś caiva me vayaḥ // HV_App.I,41.235 //
GE07hv_apppu:17163: na hy eṣa samudācāro deveṣv api samāhitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17164: māṃ brahmāpi sa viśvaśo dīrghāyur iti bhāṣate // HV_App.I,41.237 //
GE07hv_apppu:17166: ya 'yaṃ jagadguruḥ sākṣād viṣṇuḥ sarveśvaro hariḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17167: sa eṣa vatsa vatseti pitā brūte na saṃśayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17169: mārkaṇḍeyeti māṃ proktvā mṛtyum īkṣitum icchati // HV_App.I,41.239 //
GE07hv_apppu:17171: athainaṃ bhagavān bhūyo babhāṣe tatparāyaṇam // HV_App.I,41.241 //
GE07hv_apppu:17172: ahaṃ te janako vatsa hṛṣīkeśaḥ pitā guruḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17173: āyuḥpradātā paurāṇaḥ kim arthaṃ nopasarpasi // HV_App.I,41.243 //
GE07hv_apppu:17174: māṃ putrakāmaḥ prathamaṃ pitā te hy aṅgirā muniḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17175: pūrvam ārādhayām āsa tapas tīvramupāśritaḥ // HV_App.I,41.245 //
GE07hv_apppu:17177: dattavān aham ātmeṣṭaṃ maharṣim amitāyuṣam // HV_App.I,41.247 //
GE07hv_apppu:17179: madaṃśo hi bhavān vatso na kopaṃ kartum arhasi //
GE07hv_apppu:17180: na mām utsahate cānyo yo na bhūyo mamātmakaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17185: athākaron namaskāraṃ praṇataḥ śirasā prabhum // HV_App.I,41.253 //
GE07hv_apppu:17189: icche 'haṃ tattvato māyām imāṃ jñātuṃ tavānagha /
GE07hv_apppu:17190: yad ekārṇavamadhyasthaṃ śeṣe tvaṃ bālarupavān // HV_App.I,41.255 //
GE07hv_apppu:17191: kiṃsaṃjñaḥ kaś ca bhagavāṃl loke vijñāyase 'nagha /
GE07hv_apppu:17192: tarkaye tvāṃ mahābhūtaṃ na bhūtam iha tiṣṭhati // HV_App.I,41.257 //
GE07hv_apppu:17197: ahaṃ brahmā ca rudraś ca sarvavyāpī bhavāmy aham /
GE07hv_apppu:17198: aham aindre pade śakra ṛtūnām api vatsaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17199: ahaṃ yuge yugākhyaś ca yugasyāvarta eva ca // HV_App.I,41.261 //
GE07hv_apppu:17200: ahaṃ sarvāṇi sattvāni daivatāny akhilāni ca /
GE07hv_apppu:17201: bhūjaṃgānām ahaṃ śeṣas tārkṣyo 'haṃ sarvapakṣiṇām // HV_App.I,41.263 //
GE07hv_apppu:17202: ahaṃ sahasraśīrṣā dyaur yaḥ padair abhisaṃvṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17204: aham agnir havyavāho yādasāṃ patiravyayaḥ // HV_App.I,41.266 //
GE07hv_apppu:17209: ahaṃ karma kriyā jīvaḥ sarveṣāṃ dharmadarśanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17212: ahaṃ dharmas tapaś cāhaṃ sarvāśramanivāsinām // HV_App.I,41.274 //
GE07hv_apppu:17214: ṛtaṃ satyaṃ ca paramam aham ekaḥ prajāpatiḥ // HV_App.I,41.276 //
GE07hv_apppu:17215: ahaṃ sāṃkhyam ahaṃ yogo ahaṃ tatparamaṃ padam /
GE07hv_apppu:17216: aham īḍyo bhavaś cāham ahaṃ vidyādhipaḥ smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,41.278 //
GE07hv_apppu:17217: ahaṃ jyotir ahaṃ vāyur ahaṃ bhūmir ahaṃ nabhaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17218: aham āpaḥ samudrāś ca nakṣatrāṇi diśo daśa /
GE07hv_apppu:17219: ahaṃ varṣam ahaṃ somaḥ parjanyo 'ham ahaṃ raviḥ // HV_App.I,41.281 //
GE07hv_apppu:17221: vahniḥ saṃvartako bhūtvā pibaṃs toyamayaṃ haviḥ // HV_App.I,41.283 //
GE07hv_apppu:17223: ahaṃ bhūtasya bhavyasya vartamānasya saṃbhavaḥ // HV_App.I,41.285 //
GE07hv_apppu:17224: [k: K3.4 Ñ2 B2 Dn Ds D3.5 T1.2 G1.5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:17226: yat kiṃcit paśyase caiva yac chṛṇoṣi ca kiṃcana /
GE07hv_apppu:17227: yac cānubhavase loke tat sarvaṃ māmakaṃ smṛtam // HV_App.I,41.287 //
GE07hv_apppu:17228: viśvaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ mayā pūrvaṃ sṛjeyaṃ cādya paśya mām /
GE07hv_apppu:17229: yuge yuge ca srakṣyāmi mārkaṇḍeyākhilaṃ jagat // HV_App.I,41.289 //
GE07hv_apppu:17231: śuśrūṣur mama dharmepsuḥ kukṣau cara sukhī bhava /
GE07hv_apppu:17232: mama brahmā śarīrastho devāś ca ṛṣibhiḥ saha /
GE07hv_apppu:17234: aham ekākṣaro mantras tryakṣaraś caiva sarvaśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17237: vyaktam āhṛtavān āśu mārkaṇḍeyaṃ mahāmunim // HV_App.I,41.297 //
GE07hv_apppu:17238: [k: Ñ2 V3 B Ds D2.5.6 G3.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:17241: rarāma sukham āsādya śuśrūṣur haṃsam avyayam // HV_App.I,41.299 //
GE07hv_apppu:17242: tad akṣaraṃ vividham apāśrito vapur @ HV_App.I,41.300 @
GE07hv_apppu:17244: śanaiś caran prabhur api haṃsasaṃjñito @ HV_App.I,41.302 @
GE07hv_apppu:17248: āpavaḥ sa vibhur bhūtvā kārayām āsa vai tapaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17253: nirākāśe toyamaye sūkṣme jagati gahvare // HV_App.I,41.309 //
GE07hv_apppu:17254: īṣat saṃkṣobhayām āsa so 'rṇavaṃ salile sthitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17255: so 'nantarormiṇā sūkṣmam atha cchidram abhūt tadā // HV_App.I,41.311 //
GE07hv_apppu:17257: sa labdhvāntaram akṣobhyaṃ vyavardhata samīraṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.313 //
GE07hv_apppu:17262: tataḥ saṃśoṣayām āsa pāvakaḥ salilaṃ bahu /
GE07hv_apppu:17263: kṣayāj jalanidheś chidram abhavad vistṛtaṃ nabhaḥ // HV_App.I,41.319 //
GE07hv_apppu:17273: yat pṛthivyāṃ dvijendrāṇāṃ tapasā bhāvitātmanām // HV_App.I,41.327 //
GE07hv_apppu:17277: devo brahmaṇi viśveśo niyojayati yogavit // HV_App.I,41.331 //
GE07hv_apppu:17278: tatas tasmin mahātoye haviṣo harir acyutaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17279: svapan krīḍaṃś ca vividhaṃ modate caiṣa pāvakiḥ // HV_App.I,41.333 //
GE07hv_apppu:17288: atha yogavidāṃ śreṣṭham asṛjad bhūri tejasam /
GE07hv_apppu:17292: tac ca padmaṃ purāṇajñāḥ pṛthivīruham uttamam /
GE07hv_apppu:17294: yā tu padmāsanā devī pṛthivīṃ tāṃ pracakṣate /
GE07hv_apppu:17296: himavantaṃ ca meruṃ ca nīlaṃ niṣadhameva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:17297: kailāsaṃ muñjavantaṃ ca tathādriṃ gandhamādanam // HV_App.I,41.349 //
GE07hv_apppu:17298: puṇyaṃ triśikharaṃ caiva kāntaṃ mandarameva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:17299: udayaṃ ca giriṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vindhyamastaṃ ca parvatam // HV_App.I,41.351 //
GE07hv_apppu:17300: ete devagaṇānāṃ ca siddhānāṃ ca mahātmanām /
GE07hv_apppu:17302: eteṣām antaro deśo jambūdvīpa iti smṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17303: jambūdvīpasya saṃkhyānaṃ yajñiyā yatra cakrire // HV_App.I,41.355 //
GE07hv_apppu:17305: divyatīrthaśatāpāṅgyas tā divyāḥ saritaḥ smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,41.357 //
GE07hv_apppu:17306: yāny etāni tu padmasya kesarāṇi samantataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17307: asaṃkhyātāḥ pṛthivyāṃ tu viśve te dhātuparvataḥ // HV_App.I,41.359 //
GE07hv_apppu:17308: yāni padmasya patrāṇi bhūrīṇy ūrdhvaṃ narādhipa /
GE07hv_apppu:17309: te durgamāḥ śailacitā mlecchadeśā vikalpitāḥ // HV_App.I,41.361 //
GE07hv_apppu:17310: yāny adhaḥ padmapatrāṇi vāsārthaṃ tān vibhāgaśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17311: daityānām uragāṇāṃ ca pātālaṃ tan mahātmanām // HV_App.I,41.363 //
GE07hv_apppu:17312: teṣāṃ adhogataṃ yat tad udakety abhisaṃjñitam /
GE07hv_apppu:17314: padmasyānte bhṛśaṃ yat tad ekārṇavajalaṃ mahat /
GE07hv_apppu:17315: proktās te dikṣu saṃghātāś catvāro jalasāgarāḥ // HV_App.I,41.367 //
GE07hv_apppu:17319: yajñiyair vedadṛṣṭārthair yajñe padmavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,41.371 //
GE07hv_apppu:17320: evaṃ bhagavataḥ padme viśvasya paramo vidhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17321: parvatānāṃ nadīnāṃ ca deśānāṃ ca vinirmitaḥ // HV_App.I,41.373 //
GE07hv_apppu:17324: utpattiḥ prakṛtā rājann ataḥ pauṣkarikās tu te //
GE07hv_apppu:17332: vighnas tamasi saṃbhūto madhur nāma mahāsuraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17333: tasyaiva ca sahāyo 'nyo bhūto rajasi kaiṭabhaḥ // HV_App.I,41.380 //
GE07hv_apppu:17346: tau tatra viharantau sma puṣkare viśvatomukham // HV_App.I,41.391 //
GE07hv_apppu:17349: yogināṃ śreṣṭham āsādya dīptaṃ dadṛśatus tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:17351: daivatāni ca viśvāni mānasāṃś ca sutān ṛṣīn // HV_App.I,41.394 //
GE07hv_apppu:17352: tatas tāv ūcatus tatra brahmāṇam asurottamau /
GE07hv_apppu:17355: āvām agaṇayan mohād āsse tvaṃ vigatajvaraḥ // HV_App.I,41.398 //
GE07hv_apppu:17357: āvābhyām ativīrābhyāṃ na śakyaṃ sthātum āhave // HV_App.I,41.400 //
GE07hv_apppu:17359: āvābhyāṃ paramābhyāṃ tvam aśaktaḥ sthātum arṇave //
GE07hv_apppu:17360: kas tvaṃ kaś codbhavas tubhyaṃ kena vāsīha coditaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17361: kaḥ sraṣṭā kaś ca te goptā kena nāmnābhidhīyase // HV_App.I,41.402 //
GE07hv_apppu:17363: yaḥ ka ity ucyate loke hy avijñātaḥ sahasraśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17364: tatsaṃbhavena yogena kiṃ māṃ nābhyavagacchathaḥ // HV_App.I,41.404 //
GE07hv_apppu:17366: nāvayoḥ paramaṃ loke kiṃcid asti mahāmune /
GE07hv_apppu:17367: āvābhyāṃ chādyate viśvaṃ tamasā rajasā tathā // HV_App.I,41.406 //
GE07hv_apppu:17370: āvābhyāṃ muhyate loka ucchritābhyāṃ yuge yuge /
GE07hv_apppu:17371: āvām arthaś ca kāmaś ca yajñāḥ sarvaparigrahāḥ // HV_App.I,41.410 //
GE07hv_apppu:17372: sukhaṃ yatra mudo yatra śrīḥ saṃnatir nayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17373: eṣāṃ yat kāṅkṣitaṃ caiva tat tad āvāṃ vicintaya // HV_App.I,41.412 //
GE07hv_apppu:17375: yat tad yogavatāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ yac ca pūrvam ayonijam /
GE07hv_apppu:17376: tat samādhāya guṇavān sattve cāsmi pratiṣṭhitaḥ // HV_App.I,41.414 //
GE07hv_apppu:17377: [k: T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. for lines 413-414:k]
GE07hv_apppu:17378: yasmin sarvam idaṃ viśvam udbhūtaṃ yugaparyaye /
GE07hv_apppu:17379: tam eva devaṃ yogeśaṃ āsthito 'haṃ yuge yuge //
GE07hv_apppu:17381: yūnādyo bhavatī dṛṣṭvā yūyaṃ pūrvaṃ mayā jitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17382: taṃ māṃ pāpau na bādhetāṃ sattve cāsmin pratiṣṭhitam //
GE07hv_apppu:17383: yat paraṃ yogayuktānām akṣaraṃ sattvam eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:17384: rajasas tamasaś caiva yaḥ sraṣṭā jīvasaṃbhavaḥ // HV_App.I,41.416 //
GE07hv_apppu:17386: sa eva yuktaḥ samare vaśī vāṃ śamayiṣyati // HV_App.I,41.418 //
GE07hv_apppu:17391: na śekatus tau calituṃ śakunāv iva pīḍitau // **HV_App.I,41.419**33:3
GE07hv_apppu:17392: tatas tāv āhatur gatvā tadā devaṃ sanātanam /
GE07hv_apppu:17393: padmanābhaṃ hṛṣīkeśaṃ praṇipatyātha tāv ubhau // HV_App.I,41.420 //
GE07hv_apppu:17397: tatas tvām abhito deva kāṅkṣāvaḥ prativīkṣitum // HV_App.I,41.424 //
GE07hv_apppu:17398: tad icchāvo varaṃ dattaṃ tvayā hy āvām ariṃdama /
GE07hv_apppu:17401: kān icchato drutaṃ brūtaṃ varān asurasattamau /
GE07hv_apppu:17402: dattāyuṣau mayā bhūyo aho jīvitum icchatha // HV_App.I,41.428 //
GE07hv_apppu:17403: tasmād yad eṣa vāṃ yatnas tat prāpnutaṃ mahābalau /
GE07hv_apppu:17404: [k: Ñ2 V3 B Ds D6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:17405: vadhyau bhavantau tu syātāṃ tāv ityevābravīd dhariḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:17406: [k: B1 cont., Ñ2 ins. after line 430:k]
GE07hv_apppu:17407: evam astv iti taṃ devaṃ māvayos taṃ hitaṃ varam /
GE07hv_apppu:17408: ubhāv api mahātmānāv ūrjitau kṣatratatparau // HV_App.I,41.430 //
GE07hv_apppu:17410: yasmin na kaścin mṛtavān deśe tasmin vibho vadham /
GE07hv_apppu:17411: icchāvaḥ putratāṃ caiva tava gantuṃ surādhipa // HV_App.I,41.432 //
GE07hv_apppu:17413: bāḍhaṃ sutau me pravarau bhaviṣye kalpasaṃbhave /
GE07hv_apppu:17414: bhaviṣyatho na saṃdehaḥ satyam etad bravīmi vām // HV_App.I,41.434 //
GE07hv_apppu:17421: sthitvā tasmiṃs tu kamale brahmā brahmavidāṃ varaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17422: ūrdhvabāhur mahābāhus tapo ghoram athāśritaḥ // HV_App.I,41.440 //
GE07hv_apppu:17423: jvalann iva ca tejasvī bhābhiḥ svābhis tamonudaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17428: sāṃkhyācāryaś ca matimān kapilo brahmaṇāṃ varaḥ // HV_App.I,41.446 //
GE07hv_apppu:17430: ubhāv api mahātmānāv ūrjitau kṣetratatparau // HV_App.I,41.448 //
GE07hv_apppu:17431: tau prāptāv ūcatus tatra brahmāṇam amitaujasam /
GE07hv_apppu:17434: bṛhatvād brahmaṇatvāc ca brahmāsi satataṃ vibho /
GE07hv_apppu:17435: bahutvād bahupādaś ca viśvātmā jagataḥ sthitiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17436: grāmaṇīḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ brahmā lokagurur varaḥ // HV_App.I,41.452 //
GE07hv_apppu:17437: tayos tad vacanaṃ śrutvā tisro vyāhṛtayo japan /
GE07hv_apppu:17438: trīn imān kṛtavāṃl lokān yathāha brāhmaṇī śrutiḥ // HV_App.I,41.454 //
GE07hv_apppu:17440: tato gatāgatas tatra brahmā mānasam avyayam // HV_App.I,41.456 //
GE07hv_apppu:17441: sotpannas tv agre brahmāṇam uvāca mānasaḥ sutaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17442: karomi kiṃ te sāhāyyaṃ bravītu bhagavān iti // HV_App.I,41.458 //
GE07hv_apppu:17444: ya eṣa kapilo nāma brahmā nārāyaṇas tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:17445: vadate varadas tvāṃ tu tat kuruṣva mahāmate // HV_App.I,41.460 //
GE07hv_apppu:17447: śuśrūṣur asmi yuvayoḥ kiṃ kurveti(!) kṛtāñjaliḥ // HV_App.I,41.462 //
GE07hv_apppu:17449: yat satyam akṣaraṃ brahma hy aṣṭāviṃśavidhaṃ smṛtam /
GE07hv_apppu:17450: yat satyam amṛtaṃ caiva paraṃ tat samanusmara // HV_App.I,41.464 //
GE07hv_apppu:17451: etad vaco niśamyātha sa yayau diśam uttarām /
GE07hv_apppu:17452: gatvā ca tatra brahmatvam agamaj jñānacakṣuṣā // HV_App.I,41.466 //
GE07hv_apppu:17453: tato brahmā bhuvaṃ nāma dvitīyam asṛjat prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17454: taṃ kalpayitvā manasā manasaiva mahāmanāḥ // HV_App.I,41.468 //
GE07hv_apppu:17455: tataḥ so 'py abravīd vākyaṃ kiṃ kurveti pitāmaham /
GE07hv_apppu:17458: brahmabhyāṃ sahitaḥ so 'tha bhūyo bhagavatīṃ gataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17459: prāptaś ca paramaṃ sthānaṃ sa tayoḥ pārśvam āgataḥ // HV_App.I,41.472 //
GE07hv_apppu:17460: tasminn api gate putre tṛtīyam asṛjat prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17461: mokṣopapattikuśalaṃ bhūrbhuvaṃ nāma tad viduḥ // HV_App.I,41.474 //
GE07hv_apppu:17462: āsādya so 'pi taṃ dharmaṃ tayor evāgamad gatim /
GE07hv_apppu:17463: evaṃ putrās trayo 'py ete uktāḥ śaṃbhor mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.476 //
GE07hv_apppu:17464: tān gṛhītvā sutāṃs tasya prayātau svārjitāṃ gatim /
GE07hv_apppu:17465: nārāyaṇaś ca bhagavān kapilaś ca yatīśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,41.478 //
GE07hv_apppu:17466: yaṃ kālaṃ tau gatau muktau brahmā tat kālam eva tu /
GE07hv_apppu:17467: tapo ghorataraṃ bhūyaḥ saṃśritaḥ saṃśitavrataḥ // HV_App.I,41.480 //
GE07hv_apppu:17468: na rarāma tato brahmā prabhur ekas tapaś caran /
GE07hv_apppu:17469: śarīrārdhāt tato bhāryāṃ samutpāditavāñ śubhām // HV_App.I,41.482 //
GE07hv_apppu:17471: tapasā tejasā caiva varcasā niyamena ca /
GE07hv_apppu:17472: sadṛśīm ātmano bhāryāṃ samarthāṃ lokasarjane // HV_App.I,41.484 //
GE07hv_apppu:17473: sa tayā sahitas tatra reme brahmā tapomayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17474: tataḥ prajāpatīn sarvān sāgarān saritas tathā // HV_App.I,41.486 //
GE07hv_apppu:17476: akaroc caiva caturo vedān gāyatrisaṃbhavān // HV_App.I,41.488 //
GE07hv_apppu:17478: viśve prajānāṃ patayo yebhyo lokā viniḥsṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,41.490 //
GE07hv_apppu:17480: sarvāśramapadaṃ puṇyaṃ nāmnā dharmaṃ sa sṛṣṭavān // HV_App.I,41.492 //
GE07hv_apppu:17481: dakṣaṃ marīcim atriṃ ca pulastyam pulahaṃ kratum /
GE07hv_apppu:17482: vasiṣṭhaṃ gautamaṃ caiva bhṛgum aṅgirasaṃ munim // HV_App.I,41.494 //
GE07hv_apppu:17484: trayodaśasutānāṃ tu ye vaṃśās tu maharṣiṇām // HV_App.I,41.496 //
GE07hv_apppu:17485: aditir ditir danuḥ kālā anāyuḥ siṃhikā muniḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17486: prādhā krodhā ca surasā vinatā kadrur eva ca // HV_App.I,41.498 //
GE07hv_apppu:17488: nakṣatrāṇi ca bhadraṃ te saptāviṃśatir ūrjitāḥ // HV_App.I,41.500 //
GE07hv_apppu:17489: marīceḥ kaśyapaḥ putras tapasā nirmitaḥ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17492: tasmai kanyā dvādaśemā dakṣas tā anvamanyata // HV_App.I,41.502 //
GE07hv_apppu:17493: nakṣatrākhyāṃś ca somāya vasave dattavān ṛṣiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17496: lakṣmīḥ kīrtis tathā sādhyā viśvāvasuratā śubhā /
GE07hv_apppu:17497: devī padmodbhavā caiva brahmaṇā nirmitāḥ purā // HV_App.I,41.506 //
GE07hv_apppu:17498: etāḥ pañca variṣṭhā vai suraśreṣṭhāya bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:17499: dattā dharmāya bhadraṃ te brahmaṇā dṛṣṭadharmaṇā // HV_App.I,41.508 //
GE07hv_apppu:17501: surabhiḥ sā tu gaur bhūtvā brahmāṇaṃ samupasthitā // HV_App.I,41.510 //
GE07hv_apppu:17502: tatas tām agamad brahmā maithune lokapūjitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17506: te rudanto dravantaś ca bhagavantaṃ pitāmaham /
GE07hv_apppu:17507: rodanād dravaṇāś caiva tato rudrā iti smṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,41.516 //
GE07hv_apppu:17508: nirṛtiś caiva sarpaś ca tṛtīyo hy aja ekapāt /
GE07hv_apppu:17509: mṛgavyādhaḥ pinākī ca dahano 'theśvaraś ca vai // HV_App.I,41.518 //
GE07hv_apppu:17511: senānīś ca mahātejā rudrā ekādaśa smṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,41.520 //
GE07hv_apppu:17512: tasyām eva surabhyāṃ vai jajñivān govṛṣas tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:17513: akṛṣṭāś ca tathā māṣāḥ sikatāḥ pṛśnayo 'kṣatāḥ // HV_App.I,41.522 //
GE07hv_apppu:17519: oṣadhyaḥ pravarā yāś ca surabhyāṃ tāḥ samutthitāḥ // HV_App.I,41.524 //
GE07hv_apppu:17520: dharmāl lakṣmyudbhavaḥ kāmaḥ sādhyān sādhyā vyajāyata /
GE07hv_apppu:17521: bhavaṃ ca prabhavaṃ caiva īśānam aratiṃ tathā // HV_App.I,41.526 //
GE07hv_apppu:17523: mahiṣaṃ ca tanūjaṃ ca vijñānam anaghaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,41.528 //
GE07hv_apppu:17524: matsaraṃ ca vibhūtiṃ ca sarve surabhisūnavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17525: suvarcasaṃ vṛṣaṃ nāgaṃ sādhyā lokanamaskṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,41.530 //
GE07hv_apppu:17526: vāsavānugatā devī janayām āsa vai sutam /
GE07hv_apppu:17527: dharaṃ ca prathamaṃ devaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhruvam avyayam // HV_App.I,41.532 //
GE07hv_apppu:17528: viśvāvasuṃ tṛtīyaṃ ca caturthaṃ somam īśvaram /
GE07hv_apppu:17530: tato yogāyamānaṃ ca śamas tasmād anantaram /
GE07hv_apppu:17531: pañcamaṃ parvataṃ caiva yogendraṃ tadanantaram // HV_App.I,41.534 //
GE07hv_apppu:17532: saptamaṃ ca tato vāyum aṣṭamaṃ nirṛtiṃ vasum /
GE07hv_apppu:17533: dharmasyāpatyam etad vai surabhyāṃ samajāyata // HV_App.I,41.536 //
GE07hv_apppu:17534: viśve devāś ca viśvāyāṃ dharmodbhūtā iti śrutiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17536: dhanyaś caiva mahābāhur vivasvāṃś ca tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:17537: dakṣaś caiva mahābāhur vasuś ca suta eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:17538: [k: Ñ2 V1.3 B Ds D3.6 G3.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:17539: sudharmā ca mahābāhuḥ śaṅkhapāc ca mahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17542: ruruś ca ṛṣiputro vai bhāskarapratimadyutiḥ // HV_App.I,41.541 //
GE07hv_apppu:17543: viśve devān devamātā viśveśāñ janayat sutān /
GE07hv_apppu:17544: marutvatī marutvanto devān ajanayac chubhān // HV_App.I,41.543 //
GE07hv_apppu:17545: agniś cakṣur havir jyotiḥ sāvitraṃ mitram eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:17546: amaraṃ śaravṛṣṭiṃ ca saṃkṣayaṃ ca mahābhujam // HV_App.I,41.545 //
GE07hv_apppu:17548: aśmantaṃ citraraśmiṃ ca tathā niṣṭavinaṃ nṛpam /
GE07hv_apppu:17549: kuyoniṃ ca kṛtiṃ caiva cāritraṃ bahupannagam // HV_App.I,41.548 //
GE07hv_apppu:17550: bṛhantaṃ ca bṛhad rūpaṃ tathaiva tapanānanam /
GE07hv_apppu:17551: marutvatī purā jajñe dharmād vai marutāṃ gaṇam // HV_App.I,41.550 //
GE07hv_apppu:17552: adityāṃ jajñire rājann ādityāḥ kaśyapād atha /
GE07hv_apppu:17553: indro viṣṇur bhagas tvaṣṭā varuṇo 'ṃśo 'ryamā raviḥ // HV_App.I,41.552 //
GE07hv_apppu:17554: pūṣā mitraś ca varado manuḥ parjanya eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:17555: ity ete dvādaśādityā variṣṭhās tridivaukasaḥ // HV_App.I,41.554 //
GE07hv_apppu:17557: rūpaśreṣṭhaṃ vapuḥśreṣṭhaṃ tridive rūpiṇāṃ varam // HV_App.I,41.556 //
GE07hv_apppu:17559: vairajaṃ caiva babhraṃ ca viśvāvasum adas tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:17560: danus tu dānavāñ jajñe ditir daityān vyajāyata /
GE07hv_apppu:17561: kālā tu kālakeyān vai asurān rākṣasāṃs tathā // HV_App.I,41.558 //
GE07hv_apppu:17563: siṃhikā grahamātā ca gandharvajananī muniḥ // HV_App.I,41.560 //
GE07hv_apppu:17564: prādhā cāpsarasāṃ śreṣṭhā apsarāś cāpy ajījanat /
GE07hv_apppu:17565: krodhāyāḥ sarvabhūtāni piśācāś caiva bhārata // HV_App.I,41.562 //
GE07hv_apppu:17566: tathā pakṣigaṇāś caiva guhyakāś ca viśāṃ pate /
GE07hv_apppu:17567: catuṣpadāni sarvāṇi ṛte gāvaś ca saurabhāḥ // HV_App.I,41.564 //
GE07hv_apppu:17569: mahīdharān sarvanāgān devī kadrūr vyajāyata // HV_App.I,41.566 //
GE07hv_apppu:17570: evaṃ vivṛddhim agaman viśve devāḥ parasparam /
GE07hv_apppu:17571: tadā pauṣkarake rājan prādurbhāve mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.568 //
GE07hv_apppu:17572: purāṇaṃ puṣkaraṃ caiva mayā dvaipāyanāc chrutaṃ /
GE07hv_apppu:17574: yaś cedam agryaṃ paramaṃ purāṇaṃ @ HV_App.I,41.571 @
GE07hv_apppu:17580: kṛtaṃ naḥ paramaṃ brahman viṣṇoś caritam adbhutaṃ /
GE07hv_apppu:17581: vārāhaṃ caritaṃ cāpi nārasiṃham ataḥ param // **HV_App.I,41.574**44:2
GE07hv_apppu:17583: dakṣasya cādhvaraṃ brahmañ chrotum icchāmi tatvataḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:17586: suraiś ca munibhiḥ sārdhaṃ hariṇā śaṃkareṇa ca //
GE07hv_apppu:17588: tasmin pravṛtte yajñe tu munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17591: śrutaṃ naḥ paramaṃ brahman svavaṃśacaritaṃ mahat /
GE07hv_apppu:17592: divyam anyonyasaṃbhūtam arcitaṃ bahubhir guṇaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.576 //
GE07hv_apppu:17597: brāhmaṇānāṃ prabhāvaiś ca yodhānāṃ ca parākramaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17598: vairaniryātanaiś caiva pratijñānāṃ ca pāragaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.582 //
GE07hv_apppu:17601: ye ca tasmin mahāraudre saṃgrāme nihatā nṛpāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17602: teṣāṃ sarvāṇi rāṣṭrāṇi putrāḥ sarve prapedire // HV_App.I,41.586 //
GE07hv_apppu:17604: dharmaś ca bahudhā proktas trayāṇāṃ varṇasaṃpadām /
GE07hv_apppu:17605: śūrāṇām api vikhyātaḥ svargahetur dvijarṣabha // HV_App.I,41.589 //
GE07hv_apppu:17607: caturṇāṃ varṇasaṃjñānāṃ pṛthak pṛthag anekadhā // HV_App.I,41.591 //
GE07hv_apppu:17609: pṛcchatāṃ devasaṃcāre kṣīṇe puṇye ca karmaṇi // HV_App.I,41.593 //
GE07hv_apppu:17610: dāne yaś cāpi saṃyogaḥ sa cāpi bahudhā kṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17611: dvābhyāṃ saṃyogavihitaṃ madhuvāg vacanaṃ tayoḥ // HV_App.I,41.595 //
GE07hv_apppu:17612: naitac chakyaṃ mayā khyātuṃ bhāratādhyayanaṃ mahat /
GE07hv_apppu:17613: ekāhena mahad brahmann api divyena cakṣuṣā // HV_App.I,41.597 //
GE07hv_apppu:17614: brahmaṇo 'hnas tu vistāraṃ saṃkṣepaṃ ca susaṃgraham /
GE07hv_apppu:17615: śrotum icchāmi bhagavan mahat kautūhalaṃ hi me // HV_App.I,41.599 //
GE07hv_apppu:17619: kathāṃ kathayato rājan nirvikāreṇa cetasā // HV_App.I,41.601 //
GE07hv_apppu:17621: purastād brahmasaṃpannaṃ brahmaṇo yad adakṣiṇam // HV_App.I,41.603 //
GE07hv_apppu:17622: avyaktaṃ kāraṇaṃ yat tan nityaṃ sadasadātmakam /
GE07hv_apppu:17625: acintyaś cāvyayaś caiva yugānāṃ prabhavo 'vyayaḥ // HV_App.I,41.607 //
GE07hv_apppu:17626: abhūtaś cāpy ajātaś ca sarvatra samatāṃ gataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17627: avyaktāt paramaṃ yat tat tat purāṇavido viduḥ // HV_App.I,41.609 //
GE07hv_apppu:17629: sarvataḥ śrutimal loke sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭati // HV_App.I,41.611 //
GE07hv_apppu:17630: asataś ca sataś caiva vijñeyaṃ tatra kāraṇam /
GE07hv_apppu:17631: avyakto vyaktarūpaś ca carann api na dṛśyate // HV_App.I,41.613 //
GE07hv_apppu:17633: caraty acintyaḥ sarveṣu gūḍho 'gnir iva dāruṣu // HV_App.I,41.615 //
GE07hv_apppu:17635: prabhuḥ sarvasya lokasya nāma cāsyeti tattvataḥ // HV_App.I,41.617 //
GE07hv_apppu:17636: apadāt tu pado jātas tasmān nārāyaṇo 'bhavat /
GE07hv_apppu:17637: avyakto vyaktim āpanno brahmayogena kāmataḥ // HV_App.I,41.619 //
GE07hv_apppu:17638: brahmabhāvena taṃ viddhi sa śabdaṃ labdhavān prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17639: prabhavaḥ sarvasya lokasya sthāvarasya carasya ca // HV_App.I,41.621 //
GE07hv_apppu:17640: ahaṃ tv iti sa hovāca prajāḥ srakṣyāmi bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:17641: prabhavaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yasya tantur imāḥ prajāḥ // HV_App.I,41.623 //
GE07hv_apppu:17642: svabhāvāj jāyate sarvaṃ svabhāvāc ca tathābhavat /
GE07hv_apppu:17643: ahaṃkārasvabhāvāc ca sa ca sarvam idaṃ jagat // HV_App.I,41.625 //
GE07hv_apppu:17645: eṣa brahmamayo jyotir brahmaśabdena śabditaḥ // HV_App.I,41.627 //
GE07hv_apppu:17647: dhārayan brahmaṇo vyaktiṃ vividhaṃ vitataś caran // HV_App.I,41.629 //
GE07hv_apppu:17649: sasarja salilaṃ brahmā yena sarvam idaṃ tatam // HV_App.I,41.631 //
GE07hv_apppu:17650: vāyuṃ pūrvam atho dṛṣṭvā yo dhātur dhātṛsattamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17651: dhāraṇād dhātṛśabdaṃ ca labhate lokasamjñitam // HV_App.I,41.633 //
GE07hv_apppu:17652: tad etadvāyusaṃbhūtaṃ kṛtsnaṃ jagad abhūt purā /
GE07hv_apppu:17653: etad devair atikrāntaṃ pūrvam eva sarasvati // HV_App.I,41.635 //
GE07hv_apppu:17655: ghanatvāc ca dravatvāc ca nikhilenopalabhyate // HV_App.I,41.637 //
GE07hv_apppu:17657: vyājahāra śubhāṃ vāṇīṃ samantāt pūrayann iva // HV_App.I,41.639 //
GE07hv_apppu:17658: ūrdhvaṃ vai sthātum icchāmi saṃsīdāmy uddharasva mām /
GE07hv_apppu:17662: śrutvā ca gaditaṃ tasyā giraṃ tāṃ ca subhāṣitām /
GE07hv_apppu:17664: uddhṛtya so 'vaniṃ toyāt kṛtvā karma suduṣkaram /
GE07hv_apppu:17665: samādhau pralayaṃ gatvā pralīno na ca dṛśyate // HV_App.I,41.647 //
GE07hv_apppu:17666: yat tad brahmamayaṃ jyotir ākāśam iti śabditam /
GE07hv_apppu:17671: tapanas tūrdhvam ātiṣṭhan raśmibhiḥ pradahann iva // HV_App.I,41.653 //
GE07hv_apppu:17673: sa sanātanajo brahmā saumyaṃ somatvam anvagāt // HV_App.I,41.655 //
GE07hv_apppu:17676: sa tu yogamayāj jñānāt svabhāvād brahmasaṃbhavāt /
GE07hv_apppu:17677: sṛjate puruṣaṃ divyaṃ brahmayoniṃ sanātanam // HV_App.I,41.659 //
GE07hv_apppu:17678: dravaṃ yat salilaṃ tasya ghanaṃ yat pṛthivī bhavat /
GE07hv_apppu:17679: chidraṃ tatra tad ākāśaṃ jyotir yac cakṣur eva tat // HV_App.I,41.661 //
GE07hv_apppu:17681: puruṣāt puruśo bhāvaḥ pañcabhūtamayo mahān // HV_App.I,41.663 //
GE07hv_apppu:17682: bhūtātmā vai sa me tasmiṃs tasmin dehaḥ sanātanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17683: guhāyāṃ nihitaṃ jñānaṃ yogād yajñaḥ sanātanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.665 //
GE07hv_apppu:17684: tapanasyaiva tad rūpaṃ yo 'gnir vasati dehinām /
GE07hv_apppu:17685: śarīre nityaśo yukte dhātubhiḥ saha saṃgataḥ // HV_App.I,41.667 //
GE07hv_apppu:17686: svabhāvāt kṣayam āyāti svabhāvād bhavam eti ca /
GE07hv_apppu:17687: svabhāvād vindate śāntiṃ svabhāvāc ca na vindati // HV_App.I,41.669 //
GE07hv_apppu:17689: saṃbhavaṃ nidhanaṃ caiva karmabhiḥ pratipadyate // HV_App.I,41.671 //
GE07hv_apppu:17691: tāvat saṃsāram āpnoti saṃbhavāṃś ca punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,41.673 //
GE07hv_apppu:17692: indriyair vyatirikto vai yadā bhavati yogataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17693: tadā brahmatvam āpannaḥ pralayāgre pratiṣṭhati // HV_App.I,41.675 //
GE07hv_apppu:17694: pratiṣiddham amuṃ lokaṃ brahmavāṃś ca bhavaty uta /
GE07hv_apppu:17695: na ca rāgavyayair yāti na ca sajjati karhicit // HV_App.I,41.677 //
GE07hv_apppu:17696: āgatiṃ ca gatiṃ caiva nidhanaṃ saṃbhavaṃ tatha /
GE07hv_apppu:17697: bhūtebhyo vetti sarvajñaḥ parāṃ siddhim upāgataḥ // HV_App.I,41.679 //
GE07hv_apppu:17699: purastāt karmanirvṛttaḥ pade brāhme pratiṣṭhataḥ // HV_App.I,41.681 //
GE07hv_apppu:17700: cittagranthīś ca manasā rundhyāt pūrvāś ca yātanāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17703: brahmaproktam ihātmā vai vimukto dehabandhanāt // HV_App.I,41.685 //
GE07hv_apppu:17704: sṛjed api paraṃ lokaṃ saṃhared api vidyayā /
GE07hv_apppu:17705: tejomūrtir ivāviddham iha lokaṃ ca saṃsṛjet // HV_App.I,41.687 //
GE07hv_apppu:17707: tāny api pratimucyeta brahmayuktena cetasā // HV_App.I,41.689 //
GE07hv_apppu:17708: akṣaraṃ ca kṣaraṃ caiva yogakarmāti vidyate /
GE07hv_apppu:17709: na kṣaraṃ vidyate tatra yad brahma karmabhir dhruvam // HV_App.I,41.691 //
GE07hv_apppu:17712: pṛthivyāṃ yat kṛtaṃ chidraṃ tapanena vivardhatā /
GE07hv_apppu:17715: acalād acalatvaṃ ca svabhāvān merur eva saḥ // HV_App.I,41.695 //
GE07hv_apppu:17717: tasmin sa puruṣo vyakto vasati jyotisaṃbhavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17718: vihitaś ca svabhāvena tenaiva paramātmanā // HV_App.I,41.698 //
GE07hv_apppu:17719: yat tad brahmamayaṃ tejo nihitaṃ śiraso 'ntare /
GE07hv_apppu:17720: tasya jyotirmayaṃ rūpaṃ dīptaṃ puruṣavigraham // HV_App.I,41.700 //
GE07hv_apppu:17722: caturbhir vadanair yuktaṃ caturbhiś ca bhujottamaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.702 //
GE07hv_apppu:17724: tad evaitan mahābhūtaṃ punarbhāvatvam āgatam // HV_App.I,41.704 //
GE07hv_apppu:17729: brahmatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sthānād aloko lokatāṃ gataḥ // HV_App.I,41.706 //
GE07hv_apppu:17731: ucchritaṃ yojanaśataṃ sahasraśatam eva ca // HV_App.I,41.708 //
GE07hv_apppu:17732: evam eva ca vistāraṃ caturbhir guṇitaṃ guṇaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17733: atha vā naiva saṃkhyātuṃ śakyaṃ bhūtena kenacit /
GE07hv_apppu:17734: samāsahasrair bahubhir api divyena cetasā // HV_App.I,41.711 //
GE07hv_apppu:17736: nagasya yasya rājendra vistāraiḥ śatayojanaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.713 //
GE07hv_apppu:17738: yogayuktaiḥ sadā siddhair nityaṃ brahmaparāyaṇaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.715 //
GE07hv_apppu:17739: marudbhiḥ saha devendrai rudraiḥ vasubhir eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:17741: rarakṣa pṛthivīṃ caiva bhagavān viṣṇunā saha /
GE07hv_apppu:17742: vivisvadvaruṇābhyāṃ ca saṃghātaṃ gamitāṃ nṛpa // HV_App.I,41.719 //
GE07hv_apppu:17744: yat tad viṣṇumayaṃ tejaḥ sarvatra samatāṃ gatam // HV_App.I,41.721 //
GE07hv_apppu:17745: yat tad brahmeti vai proktaṃ brāhmaṇair vedapāragaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17747: evam ete trayo lokā brāhme 'hani samāhitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17748: ahani brahma cāvyaktaṃ vyaktaṃ prāṇe pratiṣṭhitam // HV_App.I,41.725 //
GE07hv_apppu:17751: etad dhitam iti proktaṃ brāhmaṇair vedapāragaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17752: yad ekaṃ brahma nirdiṣṭaṃ viśvatāṃ gamitaṃ padam // HV_App.I,41.729 //
GE07hv_apppu:17754: yat tad viṣṇumayaṃ tejo viśvatvaṃ gamitaṃ param /
GE07hv_apppu:17758: evaṃ dvaṃdvaṃ sa bhagavān prathamaṃ mithunaṃ sṛjat // HV_App.I,41.733 //
GE07hv_apppu:17759: sa eva bhagavān viśvo devyā saha sanātanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17760: vidhāya vipulān bhogān brahmā carati sānugaḥ // HV_App.I,41.735 //
GE07hv_apppu:17761: sa eṣa bhagavān brahmā nityaṃ brahmavidāṃ varaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17765: abhiṣicya ca bhūteśaṃ kṛtvā karma svabhāvataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17766: nadati sma tadā nādaṃ tena sā hy ucyate nadī // HV_App.I,41.741 //
GE07hv_apppu:17768: gāṃ gatā gaganād devī saptadhā prasasāra ha // HV_App.I,41.743 //
GE07hv_apppu:17769: sahasradhā ca rājendra bahudhā ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17770: imaṃ lokam amuṃ caiva bhāvayan kṣarasaṃbhavam // HV_App.I,41.745 //
GE07hv_apppu:17772: tataḥ sarve kriyārambhāḥ prāvartanta manīṣiṇām // HV_App.I,41.747 //
GE07hv_apppu:17776: patitvenābhavad devo brahmā cātra pitāmahaḥ // HV_App.I,41.751 //
GE07hv_apppu:17777: pādā dharmasya catvāro yair idaṃ dhāryate jagat /
GE07hv_apppu:17778: brahmacaryeṇa vyaktena gṛhasthena ca pāvane // HV_App.I,41.753 //
GE07hv_apppu:17780: ity ete dharmapādāḥ syuḥ svargahetoḥ pracoditāḥ // HV_App.I,41.755 //
GE07hv_apppu:17781: nyāyād dharmeṇa guhyena somo vardhati maṇḍale /
GE07hv_apppu:17782: brahmā sabrahmacaraṇā vedā vartanti śāśvatāḥ // HV_App.I,41.757 //
GE07hv_apppu:17784: ṛṣayo 'pi ca dharmeṇa nagasya śirasi sthitāḥ // HV_App.I,41.759 //
GE07hv_apppu:17785: nagasya tasya saṃpaśya meroḥ śikharam uttamam /
GE07hv_apppu:17786: padbhyāṃ saṃpīḍya vṛṣaṇāv ṛṣibhis tair vicāryate // HV_App.I,41.761 //
GE07hv_apppu:17787: grīvāṃ nigṛhya pṛṣṭhaṃ ca vināmya prahasann iva /
GE07hv_apppu:17788: nābhideśe karau nyasya sarvaśo 'ṅgāni saṃkṣipan // HV_App.I,41.763 //
GE07hv_apppu:17789: mūrdhni brahma samutkṣipya manasā sa pitāmahaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17790: asṛjan manasā viṣṇuṃ yogād yogeśvarasya ca // HV_App.I,41.765 //
GE07hv_apppu:17794: virājan nabhaso madhye prabhābhir atulaṃ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,41.769 //
GE07hv_apppu:17796: lalāṭamadhye tiṣṭhantaṃ dvidhābhūtaṃ kriyāṃ prati // HV_App.I,41.771 //
GE07hv_apppu:17798: buddhyā pūrvaṃ tu paśyanti adhyātmaviṣaye ratāḥ // HV_App.I,41.773 //
GE07hv_apppu:17800: netare jātu paśyanti adhyātmaṃ nāvabudhyate // HV_App.I,41.775 //
GE07hv_apppu:17802: bhūtayo bhuvi bhūteśo mohaprāptena cetasā // HV_App.I,41.777 //
GE07hv_apppu:17804: narāṇāṃ yogam ādhāya sveṣu gātreṣu bhārata // HV_App.I,41.779 //
GE07hv_apppu:17806: candramaṇḍalasaṃsthānaṃ jyotis tejo mahat tadā // HV_App.I,41.781 //
GE07hv_apppu:17808: garbhasya saṃbhavo yaś ca caturdhā puruṣātmakaḥ // HV_App.I,41.783 //
GE07hv_apppu:17810: na cendriyaguṇair yukto yuktas tejoguṇena ca // HV_App.I,41.785 //
GE07hv_apppu:17812: netrābhyāṃ janayad devo ṛgvedaṃ yajuṣā saha // HV_App.I,41.787 //
GE07hv_apppu:17813: sāmavedaṃ ca jihvāgrād atharvāṇaṃ ca mūrdhataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17814: jātamātrās tu te vedāḥ kṣetraṃ vindanti tattvataḥ // HV_App.I,41.789 //
GE07hv_apppu:17815: tena vedatvam āpannā yasmād vindanti tatpadam /
GE07hv_apppu:17816: te sṛjanti tadā vedā brahma pūrvaṃ sanātanam // HV_App.I,41.791 //
GE07hv_apppu:17817: puruṣaṃ divyarūpābhaṃ svaiḥ svair bhāvair manobhavaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17818: atharvaṇas tu yo bhāgaḥ śīrṣaṃ yajñasya tat smṛtam // HV_App.I,41.793 //
GE07hv_apppu:17819: grīvābāhvantaraṃ caiva ṛgbhāgaḥ sa bhavet tataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17820: hṛdayaṃ caiva pārśvaṃ ca sāmabhāgas tu nirmitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17823: puruṣo divyarūpābhaḥ saṃbhūto hy amarāt padāt // HV_App.I,41.798 //
GE07hv_apppu:17825: ubhayor lokayos tāta hiṃsāvarjyaḥ sanātanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.800 //
GE07hv_apppu:17827: prabhavaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ yo vindati sa vedavit // HV_App.I,41.802 //
GE07hv_apppu:17828: sa siddhaḥ procyate loke siddhir eva na saṃśayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17830: vaiṣṇavaṃ yajñam ity evaṃ bruvate vedapāragāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17834: kāraṇaṃ śrotum icchāmi yathātattvaṃ mahāmune // HV_App.I,41.808 //
GE07hv_apppu:17836: na hy asya kāraṇaṃ kiṃcid bāhyaṃ bhavati bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:17837: antargataṃ kāraṇaṃ tu śārīraṃ mānasaṃ nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:17838: yena vedyaṃ vidur martyā brāhmaṇāḥ saṃśitavratāḥ // HV_App.I,41.811 //
GE07hv_apppu:17839: avedyam api vedyaṃ ca śakyaṃ vettuṃ na karmaṇā /
GE07hv_apppu:17842: sadā caiva śucir bhūtvā niyato brahmakarmaṇā /
GE07hv_apppu:17843: upatiṣṭheta sa guruṃ baddhāñjalipuṭo dvijaḥ // HV_App.I,41.816 //
GE07hv_apppu:17844: sāyaṃ prātaś ca tattvajño mokṣakarmāṇi kārayet /
GE07hv_apppu:17847: dhyāyann eva prasīdeta samāhitamatir dvijaḥ // HV_App.I,41.820 //
GE07hv_apppu:17848: sa gacchet paramaṃ brahma nirvikāreṇa cetasā /
GE07hv_apppu:17850: tad evākṣaram ity āhur yat tad brahma sanātanam /
GE07hv_apppu:17851: na hi tat karmayogena vidyāyogena darśitam // HV_App.I,41.824 //
GE07hv_apppu:17855: anādānena manasā rājan karmaṇi karmaṇi // HV_App.I,41.828 //
GE07hv_apppu:17857: brahmaṇebhyaḥ kriyāprāptir jantoḥ pūrvāj janādhipa // HV_App.I,41.830 //
GE07hv_apppu:17858: muktaś cendriyabandhena prātaś ca paramaṃ padam /
GE07hv_apppu:17859: na bhūyaḥ punar āyāti mānuṣaṃ dehavigraham // HV_App.I,41.832 //
GE07hv_apppu:17862: upasargaṃ ca yogaṃ ca dhyātavyaṃ caiva yat padam /
GE07hv_apppu:17863: siddhiṃ siddhiguṇāṃś caiva śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ // HV_App.I,41.834 //
GE07hv_apppu:17865: śṛṇu vistarataḥ sarvaṃ yathā pṛcchasi medhayā /
GE07hv_apppu:17870: bahurūpam anaiśvaryāt pravakṣyāmi nibodha tat // HV_App.I,41.840 //
GE07hv_apppu:17873: tejasā mūrdhni cādhāya dhūmo dodhūyate mahān /
GE07hv_apppu:17874: nīlalohitavarṇābhaḥ pītaiḥ śvetaiś ca dhātubhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.844 //
GE07hv_apppu:17880: saṃpatadbhiś ca yugapan meghair iva samāgame // HV_App.I,41.850 //
GE07hv_apppu:17883: nirvemuś caiva toyaughān viviśur vasudhātalam // HV_App.I,41.853 //
GE07hv_apppu:17884: mūrdhni caiva mahān agnir mānaso dhūyate prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17890: varṇābhyāṃ yujyamānaś ca vāyur dodhūyate mahān /
GE07hv_apppu:17893: tair eva cāgnisaṃghātair dhātubhiḥ saha saṃgataḥ // HV_App.I,41.863 //
GE07hv_apppu:17895: agnir vāyujalaṃ bhūmir dhātavo brahmacoditāḥ // HV_App.I,41.865 //
GE07hv_apppu:17897: saṃghātaṃ brahmavegena dhātavo gamitā nṛpa // HV_App.I,41.867 //
GE07hv_apppu:17898: yadbrahma cakṣuṣor madhye sa sūkṣmaḥ puruṣo virāṭ /
GE07hv_apppu:17899: tayor anyān bahūn sukṣmān sasṛje puruṣottamaḥ // HV_App.I,41.869 //
GE07hv_apppu:17900: sa eṣa bhagavān viṣṇur vyaktāvyaktaḥ sanātanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17902: taṃ mūrdhni dhātubhir baddhaṃ viśanti brahmacoditāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17903: te 'ntarā puruṣāḥ sarve jñātāraḥ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ // HV_App.I,41.873 //
GE07hv_apppu:17905: bhittvā ca dharaṇīṃ devīṃ prapadyante diśo daśa // HV_App.I,41.875 //
GE07hv_apppu:17906: ity ete pārthivāḥ sarve ṛṣayo brahmanirmitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17907: tatraiva pralayaṃ yātā bhūmitvam upayānti ca // HV_App.I,41.877 //
GE07hv_apppu:17910: tām eva prakṛtiṃ yānti ajñātāṃ karmagocaraiḥ // HV_App.I,41.880 //
GE07hv_apppu:17912: yena tantur iva cchanno bhāvābhāvaḥ pravartate // HV_App.I,41.882 //
GE07hv_apppu:17913: dhūmād abhrās tu saṃbhūtā abhrāt toyaṃ sunirmalam /
GE07hv_apppu:17914: jagatī jalāt tu saṃbhūtā jagaty eva ca yat phalam // HV_App.I,41.884 //
GE07hv_apppu:17915: phalād rasaś ca saṃjajñe rasāt prāṇaś ca dehinām /
GE07hv_apppu:17916: rasas tu tanmayo jajñe yat tad brahma sanātanam // HV_App.I,41.886 //
GE07hv_apppu:17919: avyaktād vyaktim āpannaṃ svena bhāvena bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:17920: antaḥsthaṃ sarvabhūteṣu carantaṃ vidyayā saha // HV_App.I,41.890 //
GE07hv_apppu:17924: niḥsṛtas tu bhruvor madhyān meghamukta ivāṃśumān // HV_App.I,41.894 //
GE07hv_apppu:17926: yogadharmeṇa kauravya dhruvam āsādyate phalam // HV_App.I,41.896 //
GE07hv_apppu:17927: prādurbhāvaṃ kṣayaṃ caiva bhūtasya nidhanaṃ tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:17928: vidhatte śataśo brahmā saṃkṣaye ca bhavet tathā // HV_App.I,41.898 //
GE07hv_apppu:17930: avināśāya lokasya dharmasyāpy āyanena ca // HV_App.I,41.900 //
GE07hv_apppu:17932: etad brahmayugaṃ nāma yugānāṃ prathamaṃ yugam // HV_App.I,41.902 //
GE07hv_apppu:17934: sūkṣmaṃ bhavati lokānāṃ nirvikāram acetanam // HV_App.I,41.904 //
GE07hv_apppu:17935: tathā pralayam āpannaṃ jagat sarvaṃ sanātanam /
GE07hv_apppu:17936: brahma sampadyate sūkṣmaṃ nirmitaṃ kāraṇair guṇaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.906 //
GE07hv_apppu:17940: ādyayor yugayor brahman brahmaprāptasya sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,41.908 //
GE07hv_apppu:17942: śṛṇu vistaraśaḥ sarvaṃ yan māṃ pṛcchasi medhayā /
GE07hv_apppu:17944: ṛddhiṃ prāptas tu bhagavān yogātmā brahmasaṃbhavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17945: bhūtānāṃ bahulatvaṃ ca cakāreheśvaraḥ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,41.912 //
GE07hv_apppu:17946: sthito brahmāsane brahmā vikṣiptaḥ sahasā prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17949: yasmāt padasahasrāṇi bhavanti na bhavanti ca // HV_App.I,41.916 //
GE07hv_apppu:17950: brahmayajñaṃ tu yajate yogād vedātmakaṃ sadā /
GE07hv_apppu:17951: brahmaṇo vipulaṃ jñānam aiśvaryaṃ ca prajāyate // HV_App.I,41.918 //
GE07hv_apppu:17953: brahmaṇā brahmabhūtena bhūtānāṃ hitam icchatā // HV_App.I,41.920 //
GE07hv_apppu:17954: yadā tv ākāśam aiśvaryaṃ yuñjānasya pravartate /
GE07hv_apppu:17961: vikārair bahubhiḥ prāptaiḥ saṃpatadbhir mahābalaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.928 //
GE07hv_apppu:17962: etair vikāraiḥ saṃvṛttair niruddhaiś ca samantataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17963: dhruvam aiśvaryam āpannaḥ siddho bhavati brāhmaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.930 //
GE07hv_apppu:17965: nirālambo nirālambān ālambya manasā tataḥ // HV_App.I,41.932 //
GE07hv_apppu:17966: aiśvaryabhūto bhūtātmā caran divi na dṛśyate /
GE07hv_apppu:17967: cakṣurbhir bahubhir loke puraṃdarasamair api // HV_App.I,41.934 //
GE07hv_apppu:17968: oṃkāraṃ ye tv adhīyante manasā brahmasattamāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17969: vibhaktāḥ sarvakāmebhyas te taṃ paśyanti sādhavaḥ // HV_App.I,41.936 //
GE07hv_apppu:17970: etad dhi paramaṃ brahma brāhmaṇānāṃ manīṣiṇām /
GE07hv_apppu:17971: antaścarati bhūtānāṃ viddhi cetanayā saha // HV_App.I,41.938 //
GE07hv_apppu:17973: vāyūbhūto 'kṣaraṃ prāpto vadanty evaṃ dvijātayaḥ // HV_App.I,41.940 //
GE07hv_apppu:17976: tataḥ pūrvam anudhyāya manasā pūrayann iva /
GE07hv_apppu:17977: vedātmakaṃ tadā yajñaṃ cintayanto manīṣiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.944 //
GE07hv_apppu:17979: brahmalokaṃ kāṅkṣamāṇā vaiṣṇavaṃ padam uttamam // HV_App.I,41.946 //
GE07hv_apppu:17980: yasya hetoḥ kriyāḥ sarvāḥ kurvanti vigatajvarāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17981: na hy ete prasavādāne bhavam icchanti bhārata // HV_App.I,41.948 //
GE07hv_apppu:17982: mālyopahāraiś ca tribhiḥ pratibhānaiś ca vai dvijāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:17985: brahmā ca vaiṣṇavaṃ tejo vedoktair vacanair nṛpa // HV_App.I,41.952 //
GE07hv_apppu:17989: tad eva paramaṃ brahma vaiṣṇavaṃ paramādbhutam // HV_App.I,41.956 //
GE07hv_apppu:17991: ghorarūpā vikārās te vyathayanti mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.958 //
GE07hv_apppu:17993: ūrmibhiś chādyate caiva śītoṣṇābhir vikārataḥ // HV_App.I,41.960 //
GE07hv_apppu:17994: mahārṇavagataś caiva dahyate na ca sajjate /
GE07hv_apppu:17995: bhagnāś caiva mahānadyaḥ salile caiva sīdati // HV_App.I,41.962 //
GE07hv_apppu:17996: sīdamānaś ca salile sa śīte pātyate balāt /
GE07hv_apppu:17997: aśanāc chādanāc cāpi yujyamāno vicetanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.964 //
GE07hv_apppu:17999: śuklavarṇena bahunā srotasā mūrdhni sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,41.966 //
GE07hv_apppu:18000: ūrdhvaṃ jyotir avekṣyaś ca śubhraiḥ pītaiś ca chādyate /
GE07hv_apppu:18001: vāripūrṇaiḥ sugambhīrair vidyudbhir iva bhāsitaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.968 //
GE07hv_apppu:18002: etair vikāraiḥ saṃvṛttair niruddhaiś caiva sarvaśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18003: dhruvaiśvaryam athāsādya siddho bhavati brāhmaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.970 //
GE07hv_apppu:18006: rasāṃś ca vividhān yogān sa siddhaḥ sṛjate prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18008: tejaso rūpam aiśvaryaṃ vikāraiḥ saha vardhate /
GE07hv_apppu:18012: netraṃ samuddharan bhīmaṃ jihvāgraṃ cāsya vindati /
GE07hv_apppu:18013: nadanti yugapan nādāñ jṛmbhamāṇāḥ punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,41.980 //
GE07hv_apppu:18014: punar eva tadā bhūtvā bahurūpās tadābhavan /
GE07hv_apppu:18016: strībhūtāś ca samaṃ sarve yuñjānāś cāvalambire /
GE07hv_apppu:18017: kaṇṭheṣu bahurūpatvād vighnaiś caiva pralobhayan // HV_App.I,41.984 //
GE07hv_apppu:18019: patanti yugapat sarve pādayor mūrdhabhir natāḥ // HV_App.I,41.986 //
GE07hv_apppu:18021: bahuprakāraṃ kathayan nṛtyanti ca ramanti ca // HV_App.I,41.988 //
GE07hv_apppu:18022: etair vikāraiḥ saṃvṛttair niruddhaiś caiva sarvaśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18023: dhruvam aiśvaryam āsādya siddho bhavati brāhmaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.990 //
GE07hv_apppu:18027: caranti satataṃ loke sūryācandramasor gatim // HV_App.I,41.994 //
GE07hv_apppu:18029: etad vibhrājate loke kālacakraṃ dhruvaṃ caran // HV_App.I,41.996 //
GE07hv_apppu:18030: ardhamāsāś ca māsāś ca ṛtusaṃvatsarāṇy atha /
GE07hv_apppu:18031: kṣaṇā lavā muhūrtāś ca kalāḥ kāṣṭhās tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,41.998 //
GE07hv_apppu:18033: tārāṇāṃ gatayaś caiva grahāṇāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1000 //
GE07hv_apppu:18035: yogayuktās tv abhigrastāḥ prātyante hy acalāsanāt // HV_App.I,41.1002 //
GE07hv_apppu:18037: sīdate vasudhāmadhye bhidyamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1004 //
GE07hv_apppu:18038: bhūtānāṃ bahurūpaiś ca anyaiś ca talavāsibhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18039: viṣayair yujyate kṣipraṃ saṃkṣepāt saṃprarudhyate // HV_App.I,41.1006 //
GE07hv_apppu:18041: tataḥ pārthivam aiśvaryaṃ sevamānaś ca sarvataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18042: mūrtimadbhiś ca bahudhā dhātubhiḥ sa ca hanyate /
GE07hv_apppu:18045: bhidyate caiva bāṇāgraiḥ sutīkṣṇair marmabhedibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1010 //
GE07hv_apppu:18046: ebhir vikāraiḥ sakalair niruddhaiś cāpi sarvaśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18047: dhruvam aiśvaryam āpannaḥ siddho bhavati brāhmaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1012 //
GE07hv_apppu:18049: prādurbhavati yuñjāne samādhau pralayaṃ gate // HV_App.I,41.1014 //
GE07hv_apppu:18050: divyaṃ tad gandham āghrāti divyārthāṃs tāñ śṛṇoti ca /
GE07hv_apppu:18051: divyarūpaiś ca puruṣair bhidyate na ca chidyate /
GE07hv_apppu:18052: gacchan prakṛtito 'nantaḥ pradhānātmā kṣarann iva // HV_App.I,41.1017 //
GE07hv_apppu:18055: tato 'nyāṃ dhāraṇāṃ gatvā manasā sa pitāmahaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18058: brahmayogena yogajñaḥ sṛjate manasā prajāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1021 //
GE07hv_apppu:18059: manasā rūpasaṃpannā hy apsarāḥ sṛjate prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18063: brahmayogena yogajñaḥ svayaṃbhūr bhagavān prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,41.1026 //
GE07hv_apppu:18066: dharmyāṃ śucigiraṃ sevyāṃ brāhmīṃ mūrtimatīṃ śriyam // HV_App.I,41.1029 //
GE07hv_apppu:18070: nāsikāgrāc ca gandharvān suvācaḥ supravāditān // HV_App.I,41.1033 //
GE07hv_apppu:18072: anyeṣāṃ caiva viprāṇāṃ gānaṃ brahmaprabhāvitam // HV_App.I,41.1035 //
GE07hv_apppu:18073: padbhyāṃ sṛjati bhūtāni gatimanti dhruvāṇi ca /
GE07hv_apppu:18075: gajān siṃhāṃś ca vyāghrāṃś ca mṛgāṃś caiva sahasraśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18076: tṛṇajātīś ca bahudhā bhāvahetoś catuṣpadān // HV_App.I,41.1039 //
GE07hv_apppu:18077: ye tu hastān nikhādanti karmaprāptena hetunā /
GE07hv_apppu:18078: hastebhyaḥ karma sa sṛjan mantavyaṃ manasā tathā // HV_App.I,41.1041 //
GE07hv_apppu:18079: pāyunā sa visargaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ sukham icchatām /
GE07hv_apppu:18081: hṛdayād asṛjad gāvo bāhunā pakṣiṇas tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:18082: anyāni caiva sattvāni tais tair veṣaiḥ pṛthagvidhaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1045
GE07hv_apppu:18083: ṛṣiṃ tv aṅgirasaṃ caiva muniṃ jvalitatejasam /
GE07hv_apppu:18088: sanatkumāraṃ mūrdhnaś ca mahāyogī pitāmahaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1051 //
GE07hv_apppu:18089: abhiṣiktaṃ ca somaṃ ca yauvarājye pitāmahaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18090: brāhmaṇānāṃ ca rājānaṃ śāśvataṃ rajanīcaram // HV_App.I,41.1053 //
GE07hv_apppu:18091: tapasā mahatā yukto grahaiḥ saha puraḥsaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18092: cacāra nabhaso madhye prabhābhir bhāsayañ jagat // HV_App.I,41.1055 //
GE07hv_apppu:18093: sa gātrair manasā yogān bhagavān siddhim āgataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18094: sṛṣṭavān sarvabhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca // HV_App.I,41.1057 //
GE07hv_apppu:18095: tatra sthānāni bhūtānāṃ yogaṃś caiva pṛthagvidhān /
GE07hv_apppu:18097: eṣa brahmamayo yajño yogaḥ sāṃkhyaś ca tattvataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18098: vijñānaṃ ca svabhāvaṃ ca kṣetraṃ kṣetrajñam eva ca // HV_App.I,41.1061 //
GE07hv_apppu:18099: ekatvaṃ ca pṛthaktvaṃ ca saṃbhavo nidhanaṃ tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:18100: kālaḥ kālakṣayaś caiva jñeyo vijñānam eva ca // HV_App.I,41.1063 //
GE07hv_apppu:18103: śrutaṃ brahmayugaṃ brahman yugānāṃ prathamaṃ yugam /
GE07hv_apppu:18104: kṣatrasyāpi yugam brahmañ śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ prabho // HV_App.I,41.1065
GE07hv_apppu:18106: upāyajñaiś ca kathitaṃ kratubhiś caiva śobhitam // HV_App.I,41.1067 //
GE07hv_apppu:18109: dānadharmaiś ca vividhaiḥ prajābhir upaśobhitam // HV_App.I,41.1069 //
GE07hv_apppu:18113: parāyaṇasya saṃgamya brahmaṇas tu mahīpate // HV_App.I,41.1073 //
GE07hv_apppu:18114: śrīvṛtāḥ pāvanāś caiva brāhmaṇāś ca mahīpate /
GE07hv_apppu:18116: pūrṇe yugasahasrānte pūrvaṃ ye pralayaṃ gatāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18119: dakṣaḥ prajāpatir bhūtvā sṛjate vimalāḥ prajāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1079 //
GE07hv_apppu:18121: vaiśyā vikārataś caiva śūdrā dhūmavikārataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1081 //
GE07hv_apppu:18122: śvetalohitakair varṇaiḥ pītair nīlaiś ca brāhmaṇāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18124: tato varṇatvam āpannāḥ prajā loke caturvidhāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18125: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś caiva mahīpate // HV_App.I,41.1085 //
GE07hv_apppu:18129: tena vā brahmayogena vaiṣṇavena mahīpate // HV_App.I,41.1089 //
GE07hv_apppu:18130: prajñayā tejasā yogāt tena prācetasaḥ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18131: viṣṇur eva mahāyogī karmaṇām antaraṃ gataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1091 //
GE07hv_apppu:18133: tasmān nārhanti saṃskāraṃ na hy atra brahma vidyate // HV_App.I,41.1093 //
GE07hv_apppu:18135: prādurbhūto visarpan vai nopayujyati karmaṇi // HV_App.I,41.1095 //
GE07hv_apppu:18136: evaṃ śūdrā visarpante bhuvi kārtsnyena janmanā /
GE07hv_apppu:18141: antam icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ dhātryāḥ putro 'balo hy aham /
GE07hv_apppu:18142: tato vidhāsye tattvajñaḥ prajānāṃ vipulaṃ balam /
GE07hv_apppu:18143: vipulatvād dhi kṣetrāṇāṃ mamāpi vipulāḥ prajāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1103 //
GE07hv_apppu:18144: na teṣāṃ darśayed devī cakṣuṣā rūpam ātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18145: prajāpatisutānāṃ vai vipulaṃ sāram icchatām // HV_App.I,41.1105 //
GE07hv_apppu:18147: janitrī sarvabhūtānām aṇḍajān udbhidāṃs tathā // HV_App.I,41.1107 //
GE07hv_apppu:18149: aṇutāṃ tanutāṃ caiva jantūnāṃ karmabhāginām // HV_App.I,41.1109 //
GE07hv_apppu:18152: sādhv ahaṃ śrotum icchāmi tretāyāṃ brāhmaṇottama /
GE07hv_apppu:18153: yaṃ jñātvā sarvavidyānāṃ paraṃ paśyeyam avyayam // HV_App.I,41.1111 //
GE07hv_apppu:18155: dakṣas tu punar ālambya strībhāvaṃ puruṣottamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18161: dakṣaḥ prācetasas tasyāṃ kanyāyāṃ janayat prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18162: dehād dhi yogavidhinā kanyāḥ padmanibhānanāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1117 //
GE07hv_apppu:18165: tāḥ kanyāḥ pradadau dakṣaḥ svayaṃ prācetasaḥ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18169: dakṣo dattvātha tāḥ kanyā brahmakṣatraṃ prapadyata /
GE07hv_apppu:18171: tapyamāno mṛgaiḥ sārdhaṃ cacāra vasudhāṃ nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:18172: tṛṇamūlaphalair vṛddho vṛddhaś ca tapasāsakṛt // HV_App.I,41.1127 //
GE07hv_apppu:18173: mṛgās tu tasya modanti phalaṃ modanti brāhmaṇāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18176: karmayajñakṛtāṃ tāta siddhiṃ paśyati lakṣaṇām // HV_App.I,41.1131 //
GE07hv_apppu:18178: mṛgaiḥ saha jarāṃ yānti sapatnīkāḥ saputriṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1133 //
GE07hv_apppu:18183: yā prajā pūrvam ārūḍhā mānasī brahmacāriṇī /
GE07hv_apppu:18185: [k: K3.4 Ñ2 B2.3 Dn Ds2 D1.2.4.6 G3 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:18188: sthāvarā jaṅgamāś caiva sthūlāḥ sūkṣmāś ca bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:18189: kālayogena yogajñā bhavanti na bhavanti ca // HV_App.I,41.1142 //
GE07hv_apppu:18190: etāś caitāḥ prajāḥ sarvā dakṣakanyāsu jajñire /
GE07hv_apppu:18192: ādityā vasavo rudrā viśve ca samarudgaṇāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18193: nāgāś cānekaśirasaḥ sādhyā vai pannagās tathā // HV_App.I,41.1146 //
GE07hv_apppu:18194: gandharvāḥ kiṃnarāḥ yakṣāḥ suparṇāś ca tathāpare /
GE07hv_apppu:18195: garutmān saha yakṣaiś ca kiṃnarāś ca suvāsasaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1148 //
GE07hv_apppu:18196: gāvaḥ paśugaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ narāś ca vasudhādhipa /
GE07hv_apppu:18197: dharādharāś ca vasudhā dhātāraś ca dharādharāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18198: gajāḥ siṃhāś ca vyāghrāś ca hayāḥ pakṣadharās tathā // HV_App.I,41.1151 //
GE07hv_apppu:18199: khaḍgā viṣāṇinaś caiva vṛṣabhāś ca mṛgās tathā // HV_App.I,41.1152 //
GE07hv_apppu:18202: tathārūpais tathāgātrais taiḥ śīlais taiḥ parākramaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18203: munayaḥ punar udbhūtā dharmakṣetre sanātane // HV_App.I,41.1156 //
GE07hv_apppu:18205: yatrodbhūtāḥ surāḥ sarve divi loke pratiṣṭhitāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1158 //
GE07hv_apppu:18206: ye cānye tapasā siddhā gṛhasthā manujādhipa /
GE07hv_apppu:18207: brahmacaryeṇa saṃsiddhāḥ paricaryāṃ gatā guroḥ // HV_App.I,41.1160 //
GE07hv_apppu:18208: ye ca yogagatiṃ prāptāḥ siddhihetor mahīpate /
GE07hv_apppu:18209: kleśādhikaiḥ karmajanyair vṛttiṃ lapsyanti vai dvijāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1162
GE07hv_apppu:18211: sarve tv ete divicarā bhavanti caritavratāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1164 //
GE07hv_apppu:18219: mantrayajñaparā nityaṃ nityaṃ vratahite ratāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1170 //
GE07hv_apppu:18223: atas te tritvam āpannā yad ekas trividhaḥ kṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1174 //
GE07hv_apppu:18224: eka eva mahān agnir haviṣā saṃpravartate /
GE07hv_apppu:18226: svayaṃ ca dakṣaḥ saṃprāpto bhāgavān bhūtasatkṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18228: daṇḍī carmī śarī khaḍgī śikhī padmanibhānanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18230: yajate puṣkare brahmā medhayā saha saṃgataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18232: ghṛtaṃ kṣīraṃ yavā vrīhiḥ sarvaṃ paramakaṃ haviḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18233: vedaproktaṃ makhe nyastaṃ kalpitaṃ brahmaṇaḥ pade // HV_App.I,41.1184 //
GE07hv_apppu:18235: sa brahmā prathamaṃ tasminn agnim anyaṃ pravartayat // HV_App.I,41.1186 //
GE07hv_apppu:18236: na hy anyad vihitaṃ dravyaṃ yathāgnir yajñakarmaṇi /
GE07hv_apppu:18237: pravartayed vibhāgair vā hutahavyamayaṃ balam // HV_App.I,41.1188 //
GE07hv_apppu:18241: brahmajño brahmaṇo yajñe parayā varṇasaṃpadā // HV_App.I,41.1192 //
GE07hv_apppu:18245: vibhāti sa makho vyaktaṃ brahmaloka ivāparaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1196 //
GE07hv_apppu:18247: prayogaiḥ saṃprayuktasya jalpann iva sa vardhate // HV_App.I,41.1198 //
GE07hv_apppu:18249: yavair vrīhibhir ājyaiś ca pūrṇaiś ca jalabhājanaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1200 //
GE07hv_apppu:18251: gobhiḥ payasvinībhiś ca parivatsaiś ca komalaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1202 //
GE07hv_apppu:18255: brahmajñānamayo devo vidyayā saha saṃgataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1204 //
GE07hv_apppu:18256: mānasaiś ca kriyāmūrtir ye ca bhūtāḥ svayaṃ nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:18257: brahmā juhoti tāṃs tasmān marudbhiḥ sahitas tadā // HV_App.I,41.1206 //
GE07hv_apppu:18261: yajate kratunā pūrvam agniṣṭomena sa prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18263: jalpanti madhurā vācaḥ sānusvārāḥ kriyās tataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1212 //
GE07hv_apppu:18267: vasudhām iva saṃprāptaiḥ sarvair eva divaukasaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18270: jvaladbhir iva viprais tais tribhir evādhvare 'gnibhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18271: brahmaloka ivābhāti brahmaṇaḥ sa mahākratuḥ // HV_App.I,41.1220 //
GE07hv_apppu:18275: āyayur manayaḥ sarve manobhiḥ śrotravādibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1224 //
GE07hv_apppu:18276: hotā cātrābhavad rājan brahmatve ca bṛhaspatiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18278: yajamānaś ca yajñānte viṣṇoḥ pūjāṃ prayujya ca /
GE07hv_apppu:18279: adityāḥ paścime garbhe tapasā saṃbhṛte nṛpa // HV_App.I,41.1228 //
GE07hv_apppu:18280: padaṃ viṣṇur ajo brahmā nirdvaṃdvo niṣparigrahaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18281: yataḥ padasahasrāṇi bhaviṣyanty udbhavanti ca // HV_App.I,41.1230 //
GE07hv_apppu:18282: avandhyaṃ cāprameyaṃ ca vyatiriktaṃ ca karmabhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18283: ātmāpi yasya munayo bhavanti niṣparigrahāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1232 //
GE07hv_apppu:18285: doṣāṃś ca yugapat sarve chādayanti manobalāt // HV_App.I,41.1234 //
GE07hv_apppu:18287: parigrahaṃ śubhaṃ dharmam avidyālakṣaṇaṃ nṛpa // HV_App.I,41.1236 //
GE07hv_apppu:18289: yadi cen muniśabdena gṛhyate brahmavādibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1238 //
GE07hv_apppu:18291: divi lokaḥ satāṃ sthānaṃ lokānāṃ loka ucyate // HV_App.I,41.1240 //
GE07hv_apppu:18292: yatra devā havyapuṣṭā na kṣayaṃ yānti bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:18293: yajamānaś ca bhāgaiḥ svaiḥ karmaprāptodite pade /
GE07hv_apppu:18294: modate saha patnībhir vijvaro vasudhādhipa // HV_App.I,41.1243 //
GE07hv_apppu:18298: na śekuḥ pravibhāgārthaṃ bhettuṃ sarvodyamair api // HV_App.I,41.1247 //
GE07hv_apppu:18302: abravīt praṇataḥ sarvāñ śirasā tān dvijottamān // HV_App.I,41.1251 //
GE07hv_apppu:18303: na hi śakyo balād bhettuṃ yuṣmābhir asusaṅgibhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18308: vimuktaṃ rāgadoṣābhyāṃ brahma vardhati śāśvatam // HV_App.I,41.1257 //
GE07hv_apppu:18310: dhātubhiś ca visarpadbhiḥ śikharaiś cānupātibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1259 //
GE07hv_apppu:18312: bahubhir vyālarūpaiś ca codyamāno guhāśayaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1261 //
GE07hv_apppu:18314: tūṣṇīṃ babhūvus te sarve tadā brāhmaṇasattamāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1263 //
GE07hv_apppu:18317: balir homāś ca vardhante ahany ahani bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:18320: teṣāṃ brahmavidāṃ rājan pṛthivyāṃ brahmavādibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1267 //
GE07hv_apppu:18323: vāsaṃ yatra prakurvanti dṛṣṭvā bhagavataḥ kriyām /
GE07hv_apppu:18326: yatayaś cāpi kāṅkṣanti dharmeṇa harikāṅkṣiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1273 //
GE07hv_apppu:18331: caranto brahmacaryaṃ ca yatnam āsthāya dāruṇam /
GE07hv_apppu:18332: anena vidhinā rājan kramaprāptena sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1279 //
GE07hv_apppu:18334: pūrvair ācaritaṃ rājan munibhir brahmavādibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1281 //
GE07hv_apppu:18335: nāvedavidvān āgacchen nāpi raudram vrataṃ caret /
GE07hv_apppu:18336: na ca tyāgena gaccheta gṛhadharmaṃ ca na tyajet // HV_App.I,41.1283 //
GE07hv_apppu:18337: evaṃ na gacched utthānam aprāpto vedasaṃcayam /
GE07hv_apppu:18338: ṛcaś ca saṃcayaḥ pūrvaḥ sāmagānāṃ ca bhārata // HV_App.I,41.1285 //
GE07hv_apppu:18340: asaṃcayaś ca saṃcayaṃ ca sāmagānaṃ ca bhārata //
GE07hv_apppu:18341: ye cāpi putriṇo na syuḥ śrutvāpi prāpnuyuḥ phalam /
GE07hv_apppu:18342: brāhmaṇās tapasā śrāntā guroś ca paricaryayā // HV_App.I,41.1287 //
GE07hv_apppu:18343: yasya naivaṃ śrutam brahman na gṛhītam viśāṃ pate /
GE07hv_apppu:18344: kāmaṃ taṃ dhārmiko rājā śūdrakarmāṇi kārayet // HV_App.I,41.1289 //
GE07hv_apppu:18345: atha vā naiva vidyeta yad brahma nādriyed dvijaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18346: dvābhyāṃ tu śrotraviṣaye manaḥ pūrvaṃ samāhite // HV_App.I,41.1291 //
GE07hv_apppu:18348: brāhmaṇo bhūtisaṃpanno ya icched bhūtim ātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1293 //
GE07hv_apppu:18351: te tu gobrāhmaṇāṃs tāṃś ca candrādityapuraskṛtāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18352: brāhmaṇān pūjayan rājan vasubhir brahmasaṃbhavaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1295 //
GE07hv_apppu:18354: kurvanti satataṃ yajñaiḥ kramaprāptaiḥ pitāmaham // HV_App.I,41.1297 //
GE07hv_apppu:18358: provāca bhagavān brahma diṣṭyā diṣṭyeti bhārata // HV_App.I,41.1301 //
GE07hv_apppu:18359: tataḥ kaśyapam ābhāṣya provāca bhagavān prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18360: bhavān api sutaiḥ sārdhaṃ yakṣyate vasudhātale // HV_App.I,41.1303 //
GE07hv_apppu:18362: yakṣāḥ surāś ca te sarve yathāpratiguṇaiḥ prabho // HV_App.I,41.1305 //
GE07hv_apppu:18363: vayaṃ yakṣyāmahe sarve pūrvaṃ yakṣyāmahe vayam /
GE07hv_apppu:18366: yuddhāyaiva pratiṣṭhanti pragṛhya vipulau bhujau // HV_App.I,41.1309 //
GE07hv_apppu:18369: nivāryamāṇā yudhyanti vṛṣabhā iva gokule // HV_App.I,41.1312 //
GE07hv_apppu:18371: paśyatāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ mṛtyor viṣayam āgatāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1314 //
GE07hv_apppu:18372: tataḥ śabdena mahatā paraṃ kṛtvā mahābalāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18373: rundhanti bāhubhiḥ kruddhāḥ sapakṣā iva pakṣiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1316 //
GE07hv_apppu:18374: cacāla vasudhā caiva pādākrāntā ca roṣibhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18376: parvatāś ca viśīryante nardamānā vṛṣā iva // HV_App.I,41.1319 //
GE07hv_apppu:18378: tataḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ madhor viṣṇoś ca bhārata // HV_App.I,41.1321 //
GE07hv_apppu:18381: vahner iva balaṃ dīptaṃ śamayaty ambunā yathā // HV_App.I,41.1324 //
GE07hv_apppu:18386: balavān sa tu daiteyo madhur bhīmaparākramaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18387: babandha pāśair niśitair mahendraṃ parvatāntare // HV_App.I,41.1326 //
GE07hv_apppu:18388: taṃ vai prahrādavacanāl lakṣaṇajñaś ca bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:18389: aiśvaryam aindram ākāṅkṣan bhaviṣyaṃ buddhisaṃkṣayāt // HV_App.I,41.1328
GE07hv_apppu:18391: āyasair bahubhiś citrair balavadbhir vidāraṇaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1330 //
GE07hv_apppu:18393: madhye gaṇānāṃ sarveṣāṃ kālasya vasām āgataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1332 //
GE07hv_apppu:18395: yuddhārtham abhyadhāvanta pragṛhya vipulā gadāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1334 //
GE07hv_apppu:18396: gandharvāḥ kiṃnarāś caiva vādye gīte ca kovidāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18397: pranṛtyanti pragāyanti prahasanti ca sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1336 //
GE07hv_apppu:18399: mano madhor vidhunvanti yudhyamānasya rāgiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1338 //
GE07hv_apppu:18401: etān vikārān kurvanti gandharvāḥ satyavādinaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1340 //
GE07hv_apppu:18402: tatra saktā hi gāndharve tasmiñ śabde dadur manaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18403: dānavāś cāsurāś caiva pratyakṣaṃ yānti prāṇadan // HV_App.I,41.1342 //
GE07hv_apppu:18404: madhoś ca mana ākṣipya paśyan yogena cakṣuṣā /
GE07hv_apppu:18405: mandaraṃ prāpatad viṣṇur gūḍho 'gnir iva dāruṣu // HV_App.I,41.1344 //
GE07hv_apppu:18409: bhujena śaṅkhadeśānte na cakampe padāt padam // HV_App.I,41.1348 //
GE07hv_apppu:18411: sa papāta mahīṃ tūrṇaṃ jānubhyāṃ rudhiraṃ vaman // HV_App.I,41.1350 //
GE07hv_apppu:18412: na cainaṃ patitaṃ hanti viṣṇur yuddhaviśāradaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18415: madhū roṣaparītātmā nirdahann iva cakṣuṣā // HV_App.I,41.1354 //
GE07hv_apppu:18419: ubhau ca tapasā śrāntāv ubhau satyaparākramau // HV_App.I,41.1358 //
GE07hv_apppu:18421: śailendrāv iva yudhyantau pakṣaiḥ pāṣāṇasaṃnibhaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1360 //
GE07hv_apppu:18423: gajāv iva viṣāṇāgrair nakhāgraiś ca viceratuḥ // HV_App.I,41.1362 //
GE07hv_apppu:18424: tato vraṇamukhaiś caiva susrāva rudhiraṃ bahu /
GE07hv_apppu:18425: grīṣmānte dhātusaṃsṛṣṭaṃ śailebhya iva kāñcanam // HV_App.I,41.1364 //
GE07hv_apppu:18427: athodyataiḥ padāgraiś ca tau vyadārayatāṃ mahīm // HV_App.I,41.1366 //
GE07hv_apppu:18428: abhihatya tu tau vīrau parasparam anekadhā /
GE07hv_apppu:18429: pataṃgāv iva yudhyetāṃ pakṣābhyāṃ māṃsagṛddhinau // HV_App.I,41.1368 //
GE07hv_apppu:18434: tad brahma indriyair yuktaṃ tejobhūtaṃ sanātanam // HV_App.I,41.1373 //
GE07hv_apppu:18435: dhruvaṃ tiṣṭhanti bhūtās te sūkṣme pralayatāṃ gate /
GE07hv_apppu:18437: prabodhya bhāvam bhūtānāṃ triṣu lokeṣu kāmadaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1376 //
GE07hv_apppu:18438: surūpo bahurūpas tāṃl lokān saṃcarate vaśī /
GE07hv_apppu:18439: mānasīṃ tanum āsthāya bahubhiḥ kāraṇāntaraiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1378 //
GE07hv_apppu:18441: brahmabhūtaṃ paraṃ caiva sūkṣmeṇātmānam īśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,41.1380 //
GE07hv_apppu:18442: brāhmeṇa viprān vasati yuddhenaiva ca kṣatriyān /
GE07hv_apppu:18443: pradānakarmaṇā vaiśyāñ śūdrān paricareṇa ca // HV_App.I,41.1382 //
GE07hv_apppu:18446: caturbhir vyatiriktāṅgais tribhir anyaiś ca dhātubhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18447: saptabhiḥ pitṛbhir nityais trīṃl lokān parirakṣaṇe // HV_App.I,41.1386 //
GE07hv_apppu:18449: prakāśe cāprakāśe ca nigūḍhaṃ svena tejasā // HV_App.I,41.1388 //
GE07hv_apppu:18450: trayas tu pitaro nityaṃ vardhayanti divākaram /
GE07hv_apppu:18451: caturbhiḥ pitṛbhiś caiva candro vardhati maṇḍale // HV_App.I,41.1390 //
GE07hv_apppu:18452: trayaḥ pitṛgaṇā nityaṃ piṇḍān paścād adanti te /
GE07hv_apppu:18453: catvāro 'nye pitṛgaṇāḥ siddhāḥ paṇcaka ādade // HV_App.I,41.1392 //
GE07hv_apppu:18454: tvam eva pañca tān dharmās tvam evāpañcatān vibho /
GE07hv_apppu:18456: tasmāt tat teja ādatte agnir vāyuś ca sarvaśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18457: atas tvaṃ karmaṇā tena ādityaḥ samapadyathāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1396 //
GE07hv_apppu:18458: yad aśnāsi jagat sarvaṃ raśmibhiḥ pradahann iva /
GE07hv_apppu:18459: yūgāntakāle saṃprāpte parāṃ siddhim upāgataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1398 //
GE07hv_apppu:18463: hetūnām adhikāraṃ ca mā bhūt karmaviparyayaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1402 //
GE07hv_apppu:18465: bālabhāvāya vasudhāṃ pakṣe pakṣe jarāṃ tava // HV_App.I,41.1404 //
GE07hv_apppu:18467: vasu yad bhuvi kiṃcic ca sarvaṃ tat tvanmayaṃ vibho // HV_App.I,41.1406 //
GE07hv_apppu:18468: tvam eva dvividhaṃ dharmaṃ śāśvataṃ vasudhātale /
GE07hv_apppu:18470: dvividhaḥ svargamārgaś ca sūryaś candraś ca nirmalaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18471: candramāḥ pitṛyānaś ca devayānaś ca bhāskaraḥ // HV_App.I,41.1410 //
GE07hv_apppu:18472: tvam eva vasudhāyukto viśvaṃ carasi māyayā /
GE07hv_apppu:18473: ekīkṛtya gaṇān sarvān saṃkṣipyāmutra saṃbhavaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1412 //
GE07hv_apppu:18474: ekas tvam asi saṃbhūtaḥ purāṇaḥ puruṣo virāṭ /
GE07hv_apppu:18475: akṣayaś cāprameyaś ca kāmakārakaro vaśī // HV_App.I,41.1414 //
GE07hv_apppu:18476: mūrtas tejasi saṃbhūto vāyuḥ paryeti khecaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18477: saptabhī rūpasaṃsthānair nityam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati // HV_App.I,41.1416 //
GE07hv_apppu:18478: sādhane vāpi nirvāṇe saṃhāre pralaye tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:18479: dhātā dhāraṇakāle ca diśaś cakṣuṣi sarpaṇe // HV_App.I,41.1418 //
GE07hv_apppu:18481: karmabhiḥ satyam āpannaiḥ samarāgair jitendriyaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1420 //
GE07hv_apppu:18482: stūyamānaś ca vibudhaiḥ siddhair munivarais tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:18483: sasmāra vipulaṃ dehaṃ harir hayaśiro mahān // HV_App.I,41.1422 //
GE07hv_apppu:18485: śiromadhye mahādevo brahmā tu hṛdaye sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1424 //
GE07hv_apppu:18487: jaṅghe tu vasavaḥ sādhyāḥ sarvasaṃdhiṣu devatāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1426 //
GE07hv_apppu:18488: jihvā vaiśvānaro devaḥ satyā devī sarasvatī /
GE07hv_apppu:18490: evaṃ kṛtvā tathā rūpaṃ surāṇām adbhutaṃ mahat /
GE07hv_apppu:18491: asuraṃ pīḍayām āsa krodhād raktāntalocanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1430 //
GE07hv_apppu:18494: medinīty eva śabdaś ca labdhaḥ pṛthvyā narottama /
GE07hv_apppu:18499: prahṛṣṭāni pragāyanti pranṛtyanti ca sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1436 //
GE07hv_apppu:18501: bahudhātuvicitraiś ca saṃlikhann iva cābabhau // HV_App.I,41.1438 //
GE07hv_apppu:18503: prāṃśubhiḥ śikharāgraiś ca savidyuta ivāmbudāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1440 //
GE07hv_apppu:18510: kāñcanāḥ parvatāḥ sarve sphāṭikair maṇibhiś citāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18511: sūryakāntaiś ca bahubhiś candrakāntaiś ca nirmalaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1448 //
GE07hv_apppu:18512: himavāṃś ca mahāśailaḥ śvetair dhātubhir ācitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18515: tāmrapuṣpaiś ca śikharair dīpyamānaḥ svatejasā // HV_App.I,41.1452 //
GE07hv_apppu:18519: toraṇaiś caiva nibiḍaiḥ prāṃśubhiś caiva pādapaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1456 //
GE07hv_apppu:18523: śṛṅgāraiḥ sāṅgahāraiś ca kailāso madanāyate // HV_App.I,41.1460 //
GE07hv_apppu:18525: vindhyo nīlāmbudaśyāmo vibhinna iva toyadaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1462 //
GE07hv_apppu:18527: nirvemur vimalaṃ toyaṃ meghajālair ivottamaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1464 //
GE07hv_apppu:18531: citraiḥ puṣpais tarugaṇāḥ śobhanta iva bhūṣitāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1468 //
GE07hv_apppu:18533: vihaṃgamābhir līnāś ca latās tarusamāśritāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1470 //
GE07hv_apppu:18541: viṣṇur madhor nihantā ca cakāra madhuvāhinīm /
GE07hv_apppu:18545: viveśa puṣkaraṃ sā tu brahmaṇo vākyacoditā /
GE07hv_apppu:18547: dhātrī kapilarūpeṇa gaur bhūtvā kṣarate payaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18548: madhuraṃ vitate yajñe brahmaṇo vākyacoditā // HV_App.I,41.1485 //
GE07hv_apppu:18549: śiraś ca pṛthivībhūtaṃ saṃdhātuṃ prāptavān mahīm /
GE07hv_apppu:18550: śuddhaṃ ca bhajate lokaṃ śāśvataṃ paramādbhutam // HV_App.I,41.1487 //
GE07hv_apppu:18559: mahāmeror yathā rūpaṃ pañcabhir dhātubhir vṛtam /
GE07hv_apppu:18562: kariṣyāmy aham apy etan manasā dharmacāriṇam /
GE07hv_apppu:18563: rūpaṃ bahuvidhaṃ loke pārthivī cetanā yathā // HV_App.I,41.1500 //
GE07hv_apppu:18564: trīṃś ca lokān prapadyeyaṃ pañcabhir dhātulakṣaṇaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18565: ṣaṣṭhena ca visarjeyaṃ manasā dharmacāriṇīm // HV_App.I,41.1502 //
GE07hv_apppu:18568: na ca vindeta māṃ kaścin manasā kāmarūpiṇam /
GE07hv_apppu:18570: ye ca viṣṇum adhīyante bahudhā pādavigrahaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18571: te māṃ paśyeyur avyaktaṃ tapasā dagdhakilbiṣāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1508 //
GE07hv_apppu:18572: ye ca mām abhiroheyur narā dharmapathe sthitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18573: te 'pi svargejitaḥ sarve paśyeyur māṃ gataklamāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1510 //
GE07hv_apppu:18574: yaś caiva parvataḥ prāṃśur merupṛṣṭhe pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18575: etam āruhya yudhyeyuḥ prāṇatyāgeṣu nirmalāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1512 //
GE07hv_apppu:18577: nandanaṃ vanam āsādya kāmyakaṃ ca mahad vanam // HV_App.I,41.1514 //
GE07hv_apppu:18578: imāṃ vidyāṃ samāsthāya madbhaktāḥ puṣkareṣv iha /
GE07hv_apppu:18579: śarīraṃ kṣapayiṣyanti vratair bahuvidhaiḥ kṛśāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1516 //
GE07hv_apppu:18580: siddhiṃ prāpya krameyus te kāmair bahuvidhair narāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18581: imaṃ lokam amuṃ caiva saṃpateyur yathāsukham // HV_App.I,41.1518 //
GE07hv_apppu:18582: gaurī siddheti vikhyātā triṣu lokeṣu vidyayā /
GE07hv_apppu:18583: prabhāvaṃ tapaso vṛttaṃ darśayanti samāhitāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1520 //
GE07hv_apppu:18585: bhaveyus te nirārambhā dhātubhir muktabandhanāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1522 //
GE07hv_apppu:18586: sahasraguṇam apy atra dattvā dānaphalād iva /
GE07hv_apppu:18590: yeṣām iha ca sāṃnidhyaṃ yajñe brāhmaṇasaṃkule /
GE07hv_apppu:18591: te bhūyo yajamānādyā abhiṣicya punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1528 //
GE07hv_apppu:18592: tathā tāṃ manyase gaurīṃ manasā dharmacāriṇīm /
GE07hv_apppu:18593: anugrahāya bhūtānāṃ mamāgre ca tapodhane // HV_App.I,41.1530 //
GE07hv_apppu:18594: satya eṣa paro divye bhavitā nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18595: nāphalo vidyate dharmaś carito brahmacāriṇā // HV_App.I,41.1532 //
GE07hv_apppu:18599: tathā sa dhātunicaye puṇye parvatarodhasi // HV_App.I,41.1534 //
GE07hv_apppu:18605: [k: K3 D1.4 subst. for line 1539, K2 ins. after line 1539:k]
GE07hv_apppu:18607: aṣṭau varṣasahasrāṇi sahasraṃ ca tapodhanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1540 //
GE07hv_apppu:18609: tiṣṭhate tapasā madhye yogātmā bhāvayañ jagat // HV_App.I,41.1542 //
GE07hv_apppu:18610: somo viṣayam ākṣipya manasā dhārayan manaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18611: yuktaḥ paramadharmātmā brāhmīṃ siddhim upāgataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1544 //
GE07hv_apppu:18612: sarvaṃ paśyati sarvatra divi bhuvy antare tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:18613: jyotiṣṇuḥ karma kurvāṇo bahurūpaḥ sa saṃpadā // HV_App.I,41.1546 //
GE07hv_apppu:18615: uddhṛtya dakṣiṇaṃ pādaṃ vāyubhakṣaḥ samāhitaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1548 //
GE07hv_apppu:18616: aṣṭau varṣasahasrāṇi sahasraṃ śatam eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:18618: atha vāyur ghanībhūtvā ante carati gopateḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18619: phenībhūtaṃ samudgāraiḥ pavanaṃ nirgiran mukhāt // HV_App.I,41.1552 //
GE07hv_apppu:18620: sa niṣkrāntas tato vaktrāt prāṇena paramātmavān /
GE07hv_apppu:18621: niryāsabhūtaḥ patito naivārdro naiva pārthivaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1554 //
GE07hv_apppu:18623: naivārdro naiva śuṣkāṅgo vāyuḥ saṃghātam āgataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1556 //
GE07hv_apppu:18624: tatkāle phenam utkṣipya pavanaḥ saha vāriṇā /
GE07hv_apppu:18625: nirālambe nirālambas tv abhrāṇi samapadyata // HV_App.I,41.1558 //
GE07hv_apppu:18626: te kṣipanti payo bhūmāv ātmānaṃ svena ghaṭṭitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18628: brāhmīṃ mūrtiṃ samādhāya vāyuḥ sarvatrago vaśī /
GE07hv_apppu:18629: samāḥ sahasraṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ cacāra vipulaṃ tapaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1562 //
GE07hv_apppu:18631: tapas tapyad anāhāro maunam āsthāya pauṣkare // HV_App.I,41.1564 //
GE07hv_apppu:18632: varṣāṇāṃ ca sahasrāṇi trīṇi caikaṃ ca yatnataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18633: tasyāgnes tejaḥ saṃbhūto mahān agniḥ pravartate // HV_App.I,41.1566 //
GE07hv_apppu:18637: tat tamo bhuvi rājendra mānuṣeṣu pratiṣṭhitam /
GE07hv_apppu:18638: bhāskaras tejasaṃhāras tato bhavati sattamaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1571 //
GE07hv_apppu:18640: na tu yogabale rājan brāhmaṇasya viśeṣataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18641: tat tamo nāśayed rātrau nāpy aho bhavitā punaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1574 //
GE07hv_apppu:18643: tapaś carati dharmātmā puṣkare susamāhitaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1576 //
GE07hv_apppu:18645: tāvat svarūpam āsthāya tiṣṭhate nikhilāḥ samāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1578 //
GE07hv_apppu:18646: jānubhyāṃ patito bhūmau jyotir nabhasi paśyati /
GE07hv_apppu:18647: samāḥ sahasraṃ nikhilaṃ netrair animiṣair jagat // HV_App.I,41.1580 //
GE07hv_apppu:18649: madhyaṃ dinakare prāpte raśmivān saparigrahaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1582 //
GE07hv_apppu:18651: rarāja tejaḥsaṃyogād vidyūdbhir iva pāvakaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1584 //
GE07hv_apppu:18654: bahudhā tu punar bhūtvā niṣaṇṇo vasudhātale /
GE07hv_apppu:18655: samāsahasraṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ tapas tepe sudāruṇam // HV_App.I,41.1588 //
GE07hv_apppu:18657: meroḥ śikharam āsādya kāmaṃ kāmena nirvaman // HV_App.I,41.1590 //
GE07hv_apppu:18658: tapaḥkāmaḥ sa yakṣas tu kubero naravāhanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18659: viṣṇur eva tapodhyakṣas tejaso 'nte vijṛmbhati // HV_App.I,41.1592 //
GE07hv_apppu:18660: na hi kaścit pumān asti ya evaṃ tapa ācaret /
GE07hv_apppu:18661: triṣu lokeṣu rājendra ṛte viṣṇuṃ sanātanam // HV_App.I,41.1594 //
GE07hv_apppu:18662: vāsukir bahuśīrṣaś ca nāgendro maunam āsthitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18663: tapa ācarate samyaṅ nidhāya manasā manaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1596 //
GE07hv_apppu:18667: samāḥ sahasraṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ nirāhāras tapodhanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1600 //
GE07hv_apppu:18668: kālakūṭaṃ viṣaṃ tad dhi sūmahat samapadyata /
GE07hv_apppu:18669: yena loko hy abhigrasto na sukhaṃ vindate nṛpa // HV_App.I,41.1602 //
GE07hv_apppu:18671: jaṅgamaṃ sthāvaraṃ caiva sarvatrānugataṃ viṣam // HV_App.I,41.1604 //
GE07hv_apppu:18673: nāśayaty ātmano 'ṅgāni tena tīkṣṇena bhārata // HV_App.I,41.1606 //
GE07hv_apppu:18675: mantraṃ visṛjate rājan brahmākṣaram ahiṃsakam // HV_App.I,41.1608 //
GE07hv_apppu:18676: [k: D1 ins. after line 1608, K2 after line 1609 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:18677: āhāraś ca tato yogād vihitās tasya pannagāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18679: garutmān vitataiḥ pakṣair nakhāgraiḥ salilaṃ mahīm /
GE07hv_apppu:18682: rarāja vasudhā caiva taiḥ parṇair bahucitritaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1612 //
GE07hv_apppu:18689: tapaś carati dharmātmā bāhum udyamya dakṣiṇam // HV_App.I,41.1619 //
GE07hv_apppu:18690: sāgraṃ varṣasahasraṃ ca śatam ekaṃ ca suvṛta /
GE07hv_apppu:18696: dine niṣaṇṇo bhavati rātrau bhavati vai sthiraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18698: tasya yaḥ sodyataḥ pāṇiḥ pṛthivyāṃ pṛthivīsamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18699: rātrau sa tapano bhavati maṇḍalaṃ vipulaṃ nabhaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1629 //
GE07hv_apppu:18700: sa candraviṣayaṃ rājañ śamayām āsa rundhati /
GE07hv_apppu:18701: grahāṇāṃ gatayaś caiva tārāṇāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1631 //
GE07hv_apppu:18702: tāṃ chāyām ākṣipat somaḥ sravadbhir maṇḍalena vai /
GE07hv_apppu:18703: pṛthivyāṃ dakṣiṇo hasto mahāyogī mahāmanāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1633 //
GE07hv_apppu:18705: aliṅgā pṛthivīliṅgād adbhutād akṣayā divi // HV_App.I,41.1635 //
GE07hv_apppu:18707: prokṣya pādau tu satalau pṛthvī vācyam upāgatā // HV_App.I,41.1637 //
GE07hv_apppu:18711: sphāṭikeva śūbhā yaiṣā kāñcanair dhātubhir vṛtā // HV_App.I,41.1641 //
GE07hv_apppu:18714: raśmibhiḥ punar uttīrṇā tato yogena dhāvati /
GE07hv_apppu:18716: śītacchāyaiś ca tarubhir latābhiś ca sugandhibhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18717: padmakhaṇḍaiś ca vividhaiḥ śuśubhe divyagandhibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1647 //
GE07hv_apppu:18722: sakhyā gaṅgā phalaṃ lebhe puṣkareṇa samāhitā /
GE07hv_apppu:18723: sutapā candravihitā lokānāṃ dhāraṇe ratā // HV_App.I,41.1653 //
GE07hv_apppu:18725: pṛṣṭhāt prayātā śailendre mandare mandagāminī // HV_App.I,41.1655 //
GE07hv_apppu:18726: ṛgādyāṃś caturo vedān pādaiś caturbhir āvṛtān /
GE07hv_apppu:18727: yajurbhiḥ sāmabhiś caiva grathitāñ śikṣayā tathā // HV_App.I,41.1657 //
GE07hv_apppu:18729: supārśvasya gireḥ pāde paridāyaiḥ sudāruṇaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1659 //
GE07hv_apppu:18730: nisvanaṃ sarvabhūtāni niyamena ca me śṛṇu /
GE07hv_apppu:18731: mandarāgre visarpantaṃ jagat kṛsnam atīndriyam // HV_App.I,41.1661 //
GE07hv_apppu:18733: na vācam īrayed devī niyamāt satyavādinī // HV_App.I,41.1663 //
GE07hv_apppu:18735: na śekur abhidhānārthaṃ vyāhartuṃ vadanair balāt // HV_App.I,41.1665 //
GE07hv_apppu:18739: tasminn evātha te sarve gānaṃ gāyanti śikṣayā // HV_App.I,41.1669 //
GE07hv_apppu:18740: ādityā vasavo rudrā marutaś cāśvibhiḥ saha /
GE07hv_apppu:18742: gandharvāḥ kiṃnarāś caiva sanāgāḥ saha cāmbhasaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18745: tapaś caranti sahitāḥ puṣkareṣu manīṣiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1673 //
GE07hv_apppu:18746: api kīṭapataṃgaiś ca saha sarvaiḥ sarīsṛpaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18749: saṃrakṣati mahāyogī sarvāṃs tān sahacāriṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1677 //
GE07hv_apppu:18750: puṣkare ramate viṣṇur viṣṇur eva dvidhā kṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18751: dīpyamānaḥ svatejobhir vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1679 //
GE07hv_apppu:18753: pradhāvati samaṃ tena maṇḍalaṃ daśayojanam // HV_App.I,41.1681 //
GE07hv_apppu:18756: tasyāgner visphuliṅgānāṃ na śekur laṅghane ratāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18757: viprakīrṇasya bahudhā maryādām iva bhāskaraḥ // HV_App.I,41.1685 //
GE07hv_apppu:18758: so 'gnir dīpya vibhajyāṃśūn vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18760: so 'gnir dhūmagatas tatra tiṣṭhate vipulas tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:18761: yāvad viṣṇuḥ kramaprāpto niyamasya samāpanāt // HV_App.I,41.1689 //
GE07hv_apppu:18762: rakṣāṃ kṛtvā na taṃ vidyād viṣṇur viṣṇuparākramaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18763: bhūtvā śataśarīro vai nāgo bālāhako 'bhavat // HV_App.I,41.1691 //
GE07hv_apppu:18767: nyaṣiñcad dahanaṃ tatra nāgo bālāhakas tadā // HV_App.I,41.1695 //
GE07hv_apppu:18768: tataḥ siddhagaṇair juṣṭaḥ puṣkare tapyate tapaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18771: acalaṃ sthānam āsādya tūṣṇīṃbhūto babhūva ha // HV_App.I,41.1699 //
GE07hv_apppu:18773: hitaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu iha cāmutra cobhayoḥ // HV_App.I,41.1701 //
GE07hv_apppu:18780: te śailās tv arciṣā dagdhāḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18781: yugante prabhur ādityaḥ prajā iva didhakṣivān // HV_App.I,41.1709 //
GE07hv_apppu:18782: na śekur agniṃ daityās te māyābhimukham udyatam /
GE07hv_apppu:18783: ādityam iva dīpyantaṃ nabhaḥ sūryodaye yathā // HV_App.I,41.1711 //
GE07hv_apppu:18785: gandhamādanam āsādya niṣaṇṇā girir mūrdhani // HV_App.I,41.1713 //
GE07hv_apppu:18786: sa cāgnir vaiṣṇave loke vidyudbhir iva saṃgataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18787: antarikṣacarān daityān nirdahan vicaran divi // HV_App.I,41.1715 //
GE07hv_apppu:18788: nāgo bālāhakaś caiva meghaiḥ saṃghātam āgataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18789: mumoca salilaṃ bhūmau parjanya iva vṛṣṭimān // HV_App.I,41.1717 //
GE07hv_apppu:18793: haviṣā mantrapūtena yathā vai vidhir eva ca //
GE07hv_apppu:18794: mumoca toyasaṃghātaṃ mānayan viprajaṃ janam // HV_App.I,41.1719 //
GE07hv_apppu:18797: saṃyujya tapasā devāḥ kim akurvaṃs tataḥ param /
GE07hv_apppu:18798: na hi tad vidyate loke tapasā yan na labhyate // HV_App.I,41.1721 //
GE07hv_apppu:18800: atha dīkṣāṃ samāsthāya sarve viṣṇumayā gaṇāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18801: puṣkarād agnim uddhatya praṇīya ca yathāvidhi // HV_App.I,41.1723 //
GE07hv_apppu:18803: haviṣā mantrapūtena yathā vai vidhir eva ca // HV_App.I,41.1725 //
GE07hv_apppu:18804: sa cāgnir vidhivat tatra vardhate brahmatejasā /
GE07hv_apppu:18806: brahmadaṇḍa iti khyāto vapuṣā nirdahann iva /
GE07hv_apppu:18808: gadī ca lāṅgalī cakrī śarī carmī paraśvadhī /
GE07hv_apppu:18809: śūlī vajrī khaḍgapāṇiḥ śaktimān varakārmukī // HV_App.I,41.1731 //
GE07hv_apppu:18811: naro lāṅgalam ālambya musalaṃ ca mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1733 //
GE07hv_apppu:18813: rudraḥ śūlaṃ pinākaṃ ca manasādhārayat prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,41.1735 //
GE07hv_apppu:18814: mṛtyur daṇḍaṃ sapāśaṃ ca kālaḥ śaktim agṛhṇata /
GE07hv_apppu:18815: jagrāha paraśuṃ tvaṣṭā kuberaś ca paraśvadham // HV_App.I,41.1737 //
GE07hv_apppu:18817: viśvakarmā ca tvaṣṭā ca cakrāte hy āyudhāni tu // HV_App.I,41.1739 //
GE07hv_apppu:18818: indrāyāgnī rathaṃ prādāt sūryāya ca pratāpine /
GE07hv_apppu:18819: paramātmā dadau viṣṇū rudrāya ca mahātmane // HV_App.I,41.1741 //
GE07hv_apppu:18820: chandobhir eva tvaṣṭā tu sa cakārātha vāhinīm /
GE07hv_apppu:18821: viśvakarmā vimānāni cakāra bahubhiḥ kramaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1743 //
GE07hv_apppu:18823: puṣkarāt parvaṇi ghanān pṛtanārthaṃ prakalpayat // HV_App.I,41.1745 //
GE07hv_apppu:18825: yayābhiyujya saṃgrāme śatruṃ nirbibhide raṇe // HV_App.I,41.1747 //
GE07hv_apppu:18826: sa taṃ daṇḍaṃ samucitaṃ nirvikāraṃ samāhitam /
GE07hv_apppu:18827: brahmā jagrāha vidhinā antardhānagataḥ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,41.1749 //
GE07hv_apppu:18828: svaiḥ prabhāvaiś ca bahudhā so 'stragrāmaṃ caturvidham /
GE07hv_apppu:18829: aindram āgneyavāyavyaṃ raudraṃ raudreṇa varcasā // HV_App.I,41.1751 //
GE07hv_apppu:18830: ebhir vikāraiḥ saṃyuktā diteḥ putrā mahābalāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18831: tapasā śikṣayā caiva astraiḥ praharaṇais tathā // HV_App.I,41.1753 //
GE07hv_apppu:18833: apradhṛṣyā raṇe sarve kṣaṇenaivābhavaṃs tadā // HV_App.I,41.1755 //
GE07hv_apppu:18835: mandarasya gireḥ pāde vicerur vasudhātale // HV_App.I,41.1757 //
GE07hv_apppu:18836: caturaṅgaṃ balaṃ sarvaṃ saṃhṛtya tamasaḥ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18837: viṣṇur eva mahāyogī cacāra vasudhātale // HV_App.I,41.1759 //
GE07hv_apppu:18838: bhūyo 'nyat tapa āseduś caranto brāhmaṇaiḥ saha /
GE07hv_apppu:18839: taiś ca sarvaiḥ suragaṇaiś carmacīranivāsibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1761 //
GE07hv_apppu:18843: avināśe ca bhūtānāṃ katham āsan prajās tadā // HV_App.I,41.1763 //
GE07hv_apppu:18845: abhyaṣiñcat pṛthuṃ vainyaṃ purā rājye prajāpatiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18846: [k: Ñ2 V1.3 B1.3 Ds D3.6 G3 subst. for line 1764:k]
GE07hv_apppu:18849: eṣa vaḥ paramo rājā anurāgād ajāyata /
GE07hv_apppu:18851: eṣa no vṛttidātā ca śilpānāṃ ca samarpitā /
GE07hv_apppu:18854: bahubhir niyamaiḥ śrāntā niṣaṇṇā girisānuṣu // HV_App.I,41.1771 //
GE07hv_apppu:18856: mādhave samaye prāpte tena gandhena darpitāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1773 //
GE07hv_apppu:18858: manogrāhi sukhaṃ sarvaṃ pārthivaṃ gandham uttamam // HV_App.I,41.1775 //
