GE07hv_apppu:18859: te daityās tena gandhena kiṃcid vismayam āgatāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18860: prasannamanaso bhūtvā paraṃ saukhyam upāgatāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1777 //
GE07hv_apppu:18861: ūcuś ca sahitāḥ sarve tena gandhena darpitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18862: puṣpamātrasya yadvīryaṃ kiṃ tasya phalato bhavet // HV_App.I,41.1779 //
GE07hv_apppu:18864: śubhāś caivāśubhāś caiva buddhiprāṇena dehinām // HV_App.I,41.1781 //
GE07hv_apppu:18868: pītvā ca sahitāḥ sarve prasthitāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1785 //
GE07hv_apppu:18870: divaṃ ca vasudhāṃ caiva bhokṣyāmaḥ saha śatrubhīḥ // HV_App.I,41.1787 //
GE07hv_apppu:18872: sarvagrahāṃś ca gṛhṇīmaḥ sudhāṃ ca vasudhātale // HV_App.I,41.1789 //
GE07hv_apppu:18874: prabhāṣya vacanaṃ devā mandarasya prakampane // HV_App.I,41.1791 //
GE07hv_apppu:18877: na śekus te samuddhartuṃ śailendraṃ danuvaṃśajāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18878: nipetur jānubhir juṣṭā vipule parvatāntare // HV_App.I,41.1795 //
GE07hv_apppu:18882: jñātvā bahuvidhair vākyair vyājahāra sarasvatīm // HV_App.I,41.1799 //
GE07hv_apppu:18885: ādityair vasubhiś caiva rudraiś ca samarudgaṇaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18886: devair yakṣaiḥ sagandharvaiḥ kiṃnaraiś ca pragāthibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1803
GE07hv_apppu:18887: sametya sahitaiḥ sarvaiḥ śakya uddharituṃ giriḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18891: etac chrutvā ca vacanaṃ sarveṣām antike tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:18892: daiteyā bāhubalino manobhir vāgbhir eva ca // HV_App.I,41.1809 //
GE07hv_apppu:18895: na ca kecit pibanty anye devā naiva ca dānavāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18896: yatra puṣkaraṃ vinyastaṃ sahitair devadānavaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1811 //
GE07hv_apppu:18899: mandaraṃ puṣkaraṃ kṛtvā netraṃ vāsukim eva ca // HV_App.I,41.1813 //
GE07hv_apppu:18901: kūrmapṛṣṭaṃ tataḥ prāpya mandaraṃ nyastavāṃs tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:18902: viṣṇur eva mahābāhuḥ parvataṃ yantravat tataḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:18904: yataḥ pucchaṃ tato devā asurā mastake sthitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18905: etasya ha saniśvāsā ukṣitā asurās tadā // **HV_App.I,41.1813**59:5 //
GE07hv_apppu:18906: samāḥ sahasraṃ mathitaṃ jalam oṣadhibhiḥ saha /
GE07hv_apppu:18910: mathyamāne tatas tasya samutpattiḥ krameṇa saḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:18914: kalaśāt tat samudbhūtam amṛtaṃ tatra dṛṣṭavān //
GE07hv_apppu:18915: taj jahrur asurāḥ pūrvam ākrāntā lobhamanyunā // HV_App.I,41.1816 //
GE07hv_apppu:18916: [k: Ñ2 B G3 ins. after line 1816, V1 after line 1817:k]
GE07hv_apppu:18918: dhanvataris tathā madyaṃ śrīr devī kaustubho maṇiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18920: uccaiḥśravā hayo ramyaḥ pīyūṣaṃ tadanantaram // HV_App.I,41.1819 //
GE07hv_apppu:18921: paścād devās tadādātum udyatā rāhum abruvan /
GE07hv_apppu:18923: dṛṣṭvā daityaṃ sthitaṃ pātuṃ madhye taṃ rāhum avyayam /
GE07hv_apppu:18924: na tu kecit pibanty ete daityā naiva ca dānavāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1821 //
GE07hv_apppu:18925: cicchedātha hariḥ saṃkhye rāhoś cakreṇa kaṃ tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:18926: anirbhuktaṃ pitṛgaṇair munibhiś ca sanātanaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1823 //
GE07hv_apppu:18932: daiteyā dānaveyāś ca kim icchanti parākramāt // HV_App.I,41.1827 //
GE07hv_apppu:18935: tapa icchanti sahitā devāḥ satyaparākramāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1829 //
GE07hv_apppu:18937: yajate brahmaṇaḥ kṣetre prāptaiśvaryaḥ sa kāmadaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1831 //
GE07hv_apppu:18940: gaṅgāyamunayor madhye yad abhūd vipulaṃ tapaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18941: sameyus tatra sahitā yajamāne mahāsure // HV_App.I,41.1835 //
GE07hv_apppu:18943: yatayaś cāpare siddhā yogadharmeṇa bhārata // HV_App.I,41.1837 //
GE07hv_apppu:18944: munayo vālakhilyāś ca dhanyā dharmeṇa śodhitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18945: bahavo hi dvijā mukhyā nityaṃ dharmaparāyaṇāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1839 //
GE07hv_apppu:18946: ṛṣayaś ca mahābhāgā vipraiḥ pūjyāḥ sahasraśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18947: vipulai ratnavibhavair hriyamāṇais tatas tataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1841 //
GE07hv_apppu:18948: śukras tu saha putreṇa daityaṃ yājayate prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18951: kāmād varaṃ dadānīti tad vai saṃpratipadyatām // HV_App.I,41.1845 //
GE07hv_apppu:18953: hiraṇyakaśipor hastād dve pade padam eva ca // HV_App.I,41.1847 //
GE07hv_apppu:18955: trīṃl lokāṃs tripadaiḥ krāntvā divyaṃ vapur adhārayat // HV_App.I,41.1849
GE07hv_apppu:18962: sa tān svadhāmṛtenāśu pitṝn vai samatarpayat // HV_App.I,41.1856 //
GE07hv_apppu:18963: brahmā tad amṛtaṃ divyaṃ mahendrāya prayacchati /
GE07hv_apppu:18964: akṣayaś cāvyayaś caiva saṃvṛtas tena karmaṇā // HV_App.I,41.1858 //
GE07hv_apppu:18967: taṃ śrutvā śaṅkhaśabdaṃ tu trayo lokāḥ samāhitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18968: nirvṛtiṃ paramāṃ prāptā indraṃ nātham avāpya ca // HV_App.I,41.1862 //
GE07hv_apppu:18970: mandarāgreṣu vihatair jvaladbhir iva pāvakaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1864 //
GE07hv_apppu:18973: tato mahati vṛttānte sthite rājye mahodaye /
GE07hv_apppu:18974: devānāṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ ca sahavāso 'bhavat tadā // HV_App.I,41.1866 //
GE07hv_apppu:18978: svayaṃ ca bhāgaṃ gṛhṇanti yajñakarmaṇi bhārata // HV_App.I,41.1868 //
GE07hv_apppu:18979: prācetasaṃ tato dakṣaṃ dīkṣitvā vai bṛhaspatiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18982: śāmitram akarod rudro bhāgārthe saha nandinā // HV_App.I,41.1872 //
GE07hv_apppu:18983: rudrasyaiva hi tad rūpaṃ dvidhābhūtaṃ tadīpsayā /
GE07hv_apppu:18985: tena yogena rājendra yat tad brahma sanātanam /
GE07hv_apppu:18990: devāś ca bhāgaṃ gṛhṇanti dakṣasya ca mahātmanaḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:18991: tataḥ kruddho mahādevaś cāpam udyamya vīryavān /
GE07hv_apppu:18992: nandinā saha bhūtaiś ca samuttasthau sabhāntare //
GE07hv_apppu:18993: sarūpaiś cāpy arūpaiś ca virūpākṣair ghaṭodaraiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:18994: ūrdhvanetrair mahākāyair vikaṭair vāmanais tathā // HV_App.I,41.1878 //
GE07hv_apppu:18995: śikhibhir jaṭibhiś caiva tryakṣair vai śaṅkukarṇibhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19000: etaiḥ parivṛto devo makhaṃ taṃ samupārujat // HV_App.I,41.1884 //
GE07hv_apppu:19004: kālāgnir iva dīptārcir jagad dagdhum ivodyataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1888 //
GE07hv_apppu:19005: nandī pinākapāṇiś ca jaghnatur makham uttamam /
GE07hv_apppu:19006: yugānta iva kālāgniḥ kṣipraṃ dagdhum ivodyataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1890 //
GE07hv_apppu:19009: havīṃṣy anye pibanty eva jihvābhis tāmralocanāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19010: bhakṣayanti paśūn anye rasanāntaiḥ pralambibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1894 //
GE07hv_apppu:19011: mumucuś cāpare yūpān prasabhaṃ praharanti ca /
GE07hv_apppu:19012: vahnim anye prasiñcanti vāribhiḥ prahasanti ca // HV_App.I,41.1896 //
GE07hv_apppu:19013: somam anye jahuḥ kecin netrais tāmrajapopamaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19014: darbhān kecid vilumpanti hastaiḥ padmadalaprabhaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1898 //
GE07hv_apppu:19016: cicchiduḥ kāñcanān vṛkṣāñ śobhārtham upakalpitān // HV_App.I,41.1900 //
GE07hv_apppu:19017: bibhiduś caiva bāṇaiś ca mumucuś ca hiraṇmayān /
GE07hv_apppu:19018: lulupuś caiva pātrāṇi mamanthuś cāraṇīm atha // HV_App.I,41.1902 //
GE07hv_apppu:19019: ārujaṃś caiva prāgvaṃśāṃl lulupuś ca samāhitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19020: cakhādire puroḍāśān nakhāgraiś ca cakartire // HV_App.I,41.1904 //
GE07hv_apppu:19021: evaṃ divā ca rātrau ca bhidyamāno mahāmakhaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19022: cukrośa ca mahānādān bhidyamāna ivārṇavaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1906 //
GE07hv_apppu:19026: dhanur vigṛhya jānubhyāṃ jaghāna sa mahākratum // HV_App.I,41.1910 //
GE07hv_apppu:19027: sa viddhas tena bāṇena khaṃ samutpatitaḥ kratuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19028: mṛgo bhūtvā nardamāno brahmāṇam upadhāvati // HV_App.I,41.1912 //
GE07hv_apppu:19029: śareṇābhihatas trāṇaṃ na lebhe praśamaṃ bhuvi /
GE07hv_apppu:19030: śaraṇārthī hy ahaṃ prāptaḥ śareṇāntargatena ca // HV_App.I,41.1914 //
GE07hv_apppu:19031: tam uvāca mṛgaṃ brahmā śubhaṃ sānunayaṃ vacaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19033: evaṃrūpo nabhasi tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi mahāmṛga // HV_App.I,41.1917 //
GE07hv_apppu:19035: tiṣṭhan nakṣatraśirasi saha rudreṇa nityaśaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1919 //
GE07hv_apppu:19036: somena saha saṃyukto hy akṣayeṇāvyayena ca /
GE07hv_apppu:19037: divi saṃcārabhūtaś ca dhruvaś caiva mahādhruvaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1921 //
GE07hv_apppu:19038: jyotiṣāṃ jyotibhūtas tvaṃ dhruvaś caiva mahādhruvaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1922 //
GE07hv_apppu:19039: yac caitad rudhiraṃ divyaṃ kṣatāt samabhiniḥsṛtam /
GE07hv_apppu:19040: nabhasy utpatitaṃ caiva pravegena pradhāvataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1924 //
GE07hv_apppu:19042: nimittabhūtaṃ bhūtānāṃ varṣe varṣapradaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,41.1926 //
GE07hv_apppu:19043: sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ darśane saṃpravartate /
GE07hv_apppu:19046: adbhutaṃ bahucitraṃ ca manasā saṃprakalpitam // HV_App.I,41.1930 //
GE07hv_apppu:19047: na tu rātrau pradṛśyeta khe tu savraṇasaṃjñitam /
GE07hv_apppu:19048: dinasyaiva sadā tv agre mahat kāryaṃ pradṛśyate /
GE07hv_apppu:19049: bhūmāv eva samuttiṣṭhed ākāśe pravilīyate // HV_App.I,41.1933 //
GE07hv_apppu:19050: śataśaś ca samaṃ sarve pradhāvanti pracetasaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19051: bhayād rudrasya mahato dhanvino bāṇapāṇayaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1935 //
GE07hv_apppu:19055: prātiṣṭhata mahābāhuḥ pāṇinā cakram ādadhat // HV_App.I,41.1939 //
GE07hv_apppu:19056: gadāṃ saghaṇṭām anyena khaḍgam anyena pāṇinā /
GE07hv_apppu:19059: śaṅkhaṃ cāpratimaṃ loke śarāṃś ca nataparvaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1943 //
GE07hv_apppu:19060: viṣṇur agre sthito bhāti sabalaḥ saṃhatāñjaliḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19062: ādityā vasavaś caiva divyaiḥ praharaṇaiḥ saha /
GE07hv_apppu:19063: viṣṇum evābhitaḥ sarve tiṣṭhanti jvalanaprabhāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1947 //
GE07hv_apppu:19064: marutaś caiva viśve ca rudram evābhipedire /
GE07hv_apppu:19065: gandharvakiṃnarāś caiva nāgā yakṣāḥ sapannagāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1949 //
GE07hv_apppu:19066: ṛṣayo nyastadaṇḍāś ca ubhayoḥ pakṣayor hitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19067: jvalantaḥ śāntaye nityaṃ lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā // HV_App.I,41.1951 //
GE07hv_apppu:19070: na cakampe tadā viṣṇuḥ sarvātmā sarvasaṃbhavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19071: na ca roṣamanā nityaṃ vṛtaḥ sarvaiḥ ṣaḍindriyaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1955 //
GE07hv_apppu:19072: viṣṇuś ca dhanur ādāya śareṇa samayojayat /
GE07hv_apppu:19074: sa viddhas tena bāṇena mahādevo na kampate /
GE07hv_apppu:19076: tataḥ prasabham āplutya rudraṃ viṣṇuḥ sanātanam /
GE07hv_apppu:19077: kaṇṭhe jagrāha bhagavān nīlakaṇṭhas tato 'bhavat // HV_App.I,41.1961 //
GE07hv_apppu:19079: sarvabhūtāgamācāryo mama kartā ca karmaṇām // HV_App.I,41.1963 //
GE07hv_apppu:19080: karmaṇāṃ ca prakartā ca vikartā caiva bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:19081: aroṣatvāc ca bhūtānāṃ sarvabhūteṣu cottamaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1965 //
GE07hv_apppu:19082: svayam eva hi yat karma vidhatte karmayoniṣu /
GE07hv_apppu:19085: tayoḥ śubhatamo rājan svayam eva tathākarot // HV_App.I,41.1967 //
GE07hv_apppu:19087: siddhānāṃ vadanonmuktāḥ sanātana namo 'stu te // HV_App.I,41.1969 //
GE07hv_apppu:19089: mūrdhany abhijaghānājau viṣṇuṃ krodhena mūrchitaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1971 //
GE07hv_apppu:19090: tataḥ prahasito viṣṇur nandīṃ dṛṣṭvā surottamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19091: stambhayām āsa bhagavān sarvabhūtapatir hariḥ // HV_App.I,41.1973 //
GE07hv_apppu:19092: viṣṇur brahmasamo bhūtvā tejasā prajvalann iva /
GE07hv_apppu:19093: kṣamayā ca samāyuktaḥ sthitaḥ sthāṇur ivācalaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1975 //
GE07hv_apppu:19094: acintyaś cāprameyaś ca ajeyaś cāpy ariṃdamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19095: yugāntāgnisamo bhūtvā śāntātmā harir avyayaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1977 //
GE07hv_apppu:19096: prasannaḥ kalpayām āsa bhāgaṃ rudrāya dhīmate /
GE07hv_apppu:19097: viṣṇur dharmaparo nityaṃ tyaktakāmaḥ surarṣabhaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1979 //
GE07hv_apppu:19098: viṣṇūnā caiva rājendra sa yajñaḥ saṃdhitaḥ punaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19099: yathāpakṣaṃ ca te sarve gaṇā āsan mahīpate /
GE07hv_apppu:19100: tasmin yuddhe mahāghore viṣṇo rudrasya caiva ha // HV_App.I,41.1982 //
GE07hv_apppu:19102: vināśaś caiva yajñasya tadā loke pratiṣṭhitaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1984 //
GE07hv_apppu:19104: dakṣo yajñaphalaṃ caiva prāptavān sa prajāpatiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1986 //
GE07hv_apppu:19106: śrāvayed yas tu viprebhyaḥ śuciḥ prayatamānasaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19107: adhītya sarvam adhyātmaṃ devaloke mahīyate // HV_App.I,41.1989 //
GE07hv_apppu:19108: [k: K1.2 Ñ2 V1.3 B2 Dn D4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19111: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 42, transliterated by N. Hanemann, proof--read
GE07hv_apppu:19112: by Horst Brinkhaus, version of September 19, 2001 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:19113: [k: K Ñ2 V1.3B Dcont. after App. I, No. 41; Ñ1 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 cont.
GE07hv_apppu:19117: satāṃ kathayatāṃ vipra vārāha iti naḥ śrutaḥ // HV_App.I,42.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:19118: na jāne tv asya caritaṃ nikhilaṃ ca savistaram /
GE07hv_apppu:19119: na dharmaguṇasaṃsthānaṃ na hetuṃ na manīṣitam // HV_App.I,42.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:19121: kimācāraḥ kiṃprabhāvaḥ kiṃ vā tena purā kṛtam // HV_App.I,42.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:19122: etan me śaṃsa tattvena vārāhaṃ śrutivistaram /
GE07hv_apppu:19123: yajñārthaṃ ca sametānāṃ dvijātīnāṃ mahātmanām // HV_App.I,42.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:19126: pramāṇārthaṃ dvijaśreṣṭha tan me vada mahāmune //
GE07hv_apppu:19129: [k: Ñ2 B Dn Ds D3.5 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19131: samāhitamanā bhūtvā śṛṇu rājan yathātatham // HV_App.I,42.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:19133: yathā nārāyaṇo devo vārāhaṃ vapur āsthitaḥ // HV_App.I,42.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:19138: śuciḥ prayatnavān bhūtvā nibodha janamejaya // HV_App.I,42.15 //
GE07hv_apppu:19139: idaṃ purāṇaṃ paramaṃ puṇyaṃ vedaiś ca saṃmitam /
GE07hv_apppu:19141: purāṇam etad akhilaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ yogaṃ ca veda yaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19142: kārtsnyena vidhinā proktaṃ so 'syārthaṃ vedayiṣyati // HV_App.I,42.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:19144: prajānāṃ patayaś caiva sapta caiva maharṣayaḥ // HV_App.I,42.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:19146: [k: T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. for line 22 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19149: daityāḥ piśācā nāgāś ca bhūtāni vividhāni ca /
GE07hv_apppu:19150: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrā mlecchādayo bhuvi // HV_App.I,42.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:19152: jaṅgamāni ca sattvāni yac cānyajjīvasaṃjñitam // HV_App.I,42.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:19156: śikhābhir vidhamaṃl lokān saṃśoṣayati dehinaḥ // HV_App.I,42.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:19162: pūrvadevagaṇāś caiva trayastriṃśac ca chandajāḥ // HV_App.I,42.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:19163: tasminn ahani saṃprāpte taṃ haṃsaṃ mahadakṣaram /
GE07hv_apppu:19164: praviśanti mahāyogaṃ hariṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum // HV_App.I,42.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:19166: yathā sūryasya satatam udayāstamayāv iha // HV_App.I,42.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:19168: tasmiñ jīvakṛtaṃ sarvaṃ niḥśeṣam avatiṣṭhate // HV_App.I,42.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:19170: kṛtvātmagarbhaṃ bhagavān āsta eko jagadguruḥ // HV_App.I,42.45 //
GE07hv_apppu:19171: yaḥ sraṣṭā sarvabhūtānāṃ kalpānteṣu punaḥ punaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19172: avyaktaḥ śāśvato devas tasya sarvam idaṃ jagat // HV_App.I,42.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:19176: amaryādākule raudre sarvatas tamasā vṛte // HV_App.I,42.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:19184: vakṣo bibhran mahābāhuḥ savidyud iva toyadaḥ // HV_App.I,42.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:19186: patnī cāsya svayaṃ lakṣmīr deham āśritya tiṣṭhati // HV_App.I,42.61 //
GE07hv_apppu:19188: kim apy amitavikrānto yoganidrām upāgataḥ // HV_App.I,42.63 //
GE07hv_apppu:19191: tato yugasahasre tu pūrṇe sa puruṣottamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19192: svayam eva vibhur bhūtvā budhyate vibudhādhipaḥ // HV_App.I,42.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:19193: tataś cintayate bhūyaḥ sṛṣṭiṃ lokasya lokakṛt /
GE07hv_apppu:19196: saṃbhavaṃ sarvalokasya vidadhāti sa vākpatiḥ // HV_App.I,42.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:19197: kartā caiva vikartā ca saṃhartā ca prajāpatiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19198: dhātā vidhātā prabhavaḥ saṃyamo niyamo yamaḥ // HV_App.I,42.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:19202: [k: Ñ2 V1.3 B1.2 Ds T1.2 G4.5 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19204: [k: Ñ2 V1.3 B1.2 Ds cont., K Ñ1 B3 Dn D1-6 ins. after line 74:k]
GE07hv_apppu:19207: [k: Ñ1.2 V1.3 B Dn2 Ds D3.5.6 T2 G1.4.5 M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19208: nārāyaṇaparo devo na bhūto na bhaviṣyati /
GE07hv_apppu:19209: sa svayaṃbhūr iti jñeyaḥ sa brahmā bhuvanādhipaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19210: sa vāyur iti vijñeya eṣa yajñaḥ prajāpatiḥ // HV_App.I,42.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:19211: sadasac ca sa vijñeyaḥ sa yajñaḥ sa prajākaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19212: yad veditavyaṃ tridaśais tad eṣa parivindati /
GE07hv_apppu:19213: yac ca vedyaṃ bhagavato devā api na tad viduḥ // HV_App.I,42.80 //
GE07hv_apppu:19214: prajānāṃ patayaḥ sapta ṛṣayaś ca sahāmaraiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19215: nāsyāntam adhigacchanti tenānanta iti śrutiḥ // HV_App.I,42.82 //
GE07hv_apppu:19216: yad asya paramaṃ rūpaṃ tan na paśyanti devatāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19217: prādurbhāveṣu saṃbhūtaṃ yat tad arcanti devatāḥ // HV_App.I,42.84 //
GE07hv_apppu:19218: [k: T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. for line 84:k]
GE07hv_apppu:19219: prādurbhāve tu yad rūpaṃ tad arcanti divaikasaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19220: darśitaṃ yad anenaiva tad avekṣanti devatāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19221: yan na darśitavān devaḥ kas tad anveṣṭum arhati // HV_App.I,42.86 //
GE07hv_apppu:19223: tejasas tapasaś caiva nidhānam amṛtasya ca // HV_App.I,42.88 //
GE07hv_apppu:19226: tad eṣa saṃhṛtya jagat kṛtvā garbhastham ātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19233: tadāsṛjaj jagad idam ātmanā prabhuḥ || HV_App.I,42.96 ||
GE07hv_apppu:19236: jagadaṇḍam idaṃ sarvam āsīt pūrvaṃ hiraṇmayam /
GE07hv_apppu:19237: prajāpater bhūtimayam itīyaṃ vaidikī śrutiḥ // HV_App.I,42.98 //
GE07hv_apppu:19241: cakāra jagataś cātra vibhāgaṃ sarvabhāgavit // HV_App.I,42.102 //
GE07hv_apppu:19242: yac chidram ūrdhvam ākāśaṃ parā sukṛtināṃ gatiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19243: vihitaṃ viśvayogena yad adhas tad rasātalam // HV_App.I,42.104 //
GE07hv_apppu:19245: samantād aṣṭadhā yogī chidrāṇi kṛtavāṃs tu saḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19246: diśaś ca vidiśaḥ sarvā manasaivākarod vibhuḥ // HV_App.I,42.107 //
GE07hv_apppu:19248: bahuvarṇadharāś citrā babhūvus te balāhakāḥ // HV_App.I,42.109 //
GE07hv_apppu:19249: yad aṇḍamadhye skannaṃ tad dravam āsīt samāhitam /
GE07hv_apppu:19250: jātarūpaṃ tad abhavat tat sarvaṃ pṛthivītale // HV_App.I,42.111 //
GE07hv_apppu:19252: pṛthivī nikhilā rājan yugānte sāgarair iva // HV_App.I,42.113 //
GE07hv_apppu:19254: tatra yat salilaṃ skannaṃ so 'bhavat kāñcano giriḥ // HV_App.I,42.115 //
GE07hv_apppu:19255: tenāmbhasā plutāḥ sarvā diśaś copadiśas tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:19256: antarikṣaṃ ca nākaṃ ca yac cānyat kiṃcid antaram // HV_App.I,42.117 //
GE07hv_apppu:19257: yatra yatra jalaṃ skannaṃ tatra tatrotthito giriḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19258: śailaiḥ sahasrair gahanā viṣamā medinī kṛtā // HV_App.I,42.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:19260: pīḍitā gurubhir devī pṛthivī vyathitābhavat // HV_App.I,42.121 //
GE07hv_apppu:19262: hiraṇmayaṃ samuddiṣṭaṃ tejo vimalarūpi tat // HV_App.I,42.123 //
GE07hv_apppu:19263: aśaktā vai dhārayitum adhastāt praviveśa ha /
GE07hv_apppu:19264: pīḍyamānā bhagavatas tejasā tena sā kṣitiḥ // HV_App.I,42.125 //
GE07hv_apppu:19265: pṛthivīṃ viśatīṃ dṛṣṭvā tām adho madhusūdanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19266: uddhārārthaṃ manaś cakre tasyāḥ sa hitakāmyayā // HV_App.I,42.127 //
GE07hv_apppu:19269: rasātalaṃ viśed devī paṅke gaur iva durbalā // HV_App.I,42.129 //
GE07hv_apppu:19278: tvayātmā dhāryate deva tvayā saṃdhāryate jagat /
GE07hv_apppu:19279: tvaṃ dhārayasi bhūtāni bhuvanaṃ tvaṃ bibharṣi ca // HV_App.I,42.135 //
GE07hv_apppu:19280: yat tvayā dhāryate kiṃcit tejasā ca balena ca /
GE07hv_apppu:19281: tatas tava prasādena mayā paścāt tu dhāryate // HV_App.I,42.137 //
GE07hv_apppu:19282: tvayā dhṛtaṃ dhārayāmi nādhṛtaṃ dhārayāmy aham /
GE07hv_apppu:19283: na hi tad vidyate bhūtaṃ yat tvayā nāvadhāryate // HV_App.I,42.139 //
GE07hv_apppu:19284: tvam eva kuruṣe vīra nārāyaṇa yuge yuge /
GE07hv_apppu:19287: trāyasva māṃ suraśreṣṭha tvām eva śaraṇaṃ gatām // HV_App.I,42.143 //
GE07hv_apppu:19289: tvām eva śaraṇaṃ nityam upayāmi sanātanam // HV_App.I,42.145 //
GE07hv_apppu:19290: tāvan me 'sti bhayaṃ bhūyo yāvan na tvāṃ kakudminam /
GE07hv_apppu:19291: śaraṇaṃ yāmi manasā śataśo 'py upalakṣitā // HV_App.I,42.147 //
GE07hv_apppu:19293: mā bhair dharaṇi kalyāṇi śāntiṃ vraja samāhitā /
GE07hv_apppu:19294: eṣa tvām ucitaṃ sthānaṃ mānayāmi manīṣitam // HV_App.I,42.149 //
GE07hv_apppu:19296: tato mahātmā manasā divyaṃ rūpam acintayat /
GE07hv_apppu:19297: kiṃ nu rūpam ahaṃ kṛtvā uddharāmi vasuṃdharām // HV_App.I,42.151 //
GE07hv_apppu:19298: jale nimagnāṃ dharaṇīṃ yenāhaṃ vai samuddhare /
GE07hv_apppu:19299: ity evaṃ cintayitvā tu devas tatkaraṇe matim // HV_App.I,42.153 //
GE07hv_apppu:19301: harir uddharaṇe yuktas tadā bhūmeḥ sa bhūmidhṛk // HV_App.I,42.155 //
GE07hv_apppu:19309: rūpam āsthāya vipulaṃ vārāham amitaṃ hariḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19314: ājyanāsaḥ sruvas tuṇḍaḥ sāmaghoṣasvano mahān // HV_App.I,42.168 //
GE07hv_apppu:19325: bhūtvā yajñavarāho 'sau drāgadhaḥ prāviśad guruḥ // HV_App.I,42.179 //
GE07hv_apppu:19326: adbhiḥ saṃchāditām urvīṃ sa tām ārchat prajāpatiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19330: mumoca pūrvaṃ sahasā dhārayitvā dharādharaḥ // HV_App.I,42.184 //
GE07hv_apppu:19331: tato jagāma nirvāṇaṃ medinī tasya dhāraṇāt /
GE07hv_apppu:19332: cakāra ca namaskāraṃ tasmai devāya śaṃbhave // HV_App.I,42.186 //
GE07hv_apppu:19334: uddhṛtā pṛthivī devī lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā // HV_App.I,42.188 //
GE07hv_apppu:19337: rasātalagatām evaṃ vicintya sa surottamaḥ // HV_App.I,42.191 //
GE07hv_apppu:19340: [k: T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. for lines 192-193 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19347: tasyopari jalaughasya mahatī naur iva sthitā /
GE07hv_apppu:19348: vitatatvāt tu dehasya na yayau saṃplavaṃ mahī // HV_App.I,42.197 //
GE07hv_apppu:19349: tataḥ sa cintayām āsa pravibhāgaṃ kṣiter vibhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19350: samucchrayaṃ ca sarveṣāṃ parvatānāṃ samantataḥ // HV_App.I,42.199 //
GE07hv_apppu:19351: vilekhanaṃ pramāṇaṃ ca gatiṃ prasavam eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:19352: māhātmyaṃ ca viśeṣaṃ ca nadīnām anvacintayat // HV_App.I,42.201 //
GE07hv_apppu:19353: caturantāṃ dharāṃ kṛtvā kṛtvā caiva mahārṇavam /
GE07hv_apppu:19354: madhye pṛthivyāḥ sauvarṇam akaron meruparvatam // HV_App.I,42.203 //
GE07hv_apppu:19360: nityapuṣpaphalān vṛkṣān kṛtavāṃs tatra parvate // HV_App.I,42.209 //
GE07hv_apppu:19362: cakāra sa mahādevaḥ punaḥ saumanasaṃ girim // HV_App.I,42.211 //
GE07hv_apppu:19366: vedikāṃ bahuvarṇāṃ ca saṃdhyābhrābhām akalpayat // HV_App.I,42.213 //
GE07hv_apppu:19370: kṛtavān ātmanaḥ sthānaṃ viśvakarmā prajāpatiḥ // HV_App.I,42.217 //
GE07hv_apppu:19374: cakāra pulinopetāṃ vasudhārām iti śrutiḥ // HV_App.I,42.221 //
GE07hv_apppu:19375: sā diśaṃ nikhilāṃ prācīṃ puṇyair mukhaśataiś citām /
GE07hv_apppu:19378: bhūṣitābhyadhikaṃ kāntaiḥ sā nadītīrajair drumaiḥ // HV_App.I,42.225 //
GE07hv_apppu:19379: kṛtvā prācīvibhāgaṃ tu dakṣiṇāyām atho diśi /
GE07hv_apppu:19380: cakāra parvataṃ ramyaṃ sarvaṃ kāñcanarājatam // HV_App.I,42.227 //
GE07hv_apppu:19382: sa bibhracchuśubhe 'tīva dvau varṇau parvatottamaḥ // HV_App.I,42.229 //
GE07hv_apppu:19384: vapuṣmantam atho tatra bhānumantaṃ mahāgirim // HV_App.I,42.231 //
GE07hv_apppu:19388: ṛṣabhapratimaṃ caiva ṛṣabhaṃ nāma parvatam // HV_App.I,42.235 //
GE07hv_apppu:19390: mahendram atha śailendraṃ śatayojanam ucchritam // HV_App.I,42.237 //
GE07hv_apppu:19392: medinyāṃ kṛtavān devaḥ pratikṣobham ivācalam // HV_App.I,42.239 //
GE07hv_apppu:19396: dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi śubhaṃ cakāra sa mahācalam /
GE07hv_apppu:19402: diśaṃ yāmyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya pratīcīṃ diśam āgamat /
GE07hv_apppu:19404: śobhitaṃ śikharaiś citraiḥ supravṛddhair hiraṇmayaiḥ // HV_App.I,42.251 //
GE07hv_apppu:19405: kāñcanībhiḥ śilābhiś ca guhābhiś ca vibhūṣitam /
GE07hv_apppu:19406: samākulaṃ sūryanibhaiḥ sālais tālaiś ca bhāsvaraiḥ // HV_App.I,42.253 //
GE07hv_apppu:19409: merupratimarūpāṇi vapuṣā prabhayā ca ha // HV_App.I,42.256 //
GE07hv_apppu:19415: rājatāḥ kāñcanāś caiva yatra divyāḥ śiloccayāḥ // HV_App.I,42.262 //
GE07hv_apppu:19422: śubhām atirasāṃ caiva ghṛtadhārām iti śrutiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19423: varāhaḥ saritaṃ puṇyāṃ pratīcyām akarot prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,42.270 //
GE07hv_apppu:19428: sa tu deśo visūryo 'pi tasya bhāsā prakāśate // HV_App.I,42.275 //
GE07hv_apppu:19429: tasya lakṣmyādhikaṃ bhāti tapatā raviṇā yathā /
GE07hv_apppu:19432: cakāra ratnasaṃkīrṇaṃ bhūyo 'staṃ nāma parvatam // HV_App.I,42.279 //
GE07hv_apppu:19438: śubhraṃ pāṇḍurameghābhaṃ kailāsaṃ ca nagottamam // HV_App.I,42.285 //
GE07hv_apppu:19440: niveśayām āsa harir vārāhīṃ tanum āsthitaḥ // HV_App.I,42.287 //
GE07hv_apppu:19442: madhudhārāṃ sa kṛtavān divyāṃ mukhaśatākulām // HV_App.I,42.289 //
GE07hv_apppu:19444: tadā kṛtā bhagavatā vicitrāḥ parameṣṭhinā // HV_App.I,42.291 //
GE07hv_apppu:19445: sa kṛtvā pravibhāgaṃ tu pṛthivyā lokabhāvanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19454: tasya cintayato vaktrān niḥsṛtaḥ puruṣaḥ kila // HV_App.I,42.299 //
GE07hv_apppu:19455: tataḥ sa puruṣo devaṃ kiṃ karomīty upasthitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19457: vibhajātmānam ity uktvā gato 'ntardhānam īśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,42.302 //
GE07hv_apppu:19459: praśāntasyeva dīpasya gatis tasya na vidyate // HV_App.I,42.304 //
GE07hv_apppu:19461: hiraṇyagarbho bhagavān ya eṣa cchandasi śrutaḥ // HV_App.I,42.306 //
GE07hv_apppu:19468: katham ātmā vibhajyaḥ syāt saṃśayo hy atra me mahān // HV_App.I,42.310 //
GE07hv_apppu:19469: iti cintayatas tasya om ity evotthitaḥ svaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19470: sa bhūmāv antarikṣe ca nāke ca kṛtavān svanam // HV_App.I,42.312 //
GE07hv_apppu:19476: tatpadaṃ saṃsmaran divyāṃ sāvitrīm akarot prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,42.318 //
GE07hv_apppu:19478: cakāra nikhilān vedān brahmayuktena karmaṇā // HV_App.I,42.320 //
GE07hv_apppu:19479: tatas tasyaiva manasaḥ sanaḥ sanaka eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:19480: sanātanaś ca bhagavān varadaś ca sanandanaḥ // HV_App.I,42.322 //
GE07hv_apppu:19481: sanatkumāraś ca vibhus tatra jajñe sanātanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19482: mānasāś caiva pūrvādyā ity ete ṣaṇmaharṣayaḥ // HV_App.I,42.324 //
GE07hv_apppu:19483: brahmāṇaṃ kapilaṃ caiva ṣaḍ etāṃś caiva yoginaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19484: yatayo yogatantreṣu yān stuvanti dvijātayaḥ // HV_App.I,42.326 //
GE07hv_apppu:19485: tato marīcim atriṃ ca pulastyaṃ pulahaṃ kratum /
GE07hv_apppu:19486: bhṛgum aṅgirasaṃ caiva manuṃ caiva prajāpatim // HV_App.I,42.328 //
GE07hv_apppu:19488: maharṣīn asṛjac chaṃbhur aṣṭāv etāṃs tu mānasān // HV_App.I,42.330 //
GE07hv_apppu:19489: ete yugasahasrānte yāś caiṣām abhavan prajāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19490: kalpe niḥśeṣamukte tu tato gacchanti nirvṛtim // HV_App.I,42.332 //
GE07hv_apppu:19495: kiṃ tu karmaviśeṣeṇa devatānāṃ yuge yuge /
GE07hv_apppu:19497: aṅguṣṭhād dakṣiṇād dakṣa utpanno bhagavān ṛṣiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19498: tasthaiva tu punar bhāryā vāmāṅguṣṭhād ajāyata // HV_App.I,42.338 //
GE07hv_apppu:19500: yābhir vyāptās trayo lokāḥ prajābhir manujādhipa // HV_App.I,42.340 //
GE07hv_apppu:19501: aditiṃ ca ditiṃ kālām anāyuṃ siṃhikāṃ munim /
GE07hv_apppu:19502: prādhāṃ krodhāṃ ca surabhiṃ vinatāṃ surasāṃ tathā // HV_App.I,42.342 //
GE07hv_apppu:19504: irāṃ krodhavaśāṃ caiva surasāṃ ca trayodaśa /
GE07hv_apppu:19505: danuṃ kadrūṃ ca duhitṝḥ pradadau kaśyapāya tu /
GE07hv_apppu:19507: arundhatīṃ vasuṃ yāmīṃ lambāṃ bhānuṃ marutvatīm /
GE07hv_apppu:19508: saṃkalpāṃ ca muhūrtāṃ ca sādhyāṃ viśvāṃ ca bhārata // HV_App.I,42.346 //
GE07hv_apppu:19509: manave brahmaputrāya kanyā dakṣo dadau daśa /
GE07hv_apppu:19510: tāś ca sarvān avadyāṅgyaḥ kanyāḥ kamalalocanāḥ // HV_App.I,42.348 //
GE07hv_apppu:19511: [k: K1.2 Ñ2 B1.3 Ds D3-6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19513: kīrtiṃ lakṣmīṃ dhṛtiṃ puṣṭiṃ buddhiṃ medhāṃ kriyāṃ tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:19514: matiṃ lajjāṃ vasuṃ caiva dakṣo dharmāya vai dadau // HV_App.I,42.350 //
GE07hv_apppu:19515: ātreyas tu tato bhūtas tasya toyātmakaḥ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19516: putro gṛhāṇām adhipaḥ sahasrāṃśus tamisrahā // HV_App.I,42.352 //
GE07hv_apppu:19518: rohiṇīpramukhāḥ kanyā dakṣaḥ prācetaso dadau // HV_App.I,42.354 //
GE07hv_apppu:19519: etāsāṃ putrapautraṃ tu procyamānaṃ mayā śṛṇu /
GE07hv_apppu:19520: kaśyapasya manoś caiva dharmasya śaśinas tathā // HV_App.I,42.356 //
GE07hv_apppu:19521: aryamā varuṇo mitraḥ pūṣā dhātā puraṃdaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19522: tvaṣṭā bhago 'ṃśaḥ savitā parjanyaś ceti viśrutāḥ // HV_App.I,42.358 //
GE07hv_apppu:19524: dityāṃ putradvayaṃ jajño kaśyapād iti naḥ śrutam // HV_App.I,42.360 //
GE07hv_apppu:19526: dvāv apy amitavikrāntau tapasā kaśyapopamau // HV_App.I,42.362 //
GE07hv_apppu:19534: bhavāya tu bhavaṃ devaṃ śrīgarbhaṃ parameśvaram /
GE07hv_apppu:19536: akṣayaṃ paramaṃ devam avyayaṃ bhavanaṃ param /
GE07hv_apppu:19537: parāc ca paramaṃ devaṃ parāvaraparaṃ param //
GE07hv_apppu:19543: [k: K1.2 Ñ1 B Ds D4.6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19544: prahrādaś caiva saṃhrādas tathānuhrāda eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:19545: hradaś caiva tu vikrāntaḥ pañcamo 'nuhradas tathā //
GE07hv_apppu:19546: prahrādaḥ pūrvajas teṣām anuhrādas tato 'paraḥ // HV_App.I,42.364 //
GE07hv_apppu:19547: saṃhrādaś caiva hrādaś ca kanīyāṃsau babhūvatuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19548: [k: K1.2 Ñ2 B1.2 Dn Ds D3.4.6 T2 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19550: virocanaś ca prāhrādir daityendro 'bhūn mahāyaśāḥ // HV_App.I,42.366 //
GE07hv_apppu:19551: virocanaś ca jambhaś ca sujambhaś ceti viśrutāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19554: balir virocanasuto bāṇa eko baleḥ sutaḥ // HV_App.I,42.368 //
GE07hv_apppu:19557: [k: T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. after line 368:k]
GE07hv_apppu:19558: bales tu putro balavān bāṇa eva pratāpavān // **HV_App.I,42.368**23:1
GE07hv_apppu:19559: anuhlādasya ye putrā khyātāḥ sarvatra bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:19560: danoḥ putrās tu bahavo vaṃśe khyātā mahāsurāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19561: vipracittiḥ prathamajas teṣāṃ rājā babhūva ha // HV_App.I,42.370 //
GE07hv_apppu:19563: raudrāḥ krodhavaśā nāma krūrakarmāṇa eva te // HV_App.I,42.372 //
GE07hv_apppu:19565: grastāraṃ caiva candrasya sūryasya ca vināśanam // HV_App.I,42.374 //
GE07hv_apppu:19568: sahasraśīrṣā śeṣaś ca vāsukis takṣakas tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:19569: bahūnāṃ kadruputrāṇām ete prādhānyam āgatāḥ // HV_App.I,42.378 //
GE07hv_apppu:19572: tārkṣyaś cāriṣṭanemiś ca garuḍaś ca mahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19573: aruṇaś cāruṇiś caiva vinatāyāḥ sutāḥ smṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,42.382 //
GE07hv_apppu:19577: anugāṃ subhagāṃ caiva striyaḥ prādhā vyajāyata // HV_App.I,42.386 //
GE07hv_apppu:19579: surūpā lakṣmaṇā kṣemā tathā rambhā manoramā // HV_App.I,42.388 //
GE07hv_apppu:19580: amitā ca subāhū ca suvṛttā sumukhī tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:19581: supriyā ca sugandhā ca surathā ca pramāthinī // HV_App.I,42.390 //
GE07hv_apppu:19583: viśvāvasur bharaṇyā ca gandharvāś caiva viśrutāḥ // HV_App.I,42.392 //
GE07hv_apppu:19585: ghṛtasthalā ghṛtācī ca viśvācī corvaśī tathā // HV_App.I,42.394 //
GE07hv_apppu:19586: anumloceti vikhyātā pramloceti ca tā daśa /
GE07hv_apppu:19587: manovatī tathā caiva divyā apsarasaḥ smṛtāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19588: prajāpates tu saṃkalpāt saṃbhūtā bhuvanaśriyaḥ // HV_App.I,42.397 //
GE07hv_apppu:19590: surabhyapatyam ity etat purāṇe niścayo mahān // HV_App.I,42.399 //
GE07hv_apppu:19591: etad vai kaśyapāpatyaṃ manor vaṃśaṃ nibodhata /
GE07hv_apppu:19593: viśvedevās tu viśvāyāḥ sādhyā sādhyān vyajāyata /
GE07hv_apppu:19594: marutvatyā marutvanto vasos tu vasavaḥ smṛtāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19595: bhānos tu bhānavas tāta muhūrtās tu muhūrtajāḥ // HV_App.I,42.404 //
GE07hv_apppu:19596: lambā ghoṣaṃ vijajñe 'tha nāgavīthī ca jāmijā /
GE07hv_apppu:19598: saṃkalpāyās tu kauravya jajñe saṃkalpa eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:19599: dharmasya putro lakṣmyās tu kāmo jajñe jagatpriyaḥ // HV_App.I,42.408 //
GE07hv_apppu:19600: yaśo harṣaś ca kāmasya ratyāṃ putradvayaṃ smṛtam /
GE07hv_apppu:19601: somasya putro rohiṇyāṃ jajñe varcā mahāprabhaḥ // HV_App.I,42.410 //
GE07hv_apppu:19602: udayann eva bhagavān varcasvī yena jāyate // HV_App.I,42.411 //
GE07hv_apppu:19604: purūravāś ca bhagavān urvaśī yena yujyate /
GE07hv_apppu:19606: etāvat tu jaganmūlaṃ yatra lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ // HV_App.I,42.413 //
GE07hv_apppu:19607: prajāpatis tu bhagavān guṇataḥ prekṣya dehinaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19609: diśo daśa kṣitim ṛṣayo 'rṇavān nagān @ HV_App.I,42.416 @
GE07hv_apppu:19612: kriyā makhān atha kṛtavān girīṃś ca saḥ || HV_App.I,42.419 ||
GE07hv_apppu:19615: trayāṇām api lokānām ādityānāṃ ca bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:19617: sa vajrī kavacī jiṣṇur adityām abhijajñivān /
GE07hv_apppu:19618: smṛtīsahāyo dyutimān yathā so 'dhvaryubhiḥ stutaḥ // HV_App.I,42.423 //
GE07hv_apppu:19619: jātamātro 'tha bhagavān adityā sa kuśair vṛtah /
GE07hv_apppu:19622: brahmā krameṇa rājyāni vyādeṣṭum upacakrame // HV_App.I,42.427 //
GE07hv_apppu:19624: dvijānām oṣadhīnāṃ ca somaṃ rājye 'bhyaṣecayat // HV_App.I,42.429 //
GE07hv_apppu:19625: dakṣaṃ prajāpatīnāṃ tu ambhasāṃ varuṇaṃ patim /
GE07hv_apppu:19628: gandharvāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ mahādevaḥ kṛtaḥ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19629: gandharvāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ ca śarīriṇām /
GE07hv_apppu:19630: śabdakālabalānāṃ ca vāyur īśas tadā kṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,42.433 //
GE07hv_apppu:19633: pretānāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ mahādevaḥ kṛtaḥ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19634: yakṣāṇāṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca guhyakānāṃ dhanasya ca // HV_App.I,42.437 //
GE07hv_apppu:19635: ratnānāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ kṛto vaiśravaṇaḥ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19636: sarveṣāṃ daṃṣṭriṇāṃ śeṣo nāgānām atha vāsukiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19637: sarīsṛṣāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ prabhur vai takṣakaḥ kṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,42.440 //
GE07hv_apppu:19638: sāgarāṇāṃ nadīnāṃ ca meghānāṃ varṣitasya ca /
GE07hv_apppu:19641: sarvāpsarogaṇānāṃ ca kāmadevaḥ kṛtaḥ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,42.444 //
GE07hv_apppu:19644: daityānāṃ ca mahātejā hiraṇyākṣaḥ prabhuḥ kṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19645: dānavānāṃ ca sarveṣām anīkānāṃ tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,42.448 //
GE07hv_apppu:19649: anāyuṣāyāḥ putrāṇāṃ vṛtro rājā tadā kṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,42.452 //
GE07hv_apppu:19652: siṃhikātanayo yas tu rāhur nāma mahāgrahaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19653: utpātānām anekānām aśubhānāṃ patiḥ kṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,42.454 //
GE07hv_apppu:19654: ṛtūnām atha sarveṣāṃ yugānāṃ caiva bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:19655: pakṣāṇāṃ ca kṣapāṇāṃ ca tathāhastithiparvaṇām // HV_App.I,42.456 //
GE07hv_apppu:19657: kṛtaḥ saṃvatsaro rājā yogasya gaṇitasya ca // HV_App.I,42.458 //
GE07hv_apppu:19658: pakṣiṇām atha sarveṣāṃ nāgānāṃ ca mahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19659: suparṇo bhogināṃ caiva guruḍo 'dhipatiḥ kṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,42.460 //
GE07hv_apppu:19661: [k: Ñ2 Bombay Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19662: yogānāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ sādhyānām adhipaḥ kṛtaḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:19664: [k: T2 G1.3-5 ins. after line 461, T1 after line 463 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19666: rājā prācyāṃ diśi tathā vāsavo 'dhipatiḥ kṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,42.462 //
GE07hv_apppu:19670: amburāja iti khyātaḥ pratīcyāṃ diśi pārthivaḥ // HV_App.I,42.466 //
GE07hv_apppu:19672: ekākṣaḥ piṅgalo nāma saumyāyāṃ diśi pārthivaḥ // HV_App.I,42.468 //
GE07hv_apppu:19674: lokāṃś ca tridive divyān adadāt sa pṛthak pṛthak // HV_App.I,42.470 //
GE07hv_apppu:19679: ye ca bhāsā vibhānty agre saumyās tārāgaṇā iva /
GE07hv_apppu:19680: ete sukṛtināṃ lokā ye jātāḥ puṇyakarmiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,42.476 //
GE07hv_apppu:19684: te tyaktarajasaḥ śāntā yānti tatra tapojjvalāḥ // HV_App.I,42.480 //
GE07hv_apppu:19691: yaśo divaṃ ca pratipedire śubhaṃ @ HV_App.I,42.487 @
GE07hv_apppu:19695: kadācit tu sapakṣās te parvatā dharaṇīdharāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19696: prasthitā dharaṇīṃ tyaktvā nūnaṃ tasyaiva māyayā // HV_App.I,42.490 //
GE07hv_apppu:19698: diśaṃ pratīcīm āgamya hrade 'majjan yathā gajāḥ // HV_App.I,42.492 //
GE07hv_apppu:19700: tac chrutvāthāsurāḥ sarve cakrur udyogam uttamam // HV_App.I,42.494 //
GE07hv_apppu:19701: krūrāṃ ca buddhim atulāṃ pṛthivīharaṇe ratāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19702: āyudhāni ca sarvaṇi jagṛhur bhīmavikramāḥ // HV_App.I,42.496 //
GE07hv_apppu:19703: cakrāśanīṃs tathā khaḍgān bhuśuṇḍīś ca dhanūṃṣi ca /
GE07hv_apppu:19704: prāsān pāśāṃś ca śaktīś ca musalāni gadās tathā // HV_App.I,42.498 //
GE07hv_apppu:19705: kecit kavacinaḥ sajjā mattān nāgān samāsthitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19706: kecid aśvarathān yuktā apare 'śvā mahārathāḥ // HV_App.I,42.500 //
GE07hv_apppu:19707: kecid uṣṭrāṃs tathā khaḍgān mahiṣān gardabhān api /
GE07hv_apppu:19708: svabāhubalam āsthāya kecic cāpi padātayaḥ // HV_App.I,42.502 //
GE07hv_apppu:19710: itaś cetaś ca niścerur hṛṣṭāḥ sarve yuyutsavaḥ // HV_App.I,42.504 //
GE07hv_apppu:19712: daityānāṃ viditodyogāś cakrur udyogam uttamam // HV_App.I,42.506 //
GE07hv_apppu:19717: tatas tūryaninādaiś ca bherīṇāṃ ca mahāsvanaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19720: musalaiḥ paṭṭisaiś caiva chādayām āsa vāsavam // HV_App.I,42.514 //
GE07hv_apppu:19724: parighair āyasaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ kṣepaṇīyaiś ca mudgaraiḥ // HV_App.I,42.518 //
GE07hv_apppu:19726: ghātanībhiś ca gurvībhiḥ śataghnībhis tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,42.520 //
GE07hv_apppu:19727: yugair yantraiś ca nirmuktair argalaiś ca vidāraṇaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19728: sarvān devagaṇān daityāḥ saṃnijaghnuḥ savāsavān // HV_App.I,42.522 //
GE07hv_apppu:19734: te hiraṇyākṣam asuraṃ daityānām agrataḥ sthitam // HV_App.I,42.528 //
GE07hv_apppu:19736: pravivyathuḥ surāḥ sarve tadā śakrapurogamāḥ // HV_App.I,42.530 //
GE07hv_apppu:19743: babhañjur bāhubhir bāhūn dvaṃdvam anye yuyutsavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19744: gadānipātair bhagnāṅgā bāṇaiś ca mathitorasaḥ // HV_App.I,42.538 //
GE07hv_apppu:19746: babhañjire rathān kecit kecit saṃmṛditā rathaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19747: saṃbādham anye saṃprāptā na śekuś calituṃ rathāḥ // HV_App.I,42.541 //
GE07hv_apppu:19748: dānavendrabalaṃ tat tu devānāṃ ca mahad balam /
GE07hv_apppu:19750: hiraṇyākṣaś ca balavān kruddhaḥ sa ditinandanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19751: vyavardhata mahātejāḥ samudra iva parvaṇi // HV_App.I,42.545 //
GE07hv_apppu:19752: tasya kruddhasya sahasā mukhān niścerur arciṣaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19755: divyam ākāśam āvavre parvatair ucchritair iva // HV_App.I,42.549 //
GE07hv_apppu:19757: na śekuś calituṃ devā hiraṇyākṣārditā yudhi // HV_App.I,42.551 //
GE07hv_apppu:19759: na śekur yatnavanto 'pi yatnaṃ kartuṃ vicetasaḥ // HV_App.I,42.553 //
GE07hv_apppu:19761: airāvatagataḥ saṃkhye nāśakac calituṃ bhayāt // HV_App.I,42.555 //
GE07hv_apppu:19762: sarvāṃś ca devān akhilān sa parājitya dānavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19763: stambhayitvā ca deveśam ātmasthaṃ manyate jagat // HV_App.I,42.557 //
GE07hv_apppu:19772: vārāhaḥ parvato nāma yaḥ pūrvaṃ samudāhṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19773: sa eṣa bhūtvā bhagavān ājagāmāsurāntakṛt // HV_App.I,42.565 //
GE07hv_apppu:19777: japyate yo 'maraiḥ sarvair guhyair nāmabhir avyayaḥ // HV_App.I,42.569 //
GE07hv_apppu:19778: sa ca sarvātmani śreṣṭhaḥ sadbhir yaḥ sevyate sadā /
GE07hv_apppu:19779: ijyate ca purāṇaiś ca triloke lokabhāvanaḥ // HV_App.I,42.571 //
GE07hv_apppu:19780: yo vaikuṇṭhaḥ surendrāṇām ananto bhoginām api /
GE07hv_apppu:19781: viṣṇur yo yogaviduṣāṃ yo yajño yajñakarmaṇi // HV_App.I,42.573 //
GE07hv_apppu:19783: ājyaṃ maharṣibhir dattam aśnuvanti tridhā hutam // HV_App.I,42.575 //
GE07hv_apppu:19784: yo naidhano 'gnir daityānāṃ yaḥ surāṇāṃ parā gatiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19785: yaḥ pavitraṃ pavitrāṇāṃ svayaṃbhor api yo vibhuḥ // HV_App.I,42.577 //
GE07hv_apppu:19787: kulāny ākulatāṃ yānti yāni dṛptāni vīryataḥ // HV_App.I,42.579 //
GE07hv_apppu:19789: dadhmau prāṇena balavān vikṣipan daityajīvitam // HV_App.I,42.581 //
GE07hv_apppu:19791: kṣubhitā dānavāḥ sarve diśo daśa vilokayan // HV_App.I,42.583 //
GE07hv_apppu:19793: ko 'yam ity abravīd roṣān nārāyaṇam udaikṣata // HV_App.I,42.585 //
GE07hv_apppu:19797: sūryācandramasor madhye yathā nīlaḥ payodharaḥ // HV_App.I,42.589 //
GE07hv_apppu:19801: na cacāla harir yuddhe 'kampamāna ivācalaḥ // HV_App.I,42.593 //
GE07hv_apppu:19803: tataḥ kruddho hiraṇyākṣaḥ provāca harim uddhataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19804: tiṣṭha tiṣṭha na me 'dya tvaṃ mokṣyase sahajīvitaḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:19807: tasyāḥ śaktyāḥ prahāreṇa brahmā vismayam āgataḥ // HV_App.I,42.596 //
GE07hv_apppu:19808: [k: B D4 Bombay Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19811: tasyāṃ pratihatāyāṃ tu brahmā sādhv iti cābravīt /
GE07hv_apppu:19812: yaḥ prabhuḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ varāhas tena tāḍitaḥ // HV_App.I,42.598 //
GE07hv_apppu:19817: tataś ca bhagavān viṣṇur durvijñeyagatiḥ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19819: mahāvarāhaṃ daityendro muṣṭinā taṃ jaghāna ha //
GE07hv_apppu:19820: tayor yuddhaṃ mahac cāsīd devadaityendrayos tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:19821: tayoḥ śabdo mahān āsīd bāhvoḥ saṃkṣobhajas tadā //
GE07hv_apppu:19822: kṣubdhā devās tadā sarve bhītās tatrāvatathire /
GE07hv_apppu:19824: tasmin yuddhe mahāghore sanakādyās tato harim /
GE07hv_apppu:19847: nirvighnāḥ santu lokāś ca dānavasya vadhād dhare //
GE07hv_apppu:19848: ete devā namasyanti bhītās tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19850: ity uktvā te munivarā vācam āyamya saṃsthitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19851: devāś ca munayaś caiva saṃsthitā bhayaviklavāḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:19854: evaṃ stuto jagannātho vavṛdhe viṣṇur avyayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19855: dānavasya karaṃ gṛhya balād daṇḍam ivāyasam //
GE07hv_apppu:19864: nanāda bhūyo 'pi tato balāt sa tam |
GE07hv_apppu:19891: evaṃ bahūni yuddhāni kṛtvā tau devadānavau /
GE07hv_apppu:19893: niśceṣṭaṃ ca jagat sarvaṃ prādur āsīt samantataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19894: evaṃ saṃkrīḍya bahudhā daityaṃ hantuṃ mano dadhe //
GE07hv_apppu:19897: tato bhagavatā cakram āvidhyād ity asaṃnibham /
GE07hv_apppu:19899: tataḥ sthitasyaiva śiras tasya bhūmau papāta ha /
GE07hv_apppu:19901: hiraṇyākṣe hate daitye ye śeṣās tatra dānavāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19902: sarve tasya bhayatrastā jagmur ārtā diśo daśa // HV_App.I,42.604 //
GE07hv_apppu:19909: vidrāvya tu raṇe sarvān asurān puruṣottamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19910: mumoca tatra baddhāṃs tān puraṃdaramukhān surān // HV_App.I,42.610 //
GE07hv_apppu:19911: tataḥ prakṛtim āpannāḥ sarve devagaṇās tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:19919: [k: D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. after the ref. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19920: natāḥ sma devadeveśa tvāṃ vayaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19921: natāḥ sma viṣṇuṃ sakalaṃ niṣkalaṃ bhūtabhāvanam //
GE07hv_apppu:19923: natāḥ sma bhūtabhavyeśam īḍyam ādiguruṃ harim //
GE07hv_apppu:19924: natāḥ sma varuṇaṃ devam arcitaṃ bhuvaneśvaram /
GE07hv_apppu:19927: namaḥ sarvātmane tubhyaṃ sarvakartre namo namaḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:19929: namaḥ sraṣṭe namo hartre namaḥ kartre jagatpate /
GE07hv_apppu:19930: namo goptre jagannātha namaḥ sthātre namo namaḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:19931: yaṃ prāpya na nivartante yogino yatacetasaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19932: tasmai tubhyaṃ pradhānātman sarvāya jagataḥ pate //
GE07hv_apppu:19936: tvacchāsanād dhi bhagavan kiṃ kurvantv aditeḥ sutāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19937: icchāmaḥ pādaśuśrūṣāṃ tava kartuṃ sanātana // HV_App.I,42.616 //
GE07hv_apppu:19939: uvāca vacanaṃ devān mudā yukto hatadviṣaḥ // HV_App.I,42.618 //
GE07hv_apppu:19940: yo 'yaṃ sa bhavatāṃ loko mayaiva vihitaḥ purā /
GE07hv_apppu:19941: pālyatāṃ sa tu yatnena prādhānyena kvacit kvacit // HV_App.I,42.620 //
GE07hv_apppu:19943: mayaiva pūrvaṃ nirdiṣṭo niyogaḥ paripālyatām // HV_App.I,42.622 //
GE07hv_apppu:19945: idaṃ yathāvat kartavyaṃ satsu cāsatsu ca tvayā // HV_App.I,42.624 //
GE07hv_apppu:19949: yāyajūkāś ca ye kecid brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā viśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19951: yajñair iṣṭvā yāyajūkāḥ phalaṃ te prāpnuvantu ca // HV_App.I,42.626 //
GE07hv_apppu:19954: satyaśūrā dānaśūrā raṇaśūrāś ca ye narāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19955: te svargaphalam aśnantu sadā ye cānasūyakāḥ // HV_App.I,42.630 //
GE07hv_apppu:19957: abrahmaṇyā nāstikāś ca narakaṃ yāntu mānavāḥ // HV_App.I,42.632 //
GE07hv_apppu:19959: yogino māṃ tu ye devaṃ bhajante yogatatparāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19961: sadā māṃ dhyāhi deveśa śreyas tava bhaviṣyati /
GE07hv_apppu:19962: matparo bhava deveśa māṃ namaskuru yatnataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:19963: idam eva paraṃ śreyo nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // **HV_App.I,42.632**35:5
GE07hv_apppu:19965: tato mayi sthite sarvān bādhiṣyante na cārayaḥ // HV_App.I,42.634 //
GE07hv_apppu:19967: devatānāṃ ca sarveṣām abhavad vismayo mahān // HV_App.I,42.636 //
GE07hv_apppu:19969: namaskṛtvā varāhāya nākapṛṣṭham ito gatāḥ // HV_App.I,42.638 //
GE07hv_apppu:19972: vimuktā dānavagaṇaiḥ prakṛtiṃ dharaṇī gatā // HV_App.I,42.641 //
GE07hv_apppu:19973: sthairyahetor dharaṇyās tu jñātvā cāgaskṛtān girīn /
GE07hv_apppu:19975: ciccheda bhagavān pakṣān vajreṇa śataparvaṇā // HV_App.I,42.644 //
GE07hv_apppu:19976: sarveṣām eva pakṣā vai chinnāḥ śakreṇa dhīmatā /
GE07hv_apppu:19977: ekaḥ sapakṣo mainākaḥ surais tatsamayaḥ kṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,42.646 //
GE07hv_apppu:19979: vārāha iti viprendraiḥ purāṇe parikīrtitaḥ // HV_App.I,42.648 //
GE07hv_apppu:19981: nāśūcerna kṛtaghnāya nṛśaṃsāya na kīrtayet // HV_App.I,42.650 //
GE07hv_apppu:19982: [k: Ñ2 Bombay Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19983: na kṣudrāya na nīcāya na gurudveṣakāriṇe /
GE07hv_apppu:19984: nāśiṣyāya tathā rājan na kṛtaghnāya caiva hi //
GE07hv_apppu:19986: jayaiṣibhiś ca śrotavyo devānām eṣa vai jayaḥ // HV_App.I,42.652 //
GE07hv_apppu:19991: ye yajanti makhaiḥ puṇyair daivatāni pitṝn api /
GE07hv_apppu:19992: ātmānam ātmanā nityaṃ viṣṇum eva yajanti te // HV_App.I,42.658 //
GE07hv_apppu:19998: [h: HV (CE) App. 42A, transliterated by Horst Brinkhaus, proof--read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of May 15, 2001 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:19999: [k: K Ñ1.2 V1.3B DT1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 cont. after Appendix I, No. 42 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:20001: vārāha eṣa kathito nārasiṃham ataḥ śṛṇu /
GE07hv_apppu:20002: [k: Before the ref., D6 T1 G3-5 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:20004: vārāha eṣa kathito nārasiṃham ataḥ param /
GE07hv_apppu:20006: yatra bhūtvā mṛgendreṇa hiraṇyakaśipur hataḥ // HV_App.I,42A.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:20011: tataḥ śamadamābhyāṃ ca brahmacaryeṇa caiva ha /
GE07hv_apppu:20012: brahmā prīto 'bhavat tasya tapasā niyamena ca // HV_App.I,42A.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:20013: tataḥ svayaṃbhūr bhagavān svayam āgatya tatra ha /
GE07hv_apppu:20015: ādityair vasubhiḥ sādhyair marudbhir daivataiḥ saha /
GE07hv_apppu:20017: digbhiś cāpi vidigbhiś ca nadībhiḥ sāgarais tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:20018: nakṣatraiś ca muhūrtaiś ca khecaraiś ca mahāgrahaiḥ // HV_App.I,42A.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:20019: devair brahmarṣibhiḥ sārdhaṃ siddhaiḥ saptarṣibhis tathā /

GE07hv_apppu:20834: stutvā nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ brahmalokaṃ gataḥ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,42A.577 //

GE07hv_apppu:20838: tato nṛsiṃho bhagavān prahrādam idam abravīt /
GE07hv_apppu:20839: dhyāhi māṃ satataṃ daitya manaḥśuddhir bhavet tava //

GE07hv_apppu:20868: nṛsiṃha eṣa kathito bhūyo 'yaṃ vāmanaḥ paraḥ /

GE07hv_apppu:20870: baler balavato yajñe balinā viṣṇunā purā /

GE07hv_apppu:20876: kathaṃ nārāyaṇo devo vāmanatvam upāgataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:20877: yaḥ purāṇe purāṇātmā bhūtvā nārāyano vibhuḥ /

GE07hv_apppu:20883: adityā devamātuś ca kathaṃ garbhe 'bhavat prabhuḥ /

GE07hv_apppu:20885: prasūto divi deveśo viṣṇutvaṃ prāptavān katham /
GE07hv_apppu:20886: etad ācakṣva me vipra prādurbhāvaṃ mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:20888: śṛṇu rājan kathāṃ divyām arcitām ṛṣipuṃgavaiḥ /

GE07hv_apppu:20898: tathaikādaśamas tvaṣṭā dvādaśo viṣṇur ucyate // HV_App.I,42B.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:20899: dityāṃ jāto hi bhagavān hiraṇyakaśipuḥ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:20901: gaṇāḥ subahuśo rājan deśe deśe sahasraśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:20902: tasyānujaś ca daityendro hiraṇyākṣo mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:20904: prahrādaś cānuhrādaś ca jambhaḥ saṃhrāda eva ca // HV_App.I,42B.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:20905: virocanas tu prāhrādis tasya putro baliḥ smṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:20906: putrapautraṃ ca balavat teṣām akṣayam avyayam // HV_App.I,42B.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:20910: śaśāsa sarvān daityaindro jitvā devān savāsavān /
GE07hv_apppu:20911: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavān viṣṇur jaghāna harirūpadhṛk //
GE07hv_apppu:20913: gaṇāḥ subahuśo rājan deśe deśe sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.32 //
