GE07hv_apppu:22111: nanāda ditijaśreṣṭho hatas tvaṣṭuḥ śarair mayaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1039 //
GE07hv_apppu:22115: bhīmāṃ sarvāyasīṃ tvaṣṭā puraṃdara ivāśanim // HV_App.I,42B.1043 //
GE07hv_apppu:22117: mayaś ciccheda tīkṣṇāgrais tūrṇaṃ saptabhir āśugaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1045
GE07hv_apppu:22118: tataḥ kṣiṇvann iva prāṇāṃs tvaṣṭuḥ kopān mahāsuraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22119: preṣayām āsa saṃrabdhaḥ śarān barhiṇavāsasaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1047 //
GE07hv_apppu:22120: ciccheda bāṇāṃs tvaṣṭā tāñ jvalitair nataparvabhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22122: tau vṛṣāv iva nardantau balinau vāśitāntare /
GE07hv_apppu:22123: śārdūlāv iva cānyonyaṃ prasaktāv abhijaghnatuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1051 //
GE07hv_apppu:22125: anyonyam abhivīkṣantau kruddhāv āśīviṣāv iva // HV_App.I,42B.1053 //
GE07hv_apppu:22128: tataḥ sa vipulāṃ dīptāṃ mayo rukmāṅgadāṃ gadām /
GE07hv_apppu:22131: gadayā dānavaḥ kruddho vajreṇendra ivācalān // HV_App.I,42B.1059 //
GE07hv_apppu:22132: tataḥ kruddho mahādaityaḥ kṣurābhyāṃ tasya saṃyuge /
GE07hv_apppu:22133: [k: K Ñ1.2 V1.3B D(D6 missing) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22134: punar dvābhyāṃ śarābhyāṃ tu niśitābhyāṃ mahāraṇe /
GE07hv_apppu:22135: dhvajaṃ tvaṣṭur atha cchittvā sūtaṃ ninye yamakṣayam // HV_App.I,42B.1061
GE07hv_apppu:22138: dṛṣṭvā tvaṣṭā hataṃ sūtaṃ kṣurābhyāṃ vinipātitam /
GE07hv_apppu:22139: hatāśvaṃ ratham utsṛjya sūtaṃ ca patitaṃ bhuvi /
GE07hv_apppu:22140: visphārayan mahācāpaṃ sthito bhūmau mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1064 //
GE07hv_apppu:22144: prādahad devasainyāni dāvāgnir iva kānanam // HV_App.I,42B.1068 //
GE07hv_apppu:22147: te papus tasya devasya śoṇitaṃ rukmabhūṣaṇāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22148: āśīviṣā iva kruddhā bhujagāḥ kālacoditāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1072 //
GE07hv_apppu:22150: [k: For line 1073, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22154: astaṃ gacchantam ādityaṃ praviśanta ivāṃśavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1076 //
GE07hv_apppu:22157: te tasya daityasya bhujaṃ savyaṃ nirbhidya patriṇaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22158: vidārya viviśur bhūmiṃ bhujagā iva vegitāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1080 //
GE07hv_apppu:22159: mayas tribhir athānarcchat tvaṣṭāraṃ tu patatribhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22161: [k: For line 1082, B1.3 T1.2 G3-5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22163: tvaṣṭātha mayanirmuktaiḥ sāyakair arditaḥ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1083 //
GE07hv_apppu:22165: taṃ tatra hatasūtāśvaṃ bhujaṃgam iva nirviṣam /
GE07hv_apppu:22166: tvaṣṭāraṃ virathaṃ dṛṣṭvā muditaḥ sa tu dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1086 //
GE07hv_apppu:22168: raṇe 'bhyatiṣṭhad daityendro jvalann iva hutāśanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1088 //
GE07hv_apppu:22173: sarveṣām eva bhūtānāṃ yaḥ prāṇaḥ kathyate dvijaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22174: balinā kālakalpena vāyunā saha saṃgataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1092 //
GE07hv_apppu:22176: nāmṛṣyata yathā matto gajaḥ pratigajasvanam // HV_App.I,42B.1094 //
GE07hv_apppu:22178: raśmijālair ivārkasya vitataṃ sāmbaraṃ jagat // HV_App.I,42B.1096 //
GE07hv_apppu:22179: sa tāmranayanaḥ kruddhaḥ śvasann iva mahoragaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22180: vṛto daityaśatair vāyū raśmivān iva bhāskaraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1098 //
GE07hv_apppu:22182: rukmapuṅkhā vyarājanta haṃsāḥ śreṇīkṛtā iva // HV_App.I,42B.1100 //
GE07hv_apppu:22184: prapatantaḥ sma dṛśyante daityasyāyutaśaḥ śarāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1102 //
GE07hv_apppu:22185: evaṃ sutīkṣṇān khacarāñ śalabhān iva pāvake /
GE07hv_apppu:22186: suvarṇavikṛtāṃś citrān mumoca ditijaḥ śarān // HV_App.I,42B.1104 //
GE07hv_apppu:22187: tam antakam iva kruddham āpatantaṃ sa mārutaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22188: tyaktvā prāṇān atikramya vivyādha navabhiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1106 //
GE07hv_apppu:22189: tasya vegam asaṃhāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā vāyuḥ sanātanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22190: uttamaṃ javam āsthāya vyadhamat sāyakavrajān // HV_App.I,42B.1108 //
GE07hv_apppu:22194: vivyādha daityaṃ viṃśatyā viśikhair nataparvabhiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1110 //
GE07hv_apppu:22196: sādhu sādhv iti vegena siṃhanādaṃ pracakrire // HV_App.I,42B.1112 //
GE07hv_apppu:22200: [k: For line 1115, B1.3 Ds T1.2G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22203: te pīḍayantaḥ pavanaṃ kruddhāḥ sapta mahārathāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22204: prajāsaṃharaṇe ghorāḥ somaṃ sapta grahā iva // HV_App.I,42B.1118 //
GE07hv_apppu:22206: karaṃ gajakarākāram udyamya yudhi mārutaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1120 //
GE07hv_apppu:22207: teṣāṃ mūrdhasu daityānāṃ pātayām āsa vīryavān /
GE07hv_apppu:22208: nihatā vāyuvegena sapta tena mahārathāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1122 //
GE07hv_apppu:22209: tyaktvā prāṇān pulomā tu vivyādha navabhiḥ śaraiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22210: tasyāpi tam asaṃhāryaṃ dṛṣtvā vāyuḥ sanātanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22211: asaṃcintya śaraughāṃs tāñ jvalitān vai pulomataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1125 //
GE07hv_apppu:22217: tataḥ prāvartata nadī raudrarūpā bhayāvahā // HV_App.I,42B.1131 //
GE07hv_apppu:22220: raṇabhūmir abhūd raudrā tatra tatra sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1134 //
GE07hv_apppu:22222: sānukarṣapatākaiś ca sopāsaṅgair dhvajai rathaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1136 //
GE07hv_apppu:22229: tanutraiḥ satalatraiś ca hārair niṣkaiś ca śobhanaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22230: hataiś ca ditijais tatra śastrasyandanavarjitaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1144 //
GE07hv_apppu:22235: vimardo devasainyānāṃ sadṛśaḥ karmaṇāṃ babhau // HV_App.I,42B.1147 //
GE07hv_apppu:22239: tair vadhyamānaḥ sa babhau samantād arpitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1151
GE07hv_apppu:22241: hatvā tu ditijaḥ pṛṣṭham āsādya yudhi varjitān /
GE07hv_apppu:22242: hatvāṣṭau tatra yodhānāṃ śatāni pavanaḥ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22243: kṛtvā mārgaṃ suraśreṣṭhaḥ prayātaḥ sa mahārathaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1153 //
GE07hv_apppu:22244: adyāpi ca suvistīrṇaḥ panthāḥ saṃdṛśyate divi /
GE07hv_apppu:22245: nāmnā vāyupatho nāma siddhāḥ paśyanti taṃ divi // HV_App.I,42B.1155 //
GE07hv_apppu:22246: hayagrīvas tu ditijaḥ pūṣāṇaṃ prati vīryavān /
GE07hv_apppu:22249: pūṣāṇaṃ ditijo 'paśyat kruddho ghoreṇa cakṣuṣā // HV_App.I,42B.1159 //
GE07hv_apppu:22251: muñcataḥ karṣato vāpi dadṛśus tatra nāntaram // HV_App.I,42B.1161 //
GE07hv_apppu:22254: rukmapuṅkhais tatas tasya cāpamuktaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22255: prācchādyanta śilādhautair diśaḥ sūryasya ca prabhāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1165
GE07hv_apppu:22257: nabhaścarāṇāṃ nabhasi dṛśyante bahavo vrajāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1167 //
GE07hv_apppu:22259: śreṇībhūtāḥ prakāśante yāntaḥ śyenā ivāmbare // HV_App.I,42B.1169 //
GE07hv_apppu:22263: mahāvegān prasannāgrān mumoca ditijaḥ śarān // HV_App.I,42B.1171 //
GE07hv_apppu:22265: dehe samavakīryanta pūṣṇaḥ suniśitāḥ śarāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1173 //
GE07hv_apppu:22267: khadyotā iva gharmānte khe carantaḥ samantataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1175 //
GE07hv_apppu:22269: parvataṃ vāridhārābhir yathā prāvṛṣi toyadāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1177 //
GE07hv_apppu:22270: [k: K3 Ñ1.2 V1.3 B2.3 Dn Ds D1.3.5 T1 G3.5 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22282: te bāṇā bhūtale magnāḥ pūṣṇo bhāti śilāśitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22283: vikramaṃ śaṃsituṃ tūrṇam anantasya ca vai gatāḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:22284: [k: Ñ2 D2 ins. after line 2, B2 after line 1 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22289: tatas tu pūṣṇo devasya balaṃ vīryaṃ parākramam /
GE07hv_apppu:22290: vyavasāyaṃ ca sattvaṃ ca paśyanti tridaśādbhutam // HV_App.I,42B.1179 //
GE07hv_apppu:22292: nācintayat tadā pūṣā daityāṃś cābhyadravad raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1181 //
GE07hv_apppu:22293: hemapṛṣṭhaṃ mahānādaṃ pūṣṇa āsīn mahad dhanuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22295: tataḥ śarāḥ prādur āsan pūrayanta ivāmbaram /
GE07hv_apppu:22296: suvarṇapuṅkhāḥ pūṣṇas te prabhavantaḥ śarāsanāt // HV_App.I,42B.1185 //
GE07hv_apppu:22298: prādur āsīn mahāghorā bṛhataḥ pūṣakārmukāt // HV_App.I,42B.1187 //
GE07hv_apppu:22302: patatāṃ pātyamānānāṃ kham āsīt saṃvṛtaṃ vrajaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1191 //
GE07hv_apppu:22306: amarṣī balavān kruddho didhakṣann iva pāvakaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1195 //
GE07hv_apppu:22307: pūṣṇas tv ājau dhvajaṃ caiva patākāṃ dhanur eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:22308: raśmīn yoktrāṇi cāśvānāṃ hayagrīvo raṇe 'cchinat // HV_App.I,42B.1197 //
GE07hv_apppu:22310: sārathiṃ sa mahātejā rathopasthād apātayat // HV_App.I,42B.1199 //
GE07hv_apppu:22311: kṛtas tu virathaḥ pūṣā hayagrīveṇa saṃyuge /
GE07hv_apppu:22312: pūṣā tasya rathābhyāśāt sa yayau tena vai jitaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1201 //
GE07hv_apppu:22313: [k: B1.3 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. for line 1201, K1.2 D4 ins. after line 1200, Ds D5 after line 1201 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22316: tatrādbhutam ito bhūyo yuddhaṃ vartata dāruṇam /
GE07hv_apppu:22317: kṛtapratikṛtaṃ ghoraṃ śambarasya bhagasya ca // HV_App.I,42B.1203 //
GE07hv_apppu:22323: samakampanta bhītāni sindhor iva mahormayaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1209 //
GE07hv_apppu:22326: tato bhago maheṣvāso divyaṃ visphārayan dhanuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22328: tam abhyayād bhago daityaṃ tūrṇam asyantam antikāt /
GE07hv_apppu:22329: mātaṅgam iva mātaṅgo vṛṣaḥ prativṛṣaṃ yathā // HV_App.I,42B.1215 //
GE07hv_apppu:22331: prācchādayetām anyonyaṃ takṣamāṇau raṇe śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1217 //
GE07hv_apppu:22332: tayoḥ sutumulaṃ yuddham āsīd ghoraṃ mahāraṇe /
GE07hv_apppu:22335: vyadārayetām anyonyaṃ kārṣṇe nirbhidya varmaṇī // HV_App.I,42B.1221 //
GE07hv_apppu:22337: [k: K3 Ñ2 B Dn D5 (marg.) T1.2 G1.4.5 M2.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22339: takṣamānau śitair bāṇair nānvīkṣitum aśaknutām // HV_App.I,42B.1223 //
GE07hv_apppu:22343: nārācā nyapatan dehe tūrṇaṃ śambaracoditāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1227 //
GE07hv_apppu:22344: tān antarikṣe nārācān bhagaś ciccheda patriṇā /
GE07hv_apppu:22348: [k: For line 1231, B T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22350: tadā tat suciraṃ kālaṃ yuddhaṃ samam ivābhavat /
GE07hv_apppu:22351: śambarasya ca māyābhir nādṛśyata tato 'mbaram // HV_App.I,42B.1233 //
GE07hv_apppu:22352: dorbhyāṃ vikṣipataś cāpaṃ rathaṃ viṣṭabhya tiṣṭhataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22353: śrūyate dhanuṣaḥ śabdo visphūrjitam ivāśaṇeḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1235 //
GE07hv_apppu:22354: sa bhagasya hayān hatvā chittvā ca dhvajam āhave /
GE07hv_apppu:22355: abhyavarṣac charair enaṃ parjanya iva vṛṣṭimān // HV_App.I,42B.1237 //
GE07hv_apppu:22356: na tasyāsīd anirbhinnaṃ gātre dvyaṅgulam antaram /
GE07hv_apppu:22358: [k: For line 1239 B1.3 G1.4.5 M2.4 subst., Ds ins. after line 1238:k]
GE07hv_apppu:22360: daityasya cādbhutaṃ divyam astram astreṇa vārayan /
GE07hv_apppu:22362: mumoca krodhatāṃ rākṣo didhakṣan daityam āhave /
GE07hv_apppu:22364: avañcayad bhagaṃ daityo māyābhir lāghavena ca // HV_App.I,42B.1242 //
GE07hv_apppu:22366: atha daityo bhagaṃ samyag vañcayām āsa lāghavaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22367: [k: While K1.2 D4 ins. after line 1242 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22368: bhagas tasya rathaṃ sāśvaṃ śaravarṣair avākirat /
GE07hv_apppu:22370: adṛśyata śaraiś channaḥ śambaraḥ śatadhā raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1244 //
GE07hv_apppu:22372: atha sma yudhyate bhūyaḥ śatadhā śailasaṃnibhaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1246 //
GE07hv_apppu:22373: diśāgajendram ārūḍho dṛśyate sma punar balī /
GE07hv_apppu:22374: pādeśamātraś ca punar bhūtvā bhavati śailavat /
GE07hv_apppu:22375: mahāmegha iva śrīmāṃs tiryag ūrdhvaṃ ca so 'bhavat /
GE07hv_apppu:22378: punaḥ kṛtvā virūpāṇi vikṛtāni ca sarvaśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22379: sarvāṃ bhīṣayate senāṃ devānāṃ bhīmadarśanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1251 //
GE07hv_apppu:22380: [k: K1.2 B2 Dn D4 T1 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22381: te bhītāḥ prapalāyante siṃhatrastā mṛgā iva /
GE07hv_apppu:22382: tataḥ so 'nyaṃ navaṃ dehaṃ kṛtvā prāṃśutaraṃ punaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22383: gacchaty ūrdhvagatiṃ ghoro diśaḥ śabdena pūrayan /
GE07hv_apppu:22386: [k: For line 1255, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22389: śatavartmā śataśikho dadāha ca punaḥ surān // HV_App.I,42B.1257 //
GE07hv_apppu:22391: adṛśyata divaṃ stabdhvā śataśṛṅga ivācalaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1259 //
GE07hv_apppu:22392: yo 'nye daityāś ca sādhyāś ca ye ca viśve ca devatāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22393: kṣipanty astrāṇi divyāni tāni so 'grasatāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1261 //
GE07hv_apppu:22400: rathaṃ tyaktvā mahābhāgo mahendraṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1267 //
GE07hv_apppu:22401: parājitya tu taṃ devaṃ dānavendraḥ pratāpavān /
GE07hv_apppu:22402: gato yatra mahātejā jātavedā mahāprabhaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1269 //
GE07hv_apppu:22403: sa vahnir vāgbhir ugrābhiḥ kruddhas tarjayate balī /
GE07hv_apppu:22404: bhavāmy eṣa hi te mṛtyur ity uktvāntaradhīyata // HV_App.I,42B.1271 //
GE07hv_apppu:22406: jaghāna somaḥ śītāstro dānavānāṃ camūṃ raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1273 //
GE07hv_apppu:22408: avadhīd dānavān dṛptān daṇḍapāṇir ivāntakaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1275 //
GE07hv_apppu:22410: daityeṣu vyacarac chrīmān yugānte kālavac chaśī // HV_App.I,42B.1277 //
GE07hv_apppu:22412: dadāha dānavān sarvān dāvāgnir iva coditaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1279 //
GE07hv_apppu:22414: sādinaś cāśvapṛṣṭhebhyo bhūmau cāpi padātinaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1281 //
GE07hv_apppu:22415: śītena vyadhamat sarvān vāyur vṛkṣān ivaujasā /
GE07hv_apppu:22417: tad astram abhavat tasya pradigdhaṃ śatruśoṇitaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22419: yugāntakopamaḥ śrīmān daityeṣu vyacarad balī // HV_App.I,42B.1286 //
GE07hv_apppu:22420: āvārya mahatīṃ senāṃ pradravantīṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22421: candraṃ mṛtyum ivāyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā yodhā visiṣmiyuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1288 //
GE07hv_apppu:22423: tatas tato vyaśīryanta daityasainyāni saṃyuge // HV_App.I,42B.1290 //
GE07hv_apppu:22427: dṛṣṭvā śaśāṅkam āyāntaṃ daityānāṃ candrabhāskarau // HV_App.I,42B.1294 //
GE07hv_apppu:22429: chādayetāṃ śaraiś candraṃ vṛṣṭim antāv ivāmbudau // HV_App.I,42B.1296 //
GE07hv_apppu:22431: abhavat sumahāśabdo diśaḥ saṃnādayann iva // HV_App.I,42B.1298 //
GE07hv_apppu:22435: anyonyam abhigarjanto goṣṭheṣv iva mahāvṛṣāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1302 //
GE07hv_apppu:22437: aśmavṛṣṭir ivākāśe hy abhavat senayos tayoḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1304 //
GE07hv_apppu:22439: patitāni sma dṛśyante śirāṃsi raṇamūrdhani // HV_App.I,42B.1306 //
GE07hv_apppu:22441: sahasrābharaṇaiś cānyair vicchinnai ruciraiḥ karaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1308
GE07hv_apppu:22445: āsīt sarvā samākīrṇā muhūrtena vasuṃdharā // HV_App.I,42B.1312 //
GE07hv_apppu:22449: prāvartata surāṇāṃ ca dānavānāṃ ca saṃyuge // HV_App.I,42B.1316 //
GE07hv_apppu:22455: aśvāś ca paryadhāvanta hatārohā diśo daśa /
GE07hv_apppu:22461: nirjaghnur mahatīṃ senām anyonyasya paraṃtapāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1326 //
GE07hv_apppu:22464: aśvānāṃ kuñjarāṇāṃ ca rathānāṃ ca varūthināṃ /
GE07hv_apppu:22467: yodhās tatrābhyahanyanta hastyaśvam api tad bahu // HV_App.I,42B.1332 //
GE07hv_apppu:22473: abhavat tumulaḥ śabdo meghānām iva garjatām /
GE07hv_apppu:22474: evaṃ tad abhavad yuddhaṃ devānām asuraiḥ saha /
GE07hv_apppu:22478: tam āyāntam abhiprekṣya viṣvaksenaḥ surair vṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22483: viṣvaksenaṃ bibhedājau dīptaiḥ saptabhir āśugaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1346 //
GE07hv_apppu:22485: mūrcchām abhijagāmāśu dhvajaṃ cāpy āśrayat prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1348 //
GE07hv_apppu:22486: tataḥ sa punar āśvasya sādhyo yuddhe mano dadhe /
GE07hv_apppu:22487: visphārya ca mahācāpaṃ daityamadhye vyavasthitaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1350 //
GE07hv_apppu:22489: kṣobhayan surasainyāni samantān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1352 //
GE07hv_apppu:22492: tasya vai yudhyamānasya saṃyuge niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22493: śrūyate tumulaḥ śabdo jīmūtasyeva garjataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1354 //
GE07hv_apppu:22498: te prādravanta vitrastā rathebhyo rathinas tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:22499: sādinaś cāśvapṛṣṭhebhyo bhūmau cāpi padātayaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1360 //
GE07hv_apppu:22506: padātīnāṃ yayuḥ saṃghā yatra devaḥ śacīpatiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1364 //
GE07hv_apppu:22510: padātīnāṃ ca saṃgheṣu vinighnan pratyadṛśyata // HV_App.I,42B.1368 //
GE07hv_apppu:22511: vitatya śyenavat pakṣau sarvataḥ sa varūthinīm /
GE07hv_apppu:22512: bhittvā bhittvā mahābāhuḥ śirāṃsy ājāv akṛntata // HV_App.I,42B.1370 //
GE07hv_apppu:22513: sādinaś ca padātāś ca hataśeṣā rathās tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:22516: tam ekam abhyadhāvantaṃ siṃhanādaṃ pracakrire // HV_App.I,42B.1374 //
GE07hv_apppu:22517: tataḥ so 'siṃ samudyamya javam āsthāya dānavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22518: cakarta rathinām ājau śirāṃsi ca dhanūṃṣi ca // HV_App.I,42B.1376 //
GE07hv_apppu:22520: virocanaś caran mārgān prakārān ekaviṃśatim // HV_App.I,42B.1378 //
GE07hv_apppu:22521: bhrāntam udbhrāntam āviddham āplutaṃ viplutaṃ plutam /
GE07hv_apppu:22522: saṃpātaṃ samudīrṇaṃ ca darśayām āsa dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1380 //
GE07hv_apppu:22524: vineduś chinnavarmāṇo nipetuś ca gatāsavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1382 //
GE07hv_apppu:22526: vidrutāḥ svāny anīkāni jaghnus tridaśavāraṇāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1384 //
GE07hv_apppu:22529: pratīpam āharan nāgān aśvāṃś ca dṛḍhavikramān /
GE07hv_apppu:22530: cakarta rathinām ājau śirāṃsi ca dhanūṃṣi ca // HV_App.I,42B.1388 //
GE07hv_apppu:22532: sūtāṃś ciccheda khaḍgena rathān api ca dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1390 //
GE07hv_apppu:22533: muhur utpatato dikṣu dhāvataś ca yaśasvinaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22534: mārgāṃś carita vai citrān vyasmayanta tato 'surāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1392 //
GE07hv_apppu:22536: khaḍgena cānyāṃś ciccheda nādenānyāṃś ca bhīṣayat // HV_App.I,42B.1394 //
GE07hv_apppu:22538: apare daityam ālokya bhayāt prāṇān avāsṛjan // HV_App.I,42B.1396 //
GE07hv_apppu:22539: tasmiṃs tathā vartamāne yuddhe mahati dāruṇe /
GE07hv_apppu:22543: kujumbho dānavaśreṣṭho hy aṃśam ādityam āhave /
GE07hv_apppu:22545: yodhayām āsa samare vṛṣaḥ prativṛṣaṃ yathā /
GE07hv_apppu:22547: [k: Ñ1 B Dn Ds D5.6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22548: sphuradbhir niśitais tīkṣnaiḥ śarair bahubhir āśugaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22550: tasya bāṇapathaṃ prāpya nābhyavartanta sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1402 //
GE07hv_apppu:22552: devānām ajayaḥ kruraḥ pratyapadyata dāruṇaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1404 //
GE07hv_apppu:22559: sa gajān gadayā nighnan vyacarat samare balī /
GE07hv_apppu:22561: viśīrṇadantāṃś ca bahūn bhinnakumbhāṃś ca vāraṇān /
GE07hv_apppu:22562: akarod dānavaśreṣṭha uddiśyoddiśya tān balī // HV_App.I,42B.1414 //
GE07hv_apppu:22567: nārācair vividhais tīkṣṇair apāsya gajayodhinaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1416 //
GE07hv_apppu:22568: kṣuraiḥ kṣuraprair bhallaiś ca pītair añjalikaiḥ śitaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22571: aśmavṛṣṭir ivābhāti bāhubhiś ca sahāṅkuśaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1420 //
GE07hv_apppu:22573: adṛśyanta mahārāja tālā viśiraso yathā // HV_App.I,42B.1422 //
GE07hv_apppu:22575: jaghānaikeṣuṇā kruddhas tataḥ sa vimukho 'bhavat // HV_App.I,42B.1424 //
GE07hv_apppu:22577: vinighnan pravarān sainyān gadayā balināṃ varaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1426 //
GE07hv_apppu:22579: apaśyanta surāḥ sarve parvatān iva pātitān // HV_App.I,42B.1428 //
GE07hv_apppu:22580: kujambhasya ca mārgeṣu viśīrṇās te mahāgajāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22581: vajrāhatā ivendreṇa viśīrṇā iva parvatāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1430 //
GE07hv_apppu:22584: sa babhau tāṃ gadāṃ bibhrat prokṣitāṃ gajaśoṇitaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22586: [k: K1.2 Ñ1.2 B Dn D4 T1 G3 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22587: yathā hi bhagavān kruddhaḥ prajānāṃ saṃkṣaye purā /
GE07hv_apppu:22589: gopāla iva daṇḍena kālayan sa mahāgajān /
GE07hv_apppu:22590: kruddhaṃ kālam ivākāśe daṇḍam udyamya dānavam /
GE07hv_apppu:22591: apaśyanta surāḥ sarve kujambhaṃ bhīmavikramam // HV_App.I,42B.1438 //
GE07hv_apppu:22593: te hanyamānā gadayā bāṇaiś ca bhṛśavikṣatāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1440 //
GE07hv_apppu:22595: svāny anīkāni mṛdnantaḥ prādravanta mahāgajāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1442 //
GE07hv_apppu:22599: atiṣṭat samare daityaḥ kālaḥ saṃvartako yathā // HV_App.I,42B.1444 //
GE07hv_apppu:22601: abhyadravanta ditijān nandanto bhairavān ravān // HV_App.I,42B.1446 //
GE07hv_apppu:22606: āpatantam apāraṃ ca samudram iva parvaṇi /
GE07hv_apppu:22611: [k: Ds1 M2.4 subst. for line 1452, B1. 3 Ds2 G5 ins. after line 1451
GE07hv_apppu:22614: udīrṇāṃ pṛtanāṃ sarvāṃ sāśvāṃ sarathakuñjarām // HV_App.I,42B.1452 //
GE07hv_apppu:22617: anīkinīṃ kujambhas tu gadayā saṃnyavārayat // HV_App.I,42B.1455 //
GE07hv_apppu:22618: [k: Dn Ds (marg.) Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22619: sā tathā vāritā senā vihvalābhūn nirudyamā /
GE07hv_apppu:22621: asilomā hariś caiva jaghnatus tau parasparam // HV_App.I,42B.1457 //
GE07hv_apppu:22624: tapaty arka ivāmoghaḥ surasainyāni saṃyuge // HV_App.I,42B.1460 //
GE07hv_apppu:22626: śarair megha ivāvarṣad devānīkaṃ pratāpavān // HV_App.I,42B.1462 //
GE07hv_apppu:22628: raudraḥ krūro durādharṣo durvāryo dhvajinīmukhe // HV_App.I,42B.1464 //
GE07hv_apppu:22629: yudhyate daivataiḥ sārdhaṃ grasamāna iva prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22647: hayān gajān padātīṃś ca rathāṃś ca tarasā bahūn // HV_App.I,42B.1478 //
GE07hv_apppu:22649: aplāvayat sa devaughān dāruṇo dānaveśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1480 //
GE07hv_apppu:22650: prāmardata yudhi śrīmān yudhi śreṣṭo yudhi sthitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22652: saṃnaddhaṃ tatra yudhyantaṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam /
GE07hv_apppu:22654: na śekuḥ sarvabhūtāni dānavaṃ prasamīkṣitum // HV_App.I,42B.1485 //
GE07hv_apppu:22655: yathā prarūḍhe gharmānte dahet kakṣaṃ hutāśanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22656: tathā suravarān daityo dahate balatejasā // HV_App.I,42B.1487 //
GE07hv_apppu:22657: devānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca balaṃ nardati dāruṇam /
GE07hv_apppu:22658: vimūḍham abhavat sarvam ākulaṃ ca samantataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1489 //
GE07hv_apppu:22660: āryāṃ buddhiṃ samādāya na tyajanti mahāraṇam // HV_App.I,42B.1491 //
GE07hv_apppu:22664: astraghātāṃś ca vividhān dānavānāṃ tadā raṇe /
GE07hv_apppu:22666: svān parān nābhijānanti vimūḍhāḥ śastrapāṇayaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1497 //
GE07hv_apppu:22670: praharanti raṇe vīrā āttaśastrāḥ parasparam // HV_App.I,42B.1501 //
GE07hv_apppu:22672: saṃkule tumule yuddhe vartamāne mahābhaye // HV_App.I,42B.1503 //
GE07hv_apppu:22673: hayo hayaṃ gajo nāgaṃ vīro vīraṃ mahāhave /
GE07hv_apppu:22674: abhyadravañ jighāṃsanto hy asamañja samāhave // HV_App.I,42B.1505 //
GE07hv_apppu:22675: [k: For line 1505, B T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22677: asurāś ca surāś caiva vikramāḍhyā mahārathāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22678: juhvataḥ samare prāṇān nijaghnur itaretaram // HV_App.I,42B.1507 //
GE07hv_apppu:22680: hastaiḥ pādaiś ca yudhyante dānavās tridaśaiḥ saha // HV_App.I,42B.1509 //
GE07hv_apppu:22681: haris tu niśitaṃ bhallaṃ preṣayām āsa saṃyuge /
GE07hv_apppu:22682: sa tasya ghanuṣaḥ koṭiṃ chittvā bhūmāv apātayat /
GE07hv_apppu:22684: prāhiṇot sahasā tasya dānavendrasya saṃyuge // HV_App.I,42B.1513 //
GE07hv_apppu:22685: tasya dehe vimuktās te mārutena samīritāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22686: magnārdhakāyā viviśuḥ pannagā iva parvate // HV_App.I,42B.1515 //
GE07hv_apppu:22687: sa tair nipatitair gātraiḥ kṣaradbhir asṛg avyayam /
GE07hv_apppu:22688: babhau daityo mahābāhur merur dhātum ivotsṛjan // HV_App.I,42B.1517 //
GE07hv_apppu:22689: [k: Ñ1.2 Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22692: rukmapuṅkhāṃś ca niśitān preṣayām āsa sāyakān // HV_App.I,42B.1519 //
GE07hv_apppu:22694: gātraṃ saṃchādayām āsa mahābhrair iva parvatam // HV_App.I,42B.1521 //
GE07hv_apppu:22695: [k: For line 1521, T2 G1.4.5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22700: supuṅkhaṃ sūryasaṃkāśaṃ bāṇam apratimaṃ raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1523 //
GE07hv_apppu:22702: mumoha sahasā devo bhūmau cāpi papāta ha // HV_App.I,42B.1525 //
GE07hv_apppu:22703: tato hāhākṛtāḥ sarve deve bhūtalam āśrite /
GE07hv_apppu:22706: jagat sadevam āvignaṃ yathārkapatane tathā // HV_App.I,42B.1527 //
GE07hv_apppu:22707: parivāraṃ tu samare tasya hatvā mahāsuraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22709: [k: K1.2 Ñ2 V3 B Dn Ds D4.6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22711: pragṛhya kārmukaṃ ghoraṃ gataḥ śakrarathaṃ prati //
GE07hv_apppu:22712: tatraiva tu mahāyuddhe sasainyāv aśvināv ubhau /
GE07hv_apppu:22713: prayuddhau saha vṛtreṇa balinā devatāriṇā // HV_App.I,42B.1531 //
GE07hv_apppu:22715: āsādya so 'śvinau daityaḥ sthito girir ivācalaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1533 //
GE07hv_apppu:22725: śarair vivyādha gātrāṇi devānāṃ priyadarśanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1543 //
GE07hv_apppu:22729: nikṛttāny eva dṛśyante śarīrāṇi śirāṃsi ca // HV_App.I,42B.1545 //
GE07hv_apppu:22735: avidhyat sabalān kruddhaḥ sāyakair marmabhedibhiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1551 //
GE07hv_apppu:22737: na moham asurendrasya dadṛśus tridaśā raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1553 //
GE07hv_apppu:22739: paraśvadhaiś ca śūlaiś ca pravavarṣur mahārathāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1555 //
GE07hv_apppu:22740: tato vṛtraḥ susaṃkruddhas tais tadābhyardito balāt /
GE07hv_apppu:22741: [k: For line 1556, T2 G1.4.5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22743: abhyavarṣac chitair bāṇais tān sarvān satyavikramaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1557
GE07hv_apppu:22747: uttarāṃ diśam ājagmus trāsitā dṛḍhadhanvanā // HV_App.I,42B.1561 //
GE07hv_apppu:22749: prāvartata raṇe vṛtras trāsayānaś carācarān // HV_App.I,42B.1563 //
GE07hv_apppu:22751: abhyadhāvata daityendraṃ vṛtram apratimaṃ raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1565 //
GE07hv_apppu:22754: tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya prabhinnam iva vāraṇam /
GE07hv_apppu:22759: aśvinaṃ sahasāgamya tāḍayām āsa vīryavān // HV_App.I,42B.1571 //
GE07hv_apppu:22760: dīpyamānaṃ tataḥ śūlam aśvī suvipulaṃ dṛḍham /
GE07hv_apppu:22763: aśvinaṃ sahasā bhartsya garutmān iva pannagam // HV_App.I,42B.1575 //
GE07hv_apppu:22767: prayātaḥ sahasā tatra yatra yudhyati vāsavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1579 //
GE07hv_apppu:22769: jayaśriyā sevyamāno vṛtro yuddhe vyavasthitaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1581 //
GE07hv_apppu:22772: yudhyate saha daityena ekacakreṇa dhīmatā // HV_App.I,42B.1583 //
GE07hv_apppu:22774: ekacakrasya sainyaṃ tac charavarṣair avākirat // HV_App.I,42B.1585 //
GE07hv_apppu:22776: śūlāni ca bhuśuṇḍīś ca kṣipanti sma mahāraṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1587 //
GE07hv_apppu:22778: aśivaṃ ditijair muktaṃ durnivāryaṃ carācaraiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1589 //
GE07hv_apppu:22781: turaṃgamāṇāṃ tu śataṃ tasya yuktaṃ mahārathe /
GE07hv_apppu:22785: tasya bāṇanipātaiś ca hatā vai śataśaḥ surāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1595 //
GE07hv_apppu:22786: tataḥ sa laghubhiś citraiḥ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22787: āyudhān acchinat kruddhaḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1597 //
GE07hv_apppu:22789: gamitāḥ prakṣayaṃ kecit tridaśair dānavā raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1599 //
GE07hv_apppu:22790: tataḥ prakṣīyamāṇāṃs tān utprekṣya ca dite sutāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22792: te diśo vidiśaś caiva pratirudhya prahāriṇaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22793: abhyaghnan niśitaiḥ śastrair devān ditisutā raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1603 //
GE07hv_apppu:22795: mumocāstraṃ mahābāhur mathanaṃ nāma saṃyuge // HV_App.I,42B.1605 //
GE07hv_apppu:22798: chittvā śūlāṃś ca tān sarvān ekacakro mahāsuraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22799: abhyavidhyata taṃ sādhyaṃ daśabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1609 //
GE07hv_apppu:22801: jvalitair aparaiḥ śīghrais tān avidhyat sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1611 //
GE07hv_apppu:22802: teṣāṃ chinnāni gātrāṇi visṛjanti sma śoṇitam /
GE07hv_apppu:22805: ditijaiḥ kālyamānās te vitresuḥ surasattamāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1615 //
GE07hv_apppu:22811: nyahanat surasainyasya gajān gaja ivāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1621 //
GE07hv_apppu:22813: meghas tanitanirghoṣān mahādrīn iva cotthitān // HV_App.I,42B.1623 //
GE07hv_apppu:22817: utsārayām āsa gajān mahābhrāṇīva mārutaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1627 //
GE07hv_apppu:22818: nihatya gadayā sarvāṃs tān gajān gajamardanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22821: pārāvatasavarṇāṃś ca haṃsavarṇāṃs tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,42B.1631 //
GE07hv_apppu:22824: niṣūdayām āsa balī gadayā bhīmavikramaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1634 //
GE07hv_apppu:22830: raṇe 'tiṣṭhata daityendro vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1640 //
GE07hv_apppu:22831: tasminn eva tu saṃgrāme balodrikto mahāsuraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22832: mṛgavyādhaṃ mahātmānaṃ yodhayaty ajitaṃ raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1642 //
GE07hv_apppu:22835: gajair mattai rathair divyair vājibhiś ca mahājavaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22836: astraiś ca niśitais tīkṣṇaiḥ śaraiś cānalasaṃnibhaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1646
GE07hv_apppu:22837: tatas te dadṛśur vīrā dīpyamānaṃ mahāsuraṃ /
GE07hv_apppu:22841: taṃ saṃīkṣya mahāyodhaṃ dikṣu sarvāsv avasthitam /
GE07hv_apppu:22842: tataḥ praharaṇair ghorair abhipetuḥ samantataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1652 //
GE07hv_apppu:22843: tasya sarvāyasās tīkṣṇāḥ śarāḥ pītamukhāḥ śitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22845: taiś ca saptabhir āviṣṭaḥ śaraiḥ śirasi cārpitaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22846: utpapāta tadā vyomni diśo daśa vinādayan // HV_App.I,42B.1656 //
GE07hv_apppu:22847: tatas taṃ tridaśo vīraḥ sarathaḥ sajyakārmukaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22848: anuvavrāja saṃhṛṣṭaḥ khaṃ tadā sa mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1658 //
GE07hv_apppu:22849: [k: For line 1658, T2 G1.4.5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22851: asuraṃ chādayām āsa taṃ vyomni śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22852: vṛṣṭimān iva jīmūto nidāghānte dharādharam // HV_App.I,42B.1660 //
GE07hv_apppu:22854: cakāra ninadaṃ ghoram ambare jalado yathā // HV_App.I,42B.1662 //
GE07hv_apppu:22856: nipapāta mahāvegaḥ pakṣavān vai girir yathā // HV_App.I,42B.1664 //
GE07hv_apppu:22857: babhañja ca tato daityo bhagneṣākūbaraṃ rathaṃ /
GE07hv_apppu:22858: mṛgavyādhaḥ parityajya sthito bhūmau mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1666 //
GE07hv_apppu:22859: virathaṃ prekṣya rudraṃ tu tasya pāriṣadāḥ śubhāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22861: sa tu taiḥ sahasotthāya viṣṭhito vimale 'mbare /
GE07hv_apppu:22862: mudgarair ardito bhīmair vṛkṣaḥ paraśubhir yathā // HV_App.I,42B.1670 //
GE07hv_apppu:22863: teṣāṃ vegavatāṃ vegaṃ nihatya sa mahāsuraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22866: sarvān pāriṣadān saṃkhye sūdayām āsa dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1674 //
GE07hv_apppu:22870: jaghāna tān pāriṣadān samare dānaveśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1678 //
GE07hv_apppu:22872: balaṃ tad avaśeṣaṃ sa nāśayām āsa vīryavān // HV_App.I,42B.1680 //
GE07hv_apppu:22873: aśvair aśvān gajair nāgān yodhān yodhai rathān rathaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22874: dānavaḥ sūdayām āsa yugānte 'ntakavat prajāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1682 //
GE07hv_apppu:22875: hatair aśvaiś ca nāgaiś ca bhagnākṣaiś ca mahārathaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22876: tridaśaiś cābhavad bhūmī ruddhamārgā samantataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1684 //
GE07hv_apppu:22877: evaṃbalaḥ sa daityendro mṛgavyādhaś ca vīryavān /
GE07hv_apppu:22878: yudhi prayuddhau balinau prabhinnāv iva vāraṇau // HV_App.I,42B.1686 //
GE07hv_apppu:22879: tatraiva yudhyate rudro dvitīyo rāhuṇā saha /
GE07hv_apppu:22880: viśrutas triṣu lokeṣu krodhātmā aja ekapāt // HV_App.I,42B.1688 //
GE07hv_apppu:22881: tat tadā sumahad yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇam /
GE07hv_apppu:22882: āsīt pratibhayaṃ raudraṃ vīrāṇāṃ jayam icchatām // HV_App.I,42B.1690 //
GE07hv_apppu:22888: jaghāna samare śrīmān kruddho daityasya sāyakaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1696 //
GE07hv_apppu:22889: tasya pāriṣadas tv eko rathaśaktyā mahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22890: bibheda samare hṛṣṭo dānavaṃ taṃ stanāntare /
GE07hv_apppu:22891: sa bhinnagātro rudreṇa tathā pāriṣadair api // HV_App.I,42B.1699 //
GE07hv_apppu:22892: rudrasya ratham āyāntaṃ sa rāhur dānavottamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22900: bibheda samare rudraḥ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1705 //
GE07hv_apppu:22904: nirbibheda śarais tīkṣṇair meruṃ sūrya ivāṃśubhiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1709 //
GE07hv_apppu:22906: patitaiḥ parvatābhaiś ca dānavaiḥ kāmarūpibhiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1711 //
GE07hv_apppu:22908: tataḥ sa rudraḥ samare muṣṭinābhihatas tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:22909: papāta sarathaḥ sāśvaḥ purāṭṭa iva bhūtale //
GE07hv_apppu:22912: virejus te tadā daityāḥ puṣpitā iva kiṃśukāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22917: hatānāṃ svanatāṃ tatra daityānāṃ cāpi nisvanaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22918: surāṇām asurāṇāṃ ca saṃbabhūva mahāsvanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1716 //
GE07hv_apppu:22920: rurodha mārgaṃ yodhānāṃ cakṣūṃṣi ca dharārajaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1718 //
GE07hv_apppu:22923: āsīt pratibhayaṃ raudraṃ vīrāṇāṃ jayam icchatāṃ //
GE07hv_apppu:22928: [k: For line 1721, T2 G1.4.5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22930: apaviddhaiś ca bhagnaiś ca rathaiḥ sāṃgrāmikair hataiḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:22936: nāgā lakṣaṃ hatā rājann aśvā lakṣatrayaṃ nṛpa //
GE07hv_apppu:22937: utpetuś ca kavandhāni dikṣu sarvāsu saṃyuge /
GE07hv_apppu:22941: ajasya caikapādasya rāhoś caiva mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1730 //
GE07hv_apppu:22942: teṣāṃ tu tatra patatāṃ kruddhānām atinisvanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22943: udvarta iva bhūtānāṃ samudrāṇāṃ ca śuśruve // HV_App.I,42B.1732 //
GE07hv_apppu:22944: tatraikas tu sadhūmrākṣaḥ śrīmān rudro munīśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22949: dānavaiḥ saṃvṛtaḥ keśī yudhyate yudhi durjayaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1738 //
GE07hv_apppu:22951: niṣpetur ugravīryasya jvālā hi prasṛtā mukhāt // HV_App.I,42B.1740 //
GE07hv_apppu:22955: babhūva sumahānādaḥ kṣobhayaṃs tridivaṃ tadā // HV_App.I,42B.1744 //
GE07hv_apppu:22958: [k: B Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22963: sarve hy atibalāḥ śūrāḥ sarve parvatasaṃnibhāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22972: udbhūto devadaityaughaiḥ saṃrurodha diśo daśa // HV_App.I,42B.1754 //
GE07hv_apppu:22974: saṃvṛtā bahurūpeṇa dadṛśur na sma kiṃcana // HV_App.I,42B.1756 //
GE07hv_apppu:22975: na dhvajo na patākā vā na varma turago 'pi vā /
GE07hv_apppu:22976: āyudhaṃ syandanaṃ vāpi dṛśyate naiva sārathiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1758 //
GE07hv_apppu:22977: sa śabdas tumulas teṣām anyonyam abhidhāvatām /
GE07hv_apppu:22978: nipetur ugravīryasya jvālā hi prasṛtā mukhāt // HV_App.I,42B.1760 //
GE07hv_apppu:22982: śrūyate tumulaḥ śabdo na rūpāṇi cakāśire // HV_App.I,42B.1764 //
GE07hv_apppu:22983: dānavās tatra saṃkruddhā dānavān eva jaghnire /
GE07hv_apppu:22984: tridaśās tridaśāṃś caiva nijaghnus tumule tadā // HV_App.I,42B.1766 //
GE07hv_apppu:22985: te parāṃś ca vinighnantaḥ svāṃś ca yuddhe mahāsurān /
GE07hv_apppu:22986: rudhirārdrāṃ tathā cakrur medinīm asurāḥ surāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1768 //
GE07hv_apppu:22987: tatas tu rudhiraugheṇa saṃsiktaṃ mṛditaṃ rajaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:22990: tridaśā dānavāś caiva jaghnur anyonyam āhave // HV_App.I,42B.1772 //
GE07hv_apppu:22992: rudrapāriṣadān sarvān sūdayanti sma dānavāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1774 //
GE07hv_apppu:22996: saṃgrāmamarṣī ghoraḥ sa svāny anīkāni harṣayan /
GE07hv_apppu:22997: teṣāṃ paramasaṃkruddho vajram astram udīrayat // HV_App.I,42B.1779 //
GE07hv_apppu:22999: mahāpāriṣadāḥ sarvaṃ nihatā yudhi durjayāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1781 //
GE07hv_apppu:23001: viprakīrṇadrumāḥ petuḥ śailā vajrahatā iva // HV_App.I,42B.1783 //
GE07hv_apppu:23002: evaṃ tat tumulaṃ yuddham abhaval lomaharṣaṇam /
GE07hv_apppu:23003: keśinaḥ saha rudreṇa tad adbhutam ivābhavat // HV_App.I,42B.1785 //
GE07hv_apppu:23009: dhvajinīṃ prekṣya śatrūṇāṃ sārathiṃ tvarito 'bravīt // HV_App.I,42B.1789
GE07hv_apppu:23010: atraiva tāvat tvaritaṃ nayemaṃ sārathe ratham /
GE07hv_apppu:23011: ete hi devāḥ sahitā ghnanti naḥ samare balam // HV_App.I,42B.1791 //
GE07hv_apppu:23013: etair hi dānavānīkaṃ kṛtacchidram idaṃ mahat // HV_App.I,42B.1793 //
GE07hv_apppu:23015: arīn abhyahanat kruddhaḥ śarajālair mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1795 //
GE07hv_apppu:23018: na sthātuṃ devatāḥ śaktāḥ kiṃ punar yoddhum āhave /
GE07hv_apppu:23020: atyarthaṃ vai raṇe śūrāḥ saṃgrāmeṣv anivartinaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23026: samīkṣya nihatāñ jñātīn avatasthe mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1799 //
GE07hv_apppu:23027: niṣkumbhaṃ tatra taṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve te tridaśottamāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23028: sametya sahitāḥ sarve taṃ drutaṃ paryavārayan // HV_App.I,42B.1801 //
GE07hv_apppu:23029: vyavasthitaṃ ca niṣkumbhaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā tridaśottamāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23031: vṛṣaparvā tu śailābhaṃ niṣkumbhaṃ samare sthitam /
GE07hv_apppu:23032: mahendra iva dhārābhiḥ śaravarṣair avākirat // HV_App.I,42B.1805 //
GE07hv_apppu:23033: acintayitvā tu śarāñ śarīre patitān bahūn /
GE07hv_apppu:23034: sthitaś ca pramukhe śrīmān sasainyaḥ sa mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1807 //
GE07hv_apppu:23036: abhidudrāva vegena kampayann iva medinīm // HV_App.I,42B.1809 //
GE07hv_apppu:23038: babhūva rūpaṃ durdharṣaṃ dīptasyeva vibhāvasoḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1811 //
GE07hv_apppu:23039: rathaṃ tyaktvā sa tu śrīmān sakrodhaḥ kamalekṣaṇaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23041: tataś cikṣepa taṃ vṛkṣaṃ niṣkumbho vṛṣaparvaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1814 //
GE07hv_apppu:23043: vinadya sumahānādaṃ bhrāmayitvā ca vīryavān // HV_App.I,42B.1816 //
GE07hv_apppu:23045: jaghāna dānavas tena śākhinā tridaśāṃs tadā // HV_App.I,42B.1818 //
GE07hv_apppu:23046: tam antakam iva kruddhaṃ samare prāṇahāriṇam /
GE07hv_apppu:23049: ālokya dhanvī niṣkumbhaś cukrodha ca nanāda ca // HV_App.I,42B.1822 //
GE07hv_apppu:23050: sa tatra niśitair bāṇair viṃśadbhir marmavedhibhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23053: [k: K1 V1.3 B Dn Ds D3.4.6 T1.2 G1.4.5 M2.4 subst. for line 1825, Ñ2
GE07hv_apppu:23060: viddhaḥ samaramadhyastho rudhiraṃ prāsravad bahu // HV_App.I,42B.1826 //
GE07hv_apppu:23062: śvasanto dudruvuḥ sarve bhayād vai vṛṣaparvaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1828 //
GE07hv_apppu:23064: pṛṣṭhatas trāsasaṃvignāḥ prekṣamāṇā muhur muhuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1830 //
GE07hv_apppu:23067: tatraiva tu mahāvīryaḥ prahrādaḥ kālam āhave /
GE07hv_apppu:23068: yodhayām āsa raktākṣo hiraṇyakaśipoḥ sutaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1834 //
GE07hv_apppu:23073: cakāra tvarayā yukto bhārgavo vijayāvahāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1836 //
GE07hv_apppu:23076: srajaś ca vividhāś citrā jayārtham abhimantritāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23078: kālena saha saṃgrāme prayuddhaḥ sa mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1841 //
GE07hv_apppu:23081: tāni dānavavīrāṇāṃ jepuḥ śāntim anuttamām // HV_App.I,42B.1844 //
GE07hv_apppu:23083: [k: K2.3 D4 ins. after line 1845, K1 after line 1846:k]
GE07hv_apppu:23084: raṇapraveśasāntiṃ te kramāc cakruś ca dānavāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23089: balim abhyarcya rājānaṃ prahradāṃ paryavārayan // HV_App.I,42B.1850 //
GE07hv_apppu:23093: meroḥ śikharam ākīrṇaṃ dyaur ivāmbudharāgame // HV_App.I,42B.1854 //
GE07hv_apppu:23099: tasya daityasahasrāṇi prayānty agre mahāraṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1860 //
GE07hv_apppu:23101: saptatir vai sahasrāṇi gajās tāvanta eva ca // HV_App.I,42B.1862 //
GE07hv_apppu:23103: dhanur visphārayan ghoraṃ nanāda prajahāsa ca // HV_App.I,42B.1864 //
GE07hv_apppu:23106: sa samaṃ vartamānas tu pakṣābhyāṃ vistṛto mahān /
GE07hv_apppu:23109: nānāpraharaṇānāṃ ca parimāṇaṃ na vidyate // HV_App.I,42B.1870 //
GE07hv_apppu:23112: garjanto vinadantaś ca vikrośantaḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23115: hayānāṃ ca gajānāṃ ca garjatām abhitaujasām // HV_App.I,42B.1876 //
GE07hv_apppu:23117: śuśruve śaṅkhaśabdaś ca paṭahānāṃ ca nisvanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1878 //
GE07hv_apppu:23119: nirghoṣeṇa rathānāṃ ca krośatīva nabhaḥsthalam // HV_App.I,42B.1880 //
GE07hv_apppu:23124: antarikṣāt papātolkā vāyuś ca paruṣo vavau /
GE07hv_apppu:23125: vamantyaḥ pāvakaṃ ghoraṃ śivāś caiva vavāśire // HV_App.I,42B.1886 //
GE07hv_apppu:23129: adya madbāṇanihatān devān drakṣyatha saṃyuge // HV_App.I,42B.1890 //
GE07hv_apppu:23130: bāndhavā nihatā yeṣāṃ tridaśair iha saṃyuge /
GE07hv_apppu:23131: adya te nirvapiṣyanti śatrumāṃsāni dānavāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1892 //
GE07hv_apppu:23135: ākāśaṃ saṃpatiṣyanti khadyotā iva me śarāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1896 //
GE07hv_apppu:23137: adyāhaṃ nihaniṣyāmi kālendraṃ dhanuṣā raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1898 //
GE07hv_apppu:23139: tridaśān sagaṇān hatvā raṇe cāntakasaṃnibhān // HV_App.I,42B.1900 //
GE07hv_apppu:23140: akṣayāḥ santi me tūṇāḥ śarāś cāśīviṣopamāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23141: sthātuṃ me purataḥ śaktāḥ ke raṇe jīvitepsavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1902 //
GE07hv_apppu:23142: hatvā ripugaṇāṃs tuṣṭir anurāgaś ca rājasu /
GE07hv_apppu:23143: hatasya tridive vāso nāsti yuddhasamā gatiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1904 //
GE07hv_apppu:23144: te bhayaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā raṇe dānavasattamāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23145: nihatyemān arīn sarvān modadhvaṃ nandane vane // HV_App.I,42B.1906 //
GE07hv_apppu:23148: sarvāstravidvāñ śūraś ca nityaṃ cāpy aparājitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23151: prahrādasyātivīryasya ye tasya tanayā nijāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1912 //
GE07hv_apppu:23152: tais tu kratuśatair iṣṭaṃ vipulair āptadakṣiṇaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23156: yaṣṭāraḥ kratubhir nityaṃ nityaṃ cādhyayane ratāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23163: veṇuśaṅkharavaiś caiva siṃhanādaiś ca puṣkalaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1924 //
GE07hv_apppu:23167: mahāsurair apy ajitā yodhayanti raṇe 'ntakam // HV_App.I,42B.1928 //
GE07hv_apppu:23169: dānavā māninaḥ sarve sarve svargābhikāṅkṣiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1930 //
GE07hv_apppu:23174: tataḥ kālas tu niryāto bhīmo bhīmaparākramaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23175: vinadan sumahākāyo vyādhibhir bahubhir vṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1934 //
GE07hv_apppu:23180: praviśya dhvajinīṃ caiṣāṃ ghātayām āsa vīryavān /
GE07hv_apppu:23183: ājaghāna raṇe kālo daṇḍam udgarapaṭṭisaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1942 //
GE07hv_apppu:23185: gadāś ca parighāś caiva vividhāś ca paraśvadhāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1944 //
GE07hv_apppu:23186: dhanūṃṣi ca vicitrāṇi śataghnīś ca sthirāyasīḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23187: pātyante vyādhibhir yuddhe dānavānāṃ camūmukhe // HV_App.I,42B.1946 //
GE07hv_apppu:23189: atisārā jvarāś caiva yakṣmāṇaḥ śleṣmajā rujāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23192: vyādhīn api ca daityaughā nijaghnur bahavo bahūn // HV_App.I,42B.1948 //
GE07hv_apppu:23193: śūlaiḥ pramathitāḥ kecit kecic chinnāḥ paraśvadhaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23194: parighair āhatāḥ kecit kecic ca paramāyudhaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1950 //
GE07hv_apppu:23195: kecid dvidhākṛtāḥ khaḍgaiḥ sphurantaḥ patitā bhuvi /
GE07hv_apppu:23196: vyādhayo dānavair evaṃ nānāśastrair vidāritāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1952 //
GE07hv_apppu:23197: te cāpi vyādhibhiḥ sarve vividhair āyudhottamaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23199: bhinnāś ca dānavāḥ śūlair nikṛttāś ca paraśvadhaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1955 //
GE07hv_apppu:23200: mudgaraiḥ paṭṭisaiś caiva vyādhibhiś ca mahābalaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23201: kṣatāḥ śastrair anekaiś ca muṣṭibhiś ca mahāmṛdhe // HV_App.I,42B.1957 //
GE07hv_apppu:23203: ārtasvaraṃ ca nadatāṃ siṃhanādāṃś ca garjatām /
GE07hv_apppu:23204: babhūva tumulaḥ śabdaḥ saṃgrāme lomaharṣaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1960 //
GE07hv_apppu:23206: sāditāni mahīṃ jagmus tiṣṭhatām eva saṃyuge // HV_App.I,42B.1962 //
GE07hv_apppu:23220: nāśaṃsanta tadā yodhā jīvitāny api saṃyuge // HV_App.I,42B.1976 //
GE07hv_apppu:23223: patitair nipatadbhiś ca pātyamānaiś ca saṃyuge /
GE07hv_apppu:23224: babhūva bhūḥ samākīrṇā yodhair udgatajīvitaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1980 //
GE07hv_apppu:23225: na gṛhṇatoḥ śarān ghorān na ca saṃdadhatos tayoḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23226: antaraṃ dadṛśe kaścit prayatnād api saṃyuge // HV_App.I,42B.1982 //
GE07hv_apppu:23235: hatadarpaṃ tu vijñāya prahrādaḥ kālam āhave /
GE07hv_apppu:23236: apayātaṃ ca samarād dviṣantaṃ saṃpratarkya tam // HV_App.I,42B.1988 //
GE07hv_apppu:23238: tanūjaḥ śārṅgiṇa iti bhītaṃ nāma tṛṇānanam /
GE07hv_apppu:23240: tatraivānyāṃ camūṃ bhūyaḥ sa mamarda mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1990 //
GE07hv_apppu:23242: tādṛśaṃ sarvalokeṣu na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,42B.1992 //
GE07hv_apppu:23244: prahrādaḥ parivṛddho 'tra kālas tv apasṛto raṇāt // HV_App.I,42B.1994 //
GE07hv_apppu:23248: sasainyo yodhayām āsa kṣobhayan yakṣavāhinīm // HV_App.I,42B.1996 //
GE07hv_apppu:23250: ardayām āsa saṃkruddho dhanādhyakṣaṃ pratāpavān // HV_App.I,42B.1998 //
GE07hv_apppu:23252: cakāra kadanaṃ ghoraṃ dhanuṣpāṇir mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2000 //
GE07hv_apppu:23253: āvarta iva saṃjajñe balasya mahato mahān /
GE07hv_apppu:23255: tridaśānāṃ śarīrais tu dānavānāṃ ca medinī /
GE07hv_apppu:23256: babhūva nicitā ghoraiḥ parvatair iva saṃplave // HV_App.I,42B.2004 //
GE07hv_apppu:23258: sarvato mādhave māsi puṣpitair iva kiṃśukaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2006 //
GE07hv_apppu:23259: hatair vīrair gajair aśvaiḥ prāvartata mahānadī /
GE07hv_apppu:23267: tridaśā dānavāś caiva terus tāṃ dustarāṃ nadīm /
GE07hv_apppu:23268: yathā padmarajodhvas tāṃ nalinīṃ gajayūthapāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2016 //
GE07hv_apppu:23269: tataḥ sṛjantaṃ bānaughān anuhrādaṃ rathe sthitam /
GE07hv_apppu:23270: dadarśa tarasā devo nighnantaṃ yakṣavāhinīm // HV_App.I,42B.2018 //
GE07hv_apppu:23271: kruddhas tato daityabalaṃ sūdayām āsa vittapaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23272: vikṣipann iva khe vāyur mahābhrapaṭalaṃ balāt // HV_App.I,42B.2020 //
GE07hv_apppu:23273: samīkṣya tumulaṃ yuddham anuhrādaś ca bhūpatiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23275: sa dhanur dhanināṃ śreṣṭho vikṛṣya raṇamūrdhani /
GE07hv_apppu:23276: utsasarja śitān bāṇān vitteśasya mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2024 //
GE07hv_apppu:23277: kuberaṃ prāpya te bāṇā nirbhidya susamāhitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23278: aparān pṛṣṭhato jaghnur vyāsaktān yakṣarākṣasān // HV_App.I,42B.2026 //
GE07hv_apppu:23281: tato vaiśravaṇo rājā kruddho yakṣagaṇaiḥ saha /
GE07hv_apppu:23282: vavarṣa śaravarṣāṇi dānavaṃ prati vīryavān // HV_App.I,42B.2030 //
GE07hv_apppu:23283: tad yathā śāradaṃ varṣaṃ govṛṣaḥ śīghram āgatam /
GE07hv_apppu:23286: nimīlitākṣaḥ sahasā daityaḥ sahati dāruṇam // HV_App.I,42B.2034 //
GE07hv_apppu:23289: utpapāta rathāt tūrṇaṃ kṣitiṃ padbhyām upāgataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23293: nijaghāna hayāñ śreṣṭhān kuberasya mahājavān // HV_App.I,42B.2039 //
GE07hv_apppu:23294: tasya karma mahāghoraṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve mahāsurāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23296: tayos tu tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ saṃjajñe devadaityayoḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2042 //
GE07hv_apppu:23300: anyonyaṃ vividhaiḥ śastrair ghorair jaghnatur āhave // HV_App.I,42B.2044
GE07hv_apppu:23301: tridaśā dānavān yuddhe mathitvā prāṇadaṃs tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:23302: dānavais tridaśāś cāpi kruddhair bhuvi nipātitāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2046 //
GE07hv_apppu:23303: dānavās tv atha saṃkruddhās tridaśān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23306: amarṣitatarā bhūyaś cakruḥ karmāṇy abhītavat // HV_App.I,42B.2050 //
GE07hv_apppu:23307: te gadābhiḥ subhīmābhiḥ paṭṭiśaiḥ śūlam udgaraiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23308: parighaiś ca sutīkṣṇāgrair dānavāḥ pīḍitāḥ suraiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2052 //
GE07hv_apppu:23310: jagṛhus te śilāś caiva drumāṃś cāsurasattamāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2054 //
GE07hv_apppu:23311: te bhīmavegā ditijā nardamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23312: mamanthus tridaśān vīrāñ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2056 //
GE07hv_apppu:23314: śilābhir vipulābhiś ca śataśākhaiś ca pādapaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23317: kecid vinihatā bhūmau rudhirārdrāḥ surāsurāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2061 //
GE07hv_apppu:23320: vidāritās triśūlaiś ca kecit tatra gatāsavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2064 //
GE07hv_apppu:23326: diśo vidrāvayām āsa saṃkruddhaḥ śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2070 //
GE07hv_apppu:23328: abhyadravad anuhrādaḥ pragṛhya vipulāṃ śilām // HV_App.I,42B.2072 //
GE07hv_apppu:23330: śilāṃ tāṃ pātayām āsa kuberasya rathottame // HV_App.I,42B.2074 //
GE07hv_apppu:23332: rathād āplutya vegena vasudhāyāṃ vyatiṣṭhata // HV_App.I,42B.2076 //
GE07hv_apppu:23334: bhaṅktvā rathottamaṃ tasya nipapāta śilā bhuvi // HV_App.I,42B.2078 //
GE07hv_apppu:23336: surāṇāṃ kadanaṃ cakre saskandhaviṭapair drumaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2080 //
GE07hv_apppu:23338: drumaiḥ pramathitāṅgāś ca nipetur dharaṇītale // HV_App.I,42B.2082 //
GE07hv_apppu:23340: giriśṛṅgaṃ mahad gṛhya kuberam abhidudruve // HV_App.I,42B.2084 //
GE07hv_apppu:23341: tam āpatantaṃ dhanado gadām udyamya vīryavān /
GE07hv_apppu:23342: vinardann āhvayām āsa dānavendraṃ mahābalam // HV_App.I,42B.2086 //
GE07hv_apppu:23343: tasya kruddhasya saṃkruddho gadāṃ tāṃ bahukaṇṭakām /
GE07hv_apppu:23345: daityas tu krodhatāmrākṣas taṃ prahāram acintayan /
GE07hv_apppu:23348: papāta sahasā bhūmau viśīrṇa iva parvataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2092 //
GE07hv_apppu:23349: vitteśaṃ vihvalaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve te yakṣarākṣasāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23351: muhūrtaṃ vihvalo bhūtvā prabhur viśravasaḥ sutaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23352: [k: K1-3 Ñ1 Dn1 Ds D3.4.6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:23354: utthitaḥ sahasā bhūyaḥ piṅgākṣaḥ sa mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2096 //
GE07hv_apppu:23356: janayann iva nirghoṣaṃ vidhamann iva parvatān // HV_App.I,42B.2098 //
GE07hv_apppu:23357: tam avadhyaṃ tu vijñāya nihataṃ punar utthitam /
GE07hv_apppu:23358: prekṣya piṅgākṣam āyāntaṃ dānavā vipradudruvuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2100 //
GE07hv_apppu:23360: kālanemiṃ ca nemiṃ ca mahānemiṃ ca dānavam // HV_App.I,42B.2102 //
GE07hv_apppu:23361: ātmānaṃ caiva vīryaṃ ca vismṛtyābhijanaṃ tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:23362: kva gacchata bhayatrastāḥ prākṛtā iva dānavāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2104 //
GE07hv_apppu:23364: nālaṃ yuddhāya yakṣo 'yaṃ mahatīyaṃ vibhīṣikā // HV_App.I,42B.2106 //
GE07hv_apppu:23366: vikramya vidham iṣyāmi nivartadhvaṃ mahāsurāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2108 //
GE07hv_apppu:23370: darpotkaṭā bhujair eva saṃprahāraṃ pracakrire // HV_App.I,42B.2112 //
GE07hv_apppu:23371: pāṃsubhiś caiva kāṣṭhaiś ca śilābhiś ca mahābalāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23372: bāhubhiś ca tathānyonyam ākṣipanti sma vegitāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2114 //
GE07hv_apppu:23373: muṣtibhiś ca talaiś caiva nakhapātair mahābalāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23374: pādapaiś ca mahāśākhair ayudhyanta raṇājire // HV_App.I,42B.2116 //
GE07hv_apppu:23376: mamantha paramāyasto vanāny agnir ivotthitaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2118 //
GE07hv_apppu:23378: nikṛttāḥ patitā bhūmau tāmrapuṣpā iva drumāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2120 //
GE07hv_apppu:23379: anuhrādas tu vikrānto devāṃs tv āśīviṣopamān /
GE07hv_apppu:23380: yudhyamānāṃś ca samare vyasṛjan niśitāñ śarān // HV_App.I,42B.2122 //
GE07hv_apppu:23382: aṅgāramiśrāḥ kruddhasya mukhān niścerur arciṣaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2124 //
GE07hv_apppu:23384: vivyādha samare kruddho daṇḍapāṇir ivāntakaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2126 //
GE07hv_apppu:23385: kuberas tu śarair bhinnaḥ samantāt kṣatajokṣitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23386: rudhiraṃ parisusrāva giriḥ prasravaṇair iva // HV_App.I,42B.2128 //
GE07hv_apppu:23388: vihvalaś cāpy abhūd devo muhūrtaṃ dhanadādhipaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23389: [k: Ñ2 V3 cont., K4 Dn D1.2 ins. after line 2128 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:23390: labdhvā sa tu punaḥ saṃjñāṃ roṣaraktekṣaṇaḥ suraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23392: cikṣeṣa daityam uddiśya balāt krodhena mūrchitaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2130 //
GE07hv_apppu:23393: aprāptām antare so 'tha tāṃ gadāṃ gadayāsuraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23394: babhañja vinadan kruddhas tad āścaryam abhūt tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:23395: pragṛhya tu gadāṃ bhūyo hy abhidudrāva dānavam // HV_App.I,42B.2133 //
GE07hv_apppu:23399: tam antakam ivāyāntam ajeyaṃ sakalaiḥ suraiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23400: grasantam iva taṃ daityaṃ trailokyam akhilaṃ ruṣā // HV_App.I,42B.2138 //
GE07hv_apppu:23401: tam ālokya tathārūpaṃ dhanādhyakṣo raṇaṃ bhayāt /
GE07hv_apppu:23402: apahāya yayau tatra yatra śakraḥ surādhipaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2140 //
GE07hv_apppu:23403: tasya cāpi mahat karma dṛṣṭvā vittapatis tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:23405: nāhaṃ śakto raṇe yoddhum iti matvā dhanādhipaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23406: jagāma bhayasaṃtrasto yatra devaḥ śacīpatiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2142 //
GE07hv_apppu:23409: vipracittis tu varuṇaṃ daityānām ādir avyayam /
GE07hv_apppu:23410: jaghāneṣugaṇaiḥ kruddho dīptair iva mahoragaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2144 //
GE07hv_apppu:23412: nābhyajānata kartavyaṃ saṃgrāme sa jaleśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2146 //
GE07hv_apppu:23417: na śaknoty agrataḥ sthātuṃ vipracitter jalādhipaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2148 //
GE07hv_apppu:23419: taṃ vyūhya pratyayudhyanta dānavā devavāhinīm // HV_App.I,42B.2150 //
GE07hv_apppu:23421: mukham ābhāti daityasya vipracitter mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2152 //
GE07hv_apppu:23432: sa kaṇṭhasthena niṣkeṇa bhujasthair api cāṅgadaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23433: kuṇḍalābhyāṃ vicitrābhyāṃ srajā caiva vicitrayā // HV_App.I,42B.2162 //
GE07hv_apppu:23441: saha caivāmarāvatyā siddhalokais tathā saha // HV_App.I,42B.2168 //
GE07hv_apppu:23446: tridaśā varuṇaś caiva na śekuḥ spandituṃ bhayāt /
GE07hv_apppu:23447: tatrāsīn nirbhayas tv ekaḥ kauśiko vāsavaḥ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2174 //
GE07hv_apppu:23449: pātayām āsa senāyāṃ jaleśasya mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2176 //
GE07hv_apppu:23453: papāta sa punas tūrṇaṃ varuṇasyeva vakṣasi /
GE07hv_apppu:23457: bhūyaś cainaṃ tadā bhrāmya varuṇāya nyapātayat // HV_App.I,42B.2181 //
GE07hv_apppu:23459: sa papāta punas tūrṇaṃ varuṇasyeha vakṣasi /
GE07hv_apppu:23460: [k: While, K4 Dn D1.2.6 ins. after line 2181:k]
GE07hv_apppu:23461: pātyamāne tadā tasmiñ śarīre varuṇas tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:23462: sa bhinnaḥ parigho ghoro devagātre vyaśīryata /
GE07hv_apppu:23463: śīryamāṇasya cūrṇāni khadyotā iva cāmbare // HV_App.I,42B.2183 //
GE07hv_apppu:23464: sa tu tena prahāreṇa cacāla salilādhipaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23466: sa sainyeṣv atha bhagneṣu bhinnadeheṣu cāhave /
GE07hv_apppu:23467: muhūrtam agamat kṣobham apāṃ patir amarṣaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2187 //
GE07hv_apppu:23470: sa sāgaraiś caturbhis tu vṛto dīptaiḥ sapannagaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23471: śaṅkhamuktāmaṇinibho bibhrat toyam ayaṃ vapuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2191 //
GE07hv_apppu:23474: varuṇas tu tadā kruddhas tān nirīkṣya svasainikān /
GE07hv_apppu:23475: uvāca hṛṣṭā yudhyadhvaṃ dānavānāṃ jighāṃsayā // HV_App.I,42B.2195 //
GE07hv_apppu:23477: aham enaṃ haniṣyāmi bhayaṃ muktvā tu yudhyata /
GE07hv_apppu:23479: jaghnur daityān raṇamukhe nadanto jayagṛddhinaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2197 //
GE07hv_apppu:23480: te tu nālīkanārācair gadābhiḥ parighair api /
GE07hv_apppu:23481: abhyaghnan dānavān dṛptān muditā varuṇānugāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2199 //
GE07hv_apppu:23485: ghātayām āsa samare garuḍaiḥ pannagāśanaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2203 //
GE07hv_apppu:23487: pannagān samare vīraḥ pramamātha sudurjayaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2205 //
GE07hv_apppu:23489: petur mathitasarvāṅgā gajā iva mahāgajaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2207 //
GE07hv_apppu:23491: abhyadhāvata saṃkruddhaḥ samare varuṇaḥ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2209 //
GE07hv_apppu:23493: taṃ dṛṣṭvā kruddham āyāntaṃ hantāraṃ dānavān bahūn /
GE07hv_apppu:23494: tatas tu dānavās tatra bhinnadehāḥ sahasraśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23495: vyathitā vidravanti sma diśo daśa vicetasaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23497: vinardamāno yuyudhe samare pāśabhṛd varaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2213 //
GE07hv_apppu:23500: tato 'straiś ca śilābhiś ca praharan sa balotkaṭaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23503: varuṇasya mahāvegān bibheda samare hayān // HV_App.I,42B.2219 //
GE07hv_apppu:23507: vāruṇīṃ tāṃ mahāsenāṃ nirmamantha mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2223 //
GE07hv_apppu:23510: [k: For line 2225, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:23512: [k: K4 Dn D1.2 ins. after line 2225:k]
GE07hv_apppu:23516: mahendraṃ śaraṇaṃ prāpto vipracitter bhayārditaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2227 //
GE07hv_apppu:23520: cakāra buddhiṃ daityānāṃ vadhe brahmarṣibhiḥ stutaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2229
GE07hv_apppu:23523: lohito lohitagrīvo hartā dātā haviḥ kaviḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23524: pāvako viśvabhug devaḥ sarvadevānanaḥ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2233 //
GE07hv_apppu:23526: kṛṣṇavartmā citrabhānur devāgryaś citra ekarāṭ // HV_App.I,42B.2235 //
GE07hv_apppu:23534: adhṛṣyaḥ pāvako bhūtir bhūtātmā vai svadhādhipaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2243 //
GE07hv_apppu:23539: udyamya divyam āgneyam astraṃ devo raṇe mahat /
GE07hv_apppu:23540: dānavāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi prayutāny arbudāni ca // HV_App.I,42B.2249 //
GE07hv_apppu:23541: dadāha bhagavān vahniḥ saṃkruddhaḥ pralaye yathā /
GE07hv_apppu:23542: [k: For line 2250, B1.3 Cal. ed. subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:23544: prāṇo yaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ hṛdi tiṣṭhati pañcadhā // HV_App.I,42B.2251 //
GE07hv_apppu:23545: yantā yaś ca hutāśasya sakhā ca prabhur īśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23546: prabhañjano yo lokānāṃ yugānte sarvanāśanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2253 //
GE07hv_apppu:23548: yo hy ākāśagato devo dūragaḥ śabdasaṃbhavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2255 //
GE07hv_apppu:23549: yaś ca kartā vikartā ca gatir gatimatāṃ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23550: devakartā samo loke brahmaṇā yaḥ sanātanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2257 //
GE07hv_apppu:23552: so 'gniṃ samīrayām āsa śamīgarbhaṃ samīraṇaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2259 //
GE07hv_apppu:23557: śoṇitodāṃ raṇe dṛṣṭvā saṃgrāmasaritaṃ vibhuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2264 //
GE07hv_apppu:23559: agnis tu sarvān ditijān prahrādapramukhāṃs tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:23560: parājayām āsa vibhuḥ krośamānān mahāhave // HV_App.I,42B.2267 //
GE07hv_apppu:23561: kecit pradīptair mukuṭaiḥ kecid dīptaiḥ śiroruhaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23562: kecit pradīptair vasanaiḥ kecid dīptair bhujānanaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2269
GE07hv_apppu:23564: kecit pradīptair vacanaiḥ kecic chatrair dhvajai rathaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23566: patākāś ca parāś cānye mukuteṣv aṅgadeṣu ca // HV_App.I,42B.2271 //
GE07hv_apppu:23567: sainyās te ca na dīpyante pāvakābhihatā raṇe /
GE07hv_apppu:23568: asurā bhayavitrastā vidrutāś ca diśo daśa // HV_App.I,42B.2273 //
GE07hv_apppu:23570: dagdhāṅgāḥ samare bhītāḥ pāvakena parājitāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2275 //
GE07hv_apppu:23571: na ca paśyanti te sarve rūpiṇaṃ dhvajinīmukhe /
GE07hv_apppu:23572: diśaḥ khaṃ gāṃ ca meghāṃś ca dīptān paśyanti dānavāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2277
GE07hv_apppu:23574: ity evaṃ dānavāḥ sarve menire trastacetasaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2279 //
GE07hv_apppu:23575: mayaś ca śambaraś caiva mahāmāyādharau tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:23577: tābhyāṃ vahniḥ sa māyābhyāṃ śāmyate vyutthitas tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:23581: ghanaiś ca vṛṣṭim adbhiś ca jalaughān bahuśas tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:23582: nīto vahnis tadā śāntiṃ mayena śambareṇa ca /
GE07hv_apppu:23583: toyaughaiḥ parvatanibhair mṛdvarcir abhavad raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.2283 //
