GE07hv_apppu:23956: āha brahmā mahātejā devānāṃ prabhur īśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2556 //
GE07hv_apppu:23959: yadartham iha saṃprāptā bhavantaḥ sarva eva hi /
GE07hv_apppu:23960: vijānāmy aham avyagram enam arthaṃ mahābalāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2558 //
GE07hv_apppu:23961: bhaviṣyati ca vaḥ so 'rthaḥ kāṅkṣito yaḥ surottamāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23962: baler dānavamukhyasya yo vai jetā bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,42B.2560 //
GE07hv_apppu:23963: na khalv asurasaṃghānām eko jetā sa viśvakṛt /
GE07hv_apppu:23964: [k: For line 2561, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:23966: trailokyasyāpi jetāsau devānām api cottamaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2562 //
GE07hv_apppu:23967: dhātā caiva hi lokānāṃ viśvayoniḥ sanātanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23969: yo mānyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yaś ca bhūtaḥ sanātanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23971: ātmā vai yena vibhunā kṛto 'jeyo mahātmanā /
GE07hv_apppu:23972: baler asuramukhyasya viśvasya jagatas tathā // HV_App.I,42B.2566 //
GE07hv_apppu:23974: paraṃ devasya viśvasya jagataḥ śāśvatas tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:23975: prabhavaḥ sa hi sarveṣām asmākam api pūrvajaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23976: acintyaḥ sa hi viśvātmā yogayuktaḥ paraṃ tapaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2568 //
GE07hv_apppu:23977: taṃ devāpi mahātmānaṃ na viduḥ ko 'py asāv iti /
GE07hv_apppu:23978: vedātmānaṃ ca viśvaṃ ca sa devaḥ puruṣottamaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2570 //
GE07hv_apppu:23979: tasyaiva tu prasādena tasya vakṣye parāṃ gatim /
GE07hv_apppu:23980: yatra yogaṃ samāsthāya tapaś carati duścaram // HV_App.I,42B.2572 //
GE07hv_apppu:23982: amṛtaṃ nāma paramaṃ sthānam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2574 //
GE07hv_apppu:23983: bhavantas tatra vai gatvā tapasā saṃśitavratāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23984: amṛtaṃ sthānam āsādya tapaś carata duścaram // HV_App.I,42B.2576 //
GE07hv_apppu:23992: amoghāṃ tasya devasya viśve devā mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2584 //
GE07hv_apppu:23995: atha yuṣmān harir brūyāt kim āgamanakāraṇam /
GE07hv_apppu:23997: kasya kaṃ vā varaṃ devā dadāmi varadaḥ sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2586 //
GE07hv_apppu:23998: taṃ kaśyapo 'ditiś caiva varaṃ gṛhṇīta vai tataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:23999: praṇamya śirasā pādau tasmai yogātmane tadā // HV_App.I,42B.2588 //
GE07hv_apppu:24000: bhagavān eva naḥ putro bhavatv iti na saṃśayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24001: uktaś ca parayā bhaktyā tathāstv iti sa vakṣyati // HV_App.I,42B.2590 //
GE07hv_apppu:24002: devā bruvantu te sarve bhrātā nas tvaṃ bhaveti ca /
GE07hv_apppu:24003: tathāstv iti ca sa śrīmān vakṣyate sarvalokakṛt // HV_App.I,42B.2592 //
GE07hv_apppu:24004: tasmād evaṃ gṛhītvā tu varaṃ tridaśasattamāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24005: kṛtakṛtyāḥ punaḥ sarve gacchadhvaṃ svaṃ svam ālayam // HV_App.I,42B.2594
GE07hv_apppu:24006: tathāstv iti surāḥ sarve kaśyapo 'ditir eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:24007: vanditvā brahmacaraṇau gatāḥ saumyāṃ diśaṃ prati // HV_App.I,42B.2596 //
GE07hv_apppu:24010: te 'tītya sāgarān sarvān parvatāṃś ca bahūn kṣaṇāt /
GE07hv_apppu:24011: nadīś ca vividhā divyāḥ pṛthivyāṃ surasattamāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2600 //
GE07hv_apppu:24013: abhāskarām amaryādāṃ tamasā saṃvṛtāṃ diśam // HV_App.I,42B.2602 //
GE07hv_apppu:24014: amṛtaṃ sthānam āsādya kaśyapena surāḥ saha /
GE07hv_apppu:24015: dīkṣitāḥ kāmadaṃ divyaṃ vrataṃ varṣasahasrakam // HV_App.I,42B.2604 //
GE07hv_apppu:24019: damena ca sūrāḥ sarve tapo duścaram āsthitāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2608 //
GE07hv_apppu:24021: udīrayati vedoktaṃ yam āhuḥ paramaṃ stavam // HV_App.I,42B.2610 //
GE07hv_apppu:24029: ||* namo 'stu te devadeva ekaśṛṅga varāha vṛṣārciṣa vṛṣasindho vṛṣākape suravṛṣabha suranirmita anirmita bhadra kapila viṣvaksena dhruvadharma dharmarāja vaikuṇṭha śatāvarta anādimadhyanidhana dhanaṃjaya śuciśravaḥ
GE07hv_apppu:24030: agnija vṛṣṇija aja ajaya amṛteśa sanātana vidhātaḥ trikāma tridhāma trikakut kukudmin duṃdubhe mahānābha lokanābha padmanābha viriñce variṣṭha bahurūpa virūpa viśvarūpa akṣaya akṣara satyākṣara haṃsākṣara havyabhuja khaṇḍaparaśo śukra muñjakeśa haṃsa mahadakṣara hṛṣīkeśa sūkṣma paramasūkṣma turāṣāṭ viśvamūrte surāgraja nīla nistama viraja tamorajaḥsattvadhāma sarvalokapratiṣṭha śipiviṣṭa sutapaḥ tapogra agra
GE07hv_apppu:24031: agraja dharmanābha gabhastinābha dharmaneme satyadhāma satyākṣara gabhastineme vipāpman candraratha tvam eva samudravāsī aja ekapāt sahasraśīrṣa sahasrasaṃmita mahāśīrṣa sahasradṛk sahasrapāt adhomukha mahāmukha mahāpuruṣa puruṣottama sahasrabāho sahasramūrte sahasrāsya sahasrākṣa sahasrabhuja sahasrabhuva sahasraśas tvām āhur vedāḥ *||
GE07hv_apppu:24032: ||* viśvadeva viśvasaṃbhava sarveṣām eva devānāṃ saubhaga ādau gatiḥ viśvaṃ tvam āpyāyanaḥ viśvaṃ tvām āhuḥ puṣpahāsa paramavaradas tvam eva tvam eva vauṣaṭ *||
GE07hv_apppu:24033: ||* oṃkāra vaṣaṭkāraṃ tvām ekam āhur agryaṃ makhabhāgaprāśinam *||
GE07hv_apppu:24034: ||* śatadhāra sahasradhāra bhūrda bhuvarda svarda bhūrbhuvaḥsvarda tvam eva bhūtaṃ bhuvanaṃ tvaṃ svadhā tvam eva brahmaśaya brahmamaya brahmādis tvam eva *||
GE07hv_apppu:24035: ||* dyaur asi pṛthivy asi pūṣāsi mātariśvāsi dharmo 'si maghavāsi hotā potā netā hantā mantā homyahotā parātparas tvaṃ homyahotā tvam eva *||
GE07hv_apppu:24036: ||* āpo 'si viśvavāk dhātrā parameṇa dhāmnā tvam eva digbhyaḥ sruk srugbhāṇḍa ijyo 'si īḍyo 'si tvaṣṭā tvam eva samiddhaḥ tvam eva gatir gatimatām asi mokṣo 'si yogo 'si guhyo 'si siddho 'si dhanyo 'si dhātāsi paramo 'si yajño 'si somo 'si yūpo 'si dakṣiṇāsi dīkṣāsi viśvam asi *||
GE07hv_apppu:24037: ||* sthaviṣṭha sthavira viśvaturāṣāṭ hiraṇyagarbha hiraṇyanābha hiraṇyanārāyaṇa nārāyaṇāntara nṛṇām ayana ādityavarṇa ādityatejaḥ
GE07hv_apppu:24038: mahāpuruṣa surottama ādideva padmanābha padmeśaya padmākṣa padmagarbha hiraṇyāgrakeśa śukla viśvadeva viśvatomukha viśvākṣa viśvasaṃbhava viśvabhuk tvam eva *||
GE07hv_apppu:24039: ||* bhūrivikrama cakrakrama tribhuvanasuvikrama svavikrama svarvikrama babhruḥ suvibhuḥ prabhākaraḥ śaṃbhuḥ svayaṃbhūś ca bhūtādiḥ bhūtātman mahābhūta viśvabhuk tvam eva viśvagoptāsi viśvaṃbhara pavitram asi havirviśārada haviḥkarmā amṛtendhana surāsuraguro mahādideva nṛdeva
GE07hv_apppu:24040: ūrdhvakarman pūtātman amṛteśa divaspṛk viśvasthapate ghṛtācy asi anantakarman druhiṇavaṃśa svavaṃśa viśvapās tvaṃ tvam eva viśvaṃ bibharṣi varārthino nas trāyasveti *||
GE07hv_apppu:24043: nārāyaṇas tu bhagavāñ śrutvemaṃ paramaṃ stavam /
GE07hv_apppu:24049: śrīmān prītamanā devaḥ provāca prabur īśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2617 //
GE07hv_apppu:24050: prīto 'smi vaḥ suraśreṣṭhāḥ sarve matto viniścayan /
GE07hv_apppu:24051: varaṃ vṛṇuta bhadraṃ vo varado 'smi surottamāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2619 //
GE07hv_apppu:24054: tadaiva kṛtakṛtyāḥ sma tvaṃ hi naḥ paramā gatiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2621 //
GE07hv_apppu:24055: yadi prasanno bhagavān dātavyo vā paro yadi /
GE07hv_apppu:24057: adityāṃ vai mama śrīmān bhagavān astu vai sutaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2624 //
GE07hv_apppu:24059: aditir devamātā ca etam evārtham uttamam /
GE07hv_apppu:24060: putrārthe varadaṃ prāha bhagavantaṃ varārthinī // HV_App.I,42B.2626 //
GE07hv_apppu:24061: yācate putrakāmā vai bhavān putro bhavatv iti /
GE07hv_apppu:24063: bhrātā bhartā ca dhātā ca śaraṇaṃ ca bhavasva naḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2629 //
GE07hv_apppu:24064: adityāḥ putratāṃ yāte tvayi devāḥ savāsavāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24067: tatas tān abravīd viṣṇur devān kaśyapam eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:24068: [k: Ñ2 V1.3 B Ds D3.6 G3.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24069: evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ vo yatheṣṭaṃ kāmam āpnuta /
GE07hv_apppu:24070: sarveṣām eva yuṣmākaṃ ye bhaviṣyanti śatravaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24071: muhūrtam api te sarve na sthāsyanti mamāgrataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2634 //
GE07hv_apppu:24073: parair mama sukhaṃ cāpi tat kariṣyāmi cādarāt //
GE07hv_apppu:24074: parituṣṭo 'smi vo devā mamaivaṃ niyamena ca /
GE07hv_apppu:24079: havyādāṃś ca surān sarvān kavyādāṃś ca pitṝn api // HV_App.I,42B.2637 //
GE07hv_apppu:24083: yathāmanīṣitaṃ kartā gacchadhvaṃ tvaṃ svam ālayam // HV_App.I,42B.2641 //
GE07hv_apppu:24084: evam ukte tu vacane viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā /
GE07hv_apppu:24086: viśve devā mahātmānaḥ kaśyapo 'ditir eva ca // HV_App.I,42B.2644 //
GE07hv_apppu:24087: [k: K1 Ñ2 V1.3 B Ds D3.4.5 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24088: sādhyā marudgaṇāś caiva śakraś caiva mahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24090: prayātāḥ prāgdiśaṃ divyaṃ vipulaṃ kaśyapāśramam // HV_App.I,42B.2646 //
GE07hv_apppu:24092: ceruḥ svādhyāyaniratā adityā garbham īpsavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2648 //
GE07hv_apppu:24103: pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu prasūtā garbham uttamam /
GE07hv_apppu:24104: surāṇāṃ śaraṇaṃ devam asurāṇāṃ vināśanam // HV_App.I,42B.2652 //
GE07hv_apppu:24105: garbhasthena tu devena paritrātāḥ surās tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:24107: tasmiñ jāte tu deveśe trailokyasya sukhāvahe /
GE07hv_apppu:24113: prajānāṃ patayaḥ sapta sapta caiva maharṣayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24114: tasya devasya jātasya namaskāraṃ pracakrire // HV_App.I,42B.2658 //
GE07hv_apppu:24119: marīcir aṅgirāś caiva pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24120: dakṣaḥ prajāpatiś caiva namaskāraṃ pracakrire // HV_App.I,42B.2664 //
GE07hv_apppu:24121: aurvo vasiṣṭhaputraś ca stambaḥ kaśyapa eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:24122: kapīvān akapīvāṃś ca datto niścyavanas tathā // HV_App.I,42B.2666 //
GE07hv_apppu:24124: hiraṇyagarbhasya sutāḥ aurvāj jātāḥ sutejasaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2668 //
GE07hv_apppu:24125: gārgyaḥ pṛthus tathaivāgryo yāmyo vāmana eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:24126: devabāhur yadudhraś ca parjanyaś caiva somajaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2670 //
GE07hv_apppu:24129: atināmā sahiṣṇuś ca namaskāram akurvata // HV_App.I,42B.2673 //
GE07hv_apppu:24131: upanṛtyanti deveśaṃ viṣṇum apsarasāṃ varāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2675 //
GE07hv_apppu:24133: bahubhiḥ saha gandharvaiḥ prāgāyata ca tumburuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2677 //
GE07hv_apppu:24135: gomāyuḥ sūryavarcāś ca somavarcāś ca saptamaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2679 //
GE07hv_apppu:24136: yugapas tṛṇapaḥ kārṣṇir nandiś citrarathas tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:24137: trayodaśaḥ śāliśirāḥ parjanyaś ca caturdaśa // HV_App.I,42B.2681 //
GE07hv_apppu:24138: kaliḥ pañcadaśaś cātra nāradaś caiva ṣoḍaśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24139: ṣaṭpañcāśad ime proktās tatraiva tu mahīpate // HV_App.I,42B.2683 //
GE07hv_apppu:24140: hāhā hūhūś ca gandharvau haṃsaś caiva mahādyutiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24143: sarve te devagandharvā upagāyanti keśavam // HV_App.I,42B.2685 //
GE07hv_apppu:24147: sumadhyāś cārumadhyāś ca priyamukhyo varānanāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2689 //
GE07hv_apppu:24148: anūkā ca tathā jāmī miśrakeśī alaṃbusā /
GE07hv_apppu:24150: adrikā lakṣmaṇā caiva rambhā tadvanmanoramā // HV_App.I,42B.2692 //
GE07hv_apppu:24151: asitā ca subāhuś ca supriyā subhagā tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:24152: urvaśī citralekhā ca sugrīvā ca sulocanā // HV_App.I,42B.2694 //
GE07hv_apppu:24155: nandā sarasvatī caiva tathānyās tatra saṃpadāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24156: puṇḍarīkā sugandhā ca surathā ca pramāthinī /
GE07hv_apppu:24157: nandā sārasvatī caiva tathānyās tatra saṃghaśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2696 //
GE07hv_apppu:24159: etāś cāpsaraso 'nyāś ca pranṛtyanti sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2698 //
GE07hv_apppu:24160: dhātāryamā ca mitraś ca varuṇo 'ṃśo bhagas tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:24161: indro vivasvān pūṣā ca tvaṣṭā ca savitā tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:24162: kathito viṣṇur ity evaṃ kāśyapeyo gaṇas tathā // HV_App.I,42B.2701 //
GE07hv_apppu:24164: cakrus tasya sureśasya namaskāraṃ mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2703 //
GE07hv_apppu:24165: mṛgavyādhaś ca sarpaś ca nirṛtiś ca mahāyaśāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24167: dahano 'atheśvaraś caiva kapālī ca viśāṃ pate /
GE07hv_apppu:24168: sthāṇur bhagaś ca bhagavān rudras tatrāvatasthire // HV_App.I,42B.2707 //
GE07hv_apppu:24170: stāṇuś ca bhagavān rudras tathā ekādaśāpare /
GE07hv_apppu:24171: aśvinau vasavaś cāṣṭau marutaś ca mahābalāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24172: viśvedevāś ca sādhyāś ca tasya prāñjalayaḥ sthitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24174: kacchapaś cāpahantā ca takṣakaś ca mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2711 //
GE07hv_apppu:24178: ete nāgā mahātmānas tasmai prāñjalayaḥ sthitāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2713 //
GE07hv_apppu:24180: ete cānye ca bahavo nāgās tasya mahātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24182: tārkṣyaś cāriṣṭanemiś ca garuḍaś ca mahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24183: aruṇaś cāruṇiś caiva vainateyā hy upasthitāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2715 //
GE07hv_apppu:24187: ṛṣayaḥ pitaraś caiva somapāś cāmbupāś ca ye //
GE07hv_apppu:24188: trailokyam adahat kṛtsnaṃ sādhyā ye ca tapodhanāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24190: pitāmahaś ca bhagavān svayam āgamya lokakṛt /
GE07hv_apppu:24193: prāha devaguruḥ śrīmān saha sarvair mahātmabhiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2717 //
GE07hv_apppu:24195: tasmāl lokeśvaraḥ śrīmān viṣṇur eva bhavatv ayam // HV_App.I,42B.2719 //
GE07hv_apppu:24196: evam uktvā tu bhagavān sārdhaṃ devarṣibhiḥ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24197: namas kṛtvā sureśāya jagāma tridivaṃ punaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2721 //
GE07hv_apppu:24198: sa tu jātaḥ sureśānaḥ kaśyapasyātmajaḥ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24201: utphullalocanāḥ sarvāḥ paśyanty apsarasas tadā // HV_App.I,42B.2725 //
GE07hv_apppu:24203: yadi bhāḥ sadṛśī sā syād bhāsas tasya mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2727 //
GE07hv_apppu:24207: yogasiddhaṃ mahātmānaṃ yaṃ vidur yogam uttamam // HV_App.I,42B.2731 //
GE07hv_apppu:24209: yaṃ prāpya śāśvataṃ viprā niyatā mokṣakāṅkṣiṇaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24212: yaṃ prāhuḥ śāśvataṃ divyaṃ gīyatāṃ mokṣakāñkṣiṇaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24213: janmato maraṇāc caiva mucyante bhavabhīravaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2734 //
GE07hv_apppu:24214: yad etat tapa ity āhuḥ sarvāśrayanivāsinaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24215: sevante yaṃ yatāhārā duścaraṃ vratam āsthitāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2736 //
GE07hv_apppu:24218: yo yajña iti viprendrair ijyate svargalipsubhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24219: nānāsthānagataḥ śrīmān ekaḥ kavir anuttamaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2740 //
GE07hv_apppu:24222: sa prāha tridaśān sarvān vācā vai parayā vibhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24223: jānann api mahātejā gato yogena bālatām // HV_App.I,42B.2744 //
GE07hv_apppu:24224: kiṃ karomi suraśreṣṭhāḥ kaṃ varaṃ ca dadāmi vaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24225: yat kāṅkṣitaṃ vaḥ sarveṣāṃ tad vai brūta mudā yutāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2746
GE07hv_apppu:24226: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā vāmanasya mahātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24228: ūcuḥ prāñjalayo viṣṇuṃ surāḥ śakrapurogamāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2749 //
GE07hv_apppu:24229: brahmaṇo varadānena hṛtaṃ no nikhilaṃ jagat /
GE07hv_apppu:24230: tapasā mahatā caiva vikrameṇa damena ca // HV_App.I,42B.2751 //
GE07hv_apppu:24232: avadhyaḥ kila sarveśāṃ so 'smākaṃ devasattama // HV_App.I,42B.2753 //
GE07hv_apppu:24233: bhavān prabhavate tasya nānyaḥ kaścana suvrata /
GE07hv_apppu:24236: ṛṣīṇāṃ ca hitārthāya lokānāṃ ca sureśvara // HV_App.I,42B.2757 //
GE07hv_apppu:24237: priyārthaṃ ca tathādityāḥ kaśyapasya tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,42B.2758 //
GE07hv_apppu:24238: kavyaṃ pitṝṇām ucitaṃ surāṇāṃ havyam uttamam /
GE07hv_apppu:24240: asmākaṃ ca hitārthāya trailokyasya ca sattama /
GE07hv_apppu:24243: priyahetor adityāś ca kāśyapasya tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:24245: pratyānaya mahendrasya trailokyam idam avyayam // HV_App.I,42B.2762 //
GE07hv_apppu:24246: kratunā vājimeghena yajate sa hi dānavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24249: asmin sthāne tu te nātha trailokyasya gataiḥ saha /
GE07hv_apppu:24250: yat pratyānayane yuktaṃ lokānāṃ tad vicintaya // HV_App.I,42B.2764 //
GE07hv_apppu:24251: evam uktas tadā devair viṣṇur vāmanarūpadhṛk /
GE07hv_apppu:24252: praharṣayann uvācātha sarvān devān idaṃ vacaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2766 //
GE07hv_apppu:24257: tato bṛhaspatiḥ śrīmān anayad vāmanaṃ prabhum /
GE07hv_apppu:24259: mauñjī yajñopavītī ca chatrī daṇḍī dhvajī tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:24263: praviśann eva sa śrīmān yajñavāṭaṃ sureśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24264: ātmānam eva bhagavān varṇayām āsa taṃ kratum // HV_App.I,42B.2776 //
GE07hv_apppu:24279: ārād atha bales tasya ṛtvijām abhitas tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:24280: yajñam ātmānam evāsau hetubhiḥ kāraṇair vibhuḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:24281: vaidikair aprakāśaiś ca punar apy atha bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:24283: tato niruttarān dṛṣṭvā sopādhyāyān ṛṣīṃś ca tān /
GE07hv_apppu:24285: adbhutaṃ cāpi mene sa virocanasuto balī /
GE07hv_apppu:24286: mūrdhnā kṛtāñjaliś cedam abravīd dhṛṣṭavad vacaḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:24287: kutas tvaṃ ko 'si kasyāsi kiṃ cehāsti prayojanam /
GE07hv_apppu:24291: nedṛśāḥ santi devānām ṛṣīṇām api sūnavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24292: na nāgānāṃ na yakṣāṇāṃ nāsurāṇāṃ na rakṣasām //
GE07hv_apppu:24293: na pitṝnāṃ na siddhānāṃ gandharvāṇāṃ tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:24294: yo 'si so 'si namaste 'stu brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te //
GE07hv_apppu:24295: ukta evaṃ hy acintyātmā balinā vāmanas tadā /
GE07hv_apppu:24300: viśeṣitās tvayā yajñā dānavendra mahābala // HV_App.I,42B.2780 //
GE07hv_apppu:24304: kratūnāṃ pravaraḥ śrīmān aśvamedha iti smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2784 //
GE07hv_apppu:24308: sa viśvayoniḥ paramo hi medhyaḥ || HV_App.I,42B.2788 ||
GE07hv_apppu:24311: yam āhur vai vedavido dvijendrā @ HV_App.I,42B.2791 @
GE07hv_apppu:24317: etac chrutvā tu daityendro vāmanena samīritam /
GE07hv_apppu:24318: mudā paramayā yuktaḥ prāha daityapatir baliḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2798 //
GE07hv_apppu:24319: kasyāsi brāhmaṇaśreṣṭha kim icchasi dadāmi te /
GE07hv_apppu:24320: varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te yatheṣṭaṃ kāmam āpnuhi // HV_App.I,42B.2800 //
GE07hv_apppu:24322: na rājyaṃ na ca yānāni na ratnāni na ca striyaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24323: kāmaye yadi tuṣṭo 'si dharme ca yadi te matiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2802 //
GE07hv_apppu:24324: gurvarthaṃ me grayacchasva padāni trīṇi dānava /
GE07hv_apppu:24325: tvam agniśaraṇārthāya eṣa me paramo varaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2804 //
GE07hv_apppu:24327: vāmanasya vacaḥ śrutvā prāha daityapatir baliḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24328: [k: While D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. after line 2804 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24332: tribhiḥ kiṃ tava viprendra padaiḥ pravadatāṃ vara /
GE07hv_apppu:24333: śataṃ śatasahasrāṇāṃ padānāṃ mārgatāṃ bhavān // HV_App.I,42B.2806 //
GE07hv_apppu:24335: mā dadasva mahābāho na taṃ vetsi mahāsura /
GE07hv_apppu:24336: eṣa māyāpraticchanno bhagavān pravaro hariḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2808 //
GE07hv_apppu:24338: tvāṃ vañcayitum āyāto baṭurūpadharo vibhuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2810 //
GE07hv_apppu:24339: evam uktaḥ sa śukreṇa ciraṃ saṃcintya vai baliḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24341: balir dānavarājas tu avajñāya tu tad vacaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24342: praharṣeṇa samāyuktaḥ kiṃ ataḥ pātram iṣyate // HV_App.I,42B.2812 //
GE07hv_apppu:24343: gṛhya haste tv asaṃbhrānto bhṛṅgāraṃ kanakāmayam /
GE07hv_apppu:24345: viprendra prāṅmukhas tiṣṭha sthito 'si kamalekṣaṇa // HV_App.I,42B.2814 //
GE07hv_apppu:24346: pratīccha dehi kiṃ bhūmiṃ kiṃmātrā bhoḥ padatrayam /
GE07hv_apppu:24347: dattaṃ vaḥ pātaya jalaṃ naiva mithyā bhaved guruḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2816 //
GE07hv_apppu:24349: bho na deyaṃ kuto daitya vijñāto 'yaṃ yathā dhruvam /
GE07hv_apppu:24350: ko 'yaṃ viṣṇur aho prītir vañcitas tvaṃ na vañcitaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2818
GE07hv_apppu:24352: kathaṃ sa nātho 'yaṃ viṣṇur yajñe svayam upasthitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24353: dāsyāmi devadevāya yad yad icchaty ayaṃ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2820 //
GE07hv_apppu:24354: ko vānyaḥ pātrabhūto 'smād viṣṇoḥ parataraṃ bhavet /
GE07hv_apppu:24355: evam uktvā baliḥ śīghraṃ pātayām āsa vai jalam // HV_App.I,42B.2822 //
GE07hv_apppu:24358: yan mayā pūrvam uktaṃ hi tat tathā na tad anyathā // HV_App.I,42B.2824 //
GE07hv_apppu:24359: [k: After line 2824, K1 Ñ2 V1.3 B Dn Ds D4.6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24361: ity etad vacanaṃ śrutvā vāmanasya mahaujasaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24363: evam astv iti daityeśo vākyam uktvārisūdanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24365: vāmano hy asurendrasya cikīrṣuḥ kadanaṃ mahat /
GE07hv_apppu:24367: prāṅmukhaś cāpi daityeśas tasmai sumanasā jalam /
GE07hv_apppu:24368: dātukāmaḥ kare yāvat tāvat taṃ pratyabodhayat //
GE07hv_apppu:24371: iṅgitajño 'grataḥ sthitvā prahrādas tv abravīd vacaḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:24373: mā dadasva jalaṃ haste baṭor vāmanarūpiṇaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24374: sa tv asau yena te pūrvaṃ nihataḥ prapitāmahaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24375: viṣṇur eva mahāprājñas tvāṃ vañcayitum āgataḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:24382: devāya pradadau tasmai padāni trīṇi viṣṇave //
GE07hv_apppu:24384: dānaveśvara mā dās tvaṃ viprāyāsmai pratigraham /
GE07hv_apppu:24385: nainaṃ vipraśiśuṃ manye nedṛśo bhavati dvijaḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:24386: rūpeṇānena daityendra satyam etad bravīmi te /
GE07hv_apppu:24387: nārasiṃham ahaṃ manye tam eva punar āgatam //
GE07hv_apppu:24389: prahrādam abravīd vākyam idaṃ nirbhartsayann iva //
GE07hv_apppu:24391: dehīti yācate yo hi pratyākhyāti ca yo 'sura /
GE07hv_apppu:24392: ubhayor apy alakṣyā vai bhāgas taṃ viśate naram //
GE07hv_apppu:24393: pratijñāya tu yo vipre na dadāti pratigraham /
GE07hv_apppu:24396: pratigrahītā cāpy anyaḥ kaścid asmād dvijo 'tha vai //
GE07hv_apppu:24397: nādhiko vidyate yasmāt tad dadāmi vasuṃdharām /
GE07hv_apppu:24398: hṛdayasya ca me tuṣṭiḥ parā bhavati dānava //
GE07hv_apppu:24400: eṣa tasmāt pradāsyāmi na sthāsyāmi nivāritaḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:24401: bhūyaś ca prābravīd enaṃ vāmanaṃ baṭurūpiṇam /
GE07hv_apppu:24403: svalpaiḥ svalpamate kiṃ te padais tribhir anuttamam /
GE07hv_apppu:24404: kṛtsnāṃ dadāmi te vipra pṛthivīṃ sāgarair vṛtām //
GE07hv_apppu:24406: na pṛthvīṃ kāmaye kṛtsnāṃ saṃtuṣṭo 'smi padais tribhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24407: eṣa eva ruciṣyo me varo dānavasattama /
GE07hv_apppu:24409: kṛtvārdhaṃ tanu siṃhasya narasyaiva paraṃ tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:24413: eka eva asau devaḥ kāryārthe bahutāṃ gataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24414: āpo bhūḥ khaṃ sarṣigaṇā devā jyotir gaṇādayaḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:24416: yad aṃśabhūtāḥ sarve te sa eva punar āgataḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:24417: ātmānaṃ baṭum āsthāya yayāca tvāṃ sureśvara /
GE07hv_apppu:24418: na deyaṃ hi na deyaṃ hi iti me niścitā matiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24420: sa kathaṃ yācate māṃ tu baṭur bhūtvā hariḥ svayam /
GE07hv_apppu:24421: padāni trīṇi daityendra yajñavāṭe tataḥ punaḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:24422: na vidyate sukṛtaṃ tāta yena sa dṛṣṭim āgataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24423: yaṃ dhyāyanti ca manasā yogino niyame sthitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24424: brahmadevo bhavaś caiva yaṃ na paśyati cakṣuṣā //
GE07hv_apppu:24425: niyamena vinā tāta bhaktyā vā bhajatā mayi /
GE07hv_apppu:24426: īdṛśo yadi so bhūtaḥ ataḥ para karomi kim /
GE07hv_apppu:24427: [k: After line 36 of *196, T1.2 G1.3.5 M2.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24429: kartavyaṃ naitad ity evaṃ māyeyaṃ prāyikī nṛpa //
GE07hv_apppu:24430: balir dānavarājas tu avajñāya ca tad vacaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24432: tathāstv iti baliḥ procya sparśayām āsa dānavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24434: kampayāmy aśayām āsa tujena hṛdayena ca (?) /
GE07hv_apppu:24437: dadau ca sodakaṃ daityo vāmanāya jagatpatiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24439: toye tu patite haste vāmano 'bhūd avāmanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24440: sarvadevamayaṃ rūpaṃ darśayām āsa vai prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2828 //
GE07hv_apppu:24441: bhūḥ pādau dyauḥ śiraś cāsya candrādityau ca cakṣuṣī /
GE07hv_apppu:24442: pādāṅgulyaḥ piśācāś ca hastāṅgulyaś ca guhyakāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2830 //
GE07hv_apppu:24443: viśvedevāś ca jānusthā jaṅghe sādhyāḥ surottamāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24444: yakṣā nakheṣu saṃbhūtā lekhāś cāpsarasas tathā // HV_App.I,42B.2832 //
GE07hv_apppu:24445: dṛṣṭir dhiṣṇyāni vipulāḥ keśāḥ sūryāṃśavas tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:24446: tārakā lomakūpāni lomāni ca maharṣayaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2834 //
GE07hv_apppu:24447: bāhavo vidiśaś cāsya diśaḥ śrotraṃ tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:24448: aśvinau śravaṇau cāsya nāsā vāyur mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2836 //
GE07hv_apppu:24449: prasādaś candramāś caiva mano dharmas tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:24450: satyam asyābhavad vāṇī jihvā devī sarasvatī // HV_App.I,42B.2838 //
GE07hv_apppu:24451: grīvāditir mahādevī tāluḥ sūryaś ca dīptamān /
GE07hv_apppu:24452: dvāraṃ svargasya nābhir vai mitras tvaṣṭā ca vai bhruvau //
GE07hv_apppu:24453: mukhaṃ vaiśvānaraś cāsya vṛṣaṇau tu prajāpatiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24454: hṛdayaṃ bhagavān brahmā puṃstvaṃ vai kaśyapo muniḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2842 //
GE07hv_apppu:24456: sarvacchandāṃsi daśanā jyotīṃṣi vimalāḥ prabhāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2844 //
GE07hv_apppu:24457: uro rudro mahādevo dhairyaṃ cāsya mahārṇavaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24458: udaraṃ cāsya gandharvā bhujagāś ca mahābalāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2846 //
GE07hv_apppu:24459: lakṣmīr medhā dhṛtiḥ kāntiḥ sarvavidyāś ca vai kaṭiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24460: lalāṭam asya paramaṃ svasthānaṃ paramātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2848 //
GE07hv_apppu:24461: sarvajyotīṃṣi yānīha tapaḥ śakras tu devarāṭ /
GE07hv_apppu:24462: tasya devādhidevasya tejaś cāsīn mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2850 //
GE07hv_apppu:24463: stanau kakṣau ca vedāś ca oṣṭhau cāsya makhāḥ sthitāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24464: iṣṭayaḥ paśubandhāś ca dvijānāṃ ceṣṭitāni ca // HV_App.I,42B.2852 //
GE07hv_apppu:24465: tasya devamayaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā viṣṇor mahāsurāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24466: abhisarpanti saṃkruddhāḥ pataṃgā iva pāvakam // HV_App.I,42B.2854 //
GE07hv_apppu:24468: śṛṇu nāmāni sarveṣāṃ rūpāṇy abhijanāni ca /
GE07hv_apppu:24469: [k: Before line 2855, D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24475: jaya viśva prabho viṣṇo jaya vāmana mādhava //
GE07hv_apppu:24485: natāḥ sma taṃ jagatāṃ patim ādibhūtam ||
GE07hv_apppu:24486: namo namo jagannātha viṣṇo deva jagatpate /
GE07hv_apppu:24487: tvām eva vividhā vedā vadanti brahma śāśvatam //
GE07hv_apppu:24488: jaya deva hare kṛṣṇa jaya vāmana pāvana /
GE07hv_apppu:24489: tvayy eva sakalaṃ lokaṃ paśyāmo jagatīpate //
GE07hv_apppu:24497: tatra nāgāḥ parivṛtāḥ samānarcuḥ padaṃ mahat //
GE07hv_apppu:24500: yābhyāṃ sahasram anye tu vāruṇīṃ ca tathāpare /
GE07hv_apppu:24502: antarā ca sahasrāṇi bāhūnāṃ yānti cakriṇaḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:24503: kecic chaṅkhaṃ samādaghmuḥ kecic chārṅgaṃ vicikṣipuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24505: anye parighasaktāḥ syur itare pāśino bhavan /
GE07hv_apppu:24516: [k: After line 18a of *199, T2 G1-2.4 M2.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24518: tyayy eva sakalaṃ lokaṃ paśyāmo jagatīpate //
GE07hv_apppu:24522: āyudhāni ca mukhyāni dānavānāṃ mahātmanām // HV_App.I,42B.2856 //
GE07hv_apppu:24523: vipracittiḥ śibiḥ śaṅkur ayaḥśaṅkus tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:24524: ayaḥśirā aśvaśirā hayagrīvaś ca vīryavān // HV_App.I,42B.2858 //
GE07hv_apppu:24526: puṣkaraḥ puṣkalaś caiva sāśvo 'śvapatir eva ca // HV_App.I,42B.2860 //
GE07hv_apppu:24530: niṣprabhaḥ suprabhaḥ śrīmāṃs tathaiva ca nirūdaraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2864 //
GE07hv_apppu:24534: śarabhaḥ śalabhaś caiva kuṇapaḥ kulapaḥ krathaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2866 //
GE07hv_apppu:24537: vāyur gaviṣṭho namuciḥ śambaro vikṣaro mahān /
GE07hv_apppu:24538: candrahantā krodhahantā krodhavardhana eva ca // HV_App.I,42B.2870 //
GE07hv_apppu:24539: kālakaḥ kālakākṣaś ca vṛtraḥ krodho vimokṣaṇaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24540: gaviṣṭhaś ca haviṣṭhaś ca pralambo narakaḥ pṛthuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2872 //
GE07hv_apppu:24542: asilomā pulomā ca bāṣkalaḥ pramado madaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2874 //
GE07hv_apppu:24543: śṛgālavadanaś caiva karālaḥ keśir eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:24544: ekākṣaś ca varāhaś ca tuhuṇḍaḥ sṛmalaḥ sṛpaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2876 //
GE07hv_apppu:24545: ete cānye ca bahavaḥ kramamāṇaṃ trivikramam /
GE07hv_apppu:24546: upatasthur mahātmānaṃ viṣṇuṃ daityagaṇās tadā // HV_App.I,42B.2878 //
GE07hv_apppu:24555: [k: Ñ2 V1 B Ds2 T1.2 G1.4-5 M2.4 ins. after line 2884, Ñ1 Dn D3 after line 2885 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24563: mārjāraśukavaktrāś ca dīrghavaktrāś ca dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2891 //
GE07hv_apppu:24565: aśvavaktrā babhruvaktrā ghorā mṛgamukhās tathā // HV_App.I,42B.2893 //
GE07hv_apppu:24566: [k: Ds ins. after line 2893; V1.3 Cal. ed. after line 2895:k]
GE07hv_apppu:24594: kuntaiḥ kuṭhāraiḥ parighair asibhis tomaraiḥ śaraiḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:24595: bāhubhir muṣṭibhiś caiva talair dantair nakhais tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:24596: yathāśakti yathāyogaṃ kuryur yuddhaṃ hi dānavāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24599: jahāra tridivaṃ devas tribhir vikramaṇair hariḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24600: [k: On the other hand, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. after line 2907 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24601: daityendrān sa samāgatya bāhubhiś ca tathā parān /
GE07hv_apppu:24603: rūpaṃ kṛtvā mahākāyaṃ jahārāśu sa medinīm // HV_App.I,42B.2908 //
GE07hv_apppu:24609: viṣṇor amitavīryasya vadanty evaṃ dvijātayaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2912 //
GE07hv_apppu:24611: dadau śakrāya vasudhāṃ harir lokanamaskṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2914 //
GE07hv_apppu:24614: prītas tasmai sureśāya dadau viṣṇur urukramaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24616: baler dattaṃ bhagavatā viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā // HV_App.I,42B.2916 //
GE07hv_apppu:24619: tatrasthaś ca mahātejā dhyānaṃ paramam āsthitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24621: kiṃ mayā deva kartavyaṃ brūhi sarvam aśeṣataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2921 //
GE07hv_apppu:24622: [k: After line 2921a, D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24625: [k: After line 2921, Ñ2 V3 T1 G4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24626: tato daityādhipaṃ prāha devo viṣṇuḥ surottamaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24629: varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te yatheṣṭaṃ kāmam āpnuhi // HV_App.I,42B.2923 //
GE07hv_apppu:24630: [k: Ñ1 ins. after line 2923, B1.3 Ds subst. for line 2926:k]
GE07hv_apppu:24631: evam uktvā tato viṣṇur atha bhūyo 'surādhipam /
GE07hv_apppu:24632: mā ca śakrasya vacanaṃ pratihāsīḥ kathaṃcana /
GE07hv_apppu:24633: aham ājñāpayāmi tvāṃ śreyaś caivam avāpsyasi // HV_App.I,42B.2925 //
GE07hv_apppu:24635: evam uktvā tadā viṣṇu+ narekaśaḥ surādhipam /
GE07hv_apppu:24638: vācā paramayā devo vareṇyaḥ prabhur īśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2927 //
GE07hv_apppu:24639: yat tvayā salilaṃ dattaṃ gṛhītaṃ pāṇinā mayā /
GE07hv_apppu:24640: tasmāt te daitya devebhyo nāsti jātu bhayaṃ kvacit // HV_App.I,42B.2929 //
GE07hv_apppu:24642: te tasmin parituṣṭiś ca varaṃ caitac chṛṇuṣva me /
GE07hv_apppu:24644: [k: T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. after line 2929 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24645: amaratvaṃ hi bhavato nāsti mṛtyuḥ pitus tava /
GE07hv_apppu:24646: dhyāhi māṃ satataṃ daitya matkathāparamo bhava /
GE07hv_apppu:24647: sutalaṃ nāma pātālaṃ tatra tvaṃ sānugo vasa /
GE07hv_apppu:24651: devatāś cāpi te sarvāḥ pūjyā eva mahāsura // HV_App.I,42B.2934 //
GE07hv_apppu:24654: prāpsyase ca mahābhāga divyān kāmān yathepsitān /
GE07hv_apppu:24655: iha cāmutra cākṣayyān vividhāṃś ca paricchadān // HV_App.I,42B.2936 //
GE07hv_apppu:24657: bhogāṃś ca vividhān samyag yajñāṃś ca sahadakṣiṇān // HV_App.I,42B.2938 //
GE07hv_apppu:24658: yadā caitāṃ mayā proktāṃ maryādāṃ cālayiṣyasi /
GE07hv_apppu:24659: bandhiṣyanti tadā hi tvāṃ nāgapāśā mahābalāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2940 //
GE07hv_apppu:24660: namaskāryāś ca te nityaṃ mahendrādyā divaukasaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24661: mama jyeṣṭhaḥ suraśreṣṭhaḥ śāsanaṃ pratigṛhyatām // HV_App.I,42B.2942 //
GE07hv_apppu:24666: namas karomi deveśaṃ tvāṃ sadā jagatīpate /
GE07hv_apppu:24667: tvam eva mama govinda śaraṇaṃ nānya eva hi //
GE07hv_apppu:24668: cintayāmi jagannātha tvām eva satataṃ hare /
GE07hv_apppu:24669: idaṃ mama hare viṣṇo vadasvādya hitaṃ vibho /
GE07hv_apppu:24670: tatrāsato me pātāle bhāgaṃ brūhi surottama // HV_App.I,42B.2945 //
GE07hv_apppu:24672: kathaṃ tatra mayā stheyaṃ vibudhānāṃ maheśvara /
GE07hv_apppu:24674: tad vadasva suraśreṣṭha tṛptir yena mamākṣayā // HV_App.I,42B.2947 //
GE07hv_apppu:24679: ete pradattās tava daitya bhāgāḥ || HV_App.I,42B.2951 ||
GE07hv_apppu:24680: puṇyaṃ maddveṣiṇāṃ yac ca madbhaktadveṣiṇāṃ tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:24682: kathāsu mama daityendra kathyamānāsu yatra ha /
GE07hv_apppu:24683: aśṛṇvan yo naro gacchet tasya saṃvatsarārjitam /
GE07hv_apppu:24684: yatnena mahatā vāpi tava sarvaṃ bhaviṣyati //
GE07hv_apppu:24685: aśuśrūṣur hared vidyāṃ sā tavāstu bale parā //
GE07hv_apppu:24686: śudrānnam aśnatām yeṣāṃ puṇyaṃ yac cārjitaṃ mahat /
GE07hv_apppu:24688: vedoktaṃ yat parityajya dharmam anyaṃ prakurvataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24690: aśraddhayā ca yad dānaṃ dadatām yajatāṃ yathā /
GE07hv_apppu:24691: tat sarvaṃ tava daityendra matprasādād bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,42B.2955 //
GE07hv_apppu:24693: śaradṛtau dinaikaṃ ca rājyaṃ tava bhaviṣyati /
GE07hv_apppu:24698: etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ balir viṣṇor mahātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24701: evam astv iti taṃ proktvā pātālam asuro gataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24704: cintayām āsa bhagavān pravibhāgaṃ jite(?)s tadā //
GE07hv_apppu:24705: atha cintayatas tasya devā brahmādayo nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:24706: te gatā jatvare(?) cainaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahādyutim /
GE07hv_apppu:24708: pātālaṃ pātito divyā nigṛhāṇaṃ ca te kṣayāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24712: indro madhurayā vācā pālyatāṃ tridivaṃ punaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24714: [k: Ñ2 B Ds D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24719: jāmbavān atha tac chrutvā bherīṃ saṃnādayan bahu /
GE07hv_apppu:24721: devāḥ svasthānam āyantu daityāḥ sarve hatāśrayāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24722: na bhayaṃ vidyate kiṃcij jitaṃ bhagavatā jagat //
GE07hv_apppu:24728: sadā vedā hy adhīyantāṃ śīghraṃ nākaṃ prapadyatām /
GE07hv_apppu:24729: brāhmaṇāḥ svasti vo nityaṃ na bhayaṃ vidyate kvacit /
GE07hv_apppu:24731: ity uktvā jāmbavān ṛkṣaḥ sthito meroś ca mastake /
GE07hv_apppu:24732: samāghnan bahuśas tūryam ājñayā keśavasya hi //
GE07hv_apppu:24733: tasya bherīravaṃ sarvaṃ jagad vikṣobhya saṃsthitam /
GE07hv_apppu:24734: pṛthivīm antarikṣaṃ ca pātālaṃ ca samaspṛśat //
GE07hv_apppu:24739: bhagavān api rājyānāṃ pravibhāgaṃ cakāra ha /
GE07hv_apppu:24740: dadau pūrvāṃ diśaṃ caindrīṃ śakrāyāmitatejase // HV_App.I,42B.2960 //
GE07hv_apppu:24741: yāmyāṃ yamāya devāya pitṛrājñe mahātmane // HV_App.I,42B.2961 //
GE07hv_apppu:24742: paścimām tu diśaṃ prādād varuṇāya mahātmane /
GE07hv_apppu:24744: aghastān nāgarājāya somāyordhvāṃ diśaṃ dadau // HV_App.I,42B.2964 //
GE07hv_apppu:24745: evaṃ vibhajya trailokyaṃ viṣṇur balavatāṃ varaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24748: [k: V1.3 B1.3 Ds D6 ins. after line 2965:k]
GE07hv_apppu:24750: [k: T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. after line 2965 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24751: akṣayaṃ cāmṛtatvaṃ ca dadau jāmbavate hariḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24755: nāradena jagannāthaḥ stūto devaiś ca pūjitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24759: iti te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ vāmanatvaṃ yathāgatam /
GE07hv_apppu:24760: hariḥ sarveśvaro viṣṇuḥ prāptaṃ devair yathā divam /
GE07hv_apppu:24762: sarve mumudire devāḥ puraskṛtya śatakratum // HV_App.I,42B.2969 //
GE07hv_apppu:24763: gate tu tridivaṃ kṛṣṇe badhvā vairocaniṃ balim /
GE07hv_apppu:24768: uvāca dānavaśreṣṭhaṃ mokṣopāyaṃ dadāmi te // HV_App.I,42B.2975 //
GE07hv_apppu:24772: tadgatas tanmanā bhūtvā drutaṃ mokṣam avāpsyasi // HV_App.I,42B.2979 //
GE07hv_apppu:24775: tam adhītya stavaṃ divyaṃ nāradena samīritam /
GE07hv_apppu:24776: pṛthivī coddhṛtā yena taṃ jajāpa mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2983 //
GE07hv_apppu:24779: saptasūryavapuḥ kṛtvā trīṃl lokān krāntavān asi /
GE07hv_apppu:24780: bhagavan kālakālas tvaṃ tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.2987 //
GE07hv_apppu:24782: punaś cintayase lokāṃs tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.2989 //
GE07hv_apppu:24784: tvatsthā dṛṣṭā dvijendreṇa tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.2991 //
GE07hv_apppu:24786: carācaragataṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.2993 //
GE07hv_apppu:24787: eko vidyāsahāyas tvaṃ yogī yogam upāgataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24788: punas trailokyam utsṛjya tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.2995 //
GE07hv_apppu:24790: lokāṃś cintayase bhūyas tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.2997 //
GE07hv_apppu:24792: dharā jaloddhṛtā yena tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.2999 //
GE07hv_apppu:24793: uddhṛtya daṃṣṭrayā yajñāṃs tripiṇḍān kṛtavān asi /
GE07hv_apppu:24795: tvaṃ pitṝṇām api hare tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3001 //
GE07hv_apppu:24797: paritrātās tvayā deva tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3003 //
GE07hv_apppu:24799: śiro jahāra cakreṇa tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3005 //
GE07hv_apppu:24801: huṃkāreṇa hato daityas tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3007 //
GE07hv_apppu:24802: dānavābhyāṃ hṛtā vedā brahmaṇaḥ paśyataḥ purā /
GE07hv_apppu:24803: paritrātās tvayā deva tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3009 //
GE07hv_apppu:24805: brahmaṇe te 'rpitā vedās tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3011 //
GE07hv_apppu:24807: antaṃ tava na paśyanti tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3013 //
GE07hv_apppu:24808: apāntaratamā nāma jāto devasya vai sutaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24809: kṛtāś ca tena vedārthās tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3015 //
GE07hv_apppu:24811: rahasyaṃ tava devasya tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3017 //
GE07hv_apppu:24813: tvatprasādāc ca cakṣuṣmāṃs tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3019 //
GE07hv_apppu:24814: grāhagrastaṃ gajendraṃ ca dīnaṃ mṛtyuvaśaṃ gatam /
GE07hv_apppu:24815: bhaktaṃ mokṣitavāṃs tvaṃ hi tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3021 //
GE07hv_apppu:24816: akṣayaś cāvyayaś ca tvaṃ brahmaṇyo bhaktavatsalaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24817: ucchritānāṃ niyantāsi tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3023 //
GE07hv_apppu:24818: śaṅkhaṃ cakraṃ gadāṃ padmaṃ śārṅgaṃ garuḍam eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:24819: prasādayāmi śirasā te bandhān mokṣayantu mām // HV_App.I,42B.3025 //
GE07hv_apppu:24821: hariṃ prasādayām āsur baliṃ mokṣaya bandhanāt // HV_App.I,42B.3027 //
GE07hv_apppu:24823: garuḍaṃ nāgahantāraṃ baliṃ mokṣaya bandhanāt // HV_App.I,42B.3029 //
GE07hv_apppu:24825: jagāma vasudhāmūlaṃ yatrāste saṃyato baliḥ // HV_App.I,42B.3031 //
GE07hv_apppu:24826: āgamaṃ tasya vijñāya nāgā muktvā mahāsuram /
GE07hv_apppu:24830: dānavendra mahābāho viṣṇus tvām abravīt prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24832: itasvayā na gantavyaṃ gavyūtim api dānava /
GE07hv_apppu:24833: samayaṃ yadi bhindyās tvaṃ mūrdhā te śatadhā vrajet // HV_App.I,42B.3039
GE07hv_apppu:24835: sthito 'smi samaye tasya anantasya mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.3041 //
GE07hv_apppu:24836: jīvyopāyaṃ tu bhagavān mama kiṃcit karotu saḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24838: bales tu vacanaṃ śrutvā garutmān idam abravit /
GE07hv_apppu:24839: pūrvam eva kṛtas tena jīvyopāyo mahātmanā // HV_App.I,42B.3045 //
GE07hv_apppu:24840: pravartiṣyanti ye yajñā vidhihīnā hy anṛtvijaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24841: prāyaścittam ajānanto yajñabhāgas tatas tava // HV_App.I,42B.3047 //
GE07hv_apppu:24842: na teṣāṃ yajñabhāgaṃ vai pratigṛhṇanti devatāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24847: yaḥ paṭheta naro bhaktyā tasya naśyati kilbiṣam // HV_App.I,42B.3053 //
GE07hv_apppu:24849: aputro labhate putraṃ kanyā caivepsitaṃ patim /
GE07hv_apppu:24850: lagnagarbhāt pramucyeta garbhiṇī janayet sutam // HV_App.I,42B.3056 //
GE07hv_apppu:24851: ye ca mokṣaiṣiṇo loke yoginaḥ sāṃkhyakāpilāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24853: sarvakāmaprado hy eṣa stavo 'nantasya kīrtyate // HV_App.I,42B.3059 //
GE07hv_apppu:24854: yaḥ paṭhet prātar utthāya śuciḥ prayatamānasaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24855: sarvakāmam avāpnoti mānavo nātra saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.3061 //
GE07hv_apppu:24856: eṣa vai vāmano nāma prādurbhāvo mahātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24857: vedavidbhir dvijair eva paṭhyate vaiṣṇavaṃ yaśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.3063 //
GE07hv_apppu:24858: yas tv imaṃ vāmanaṃ divyaṃ prādurbhāvaṃ mahātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24859: śṛṇuyān niyato bhaktyā sadā parvasu parvasu // HV_App.I,42B.3065 //
GE07hv_apppu:24860: parān vijayate rājā yathā viṣṇur mahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24861: yaśo vipulam āpnoti vipulaṃ cāpnute vasu // HV_App.I,42B.3067 //
GE07hv_apppu:24862: priyo bhavati bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ vāmano yathā /
GE07hv_apppu:24866: [k: On the other hand, T1.2 G1.5 M2.4 ins. after line 3068, G3.4
GE07hv_apppu:24868: paṭhan nityam idaṃ sarvaṃ caritaṃ vāmanasya ha /
GE07hv_apppu:24869: bhaktyā niṣkalmaṣo bhūtvā dīrgham āyur avāpnuyāt /
GE07hv_apppu:24870: [k: T1.2 G1.5 M2.4 cont., G3.4 ins. after line 3070:k]
GE07hv_apppu:24871: cintayed vāmanaṃ nityaṃ śriyaḥ prāptuṃ yad icchasi /
GE07hv_apppu:24872: śrāvayed divyam ākhyānaṃ brāhmaṇebhyo dine dine /
GE07hv_apppu:24878: abhīkṣṇaṃ garbhiṇī śrutvā namasyati ca vāmanam /
GE07hv_apppu:24880: yas tv imāṃ harivaṃśasya saṃhitāṃ nikhilāṃ paṭhet /
GE07hv_apppu:24881: so 'sukṣaye brahmalokaṃ gantā vai nātra saṃśayaḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:24883: pitāmahaḥ pitā caiva viṣṇur eva na saṃśayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24886: manasā karmaṇā vācā dveṣam eteṣu varjayet /
GE07hv_apppu:24887: pretyānantyaṃ phalaṃ bhuṅkte iha caiva na saṃśayaḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:24889: ko hy anyaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣān mahābhāratakṛd bhavet //
GE07hv_apppu:24890: dharmāṇāṃ bhāvināṃ caiva ko brūyāt tam ṛte prabhum /
GE07hv_apppu:24891: vartatāṃ te mahāyajño yathā saṃkalpitas tvayā //
GE07hv_apppu:24892: saṃkalpitāśvamedhas tvaṃ śrutvā dharmāṃś ca śāsvatān /
GE07hv_apppu:24893: āyuṣo 'nte tapas taptvā gantāsi tvaṃ narādhipa //
GE07hv_apppu:24894: etat te mahad ākhyānaṃ śrutvā tvaṃ pārthivottama /
GE07hv_apppu:24896: prādurbhāvo vāmanasya kathitaś caiṣa te mayā /
GE07hv_apppu:24897: rājarṣīṇām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca nāradasya ca saṃnidhau //
GE07hv_apppu:24898: eṣā te vaiṣṇavī caryā mayā kārtsnyena kīrtitā /
GE07hv_apppu:24900: āścaryaparvam akhilaṃ yo hīdaṃ śṛṇuyān naraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24901: nāśubhaṃ prāpnuyā[t] kiṃcid dīrgham āyur avāpnuyāt //
GE07hv_apppu:24902: yaś cedaṃ brāhmaṇo 'dhīte śucir bhūtvā sanātanaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24906: ā brahmabhavanāc cāpi yaśaḥ khyātim asaṃśayam /
GE07hv_apppu:24907: bhaviṣyati nṛpaśreṣṭha satyam etad bravīmi te //
GE07hv_apppu:24911: śaunakād yair hi saṃkṣepād bistareṇa tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:24912: proktas te harivaṃśas tu kim anyat kathayāmi te /
GE07hv_apppu:24914: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 43, transliterated by H. Brinkhaus,
GE07hv_apppu:24915: proof--read by H. Brinkhaus, version of May 30, 2002 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:24916: [k: K1 V1.3 B Dn Ds D3-5 cont. after Appendix I, No. 40; Ñ2 ins. after Adhyāya 118, V2 after line 13 of Appendix I, No. 41; D6 cont. after Appendix I, No. 42B, G3 after Appendix I, No. 41 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24918: tryakṣād vadham ahaṃ brahmañ śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24921: śṛṇu vistarataḥ sarvaṃ yan māṃ pṛcchasi naidhanam /
GE07hv_apppu:24923: śaṃkareṇa vadhaṃ rājañ śūlais tribhir ajihmagaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:24928: maṇibhiś ca prakāśadbhiḥ sarvaratnaiś ca toraṇaiḥ // HV_App.I,43.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:24929: babhāse nabhaso madhye śriyā paramayā jvalat /
GE07hv_apppu:24930: gandharvāṇām ivodagraṃ karmaṇā sādhitaṃ puraṃ // HV_App.I,43.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:24932: puraṃ prabhākaraṃ śreṣṭhaṃ manobhiḥ kāmacāriṇaḥ // HV_App.I,43.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:24940: bhavanair bahuvarṇaiś ca prāṃśubhiḥ samalaṃkṛtaiḥ // HV_App.I,43.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:24948: babhau valgujanākīrṇaṃ vanaṃ caitrarathaṃ yathā // HV_App.I,43.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:24950: rarāja tripuraṃ rājan mahadvidyud ivāmbaram // HV_App.I,43.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:24951: sūryanābhaś ca daityendraś candranābhaś ca bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:24952: tathānye ca mahāvīryā dānavā baladarpitāḥ // HV_App.I,43.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:24953: mamṛduś ca babhañjuś ca mohitāḥ parameṣṭhinā /
GE07hv_apppu:24954: panthānaṃ devagamanaṃ pitṛyānaṃ ca bhārata // HV_App.I,43.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:24959: vivarṇavadanā dīnāś chinne ca gatikarmaṇi // HV_App.I,43.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:24962: teṣāṃ caiva vadhopāyaṃ vadasva vadatāṃ vara /
GE07hv_apppu:24963: yaṃ jñātvā bāhubalino vadhema samare parān // HV_App.I,43.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:24966: gacchadhvam amarāḥ sarve rudram ārādhituṃ bhuvi /
GE07hv_apppu:24967: sa eva nigrahe śakto daityānāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ //
GE07hv_apppu:24969: tapasā tasya devasya samartho vai tato bhavet /
GE07hv_apppu:24973: sa eva hatvā tān sarvān kuśalaṃ vo vidhāsyati //
GE07hv_apppu:24975: avadhyā dānavāḥ sarve ṛte śaṃkaram avyayam // HV_App.I,43.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:24976: pratigṛhya ca tadvākyaṃ manobhir vāgbhir eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:24977: bhūmau prapedire sarve saha rudraiś ca bhārata // HV_App.I,43.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:24978: vindhyapāde ca merau ca madhye ca pṛthivītale /
GE07hv_apppu:24982: vinyastadarbhanicaye tāmraṃ lohaṃ ca bhūṣaṇam // HV_App.I,43.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:24983: paridhānāni carmāṇi mṛdūni ca śubhāni ca /
GE07hv_apppu:24991: varadānaṃ vṛthāsmāsu bhagavan vimukhe tvayi // HV_App.I,43.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:24993: yad uktaṃ devadevena khecarāṇāṃ samīpataḥ // HV_App.I,43.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:25000: evaṃ devavacobhiś ca bhāvino 'rthasya vai balāt /
GE07hv_apppu:25001: samanahyan mahādevo devaiḥ saha savāsavaiḥ // HV_App.I,43.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:25003: sarve kāñcana varṇābhā babhur dīptā ivāgnayaḥ // HV_App.I,43.68 //
GE07hv_apppu:25004: rudreṇa sahitā rudrā dahanta iva tejasā /
GE07hv_apppu:25005: saṃnaddhāś cārumukuṭāḥ prāṃśavaḥ parvatā iva // HV_App.I,43.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:25009: tripuraṃ yodhayat tryakṣaḥ pragṛhya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ // HV_App.I,43.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:25010: atha daityā bhinnadehāḥ purāṭ ṭālagatā iva /
GE07hv_apppu:25011: nyapatan bhuvi dehais te viśīrṇā iva parvatāḥ // HV_App.I,43.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:25012: abhividdhāḥ praviddhāś ca cayāṭ ṭālagatā nṛpa /
GE07hv_apppu:25013: nyapatan daityasaṃghāś ca vajreṇeva hatā nagāḥ // HV_App.I,43.78 //
GE07hv_apppu:25015: bāṇaiś ca bhinnamarmāṇo daityendrā yudhi gocare /
GE07hv_apppu:25016: prapetuḥ sahitā urvyāṃ chinnapakṣā ivācalāḥ // HV_App.I,43.81 //
GE07hv_apppu:25017: tatra saṃjñāṃ vyamuñcanta tena dīptena tejasā /
GE07hv_apppu:25019: nopālabhyanta cakṣurbhyām api divyena cakṣuṣā // HV_App.I,43.84 //
GE07hv_apppu:25020: astaṃ prāpte dinakare surendrās te niśāmukhe /
GE07hv_apppu:25022: atha daityā jayaṃ prāptā niśāyāṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:25023: vinedur vipulair nādair meghā iva mahāravāḥ // HV_App.I,43.88 //
GE07hv_apppu:25029: suraiś ca sahitaḥ sarvai ratham āsthāya śaṃkaraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:25030: darpitān abhinad daityān prabhindann iva vai diśaḥ // HV_App.I,43.95 //
GE07hv_apppu:25033: sa ratho vājibhiḥ śīghrair uhyamāno manojavaiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:25034: vibabhau nabhaso madhye savidyud iva toyadaḥ // HV_App.I,43.99 //
GE07hv_apppu:25036: bhāti sma sa ratho rājan sendrāyudha ivāmbudaḥ // HV_App.I,43.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:25038: karmabhiḥ pūrvajaṃ pūrvaiḥ śucibhis tryambakaṃ tadā // HV_App.I,43.103 //
GE07hv_apppu:25042: prahṛṣṭavadanāḥ saumyāḥ paitrye sthānāntare nṛpa // HV_App.I,43.107 //
GE07hv_apppu:25046: surāṇām arayo madhye tīkṣṇāgrāṇi samantataḥ // HV_App.I,43.111 //
GE07hv_apppu:25047: śataghnībhiś ca nighnanto bhallaiḥ śūlaiś ca bhārata /
GE07hv_apppu:25048: te cakrire mahatkarma dānavā yuddhakovidāḥ // HV_App.I,43.113 //
GE07hv_apppu:25049: gadābhiś ca gadā jaghnur bhallair bhallāṃś ca cicchiduḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:25050: astrair astrāṇy abādhanta māyāṃ māyābhir eva ca // HV_App.I,43.115 //
GE07hv_apppu:25052: aśanīś ca mahāghorā yuktāḥ śatasahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,43.117 //
GE07hv_apppu:25054: te vadhyamānā vibudhāḥ śaravarṣair avasthitāḥ // HV_App.I,43.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:25058: citraiś ca bahubhiḥ śastrair atiṣṭhata śacīpatiḥ // HV_App.I,43.123 //
GE07hv_apppu:25059: tato madhye divyaśabdaḥ prādur āsīn mahīpate /
GE07hv_apppu:25060: ṛṣīṇāṃ brahmaputrāṇāṃ mahatām api bhārata // HV_App.I,43.125 //
GE07hv_apppu:25061: sa eṣa śaṃkarasyāgre ratho bhūmiṃ pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:25062: ajeyo jayyatāṃ prāptaḥ sarvalokasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,43.127 //
GE07hv_apppu:25063: tasmin nipatite rājan rathānāṃ pravare rathe /
GE07hv_apppu:25066: vicukṣubhuḥ samudrāś ca na rejuś ca diśo daśa // HV_App.I,43.131 //
GE07hv_apppu:25067: vṛddhāś ca brāhmaṇās tatra jepuś ca paramaṃ japam /
GE07hv_apppu:25068: yat tad brahmamayaṃ tejaḥ sarvatra vijayaiṣiṇām // HV_App.I,43.133 //
GE07hv_apppu:25069: śāntyartham iha bhūtānām iha loke paratra ca /
GE07hv_apppu:25072: tejasā jvalayan viṣṇos tryakṣasya ca mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,43.137 //
GE07hv_apppu:25074: ṛṣīṇāṃ tapasāḍhyānāṃ vasatāṃ vijane vane // HV_App.I,43.139 //
GE07hv_apppu:25075: atha viṣṇur mahāyogī sarvato dṛṣya tattvataḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:25081: nanāda balavan nādaṃ samudra iva parvaṇi // HV_App.I,43.146 //
GE07hv_apppu:25083: punas te kṛtasaṃnāhā yuyudhuḥ sumahābalāḥ // HV_App.I,43.148 //
GE07hv_apppu:25086: agniṃ saṃdhāya dhanuṣi taṃ ca bāṇaṃ suyantritam /
GE07hv_apppu:25088: mumuce daityanagare tridhā śabdena saṃjñitam // HV_App.I,43.153 //
GE07hv_apppu:25089: taṃ bāṇaṃ trividhaṃ vīryāt saṃdhāya manasā prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:25090: satyena brahmayogena tapogreṇa ca bhārata // HV_App.I,43.155 //
GE07hv_apppu:25092: dīptān kanakavarṇābhān suparṇāṃś ca sunirmalān // HV_App.I,43.157 //
GE07hv_apppu:25093: muktvā śaravarān ghorān saviṣān iva pannagān /
GE07hv_apppu:25094: supradīptais tribhir bāṇair vegibhis tad vidāritam // HV_App.I,43.159 //
GE07hv_apppu:25100: tāni tasya tu dagdhāni vaidūryasadṛśāni vai /
GE07hv_apppu:25104: tatas tu vijayī rudraḥ sevyamāno maharṣibhiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:25105: vṛṣarūpaṃ tadā viṣṇuṃ pūjayan prayayau girim //
GE07hv_apppu:25106: ya imaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ vijayaṃ śaṃkarasya ca /
GE07hv_apppu:25107: sarvatra vijayaṃ prāptaḥ sa tu dīrghāyur āpnuyāt //
GE07hv_apppu:25108: hate tu tripure devair vāco harṣāt kileritāḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:25109: sarvāñ jahīti śatrūṃs tvaṃ pravṛddhān puruṣottama // HV_App.I,43.169 //
GE07hv_apppu:25110: viṣṇur eva mahāyogī yogena prasmayann iva /
GE07hv_apppu:25114: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 44, transliterated by H. Brinkhaus,
GE07hv_apppu:25115: proof--read by H. Brinkhaus, version of September 20, 2001 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:25116: [k: K1 Ñ2 V1 B2 Dn Ds D4.5 cont. after Appendix I, No. 43; K2 cont. after Appendix I, No. 42B; D3 ins. after line 26 of Appendix I, No. 45; D6 cont.
GE07hv_apppu:25119: harivaṃśe 'tra vṛttāntāḥ kramād ete ihoditāḥ // HV_App.I,44.1 //
GE07hv_apppu:25120: tatrādya ādisargas tu bhūtasargas tataḥ paraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:25121: pṛthor vainyasya cākhyānaṃ manūnāṃ kīrtanaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,44.3 //
GE07hv_apppu:25124: pitṛkalpas tathotpattiḥ somasya ca budhasya ca /
GE07hv_apppu:25131: saṃkṣepāt kīrtitā viṣṇoḥ prādurbhāvās tataḥ param // HV_App.I,44.11 //
GE07hv_apppu:25133: yoganidrāsamutthānaṃ viṣṇor vākyaṃ ca vedhasaḥ // HV_App.I,44.13 //
GE07hv_apppu:25138: tato nāradavākyaṃ ca svapnagarbhavidhis tathā // HV_App.I,44.15 //
GE07hv_apppu:25140: govraje gamanaṃ viṣṇoḥ śakaṭasya nivartanam // HV_App.I,44.17 //
GE07hv_apppu:25144: damanaṃ kāliyasyāpi dhenukasya vadhas tathā // HV_App.I,44.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:25149: andhakasya ca vākyāni keśino nidhanaṃ tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:25153: mālākāre mālyayācñā varadānaṃ ca tasya vai /
GE07hv_apppu:25169: śṛgālasya vadhas tatra mathurāgamanaṃ tataḥ // HV_App.I,44.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:25171: upāyena vadhaḥ kāla+ yavanasya prakīrtitaḥ // HV_App.I,44.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:25173: vivāhaś caiva rukmiṇyā rukmiṇo nidhanaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,44.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:25175: narakasya vadhaḥ pāri+ jātasya haraṇaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,44.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:25176: [k: K2, V1, D4 subst. for line 43 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:25181: dvārakāyāṃ praveśaś ca sabhāyāṃ ca praveśanam // HV_App.I,44.45 //
GE07hv_apppu:25191: śambarasya vadhaś caiva dhanyopākhyānam eva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:25194: bhaviṣyaṃ cātra dāhaś ca tripurasya udāhṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:25197: [k: Dn Ds2 Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:25216: loke sajjanaṣaṭpadair ahar ahaḥ pepīyamānaṃ mudā @
GE07hv_apppu:25222: ||* **HV_App.I,44.58**10:21: iti śrīmanmahābhārate śatasahasrasaṃhitāyāṃ vaiyyāsakyāṃ pārijāte sakalaharicarite khilasaṃjñaṃ samāptam *||
GE07hv_apppu:25224: tripurasyāpi dāhaś ca iti vṛttāntasaṃgrahaḥ // HV_App.I,44.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:25229: [k: follows postscriptum in prose -- not transliterated. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:25230: [k: V1 ins. *12 = lines 160-173 of Appendix I, No. 40. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:25233: vṛttāntaṃ śṛṇuyād yas tu sāyaṃ prātaḥ samāhitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:25234: sa yāti vaiṣṇavaṃ dhāma labdhakāmaḥ kurūdvaha //
GE07hv_apppu:25237: imāṃ ca saṃhitāṃ ceti sarvaśāstramayīṃ tathā /
GE07hv_apppu:25238: ekakālaṃ dvikālaṃ vā trikālaṃ vāpi yaḥ paṭhet //
GE07hv_apppu:25240: śivālaye tathā kṣetre naimiṣe puṣkare tathā // **HV_App.I,44.59**14:4
GE07hv_apppu:25241: śucir bhūtvā dampatī ca vācakaṃ pūjayet sudhīḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:25243: khilo viṣṇuḥ prasīdeta vācakaḥ paṭhanāt punaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:25245: śrutvā ca labhate lakṣmīṃ saṃtatiṃ manasepsitāṃ /
GE07hv_apppu:25251: kṛṣṇāt paraṃ kim api tattvam ahaṃ na jāne ||
GE07hv_apppu:25253: ya idaṃ śrāvayed vidvān samastaṃ tv ardham eva vā /
GE07hv_apppu:25254: pādamātraṃ tadardhaṃ vā tv ekaṃ cākhyānaṃ uttamam /
GE07hv_apppu:25255: sa namasyaḥ prayatnena viṣṇoḥ saṃprītaye sadā //
GE07hv_apppu:25257: tasmai deyaṃ prayatnena viṣṇoḥ saṃprītaye sadā /
GE07hv_apppu:25258: ya etat pustakaṃ ramyaṃ leṣayitvā samarpa .. /
GE07hv_apppu:25260: atrākhyānāni yāvanti ślokā yāvanta eva hi /
GE07hv_apppu:25262: yāvanty api ca mātrāṇi yāvantyaḥ patrapaṅkayaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:25266: aputraḥ śṛṇuyād yas tu susnātaḥ śraddhayānvitaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:25270: yasya viśveśvaras tuṣṭas tasmai tacchravaṇe matiḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:25272: tac chrotavyaṃ manuṣyeṇa paramaṃ padam icchatā /
GE07hv_apppu:25277: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 45, transliterated by Horst Brinkhaus,
GE07hv_apppu:25278: proof--read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of September 26, 2002 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:25279: [k: Dn D3.5.6 cont. after App. I, No. 44 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:25282: kiṃ phalaṃ kiṃ ca deyaṃ vai tad brūhi tvaṃ mamāgrataḥ // HV_App.I,45.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:25284: harivaṃśe purāṇe tu śrute ca bharatottama /
GE07hv_apppu:25286: tat sarvaṃ nāśam āyāti himaṃ sūryodaye yathā // HV_App.I,45.5 //
GE07hv_apppu:25288: tat phalaṃ samavāpnoti vaiṣṇavo nātra saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,45.7 //
GE07hv_apppu:25290: striyaś ca puruṣāś caiva vaiṣṇavaṃ padam āpnuyuḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:25292: śṛṇvantaḥ śraddhayā yuktā vaiṣṇavaṃ padam āpnuyuḥ // HV_App.I,45.9 //
GE07hv_apppu:25294: bhaviṣyanti narā rājan satyaṃ satyaṃ vadāmy aham // HV_App.I,45.11 //
GE07hv_apppu:25295: strībhiś ca putrakāmābhiḥ śrotavyaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ yaśaḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:25297: vācakāya yathāśaktyā yathoktaṃ phalam icchatā // HV_App.I,45.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:25299: vācakāya pradadyād vai ātmanaḥ śreyakāṅkṣayā // HV_App.I,45.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:25300: alaṃkāraṃ pradadyāc ca pāṇyor vai bharatarṣabha /
GE07hv_apppu:25301: karṇasyābharaṇaṃ dadyād yānaṃ ca saviśeṣataḥ // HV_App.I,45.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:25303: bhūmidānasamaṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,45.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:25305: ghoṭakaṃ javinaṃ dadyād vṛṣaṃ ca dhuri yojitam /
GE07hv_apppu:25306: śṛṇoti śrāvayād vāpi harivaṃśaṃ tu yo naraḥ /
GE07hv_apppu:25309: kuṇḍale caiva dātavye ūrṇāvastraṃ tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_apppu:25310: samāptau vidhivad vastraṃ deyaṃ kṣaumaṃ dvijātaye //
GE07hv_apppu:25312: ātmānaṃ sasutaṃ caiva striyaṃ ca bharatarṣabha /
GE07hv_apppu:25313: daśāṃśaś cātra homo vai kāryaḥ śrotrā narādhipa // HV_App.I,45.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:25314: idaṃ mayā tavāgre ca sarvaṃ proktaṃ nararṣabha /
GE07hv_apppu:25316: aputraḥ putram āpnoti adhano dhanam āpnuyāt // HV_App.I,45.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:25318: tat phalaṃ labhate nūnaṃ purāṇaśravaṇād dhareḥ // HV_App.I,45.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:25320: sakṛt purāṇaśravaṇāt pūto bhavati nānyathā // HV_App.I,45.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:25321: idaṃ mayā te parikīrtitaṃ mahac @ HV_App.I,45.33 @
GE07hv_apppu:25323: śṛṇvan paṭhann āśu samāpnuyāt phalaṃ @ HV_App.I,45.35 @
GE07hv_apppu:25324: yac cāpi lokeṣu sudurlabhaṃ mahat || HV_App.I,45.36 ||
